name: Large room & balcony in Redfern
summary: A large room with balcony conveniently located in the inner city suburb of Redfern. Almost everything you want to see or do in Sydney is on your doorstep. I am happy to answer any inquiries and hope to welcome you as a guest soon.
space: This is a north facing spacious room with balcony, with plenty of room for two. Included in your room is a queen sized (and comfortable) bed with a king sized quilt, extra pillows & blankets for your comfort, a small fridge and a large wardrobe. Unlimited wifi is also included!
description: A large room with balcony conveniently located in the inner city suburb of Redfern. Almost everything you want to see or do in Sydney is on your doorstep. I am happy to answer any inquiries and hope to welcome you as a guest soon. This is a north facing spacious room with balcony, with plenty of room for two. Included in your room is a queen sized (and comfortable) bed with a king sized quilt, extra pillows & blankets for your comfort, a small fridge and a large wardrobe. Unlimited wifi is also included! There is a comfortable lounge area available to you with digital television, DVD player & an extensive movies collection. Also available to you is the washing machine and dryer located in the main bathroom (detergent provided) and the kitchen with all the necessary cooking utensils. I look forward to welcoming you to the apartment, and of course will be available to assist you throughout your stay with us. I am always happy to recommend where to eat & drink, share shopping tips, and pr
neighborhood_overview: Redfern is a really cool place to live and Tay with loads of clothes, furniture & retro/vintage shopping, cafes, pubs and small bars. It also has fantastic amenities such as grocery stores, fruit & veg shops, food & night markets, post office and a number of great restaurants with Aussie & international cuisine.
notes: I also have a second AirBnB room available in the same apartment: https://airbnb.com/rooms/7890243?s=8 Please note that there is a super friendly dog in the apartment who loves to meet new guests, his name is Ruski and he is a 7 year old Groodle (golden retriever x standard poodle) who is a gentle as they come.  The apartment is located in the perfect position with close proximity to: Sydney's CBD Australian Technology Park Victoria Park Pool Sydney's Chinatown The Capitol Theatre Sydney University campus Prince Alfred Park Pool Central Railway station Redfern & Erskineville Ovals Royal Prince Alfred Hospital Broadway Shopping Centre & Hoyts cinemas Glebe markets Carriageworks We are located just a short distance from: Star City Casino Darling Harbour, Cockle Bay Wharf & Kings Street Wharf The Rocks & Sydney Observatory Sydney Aquarium & Wildlife World Art Gallery of New South Wales Hyde Park & War Memorial The Royal Botanic Gardens  Sydney Harbour Bridge & Sydney Opera House Sydney Fi
transit: Step outside the front door and catch a cab, we are minutes to wherever you need to go. Alternatively, walk up to Redfern train station which is linked to almost every line on the Sydney Trains network. You can also connect to the Light Rail network with a quick train ride into Central Station which will connect you to yet another part of Sydney. If the weather is good, a walk into Sydney city / CBD district is definitely manageable and will take you only 15-20 minutes. If you have a car, no problem, there is unmetered parking in the immediate area 24/7 however please take note of the clearway restrictions.
access: There is a comfortable lounge area available to you with digital television, DVD player & an extensive movies collection. Also available to you is the washing machine and dryer located in the main bathroom (detergent provided) and the kitchen with all the necessary cooking utensils.
interaction: I look forward to welcoming you to the apartment, and of course will be available to assist you throughout your stay with us. I am always happy to recommend where to eat & drink, share shopping tips, and provide advice on local attractions & markets if so desired.
house_rules: This space is one of respect and good energy. Please feel free to make yourself at home, however be respectful of the space and the people within it. In addition, we ask you to clean up after yourself in common areas (bathroom and kitchen) and refrain from smoking within the apartment or on the balcony during your stay.  Only guests listed on the AirBnB booking are permitted to stay in the apartment. Visitors without the permission of the host are not welcome in the apartment. At this time, I don't not accept bookings with children under the age of 16 years.  * Please note that I will be as flexible as I can with check in & check out times. If you have a particular time that you wish to check in, please confirm that with me before making a booking. In all other cases, I am available early morning and then again early evening check ins during the week as I do work full time and almost any time of the day on the weekends. In most cases, we will usually work out the check in time in the w

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed staying with Kath,  the place was great and really clean and tidy. Also really central and close to supermarkets and redfern train station. The fridge in the room was a lovely touch, as were the welcome biscuits! :)

My overall experience at Redfern at Kath's was very high and enjoyable. This room was actually my second room staying with Kath right after the first which was also a wonderful experience. Kath was consistently a wonderful lady who made my partner and I feel very welcome right from the start, all the way to the end. Even prior to meeting her in person, what  I was impressed with how highly responsive Kath was with communication. She was very welcoming and friendly with an approachable nature. The room was very accurate to description; quite large and spacious with lots of natural light, especially with a wonderful and large balcony attached. I was very impressed with the interior design of the room by Kath herself which brought out the unique aspects, and brought character to the room. It was bright and beautiful with wonderful combinations of patterns and colours. It was very impressive. Everything was accessible and ready when we arrived, including many fresh towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash etc.,as well as chargers on either sides of the bed. The bed itself was very large and comfortable. Additionally, Kath even went out shopping and brought home cereal etc. which made us feel welcome. In addition, the accommodation at Redfern itself was quite convenient. It was approximately 200m away from the train station which was very close by Central (even within walking distance ~15mins). Late night shops, especially bars and restaurants were also close-by and near walking distance. Definitely will be recommending to family and friends to stay :). Thanks Kath.

Loved my time at kath's apartment, spacious room with balcony, the welcome Tim tams were a treat.

It was so easy to get to the city from redfern station two blocks up. 

Would recommend staying there to anyone, didn't want to leave after a week
The room is exactly like the pictures and the balcony is very nice. It was really close to the train station and you are very fast in the city.

Both the host and the apartment were wonderful. The apartment is very clean and well organised, with paintings and decorations around the apartment providing a soothe homely feeling. Inside the room was a wooden stand with towels, books and dvds which added a lot of personality to the apartment. The room had a nice balcony attached to it which provided a nice place to eat and relax. As well as this, the room had 2 powerboards next to the bed so everything can be plugged in and a mini-fridge next to the bed.

The host provided most of the items that you might not remember to bring with you including plates, cups, cutlery, shampoo/body wash and more. The apartment was less than a 2 minute walk from the Redfern Train Station which is just 1 stop away from central, so this was in the perfect location to do sight seeing. 

I would recommend staying at this apartment.
Kath was a great host, everything was well prepared when we arrived.
My husband and I stayed for 3 nights. It was a happy stay at Kath's home! It was clean and comfy. It was just like friend's house! Thanks for Kath!!!

Kath is a great host. She is nice and very accommodating. She welcome us when we arrived and explain how everything worked out in the apartment. The apartment is clean and well organized. The room is nice and comfy, just exactly like what it was described. And of course, as shared by previous guests, there are tim tam, fruits and bread with jams provided for us. For location.., it is great! Close to the Redfern station, need only few minutes to reach the city. Thanks Kath!

Out stay with Kath was great! She was a very helpful and nice host!
Thanks for having us!

Staying at Kath's place was an amazing experience! My mum and I were there for a few days to explore Sydney. Great location just minutes away from the train station and it took no time at all to get to the CBD. It was a really nice room with a nice balcony and everything was clean. It was great that we also had our own private mini fridge. Kath provided towels and soaps for the shower as well. Kath also provided suggestions for things to do in Sydney and she recommended a restaurant called Blue Fish in Darling Harbour which was the most delicious seafood dinner I have ever had. The service at the restaurant was also amazing, we mentioned Kath's name and they gave us a free calamari dish! The view from the restaurant was also beautiful. If you want a nice seafood dish I would definitely recommend it! Overall the experience was lovely and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again if I'm ever back in Sydney. Thanks Kath!
Lovely room, good setting, good communication. Many thanks

Friendly host, even welcomed us an hour earlier than we arranged. Thanks again, kath! Room was clean, balcony was a great addition to the room. Had a fridge in the room as well - would stay there again.

Kath was a very good host, she welcome us at the door show us arround the house, we feel at home, there is tv if you want to watch news or you can watch dvd, nice place to be and easy going to the train station 5mns walk..Thank you Kath

This room was lovely! I bring my cup of coffee to the balcony every morning and do a bit of light reading because the balcony is just perfect for that.
Kath was generous with amenities, a lot of pillows, a lot of towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, all at our disposal. Coffee, milk, tea and bread on the house.
Fan is available too. Initially wanted to let the cool air in, but cars keep passing by so best to get that glass door shut to keep the noise out.
If the two rooms are rented, bathroom time can be tricky in the morning so best to get up early, i guess. (Ask whether the other room will be rented on your dates!)
Location is very ideal, a few steps away from Redfern station, one stop away from Central and easily accessible to everywhere. Did not get to try the bus from here, as trains got us everywhere anyway.
Uber to airport was $29.
A wonderful place and host. Cheers.

Kath is an amazing hostess, she cared for every detail to make your stay in Sydney was the best !! The location of the apartment is very good, just steps from a train station. If I return to Sydney sure I will contact again.

We were warmly welcomed by Kath and Rusky when we arrived and was glad that the room was spacious, clean, comfortable and well equipped. Our stay was very pleasant and convenient given the train/bus stations are just within 5 mins walk. The washing machine and dryer was a plus for our stay. All in all, we did enjoy our time with them. We highly recommend Kath's place.

Kath is a very accommodating and friendly host. I arrived late on the day and she waited patiently for me to check in. She lives at a super convenient location - 10 minutes train ride to city, apple store, China town etc. Would definitely stay again next time I'm in Sydney!!

Kath's apartment was a great way to start our vacation. We stayed in the room with the balcony and had plenty of room. Kath supplied bread, fruit and other breakfast items. We also enjoyed the many bakeries that are close to the apartment. Kath thought of everything from a fridge in the room, big bath towels, washer and dryer, to Tim Tam cookies. We enjoyed pleasant conversations and Kath was a great asset in dealing with our little emergency.  Kath was willing for us to check in early in the morning after flying in from the US. The only drawback was sharing the small bathroom with the other Airbnb guests who were staying there, but this was just a minor inconvenience.

Kath was a  very warm & welcoming host, ably assisted by her adorable dog Rusti! The room was as shown with the useful addition of a small fridge, and the private balcony off the room was a lovely place to sit & eat, chat, etc. The apartment was well appointed and a wonderful location, particularly to Technology Park where I was attending a seminar. Kath offered great hints for local restaurants, etc. Would highly recommend staying here!
Absolutely loved my stay at Kath's. Felt just at home the entire time. So close to everything including Redfern Station. Will definitely be staying again!

The room is the ideal urban retreat - large and airy, with a sunny balcony, only 5 minutes away from Redfern station and the vibrant strip of restaurants and bars along Redfern Street. Kath has a large number of guests, and she has the routine of welcoming people into her home down pat - she strikes the perfect balance between making you feel at home and giving you space to get on with things. A special bonus was her gorgeous dog, who was always ready for pats and to shake hands. Would definitely stay here again!
Kath is very nice person and we like her dog very much. The location is close to the train station and easy to go anyplace. The apartment is same as the pictures. If I come, I will choose it again.
Kath was a great host, very communicative and flexible! Will stay with her again :)
Kath is a nice guy ~ She provide nice breakfast. She have a dog , so cute ~ The room is very comfortable~
Our stay at Kath's place was wonderful! She was friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. The location was easily accessible to the train station as well.
I second what other guests have mentioned. Great location, cosy room, felt right at home. Loved having Ruski around too. Thanks Kath for having me!

It's a very comfortable home, complete with a very friendly big and lovable dog! We didn't feel incredibly safe out at night in the neighbourhood but the house was a secure safe haven for us. Thanks Kath & Ruski!
Kath is a beautiful hosted ,we  all like her and lovely Ruski ,a big dog .Her house is clean and warm .We enjoyed our holiday in Sydney.Thanks Kath !we will miss you!Good luck to her!
Another wonderful stay always. Kath was very professional and kept the room in a great state. I'll keep going back everytime I'm in Sydney.

Kath was very friendly and a perfect host. Although she had to work during daytime she was helpful and her apartment was nice and clean! Good connection to the city. Train station is only 2 minutes walk! Definitely would recommend staying at her place!
Great and friendly place, loved the interior and balcony. Loved Rusty, the dog.

I had a very comfortable stay here. Kath is a great host, and her dog Ruski is very friendly. The room was clean, and the place is very close to a train station (just one stop to the city center). The neighborhood is a bit quiet with not many people around, but doesn't feel unsafe. Thanks Kath!
it was good time with kath and rusky.
Kath was super friendly and the place was very comfortable, super close to the railway.

Good location & clean room with balcony. I enjoyed the time at Sydney thanks to her house. The room was clean and she provided enough towels and the other amenities. The balcony was sweet too. The dog, Ruski was my favorite in her house. It is so lovely.
Kath was a wonderful host- very clean, safe, welcoming accommodations- and we fell in love with her dog! We Highly recommend her place.
Great location next to Redfern train station which can take you practically anywhere in the city. Kath was a great host, providing just the right amount of guidance
Great easy stay with Kath and the dog (I forgot his name!). Very clean and comfortable and a really easy location to base from.
Kath的房子非常干净整洁,离红坊区火车站只有7分钟路程,交通非常方便!家里有一只非常可爱的dog,叫Ruski.

The apartment is located in a great neighborhood, very close to the train station. The separately balcony is really great and a nice place to spend time on a sunny day or warm night. Kath was a very welcoming host and her dog was very friendly as well! There were a few slight inconveniences, like not being able to use the bathroom from 8-10am while the cleaner was there on Saturday morning and sharing the bathroom with another set of guests, but overall I would definitely recommend the apartment!

Thanks for the hospitality, it has been a wonderful experience to me, especially this is the first time i am using the airbnb. The room and the location is perfect, i reckon your room is better than a hotel. So thanks again, hopefully see you next time.
Clean, big comfy room. Walking distance from station. Loved our stay here.

Kath has really thought about how to make the experience great for her guests. The place is super well organised and spotless. It has everything you could need (even shampoo in the room, plug adapters and spare light bulbs). Kath is very on the ball, welcoming and friendly. Ruski the dog is brilliant and an added bonus. Comfy bed and only a 5 min walk to Redfern station with good cafes nearby. Will definitely stay again.

Good location to take train at Redfern Station, nice host to clearly deliver message and guidance. Two rooms are set for Airbnb which means we will share bathroom with the other guests. Both are polite. In all, it is convenient and comfortable stay.

Excellent location and only one stop from central train station. One thing to note is that the front door of the flat is permanently left open, only secured by a mesh security gate which poses a slight security risk. This is due to the kitchen, living room or bathroom not having any windows, and needing additional circulation. Check in only offered before 8am or after 6pm which was inconvenient.
The host canceled this reservation 360 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The appartment was nice and we enjoyed taking the breakfast on the little balcony. Kath also provided us breakfast, saved us the first morning :)
We liked staying there, the room was nice and cosy and we had everything we needed. Her dog is a big relaxed one:)
交通很便利,距离地铁很近,外面还有免费的停车位｡Kath对房子的管理很利落,沟通上很简单｡
위치와 청결 모두 만족 스럽습니다

A lovely place to stay, very close to the train and clean. Kath is very helpful, apart from offering breakfast, she also patient to give me advice when I needed to buy some medicine during the trip.
Rusky, Kath's dog is very cute and good behave.

Kath's place is close to the central. there is lots of space and she is very friendly.
nice balcony!
Kath is very nice and friendly! And her pet dog is sooo cute and quiet! The room is clean and comfortable. And the traffic to Sydney center is very convenient. I strongly recommend your staying here.

Kath was a fantastic host! The room was well prepared with lots of nice little touches (balcony was a treat). Very well located next to the station and really easy to get around. All-in-all a home away from home!

Kath's apartment is well located within walking distance to the Redfern St, which was a big plus since we used public transit quite a lot during our visit. The bedroom was clean and cozy. Kath was very easy to communicate with and just as friendly as her lovely dog. The bathroom was a bit tight considering the fact that it had to be shared with the other guest couple and the host. Check-In time wasn't too flexible, but as former hosts, we understand that work and everyday schedule have to come first, so that wasn't a problem at all. We can definitely recommend this place to other travelers!

We had an extremely bad experience with Kath. When we first arrived in Sydney (8am) we were not allowed to drop our luggage off until after 5pm. We had to pay some ridiculous amount to leave it at a train staion in storage for the day.

The bed was extremely hard and uncomfortable. The toilet paper had run out at one point and wasn't even replaced for abit. The appartment was otherwise clean and very close to Redfern train station making it very convenient getting everywhere you need to go in-and-around Sydney.

We orgainised with Kath a couple of days prior to leave our luggage at the appartment on the last day as our flight wasn't until 9.30pm. We agreed we would be past to pick our luggage up at 7-7.30pm. When we messaged Kath that we were outside the appartment complex, she sent a reply message saying "she wasn't in Sydney" and that it would take around 45 minutes to organise for her to find someone to come and let us in to the apartment. Luckily for us the couple renting the other Airbnb room came home and let us in as otherwise we definitely would have missed our flight home. 

We have done many Airbnbs and they have all been fantastic. This has been the worst experience so far.
Very good host, I recommend her.

Kath's place is good, walkable distance to Redfern train station. The room
was so clean and with good smell. I loved the balcony especially! Ruski is super cute and quiet. It was a great stay anyway, although the water heater seemed not that perfect, since the temperature of water shifted to too cold or to hot sometimes.

Kath's place is closed to the Redfern station. There is a fridge in the room so that we can store our groceries Individually. There are fruit, milk and bread provided as breakfast. It's very convenient place for tripper. There are also a dog and a cat live in there.  If you are an animal lover. It should be your great choice.

lovely place Very comfortable room and good location.
Ruski is super cute dog
Very comfortable room and great location!
Kath is a really nice host . Her house is very lovely we really enjoy the place.
Kath was accomodating and responsive. The apartment was clean. A bit noisy in the morning
溝通上可能有點問題,位置是真的方便,但房東請人打掃當天才講這點讓人很不舒服,因該提早講才對｡
Good location.

Kath was a lovely host. The room was big and very comfortable for my boyfriend and I. The apartment was in kept clean and in good condition. The Redfern neighbourhood is also convenient as it is in a central location - great for tourists! Ruski was very friendly and nice to have around the house as well. Would definitely recommend Kath's place!

lovely apartment one stop from CBD which is convenient. The apartment is very clean because of well organized cleanup. However, the time of checkin time on website is incorrect and we have to store our luggage in the station, cost extra unnecessary money. And wait until 7pm to be checked in.

这家民宿是我住过的最糟糕的一家,中午到达后主人没时间让我们自己把行李寄存火车站等候她6:00到家,见面后一句客气的话没有,安排入住态度冷酷,感觉很寒心!进到房间地毯上尘土很多,毛发也多,掀开被子很多黑毛,着实让我吃惊!算了由于我停留时间长,再找其他家,在这里只好忍忍了,钱都交了免得惹麻烦,原本住民宿想自己做点可口的饭菜,结果这家女主人的冷漠让我望而却步了,每天只能牛奶麦片了,用他家烤箱还没有使用到位被她大声呵斥一顿太凶悍了!老实的忍了一周终于到期了,我换了一家舒服的公寓,摆脱了这种宣传不符的民宿,本不打算影响她的生意,结果这位女主人居然发邮件说把她家地毯弄脏了,晕!我们什么都没有做,简直了!跟她无法沟通了!我怎么招惹你就这么好欺负吗?你穷疯了吗?真想骂她!还是忍住了,实际给她评一下吧!要不然我心里也不舒服!
nice place and lovely dog

Enjoyed my stay here. The room was spacious with large windows, and a balcony. All amenities were well cleaned and the space was very comfortable. Kath was also flexible with our checkout time making it very easy for us.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kath is friendly, fast response, given clear instruction and flexible check out time which made us had wonderful stay.  Good location and quiet area! The only comment is the water heater are sometime cold after there are someone shower before us. Strongly recommend to stay with Kath & lovely Ruski !
Location was reasonably closed to the train station and CBD. This listing is suitable for travellers who are easy going.
Nice central place to stay in Sydney!!
Excellent location, very close to everything that we needed for the weekend. Very easy going and relaxing stay. Would definitely come back here again.
陽台好舒適,環境也很整潔,房東家的兩隻狗狗也超溫馴好可愛
A lovely room! Had a great stay at Kath's, she provided plenty of advice about Sydney, the dog was a gigantic cutie, and the balcony made the place an absolute stand out :)

A great place if you're wanting to explore and make the most of Sydney's pubic transport - walking distance to supermarkets and cafes and super close to a main train station. A very welcoming space :)

First time in Airbnb, Kath’s apartment is really clean and warm, Kath was away in the first two days, her friend Kane helped us with checking in, and Kane is friendly. Kath’s adorable dog Ruski is really quiet and friendly, I like him!

Kath's place is clean and very near to the Redfern station. Community is quite safe at night as the building is along the main road from the train station. Near to supermarket as well. Check in time is not exactly flexible as the host is only available early in the morning or in the evening. However, Kath did adjust check in time to 2:30pm to accommodate us. We greatly appreciate that. Generally we did have a very pleasant stay at Kath's place. Her dog is very cute too.
The location is really close to train station, the host is nice and the dogs are super cute. It’s a good stay.
Very good
Great hospitality on Kath,  awesome dog and nice room really great location
Only 3 minutes walking from Redfern station. Spacy room. The room can be a bit noisy at night since it faces Gibbons Street, but overall it was a good experience to stay at Kath's apartment.

Overall, this place is way better than I expected, i booked this place for my parents who were visiting me during the Chinese New Year holiday. Kath is an responsive and helpful host, and she has a lovely giant Teddy. Location is good, very close to the bus station and train station. Less than 10mins walk to University of Sydney, Broadway, Central Park.

The house is extremely close to redfern Station - just less than 5 minutes walk! Very convenient , there are nice cafes and a supermarket on the walk to the redfern train station.

The house is neat and clean , well maintained , with a big doggie. Milk, bread are provided for breakfast. Utensils are free to use. Kath would tell me how to keep the kitchen and bathroom clean after use.
Can sit at the sofa in the living room and watch TV while having breakfast. 

The bedroom is well decorated and with a relaxing balcony. The room is nice scented and has a Comfy atmosphere . 

Can use the washing machine and dryer so long stay tourists need not worry about running out of clothes to wear.

However, future residents have to consider that Kath has to work and has to stay at home for Check in at evening to night on your day of arrival. 
It is not convenient for her if I change my check in time (eg postpone the check in time ) on the day of arrival.
Sometimes, there may be problems in finding the transportation and arrive later than expected , then Kath has to stay at home and wait. 
Especially for those arrived at morning / early afternoon at Sydney - have to find a locker somewhere first to store the luggage first then do some sightseeing  , or maybe is not so familiar with the new environment so a bit difficult to find the right restaurant to eat - may not arrive on time at Kath’s house.

Kath will brief me on every important points of living in her house and she respected residents’ privacy well. She is of reach by using Airbnb messages. She answers promptly and instruct clearly on the check out details.

By the way, Rusky the dog is not very active and usually lies on carpet and sofa, having his own good time ~ : )

Great location, one train stop from central. 
Great room with the comfiest bed, more comfy than mine at home! A lovely balcony, great facilities and Kath provided tea, coffee, milk and bread. 
A lovely safe and quiet area. 
The biggest highlight was being greeted by Ruski the groodle. Always ready for a cuddle. 
I would highly recommend this Airbnb. Thanks Kath and Ruski.

Lovely bedroom and comfortable bed. The property is very conveniently located for the city as the train station is five minutes walk and one stop from Central Station. 
We were happy to be left to ourselves as Kath was out at work from early morning but we're a bit disappointed that breakfast items weren't replenished over the three days we were there and there were no 'ordinary' tea bags or cereal after first night.
However, we wouldn't, necessarily, let this put us off as the accommodation, itself is good.
It was a pleasant stay at Kath’s place. Near to train station, not too far from town.

Kath is a great and responsible host, her place is cozy and neat. The refrigerator in our room is so convenient. The balcony is also cute and quiet. What's more, although I'm a little bit scared of pets, but Ruski is so well behaved,adorable and quiet! We all enjoy the time we spend in here. Besides, one important factor that we choose this place is because it is close to Redfern station(2 mins)~
We've stayed at Kath's place for 8 days and felt like we're at home. The location is just perfect!
wonderful place.Good location.

Great stay at Kath's place. Excellent location and Kath's apartment is clean, comfortable with all amenities needed for a relaxing and homely stay. Kath is also extremely friendly and helpful! Thanks for a great stay :)

Kath and her dog Ruski welcomed us into their very clean and well maintained home.  When we arrived earlier than check in, she offered us luggage drop off and even a shower. Kath has a fantastic location.  Only a 5 minute walk to the train station and 10 minute ride to downtown Sydney.  Our favorite coffee is the The Urban Piccolo (1 block) (Say Hi to Lucas) and The Tudor Pub for a beer and a bite.  Kath had breakfast items and was always willing to answer question in person or by email.  Thanks Kath and Ruski. We highly recommend your place   --  Cheers  Barb and Chris

Really loved our stay at Kath's place. Convenient location as most trains go past Redfern, and only a one or two stations away from all the CBD goodness. The house is clean and tidy and her dog Ruski is just the sweetest!! The only thing I will say is if you're a light sleeper such as myself, it can be a bit noisy with the surroundings streets. However if thats not an issue for you then I highly recommend! :)
Kath’s place was cozy, close to the station. Rusky is a really good boy, he is well trained. I enjoy having him around during my stay.

Very nice place to stay on your trip to Sydney. Great location! Close to the train station, it’s just a short walk. The bedroom and restroom were nice and clean. 
We’ve enjoyed our stay.
Rent och bra boende nära tunnelbana. Vill man gå till Sidney centrum så är du där på 15-20 minuter. Stort rum med en stor balkong. Fanns alla saker som man kunde tänka sig behöva.

I really  really was upset about her attitude. Each room has not even key.  She was insisting on claiming me not confirming missed pillow. I was very embassed  with her act. I had seriously bad feeling about Austlaian people.

Good communication with our host. Gorgeous dog! Our only real issues were the traffic noise as this location is close to a busy thoroughfare and we stayed during a spell of hot weather and we found the pedestal fan not to be adequate. Good location in terms of close access to public transport.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND: If you are tossing up between places and Kath's apartment is in your saved lists - look no further, pick her place! The bedroom is HUGE with its on private balcony with chairs etc, and  your own fridge. The kitchen was well resourced with all the utensils you need. Great water pressure in the shower + dryer / washer for you to use. My FAV part of my stay was ofcourse Ruski. He is a gentle giant who loves a pat and will melt your heart.

name: Family ap. in best place of Ipanema
summary: Aired and large apartment ( 144m2 ) in the prime quadrilateral of Ipanema. Located between the beach and the lake. Close to the best shops, cinemas, bars, bookstores and restaurants.
space: The apartment is large and has all the necessary amenities ( cable TV, Wi -Fi , Netflix , stereo equipment , air conditioners , refrigerator, stove , microwave , washing machine , dishes , cutlery,
description: Aired and large apartment ( 144m2 ) in the prime quadrilateral of Ipanema. Located between the beach and the lake. Close to the best shops, cinemas, bars, bookstores and restaurants. The apartment is large and has all the necessary amenities ( cable TV, Wi -Fi , Netflix , stereo equipment , air conditioners , refrigerator, stove , microwave , washing machine , dishes , cutlery, Guests have access to the concierge , elevator and apartment hall . I will be available to assist any needs of guests via telephone, cell phone, email or text message. Ipanema has the perfect balance between trade, business and leisure. Bus and subway can take you to the whole city. It will be marked using electricity. Abuses will be curbed .
neighborhood_overview: Ipanema has the perfect balance between trade, business and leisure.

house_rules: It is not allowed to enter the apartment people who are not guests. Please keep quiet after 22:00 hours. Turn off lights, air conditioners and other electrical appliances when leaving. Lock with Key the gatehouse door after 22:00 pm. The loss of keys will result in a charge of 100 reais per kit.

host.host_about: Trabalhei dez anos na Rede Globo e quatro na TV Record. Atualmente sou empresário e possuo duas lojas com minha esposa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Passamos momentos agradáveis nesse amplo e confortável apartamento com localização privilegiada em Ipanema. Nem a chuva atrapalhou nossa estadia. Grande variedade de restaurantes, bares e comércio na vizinhaça.  Foi a primeira locação para temporada e Marcelo foi extremamente gentil nos recebendo com frutas, pāes e suco. Flexibilidade de horário no checkout foi muito útil. Uma excelente opção de hospedagem na Cidade Maravilhosa.

Marcello is realy enthousiast and helpfull to make the vacation we had at Ipanema one of the best we've ever had! Check in chek out where fine just as his advice he gave us for the rest of the trip.
Towels and beds are perfect. And there was fresh fruit and some food even we arived. The appartement is nice!

Execelente anfitrião! Muito educado e atencioso! Localização perfeita, perto dos restaurantes, lojas e da praia. Apartamento muito confortável, espaçoso, bem dividido! 
Ficamos muito satisfeitos e voltaríamos sempre, com certeza!!! 
Muito obrigada, Marcelo!!!

Tivemos uma estadia muito agradável. O apartamento é amplo , comporta até 6 pessoas confortavelmente. O ponto alto deste apartamento é a localização! Fica próximo a praia (posto 10 Ipanema), próximo a ótimos restaurantes, supermercados, lojas e bares. Marcelo foi bastante atencioso e prestativo e nos recebeu com uma farta mesa de cafe da manha.
Marcelo was a great host and the apartment was very nice. Marcelo was giving a lot of tips about good places to go in Rio. The apartment was very clean, big and nicely located. Thank you very much.

Adoramos o período que ficamos no apartamento. Começou com a recepção super gentil do Marcelo que nos esperou com frutas, pães, sucos, etc. ó apartamento é amplo, bem localizado e tem tudo que se necessita para curtir o Rio. O anfitrião está bastante disponível. Só podemos recomendar e dizer que queremos voltar.

Parabens para todo.
Otima location. Super apartamento e vc Marcelo muito atencioso.
Recomendo a 100%
Great place to explore Rio! Marcelo was very responsive, understanding and caring. He helped us out with his tips and recommendations. We would stay here again :)

Marcelo is a wonderful host. We met him and picked up the keys, it was very easy. He was so kind and hospitable. Whether it was the refreshing food he left us (which was nice after a long flight) or the very helpful directions, local advice, shopping, tourism, and other recommendations, he always was there to help us.  
The apartment is very nice, as nice if not better than the photos show.  We were very pleased with the beds.  He has air conditioning and fans, although we enjoyed opening the windows and letting the breeze in as well as the sounds from the street.  The doormen who manage the front doors are very kind and helpful as well.  

I highly recommend this place to stay as it is close to everything and Marcelo is a very, very nice host and wonderful person to meet.

The experience that my friends and I had at Marcelo's apartment was wonderful. The apartment is spacious, clean, comfortable, and in a great location close to many nice restaurants and bars, both on the higher-end and casual. The apartment also feels very safe and secure--there are two very friendly doormen who work in the building and Marcelo is always available via message and whatsap. When we arrived at 9pm Marcelo had some food waiting for us on the table and was very kind to show us all the ins and outs of the apartment. He was very responsive for the duration of our stay, as well as prompt and helpful, and I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to visit Rio. It is a great base for a wonderful vacation here.

Pensou em passear com a familia no Rio de Janeiro? Entao vale MUITO a pena o apto do Marcelo! Entre o mar de Ipanema e a belissima lagoa...e perto das principais lojas, bares e pontos comerciais! As acomodacoes? Sensacionais! Apartamento grande, limpo e aconchegante!! Ressalto, ainda, a simpatia do Marcelo, sempre presente com dicas sobre a cidade.
Muito bom apto. Limpo, arejado, localização perfeita. Marcelo muiyo atencioso e inclusive nos recebeu com um café da (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei

Very good place to stay and very welcome host! Marcelo is very polite, sympathetic and helpful. The place is large and cozy, very nice living room, with large windows. Marcelo welcomed us with some fruit and other breakfast food. Exactly as described. AC's all over the apartment. We were 3 couples and 2 children (8 people). The neighbourhood is excellent, one of the best is Rio! Nice restaurants around and close supermarkets. Marcelo will leave you some good places of interest recommendations. The concierges are excellent too, calling and opening the elevator door for you. Thanks Marcelo, we loved it! RECOMMENDED!
Tivemos uma ótima estadia. O apartamento é confortável e amplo, localização excelente, anfitrião super atencioso e nos recebeu muito bem! Recomendo!!!
Ótima localização, ambiente agradável e aconchegante. Localização privilegiada e bairro muito seguro. Anfitrião disposto a ajudar sempre.

O apartamento fica muito bem localizado em Ipanema, próximo a vários bares, restaurantes, supermercado, praia, lagoa...Tudo que eu e minha família precisamos achamos com muita facilidade. Além disso as fotos demonstram de maneira idêntica como é o apartamento, com quartos grandes e arejados, sala espaçosa, todas as torneiras do apartamento com água quente e fria... Adoramos a estadia no apartamento do Marcelo e com certeza voltaremos!

Excellent host, totally recommended!,  great place to stay in Rio,  the apartment is beautiful and well Placed,  very close to the beach,  secure and comfortable,  Marcelo was so nice and gentle,  always worried about our needs
Marcelo is great, his apartment is clean, located in perfect location between the ocean and the lake. I would definitely recommend this flat to anyone

Lugar sensacional. Extremamente confortável e indicado para passar dias de tranquilidade com a família. Próximo de tudo e em ao lado da praia. O Marcelo foi super gentil, nos recebeu muito bem. Nos esperou no horário combinado e nos deu ótimas indicações, além de nos receber com um café da manhã  muito caprichoso. Super indico para quem vai com a família ao Rio.

Excelente el departamento y muy amable Marcelo. Cuenta con todas las comodidades, muy bien equipado, te hace sentir como en casa. La ubicación es ideal, cerca de bares y negocios de todo tipo, está ubicado en la mejor zona de Ipanema. Gracias marcelo tu hospitalidad hizo que pasáramos una vacaciones increíbles!!!! Volveremos!!!

O apartamento é exatamente como o anúncio, bem cuidado e muito amplo. O Marcelo foi ótimo, e esse diferencial dele de fazer compras para o café da manhã no dia que chegamos fez toda a diferença, não tivemos que nos preocupar com nada. A localização também é ótima, bem próximo da praia e de bares e restaurantes famoso de Ipanema. Voltaria muitas vezes para lá.

Notre hôte a été super, très flexible au niveau des horaires il a été à l'heure. Nous avons été accueilli avec des fruits frais, du fromage et des boissons c'était très agréable. Marcelo nous a donné toutes les explications et à rédige un petit guide à l'attention de ses invités. Il est vraiment très bien
If possible, I would rate Marcelo's with 6 stars. The location is the best and so are the accomodations. Marcelo is a gracious host and even drove us to our friends' place after we checked in.

We had a fabulous time at our apartment in Rio. The location was perfect for attending the rowing at the Olympics and we had cafes and restaurants just around the corner from the apartment. We loved Rio and its people so friendly and helpful.

Nós adoramos a nossa estada no apartamento do Marcelo. Fomos muito bem recebidos, com uma linda mesa de café da manhã.
Tudo aconteceu da melhor maneira possível, o Marcelo sempre muito atencioso.  A zona de Ipanema que o apto está, é maravilhosa.
Tem vários  restaurantes por perto e Supermercado  muito próximo. 
O apto está entre o mar e a lagoa. 
Nós amamos e certamente pretendemos voltar outras vezes.
La casa di Marcelo e' molto comoda e piacevole anche se non e' lumi. Gli spazi sono molto grandi. L'indirizzo e' ottimo, sia per chi visita Rio per vacanza che per chi ci va per lavoro.

Extremely pleased with our stay here! One of the best airbnb experiences I have had.  It was even better than we expected! Marcelo was very quick to respond, and flexible with check-in and check-out and very helpful. The place was beautiful, large and a perfect location in Rio. Close to the beach and lots of amenities and a very safe neighbourhood. Marcelo also left us fresh fruit and guides and recommendations for the area. I would definitely stay here again and recommend others to stay there.  It really was an excellent value and a perfect place to stay with a family or group of friends.
Excelente apartamento... Tudo em pleno funcionamento. Ele é muito grande. O Marcelo é um ótimo anfitrião!!! Recomendo

Marcelo was incredibly hospitable. The day we arrived was raining and he had even gone out and purchased an umbrella for us, for our use during our stay. Our stay was comfortable and had no issues. Marcelo was always tentative to any needs we may have had and had some places of attraction printed out for us for us to review and consider visiting. The home had class, and displayed film posters all around. Nothing negative to say about our stay. Location is great!! Would reccomend to a friend, and would stay here again.
Local excelente. Um apartamento muito agradável e limpo. Um anfitrião muito gentil que nos recebeu de forma bastante amigável. Obrigado, Marcelo.

O Marcelo nos recebeu muito bem, deixou frutinhas na casa para nós e sempre esteve muito disponível. O apartamento é bem preparado para receber hóspedes turistas. A localizaçao é excelente! 2 quadras da praia e quase a mesma distancia da Lagoa. Além de ter tudo por perto (lojas e restauranter). O bairro é sensacional!

Desde el primer minuto que encontramos este alojamiento todo fue increíble! Macelo el mejor anfitrión! nos entregó datos al llegar, y nos ayudó con el taxi al final de nuestro viaje, siempre con mucha disposición y buena onda. Incluso teníamos fruta de bienvenida! 

El departamento es impresionante: tiene mucho espacio, es limpio, ordenado y ubicado a pocas cuadras de la playa, en un barrio muy amigable y con fácil acceso a todo.  
100% recomendable. Cuando volvamos a Rio, sin duda alguna te volveremos a contactar!  Muchas gracias por todo Marcelo!!!!

Marcelo es muy amable y atento. Nos recibio maravillosamente, nos explico el funcionamiento de la ciudad, los lugares de interes, nos recomendo lugares, y siempre que necesitamos comunicarnos nos respondio casi al instante. La casa es muy linda, comoda y tiene todos las comodidades y elementos basicos necesarios.
Marcelo muito atencioso, o apartamento é ótimo, tem tudo o que você precisa para a sua estadia, está em uma localização privilegiada, perto de tudo. Super satisfeita, recomendo!

Marcelo es un anfitrión muy amable y preocupado de que sus huespedes tengan una buena experiencia. El departamento está muy bien ubicado, el personal del edificio es amable, está completo en equipamiento y es muy cómodo con niños.

This has been one of our best AirBnB experience! Amazing location (+++), perfectly clean, so spacious, kitchen that includes everything you need and more, great sound system, Netflix, computer with good internet connection. Marcelo welcomed us at the apartment, didn't have to wait for a second to enter the apartment, which is especially nice when you just got off a late flight and are travelling with a toddler and a baby. He was always super quick in answering our questions. We could have stayed there for a month or more!!

El apartamento es hermoso y súper cómodo. Más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. Fuimos 6 y nunca nos sentimos apretados. La ubicación es inmejorable ente la laguna y el posto 10 de la playa de ipanema. Fuimos en plena ola de calor de enero pero el aire acondicionado funcionó perfecto. Marcelo fue siempre súper simpático y nos indicó muy buenos lugares para comer y visitar. Mi mejor experiencia de Airbnb hasta ahora. Volvería sin dudar con familia y amigos. Recomiendo 100%.

O apartamento é ótimo, espaçoso e o principal atrativo é  a localização,  perfeita! Perto do mar, da lagoa e de ótimas opções de restaurante, mercado, etc. O Marcelo foi superatencioso e disponível.  Recomendo!

O apartamento do Marcelo é ótimo, super bem localizado, confortável, aconchegante, limpo e organizado. 
E ele foi sempre muito atencioso desde a reserva até a hospedagem.
Recomendo!!!
Estamos encantados con el departamento, pasamos una estadía genial, amplio, cómodo, lindísimo. Le recomendamos 100% y sin dudas volveríamos. Gracias Marcelo, siempre muy atento!
super espaçoso, muito bem limpo e conservado,uma quadra do supermercado,farmácia e três quadras do posto 10 de Ipanema.

Diese Unterkunft ist sehr zu empfehlen. Die Lage nah am Strand und am Zentrum Ipanemas ist hervorragend, die Wohnung bietet viel Platz. Am besten allerdings ist der Gastgeber, der uns sogar ein kleines Handbook mit seinen persönlichen Vorschlägen hinterlassen hat (Restaurants, Bars, Museen, Spatziergänge etc.). Alles in allem eine einzigartige Erfahrung.

El departamento cuenta con todo lo necesario, tiene excelente ubicación, cerca de bares, restaurantes, dos cuadras de la playa de ipanema, etc... Por otro lado Marcelo es perfecto anfitrión, nos ofreció en todo momento su ayuda y muy buena disposición. Recomendado 100%

Marcelo es un excelente anfitrión, me recibió en tiempo y forma, todo estaba impecable, la ubicación es excelente, cerca del metro, la playa y Lagoa. El departamento es mucho más grande y cómodo de lo que parece en las fotos! mi familia y yo la pasamos muy bien! muy recomedable!
Gostamos de ficar no apartamento oferecido pelo Marcelo. O apto possui sala e quartos muito espaçosos, bons banheiros, uma cozinha bastante funcional, boa TV, e a localização é excelente.

O espaço do Marcelo é excelente.

O apartamento é bem amplo e aconchegante. Sua localização é privilegiada, possibilitando acesso rápido a diversos pontos de interesse (praia, lagoa, mercados, restaurantes e outros pontos turísticos).

Além disso, o Marcelo é bastante atencioso e disponível, o que facilita a comunicação e melhora a experiência no Rio.

Em próximas estadias, com certeza será de minha preferência.
Excelente opção de apartamento no Rio de Janeiro. Apartamento bom. Localização excelente.

Marcelo a été un excellent hôte. Très flexibles sur les horaires d'arrivée et de sortie de l'appartement. Dans les deux cas, il était présent afin de nous expliquer le fonctionnement de l'immeuble et appartement, voire même de nous indiquer des restaurants ou lieux immanquables. 
L'appartement est super. Excellente localisation, en plein coeur d'Ipanema, rue calme, près des commerces, de la plage, et de diverses options de restaurants. 
A l'intérieur, tout est aménagé pour le confort des locataires! Très propre, avec tout ce qu'il faut. Très agréable lorsque c'est un voyage en famille ou avec des amis (spatieux).
Super expérience pour notre part, un grand merci.
Best place in Rio.   Everything was perfect.   Just like pictures, Marcelo great host, close to everything, clean and lots of space.   You are lucky if you get this one!
Increíble departamento muy recomendado! Increíble en todos los aspectos!!!!!

Marcelo's place is spacious, gorgeous, and located in the best part of Ipanema. It is just a few blocks from the lagoon or the beach in either direction and a couple blocks from the subway. There is no short supply of quality dining and shopping options, as well. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and quiet. Marcelo was responsive to any questions we had and was a wealth of knowledge about Rio's treasures, far and near. Highly recommend!

Sem duvida um local ideal pra ir com a família. Marcelo foi muito atencioso. Tudo o que está descrito tem no apto. Muito bem localizado e fácil acesso as principais necessidades. Amei e me senti muito segura, em especial por ter ido com crianças. Recomendo!

Excelente!!! Recomendo!
O anfitrião foi muito atencioso e o apartamento tem uma localização ótima.
Obrigada Marcelo.
Muito bom .

A very spacious, comfortable apartment in an excellent location. Half-way between the sea and the lake, with plenty of shops and restaurants close by. 
Marcelo is a charming host, greeted us upon arrival and came to see us when we left. If we ever go back to Rio we would choose to stay in the same apartment. Thank you Marcelo, hope to see you again.

O apartamento é ótimo, grande e muito bem equipado. Tem tv a cabo, internet e eletrodomésticos de cozinha. Tudo estava limpo e organizado para nossa chegada, com roupa de cama, toalhas e produtos para banho. A localização do prédio é excelente, com tudo por perto: bares, restaurantes, supermercado, metrô e a praia. Bairro tranquilo e seguro. Os funcionários do prédio são muito educados.
O Marcelo, anfitrião, foi extremamente educado e solícito. Desde o pedido de reserva sempre me respondeu todas as dúvidas com a maior rapidez e clareza que podia. No dia que chegamos o elevador social não estava funcionando e não tínhamos a chave de acesso ao elevador de serviço, problema que ele resolveu rapidamente junto do síndico. Durante nossa estadia ele esteve disponível o tempo todo. Infelizmente uma pessoa que estava comigo causou problemas no condomínio, mas isso não o impediu de manter a toda cordialidade e a atenção conosco. 
Recomendo muito a estadia em seu imóvel.
Un accueil très sympatique de la part de Marcelo ! Un appartement très spacieux, agréable bien placé dans Ipanema entre Lagão et océan.

Marcelo is a great and friendly host, answering quickly to every question and issue. The apartment is well located in Ipanema, close to restaurants, bars, shoppings, beach and the metro. It is well equipped with everything you need also for a longer stay. I can wholeheartedly recommend to stay here.

O Marcelo é um excelente anfitrião, respondeu rapidamente e gentilmente as mensagens, flexibilizou o horário de check in e check out. O apartamento é excelente, super espaçoso, os quartos são enormes, a localização é sensacional - entre a lagoa e a praia - e além disso encontramos algumas gentilezas como café, toalhas e sabonete. O porteiro/zelador do prédio foi muito educado. 
Obrigada pela incrível estadia Marcelo!

Gostei muito da estadia no apartamento do Marcelo. O local é muito espaçoso, limpo, arejado, bem conservado, condiz com as fotos. A localização é excelente, perto de restaurantes, praia, metrô. Muito fácil acesso. O Marcelo foi disponível em todos os momentos que precisamos e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaríamos em outras ocasiões.

Excelente localização (perto de bares, restaurantes, mercados e lojas).
O apartamento é bastante confortável, acomodando muito bem seis pessoas e as fotos condizem com a realidade do local.
O Marcelo, proprietário, é muito atencioso e sempre estando disponível para quaisquer dúvidas.
Ficamos bastante satisfeitas!
Ipanema is just beautiful and Marcelo's place was perfect!

O anfitrião é excelente,  se mostrou muito prestativo e superou todas as nossas expectativas. O apartamento é espaçoso, limpo e muito bem cuidado.  Tudo estava funcionando perfeitamente, e não tivemos nenhum problema. Recomendo!
Marcelo’s apartment is spacious, comfortable, excellently located. He’s a attentive host, quick to respond. We would definitely stay there again!

O apartamento é bem localizado, o prédio e um pouco mal concervado , ás camas são um pouco desconfortáveis , a descarga do banheiro da sala também não funciona muito bem, a limpeza e conservação do apartamento também não é muito boa, fiquei quase todos os dias de minha estadia sem internet no apartamento tendo assim que fazer gastos extras que não estava incluso no meu orçamento de viagem, o interfone do prédio também não funciona e sobre á falta de internet no apartamento  o anfitrião alega que seu apartamento e muito localizado e não recebe muitos reclamações de outros hóspedes, fora á possível disponibilidade de vaga na garagem que não existe. Se você quer aproveitar sua estadia no Rio de Janeiro sem problemas, fuja deste apartamento.

The apartment corresponds exactly to the ad, it is equipped with everything needed for a great stay, and is perfectly located, a short walk from the beach and from shops, bars and restaurants. But what really made it up for us is Marcelo's attention. He let us choose the time of our check-in and checkout, which was very convenient for us. We also had a small problem with one of the keys, and Marcelo resolved it in less than 30 min, at no charge. I highly recommend Marcelo's apartment.

Apto super amplo no melhor ponto de ipanema, muito limpo e organizado, banheiros amplos e com tudo funcionando perfeitamente. Sala gigante e muito confortável! Tem tudo o que uma família precisa e busca. O anfitrião é maravilhoso. Super recomendo.

La estancia estuvo excelente. El apartamento cumple con todo lo prometido y más, es muy confortable y Marcelo es muy buen anfitrión. El apartamento cuenta con todos los elementos para facilitar la estancia de un viajero y Marcelo deja información completa para que uno pueda pasear tranquilo por Río. Estuvimos 6 personas y la comodidad fue más que suficiente. La ubicación es muy buena al ser un barrio tranquilo, es cerca a la playa, a la zona comercial, a las líneas de bus y al metro. Recomendado
Excelente departamento, ubicación inmejorable. 3 habitaciones grandes. Tiene 3 camas dobles y un colchón doble más. excelente cocina y 3 baños. Todo de 10

Passei os últimos dias com a minha família como moradora da cidade maravilhosa no apartamento do Marcelo. Primeiramente, o Marcelo foi super gentil em antecipar nosso check in por conta de problemas
pessoais. Respondeu rápido e se dispôs imediatamente a me ajudar. O apartamento é enorme. Uma das maiores e mais belas salas que já conheci. Os quartos são super espaçosos. Os ar condicionados (apesar de serem de janela) funcionam muito bem. Os banheiros também estão ótimos e o da suíte é bem grande. A cozinha e lavanderia não são muito grandes (mas quem quer ficar na cozinha quando pode comer fora no Rio). Mas tanto a cozinha quanto à lavanderia tem tudo o que precisamos. A cozinha é americana o que facilita curtir com quem está na sala se vc está cozinhando. A internet e tv a cabo funcionam perfeitamente. Os porteiros são super gentis e prestativos. E como a região é muito segura, não vi nenhum problema quanto a não ter os porteiros durante a noite. O melhor deste apartamento é a localização. A melhor localização do Rio de Janeiro. O melhor lugar de Ipanema. Perto da Livraria Travessa, perto de dois supermercados zona sul, perto de varias farmácias 24h, perto de bares e restaurantes maravilhosos e super bem badalados, perto de bancos, perto do metrô Nossa Senhora da Paz, perto da praia e perto do shopping Leblon. Quando eu falo perto, é muito perto...da pra ir andando mesmo. E perto da Lagoa. Tivemos a oportunidade de ver a inauguração da árvore da Lagoa bem perto do apartamento. Amei a experiência. O check out também foi flexível o que ajudou muito também. Super recomendo. E voltarei muitas vezes.

El apartamento de Marcelo es muy amplio, limpio, 100% seguro. Ubicado en un buen barrio, tienes el centro a una cuadra y la playa a 3 cuadras. Marcelo es muy amable. Lo recomiendo, de todas maneras e incluso es mejor de lo que muestran las fotos.

Excelente y muy espacioso departamento en la mejor zona de ipanema. 3 dormitorios amplios y 3 baños.
Sala de estar inmensa.
Cerca del centro comercial de ipanema y leblon, de la playa y de la lagoa. Todos los ambientes con aire acondicionado, fundamental por estas fechas.  El edificio con conserjería muy amable.

name: Suite 605  Waikiki Grand Central & Quiet Location
summary: ** Beach chairs, body boards, beach mats and masks & snorkel either provided or available upon request ** The unit is located in one of the most desirable & beautiful locations in Waikiki. Recently remodeled and tropically decorated unit features a queen size bed, full kitchen & standard size refrigerator. Now featuring ‘Fiber100’ high speed internet
space: The unit is located in one of the most desirable and beautiful locations in Waikiki. This newly remodeled and tropically decorated unit features a queen size bed and full kitchen with standard size refrigerator. All of the kitchen conveniences of home are available to you, Near Kuhio Beach, Queen's Beach and San Souci Beach this is a great location to relax and swim under the palm trees. “Now featuring ‘Fiber100’ high speed internet and Advantage Plus TV with 225+ channels”

Recently remodeled and tropically decorated unit features a queen size bed, full kitchen & standard size refrigerator. This newly remodeled and tropically decorated unit features a queen size bed and full kitchen with standard size refrigerator. All of the kitchen conveniences of home are available to you, Near Kuhio Beach, Queen's Beach and San Souci Beach this is a great location to relax and swim under the palm trees. “Now featuring ‘Fiber100’ high speed internet and Advantage Plus TV with 225+ channels” Free Luggage Storage Onsite Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have
neighborhood_overview: Outdoor activities are countless from this location. Restaurants and international shopping are bountiful nearby. Fast food to 5 star dinning is available. Enjoy the unique Kapahulu Ave. for dinning and shopping with the locals. Hawaiian food, Hawaiian artifacts and Hawaiian clothing are all available withing walking distance. Two blocks from the public library and a botanical garden and a short distance to Diamond Head Theater or the Saturday Farmer's Market at Kapiolani Community College.
notes: FREE ‘Fiber100' high speed Wireless Internet and Advantage Plus TV with 225+ channels
transit: - Uber and Lyft are available in Honolulu and Waikiki - 'Biki' bikeshare is available throughout Waikiki & Honolulu - Try out 'Segway' tours of Waikiki, using their stand-up scooters  - Convenient public transportation options include 'TheBus' and the 'Waikiki Trolley' - Taxis are another great way to travel when in a group and the cost can be shared. You can find taxi stands at hotels, most major shopping malls and at the airport. Note that using taxi stands and calling for pick-ups by phone or via hotel concierge is the norm in Hawaii rather than hailing a cab.
access: Free Luggage Storage Onsite Our Guest Host will meet you at the property for your check-in and give you keys
interaction: Aloha - Here is the important contact information; We have a Guest Host who will meet you at the property for your check-in. Our process is to meet guests for their arrival at the property. It's important to call my Guest Host at ** (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ** when you arrive at the Honolulu Airport. That way he will know when to meet you at the property. This number only accepts calls, no text messages.  We also have a live answering service who will take a message if our Guest Host is unable to pickup immediately, please leave a message and our Guest Host will get back to you usually within 15 minutes Sincerely, Mark G.H., Property Manager, Hawaii Americana Realty

host.host_about: Real Estate Broker

reviews.comments: Prior to arrival I received a call from the property manager giving me excellent directions on what to do when we arrived. Upon arrival we were pleasantly greeted and given personal attention to our room. The room was terrific.

The studio was directly located at Waikiki beach. Several beaches and other sights were perfectly reachable by car. A lot of restaurants and shops were close to the studio as well. The room was clean and the bathroom & kitchen provided all things needed. Unfortunately there was no table in the room which made it difficult to eat there. The balcony on the 10th floor was great for sunsets.

Rob was most gracious and helpful. Right near the beach and EVERYTHING else. We loved it. Parking arrangements were perfect and not an expensive add on.
When we come back, we'll stay here again.

My wife and I really enjoyed our stay here. The location of this property is absolutely perfect in my opinion. This property is one block from the beach, which is awesome. The rooftop deck you see in the pictures is pretty incredible. Since the property is on the very south side of Waikiki, it gives you an unobstructed, 180 degree view of diamond head and the ocean - it's pretty spectacular! I love snorkeling and there's actually pretty decent snorkeling spot on Queen's beach close to the wall between Queen's Beach and Queen's Surf Beach which is a 4
minute walk from the room. If you keep exploring for about 45 minutes you'll probably see a couple hundred fish and 8-10 different species of fish. I've always rented snorkel gear from Snorkel Bob's who is 5min from this property and they're great. Lastly about the area, we walked down and had breakfast at the Barefoot Beach Cafe one morning and I would recommend it. Great food and awesome ambiance next to the ocean.

The room was great also. It seemed slightly smaller in person than in the pictures, but it perfect for what we needed and great for a couple. Everything looked upgraded and really nice in the unit. Similar or better pricing than a decent hotel, but it's more spacious and you get a full kitchen (fridge, stove, microwave, toaster, pots and pans to cook on and nice dishes to use. There were also beach chairs and an umbrella to use in the closet. We enjoyed staying in and just watching TV some nights. The TV swivels so you can watch in bed and there's a pretty good lineup of channels here (200+) with a DVR which was great. The only downside to the building is the pool doesn't look that good. When you're 150 yards from an incredible beach - and specifically Kuhio Beach that's walled off so it feels like a pool anyway, there's really not even a need for the pool on the property. 

Overall we had a great experience. Because of the location, 180 degree rooftop view of diamond head and the ocean, quality of the room, and the price, we will probably always try to stay here first when we visit Waikiki in the future!

I rented this place for my parents and they loved it. The location is great and the space was clean, simple, and enough for their needs. It is a little small but if you're out and about in the city a lot, it's all you'll need.

Communication was easy and check in was simple as well.
The communication from the hosts was excellent. The condo is in a great location to the beach, Diamond Head and shops. We would be happy to stay again and thought good value for money in Hawaii.

Great location, very clean, close to everything! Lots of great restaurants within walking distance, and the beach was less than a block away. Also we rented a car, and this was the perfect location to get in and out of Waikiki easily. Great place, thank you for hosting us!

It was a great stay at the apartment for us. It was very clean and we had everything we needed to enjoy the stay. Communication worked easily and we could get into the room earlier than usual check-in. The location was very good to walk to the beach and explore waikiki. Also the free parking is just 5 minutes to walk. 
Only downside is that the room has no view and the water in the pool wasn't clear and had a very strange taste when I did some laps.
Very nice stay. Everything was exactly as described. Easy, quick check in. Check out was a breeze. Room was just what we needed. Building is a great location. Would definitely stay there again.

숙소의 위치는 동물원 바로 맞은편으로, 
와이키키 해변과 매우 가깝습니다. 건물 1층에는 Teddy's Bigger와 abc-mart가 위치해 있습니다. 핑크버스정류장은 aston hotel 정류장에서 하차하면 됩니다. 방은 매우 청결하며, 사진과 실물은 동일합니다. 
안타까운점은 내가 소리에 민감해서 에어컨소리가 조금 시끄럽게 느껴졌습니다. 그외에 다른것들은 완벽했다.

Great value and location for Waikiki. 
Perfect for 1-2 people

My husband and I were 100% happy with the place, it was exactly what we were after and so close to the beach - couldn't have asked for a better place to stay for our first time in Hawaii! 
If we make a trip to Hawaii again, we would be more than happy to come back and stay here.
Nice place! Quiet for Waikiki
Very nice. Good location

We didn't meet Mark but was greeted by Joey who promptly showed upon our arrival. Joey gave us a thorough tour and got us situated in the room. The hotel is in a great location and that's probably where most of the value is at. It's right across from the zoo and parking is $1 an hour there. You can add time to the zoo parking lot meter by texting from your phone, no sign up required. The room was a lot smaller than what the pictures showed but it was still homey and clean. Definitely would stay here again. BEST location if you want to be close to the Waikiki action without all the noise as you sleep.
Close to the zoo, aquarium, beach, diamond head lookout, and the main part of town but not stuck in the middle of it all. Top joint

I was expecting to be able to see the ocean from our room but when I got to the room all I seen was the back of the building which was an alley way because the pictures show otherwise on airbnb. The building itself smelled pretty bad but the room itself had a bit of a better smell. When I booked through airbnb I booked because it said doesn't need to be approved by host so I was expecting to be able to check in with no problem. I then got to the room  and wasn't able to get in. Said it was gonna be programmed to the last 4 digits of my phone number. Then it was over priced. Just not the best night.

The place was as described. Mark was able to offer us an early check in for a fee as we arrived very early and that made things a lot more comfortable for us. We booked last minute but everything was still arranged smoothly and efficiently.  Would recommend. 
Thanks Mark.

The location of Mark’s place is just fantastic, less than 1 block to the Waikiki beach, super convenient, and beach tower, beach chair are provided in the room, the check in process is very easy. Would like to try it again when visit Honolulu next time.
Place is perfectly located near to the beach and everything else you may need.
This room was an amazing location! Couldn’t ask for an easier check in either! Thank you for the great stay.

Such a lovely and quaint spot!! I have family in town and I come down quite often to the island. Needed a last minute place to stay and this was perfect. I booked the same day! Got in! Such a cute spot! I thought I’ve seen Waikiki! Or most of the condos in Honolulu but this was cute. Perfect for one. Appreciate the stocked kitchen, open rooftop deck! Closeness to the walls! Welcoming and cute spot! The tree branches outside will hit the window though. I stayed here during the windy week and the noise woke me up often! If you’re not a light sleeper, you’ll be just fine! Thanks, Mark and the team!

場所ｶﾗｶｳｱからｶﾊﾟﾌﾙを左に入ってすぐのZooのﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞの前
ﾋﾞｰﾁも近く最高です｡
ﾎﾃﾙｺﾝﾄﾞを貸してくれている感じで
入退室は数字を入力するﾀｲﾌﾟのﾄﾞｱなのですごく便利です｡
部屋はおしゃれで綺麗!!
車ある人にもｽﾞｰのﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞが1時間1ﾄﾞﾙなので申し分なしですね!

また機会があれば利用したいと思います!

Manalo!!
Great spot, in the quieter end of waikiki but walkable to everything. Room was well represented and clean, we enjoyed it thoroughly and would stay again!
The space was just what you needed for an affordable vacation to Hawaii. Its in a great location with quick access to the beach, night life, shopping and restaurants.

Mark's place was great, cozy, with all the amenities you need for your awesome stay in Hawaii. Very Clean! It's one block away from the beach, one block away from rentals for scooters, bikes, and quads and another from the ABC stores. The view is accurate and the 10th floor has an amazing overview of Diamond head and the beach. Mark's place did not leave me wanting anything more, aside from one more nights stay! highly recommend this place as it does not get any better than this!

So close to the beach!! Perfect location! Best burger restaurant right downstairs in the lobby. My initial host John was so helpful and had 5 star customer service. The room was clean, very quiet place!

This was my first time using Airbnb and definitely was worth it! I had no troubles with this place whatsoever, it was perfect. I came to Hawaii with my boyfriend for the first time and this place truly made it more easier for us. Right in front of the beah, next to stores and restaurants. The place was much bigger than from what we expected and I was really thankful we chose this place to stay at!
Awesome location with a quick and easy check-in.

The location of Mark’s rental is fantastic. I am a mature solo traveler. I felt safe and very comfortable staying here. It s a perfect location for walking to beaches, parks and accessing all of Waikiki. There are numerous bus stops just steps away that made getting  around Honolulu so easy and convenient. 
The room is attractive in a quiet area of the building. The amenities were perfect and everything was as advertised. Mark’s staff was helpful and checked in and out was efficient and super easy. 
There are many shops and restaurants in the area. The guide to the area facilities located in the room was helpful. Everything was super close. TV and WiFi worked perfectly. I would definitely stay here again!
Great location. Over the road from the zoo. Short walk to beach, restaurants, bus services. Clean, comfortable, compact space with most essentials provided.
Great place
Great room in a great location - what more could you ask for?! I'd recommend staying here as I would do so myself, again.
This is a super value. And the location is amazing.
Nice quaint room. Very good value. It was very loud at night because of a drain pipe dripping water onto the window AC unit.  Bed is firm which my wife does not prefer.

Absolutely perfect spot to stay! Good price. The unit was incredibly clean and there was gear for everything you need (snorkel, beach chairs, towels and a beach umbrella). It is within walking distance of everything you need. I would highly recommend this to anyone who plans to visit Oahu!
It was the perfect spot we lived it great price and we lived going up to the deck on the top floor it was beautiful . The front desk people went above and beyond and were so sweet .
Great location and a very cute, suitable place.

Thank you so much for the great holiday !
The location was perfect.
Beaches, parks, restaurants and shops are all within the walking distance.
The communication was very smooth and they provided all I needed before/during the stay.
If you are planning to go spend a lot of time on the Waikiki beaches, this is definitely one of the best choices !

The location can’t be beat!! All the amenities that a hotel would have and then some - we especially appreciated the beach chairs, beach towels, umbrella and snorkel gear. We didn’t long for anything and were also thankful for the laundry facilities in the building. The 10th floor deck and stunning view were an added bonus. Can highly recommend staying here.
This place was great - in the center of Waikiki

We loved our stay at Marks place. It was the perf size for the 2 of us and the hotel itself had very good vibes. All the workers there were very nice especially Roxy. We had some concerns from previous reviews indicating the bar on level 2 can be a bit loud, but we could not hear the bar from our room at all and we really enjoyed the bar there. The waitress Lee was a doll and was always giving us great tips on things to do or rent.

This is a great little place to check out Waikiki on foot. Within easy walking distance to great shops, restaurants, and a stone's throw from Waikiki beach. It's certainly small, but the location is worth it. The rooftop patio is also great.

Great location, clean and tidy and very worth the price. We loved everything about it. Our only complaint would be the showers didn’t always get hot. But other than that we enjoyed our experience and our host was very nice!

Let’s begin with the positive...the location of the building is great. Within walking distance of center Waikiki. Also,once we found our host(s) they were attentive. Also, the initial room we were given was just as shown in the picture. However, the building itself is old and definitely needs updating (carpets and paint). The air conditioner in our initial room was so loud that even Mark knew it was unacceptable. He told us to hang on and he would find us another room....then Rick (I think) brought us to “an even better room with an ocean view”.  Upon entering the room Rick apologized for the mattress/box spring saying that they were getting a new one soon. Everything in the room was old (except the tv).  The window air conditioner was bed height approximately 12” from the bed pointing straight at my face, even trying to point it down it still hit me in the face. The bathroom was a (Website hidden by Airbnb) husband had to jerry-rig the drain as the plug was in a permanent down position. We were located on the fourth floor, with constant street noise all day/night long. Plus, there is a bar two floors down that had loud music playing until at least two in the morning which we were not notified of...
Fortunately we were only booked for two nights, then went to another (Hidden by Airbnb) on north shore that was amazing!  We will not be going back there ever again.

I stayed at Unit 605 at the Waikiki Grand Hotel.  It is the best location in Waikiki from my point of view.  It is across the street from the Zoo and Kapiolani Park with views of Waikiki Beach and Diamond Head.  Because it is at the end of Waikiki Beach it is quiet with a feel of nature and far from the maddening crowds of tourists.  Perfect place for morning walks, viewing sunsets, and steps away from clubs, shops, and restaurants.  Breakfast at American's Dinner, Denny's is only two blocks from hotel door.  Mark's place has it all!

It must be said there are some good things going for this apartment. The location is great, just a few minutes walk from the beach. It is clean inside and seemingly will maintained. The roof deck of the building has a great view.

But I wouldn’t have booked this room if I knew there is a unbearable noisy air conditioner and very thin curtains with poor quality which was hard to keep the light out, they made me couldn’t sleep well every night. When you turned on the air conditioner, even in eco mode, it starts off fairly quiet. However it then alternates between this level and a significant rattle. We spoke to Mark about this, he came down to hear it for himself but insisted that the noise level was "within range". Needless to say, we disagree. I have sympathy for him because this is a brand new aircon unit, but I'm afraid for a small studio apartment it is still too noisy. The unit is about 50cm from your head when sleeping, and it simply prevents you from being able to sleep well.
 
Hope it can be solved one day.

name: Beautiful part of Istanbul  Ortaköy
summary: Simple and clean. Used to be my sisters room. Still has her positive energy.
description: Simple and clean. Used to be my sisters room. Still has her positive energy.

name: DOUBLE ROOM attached to the CATALUÑA Square
summary: Quiet and bright room in Barcelona center. 2min walk to bus, metro and rail with direct airport links.  The apartment is located within walking distance of all major tourist attractions.
space: It's an historic building from the 19th Century which still retains the original mosaics in the entrance. The room is bright and quiet, and the windows open onto a large interior courtyard.
description: Quiet and bright room in Barcelona center. 2min walk to bus, metro and rail with direct airport links.  The apartment is located within walking distance of all major tourist attractions. It's an historic building from the 19th Century which still retains the original mosaics in the entrance. The room is bright and quiet, and the windows open onto a large interior courtyard. Access to wifi. You can use the kitchen, but please, leave everything as you found it. There is only one bathroom. We share it, no problems, it is big :) I'm working from home and available to help make your stay more enjoyable. We can provide maps and information about the city. Situated in the heart of the beautiful Gothic Quarter one of the most popular tourist sites. Within easy walking distance of Plaza Cataluña, Las Ramblas, Passeig de Gràcia (Casa Batllò and La Pedrera - Gaudí masterpiece). Next door to a choice of 24 hours supermarket and within pleasant 5 minutes walking distance to the central shopping dis
neighborhood_overview: Situated in the heart of the beautiful Gothic Quarter one of the most popular tourist sites. Within easy walking distance of Plaza Cataluña, Las Ramblas, Passeig de Gràcia (Casa Batllò and La Pedrera - Gaudí masterpiece). Next door to a choice of 24 hours supermarket and within pleasant 5 minutes walking distance to the central shopping district. Also you can find at the district: restaurants, pubs and nightlife.
notes: · WE ALREADY HAVE THE ELEVATOR IN THE BUILDING \o/
transit: 2 minutes walking to public transport: bus, rail, metro, taxi; with direct and easy link to the airport. Several bike rental shops nearby.
