Very suitable for tourist visits, example distances:  - Walking (5 minutes): Ramblas, Gotic - Walking (2 minutes): Plaza Catalunya  - Walking (2 minutes): Paseo de Gracia (10 min to Casa Batllò & La Pedrera) Metro station (4 lines) just 2-5 minutes away. Direct lines to: - (in 5 minutes): Sagrada Familia - (in 5 minutes): Plaza España/ Montjuic - (in 10 minutes): Park Güell - (in 15 minutes): Camp Nou
access: Access to wifi. You can use the kitchen, but please, leave everything as you found it. There is only one bathroom. We share it, no problems, it is big :)
interaction: I'm working from home and available to help make your stay more enjoyable. We can provide maps and information about the city.
house_rules: · No parties allowed inside the house and no strangers invited in the house neither. · Please respect the neighbors rest and tranquility. · Keep the house clean. · If you are a smoker we ask that up to the terrace of the building that is a plant above. · The use of the washing machine is not included in the price.

host.host_about:
Soy brasileña y llevo más de 10 años viviendo en Barcelona. 
Trabajo como freelancer con marketing digital y me encanta la filosofía.
Me considero una eterna buscadora y caminante de la vida, por eso reparto mis horas entre el trabajo, los amigos, clases de filosofía práctica y también en actividades de voluntariado.
Me encanta compartir mi piso en el centro de Barcelona para todos los visitantes que vienen a enamorarse de esa ciudad que me ha conquistado a mi también.
¡Bienvenid@s!
--------------------------------------------------------
I’m a Brazilian girl who have been living in Barcelona for over 10 years.
I work as a freelancer with digital marketing and I love philosophy.
I consider myself an eternal seeker and walker of life, that is why I share my hours between work, friends, practical philosophy classes and also in volunteer activities.
I love sharing my apartment in the center of Barcelona for all the visitors who come to fall in love with that city that has conquered my heart.
Welcome!

reviews.comments: Tengo un muy buen recuerdo de mi estancia en casa de Lucia. Aunque no la haya visto mucho (las dos estábamos muy liadas), ha sido muy agradable charlar con ella de vez en cuando. El piso esta muy bien, todo esta muy bien arreglado y fácil de usar. Esta super bien situado, se puede ir andando a todas partes! Recomendo!
Foi maravilhoso hospedar neste apartamento, o apartamento é muito bem localizado e as meninas muito gentis e sempre dispostas para ajudar.
Lucia is very hospitable, really nice girl! And the house is right at the center, so everything is convenient!

Lucia and Romina are super nice and pretty ;) the house is at the best location, just five minutes to the airport bus stop, and two minutes to the biggest mall El Corte Ingles, actually it's near to everywhere because it's at the heart of Barcelona. The house is clean and tidy. And it's very quiet. Super recommend!!
Lucia and her flatmate where amazing. They where so relaxed and where not bother by our irratic time schedule! Lovely clean and spacious flat with an amazing location and price. 10/10

La habitación tiene todo lo que se precisa y asi como la casa, esta verdaderamente limpia. El apartamento esta ubicado en una zona estratégica donde puedes visitar todo caminando y con respecto a la seguridad la zona también es perfecta... Barcelona es una marabilla y sin duda recomendaría quedarse en este alojamiento para visitarla.

I and my wife had a very nice stay in Lucia's apartment for three nights. The location was just perfect, with very convenient access to must-sees of Barcelona. She and Romina were super nice and friendly. The place was cosy and clean. The only problem was that we had to walk many stairs up which is going to be resolved as the lift seemed to be installed soon. Then, I would strongly recommend to stay here.
Localización excelente. La casa muy limpia y bonita. Lucia muy simpática, me hizo sentir como en casa. Muy recomendable.
Perfect location, lovely flat and very nice hosts. I thought it was a bargain

Really glad we chose this flat my gf and myself. Location is superb, 5 min walking from Plaza de Catalunya, where the bus from the airport stop. In the very centre, at no time, you find yourself in la Rambla or walking on the narrow beautiful streets of Barrio Gotico. The house is charming, handy, beautiful decorated and totally clean. It's an old building, but in few months i could see a lift will be placed. Good WIFI, warming and super comfortable bed, the hosts are really nice and helpful. They let us to make a late checkin, that was really appreciated!! Thanks so much for everything :)
Romina y Lucia son DOS chicas muy amables y disponibles, para cualquier cosa te ayudan sin problemas. El Piso es muy comodo, lindo y centrico. Fue una experiencia maravillosa
Very welcoming home! Got a lot of tips about Barcelona, things to do and dinner places. Recommended!
The hosts were very kind from the very beginning till the last hour.

Hemos estado encantados. Dos chicas muy amables, la casa agradable, ñimpia y ordenada. La habitacion impoluta, pero las zonas comunes tambien. Nos facilitaron jabon de ducha, y toallas. Sin duda, una casa muy recomendable! :)

We enjoyed our stay a lot - the apartment is lovely, the hosts are super nice and welcoming, very easy to communicate with and very helpful. The apartment is clean and neat, and has all the essentials. The location is absolutely perfect!
Only thing we didn't expect and was a bit strange is that the door of the room didn't close fully, so you can't completely shut it. It doesn't have a regular door handle, but more like a closet handle, and doesn't have a lock. It wasn't too bad but just a bit uncomfortable for us as a couple to feel like we have complete privacy - but again, not a big deal.

Me gustó mucho mi estada con Romina y Lucia. Ellas son muy amistosas y abiertas. El piso es bonito y exactamente como los fotógrafos. El cuarto hay mucho luz y la cama es muy confortable.Espero que voy a volver en el futuro! I really enjoyed my stay with Romina and Lucia. They are friendly and welcoming. The flat is lovely and exactly like the pictures. The room is light and the bed is very comfortable. I hope to stay again in the future!

My boyfriend and I had such a nice stay at Romina and Lucia's place. A very clean and cozy appartment located in the very middle of Barcelona. We could use the kitchen, bath and living room as much as we wanted. However, we were often on the go and only used the appartment to stay in the night. Romina and Lucia were very kind and helpful.
I would recommend their place to other travellers looking for a central and nice appartment during their stay in Barcelona :-)

We've just came back from our trip. Lucia and her flatmate  were very kind and helpful. The room was clean, like the rest of the flat. Location is perfect, 1-2 minutes to Plaza de Catalunya. It's a good choice to stay  if you plan to visit Barcelona!

El piso está muy bien ubicado, es muy practico! Lucía y Romina son muy buenas personas que te hacen sentir como si estuvieras en tu casa. Estuve muy feliz encontrarlas y poder hablar con ellas. Están disponible para ayudar por cualquier cosa. recomendó!!

Lucia was very welcoming.  The apartment was exactly as described on the website in a lovely old Barcelona residence.  Perfect location just a few minutes walk from Placa Catalunya and Las Ramblas, but on a side street so quite quiet
The room was close to the metro and clean. Lucia was very friendly and available for any demands. I came here for a seminar. It was very convenient.

Todo perfecto, muy buena atención. Demasiado bien ubicado el depto (o piso como le dicen allá) todo limpio y la anfitriona (no estaba Romina, solo Lucia) muy gentil. Agradecidos con mi pareja y los esperamos en Chile si quieren ir.
Good location! Nice host! Walking to Metro is just 5 mins.

She was very kind
Thank you.

Lucia is an amazing host, and made sure we were comfortable. She arranged for an early check-in for us as requested, and was very responsive on emails. The apartment's location is excellent. Plaza Catalunya is hardly 5 mins away from the house, where lots of free walking tours and hop off -hop on buses start. The airport bus also drops you there. The metro station, city centre, some of the famous gaudi buildings are all within a 1-2 km range. Lots of great  eateries around as well. The room is cosy and as shown in pictures. The washroom is very clean, and even though it's slightly away from the bedroom - this should not be a problem. If we go to Barcelona again, we will 100% stay with Lucia. Highly recommended!

It was really nice trip in Barcelona!!!
The flat is exactly in central, so it's easy to access everywhere.
Romina and Lucia were really kind to us.

We had a really pleasant stay at Romina and Lucia's place. Romina is a very friendly and positive person, she made us feel like home. The appartment was clean and had the best location, most of the places were at walking distance, we used the metro only a few times. If i go to Barcelona again, i sure will stay at this place again. Highly recommended! :)
Everything was like described. Very nice girls, really clean flat, well located. It's really 1 minute from Placa Catalunya. I really recommend it!

The place is simple but comfortable and clean. The location is great, right next to the Ramblas. The bathroom is shared with Lucia, who is Brazilian, and another Argentine resident. The shower is good and the bed is good as well. 

Lucia was very sweet and helpful. I would stay again.

I would only not recommend the place for older people or those with mobility problems since there is no elevator in the building and the apartment is on a high floor .

Lucia and Romina were wonderful hosts! They provided everything they said they would and the apartment is in a great location to walk or metro to popular attractions! They were kind and respectful and even allowed me to leave my bags with them after check-out for a few hours. Thank you so much for your hospitality!! I hope to see you again :)

The room is so clean, well equipped and perfectly situated !    
 Lucia and her friend are so nice and offer us lots of useful advices!
I like Barcelona! The food, museum, park and almost everything!
When I come back, this room is certainly to be my best choice!
great location and very nice host. thank you for such a lovely place :)
Lucia and Romina were great hosts. They helped us in every possible way. The apartment's location is perfect. We had a great time!

Great Room and bathroom, perfect location in the city. Directly to the metro station placa catalunya. I can recommed this accommodation. Lucia and Romina are nice persons who help and support you by your trip. Thanks a lot
Great location (Aerobus 5min walk, enjoyed walking through Gothic Quarter evenings) clean room, comfy bed, new bathroom, - Lucia was very nice and helpful! Thanks again for a great time in Barcelona!

Lucia and Romina were very friendly and they had a lovely place! location was simply superb. You can tell they try their best to answer your questions and meet your needs. Overall a lovely experience that gave me a better taste of Barcelona!
一切都很好 除了没有电梯每天要爬楼有点累 建议不要带大行李箱去 房间很干净舒适

정말 깨끗하고 좋은 집이었어요.
위치는 말할 것도 없었어요.
그런데 5층이라(현지식3층) 캐리어 들고 올라가는게 무지 힘듭니다ㅠㅠ

It was very clean and comfortable.
Location is also perfect.
But it is hard to move my luggage. Because the home is so hight. (3floors)
But I am very happy. It was nice.
地理位置太优越了简直不用坐车｡基本上除了海边需要走20多分钟其他地方都可以分分钟走路到｡房东人也很好｡而且后来因为飞机问题问她能不能放一会行李她就一口答应了完全没问题｡特别喜欢~

La habitación es muy cómoda, así como el baño es amplio y cuenta con todo lo necesario. La zona es impecable! A media cuadra del famoso Corte Inglés de la Plaza Catalunya. Rocío y Lucía nos recibieron muy cálidamente. Lo único a tener en cuenta es que por ahora no hay ascensor en el edificio (recién ahora lo están construyendo), y el departamento se encuentra en un 5to piso, por lo que deben evaluarlo bien si van con demasiado equipaje  o si tienen dificultades para subir escaleras.

Romina e Lucia sono state molto accoglienti e gentili, disposte alle mie esigenze (ho dovuto modificare la prenotazione un giorno prima e non mi hanno fatto nessun problema!)! La camera è spaziosa il giusto, il bagno è grande, ristrutturato da poco e sempre pulito.  Soprattutto, l'appartamento è centralissimo ma allo stesso tempo non rumoroso!
Perfecta! Nos hemos sentido como en casa. Estaba todo super limpio y en una zona perfecta para visitar cualquier lugar del centro.
Lucia was really nice! the room was clean! however its kind of hard to get from 1st floor to 5th without elevators

Lucia was a kind and helpful host. She allowed us to leave our luggage on check out day for a few hours which was nice. She even left my shoes that I had forgotten in the room on my luggage so I wouldn't leave them behind. 

The bathroom is kind of small, and when shared between four people can be slightly inconvenient. We did not use the kitchen but it looked nice and the rest of the apartment was well kept. Overall a great stay in a central location, walking distance to anything and everything in the heart of Barcelona near Las Ramblas!
Very nice girls in a very nice home. We had a great trip. Thank you for everything
Lucia was an excellent host, the room was large, and the apartment was very clean and perfectly located. Highly recommend!

Très bel endroit, propre et bien situé.
L'appartement est vraiment joli, nous avons beaucoup apprécié ça.
Romina et Julia sont très aimables et accueillantes.
Julia faisait régulièrement le ménage pendant notre séjour.
Et notre arrivée à l'appartement a été facilitée par les ouvriers chaleureux de l'immeuble qui nous ont porté nos bagages jusqu'au 5ème Etage alors que l'ascenseur était en travaux.
Very nice apartment and room. Perfect location & great hosts!

Escogí este alojamiento para mi hija , desde el principio la comunicación con Lucia fue fantástica y mi hija se sintió muy agusto en su casa, desde luego si tiene que volver a Barcelona piensa repetir, quiero trasmitir a Lucia y a Romina mi agradecimiento , saludos.
Lucia and Romina were very good hosts. Thanks for everything!

The location was perfect.
It was center of the city but it was quiet, so I could totally be relaxed in the room.
Lucia and Romina was nice and discrete.
Lucia and Romina were great hosts and the location was just perfect! Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona!

Lucia e  Romina sono due ragazze fantastiche, nonostante siamo arrivate a notte fonda c'era qualcuno ad aspettarci. La casa è abbastanza accogliente e silenziosa, la camera è piccola ma allo stesso tempo funzionale. L'appartamento grande e la wifi funziona bene. L'unica pecca è il fatto di trovarsi al quinto piano senza ascensore, ma questo lo sapevamo già in quanto comunicato nell'annuncio.
Lucia was very friendly and helpful, the location was perfect 2 mins from the Place.
I mainly dealt with Lucia during my stay but everything was just perfect and I'll definitely book there again when I come back to Barcelona!

La.habitacion muy comoda, la atencion de Romina increible me resolvio todas mis dudas y estuvo pendiente. La ubicacion del piso a dos minutos de plaza Cataluña tambien facilito mi desplazamiento en Barcelona. Super recomendado

Отличная комната , в самом центре города. Немного высоковато подниматься на 4 этаж, но полезно для здоровья! В подъезде ведется капитальный ремонт большинства квартир, так что немного напоминает стройку.  Меня встретила одна из хозяек Рамона, очень приятная и вежливая девушка, все объяснила и рассказала.

The hosts were very nice and friendly, which really was great when ur traveling alone in a foreign city. 

Pros of the stay:
- great hosts
- fantastic location, only 3 min to aerobus and 10 min to Gothic quarter/el born
- large room, clean and cosy bed

Cons:
- no elevator and it's on the 6th floor, so alot of stairs to climb 
- construction currently undergoing, which can be very noisy at times n blocks the entrance
- shared bathroom among all 3 of us, so at times u will need to wait for ur turn, and the water pressure is quite low

Lucia and Romina are nice hosts who will give all the necessary information! Their apartment is pretty with all thing that you need in your vacations. And the apartment is very well located, walking distance to many places and two metro stops are near. I would recommend!
super location, Lucia was really open to questions about Barcelona, recommend it!
Roberta and Lucia were very helpful from the beginning to the end of my stay, they went out of their way to accomodate me and were very kind :)

Kind and very hospitable hosts. Location perfectly central. Building doesn't have elevator and the apartment is near the top, but as long as you know, it's not a problem. Apartment is lovely, bed is comfortable and for the price, you can't beat this. Thank you Lucia and Romina for all your help!

Romina y Lucia son muy amables y hospitalarias. El departamento es limpio y ordenado, tal como se ve en las fotos y ¡la ubicación es inmejorable! Volvería a quedarme con gusto. 

Diría que este lugar tiene una buena relación calidad-precio.

Perfect location in the city center. Comfortable bed and nice, clean bathroom. Romina and Lucia are very nice hosts and left us with maps and tourist books to help us get around the city. The house has everything you need, even filtered water from the tap so you can refill your water bottles! And there is an elevator currently being installed for future Airbnb travelers :) I would definitely recommend this house!
highly recommended. great hosts. perfect location. clean and cozy bedroom with sunlight.

Very nice hosts and the apartment is very good located to every interest site by walk. Many restaurants and a supermarket very close. Calm in night. The bed is comfortable.   I passed a nice stay with Lucia and Romina. Thanks!

Posizione centralissima con negozi, supermercati, ristoranti e metropolitana vicini. Le ragazze sono molto accoglienti, gentili e simpatiche. Hanno un rubinetto con l'acqua depurata ed è stato molto comodo poterlo utilizzare. Abbiamo condiviso il bagno anche con un loro amico ma immagino che fosse lì solo per le vacanze di Natale. L'appartamento è grande, luminoso e pulito.

Posto centralissimo, hosts simpatici e cordiali, nessun contro specifico.
Consigliato.
Muy buena ubicación, y todo muy limpio. Romina, Lucia, y Edu fueron muy amables y me ayudaron en lo que pudieron.
Lucia's place is a comfortable room, with shared bathroom, but good value for money as it is located right in the center of Barcelona. The hosts are friendly and helpful.

Helpful Host!
Location can't be better, its fantastic! 60 seconds walk to catalunya square, 60 seconds to metro!
Good workable room!
Elevator not yet functional
Neat and Clean Bathroom, but common!

Lucia's apartment is beautiful and neat as a pin. The room is a nice size with comfortable double bed and a window that allows a lot of sunlight and fresh air in. Location wise this apartment is perfect - close to Placa de Catalunya and many great shopping streets - yet the apartment itself is on a very quiet street right in the middle with very low noise levels. Bathroom is very clean and neat and has everything one needs. The hosts were very accommodating, helpful and friendly. I loved staying here and can highly recommend them.
Very felxible. Highly recommended. Great location. Tidy and confortable flat. Cheerful, helpful owners.
Very nice people you will definitely fell at home. The place is great and the room has a good size
lucia人很好,住宿环境也很舒适干净｡这个flat地理位置很好,离兰布拉大道很近,走着大概5mins就到｡此外,楼下有安全门,安全度较高,住着踏实｡

I and my wife were in Barcelona for two weeks. And we are very pleased that we select Lucia's apartment.
A lot of major attractions can be easily reached within a 5-10-minute walk.
In our room was a comfortable bed. Sometimes we cooked a food, it's very convenient that we could use kitchen and a fridge.
Lucia and Edu were very friendly and tried to do everything to help us.
We are highly recommended this apartment if your're going to Barcelona.

I stayed for 3 weeks. Perfect location! Just next to plaza Catalunya and portal de l'angel plus its a quiet street so its the best. The elevator is finally working! Lucia and edo are really nice and helpful. Would definitely go back. Really recommended!

The location is simply fantastic, near to any kind of transportation that drives you to any of the major places in the city. The Gothic Quarter is stunning. Lucia and Edu are very nice people, their place is authentic and the room is perfect for a couple or a single person. Very clean, tidy and smells nice :) Strongly recommend!

Квартира очень понравилась. Находится прям в центре, все рядом, автобус, метро, пешком можно дойти до всех достопримечательностей и моря. Квартира очень чистая. Хозяева доброжелательные. Несмотря на ранний приезд, Люсия разрешила заселиться нам сразу по приезду. Единственное , что не поняла, это платная Стиральная машинка. В описании она входила, я думала , что платить не надо. И один ключ на двоих. Хотелось бы получать по комплекту ключей для каждого.

La ubicación es perfecta y al lado de todo , está en una calle tranquila y de fácil acceso. La habitación es linda y tiene mucha luz. Toda la vivienda está ordenada y limpia ; es una casa con detalles y cuidada.
El trato con Lucía y su chico es muy agradable y están pendientes de que no te falte nada y que la estancia sea cómoda.
Lo recomiendo por su buena relación calidad precio y estpy segura de que repetiré estancia en futuras visitas a Barcelona
Lucia and Edu are great people. They are very friendly and helpful. Their flat is really nice and very calm while it is located in the middle. We enjoyed our stay & want to come back :)

Lucia had great communication and provided everything I needed. It was super close to Placa Catalunya and easy walking to the main areas of interest. Home was clean and relaxed and the room was bright. Very comfy bed. Would recommend

I couldn't have asked for a more perfect place to stay during my first time in barcelona. Soo central and a two minute walk from plaza catalunya - I easily took an aerobus from the airport, had access to the bus touristic, walkable from the beach (30 min), the gothic (10 min), la rambla, and more. The place itself was clean and well-represented by the profile. Lucia and Edu were incredibly nice and welcoming and answered my questions and were super flexible with my check in and check out. The building is on a little alleyway without driving access so it's very quiet, and the building itself has 2 doors for extra security. There's an elevator which is a plus. Overall no complaints, amazing place.

It's really important to say that it was the first time I stayed in an AirBnB, so that's why I was hesitating at first.
When I got home Lucia made me feel like I was back home.
Lucia is a wonderful host. She was really kind with me and she even supplied me with maps of Barcelona. I even asked her for a plug in socket and she had a spare one and lent me. Then she showed me my room and the bathroom. They were both really clean. She even gave me a towel I could use, and shampoo :)
I didn't have the chance to get to know her well but she left me the best impressions.
The home is 2 minutes close(on feet) to the Plaza Catalunya. You can get access there to the Plaza Catalunya metro station easily.
Overall, I had a really good time at the house.
I definitely recommend staying in Lucia's appartment :)

A room satisfying what you need after a day umder the sun and a party at night. The room is clean, Lucia is worth the trust. The location is very central  close to many attractions. There is a direct transporation to the airport 5 min away from the apartment. To recommend.
Lucia is a great host. Very friendly and helpful. Her place is in a great location. Super close to airport bus. Easy walk to restaurants and transport, yet, the apartment is in a quiet location.
정말 친절하구요 위치도 까탈루냐 광장 근처여서 공항 이동도 편했고 다른 곳 이동할때도 편했어요 깨끗하고 와이파이도 방에 바로 있어서 엄청 잘터져요~~
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e limpo. A Lucia é super receptiva e atenciosa! Recomendo a estadia!

Lucia was very nice. Our arrival was very late (2h delayed) but no problem with the checkin for her. 5*
The flat was clean and our room was nice.
Located very central so everything was easy to get there.
Nice stay in Barcelona!

Pasamos unos lindos días en casa de Lucia.  Tanto ella como Edu nos trataron muy bien. 
Gracias!
Nice room, good people, thanks for your hospitality
Great communication, close to central Barcelona room is everything you need.

The room was spacious and lovely, Lucia and Edu were very kind.

Located near a lot of attractions and metro&bus, it's very easy to get around the city from here.

I stayed here for four nights by myself, and it was just perfect. 

Once you get a hold of Major locations, you will enjoy walking everywhere; even the Barceloneta beach is only 20-25mins of walk. 

Lucia and Edu were kind and easy to communicate with. The bathroom is unique and spacious so it was comfortable using it. 

Around the street there were cute little cafeterias that were both characteristic and tasty. Go to 4Gats(2 min from house), where Picasso frequented, and enjoy a cuo of espresso for just €1.55.

Overall I highly recommend it!

We loved Lucias place! It is very central and there is lots to do. It is close to public transport nevertheless we managed to walk everywhere. The room was clean and tidy as was the rest of the Appartement we shared. Lucia was very friendly and kind, awaited us with the keys and gave us tips how to get there and around ;-)
La ubicación del piso de Lucia es inmejorable, el cuarto tal cual se ve en la foto y el lugar es limpio. Lucía y Eduardo muy amables, volveríamos sin dudarlo.
This place is greatly located and the hosts made us feel as confortable as we could feel. The shower is a little too small but who cares!

Great hospitality from Lucia! The location is very centralized. La rambla was just one block away. What I loved was the excellent customer service from Lucia. She allowed me to keep my luggage after check out. I left my glasses in the house. Lucia found it and courier it for me. She was very helpful and considerate. It was my pleasure to stayed in her house.

Excelente ubicación, a pocos minutos de medios de transporte (bus, metro catalunya, aerobus) y lugares turísticos. Rodeado de zona comercial, restaurantes y supermercados.
 Caminando: ramblas, paseo de gracia (menos de 5- 7 minutos), casa de batlo (15- 20 minutos), las pedreiras (25 minutos).
Habitación limpia y cama cómoda. 
Lucia y Leo son muy educados y si bien están ahí en el alojamiento respetan mucho la privacidad de uno. 
Buena opción para viajeros a Barcelona. :-)

To start, when I booked this location, Lucia reached out to me very quickly. Throughout my trip, she was in communication with me, and helped make recommendations. The room is pretty big compared to some European hotel rooms. I was provided a clean towel, strong wifi, and access to the kitchen if I wanted. I decided to eat out, but appreciated the sentiment. This was a great location, I was comfortable here, and Lucia was an amazing host.

Lucia and her boyfriend were a great host. Our arrival with the areobus was simply. We found the appartment easily and it was no problem to check in at 8 pm. The appartment is very cosy and there is everything you need for your stay. Only strange thing: no lock for the door. You have to close the door in your room and the bathroom with a hinge. And the walls are thin so you can hear the TV in your room. Nevertheless we recommend you this room if you want to be central and be friendly surrounded. Thanks for some good days in Barcelona. We would come back again.
위치는 정말 좋아요! 엘리베이터도 있어서 짐 옮기기 너무 편했구요~
Lucia的房子位置简直太棒了,你可以步行到差不多所有的景点,也非常好找,就在市中心,下次来巴塞罗那我还会选择这个房子,thank you Lucia!
Lucia is a nice and friendly host. I felt really welcome. Perfect location in Barcelona! I would come back!

This is a clean apartment, located close to transport, and restaurants within walking distance. Transportation to and from Barcelona Airport and the apartment is made very simple, being situated just minutes away from the shuttle bus service. The hosts are friendly, who go out of their way to make you feel comfortable and ensure you have everything you need!
Big comfortable room, so close to the airport bus stop with a lift :) everything I needed for the last stress free nights of a long trip. Thanks for having me!
Gracias y perdon por los horarios

Siamo stati ospitati da Lucia ed Edoardo per 4 giorni. Persone molto simpatiche e gentili davvero alla mano. Non ci hanno mai fatto sentire degli ospiti. La camera un po' piccolina ma comoda e pulita.
 Posizione dell'appartamento ottimo. Vicinissimo alla Rambla e alla metro. 
Soddisfatti. 
Consiglio di alloggiare da loro se vi trovate a Barcellona.
Grazie ancora

Отличная комната в хорошем месте. Если вы прилетаете в Барселону и добираетесь до города на Aerobus, всего 3 минуты от остановки и вы в квартире. Гостеприимные хозяева. Все удобно, чисто. К услугам любые мелочи: от кухни, до стиральной машины. Уезжал позже, спросил о возможности погостить не до 12, а до 16 час., Lucia любезно предоставила такую возможность. Спасибо!
优点:地理位置佳,步行即可覆盖大多数热点区域｡房间非常干净｡不足:洗澡的地方有一点小,房间比较古老｡
Lugar perfecto, personas maravillosas
엘베가 고장나는바람에 루시아 남자친구가 들어다주느라 고생이 많았어요 ㅠㅠ 외국인 친구집에서 머무는듯한 편안함입니다

Lucia har ett mycket vänligt bemötande!
Allt överensstämde med beskrivningen på hemsidan. 
Bra stort rum. Rent och fräscht. Tillgång till kök, badrum, vardagsrum.
Läget på lägenheten nära Placa Cataluna är perfekt. Innebär nära till de flesta sevärdheter, metro och buss.
Inga störande grannar.

Lucias lejlighed lå dejligt centralt i Barcelona - perfekt til en forlænget weekend og i gåafstand til mange af Barcelonas seværdigheder. Begge værter var super søde, og vi følte os meget velkomne i deres hjem. Lejligheden levede i høj grad op til de forventninger vi havde, inden vi kom - kan klart anbefales:)
Excelente ubicación muy cerca de plaza Catalunya y de las partes más importantes de Barcelona, un lugar agradable para descansar!!
房东热情,房子位置很好
Muy buena estancia, pasé dos noches en la casa de Edu y Lucia, muy buena experiencia. La casa genial muy bien situada
Super host, indeed.

Lucia 커플이랑 같이쓰는집입니다 
딱 들어갔는데 집이 좀 좁았고 같이써서 한국인들입장에선 마치 셋방살이 하는 기분입니다 
샤워하는공간은 매우 좁습니다 
체크인시 밖에 나와주지 않아 집을 찾기 매우 어려웠습니다 새벽두시에 체크인햇더니 10유로 내야했습니다 
방에서 자려고 누우니 두분이 티비보고 떠드셔서 좀 시끄러울때도있었지만 그래도 빨리 주무시는 편입니다 
위치는 좋습니다 람블라스거리 그란비아거리 다 가까워요
Thanks Lucia for getting things ready so last minute! Would defo recommend!

La habitacion es tal cual se muestra en las fotos, cómoda para dos personas. El departamento es cómodo y estaba limpio. La ubicación es inmejorable! A una cuadra de la plaza principal de Barcelona con todos los medios de transporte disponibles, muy fácil de trasladarse. Sin embargo la cuadra del departamento es muy pintoresca y tranquila, no se escuchan ruidos. Lucía y Eduardo son excelentes anfitriones, muy amables y atentos a nuestras necesidades. Sin duda lo recomendamos!
机场到这里超方便,离市中心也很近
Great location, very friendly host and helpful with local knowledge. Would definitely stay there again. Thank you Lucia .

Мне очень нравится эта квартира и ее хозяева. С мужем мы останавливаемся здесь уже второй раз, и для нас это показатель. Уютная комната, удобная кровать, все очень чисто и мило. Люсиа доброжелательная хозяйка, отзывчивая, отвечает на все вопросы.  В день отъезда Люсиа сама предложила нам выехать позже, когда нам нужно, а не в назначенное время. 
Все очень понравилось, идеальное место, идеальное местоположение .
Great location
Departamento impecable, super bien ubicado. La habitacion hermosa y los anfitriones muy buena onda. Super recomendable.  Gracias!
It was very comfortable like a staying friebds house.

Lucia and Edu are very nice, our flight delayed for about 2 hours, they still waited us at home. The flat is quiet and located in the city centre, 2 min walk to Plaze Catalunya and everything, highly recommended.

Staying at Lucia and Edu's place was a charm! The apartment is VERY centrally located, and tucked away in a surprisingly quiet street! Both Lucia and Edu were extremely hospitable and provided me with a beautiful and clean room, helping make my trip to Barcelona the highlight of my Euro trip! Would absolutely recommend!

Lucia’s home is so central to everything - a 5-minute walk to Plaza Cataluña bus and train terminal, 10-min to the gothic quarter and El Born, and yet it was tucked away on a quiet street.  The room is spacious and comfortable with a window for breeze. The bed was very cozy too.  Lucia and her partner were excellent hosts - very friendly, welcoming, and helpful.  They even invited me to watch a a futbal match with them at home. Highly recommend.
Ubicación amabilidad espacio.
Excellent location near Catalunya Placa, I would recommend to single travelers

Very well located. Clean, friendly welcoming. Only issue is the lack of air conditioning - for a Brit on a very warm night it was difficult to sleep! Though they did provide a fan which made a difference. A few nice touches like funny bears and water.
A estadia foi ótima, o apartamento muito bem localizado, quarto e banheiro bons, toalha maravilhosa!

I really enjoyed Lucia's place. Both Lucia and Edu were very friendly when I saw them. The room was very cute and the apartment was conveniently located in a busy part of Barcelona. The apartment was just around the corner from one of the transport hubs. The plaza had a touristic bus line as well as the metro, train, and buses. There is an elevator in the building and I had no trouble with the wifi while I was there.
La habitación es tal cual las fotos. Excelente ubicación!
Very kind and gracious host.  Accommodated my late arrival.  That was very much appreciated.  Prompted replies to my communications. Great location!

Not a super host, or very communicative for that matter, but the place is clean and located in a great area that is easy to get around. It’s a very small place so I would recommend to solo travelers. Safe area, and nice building. Don’t expect too much from the hosts, in my experience bc they didn’t speak to me (might be the language barrier also), but they seem like a nice couple. Overall, I was content.

My stay with Lucia was one of the best AirBnb experiences I've had, and I can't recommend this flat enough for a solo traveller. A sensational location, so easy to get around to different parts of the city by bus or metro. The area is also very safe, which for a female traveling alone is important. The layout of the flat is ideal, as although the guest room is in the middle of the flat, it does not feel as though you're stepping on each other. Finally, there is a LIFT which is so unusual, but a blessing for tired feet after a long day. Lucia and Edu are relaxed and cheerful hosts, and it was a pleasure to be in their flat for a week, the room is spacious and had everything I needed.  I will definitely stay again when I return to Barcelona. (ps do not miss OGGI Gelato just around the corner! )

I had a cancelled flight, so I only ended up staying here for a short overnight stay. It was right near Catalunya for the airport bus (walkable with luggage), and right in the middle of Barcelona -- yet still the quietest room I have had yet. Lovely and patient hosts with great communication throughout. It all worked out seamlessly, despite the airline issues.
Lucia and Edu are really fantastic people, and their spot could not be in a better location! They were both incredibly attentive, helpful, and friendly. 100% recommended!

El departamento está en una ubicación inmejorable, cerca de Plaza Catalunya. Espectacular para salir a conocer Barcelona. 
El cuarto es muy cómodo. Ideal para una persona. 
Lo recomiendo!
Un departamento muy padre por dentro, Lucia y Edu son muy amigables, me trataron muy bien. Super ubicación y el cuarto muy comodo

Lucia y Edu, fueron unos anfitriones excelentes, cordiales e interesados. Con una amabilidad insuperable, reflejada en muchos detalles, inclusive Lucia fue a esperarme fuera de su casa, al saber que venía con maletas y en la noche para ayudarme y orientarme. La habitación, iluminada, espaciosa, limpia y agradable, el baño y el apartamento muy pulcros, una ubicación excelente. Gracias por recibirme.
Great apartment in a central location. Close to metro and bus stops. Amazing host. The room was cool at night and very quiet.

Lucia is making her best to let you have a comfortable stay in her place, and to find solutions at your different requests.
I recommend this quiet address, very well located in Barcelona.
Todo impecable. Los anfitriones geniales y el lugar como en nuestra casa! Súper recomendable!
Execelente localização! Apartamento limpo e estiloso. Bem preparado para receber os hóspedes. Recomendo!
Fijn ontvangen en top locatie! Aanrader!

Un lugar recomendable, es tal cual se ve en las fotos, un departamento con detalles,  pasamos una estadía genial, Eduardo nos ayudó mucho con sus recomendaciones. La ubicación es perfecta, a 200 metros de Plaza Cataluña. Ambos fueron muy amables.
Posizione super eccezionale, comodissimo per girare e visitare Barcellona a piedi. Ottima la pulizia della camera e del bagno. Consiglio sicuramente per soggiorni di tre quattro giorni.

I loved staying at Lucia's place. The location is very central, but the street is quiet. The room is exactly as in the picture (and very lovely). The only thing to take into account is that there is no wardrobe in the room, so if you are traveling with lots of things you should let Lucia know ;) 
I would definitely reccomend staying there and would love to come back!
Location is so good. There is near the airport bus, restaurants, supermarket and everything.
Buen alojamiento, con muy buena ubicación
非常好的位置,因为要坐机场大巴所以定在加泰罗尼亚广场,步行不到3分钟就到了中心地带｡lucia小姐姐人很友善也很热情,小区有2道门锁,所以很安全｡电梯也很新,在巴塞罗那呆了4天,每天都很悠闲开心,非常愉快的一段回忆咯!
Great location. Close to everything, but apartment is in a quiet alley a minute walk from the plaza.  I suggest guests rent a bike and lock it at Plaza Catalunya.
it's in the centre of Barcelona, the location is really great. And the flat is very new and sweet. I will recommend this flat to my friends if they gonna have trip in Barcelona.:D

Très particulièrement calme, l’appartement est situé en plein cœur de Barcelone. L’immeuble ancien est restauré et magnifique. La chambre permet de vivre en toute indépendance. L’espace douche est très agréable est propre.
Lucia est adorable et pleine d’attentions.
Bref, un accueil parfait!
À recommander vivement!

Ha sido mi primera experiencia en airbnb y gracias a Lucía estoy muy contenta. Recomiendo su alojamiento. La casa es muy agradable, luminosa y es mejor que en las fotos. Cuida los detalles, es muy tolerante y una gran persona. La casa está genial ubicada y es fácil encontrarla y llegar desde el aeropuerto.  El complemento perfecto para que tu viaje a Barcelona sea genial.

The apartment is really well located. Everything you needed was close to it. Public transportation is easy from Plaça de Catalunya which is at 5 minutes of walk from the location. The bedroom was really clean and the sheets smelled  good. The host had great restaurant recommendations.
Close to metro and many sightseeing places.
L’appartement est parfaitement bien placé pour visiter tout les quartiers de Barcelone. Je recommande le logement de Lucia pour un court séjour.

name: Cycle or Walk to Hanalei Bay from This Bright and Airy Home
summary: Kick back on a sunny deck and see mountains in the horizon. Keep sliding doors open and let fresh breezes blow through this open space with vaulted timber ceilings. The large yard is perfect for kids to play. Hop on bikes and ride to the beach or town.
space: The home's meticulously clean and elegant features will help you rejuvenate. The interior's features include: two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, custom kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, all stainless steel appliances, ceiling fans in every room, and hardwood floors. Downstairs is a storage room which houses the bikes, surfboards, beach wagon, body boards and beach equipment. World famous Hanalei Bay is located less than a two minute walk away and will provide you with the ultimate beach going experience. Take in the sunrise, waterfalls, rainbows, boats, surfers, Bali Hai sunsets, and incredible ocean beauty, while you try to figure out which parts of the surrounding mountains make up 'Puff the magic dragon.' Bay activities include: snorkeling, swimming, kayaking, surfing, body boarding, hiking, walking, jogging, and of course relaxing.
description: Kick back on a sunny deck and see mountains in the horizon. Keep sliding doors open and let fresh breezes blow through this open space with vaulted timber ceilings. The large yard is perfect for kids to play. Hop on bikes and ride to the beach or town.
neighborhood_overview: The house is in the quintessential beach town of Hanalei. Walk to the bay for a surf, swim or beach walk. Have a casual or elegant meal in town, shop, and relax.
notes: This property is a legally licensed vacation rental: TVNC 5119
transit: A rental car is highly recommended to be able to go out to Ke'e for snorkeling or the NaPali hike, to Tunnel's Beach Haena, to Princeville for golf, tennis or shopping. To Anini for inside-the-reef snorkeling or swimming during winter swell.  We provide you with two cruiser bikes and one to two kid's bikes for getting around Hanalei. The Kauai Bus runs approximately every hour through the day to and from Lihue.
access: You have access to and use of the entire property.
interaction: As your host, and the property's manager, I'm available by phone/text/email before and throughout your trip.
house_rules: Please remove shoes before entering house. No parties and no loud noise before 8:00 a.m. or after 10:00 p.m. Thank you

host.host_about: Beach/ocean/depth/beauty lover, surfer, adventurer … and, will take time to host your super special vacation on the north shore of Kauai.

reviews.comments:
We really enjoyed staying at the Ke Aloha house.  While the address is listed as on the highway, it is a house back from it and we didn't notice highway noise at all.  The house is spacious, clean, and inviting.  It is a very nice space with quality furniture and design.  The second space downstairs is a wonderful addition.  We also appreciated the boogie boards, sand toys, and other extras.  

I would not recommend the house to people who don't want to take excellent care of the space.  The house rules seemed very reasonable, but people should be prepared to keep the sand out of the house, and be gentle on the furnishings.
It was a fabulous 2BR/2BATH house, perfect for our family.  We loved staying there.

Highly recommended for families. Great location just a very quick drive to town or beaches or other activities. Our host was communicative but not intrusive at all. Not a single complaint about anything.

Lauren was very helpful and clear in her instructions. Her house was beautiful and everything was according to the agreement. It's location is perfect for a five day getaway. I'm sure there wouldn't be a better place to ask for. Thanks Lauren!
Amazing stay in Hanalei.  Close to the beach and local town. The place was perfect!

We had a fabulous stay in Lauren’s house. It is the perfect space for two couples. Wonderfully clean and well equipped, especially the kitchen. We managed to make pina colada’s in the blender with local fresh coconut and pineapple from the farmers market. Very close to surf and to Hanelai. 
Thank You Lauren!

House was perfect for our family of 4.  Would definitely return again. Bed was comfy, we slept really well running just the fan on the ac unit.  Loved having bikes to ride into town. Beach chairs and wagon with plenty of towels for short walk to beach was also nice!
Great updated house near Hanalei town and the beach. Lots of beach towels, bikes and surf boards!

Lauren's Hanalei house is perfectly situated in a quiet Hanalei neighborhood across the street from the beach. The home is wonderfully furnished with warm wood floors and lovely furniture.  It has the perfect outdoor shower and boogie boards to take to the beach. The beds are all incredibly comfortable and there are overhead fans and portable AC units when it gets too hot. It's a perfect spot if you love visiting the town of Hanalei which is in walking distance and if you like to walk to beach to surf or boogie board. One of the best places we have stayed in during our many trips to Kauai.

Great House to stay in on a vacation. Everything was exceptionally clean! Having tons of extra clean linens, bath towels and beach towels was fabulous. The AC units in every room was an added bonus.  Thank You!

Nice little place close to the beach and town. We loved that the hosts had a wagon, beach gear and bikes that we were able to use. The house was very clean and well stocked. Note that the AC listed here are portable units only, and weren’t able to fully cool the space during our stay. Washer and one of the AC units were broken. Management was very responsive and had them replaced  quickly with minimal disruption to our stay.
Nice place for families. Amazing location is a short walk to a great beach. Lots of great beach gear and a wagon to haul all the stuff.

Lauren’s place is beautiful!!! It was even better than we expected, her house definitely gave the ‘wow’ factor when we opened the door. Lauren has put so much effort into the decor, linen and furniture, it just had a really nice feel. It was a perfect space for our family of four. I had to pinch myself each morning waking up to the view of the mountains. Lauren’s place is in a fantastic location, close to everything yet still private and in a quiet spot. Easy walking distance to the beach and town and if we wanted to change it up we rode on the bikes provided. Beach gear was amazing, we didn’t have to hire anything and we loved using it all each day. Thanks again for a truly memorable stay.

Beautiful home with excellent ammenities. A quick stroll to the majestic Hanalei Bay.
Our family of five adults could thoroughly recommend.

Just got back from a weeks stay at Lauren’s place and had a great time.  The space is clean, tidy and the location is amazing.  Great to have surfboards, boogie boards and bikes free to use.  
Highly recommended.

What an incredible house! Our stay at Kealoha was the perfect home base for a week of adventure around Hanalei and Kuaui. The house had everything we needed, from towels to kitchen items, and all the awesome beach toys. You’re just a short walk away to the bay. It felt great to walk by people looking for beach parking spots and land right on the sand with no stress.
Lauren was great with communication especially at check in. 
We couldn’t recommend this house more, such an awesome set up for a vacation in paradise.

name: Park Slope Private Bed+Livingroom!
summary: A truly amazing space! This large bedroom w private living room, 1st FLOOR apt is the best value in Park Slope! The vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors are just the tip. Large south facing windows open up to the greatest neighborhood in NYC!
space: 2 Large rooms on the 1st Floor!  I always enjoy when my guests arrive because they are constantly impressed by the size of the space! The bedroom and the living room are both included and are separated by French doors with thick curtains, which allow for a dark and quiet sleeping experience. The sizeable living room has 3 enormous, south facing windows that let in the sun, sights and sounds of Park Slope (the best neighborhood in NYC). There is a queen bed in one of the rooms and plenty of room for an air mattress which I have on site. *Check-in/out time is  very flexible, and if your departure is late, feel free to keep your luggage at my place while you take your time in the city!  * I will give you keys so you can come and go as you choose. About the apartment:  -- First floor  -- Private bedroom with clean sheets, empty drawers and a large closet with hangers -- Queen size bed (very comfortable) --Private Living Room -- Fios WiFi ( Extremely fast) -- Air conditioning -- Cable TV  -
description: A truly amazing space! This large bedroom w private living room, 1st FLOOR apt is the best value in Park Slope! The vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors are just the tip. Large south facing windows open up to the greatest neighborhood in NYC! 2 Large rooms on the 1st Floor!  I always enjoy when my guests arrive because they are constantly impressed by the size of the space! The bedroom and the living room are both included and are separated by French doors with thick curtains, which allow for a dark and quiet sleeping experience. The sizeable living room has 3 enormous, south facing windows that let in the sun, sights and sounds of Park Slope (the best neighborhood in NYC). There is a queen bed in one of the rooms and plenty of room for an air mattress which I have on site. *Check-in/out time is  very flexible, and if your departure is late, feel free to keep your luggage at my place while you take your time in the city!  * I will give you keys so you can come and go as you choose. Abo
neighborhood_overview: After 5 years in this apartment I am still blown away by this neighborhood and It's location! The beautiful brownstones that line the streets give Park Slope a very historical and calming feel. It is hard to believe that Maximum City is only 3 stops away! The feeling I get when I return from a day in Manhattan is priceless! I wouldn't trade the calming aspect of Park Slope, or Brooklyn for that matter, for anything. They can keep Manhattan, because Brooklyn is where it's at!
access: I encourage my guests to immediately feel at home! I want them to feel a connection to the neighborhood, the space and everything in it!  Guests will have access to the kitchen, all pots pans, the refrigerator etc...  The Bathroom is huge by NY standards and since I use the shower at the gym, I am never in the way! It is my #1 concern that my guests have complete access to the bathroom at all times!
interaction: I am extremely outgoing, but once the formalities are out of the way, I leave the interaction time to my guests. I make myself available for any questions, recommendations, or concerns, without interfering with their stay. I've had guests that I've shared dinners with and I've had others that preferred to be left alone. My only concern is the comfort of my guests for the duration of their stay!
house_rules: As of now there are very few rules and I hope to keep it that way. There will be a very short list provided at time of stay

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am an easygoing Michigander who moved to Brooklyn from a small town in Montana (1500people) 5 years ago. I love it! There is so much to see and do. 

I am just starting my second year as an airb host and I only have fond memories of my first! I like to think I specialize in hosting foreign guests, but my honest, straightforward, mid-western upbringing keeps me well rounded. Just ask my Mother:) I was fortunate to have traveled the world in my 20"s and 30's and now I really enjoy having the world come to me. I genuinely love being a host! A guest (and now a friend) from Northern Ireland wrote, "This guy embodies the spirit of AirBnB" I'm flattered by this and I hope it is true.

I recently graduated from Brooklyn College and I'm now certified to teach kindergarten through the 6th grade in the state of New York. I'm looking forward to the challenge!

Oh yeah, I'm also into Bonsai (miniature trees)! I guess, possessed by it would be a more accurate description? I have close to 100 trees at this location and another 800 or so at my nursery in Michigan.

reviews.comments:
Kevin is a flawless host and I can't recommend him highly enough. His place is immaculate, comfortable and very clean. I booked my parents to stay with Kevin as it's close to where we live and they loved it. They told me Kevin made them feel part of the family. They had space and privacy and Kevin was very friendly, on hand for anything they needed. He made them feel very welcome and relaxed immediately. The bedroom and lounge area are a great size, they also had full use of the kitchen and bathroom. It really felt like a home from home. 
Don't let the sharing the apartment aspect put you off, Kevin has a separate bedroom and lounge area so they didn't see him unless they wanted to. And he was such great company they looked forward to the daily exchanges.
The apartment is very close to 5th Ave & 7th Ave so you're on top of great cafes and restaurants. It's just 2 blocks from the nearest subway, very easy to get into Manhattan and Prospect Park is on the doorstep.
I'm so delighted I made this booking, my parents had a wonderful time, the location is great and the apartment is perfect.

Kevin is a warm and welcoming host, friendly and talkative, but also unobtrusive to his guests. After making your initial acquaintance, he leaves you to settle in and do as you may. The room (and the apartment) is very clean, neat, orderly, tidy and also very quiet. Enjoy your stay!

My husband and I spent one week staying with Kevin.  it was very comfortable staying in our spacious, clean, bedroom/living room suite with Wifi access and television.  The shared bathroom was not a problem.  Kevin was a warm, gracious host who made us feel at home.  His apartment is located in a beautiful, safe neighborhood within easy walking distance of restaurants, charming shops, and public transportation.  This was our first airbnb stay, and we will definitely use airbnb again.

We had a very super early flight into NY, but Kevin was super accommodating that he let us stay once we arrived!  

The neighborhood is historically beautiful and family friendly.  
Our private room consisted of a bedroom plus a living room with a gorgeous view of the beautiful buildings across.  We had our own key sets, so we came and go as we pleased.  Also, we had no problems at all utilizing the restroom and kitchen.  If you like to cook your own food, there's plenty of grocery stores in walking distance.  

Kevin is an amazing host and was very informative of spots to go eat at and enjoy.  He has made our first New York experience a memorable one!  This was my first booking with AirBnB and we're stoked Kevin was our host!
Kevin is a great host and the location can't be beat. He'll make sure you have everything you need and that you know how to get where you're going in the city. Can't recommend him highly enough.

Kevin is a wonderful, kind and funny host and his place was perfect for us. The space including our room and the living room was bigger than I expected. We had a great time here and now miss fancy restaurants and bars nearby. I hope we could stay in his place again someday.  (Thank you very much, Kevin!)

Kevin's apartment is  in a perfect location, Park slope is awesome! Short walk to the metro, heaps of shopping and restaurants near by. The rooms and amenities were spacious and clean, bed was comfy, room was private and cozy.

Kevin's hospitality was excellent, he has a relaxed & laid back manner (me casa sous casa, my house is your house). He wants your stay to be relaxed and enjoyable and is willing to go the extra mile to ensure this is the case. 

We would highly recommend anyone staying/visiting in New York to consider Kevin's place! A++++++++

Kevin is a great host! He really makes you feel at home without being the least bit intrusive. His place is roomy, clean, and in a safe neighborhood that is super convenient to restaurants, shops, and transportation. Also great was that, after long days of being on the go, it's only a few stairs up to his 1st floor accommodations. My husband and I would definitely welcome the chance to stay with Kevin again!

I could give a MILLION words of praise about staying at Kevin's place. 

One - the neighborhood. Park Slope is a great neighborhood, quiet and safe, but just a 5-10 minute walk from some of Brooklyn's best restaurants and bars. You've also got the B and R trains a few blocks away that run to Manhattan, PLUS Atlantic Avenue isn't too far away if you need other trains.

Two - this apartment is a steal. You get your own room and generous living room, so you have tons of privacy and space.

Finally, Kevin is a great guy and host. Laid back and fun to talk to, but also really accommodating. Seriously, stay here!!

My stay at Kevin's was great.  This guy embodies the spirit of AirBnB.  I felt at home as soon as I arrived.  My plans were pretty flexible and involved both my father and a friend staying at different times.  Kevin was absolutely fine with this and made everyone feel at ease.  All of us enjoyed our time there and we will definitely be back. 

A fantastic location and host.  I can't imagine that there is a better place to stay during your time in New York (and I stayed in a few).

This is the place to be.

Thanks Kevin - hope to see you next year.

We had an awesome experience staying with Kevin.  He is a very gracious and accommodating host, and the apartment is very spacious.  But, the best part of our stay was the neighborhood . . . it was fantastic!  We were told it has been voted the best neighborhood in New York City 3 years in a row, and we saw why . . . charming, safe, and happening!  We will definitely staying again

Kevin and his place were awesome.  The rooms were exactly as described.  Wonderful apartment in an ideal location, not too far from the subway and near all sorts of shops and restaurants.  Kevin is kind, accommodating, and incredibly helpful.  Would stay there again in a heartbeat!
The location was perfect for us and Kevin was a great host, attentive, friendly and easy going. Our room was very comfortable, attractive and homey. We had a great stay.

Whoever said in an earlier review that Kevin and his place embody the spirit of airbnb got it spot-on. I spent a Friday night at Kevin's to go to an event at Barclays (a pleasant 10-15 minute walk away) and catch up with some friends, then tool around NY on my own the next day. Kevin was as accessible and accomodating as could be concerning my arrival and departure times, which was a big help because I tend to come to NY with a plan that consists solely of places to eat (of which there are many in walking distance) and fill in the blanks as I go.

I felt completely safe walking back alone at 3 am after enjoying some nightlife, and didn't worry about tiptoeing around when I got back in, as Kevin made it clear that I couldn't possibly disturb his slumber. The two rooms you're renting here are sunny and well-maintained, with good wifi, a comfortable bed, a clean shared bathroom and use of the fridge and kitchen. What else could you need?

Overall, I had a great time, loved the neighborhood, and appreciate everything Kevin does to make sure his guests have a pleasant, fairly priced, and stress-free stay. The next time I need a place to stay in BK, he'll be at the top of my list.

We stayed for a month in Kevin’s place. The neighborhood was really great and safe, close to subways and full of really nice restaurants and coffee shops. There were tons of great shopping stores and groceries. Moreover, the access to the Subway and the park is an important plus. We were out late every night and Kevin assured us that he is cool with that. He was easygoing and really friendly. He would even invite us to eat out together, even though we were very busy and couldn’t hang out as much. But for sure next time we will do it, because he is nice and we enjoyed talking to him.
Watching his “bonsai” in our room was pleasant and made it feel like home. The living room has only two lamp shades, which sometimes was really relaxing, but perhaps maybe too dark if you needed to work or read. We could cook in the kitchen and it was no problem. Sometimes communicating could be a little hard for us because English is not our first language.  But still, even though he was busy, he would answer our questions patiently.
Staying at this place was overall a good experience, and I think next time we will go there again.
Kevin was welcoming and very kind. I didn't feel rushed or intrusive. It was a pleasant stay, clean and accommodating. Perfect for my first AirBnB experience. Thanks Kev!

This was a great experience.  Although we asked at the last minute Kevin was totally accommodating, he was born to be a host, he is such a people person and his apt.is beautiful, clean and so convenient to anything in Park Slope. Highly recommended!

I can confirm all the good reviews this place has from other travellers. Kevin is a very nice, open, communicative and relaxed person. He gives you the feeling, that he really enjoys having you around. 
The rooms are very nice. It is very relaxing to sit in the comfortable chair in the living room, enjoying the sun shining in, and watch the people in the street. Union street is very busy with shops and restaurants, though it isn't noisy.
We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you so much, Kevin.
This place is highly recommended.

Kevin was a superb host. He was kind, prompt, and thoughtful.  He made sure we had everything we needed, and was very responsive to our questions. 

The space is beautiful and centrally located. The space is clean and safe with lots of natural light. It is a prime location to experience Brooklyn. We would definitely stay there again.

Many thanks!

Kevin has a great space that allows you feel at home.  He provides a charming and peaceful atmosphere. During my stay, he added some wintery magic touches that affected the whole neighborhood!  Kevin was hospitable, personal, sincere and completely respectful of my privacy.  
I highly recommend staying with Kevin. He'll help you with anything you need.  The area is nice, as well.  There isn't anything you can't find within walking distance! Plus, you're right between the R and BQ.  What else could you ask for??

My wife an I had an excellent stay with Kevin.  He was the perfect host.  We were a little worried about the shared bathroom but it turned out just fine.  We enjoyed the private living room after a day out on the town.  Great location to the Barclay Center and the Subway.  Would definitely stay with Kevin again!

Like the others said - Kevin is a great host and the place is very nice and big. We were quite late with reservation, but Kevin was very flexible and responsive. We didn't have any problems with check-in an check-out.

My friend and I really enjoyed our stay at Kevin's apartment. Kevin is very kind and thoughtful, and makes our stay very comfortable. The bathroom is very clean, and the living room and bedroom are very spacious. The neighborhood is great. It's convenient to everything. We will consider staying there if we ever go back to New York!

I can only echo the satisfaction expressed here by other guests.  The bedroom and living room provided plenty of space, the bathroom was clean, and Kevin was very attentive to his guests and any needs that might arise.  We would definitely return.  The location is quiet, yet one feels connected to a vibrant friendly neighborhood.  I also recommend the almond pastries at Cousin John's Bakery, a short walk down 7th Avenue.
Great location, clean well-lit place, extremely gracious host.

We had a wonderful stay with Kevin! He is a great host. We had everything we needed and the room was perfect. His place is in a great neighborhood and very convenient to the subway. Just a great place to stay when visiting NYC!

Kevin was a very warm, down-to-earth host and made me feel like I was at home. The bedroom is very dark which is nice for catching up on minus several days of sleep. The lighting in the daytime is also good. Oh, and the space is HUGE! I definitely would stay here again. The location is also convenient for getting around the city or grabbing a bite.

Kevin was easy to communicate with before arrival, had the room ready to go, and shared access to everything we needed, bathroom and food storage. We slept well each night and would be happy to stay with him again anytime in Brooklyn.

We stayed with Kevin when we were in the middle of moving to our new apartment in the same neighborhood. Kevin is really friendly and kind. His apartment was clean and just as described. We would definitely recommend his place. Great price for the location.
Kevin was awesome and his spot is legit, one of the most comfortable spots I have stayed. A very positive and welcoming experience!

We enjoyed the stay in Kevin's apartment. The two rooms are spacious and inviting, the neighborhood was great, too, and we came along very well with the host, Kevin. Highly recommended. Nice collection of bonsai trees.

We stayed at Kevin's apartment for about a week this April and had a great time. Communication with Kevin was very easy, he was super responsive prior to and throughout our stay. 
The room, actually the two rooms, are very spacious, exactly as described and perfect for two people. 
The area is fantastic, lots of shopping, great bars and restaurants, as well as Prospect Park, right around the corner.  Try Rose Water which is at Union St, just across 6th Ave.

The apartment has a real New York-Brooklyn feel, beautiful light and the surprise of many bonsais, a comfy bed and lots of privacy. Very nice, live neighborhood, several places to eat and shop around, near several train lines, a close walk to Prospect Park. I haven't met Kevin in person but all contacts were super friendly and easy.

Alors que je voyageais seule avec mes enfants à NYC, j'avais choisi un logement chez l'habitant. J'avais besoin de me sentir accueillie, rassurée dans une ville que je ne connaissais pas ou peu. Les commentaires sur Kévin étaient tellement favorables et chaleureux, que je me sentais vraiment rassurée, même si les échanges par mail avec lui n'ont pas été très nombreux ni étoffés. Une semaine avant mon départ, je lui demandais des conseils par mail sur mon arrivée à son domicile. Pas de nouvelle. La veille, je lui téléphonais.... Et là...Oh, surprise !!! Il m'annonçait qu'il ne serait pas là à mon arrivée, mais également qu'il serait absent toute la semaine (déplacement professionnel). Grande déception pour moi... Mais Kévin s'est vu rassurant et vraiment sympathique en m'assurant que tout se passerait bien et que l'appart était situé dans un très chouette quartier. Nous avons convenus d'un endroit pour la remise de clefs. Et le début de l'aventure commençait... Et en effet, comme Kévin l'avait présagé tout s'est bien passé !!!  L'appart est confortable et très bien situé. Mes enfants et moi avons adoré le quartier. Brooklyn est génial...Les gens sont hyper sympas, très décontractés...Pour la fin de notre séjour, je demandais des précisions pour le dépôt des clefs : 1 mail, 2 sms. Pas de réponse. J'ai laissé les clefs à l'intérieur et nous sommes parties. Et là, le lendemain, alors que j'étais rentrée en France, Kévin me demandait si j'avais laissé les clefs au même endroit où je les avais trouvées. Et non, je ne pouvais deviner que d'autres hôtes arriveraient !
Ce que j'attendais de cette expérience, c'était vraiment un accueil. Je pense que j'aurais annulé la réservation si j'avais su qu'il serait absent. Mon choix de voyage était d'être chez l'habitant. 
Alors, oui, tout s'est bien passé... et je reste sur cette note positive. Notre aventure à Brooklyn a été fantastique !!!

Kevin is an awesome AirBnB host!  Within a day we felt like we had known him forever. The space is huge and the location simply cannot be beat for the price.  It's convenient to shops and restaurants and a short walk to the subway.

Kevin was great, including answering my call when I needed some help.  The space was everything we needed, and was clean and pleasant.  The location was ideal for us, and everything we needed, shopping, restaurants, laundry, all were within a short walk.  We plan to check this place out for availability when we come to Brooklyn again!

Kevin is a very welcoming person. He did everything he could to make us feel at home. His apartment is very cute with plenty of nice artsy details. The neighborhood was so lovely with plenty of  fine groceries and clothing shops. It only takes around 10 minutes of walking to get to the subway. Very well located!

We had a great time in NYC and Brooklyn is a really nice place to stay for visiting the big Apple, after a day full of noises, Brooklyn is quite and cosy. Kevin ´s appartment is really well located, 15 min walk from the 7th ave station subway that drives you to Manhattan ! There are plenty of differents restaurants around, à landromat just 100 metres and a great mini-store just accrossed the streat. We didn ´t get the chance to meet Kevin. Let ´s just say that this location worth the price you will pay ! Don 't except 4 stars hotel, just enjoy the location !!

Kevin was great. He was very welcoming and had tons of great tips for us about the city. He gave us some great info on the subway (which was alsov very close to the apartment) and how to navigate the area. 

Park Slope really is a great area. It was extremely safe and much calmer than the craziness of Manhattan. It had tons of great coffee shops (Cafe Martin was my favourite), awesome restaurants and plenty of little grocery stores where we could stock up on breakfast food. Check out Union Market - it is down the street from Kevin's place and is a beautiful store. Don't forget to check out the Botanical Gardens at Prospect Park which is within walking distance from the apartment. 

Park Slope is really close to several subway stations which made getting around very easy. I was also surprised at how reasonable cabs were - we took a cab to and from LaGuardia to the apartment and it only cost about $35.  

The apartment itself was great. We had tons of space and were extremely appreciative of the air conditioner! Having access to the kitchen saved us buckets of money. We were able to have breakfast at home every day so we could afford to go out to a few fancy restaurants for dinner. 

We felt we got amazing value out of staying with Kevin and would recommend him to anyone going to NYC that is not interested in lighting their wallet on fire by staying at a hotel.

Wish everybody was as welcoming as Kevin! Fantastic location and good apartment. Pictures and description are absolutely accurate. Much better option than a hotel in Manhattan, enjoying beautiful Park Slope, without the craziness of the city, which only a few stops away. 

Would certainly recommend to friends!

We didn't get to meet in person unfortunately, but he was greatly helpful, clear and responsve in oyr communications. The apartment is perfect, Clean, spacious and perfectly located. Would definitely love to stay there when I'm back in the city.

Kevin was a fantastic host with the perfect place to stay in Brooklyn and the ideal location to base any stay in NYC. The bedroom and accessible rooms were very comfortable and well furnished and the space is terrific value. Just as importantly, Kevin keeps the place spotlessly clean. 

The apartment is in a brilliant location in a very pleasant and safe part of Brooklyn, with some great bars, restaurants, breakfast diners and general stores nearby. The metro is just a couple of blocks away and it is just a few stops (10 mins) into the centre of manhatten. 

I only met Kevin briefly, but he seemed a great guy and was always on hand via messaging for any queries etc.....and very forgiving too when I inadvertently locked him out! Sorry Kevin!

All in all, a great host and a great place to stay in NYC. I'd definitely stay again and would highly recommend!

REVIEW is written by Caitlin through my Mum Yvonne's account!

This was our first trip (myself and my 4yr old daughter) to New York to visit my brother who lives in Park Slope. Kevin was a lovely and easy-going host who made us feel very welcome and at home. He was there if I needed anything but was also very respectful of our privacy. 

Our private bedroom and living area was particularly spacious and overlooked the tree lined street. It was very comfortable. The shared kitchen and bathroom were kept clean and had all the facilities I needed. I would definitely approach Kevin again as a host for future trips to New York. 

The location was fantastic and just a short walk to the great shops on 5th avenue, the subway and the beautiful prospect park.

Thanks very much Kevin for your hospitality, I wish you all the best!
Caitlin and Millie

It was a great convenient location,  close to restaurants and the subway. Kevin met us when we arrived and was very helpful and friendly. The accommodations were clean. Good price.  We would do this again.

We made a good choice!
Die Unterkunft bei Kevin ist sehr zu empfehlen. Man hat zwei Zimmer, Schlaf- und Wohnzimmer, das ist sehr angenehm. Dadurch dass diese quasi separat sind, ist man sehr unabhängig (hat nicht das Gefühl jemandes Couch zu belegen o.ä.). Kevin ist auch sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Er nahm uns z.b. mit auf einen sehr schönen Platz an der Brooklyn Bridge. Thank's! 
Küche und Bad benutzt man zusammen, hier hatten wir auch nie Engpässe.
Wenn man ein paar Tage in NYC ist und auch ein wenig Zeit hat, ist es genau das richtige. Entspannte Gegend. Und weit nach Manhatten ist es auch überhaupt nicht. 
Weiter zu empfehlen: die Tea Lounge nebenan- ein Jazzcafé mit Jam Sessions, Bonnie's Grill - beste Burger, den ich in NY gegessen habe, natürlich der Prospekt Park und und…
Thank's and greetings to big Oscar!

First time in the Brooklyn area of New York City, even when I spent just one night at Kevin's place was a great experience, he was very helpful in all the ways and he has an awesome personality definitely I will contact him on my next trip to the big apple!!!

Hey guys, Kevin is one of the best hosts we've ever had!!! We felt home immediately! He has a very friendly and relaxed vibe..he is very helpful and was always there when we needed help. When we arrived he helped us to settle down (which was great cause we were travelling with our 2 year old daughter and needed help with sheets and even offered a baby bed..he also had lots of toys which was great for our daughter..) afterwards he went to his room to give us privacy and time to arrive.. One time I texted him about the name of the nearest train station and he not only replied immediately but was also sending directions right away ;-) The place is super clean and comfortable, the neighborhood is hip and safe and has lots of cafes, shops and subwaystations in walking distance. Only 20 minutes by subway to Manhatten, super easy! We wish we would have had more time, not only to explore Park Slope but also to hang with Kevin. He didn't treat us like paying guests but as friends! We will definetely come back!

Myself and 2 classmates stayed with Kevin for a month. Everything was great! Kevin was available whenever we needed advice and respected our privacy. The rooms were clean and very comfortable to stay in. Park Slope is a wonderful area and Kevin definitely added to the awesome experience. The area is loaded with restaurants and is not too far from the subway if you want to go to Manhattan. Would recommend this spot!

Kevin's rooms are warm, spacious and lovely, clean as a whistle and warm in the winter. The large windows give great light and connect you to the quiet street. The apartment is conveniently located in the bast part of Brooklyn within easy reach of all kinds of restaurants, services, recreational places and the subway. Kevin made us feel very welcome and at home with the perfect mixture of conversation and independence. This is a place you could spend many days happily! We highly recommend this airbnb to anyone looking for an at-home experience in the heart of Brooklyn.
The reservation was canceled 48 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our experience staying at Kevin's could not have been better.  Kevin's a great host, and a great guy to boot.  His place was spacious, private and clean.  Kevin knows how to strike that balance between giving his guests space and privacy, while also making it clear that he is available to help out in any way.  We weren't just provided with a great place to stay, but walked away feeling like we'd made new friends in Kevin and his son, Oscar.  Two cool guys. Thanks again, Kevin.

One of our best Airbnb experiences yet!  Kevin responded quickly both before and during our trip.  He was there to greet us when we arrived and the room was clean and ready for us to stay.  The room is spacious, clean and comfortable, and Kevin is a great host.  We enjoyed talking with him about the neighborhood - which is great!  This is one of the best NYC neighborhoods and you get to stay there for a steal.  Convenient to the subway (~25min ride from Port Authority) and walkable to everything you'll need (groceries, coffee, restaurants, pharmacy, etc.)  We went to a tournament at Barclays Center and it was an easy walk each day, and still centrally located enough that we could stop back home before heading into other boroughs for the evening.  Kevin really understands what Airbnb is about and this is a great choice for your travels.

The location was wonderful - close to 7th Ave. subway, and a wide choice of places to eat n have coffee. The apartment was perfect for the two of us and the host was flexible and a mine of information. The kitchen was clean and well cared for and it was great to be able to cook at home. Although the bathroom and kitchen were shared with the host, this presented no difficulties at all. 
Highly recommend staying here.

This was our first airbnb experience and we had a great time! Kevin was extremely knowledgeable, helpful, and available. Nice place and nice neighborhood. Close to everything you need and easily accessible to everything you want to see and experience in New York. Would highly recommend considering Kevin's place (as many travelers have) and we would definitely stay there again! Thanks again, Kevin!

Staying with Kevin is highly recommended. The casual and uncomplicated way of Kevin is just great. The room (actually there are two rooms) is large and comfortable. The proximity to the various subway stations is ideal for exploring New York. We would always love to go back.

Tilat olivat kuten kuvissa ja muutenkin asunto vastasi kuvausta. Isäntä oli rento ja ystävällinen, suurpiirteinen. Piti erityisesti suomalaisista! Keittiössä oli minimivarustus ja kaikki ei aina ihan toiminut, mutta kekseliäisyydellä pärjäsi. Erikoista oli se, ettei asunnon ovea saanut lukkoon, ainoastaan rapun oven. Naapurusto on kuitenkin hyvin rauhallinen ja ihmiset tuntevat toisensa, joten ilmeisesti mitään ei yleensä häviä... Ei meiltä ainakaan hävinnyt! Näin huhtikuussa huoneissa oli kylmä.

Kevin fue muy amable y paciente con nosotros, nos permitió dejar guardadas las maletas unos días en su casa antes de irnos a quedar allá y la casa es preciosa! Muy amplia la pieza, todo muy limpio y ordenado y el barrio super agradable para pasear, cerca del metro, con buses que te dejan a 5 minutos y el parque Park Slope para pasear. Las tiendas que están cerca también son bastante entretenidas.
