It was really awesome! He was very responsive all the time :) I love the bed and also was really happy that the room was warm I kinda wish that the bathroom was a little cleaner but it was amazing overall
I had to make a last minute reservation, and Reed was quick to get back to me, was flexible with my arrival time, and very warm and hospitable in welcoming me to his place.

Reed and his room mates were very nice and helpful. He was very flexible with my late arrival. Room was clean, warm and comfortable. Nice size to stay by myself. Sometimes wi-fi and shower didn't work well, but I didn't mind too much. Needless to say, location is perfect. Close to everything. I'd like to stay there again!

Reeds place is what you would expect for the price. The apartment is clean comfortable and warm. Its a good place if you don't need much beyond a bedroom and basic kitchen. the 9th St. neighborhood is a great place to be based.

Reed's place was awesome! The room was very clean and the restroom was also nice and compact. The location is wonderful, with walking distance to the Times Square. He was nice and accommodated my early arrival request. Overall, I am very satisfied and felt like home.

The host Reed was very nice and accommodating. The room was bigger then I expected and really great value and very clean. The location was amazing. I was within walking distance to a lot of the great tourist locations and times square.

The only thing that wasn't great about the room was that there was a old radiator in the room that would heat it up sometimes so occasionally I woke up with the room being very hot at night. This only happened twice in my 8 nights though.

I would 100% recommend this place to anyone who wants to be close to the action for a good price.
Lovely room and good hosts- quiet and didn't hear from them, basic but nice room, small bathroom but as pictured :)

My second time staying at Reed's!  Really like this place and location.  Reed is always very accommodating to help make my arrival smooth and easy.  The room is just as pictured, clean, simple, and perfect for my needs.  The apartment is clean and efficient, and the location is really convenient for me.  Looking forward to staying again.
I really enjoy my stay in Reed's apartment. The location is perfect!!!! So convenient! It is a good place with a good price! Thank you, Reed!

El departamento está muy cerca de times Square y zonas turísticas en midtown. También de muchas líneas de subte. El barrio esta próximo a todos por estar en manhattan central. Barato, espacio pequeño pero con todo lo necesario para un turista que busca solo un lugar donde descansar y ducharse. Reed es muy amable y me ayudó con todo. Recomendable

During my visit to NYC I was staying 5 days at Reed's place and it was a really great experience. The location is fantastic and is a good start point to explore the city. The room is clean and cousy, exactly as described in the listing. Moreover, Reed was always ready to help me during my stay, both when I arrived very late at my first day, also during my stay when he received some mail items which were addressed to me, and finally on the last day as he kept my luggage safely for my late flight. 
I'm sure that I will choose Reed's place again during my next visit to New York.
The room was perfect for my needs and the location very convenient to many places. Bed was comfortable, room was quiet, available water filter pitcher much appreciated. Thanks, Reed!
Good location with affordable price! Very close to Times Square. Bathroom is small but most time is clean. I'm sure someone clean it daily.
Everything was nicely prepared when I arrived, and the room was as described. Great location as well, I would definitely recommend staying with Reed.

Great and convenient location to stay to explore beautiful New York. This place has the basic necessities to stay and a comfortable bed to sleep in. Sufficient and safe enough for me to stay and explore NY.

The place was tidy and exactly as described. Definitely served my needs of being centrally located to times square and the theatre district. Only saw other houseguest once or twice in 3 days. 

Reed was polite and communicated well, and he was very understanding when I got my check out time confused with the check in time! 

I only used the shower once, it's definitely small and incredibly sensitive on the temp adjustments. The bathroom light wasn't working,  but Reed said they were waiting on the Super to fix it shop there's not much that can be done other than the small lamp they'd placed in there in the interim. Apartment lock was a pain sometimes,  and the steps up inside the building were step and seemed in need of repair. Just watch your step though, and you'll be fine.

Great location, close to Times Square and easy for public transport. Room was cozy. Reed was friendly, helpful and easy to communicate with. There was a bit of confusion around check in when I arrived but they were able to look after me and make sure everything was sorted when I returned. Thanks Reed!

Reed delivered everything as promised but it would have been nice to chat a bit with him.

The apartment is pretty small (by NZ  standards) with no sitting area, only your bedroom....but the location was fantastic. Just a short walkbto Times Square, all the Broadway theatres, Central Park and tge Subway so you can get around Manhatten very quickly.

Thanks for a great stay! It is the perfect location to stay in as a tourist who wants to explore! So close to Times Square, it's only a short walk away. The bedroom was perfect for me, and the hosts did not disturb me, however were there if I needed to ask anything. Would stay here in the future and recommend to others.

la chambre louée par Reed est bien située non loin de Times Square. Le quartier est animé , pas mal de restaus. Reed m'a attendu sans problème alors que j'avais pris du retard pour arriver chez lui. Très accueillant.
Par contre la salle de bain est vraiment pour moi inhospitalière, petite, fonctionnant mal..... 
c'est vrai que lorsqu'on visite New York on est plus souvent à l'extérieur et sa chambre m'a bien dépannée.
Je le remercie

Reed ha sido muy amable en todo momento! Tiempo antes de mi llegada recibió cosas por mí y contestó cada inquietud previa al viaje. Estuvo personalmente para mi llegada y me ayudó a subir las valijas por las escaleras (que no eran nada livianas).
Su hermana también ha sido muy amable. Situado en un lugar privilegiado de NY, lo recomiendo fuertemente. Gracias Reed por haberme hecho sentir como en casa... Cheers! :)
Really great host, was very kind and considerate when i showed up late. The room is small and the bathroom could be cleaner but it was very affordable and in a good area.

Reed was very accommodating and helpful. I arrived early so he helped me store my bags before check in. The place was very small, but perfect if you're just looking for a bed. I would definitely stay with Reed again.

A nice, simple, clean room in Hell's Kitchen with plenty of restaurants, delis and supermarkets nearby. Reed was very helpful and responsive if I needed anything, but also hands-off and happy to give you your privacy. The bathroom and kitchen are quite small so really not the sort of place I'd spend long hanging out/relaxing or cooking in, it's more about having a place to crash when you're exploring lovely NYC.

Reed's place is a great base for exploring manhattan. Less than ten minutes from times square, and within easy walking distance of the subway for trains to bring you uptown, downtown and into Queens or brooklyn. Ninth avenue is also bustling all day and night with plenty of great bars and restaurants, really great location. 

The room was as expected, comfortable bed, a handy well-rounded rail to hang clothes or towels, and the ac was very quiet. I didn't use the kitchen facilities, as cheap eats are so plentiful just outside, but the surfaces looked clean, and the fridge was large enough for your own food. 

It was touch and go with the hot water in the shower, sometimes really hot very quickly, or sometimes it took a while to get warm water. Nothing major though, and there was plenty of space in the shower.

You can come and go as you please at any time, very handy for the city that never sleeps! Overall a great stay, I would recommend Reed's place.
房主在了解我的行程好非常热心的给出了建议与入住安排,由于第一天我到的时间较晚,还特意安排了其他人帮助我check in,非常感谢｡房子所处的地点相当好,在市中心,去哪都很方便,楼下就是超市,酒吧,餐馆,但屋子里却很安静,实在是非常棒
Perfect room. Quiet and confortable. I wouldn't mind to repeat at this apartment

Fabulous location!!!! The street is lined with restaurants & bars & only a few blocks away from Times Square/theater district. The room was super basic, nothing fancy for sure, but the bed was bigger than I expected & super comfy. Reed was there to help me check in & answer any questions.  The place is very small, but had everything I needed for my 2 night stay. Would definitely recommend!!

Me encanto este departamento!!! la zona donde esta es increíble, cerca a todo, al Subterráneo, a las tiendas,  Reed no se encontraba pero su hermana es de las mejores anfitrionas, estaba pendiente de lo que necesitaba, me ayudaba y era muy servicial. cuando regrese a NYC volveré a este lugar.

The bed is actually larger than it appears in the photo and the room is fairly dark, which was great for sleeping.  The location is right in the middle of Hell's Kitchen and really great for those looking to be in midtown or close to the theatres.  Noise was not an issue either.  Check in and out were easy.  There was a very strong stench while I was there, but I could not locate the source.

Reed welcomed my very nicely, thanks for carrying my 24kg suitcase up. I stayed in the appartment were his sisters lives, she was very nice and helpful and very considerate.
The room is small, but that was clear, no complaints about that.
For a musical fan like me the location was perfect. No long train rides like the last years make this place great.
Grat lunch special for ca. $10 in Hells Kitchen make this another reason to come back

Reed nos contestó todas las preguntas que le hicimos a través de los mensajes de airbnb. Siempre fue muy amable.

La hermana de Reed, Fame fue muy amable durante toda nuestra estadía.
El departamento es justo para turistas que solo necesitan una cama y un baño. Nosotros alquilamos la habitación más chica y estuvo perfecto. El baño y la cocina son compartidos con los huéspedes de otra habitación y con Fame, pero nunca tuvimos problemas para usar alguno de estos ambientes. 
El departamento tiene una ubicación excelente, a unas pocas cuadras de Times Square y sobre una avenida con muchas opciones de bares y restaurates. Cerca de varias líneas de subte.

Sin duda, volveríamos al departamento de Reed!!  =)
Everything was described at it was. Overall its a room with good wifi and good location. I was looking for those things. Nothing luxurious but it does the job and at good value and location too.
small, but big enough, room in a good location for a couple days of NYC.

Excellent place! Reed and Jan are really nice people, and they are now my friends in NYC. Im glad to make a reservation with them. Very polite people, the place had everything they anounced in the description. The place is really close to the Times squares, and only 1 block away from the metro, excellent location. I would make a reservation with them again the next time in NYC.

Fame was polite and helpful and helped me out when I lost my phone which I am grateful for. 
The location is brilliant, the space itself was tiny and cramped. There were other guests staying there so there was 5 adults using one tiny grotty bathroom. The kitchen was simple unusable.
The bedroom had no where to put clothes, two hangers only were provided and there was no curtain on the window. 
This is basic at best.
Great location and host is super accommadating.

Reed is a great host! Though I only met him once I could reach him
through texts at anytime. The apartment's location was super great! It was in the middle of many nice restaurants and supermarkets and very close to subway station. Though the room that i booked was small, but it was enough for me. I surely will stay here again next time!

The location is excellent, room is small but all you need. The apartment space is very small and you will be sharing with two others on the same floor. Only gripe would be the need for basic cleaning of the bathroom and toilet would have been nice as it was quite unclean. If you want a cheap stay in New York this is for you, if you have high standards of cleanliness and want a bit of space probably not for you. I enjoyed my stay due to the great proximity to Times Square.

Jan was there to check me in when I arrive, she explained everything and offer help with everything. The location is perfect, it's close to lots of restaurants and bars, Times Square, subway. The room is small but very comfy to just sleep (a little bit too hot cause of the heater), the other facilities are fine to. I would definitely recommend for who is looking for a BB.

Tolle Lage (Musicals, Subway, Bus...). Freundliche Kommunikation. Alles lief sehr zuverlässig.Das Zimmer selbst ist klein, das Bett ist für eine Person optimal. Zimmer sauber.Heizung ließ sich leider nicht regulieren, lief tagsüber voll Power und nachts garnicht.Eigentlich kein Tageslicht,Fenster führt in Schacht zwischen 2 Häuser.Küche nicht überbewerten. Es ist alles da,was man für ein paar Tage NYC braucht.Leute total nett.1a-Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.Ich würde es weiterempfehlen. Wer allesdings etwas Ansprüche an Bad und Küche hat oder auch an Tageslicht oder z.B. Heizung, der ist hier nicht richtig. Dafür ist es preiswert. Das Bett war gut, roch frisch und man schlief gut. Viel Spaß allen, die nach mir kommen! Und viele Grüße an Reed und seine Schwester - beides sehr hilfsbereite Menschen!!

Room small and greasy. Bed smells. No one does the cleaning through my whole stay. No sunlight in the room. Weird and loud noises from upper and down floors come occasionally. Host didn't respond to my texts or airbnb messages until I knocked at the door. Great location and great food around, but I'm simply very disappointed at the cleanliness and the service.
In addition to that, you are expected to share the bathroom with 4 other people.
I surely recommend this room if you are going to visit midtown NYC. Room is pretty small but it fits the case, and hosts are really kind .
Great location, 5 min walking distance to times square
Location is perfect

Stayed 10 days.

Very good location.  Metro, Broadway, Restaurants and markets are near

Affordable cost.

Very very comfortable bed.


Downside
1. Small bathroom
Good place if you want to be near Times square. Small, as stated in the ad but good enough for people who just wants a place to sleep.

In general you get what you "ordered". The room was small (about 2x3 meters), enough space for the bed and your luggage. While the bed is very soft (some might find it too soft) the only problem is the radiator, which cannot be controlled and is a little bit noisy (hissing and clanging). Since it was cold outside, I didn't mind the heat, though it was really warm.
The bathroom and kitchen are very tiny, just enough space to stand. It's good enough if you stay out all day and just need a place to sleep. The area is perfect, you have different food places nearby and it's close to Times Square. Just don't expect much for that price.
I had fresh towels and beddings, the room was clean. Kitchen had washed up dishes, bathroom was ok. Fame herself is clean, depends a little bit on the other guest staying there.
I only saw Fame when I checked in and when I left. But via airbnb messages she was always available (not that I needed it).
If you don't have US mobile connections like I did, the check-in can be tricky. Fame wasn't in the aparment when I got there, but at her mothers place one floor above. The doorbell is supposed to ring there, too, however it didn't. Fortunatly the neighboor knew that her mother lives upstairs so I wen't there and knocked to finally get inside. 
All in all, good place to stay for a short visit to NYC especially if you plan on visiting the city most of the time. For sleeping its perfectly fine.
Great location, privacy, comfortable bed (that is bigger than it seems in the pictures). I would definitely stay there again. No complaints at all. :)
je bent midden in het centrum

Very good location! Close to Times Square. The room felt a bit bigger than in looks on the pictures.
On the other side of the room you will finde enough space to hang your clothes. The room is very clean. Thanks Reed, I recommended you to my friends already.
Very good location, lovely guests and nice price. I totally recommend it to everyone!!!!!
Great location. Friendly amazing host
Perfect ubication near Times Square & public transportation. Small room but perfect for my stay. Totally would return...

Logement très bien situé proche de Times Square, central park... Dans une rue très vivante, et pourtant l'appartement reste assez calme. Le séjour a été très agréable. Les occupant sont assez discrets et laissent à libre disposition les équipements de l'appartement. Merci pour l'accueil ce fut des vacances inoubliables

Amazing place! It's small but cozy, and the bed is really comfortable. There's a place to hang your clothes, hair dryer, window AC and fan. It's very clean and I hope I can stay here again next time I visit NY!
A nice place.

Overall, a very good experience. I had a few requests to make for my stay and they were able to accommodate me. I got quick responses to my messages. Checking in/out was easy and quick. My room was quiet and private. Using the shared facilities like the restroom and the kitchen was no issue. I had no problems during my stay and the hosts were very nice and respectful. The experience was beyond my expectations and I'd definitely recommend this place.

O quarto é bom custo e benefício. Porém é um pouco pequeno o apartamento. A água do chuveiro as vezes ficava frio, mas como fui  no verão, isso não foi um problema tão sério. 
Vale a pena se for pra ficar o dia todo fora e só usar o local pra dormir.
A localização é muito boa. Perto da Times e de restaurantes
So great!!
Wonderful location for those who wish to enjoy musicals and the atmosphere in NYC. Great host and very cozy room. Highly recommended!

The room is exactly like the photo! Both girls are super welcoming and always available. The best thing about this place is the location, in 10min you are in Times Square. No complaints, all clean & comfortable. I definitely recommend it!
The position of the apartment is really continent for u to enjoy your time in NY and its not expensive.Landlord  is very friendly.

I was surprised at the size on entering the room. It seemed small, however, it is exactly as pictured and had enough room for my things. The bed was very comfortable. 

I never used the kitchen, as the lone table seemed crowded. There any places to get something eat within a few meters of stepping outside of the building. I preferred the 7 Brothers Deli.

The bathroom was pretty good, having many essentials, like floss and mouthwash. There was a minor lighting issue, but it got fixed during the course of my stay.
 
The hosts were generally responsive. I always got a response on the same day of the question.

It is a good place to crash after exploring New York. The only thing to be wary of is the WiFi speed. It was generally great for giving family and friends Status updates, but it was terrible for streaming video. I suspect that it was due to wireless interference from other apartments, but I can't say for certain. To compensate, I bought an unlimited 4G LTE prepaid plan from T-Mobile ($75 plus tax) for my streaming video needs.

Overall a great place.

Recommended. It's a cozy and clean room where I stayed for one week. Its walkable to several subway stations, close to many different kind of restaurants and bars. The hosts are very nice, always helpful and considerable. I will recommend this place to my friends!
What I liked is how everything in the description was accurate.
The hosts were really nice and kind. Small apartment and small room. Fantastic location! Recommended for tourists who will spent most of the day in the city :)
Very comfortable room (especially the bed) with an amazing location! The hosts are kind and always willing to help. Thanks :)
Nice, comfortable and well localized. I had the best time in NYC and could enjoy Manhattan and it's night life thanks to this place. If I ever go back, that's where I'm staying for sure!
Great Location for the Price! Very friendly Host! Would definitely recommend!

These hosts are really heart-warming hosts.
Room has comfortable bed and I could have sleep well everyday.
And the location is also best. There are 2 24-hours shops around the room I could my breakfast easily.

I sincerely appreciated their kindness.

Molto gentile è disponibile. Come essere a casa. Distante 5 minuti a piedi da 50street Subway è da Times Square. Lo consiglio a single come me, e per chi va per visitare New York. Se dovessi tornare in nyc ci ritornerei .
Great cosy apartment in an extremely convienent location, so many shops and restaurants around and every major subway line is a short walk away (at time square)

Para aquellos viajeros que requieran un lugar donde dormir y bañarse, es perfecto. Quizás el baño puede ser un poco pequeño, pero del resto todo está bien. El departamento cumple con lo necesario para disfrutar de New York y más; te da la experiencia de vivir y sentir la ciudad desde un angulo diferente y que te inmiscuye en la vida diaria de la urbe. Lo mejor es lo céntrico y conectado que está con algunos de los puntos mas importantes de Manhattan (dos calles de times square). En cuestión de los caseros, tuve la oportunidad de convivir con Jan, y me ayudo en todo lo que necesité, incluyendo ayudarme con la impresión de documentos relacionados al viaje. Sin duda regresaría una y otra vez!

No bed bugs, Clean room
Near Subway station (walk 3~5min)
Near 24h market(walk 10sec)
Hosts are gentle and kind
I was so glad to stay this house.

Reed family is so great hosts!! so kind, so friendly. I could check in easily. It is so close to Times Square, the access is very good. 
The building is old, Perhaps you may take a shower a little hard. 
But I had a great time because of you. Thank you!

The hosts were very kind and accommodating. I left early because I was drugged at a bar down the street and felt very uncomfortable staying there afterward, understandably. I don't recommend this place to a female travelling alone. Not because of the hosts (they're very sweet!) but because I did NOT feel safe alone in the area. It takes a lot for me to say that, as I travel alone quite often. The only negative about the place itself was the fact that they didn't let anyone know that you're not allowed to flush toilet paper in their toilet (until you got there). So there was a bag hanging on nails with everyone's used toilet paper in it. I felt that should have been disclosed.
room is very small and nice for 1 person! i loved the stay and was close to timessquare!

Good place, perfect location,and friendly host.
If you need a place to come and sleep at night while you are doing errands during the day, this is the place.

Reed’s place is in an excellent location for discovering NY. The room itself is a good size has a comfortable bed and everything you would need for a stress free stay. The location is the absolute highlight and considering the price is excellent value for money !

The room is small but good for the price. Essentially this room is exactly as advertised, I didn’t see the host or other guests much, but I was quite busy the whole time. Times Square and Broadway theaters are certainly in reasonable walking distance. I didn’t try waking anywhere else. This room is an outstanding value, not fancy, but reasonable.

Buenas tardes, en cuánto a la estadía y la llegada todo bien. Ya habíamos acordado el horario de dejar las maletas así que bien. La comunicación y las indicaciones son muy malas, en realidad no hubo. Ni siquiera se preguntó si en algún momento necesitaba algo o me sentía bien. El baño y la cocina no estaban en buenas condiciones . Un poco sucio. Lo mejor es la ubicación y la habitación y tranquilidad con la que se pudo descansar. Lo peor la comunicación, y la hospitalidad por parte de los anfitriones. Y el último día ni siquiera estaban para dejar la llaves.

La ubicación del departamento, junto con el precio, fueron lo mejor. Es muy cómodo para moverse en la ciudad, cerca de los subtes, Times Square y las avenidas. La habitación estaba mejor de lo que esperaba, en las fotos parecía más chica de lo que era. Viajé sola con dos valijas y estuve muy cómoda.
La cama era súper cómoda!

Las chicas (Jan y Fame) fueron muy amables, inclusive me permitieron dejar las valijas antes del horario de entrada y también después de dejar la habitación, eso fue de gran ayuda.

Lo único que mejoraría es la limpieza del baño. No era de terror ni mucho menos, pero si podría haber estado un poco más limpio. Aunque puede haber tenido que ver con los otros huéspedes.

Muy agradecida y conforme en general!
Thank you for all ! I had great time in NYC, perfect localization of the accommodation, reactivity and flexibility of the host, quiet place, Thanks ! _^

We wanna to thank Reed, Jan, Fame and Keng for all the kind in receiving us and hospitality that they have shown. Their place is very well located, near of many tourist points in NY and subway stations. The room was really good, following what the photos show. There was a little confusion in the first day - changed rooms - that was rapidly and very well solved by them. We recommend their place!

The apartment is quite small but the bedroom is perfect if you are all by yourself. Reed and Jan were super organized with the check-in and the check-out and their welcome was amazing. They were very kind also if I needed any information or had questions about the house.
This bedroom is perfect for who, like me, is looking for something simple, close to everything and the main attractions in Manhattan; the position is amazing :)))
This is a very convenient place to stay.  While the room is small there is plenty of room for bags etc. , the air con is great and bed very comfortable.  Communication with host is excellent.

Hey everybody! For my one week trip to NY I was staying at Reed's airbnb. It was very clean and everybody was very friendly to me. The flat is a little bit small, but I think that's normal for NY. For me it was more important, that the flat was clean! It was my first time in the US, so I often had some questions. These guys were very helpful, so I didn't have any problems to find something. I'll recommend Reed's airbnb to my friends, who like to go to the US too!
Location is everything! Perfect spot

Bon séjour chez Reed et Jan ! La chambre se situe dans un autre appartement que le leur, avec la sœur de l’hôte ainsi qu’un autre visiteur Airbnb (un homme pour ma part durant le séjour), il faut donc parfois attendre son tour à la sdb/wc.
Chambre conforme aux photos et descriptif, très bon lit, climatisation dans la chambre ce qui est indispensable lors des grosses chaleurs, draps et serviettes fournies. 
Point noir en revanche concernant la sdb. Exiguë, pas de place pour poser ses affaires, douche et robinetterie vétustes (moisissures, eau chaude très longue à venir résultat beaucoup de douche à l’eau froide).
Cela reste tout de même un bon séjour ! Appartement très bien situé, à 2 blocs de Times Square

I had an amazing stay at Jan and Reed's place! My flight dates changed twice prior to my trip and they were so helpful with changing my reservation dates. Check-in was super simple too as I was able to leave my luggage in the kitchen until my room was ready. The room was bigger than expected, and it was the comfiest bed ever! The location is unbeatable - it's next to so many bars and restaurants in Hell's Kitchen, plus it's 5 mins walk to Times Square. I hope to stay here next time I visit NYC! Also, for people worried about noise, it's in a lively location but my sleep was never disturbed as the room isn't facing the main road :-)
Good value in a great location, just don't expect the Ritz.

Very comfortable room and the apartment location is perfect, especially for people who like to see a lot of Broadway shows. Fame and Jan were very friendly hosts, too. Would definitely stay there again.

The hosts were very nice, communication was smooth, the room was decent size and a bed was very comfy so I could sleep very well. The apartment was really quite, no noise at all. Location is fabulous, 5 mins to Time square and walkable distance to all sites- recommended!

Nickel commr endroit super hôte rien à dire
Hôte très discrets et agréable.
Very convenient location
Posizione comoda, a 10 minuti a piedi da Time Square. La camera piccola ma per chi viaggia da solo è l’ideale, molto calda e letto comodissimo
Las fotos no muestran del todo lo que realmente es el departamento, espacialmente el baño y la cocina,
Great locacion! A great place for your first time un NYC

La ubicación es la mejor caminas a paso lento y en 10mins ya estás en time square, es seguro, saliendo del departamento hay varias tiendas para poder comprar despensa, un metro a 5 mins caminando que te lleva hasta el WTC, la habitación es chica pero bastante bien EXCEPTO por la cama la pata de abajo a la izquierda (ya acostado) está floja y una vez se me cayo la cama de lado y por el calefactor hace muchísimo ruido en la noche. El baño igual es chico pero también bien. Y de los anfitriones poco que decir casi no los vi, no estuvieron para recibirme ni darme las llaves personalmente. Mis compañeros de departamentos increíbles muy buena onda, ellos me ayudaron mucho y me dieron consejos, ya que los anfitriones no estaban.
Pero bueno resumido, muy bueno por el precio, excelente ubicación.
Perfect location!!!

name: Charming & Sunny Mezzanine Loft
summary: Enjoy your stay at this excellent and Sunny Mezzanine Loft at the heart of the city. Centrally located in the downtown Porto area, a short walking distance to main spots, also allows a peaceful night s sleep as its facing the a nice backyard . Renovated with quality materials and equipped for four people. Welcome!
space: Enjoy your stay at this excellent Mezzanine Loft in the heart of the city. Centrally located in downtown Porto, allows a peaceful night s sleep, renovated and equipped apartment with quality and modern materials, for four people. The neighbourhood is very cool, lots of refurbish buildings in a historical street, so you can be in the center while enjoying a peaceful night sleep. A sunny and bright place to enjoy the best of the city. A charming area of this groovy city.  The oldest city market Bolhão and metro station are in a short 6 minutes walking distance. Its the downtown area with lots of cool restaurants, shops, commercial area and the nightlife is 5 minute walking distance. It’s a second floor in a XIX building with a beautiful skylight. This open space mezzanine apartment with a perfect division of spaces. The kitchen connects with the living room creating an harmony for your meals and plans for the best vacations, Equipped for four people with the all the appliances and qualit
description: Enjoy your stay at this excellent and Sunny Mezzanine Loft at the heart of the city. Centrally located in the downtown Porto area, a short walking distance to main spots, also allows a peaceful night s sleep as its facing the a nice backyard . Renovated with quality materials and equipped for four people. Welcome! Enjoy your stay at this excellent Mezzanine Loft in the heart of the city. Centrally located in downtown Porto, allows a peaceful night s sleep, renovated and equipped apartment with quality and modern materials, for four people. The neighbourhood is very cool, lots of refurbish buildings in a historical street, so you can be in the center while enjoying a peaceful night sleep. A sunny and bright place to enjoy the best of the city. A charming area of this groovy city.  The oldest city market Bolhão and metro station are in a short 6 minutes walking distance. Its the downtown area with lots of cool restaurants, shops, commercial area and the nightlife is 5 minute walking dist
neighborhood_overview: A central and historical street full of history of Porto and Portugal, walking trough Rua Firmeza or Rua Fernades Tomás, check the Capela das Almas, the Mercado do Bolhão the first city market. Two blocks away from the famous Rua de Sta. Catarina, pedestrian and the most comercial street with lots of places of interest, like the café Majestic and many other main spots. Explore the city! Enjoy
transit: Best metro station is Bolhão, 6 minutes walking distance, Bus and taxis in the premiss too. The Campo 24 de Agosto metro station is 5 minutes walking distance also.
access: Access the nice refurbished building and all the apartment.
interaction: Always available to assist. Contact us any time. Happy to help.
house_rules: Please consider a moderate use of electricity and water - please leave the rubbish out of the apartment and building - Its an apartment in a residential building, please act according, respect the neighbors!

host.host_about: Hi we are  Miguel and João and a good friend of us Miguel also. We live in Porto and we have  some great ideas and spots for having a good time wile traveling to Portugal. We are starting a company of quality rental accommodations and services. The houses and apartments belong to friends and family. We are managing the places and, one or the other will be always available to assist and welcome you. We consider ourselves open minded persons and professional, always open to assist. We enjoy meeting people from all over the world and give them great tips to have a great time with original hints of the city, love travel, Design, sports (play tennis regularly), food, music and life. It will be our pleasure to help you to have a great time in Portugal.

reviews.comments:
We had an amazing experience in Porto. João was very helpful, picked us up from the train station and made sure we had everything we needed. He also gave us some tips for going around the city and which places to visit, that made the trip easier and saved us time in planning. 
The apartment is perfect :) Renewed, very clean and tidy and with lots of natural light,  really beautiful.  João provided us with the basics so we barely had to do any shopping for the weekend. It is ideal for a group of 3 or 4 people since there is a large bed upstairs and a sofa bed in the living room. 
It is located in a central area so we were able to walk almost everywhere. Just a 10 minute walk to Avenida dos Aliados. If you don't want to walk, there is also a metro station and several bus stops just 5 minutes away from the apartment. Despite this, it's a very quiet area,  far enough that you don't hear any noise on the street. 
It was a pleasure to be able to enjoy the apartment during a couple of days and to have João as a host. Definitely an experience we would like to repeat!  :)

A nossa experiência foi fantástica. O João é um anfitrião super simpático, sempre disponível para nos ajudar e até nos deu algumas sugestões de sítios para visitar no Porto. A casa estava impecável e exactamente igual às fotos, nem maior nem mais pequena. Tinha tudo o que alguma vez poderíamos precisar. A localização também era excelente - dez minutos a pé e estávamos nos Aliados! No geral adorei a experiência e certamente irei voltar!

We felt right at home in this nice little studio apartment. Very spacious for two, clean and neat place with lots of natural light. It is well located, calm but with anything you'd need and the historic center of Porto to explore right outside your door. There's a washing machine, Iron and a kitchen which seemed to be fully equipped for some basic cooking and breakfasts. Joao was a great host, very friendly and helpful. He organized a taxi to the airport and gave some good tips on what to do in Porto. Thanks Joao, I would definately recommend you and the place to anyone without a doubt.
Joao was very flexible and easy to talk to and the place is very nice. Everything is new and clean.

João was a great host even though we didn't manage to meet! His apartment is lovely, even better than the pictures and in a great location.  João was a very attentive host, communication was always easy and he sent us tips during our stay, everything was great, we would definitely recommend :)

Nuestra experiencia fue excelente. El apartamento es incluso mejor de lo que aparece en las fotos. La ubicación es perfecta, cerca del centro y de lugares de interés. Muy cerca hay un supermercado y también es fácil aparcar por la zona. 
Joao fue muy atento antes y durante nuestra estancia, y su hermano también, al cual conocimos el día de nuestra llegada. 
Sin duda, recomiendo este alojamiento para pasar unos días en Oporto. Ha sido una excelente elección.
Everything was super nice and João was a great and very attentive host and gave us very useful informations! The appartement is great and charming and so I can really recommend it :)

João was an exceptional host.  My flight departure time changed several times out of Gatwick and he responded to each of my texts by saying not to worry, relax, as I will be here when you arrive to talk about the flat and Porto. I did not arrive until 11:15pm and he was there at the door to help with luggage.  It is a 5 star hotel when it comes to personal treatment. João's flat is located in a very quiet section of town that is only 5 minutes walk from the Rue de Santa Catarina, the promenade with everything you need. The flat is entirely renovated: it is perfect. João also spent time helping me find a food tour, a wine tasting tour and he booked the taxi as well.  Of course he is very knowledgeable about Porto, and I tried to hit every hot spot he recommended.  If you have the time, stay there more than three nights. I should have.

We really enjoyed our stay at João's apartment in Porto. His brother, Miguel, was waiting for us when we arrived with a warm welcome, a map of the city, and a few recommendations of things to do in Porto during our stay. The apartment is exactly like it is in the photos, great light, beautiful wood floors, and a cozy lofted bedroom. We were also thrilled that it had a washer as we had been traveling for nearly two weeks and hadn't had a chance to wash clothes yet. We were unfortunately unlucky with the weather and it was raining every night in Porto, Miguel had warned us that there may be a slight leak from the skylight during strong rains, so we had to put a bucket down under where the water was dripping- it didn't impact our stay in the least, and we would most definitely still recommend this apartment to those interested in a trip to Porto and an apartment in a quiet and central part of the city.

João was very friendly and met us as we arrived in Porto. He recommended local sites and restaurants to us which was very helpful!  The flat was lovely! It was very spacious, clean and comfortable. We parked the car in a nearby parking lot and walked everywhere for the weekend as the flat is conveniently located downtown. The flat is correctly named as it is very charming. It was a perfect vacation getaway for my boyfriend and myself.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par un hôte sympatique, ponctuel et avec qui il est facile de communiquer. Soucieux de notre bien-être il nous a suggéré des restaurants, lieux à (Website hidden by Airbnb) nous a laissé des oranges     délicieuses provenant del'Algarve.L'appartement est magnifique, lumineux, très bien équipé, très propre et très confortable situé dans un quartier sécuritaire. Même s'il est situé sur une rue achalandée, il donne sur la cour arrière de l'immeuble dans un environnement calme et un peu à l'écart des touristes. Les principales attractions touristiques sont accessibles à pieds pour ceux aime découvrir et s'imprégner de la culture des "portuans".

Charmant appartement très propre 
Bonne localisation et très bon accueil 
A recommander !

The flat is situated in a renovated building having 2 floors, two toilets on each floor. That flat was very tidy and cozy. The host was very friendly and helpful and it was easy to communicate with him. Due to bad weather it was cold but host provided us with two heaters so it was very comfortable inside the flat, also blanket is very cozy and warm. Flat has everything you need. Also there is a washing mashing and we were provided with washing liquid so there was no need to buy it by ourselves. We highly recommend this flat.

Nous avons trouvé très facilement l'adresse et Joao, notre hôte, s'est montré disponible et accueillant, cela malgré notre retard d'1 heure !
L'appartement est agréable, fonctionnel, original. 
Nous avons pris plaisir à l'habiter...
Le quartier est idéalement situé, proche transports, commodités et bon point de départ pour les visites.
En conclusion, que du positif !

João's apartment was beautiful and looked just as it does in the pictures. It is brand new, and very nice. The apartment is in walking distance of the the city center. We really enjoyed our stay and felt welcomed by our host. One thing to note, the loft part of the apartment isn't the most kid friendly since some of the banisters on the stairs are a little far apart. We bought our toddler with and had to keep a very close eye on him. Other than that everything was perfect!
Great flat and easy + fast communication. Very central and comfortable - would love to come back!
A lovely loft, which in my opinion is more spacious and light filled than in the pictures. All went wondefully, no complaints at all, we had a great time!
Super appartement ! exactement comme sur les photos : refait à neuf, très propre et lumineux. Merci à João pour l'accueil ! Vivement conseillé pour 2 à 3 personnes !
This apartment was amazing! We had 2 nights and felt like we were living In Luxury!

Joao è stato un ottimo host, è venuto incontro alle nostre esigenze, ci ha accolto puntualmente, ed è stato così gentile da prenotare un taxi per il giorno della nostra partenza; l'appartamento è assolutamente fedele alle foto, luminoso, pulito, perfetti sia il letto che la doccia; posizione comoda, a cinque minuti a piedi dal centro città.

It was a great stay at João's place! the flat is absolutely lovely and has recently been renovated; João gave us a very nice welcome, gave tips on what to see in Porto and recommended a couple of good restaurants :-)
Would definitely recommend João as a host and this great flat for your stay in Porto!

c'est le  frère de Joao,  Miguel qui nous a accueilli à Porto.
Il a pris le temps de nous présenter l'appartement, le quartier, les visites, les commerces à proximité et nous a donné tous les conseils nécessaires. Un grand merci à lui.
Joao nous a apporté son aide pour récupérer des clefs que nous avions laissées à LIsbonne. Encore Merci !
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, l'appartement est magnifique, exactement comme sur la description, le quartier est idéal.
Nous avons laissé notre voiture devant au parcmètre, en mettant régulièrement des pièces, sinon il y a un parking privé juste en face mais un peu cher. Nous avons séjourné à 4, pour nous tout c'est bine passé !
Perfecto loft muy amplio y luminoso. Muy cerca del centro pero tranquilo sin ruidos. Bien equipado. Muy amable el anfitrion.

We had a lovely time at the apartment which is very enjoyable to stay in. The location is excellent for visiting the city but the apartment itself is quiet to relax in. Joao is really friendly and helped us with some excellent ideas to enjoy our first visit to Porto.
Perfect location to enjoy the city. Not very easy to park, but there's no need to use the car. The apartment is as it's showed in the pictures. Highly recommended.
Cosy and nice place

Wir sind sehr spät angekommen, gegen 1 Uhr Nachts, trotzdem hat alles wunderbar geklappt. Unser Host war schon da, hat uns ein Wasser und Kekse mitgebracht und war sehr freundlich. Die Unterkunft war super schön, besser als auf den Bildern. Mir war nur das Bett zu hart, aber das ist ja Geschmackssache. Uns wurden viele Tipps gegeben von dem Host und er hat sich auch an den anderen Tagen per Whats App erkundigt ob es uns gut geht. Das empfand ich als äußerst freundlich.Nur hat es leider beim duschen, durch die Decke in die Küche getropft und am letzten Tag , kurz vor der Abreise fiel der Strom aus. Dafür kann er ja nix, ich wollte es nur erwähnen :)  Man kommt von der Unterkunft überall sehr gut hin. Ich würde die Unterkunft aufjedenfall empfehlen.

Communication prior to the stay was just smooth and efficient. We were welcomed by Miguel, Joao's brother, who kindly explained us the district and gave us recommendations for bars, restaurants etc... The flat is exactly as described - actually bigger than it seems on the pictures. All fully equipped to cook and to do the laundry. Location is really convenient, 5 to 10min walk to metro, grocery stores and restaurants. All attractions can easily be reached within 10 to 15min walk. We had a very nice and enjoyable stay, and will definitely consider this flat again for a future visit.

El apartamento está muy bien situado, al lado del centro de Oporto.
Pasamos una estancia y unos días muy agradables.

The flat looks exactly like the pictures (or even better!) and is perfectly clean. The location is nice too, not far from metro station and most attractions are in short walking distance. 
João's brother welcomed us and gave us some nice tips about Porto and recommended a few good restaurants.
We had a really great stay and would definitely recommend the apartment to everyone :)

Joao and his brother Miguel was very helpful and flexible. Appratment was super fresh and cozy. Location was near the center of Porto but not in the middle of it, meaning quiet location. Easy to find, extra plus that we could park our car across the street in a parking house for an extra charge. Recommended indeed :)

We really enjoyed staying at Joao's charming loft. The place was clean, comfortable and bright. Joao gave us plenty information about Porto, what to do and where to go. The loft was conveniently located. We strongly recommend this place.
Absolutely recommended.  Everything. e.v.e.r.y.t.h.i.n.g !!! was perfect.
This apartment is so beautiful, very bright, cosy and also spotless clean. Miguel gave us a map and great tips to make the most of our visit in Porto. We had an amazing time here.
Fomos muito bem recebidos, a casa é um mimo, aconchegante, muito bem equipada e localizada.

It's a really beautiful appartment with everything you need and Miguel and Joao are two very friendly guys who give you a lot of tips for the city and where to eat. We had a wonderful weekend in a wonderful apartment and can definitly recommend this nice stay!!!
The host canceled this reservation 86 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay was great from the first day. Joao's brother was excellent with recommendations and information, location was excellent, close to the main strip and short walks to all the tourist attractions. The apartment was new and very clean with all you need, including spare blankets and pillows for a very comfortable stay. I can't recommend it high enough and if we ever return to Porto I'll definitely look Joao up.
Very nice place, close to the city center, and very welcoming host.
Joao was a fantastic host. Met us on time and provide us with all the information we requested. The apartment was great. All in all everything exceeded our expectations.
We really liked the place. Also the host is very polite and supported us with good tips where to go.

El apartamento es incluso mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos, esta limpísimo y hay todo lo que te puedas imaginar que necesitas (plancha, utensilios de cocina, toallas, etc). Los anfitriones son encantadores, a nosotras nos recibió Miguel (hermano de João) a las 21:00 aproximadamente y fue encantador enseñándonos sitios de interés y demás. El apartamento está muy cerca del Mercado de Bolhão y del Cafe Majestic, lo que si es que está más lejos de la zona del puerto (un taxi de noche desde el puerto hasta el apartamento cuesta 5€), lo bueno es que para aparcar es una zona perfecta y justo en frente hay un párking que por todo el dia pagas unos 8€. En definitiva, un apartamento totalmente recomendable.
todo era genial, super bien
Appartement très agréable, très calme et avec tout le confort. Décoration soignée. Accueil agréable. Séjour parfait

Hatten eine grossartige Zeit in Porto. Das Appartement war sauber, zental und generell den Bildern entsprechend. Wir wurden vor der Haustür in Empfang genommen, haben gute Insidertipps erhalten und uns auch sonst willkommen gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist ausgestattet mit allem Nötigen. Kann ich nur empfehlen!
João & Miguel were extremely gracious hosts, offering a wealth of tips about the city and drawing out ideas for our stay on a map. The space is beautiful and comfortable. Highly recommended.
Het verblijf was erg fijn. Alles ziet er precies uit zoals op de foto's. Ze hebben ons erg geholpen met het vinden van de weg en hebben een kaart meegegeven. Locatie was in het centrum!

Everything was perfect the apartment is beautiful and very handy. Very close to the metro and Santa Catarina rua (where you can do some shopping )and also very close to the historical centrum. We were warmly welcomed and did not had any issue.

L'accueil de Jaoa a été très  chaleureux.  
Il s'est montré très disponible et nous a donné plein de bonnes recommendations. Merci encore pour tout!

The apartment is very clean and well equipped,situated in an area that is peaceful but close to all the facilities that Porto has to offer. Miguel who met us on our arrival was really helpful. He left us a city map and circled lots of places of interest. He left us contact numbers if we needed any assistance during our stay but was never intrusive. I would highly recommend Joao & Miguel's apartment to anyone staying in Porto
The apartment is located central and quiet. It is clean and equipped very modern, with a good taste. The host is reliable. We would definitely rent this place again.

Great apartment! Cozy, clean and in high standard. Kitchen have good equipment. Renovated tenement house is in peaceful surroundings. Near to the metro station and the center. Owners are very nice and helpful. We have fast and convenient contact. 
Perfect! 
Thank you Miguel :)

Un appartement bien situé, près de la gare, du métro et du centre historique. Accueil sympathique et bons conseils pour les choses à voir ou à faire.  L'appartement est spacieux, fonctionnel, propre et très joli. La petite véranda ensoleillée, la mezzanine avec puit de lumière et la belle déco ont rendu notre séjour très agréable! Nous recommandons cet appartement sans hésitation!
Merci à Miguel pour ses conseils. Communication très facile. Appartement propre, joli, proche du centre historique. On recommande sans réserve.

Excellent apartment! this place is really bright, modern, clean and calm. The location just perfect, because metro and shopping street Carmelitas is really near! we were kindly welcomed, and the host gave us a lot of tips about the city of Porto, must see places and must do/try things:)) thank you so much!

L'appartement est très bien situé, à proximité du métro et du terminal d'autobus. Tout peut se faire à la marche. L'appartement est propre, bien aéré et lumineux. Les hôtes nous ont laissé de bons attraits à aller voir ou faire durant notre séjour.   Nous le recommandons fortement!

One of our best experiences on airbnb so far! The apartment is newly renovated, central, and exactly as described. Additionally, João was extremely helpful during check in and took the time to explain some of the best things to see and do in Porto, and even booked us a taxi for the way back to the airport. Furthermore, he allowed us to leave our bags there on the last day as our flight time was later on in the day so we could spend more time in the city. My family and I definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Porto!
The Place is really nice and Joao and Miguel are very helpfull :-) Thank you for everything !

We had a really nice time at João & Miguel's apartment! 5 to 10 min away from the center, the apartment was exactly like we expected it and Miguel, who was there when we arrived, gave us good tips about what to do in Porto. Don't hesitate!
Excelente acomodação. Muito confortável e limpa. Recomendo.

Die Unterkunft war spitze, der Gastgeber war einfach klasse, sehr feundlich und wirklich sehr hilfsbereit (hat uns neben den tipps die er uns für porto gab auch noch sehr viele tipps für unsere restliche Portugal reise gegeben und sich dabei echt zeit genommen).

Die Lage war super, zu Fuß ca. 5-10minuten ins Zentrum.

Das Preis-Leistungs verhältniss ist ausgezeichnet, meine Freundinn und ich waren begeistert und würden jederzeit wieder kommen :)

La estancia en Oporto ha sido genial, el apartamento es muy cómodo, bonito y a tan solo 10 minutos andando del centro histórico de la ciudad. El anfitrión ha sido muy amable con nosotros respondiendo a nuestras inquietudes en todo momento. De 10.

The apartment was exactly what we expected. The location is great and the hosts gave us some very useful advice on how to get around Porto which made our stay much more enjoyable- they gave us a map when we arrived and sent us a message with a restaurant recommendation during our stay. Definitely recommended!

Die Wohnung ist wirklich schön und sauber. Die Bilder entsprechen der Realität, uns kam die Wohnung sogar noch größer vor! Die Wohnung wurde mit viel Liebe und Bedacht eingerichtet und ist mit allem ausgestattet was man braucht. Die Lage ist zentral, alles kann fußläufig oder in ein paar Minuten mit der Metro erreicht werden. João und Miguel waren mehr als zuvorkommend und ständig erreichbar für uns. Absolut empfehlenswert, wir sind sehr sehr zufrieden!
Great apartment in a great location. Host was friendly and communication was prompt.
Great apartment. Everything as described

Avons passé un très bon séjour cher Miguel. Appartement très agréable, conforme aux photos, bien situé et calme. Miguel nous a parfaitement conseillé sur ce qu'il ne fallait pas manquer à Porto ( monuments, boutiques et restaurants...) et également sur ce qu'il fallait voir en dehors de Porto.
Nous avons adoré notre séjour dans cette région.

El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Llegamos a Oporto a la hora convenida y no estaban allí los dueños. En un par de minutos recibimos una llamada explicando el retraso debido a los atascos (viernes tarde). Joao fue muy amable por teléfono aprovechando para darnos informaciones útiles mientras llegaba Miguel, que estuvo allí en 10 minutos. La estancia fue completamente placentera, el apartamento es muy moderno y funcional, decorado con muy buen gusto. Algo para mejorar: el crujir del piso de madera al caminar.
lovely apartment, easy and fast communication, it was a pleasure to stay in the loft! :)

João & Miguel’s loft apartment is beautiful...quite possibly one of the nicest AirBnB accommodations that I have stayed in so far! It is exceptionally clean, bright, and well equipped. I was very pleased to see that it has a bathroom both upstairs in the loft area as well as downstairs in the living space. There is a washing machine, too! There was a small hiccup in terms of finding the place because I didn't have a map with me. However, eventually I got there, and my stress quickly slipped away in the comfortable bed and cheerful surroundings. The two Miguels were also quite helpful and responsive. In terms of location, it is about 3.5 city blocks from the metro. In regards to other attractions in Porto, note that everything is basically downhill from the apartment. I would've preferred to have been a little closer to the action, but for those that like quiet nights and don't mind walking home uphill, this place IS an absolute gem!
L'appartement est tout simplement parfait ! Miguel et Juan sont très agréable et d'excellent conseil pour se diriger à Porto. Merci pour se séjour

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at João & Miguel’s place. We were warmly welcomed and provided with all the valuable information we needed to enjoy our stay in Porto! The apartment was very clean and had everything we needed.

The apartment in Bolhao was perfect for our stay in Porto.  It was a beautiful space, with lots of light and a lovely terrace.  It had all appliances and conveniences needed - and more!  The apartment was easy walking distance from all major attractions in Porto.  We were welcomed by the lovely Miguel, who spent a great deal of time making recommendations for our stay, including a restaurant called Jeremias nearby, where we had a nice dinner.  Also we recommend checking out Cantina 32, Puro, Zenith and getting the old-fashioned tourist tram up to Matosinhos to visit the beach and eat delicious seafood.  We couldn't have asked for more during our weekend in Porto, and would definitely stay again at Joao and Miguel's place!

Die Unterkunft ist einmalig mit dem grösseren Badezimmer und dem kuscheligen Bett auf dem oberen Stockwerk und dem geschmackvoll eingerichteten Wohnzimmer inkl. Küche, kleine Terrasse und Toilette auf dem unteren Stock. Miguels Empfehlungen für Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten waren toll, in einem seiner Lieblingsrestaurants haben wir ihn sogar wiedergetroffen und uns über das leckere Essen in Porto ausgetauscht. Die Kommunikation war allgemein sehr angenehm und auch sonst waren wir mit unserem Aufenthalt rundum zufrieden! :)

Porto ist auf jeden Fall ein Besuch wert und auch im Oktober hatten wir schöne sonnige Tage in und um Porto verbringen können! Die Wohnung hat uns sehr gut gefallen, es war sauber, stilbewusst und gemütlich eingerichtet. Die Wohnung ist zwar auch für vier Leute ausgeschrieben, ich denke aber am perfektesten ist es eher für ein Pärchen bzw. zu zweit weil durch den Maisonettestil keine zwei getrennten Räume vorliegen. In der Wohnung ist sehr viel schon vorhanden, zb ein Föhn, Handtücher, eine gut ausgestattete Küche, sogar eine Waschmaschine gibt es. Sehr lobenswert war auch die Schlüsselübergabe, obwohl wir erst spät gegen Mitternacht an der Wohnung ankamen war dies kein Problem, nochmal vielen Dank dafür!

I wanted to live in this apartment forever! Beautifully decorated loft and well maintained. The hosts were super helpful providing easy check in and suggestions. The location was located just outside the center which made everything accessible and walking distance. Would definitely recommend!

João and Miguel have been most kind and understanding. Due to unforeseen circumstances we could not make it to Porto, but this proved to be no problem when I talked to Miguel on the phone to explain the situation. The situation was solved satisfactorily and we will definitely make a second attempt to visit Porto, including a stay in one of João & Miguel's places. 
Highly recommend!

It's a lovely and clean place to stay! I realy liked the void (it's like a balcony) where we slept. The location is great: quiet street but close to the metro and within walking distance of everything. João gave us great tips about Porto and Miguel and Joana replied realy quick at emails and messages. I would realy recommand this place to friends and family. "Groetjes" Maaike and Daniel from the Netherlands

Das Apartment ist wirklich mit das schönste was wir jemals auf unseren Reisen gesehen haben.
Wir waren zu zweit, und haben die Zeit dort sehr genossen. Wunderschön eingerichtet, und der Charme der Wohnung Hat uns wirklich begeistert. Der ganze Kontakt verlief reibungslos und war sehr vorbildlich. Die Lage der Wohnung war für unsere Verhältnisse sehr gut. Sehr nah an der Altstadt mit den schönen Geschäften, aber dennoch sehr zentral. Wir können die Wohnung nur wärmstens empfehlen. Wenn wir jemals noch mal in Porto Urlaub machen sollten, wird es auf jeden Fall in dieser Wohnung sein.
Lovely studio, very big for just a couple, very clean and stylish. Everything is there including stuff for cooking so it made our life very easy for a lazy dinner.

El apartamento es maravilloso, mucho mejor de lo que esperábamos y no le falta de nada. Está cerca del centro y ademàs Miguel muy atento y simpático, nos explicó todo muy bien y nos indicó varios lugares de interés. Inmejorable
Everything was perfect. The Area is nice. I would definitely stay there again.

Apartamento precioso, con una ubicación perfecta, cerca del centro pero a la vez bastante tranquila. 
El trato genial, amables y atentos en todo. Repetiría sin duda.
Een super mooi, schoon appartement, goed gelegen t.o.v. de metro en het centrum is goed beloopbaar. Aanrader om te verblijven.
The apartment is brand new and beautifully renovated. The city center is close by at walking distance. This apartment is all you need for a good stay in Porto!

Communication and check in was very nice and simple. 

The loft is nice and well equipped. 

Strongly recommended!

Cet appartement est très chaleureux, très propre, très calme et très bien placé. Il n'y a pas de tromperie par rapport à ce qui est dit sur le site, et au contraire on y trouve de petites attentions inattendues mais très plaisantes. Joana a été de très bon conseil. Je retournerai certainement à Porto (trop bien !), et c'est cet appartement que j'essaierai de relouer. Merci à Miguel et Joana.

This place was excellent value, appears exactly as in photos. The apartment is well located in a safe but “locals” type area, not immediately down by the water but a non-touristy street, still only a 3 minute walk to Bolhao Market. Many stylish touches. It was very easy to work with Miguel, who was welcoming, gave tips, and was flexible on timing. 

Only would mention that the apartment is on the third floor of the building, and then another flight of stairs for the bed loft (could be a problem for other people like my mother who has a bad hip). Also bathroom shower needs re-caulking, but otherwise the apartment was spotless.

This place was perfect, even better than the pictures. Check in was a breeze and the space was a dream. Great kitchen for making breakfasts, close to a super market and cafe. Within walking distance to everything in Porto, the only time we used transit/taxi was to get in from the airport. It’s one of the best places we’ve stayed. The bed was a dream! Probably the most comfortable bed I’ve ever stayed in. We loved this space and the hosts were extremely accommodating!
Un appartement propre, spacieux, coquet, proche du centre. Nous recommandons !
Nice and well-located modern apartment, perfect to discover the city by foot.

El apartamento es tal cual las fotos.
Muy bien comunicado
Excelente
Great apartment in a very convenient location perfect for exploring Porto. Beautiful city and friendly hosts, highly recommended.

Appartement parfait : très propre, entièrement refait avec une décoration moderne, bien équipé et situé près du centre. Un bon rapport qualité prix.
Joao s’est montré disponible et donne de bons conseils pour visiter Porto
Nous recommandons !

This apartment is perfect for a couple and was exactly as described. The apartment is very bright, modern and spotlessly clean. We had great communication with the hosts and a warm welcome on arrival even though we arrived fairly late on a Saturday  evening. There are some nice restaurants nearby and the centre of town is within easy walking distance
There are sometimes very noisy seagulls on the rooftop but it wasn't a problem for us as we always travel with earplugs! Would definitely recommend this place.
Trés bel appartement, lumineux, calme et  bien situé . Possibilité de faire ses courses à 5mn. Merçi à João de nous avoir accueillies dans un français parfait.

We recently stayed here and loved it! The space is just as described, bright, clean and on a quiet street just outside of the shops and restaurants. The bed was comfortable and we loved the skylight that we could open for some air. 

Miguel especially went out of his way for us. When we arrived (which was late due to our flight) he met us much later than expected and spent time highlighting all of the good things to do and see in Porto. We also ran into a problem with getting our car out of the garage which he went to great lengths to help us out on a Sunday! His communication was amazing and we couldn’t have had a better place to stay for our time in Porto!
Perfect location! The appartement worth it. Place looking really nice and the host was really welcoming and the communication was great.
Lovely apartment, exactly as described. João met is at the apartment and gave us good tips on places to visit, eat and drink in Porto. It was a good base to explore the city from.
WOW! If you're going to Porto, stay here. What a deal! Great location, gorgeous apt with netflix : ) The loft was our favorite part by far.
This apartment is a great place to spend a few nights in Porto. The space is clean and comfortable with a bathroom on both the first floor and loft. We’d stay there again in a heartbeat!
This apartment is gorgeous, clean, spacious, modern, safe and close to the downtown (10 minute walk). Do not hesitate to book! It was one of the best we have stayed in.

Miguel's apartmet is an amazing apartment - completly modernized  with a tasteful interior.  The kitchen provides the essential basics without any additional amenites. Generally quiet area and a walkable distance to the city. Communication with Miguel  was always easy.

Our stay at Miguel & João’s apartment was amazing! The space itself is gorgeous and was exactly as pictured. Miguel was very responsive, friendly, and helpful. He greeted us when we arrived, gave us a thorough tour of the apartment, and provided a map with several tips and recommendations. We would highly recommend staying here!

Apartamento increíble, cabe destacar la ubicación, en una calle tranquila a 5 minutos de la parte céntrica, y el trato por parte de Miguel, fue encantador con nosotros y nos facilitó información de lugares y restaurantes para visitar.
Muy recomendable, ¡repetiriamos encantados!

Nice and spacious apartment!
Easy access to city center.
Host was also nice and friendly :) we enjoyed staying here. Highly recommended!

This flat is absolutely beautiful, so much light and a really relaxing place to stay! Miguel and João were fantastic hosts who gave us lots of tips about what to do. The location is perfect, we didn’t use public transport once!
Location was perfect, host was very nice and the appartment was very clean and comfortable. We would absolutely recommend this place!!

Ubytování bylo skvělé. Miguel byl velmi milý a čekal na nás v apartmánu i když letadlo mělo zpoždění a chvíli nám trvalo, než jsme se z letiště dostaly do města. Apartmán byl také na skvělém místě - cca 15 min pěšky od centra.
Das Apartment ist einfach super! Es ist sehr zentral aber in einer ruhigen Lage.

This airbnb is much better than my expectations. Very cosy and is in the perfect neighborhood for relaxing and getting fast to all the nice places in Porto. Especially we loved the bakery and the beergarden nearby. Miguel & Joaos are the best hosts that you can imagine. The communication is perfect! I loved my stay. All the best guys!

Beautiful apartment in great location of Porto. Easy with communication with Miguel and helpful hints for where to visit while in Porto. This was the perfect apartment to spend a few days exploring Porto.

The loft matches exactly with the photos and the description. We had a great time in Porto and the location of the loft is in walking distance to most of the famous places you have to see. The check-in was uncomplicated and Miguel gave us a map including great tips for places to see, the nearest supermarkets and really good restaurants. The loft is situated to the backyard and is therefore calm, you only hear the seagulls. :-) All windows can be darkened and the bed was comfy. For two persons, like us, the loft was spacious with bathroom and sleeping room at the upper level and kitchen and living room (+ second toilet) at the lower level. We would come back again if we will get the chance to.
Lovely original features combined with modern fit out. Great apartment & hosts. Loved our time in Porto.

Miguel was a great host - very responsive and friendly! He gave us some great tips for our stay in Porto. The apartment was very clean and everything was well prepared. It was one of the best apartments I’ve booked through AirBnB, so I‘m sure you’re going to enjoy your stay there as much as we did.

This is located in the middle of Porto, brand new building and a brand new appartment. Everything what you need, so clean, miguel and joao are so nice and helpful and gave us really nice tips about porto.. I would more than recommend this loft! Thank you so much for your hospitality!
Amazing and super comfortable apartment with lots of light! Really great local tips and we can highly recommend staying at their place.

Merci à Miguel et João pour leur accueil, leur disponibilité et leur gentillesse.
Appartement très propre, fonctionnel et idéalement placé (5 minutes à pied d une station de métro et du centre).
Très calme sur l arrière cour .
Nos hôtes ont su nous donner des informations judicieuses sur les visites de Porto qui se sont toujours révélées exactes.
Nous avons également beaucoup apprécié Porto, ses habitants, son architecture, sa douceur de vivre, sa gastronomie et ses vins.
A recommander.
Obrigado.

Le logement que nous avons occupé pendant 8 jours est tout simplement parfait, bien situé, parfaitement équipé, Miguel nous a très bien accueilli, et nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaires pour un beau séjour ( attraits de la région, restaurants etc.) Il nous a même organisé notre transport pour l'aéroport pour notre retour.

Nous recommandons fortement ce logement . Johanne et Gaétan

Highly recommend! Amazing location, well designed space. Convenient to all Porto destinations yet far enough away to get a quiet break at the end of the day. Joao was easy to communicate with and made our stay pleasant. Also lots of good local recs! 10/10

We had a more than wonderful time in this gem of an apartment. It’s just gorgeous for a couple wanting to enjoy beautiful Porto. The apartment is exactly as seen on the photos, very spacious, bright, clean and well equipped. It’s located in a calmer sidestreet, yet in the middle of Porto. It‘s two minutes walking to the next supermarket, shopping mall, walking street, restaurants etc and 10-15 min down to the river. So an ideal location to explore the city. 

Besides the apartment, the warm welcome of João and all his tips where to go and what to do were an absolute highlight of our stay! I honestly was never welcomed in that lovely way in an Airbnb before. 
So a full recommendation in any ways. 

One small tip of you arrive with a rental car as we did and think about a parking spot. There is one car park literally across the street for 13€ a day, but our pro tip is to park in the Via Catarina Shopping Mall. It is only 8€ a day (which is very cheap fort Porto). The trick is that you don’t pay your ticket at the machine but with the park officers on the 6th level. 

So really book this apartment an enjoy a wonderful time in Porto!

Alojamiento bonito, céntrico y con todo lo necesario para unas vacaciones. Además nos sugirió varios lugares de Oporto y las afueras, muy amable en todo momento estuvo en contacto con nosotros.
No se puede pedir más.

Great location,  quiet at night but very close to rua santa catarina and to bolhao metro station and food market. The apartment looks exactly like in the pictures. The kitchen is fully equipped to cook real meals. João was an excellent host, very responsive, flexible and caring.

name: Spacious Sunny Loft
summary: Spacious, sunny, beautiful,  safe loft in up in coming Parc X. Washer/Dryer, dishwasher, AC. Rooftop terrasse. Near Jean Talon Market & Jarry Parc. Grocery store & major bus lines just at the corner. Queen bed, futon, & blow up mattress available.
space: The space is all yours, no roommates.
description: Spacious, sunny, beautiful,  safe loft in up in coming Parc X. Washer/Dryer, dishwasher, AC. Rooftop terrasse. Near Jean Talon Market & Jarry Parc. Grocery store & major bus lines just at the corner. Queen bed, futon, & blow up mattress available. The space is all yours, no roommates.
house_rules: No smoking inside, but there is a beautiful rooftop terrasse that overlooks the mountain!

name: Beautiful Vacation Condo on Maui. Hop to a beach.
summary: GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Beautifully decorated one bedroom one bath condo.  Walk to the Kamole Beach Park.  Outdoor pool, and hot but. Close to shopping, restaurants, and Wailea.  Full kitchen, washer/dryer, free Wi-Fi, free parking, A/C.  Best deal in Kihei.  RUNNING SUMMER SPECIAL RATE $145 PER NIGHT, TAX INCLUDED.
description: GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Beautifully decorated one bedroom one bath condo.  Walk to the Kamole Beach Park.  Outdoor pool, and hot but. Close to shopping, restaurants, and Wailea.  Full kitchen, washer/dryer, free Wi-Fi, free parking, A/C.  Best deal in Kihei.  RUNNING SUMMER SPECIAL RATE $145 PER NIGHT, TAX INCLUDED.
house_rules: Smoking is strictly prohibited throughout the condo (including lanai).

reviews.comments: As it was our first time on ABB it was a new experience. Once we established communications it was great. Quick responses to all of our questions and concerns. When we got there we were met by the new manager and they were ensuring everything was ready to go! It is in a great location with all the ammenities needed in the condo and near by. Great balcony, AC works amazing, kitchen was more than we needed. Would stay again for sure. The location is pretty tough to beat. Right in the middle of lots of shops and restos with Kam 1 across the street, but far enough from the road that you don't hear any road noise. Probably one of the best units to be in for balcony size and privacy!
The host canceled this reservation 181 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had an excellent time staying in this condo for our wedding week in Kihei. We were able to book it after a very last minute cancellation from a different host. Our host was very accommodating to our needs. The place is walking distance to most everything you could want - beaches, restaurants, morning coffee, etc. We had a great time and would stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 136 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kh's place at Kihei Ali'i Kai is absolutely awesome for a solo traveller or a couple. Very clean, well provided, and modern, which cannot be said of every condo in Kihei. Fast internet, a good working kitchen, and a quiet building make the place a happy temporary home, but the real score is the location.

The Kihei Ali'i Kai condominiums are literally a one minute walk to Kamaole Beach Park I. A beautiful and peaceful little beach, and right outside the door! Furthermore, The Dolphin Plaza is right downstairs, too, offering some great food and dessert options, including the legendary Koiso Sushi.

Kh himself is civil, kind and keeps a high standard for both customer service and house conditions. All in all, you won't find a place in Kihei much better than this, and certainly not at this rate!
First time user, very happy with the results. Kh's place was exactly as it looked. Great location and had a great time.
Everything was just perfect !

Great location! Less than 30 minutes from the airport/Costco. Right across the street from a beach park that has good swimming, snorkeling, shade and showers. We were swimming (not snorkeling) one day, and watched about 5 turtles swim right by us! The condo is directly behind Dolphin plaza and other small plazas, which meant we could go grocery shopping, go out to eat, pick up, rent snorkel gear etc. right on our way home from the beach.

Great condo! It felt bigger than expected. We were there with our baby, and both the bedroom and the living room are big enough to put a crib/play pen in, if you need one (lots of rental places on Maui). I wasn't sure if this would be the case from the pictures. The bed is a queen size, and had a pillow top, if that's important to you.  The unit itself is close to the front of the condo complex, making it that much closer to the beach!

The unit was stocked with all the kitchen stuff you need, including a small cooler and reusable containers so you could pack a lunch with you wherever you go. There were also beach chairs and towels, and a beach umbrella. We rented snorkel gear and were all set!

The only downside was that the condo complex is strangely designed, and there was no way to avoid stairs when getting to the unit. There is an elevator, but you need to climb a flight of stairs to get to it.

We had a great time, and would definitely stay here again, and recommend it to friends and family.
Great place!!! Nice Pool and hot tub, BBQs to use, ocean view, easy parking, 2 beach chairs, umbrella, bogie board, towels could not have asked for more!

This condo is absolutely spectacular.  It is spacious and very comfortable with modern amenities.  You can see the ocean on your right from the balcony, and the hills to your left.  A one minute walk brings you to the beach.  The restaurants and stores around the condo are lovely, and the major attractions such as Big Beach are within a 15-20 minute drive.  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
The condo was extremely spacious and comfortable I would recommend staying:)
Couldn't have asked for a better experience. I would highly suggest staying at this location.

Great location, right across the street from nice beach!  The pool and hot tub were great too!  The space felt bigger than the pictures appeared, my mom and I were very comfortable staying there, plenty of room.
The place was great!! Right across the street from the beach and park. Walking distance to small shops and a gas station. Super quick to answer any questions I had!! No problems at all!

Great place and very close to the beach where we snorkeled with lots of sea turtles! Some small stores, restaurant and coffee places near by. We stayed here for one week of our honeymoon and had everything we needed. We will defenitly reccomend this place!! Thank you for having us.

Very spacious and clean unit with large kitchen, living room and dining area. Walking distance to the beach and many shops. Only minor downside is that parking in the lower lot closest to the unit is limited if you arrive home late, which means you have to park in the upper lot but it's only a few minutes walk to the unit. I would definitely recommend staying here to a friend!
Location is unbeatable. Expect the first day to be hot if the unit has been vacant.

Would definitely recommend! Minutes away from the beach, very clean & contains all necessary vacation items including beach towels etc. Big open balcony with view of the ocean and walkable to local shops and restaurants. Quiet serene atmosphere. 
But be aware that this building itself is like a maze! Do not carry your suitcases until you have found your unit!
