Parking for this particular unit is not always available in the lower area closest to suite so be prepared to trek down from the parking lot sometimes. This is a small inconvenience that gets easier as the days go by. 
Overall we hope to stay again!

Clean, nicely furnished apartment with partial view of ocean. Nicely equipped kitchen.  We rented a car and had easy access to major tourist attractions and restaurants 
Parking was issue at times. If no places available in small lot in front of apartment (often full), must park in back lot which is about 5 minute walk
This condo is a great deal, easy to get to lots of beaches, centrally located and easy to walk to lots of places. Would recommend and would like to stay there again.
We had an amazing experience! Fabulous vacation, incredible location, and a perfect host! We couldn’t have been more satisfied!! We will definitely visit again!!

Very nice placec , clean and   comfortable  , great location, everything in the apt worked great for us ,the host was  Quick to respond to  our need  ,
 one big issue is the parking , in both lots, if you want to drive to dinner , good luck  finding a spot coming back , thank you we looking  forward to return
Great location. Clean and nice condo.
Great location

The location is AMAZING. If you want to live in Kihei like a local this is a place to do it. There are numerous amazing places to eat (food trucks, nicer restaurants, and also mom and pop stores). The vibe is very laid back in the area. Apt is stocked w beach towels and beach chairs. WiFi is a little slow, but for price this is an amazing place to stay. Homely decorated and Kh is easy to get in touch with. Beach is literally across the street. I would recommend this to anyone!

Clean condo at a great location right across the beach with lots of shops/restaurants nearby. Also we accidentally left some of our belongings at the condo but KH was very helpful in getting them back. We very much enjoyed our stay!
Awesome, clean place. Super close to the beach, stores and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay a lot!
Great condo at a very nice location (Kihei Beach) - spacious kitchen with everything you need.
Great location!

Very clean apartment in a great location, just an 8 iron shot to the beach
We had a great time and strongly recommend it!
Nice condo! We had a great vacation there!

name: Belo apartamento Jardim Botânico - Rio de Janeiro
summary: Prédio tranquilo sem elevador. Rua com 100m de ladeira.  Bairro muito bem localizado, com comércio, restaurante e transporte fácil.  A 600m da Lagoa e do Parque Lage. Próximo ao túnel Rebouças que liga a Zona Sul a Zona Norte da cidade. Bem-vindos!!
space: O Apartamento tem 28mº, cozinha americana, a cama fica no mezanino.  Apartamento equipado com: filtro de água, ar condicionado; ventilador de teto;  geladeira; fogão; forno microondas; sanduicheira; toaster; liquidificador; cozinha equipada com utensílios novos; ferro de passar roupa; tábua de passar roupa embutida no armário; varal;  roupa de cama, toalha e cobertores novos, aquecedor a gás na água do banheiro e cozinha; banheiro com pasta de dente, shampoo, condicionador, sabonete, papel higiênico, pente, Kit primeiros socorros; secador de cabelo, 3 guias da cidade do Rio de Janeiro.  * IMPORTANTE: o sofá que está nas fotos não se encontra mais no apartamento.
description: Prédio tranquilo sem elevador. Rua com 100m de ladeira.  Bairro muito bem localizado, com comércio, restaurante e transporte fácil.  A 600m da Lagoa e do Parque Lage. Próximo ao túnel Rebouças que liga a Zona Sul a Zona Norte da cidade. Bem-vindos!! O Apartamento tem 28mº, cozinha americana, a cama fica no mezanino.  Apartamento equipado com: filtro de água, ar condicionado; ventilador de teto;  geladeira; fogão; forno microondas; sanduicheira; toaster; liquidificador; cozinha equipada com utensílios novos; ferro de passar roupa; tábua de passar roupa embutida no armário; varal;  roupa de cama, toalha e cobertores novos, aquecedor a gás na água do banheiro e cozinha; banheiro com pasta de dente, shampoo, condicionador, sabonete, papel higiênico, pente, Kit primeiros socorros; secador de cabelo, 3 guias da cidade do Rio de Janeiro.  * IMPORTANTE: o sofá que está nas fotos não se encontra mais no apartamento. Os hóspedes terão acesso a todo o imóvel. Sempre que possível estarei disponíve
neighborhood_overview: É um bairro muito bem localizado, com comércio e transporte fácil.  O apartamento fica a 10 minutos da Lagoa e do Parque Lage. Próximo ao túnel Rebouças que liga a Zona Sul a Zona Norte da cidade. O bairro faz divisa com os bairros da Lagoa, Gávea, Humaitá. A quantidade de vegetação e a proximidade com a Lagoa dão ao bairro uma temperatura mais amena que a média da cidade do Rio de Janeiro.
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso a todo o imóvel.
interaction: Sempre que possível estarei disponível por telefone ou (Hidden by Airbnb) para esclarecer qualquer dúvida, orientação ou necessidade.
house_rules: O edifico é pequeno e estritamente residencial, portanto, devem ser respeitados o sossego e a tranquilidade do ambiente.  - É proibido fazer barulho antes das 9:00 e após as 22:00. - Proibido fumar em qualquer dependência da casa. - Não é permitido animais.  - Não é permitido o acesso de pessoas não registradas na (reserva).  Ao sair de casa desligue a luz, tv, ar-condicionado e ventilador de teto. Peço que  nunca deixe o ar-condicionado ligado quando você não estiver no apartamento, 10  minutos é o suficiente para que ele alcance uma temperatura agradável. Economize energia para que ela não falte quando você precisar dela. Desta forma você me ajuda a a oferecer um preço acessível de (hospedagem). Ao sair verifique se o portão do prédio encontra-se fechado para que a segurança dos moradores seja mantida. Caso queira uma faxina extra me avise. Devolva o apartamento mais ou menos como encontrou.  Espero que os hóspedes fiquem a vontade, sintam-se em casa e cuidem do apartamento com carin

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Nossa primeira experiência dentro do Airbnb foi (com diria a anfitriã) sensacional, espetacular (kkk).

Vi o anúncio numa busca rápida e me apaixonei pelo cantinho aconchegante e acolhedor. Quando cheguei no local e fomos recepcionados calorosamente pela anfitriã e nos deparamos com o local exatamente como estava nas fotos, me fez sentirmos presenteados pelo destino.

Eu e meu marido não imaginávamos encontrar uma anfitriã que realmente se preocupasse com você nas mínimas coisas.
 
SUPER INDICO. Lugar pequeno e projetado para você se espalhar. A vista da janela então é encantadora e privilegiada. Ao sair do prédio, agente se encanta mais ainda com o local, pois acima de você está os pés do Cristo. Querida anfitriã, que "espetáculo".

Obrigada querida pelo carinho, a preocupação durante toda a estadia, por todas as ligações querendo saber se estava tudo bem e nos dando altas dicas de lazer e diversão. Adoramos que você abriu uma excessão e ter nos presenteado com a sua companhia num passeio inesquecível, onde conhecer um artista de mão cheia em Santa Teresa, chamado Getúlio, são pra poucos. 

Não esperaremos convites kkkk apareceremos em breve, com certeza!

Até a próxima ;)

Tanto a Dani quanto o apartamento foram incríveis! Super atenciosa e amigável e com uma energia incrível. Me senti totalmente em casa desde o momento que cheguei até o momento que saí. O apartamento é maravilhoso e fica em uma localização perfeita! Rua silenciosa e amigável, com mercados, restaurantes, bares e posto 24h pertinho e o acesso é super fácil! O porteiro/funcionário do prédio, Henrique, foi um querido também e só contribuiu positivamente para a experiência.
Me hospedarei novamente com certeza! 

Both Dani and the apartment were amazing! The host was very welcoming and ready to help and assure the best experience possible. I felt at home from the moment I arrived to the moment I checked out. The apartment is incredible and in a perfect location! Silent, friendly street with supermarkets, restaurants, bars and a gas station with a great "7eleven" open 24/7 at walking distance. The access to the apartment is easy, with bus stops nearby to almost every part of the city. The doorman/janitor of the building was also lovely and contributed very positively to the whole experience. Will be coming back for sure! <3

SUPER BEL APPARTEMENT !!!!  Bien situé dans un beau quartier calme de Rio de Janeiro et sécuritaire,  cet appartement est le secret le mieux gardé de Rio de Janeiro.  Tout est fonctionnel,  rénové et bien pensé.   C'est SUPER PROPRE !!!  Et c'est près de tout: épiceries,  bus,  métro de surface (Estação Maria Angélica), restaurants, cafés et parcs, tout ça à quelques minutes de marche.  Les photos représentent bien l'appartement.  Dani m'a fait sentir chez moi.  J'ai posé plein de questions dont elle avait toutes les réponses.  Dani est une hôte charmante.  J'ai adoré resté à cet appartement.  Belle fenêtre avec vue sur les arbres.   La rue en avant c'est un cul-de-sac (rue sans issue),  c'est la raison pourquoi que c'est tranquille.  Si je retourne à Rio de Janeiro,  c'est certain que je reviendrais à cet appartement.  Merci pour tout / Obrigado por tudo Dani !!!

O apartamento está ainda melhor que nas fotos. Se, nas imagens do site, vemos um charmosos local com cama suspensa e cozinha, na nossa estada experimentamos um local que cheira a novo, com pintura recente, utensílios de cozinha novíssimos, assim como toalhas e lençóis. Isso não é tudo. A Dani é uma anfitriã especialíssima, não só porque nos recebeu muito bem e ajudou a montar a nossa programação turística e cultural, mas, sobretudo, porque cuida pessoalmente de tudo. Assim, haverá muitas surpresas na casa, como as tocas de banho descartáveis sobre a pia do banheiro, sabonetes e shampoos, guarda-chuva no armário, espaços etiquetados com instruções para uso dos equipamentos e organização do imóvel. Por tudo isso, a nossa estada no Rio de Janeiro teve o melhor do conforto de um hotel com o melhor do aconchego de uma casa de amigo. Finalmente, vale dizer que o apartamento é muito bem localizado, bem próximo ao Parque Lage e ao Jardim Botânico e com fácil acesso a praias e ao centro (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Dani is the perfect host. Gentle and sweet. The studio is spotless. Everything new and clean. The neighborhood is just great, walking distance from special places in Rio like Parque Lage and Lagoa. Highly recommended!

Dani foi uma ótima anfitriã. Ela nos recebeu de madrugada quando chegamos, nos explicou tudo sobre a região do apartamento, sobre onde fazer compras, onde comer, onde passear. 
O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo da lagoa, do jardim botânico e do parque laje. Muitos restaurantes próximos. 
Ambiente confortável e aconchegante.

O apartamento é óptimo. Pequeno mas super acolhedor e com tudo o que é necessário, muito tranquilo. A localização óptima também. Dani super atenta e cuidadosa. Obrigada por tudo e até uma próxima. Super recomendado!
O apartamento é lindo e aconchegante.  O lugar, delicioso.  E Dani, maravilhosa.  Indico.  Vou alugar novamente.

O Apartamento é uma delicia e super aconchegante, perfeito para dois. Tudo super novo e muito bem localizado, bons restaurantes perto  e a Dani foi sempre muito atenciosa nos ajudando em tudo que podia. Voltarei sempre que possível e certamente indico para todos. ;) <3

Aluguei o apartamento para um amigo chamado Arthur.
 "Vim para o Rio e fui muito bem recebido pela locatária. O apartamento é muito confortável, bem localizado (vizinho da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas) com supermercados e conveniências por perto e com certeza voltarei muitas vezes". Arthur.

Nossa negociação foi ótima, a Dani e super atenciosa, mesmo antes de viajar me mandou uma mensagem de como seria a melhor opção para ir do aeroporto para o apartamento e se colocou a disposição para me ajudar no que fosse necessário, minha primeira experiência no Airbnb foi incrível!!!!
Dani foi muito atenciosa e me recebeu mesmo eu fazendo a reserva no mesmo dia! gostei muito do ap. proximo de tudo e com tudo muito novo.

Estar no apartamento da Dani e ser recebida por ela foi maravilhoso. O apartamento é super aconchegante e tem tudo o que você precisa para uma estadia mais do que confortável, além do que, a região e o entorno são super agradáveis. Mas o mais incrível é a receptividade e atenção da Dani! Estar lá com tanto conforto e cuidado com certeza tornou a viagem muito mais gostosa.

Dani foi bastante prestativa e atenciosa desde o primeiro contato, além uma simpatia durante a recepção do check in. O apartamento é pequeno, mas acolhedor e arejado. Agradavelmente decorado, ainda possui tudo o que um hóspede possa precisar (o que, inclusive, faz dele um diferencial): cozinha com todos os utensílios necessários para cozinhar, itens de higiene, kit de primeiros socorros, roupa de cama completa, toalhas confortáveis, amplo armário com cabides, etc.  Não é um espaço recomendado para idosos ou pessoas com dificuldade de locomoção, já o prédio não possui elevador e está localizado numa ladeira. No entanto, se esse não é o caso, a localização é perfeita para passeios a pé a alguns dos principais pontos turísticos da cidade. Recomendadíssimo!
Aluguei o apartamento para o Athur. "Apartamento lindo aos pés do Cristo Redentor. Do ladinho do Parque lage, ideal para fazer caminhada. Área silenciosa e bairro gostoso. Voltarei". Athur

A Dani é uma anfitriã incrível! Foi bastante rápida na comunicação. Foi extremamente cuidadosa e delicada na recepção, nos explicando tudo sobre a casa, as facilidades do bairro, dicas de bares, restaurantes, supermercados, transporte. O espaço da Dani é impecável! Todo limpo, organizado, bem equipado. A rua é muito tranquila e ao mesmo tempo próxima de todas as necessidades. Para quem gosta de viajar sem perder o conforto de casa, o espaço da Dani é perfeito, tem o aconchego de lar. Encontramos nosso lugar no Rio, certamente voltaremos.

Ótimo estadia na casa da Dani! Fui durante as olimpíadas por alguns dias e deu tudo certo. Ótima recepção, a dani é muito acessível e até criou um grupo no (Hidden by Airbnb) entre nós hospedes para comunicar-mos melhor.
A viagem foi muito boa e grande parte devo a isso, já que tivemos uma ótima estadia.
Além disso, a dani foi rápida para aceitar minha solicitação, fiz no dia anterior de última hora.
Recomendo!!

Nossa estadia no apartamento da Dani foi ótima, passamos poucos mas agradáveis dias no local que é extremamente limpo, organizado e com ótima infra para nos atender. Desde o primeiro contato a Dani foi muito solícita e preocupada em nos deixar muito a vontade em sua casa. Amamos o Rio e com certeza essa será nossa opção para o retorno.

A experiência foi excelente! O apartamento da Daniela é exatamente como estava nas fotos, o bairro é uma delícia e com fácil acesso a atrações do Rio como a Lagoa, Parque Laje e Jardim Botânico... um bairro arborizado, tranquilo, seguro, uma delícia de passear por ele e com restaurantes excelentes.

Daniela foi muito fácil de comunicar, foi tudo perfeito, com toda certeza voltando ao Rio de Janeiro ficaremos lá!

Como somos uma firma, procuramos hospedagem para nossos funcionários e quadro de diretoria, quando temos uma obra em outros Estados. Como sou da administração fico responsável por Airbnb. No apartamento de Dani ficaram o nosso diretor Daniel e seu filho. Eles ficaram muito satisfeitos com o apartamento. A minha comunicação com Dani foi ótima! Apesar de estar viajando Dani não deixou de se comunicar com os hospedes para saber se tudo estava bem. Dani deixou tudo organizado, encarregando uma pessoa de sua confiança para fazer o check-in.  Daniel e seu filho encontraram no aptº alguns itens de higiene pessoal, como cortesia de Dani. O apartamento faz jus ao anuncio. É limpinho, todos os eletrodomésticos funcionando, inclusive o ar condicionado. Houve apenas um pequeno probleminha com a torneira, mas tudo foi resolvido.  Para nós a localização do apartamento era boa, porque estava no caminho do nosso lugar de trabalho.  Reservamos o aptº por um período mais longo que o necessário, pois terminamos a obra antes do tempo previsto. Dani foi super gentil e devolveu  as diárias correspondentes, nem todo anfitrião tem esta postura! Somos muito gratos! O apartamento está próximo de ponto de ônibus, supermercado, farmácia. Fomos muito bem atendidos, recomendo!

A minha estadia no apartamento da Dani foi muito boa!
Desde o início ela foi muito atenciosa, e sempre se mostrando muito preocupada com a nossa estadia, conforto e segurança no Rio.
Além disso, o apartamento é muito bem equipado e confortável. Extremamente condizente com a imagem!
Só temos a agradecer a Dani pela simpatia e ajuda!

name: one bedroom apartment
summary: sublet a big and clean one bedroom apartment from 17 nov 2015 untill 25 dec 2015 downtown montreal less than 1 min walk to concordia university and metro guy-concordia and bus 165 , 24 close to bank, pharmaprix, jeancoutu,pa,dollarama. all include

name: Heart of Copacabana: 1 Minute to Beach
summary: Cosy studio equipped with all confort: WI-FI, 32” LCD TV, Air-Conditioning,  etc EXCELLENT LOCATION, in the best point of Copacabana: just 2 minutes walking from the beach, 15 mins to Ipanema and close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets and metro.
space: The apartment has a small lateral view to the beach and has an EXCELLENT LOCATION, whrere I believe is the best point of Copacabana (Rua  Constante Ramos at the corner of Av. Copacabana – Posto 4): just 2 minutes walking from the beach, 15 mins to Ipanema and close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets, metro and shopping.  It is residencial and secure building with 24h doorman and you will feel as a real carioca living in Rio de Janeiro.  It is the ideal studio for having a relaxing and fun vacation in Rio!!!
description: Cosy studio equipped with all confort: WI-FI, 32” LCD TV, Air-Conditioning,  etc EXCELLENT LOCATION, in the best point of Copacabana: just 2 minutes walking from the beach, 15 mins to Ipanema and close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets and metro. The apartment has a small lateral view to the beach and has an EXCELLENT LOCATION, whrere I believe is the best point of Copacabana (Rua  Constante Ramos at the corner of Av. Copacabana – Posto 4): just 2 minutes walking from the beach, 15 mins to Ipanema and close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets, metro and shopping.  It is residencial and secure building with 24h doorman and you will feel as a real carioca living in Rio de Janeiro.  It is the ideal studio for having a relaxing and fun vacation in Rio!!! Acesso a todas as àreas do apto e àreas comuns do do edifìcio Terei prazer em ajudà-los com informaçoes turisticas e no que puder ser ùtil. Excellent neighborhood: Very safe and close to everything. In the heart of Copacabana. Just 2 minut
neighborhood_overview: Excellent neighborhood: Very safe and close to everything. In the heart of Copacabana. Just 2 minutes walking from the beach, 15 mins to Ipanema and close to bars, restaurants, supermarkets, metro, cinema and shopping. Also very close to the bakery and to Ipanema and Lagoa
notes: Em principio, a estadia serà excelente, mas....caso aconteça algo, estarei pronta a ajudà-los!
transit: Vàrios transportes pùblicos nas proximidades. Pròximo a varios pontos de onibus e 5 minutos a pè do metro
access: Acesso a todas as àreas do apto e àreas comuns do do edifìcio
interaction: Terei prazer em ajudà-los com informaçoes turisticas e no que puder ser ùtil.
house_rules: Respeito com a organizaçao do apartamento e com os vizinhos. Permitidos animais de pequeno porte

host.host_about:
Olâ, meu nome é Renata, você será muito bem recebida no Rio de Janeiro. 
Seja bem vindo! 
I lived for many years in Italy ad I am fluent in English, Italian, French, Spanish and Portuguese.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Great host, nice and cozy apartment! Renata was so kind and she helped us in any way, even with our really late booking (just the evening before the check-in!!). Perfect position, 2 min from the beach, safe area, money change, shops and restaurants are all nearby. We strongly recommend Renata and her apartments, and if you are italian she is the perfect choice for you: she speaks perfect italian!

A localização do apartamento é maravilhosa, perto da praia e a vizinhança é muito segura.

A receptividade da proprietária foi super boa e amigável.

I highly recommend this apt.  It's a great place in a great location.  The apt is rather large, has been newly renovated and is two short blocks from Copacabana beach.  My girlfriend and I also stayed at another one of Renata’s properties nearby and really liked the Copacabana area.  There are plenty of restaurants, shops and bars close by, and of course you have a world class beach just a couple blocks away which was the main attraction for us. We also did quite a bit of walking and this apt lends itself to a 20ish minute walk to Ipanema beach and a 40ish minute walk to Leblon.  I highly recommend making those walks as you end up on a series of world class beaches the vast majority of the time and views and beaches are stellar.

Working with Renata was a pleasure. She was flat out great and has been the best host and person I have come in contact with while using airbnb.  We had a change of plans and needed to make this reservation at the last minute and she was able to accommodate. Our flight also didn't leave Rio until the late evening and she was a huge help in locating a place where we could leave our bags for the day. 

We hope to make a trip to Rio again at some point and when we do we will definitely reach out to Renata.  Thanks again for all your accommodations, recommendations and help Renata.  It was all very much appreciated.

I recommend this accommodation of Renata. I was welcomed in a very hearty way from her mother who explained everything necessary. The apartment is clean and fully equipped with taste. It is safe due to 24h security at the entrance. It is just two blocks away from Copacabana beach, 10 minutes of walking from a metro station and free taxis pass the streets all the time. Close you will find supermarkets, drug stores, banks, restaurants and cafés. Renata arrived on time for a hearty goodbye. The only things you shall keep in mind are, that during carnival you must expect to hear music from the street and that apartment blocks in South America have a rather large open supply funnel.

Small but very nice apartment at a perfect location in the middle of the copacabana area. Beach, shops, restaurants and supermarket in walking distance. It is also save to get home by night as the entrance to the apartment is just next to the main street in Copacabana.
Renata was very friendly and gave us some tips about Rio and also organized a low priced taxi to get back to the airport. We booked the apartment only the evening before arriving and everything worked perfectly.

My friend and I had two amazing weeks in Renata's beautiful appartment. The appartment has an incredible and safe location, you really are in two minutes at the Copacabana. Furthermore, the bakery is around the corner and the supermarket only two blocks away.
Renata is very lovely, she received us middle in the night and we could write her whenever there was a problem.
We loved the appartment it's small but we didn't need anything bigger, the bathroom is nice and you can easily cook a good meal in the kitchen. 
As two young girls we felt safe in Renata's apparment and were happy that there was a 24h doorman. 
Thank you Renata for making our stay in Rio so unforgettable :)

Renata was a perfect host! Really nice person and made our stay in Eio very comfortable! Her place is very tight and clean! I can only recommend people to use her place while staying in the fantastic metropolitan of Rio.

Thank you for all the tips about places to go out, eat and see!

Grazie Mille!

Kris & Runa

Renata es una persona muy amable que nos hizo sentir muy comodos en nuestra estadia. El departamento es muy lindo y esta muy bien ubicado en el centro de Copacabana a solo 2 cuadras de la playa. Muy recomendable!

I had such a comfotable time in Renat's home. The best thing was location. It's middle of copacabana and so close to beach and very easy to catch bus, subway and taxi. Supermarket, laundry, restaurant and bar everything is so close... 

The second thing is flat itself. Its very bright flat as you can see in foto. Feel fresh and everything is inside...and comfotable to use... also there is so much space for storage. It was very cozy.

The third thing I liked is security. I was a bit worried about this as I am woman and travel alone but this flat 24hours guard in enterance. And the location itself is very safe area so you dont need to worry!!

Lastly I love the host Renata. She is great person very international open minded. She always there want to help you and she is trying to give better service I can see this. I am sure next guest will even more  enjoyable stay. :) thanks a lot for everything. Obrigada.
O apartamento fica muito bem localizado, perto da praia, em uma região movimentada. O piso é de taco, pode ser que cause alergia em pessoas mais sensíveis. A Renata é super gente boa e prestativa.

Departamento ubicado a dos cuadras de la playa de copacabana, cerca de un supermercado y farmacias. Muy agradable, estuvimos tres noches y fue perfecto.
Renata es una excelente anfitriona, nos dió datos de cosas que hacer en Río y nos ayudó a reservar un taxi para volvernos al aeropuerto por un precio muy conveniente.
Recomiendo este lugar!
To stay at renata's place was really cool, the place is realy well located, and has everything you need. And renata has provided me with really good tips to explore rio.

We HIGHLY recommend Renata's studio and especially recommend her as a host as we know she has other properties in the area. We stayed in the Green Studio (I called it) one block from Copacabana beach post 6 for 8 wonderful nights. My husband and I had to go to Rio in Nov for business and since we did not know anyone there we thought of trying out Airbnb (which is very popular in SF were we live). We were attracted by the slogan "feel at home any part of the world" and thats exactly how we felt in Renata's apartment, at home. By the end of our trip, we where saying to each other "lets go home?" Hehe.
When we arrived we were greeted by Renata with so much attention and care. I felt like I was being received by a friend I'd known forever. She helped us with tips about the area, a list of restaurants and things do. When we needed her she was available and we felt so fortunate to have met her! 
The apartment was exactly as advertised! The bed is super comfortable, tons of closet space, easy to organize for long stays, there is a sweet little kitchen and laundry tank. The building is very clean and safe too! The 24hr doormen where all super sweet and attentive. The neighbors were friendly with us. We felt very safe in the building. We loved the neighborhood and the location and made a lot of friends there. We would walk to the beach and back several times per day. 
The location is prime, I would give a super high walk score, we walked everywhere! The supermarket was one block away, the pharmacy is on the corner, the post office, restaurants, bars, stores, shopping centers, and flea markets are all walkable. The taxis stop in front of the building and the bus runs on the streets above (to Leblon, Ipanema and Barra da Tijuca) and  below (Leme, Lapa and the city Center). Over all we were super satisfied with our stay! We will for sure come back and stay with Renata next time! Obrigada por tudo Renata!

We stayed in Renates studio for Christmas and we had a wunderful time. It's really close to the Copacabana playa, supermarket, restaurants and subway. Rebate is a really nice hostess with good tips and there if you need here. Highly recommended!

Renata's place is great, located only two blocks away from Copacabana beach you have everything (Restaurants, Bars, Coffee Shops, Banks, Supermarkets, etc) you need at walk distance. You can also take different buses (or a taxi) to all the main sights in the city like Pao de Azucar, Lagoa, Cristo Redentor, etc. Will recommend you stay here if you are a couple and wanna spend some chilling days close to the beach. The neighbourhood looks very safe and we had a great stay.

We fell in love with Renatas green room at the first sight. 
The apartment is very good located. You will have everything important around, like ATMs, supermarkets, restaurants, bars, best breakfast spot in town (Caféina) and of course Copacabana beach just 2 min. to walk.

The flat is very cosy and good equipped. It has everything you need, for example air condition plus fan, fridge, excellent wifi etc.
And also there is a 24 hour doorman service.

Renata is a very helpful and friendly host. The communication with her was perfect and also she gave us good advices to discover Rio.

We had 9 greats days there and when we visit Rio again, we would definitely stay at Renatas apartment once more.

Highly recommended for those who are looking for a place in the heart of Rio.

The stay at Renata's apartment was simply perfect; The place looks exactly like the photos and it's very complete, comfortable and very well located.  Renata was super friendly and very responsive during my entire stay.  I look forward to staying at one of Renata's apartments in the future.  :)
Renata's place was great. Very comfortable and the best location. Plus she was an amazing host, offering me tips on restaurants, bars and the city. I would absolutely recommend a stay here

Renata is a very warm, friendly and kind host. She's a great first point of contact on your arrival to Rio, a friendly face! The apartment is exactly as it appears in the photographs, very well presented and in a safe part of Copacabana. We appreciated the accommodation for our 6 nights. Thank you for having us Renata!

We had an amazing experience in Rio. Renata was a wonderful host, helping us settle in to the cosy and colourful apartment just minutes away from Copacabana beach. I would recommend this place to anyone, its just minutes away from the beach and various other attractions. There are great resturants, supermarket and money exchange just a few steps away. The aparment was prefect for what we needed. It had air conditionar which is essential for Rio's heat, a working kitchen and bathroom. The apartment is exactly like the pictures. Hope to visit Rio again, thanks Renata for a wonderfull stay.
Foi ótima a experiência. O apartamente é bem localizado e super bonitinho. A anfitriã é atenciosa e nos recebeu bem. Obrigada Renata

Consiglio caldamente la casa di Renata per soggiornare a Rio. Non è molto grande ma è  perfetta per una o due persone Essenziale ma ben organizzata e pulita. Il punto di forza è la posizione: in due minuti a piedi sarete nella spiaggia di Copacabana Inoltre avrete a portata di mano negozi ristoranti e locali tipici e la fermata della metro è raggiungibile a piedi in pochi minuti. La ciliegina sulla torta è Renata:gentilissima disponibile e fonte inesauribile di consigli. Inoltre parla perfettamente l'italiano e questo per me è stato fondamentale. Da ripetere. Obrigado Renata!

Principalmente queremos agradecer a Renata por su hospitalidad, amabilidad, carisma, la ubicación del apto es perfecto, queda a dos cuadras de la playa de Copacabana, tiene transporte publico cerca, restaurantes, bares, droguerías 24 horas, cicloruta para los que amamos el deporte, queda a 40 minutos de Lapa en transporte y caminando a Ipanema a 15 minutos.  Desde allí puedes ir fácilmente al Cristo redentor y Pan de Azucar. 

La decoración, limpieza y los utensilios necesarios para hospedarse los tiene a disposición,  muy recomendado. Renata de nuevo mil gracias por tu hospitalidad, esperamos volver pronto con mas tiempo. Abrazos. Diana y Camilo.

It was amazing! Renata is the best host i've had in long time. I recommend anybody going to rio to get in touch with her. Location of the apartment was very good (2 blocks to the beach), apartment was clean and tidy as well. Thanks for the nice expierence renata!

My boyfriend and I had a lovely time in Rio at Renata's apartment. The space is clean with lots of light and 24-hour security. We had access to large closets which is helpful to avoid the "living out of a suitcase" look. The apartment is also very close to the beach in a safe neighbourhood and is walking distance to the metro. 

Renata herself is a gracious host with lots of good recommendations on what to do in the city and how to get around. She is very accomodating, bringing us water and treats. Most importantly, she responds to messages quickly both before we arrived in Rio and afterwards, to ensure that we have a pleasant stay. She also speaks excellent English!

I would highly recommend staying at Renata's apartment if you're planning a trip to Rio. I've stayed in airbnbs all over the world and it's always great to meet a host to takes pride in her space and in her city.
La experiencia ha sido excelente. El apartamento impecable y bien ubicado. Y Renata una anfitriona perfecta y puntual.

Location was fantastic  2 minute walk to Copacabana beach, restaurants, Cafe, metro and so much more!! renata and her mother were a pleasure to deal with. very easy going, polite and spoke English very well .

The apartment itself was a bit dated, but most importantly  homey and clean. 

Would definitely reccomend this to anyone looking to stay in Copacabana.

Renata's apartment is amazingly well located, a stone-throw away from Copacabana beach. It's close to a multitude of shops and restaurants as well as public transport and taxis. Located on the 8th (luckily with a lift) it is fairly quiet and well equipped. I didn't get to use the kitchen during my stay but it looked adequate. 

In summary: nice place to stay.

Renata's apartment is fantastic! It's 5 minutes walk from the beach, the wifi is super fast, and the apartment is like a home away from home. It's also located really well in relation to the rest of Rio, so you'll cut down on travel times and taxi costs. Thanks for a great stay Renata!

We had a wonderful time staying here. The apartment is bright and airy and located right in the heart of Copacabana, just 2 blocks from the beach. Renata was on vacation, but we were greeted by her very affectionate and sweet mother, who answered a lot of our questions and did everything she could to get us situated in the apartment. It was an amazing experience and felt perfectly safe in a doorman/elevator building. Would recommend this to anyone wishing to stay in the Copa area!
A localização do apartamento é excelente! Fomos muito bem recebidos pela mãe da Renata e o apartamento é bem confortável. Gostamos muito!

Très bien placé. 
Propre, dans un immeuble surveillé. 
Et en plus Renata parle français.

Fui muito bem recebido pela Renata, muito atenciosa. A descrição do anúncio condiz com o que encontrei. A localização do apartamento é ótima. Próximo a praia. Tudo funcionou perfeitamente durante a minha estadia. Possui tudo muito próximo, supermercado, bares, padarias, restaurantes, estaçao de metrô... o bairro é muito tranquilo. Gostei muito e recomendo! Obrigado Renata.

J'ai passé une très agréable semaine à l'appartement de Renata.  Le logement est très bien situé, dans un quartier très vibrant, plein de restaurants, de cafés, de boutiques et bien entendu tout près de la plage.    Renata parle plusieurs langues dont le français, la communication avec elle est agréable, facile et efficace.  L'appartement est propre, bien équipé et confortable. Un gardien contrôle l'accès à l'édifice alors on s'y sent en sécurité.  Pour ceux qui sont très sensible au bruit, il faut savoir que l'on entend la vie de la rue même si on est situé au 8e etage.  Autrement c'est un très bon choix.

Très bon expérience dans l'appartement de Renata! L'emplacement est vraiment parfait pour les adeptes de la plage et/ou de la fête! Copacabana est très bien désservi en bus/taxi pour se déplacer facilement. L'appartement est petit mais convient parfaitement a la visite d'une si grand ville (on est pas souvent chez soi). Renata et son compagnon nous ont bien acceuillis et l'immeuble est plus que sécurisé!
Obrigada Renata!

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Renata qui nous a présenté son logement ainsi que donné des indications touristiques sur la ville. Son appartement correspondait bien à la description faite sur le site de Airbnb. La localisation était juste parfaite pour nous : à deux pas de Copacabana et près d'Ipanema qui sont quartiers vivants et animés.

O apartamento é igual descrito. A localização é ótima. A Renata foi muito gentil na recepção e o Carlo no  check-out. Deram diversas dicas legais de passeios. Destaque para Passeio de Bike na Lagoa, Restaurante El Born na Rua Bolívar.

Apartamento tem uma excelente localização atendeu nossas expectativas , anfitriã Renata super atenciosa gostei bastante de tudo , único problema que tive foi ter ido de carro pois devido ao feriado não tinha lugar para parar na rua e os estacionamentos estavam lotados , acabei parando em um estacionamento a quatro quadras de onde estava hospedado e paguei super caro, mas o resto foi tudo ótimo obrigado Renata.

It was a plwasure, great location, clesn safe, little but cosy, a nearly fully kitchen if you wanna use it. 

We will be back

A Renata foi ótima, nos deus várias dicas, e abriu bem o horário de check in e check out do apartamento para nos ajudar! O apartamento estava super limpo e organizado. A localização é melhor impossível!
Valeu super a pena!

We highly recommend this place! The apartment was clean, safe, and well located. Renata is both professional and personable. We enjoyed our stay immensely. We traveled with an infant and was able to set up a crib in the entry (in essence we were able to make it into a two bedroom). The doormen were kind and helpful (when we arrived early they got in contact with Renata for us-- which was nice since we do not speak any Portuguese). Renata gave us some great food recommendations. A short walk from the apartment will bring you to the beach, numerous restaurants, and stores. Everything else (tourist attractions) is a short taxi ride away. Comfortable bed, necessities in the kitchen, hot shower, clean room, quiet apartment building (nice neighbors) and working AC. Would stay here again.

She is a great host a great person, I enjoyed staying in her apartment... It is a super great location 

I highly recommend staying in her place, within walking distance to restaurants,supermarket and the beach.

El departamento es muy cómodo para 2 personas, limpio y con aire acondicionado optimo. Es tal cual las fotos y descripción. Tiene muy buena ubicación a la playa, restaurantes, cafés, farmacias, comercio en general. A pasos de locomoción para ir donde quieras en Rio de Janeiro. El barrio es muy seguro y cuenta con portero las 24 Hrs.

Renata es una excelente anfitriona, muy atenta, informada y dispuesta en ayudar, para que pases una excelente estadía.

La verdad es que ha sido estupendo,  la comunicación con Renata fue constante,  nos estaba esperando puntual cuando llegamos,  nos dio todo tipo de información sobre, donde había supermercados,  bares para salir, restaurantes.... 
Fue super amable.  El location del piso es inmejorable,  tiene todo lo que hace falta para unos días de vacaciones.  Quedamos muy contentos.

O apartamento tem excelente localização. Pertinho da praia e com várias opções de bares e restaurantes por perto. O apto é pequeno, mas muito limpo e organizado. A Renata é uma excelente anfitriã, nos recebeu muito bem e foi super atenciosa durante todo o nosso contato. Recomendo.

Renata is very welcoming and considerate. She is also responsive to messages and answered all of our questions quickly. The location of the apartment is perfect and looks just like the photos. The area is safe, well lit, and the 24 hour security desk is helpful too. The neighbours were quiet but sometimes you can hear traffic on the street. It was very easy to get around the city from the apartment. I would highly recommend this place for 1-2 people.
Renata is a great host, I recommend staying here. It's a great place to stay. Within walking distance to the beach and many nice restaurants.

Gostei muito do Ap, um lugar aconchegante, limpo, com uma iluminação boa, o prédio muito bem organizado desde a recepção até o andar do Ap. A localização é ótima, muitos comércios próximos, cafeteria, supermercados, farmácias, bares, restaurantes, bem pertinho da praia. A recepção da Renata foi exelente tanto no check-in quanto no checkout, foi muito atenciosa com informações de locais para fazer refeições, sair pra beber, passeios e como se locomover nas suas do bairro. Vale muito a pena se hospedar no Ap q é conforto garantido. Sentir falta de um ferro de passar roupa mas, a tábua tem. Vou querer ficar mais vezes no Ap quando voltar ao Rio de Janeiro.

Renata é muito atenciosa!! Nos recebeu muito bem, sempre solicita e nos assessorou em todo o momento da estadia, é Flexível e compromissada.
A localização é ótima! Uma quadra da praia, e próximo de bancos, metrô e outros serviços e comercio local. Prédio e apto bem cuidado, limpo com wifi e ar condicionado funcionando normalmente.
Portaria 24 hrs
O apartamento tem ótima localização, é pequeno mas aconchegante. A Renata e seu marido foram muito prestativos e nos atenderam muito bem. Ficamos muito satisfeitos!

El lugar es muy lindo. Se encuentra bien ubicado, es muy seguro y esta muy limpio.
Un placer visitar la casa de Renata.

Lovely flat in a great location. We relly enjoyed or stay there. Close to eveythig, including the beach and the subway, and a load of shops, cafes etc. 

Renata is a fabulous host. Thanks!!

Tava tudo otimo, Renata e Carlo são pessoas mto simpáticas, nos sentimos en casa.
A única coisa que poderia ser melhorado são os talheres.
Obrigado!

Accueilli agréablement par Carlo. :-) 
Logement bien situé avec une station de métro à proximité (cantalgo) et appartement conforme aux photos.
Si j'ai passé un bon séjour, c'est un peu grâce aux conseils de Carlo et Renata (week-end à Buzios). 
Merci à vous deux. :-)

Renata’s place in Copacabana is GREAT! The location is perfect (just two blocks from Copacabana beach - a short walk to Ipanema), close to plenty of restaurants and shops, and really convenient to the metro or taxis. It’s the perfect hideaway for a couple or single traveler like myself. Renata and her husband Carlo were fantastic hosts and were in constant contact with me. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!! Obrigado por tudo!!!

Es un alojamiento antiguo, no es muy cómodo, la cocina es  pequeña y tiene cucarachas, el dormitorio tampoco resulta cómodo, el servicio de WIFI es malo la conexión se cae demasiado y los ascensores fallan demasiado. Por otra parte, el departamento esta muy bien ubicado y la anfitriona tiene muy buena disposición y voluntad.

Renata’s place has a great location! You are in that part of the Copacabana where you have everything you need! The beach is really near and the value for the price is amazing!  It’s a great place for a couple, because there is enough space! Renata was also flexible with the time to check in and that was great! 
I really recommend this Renata’s flat to everybody!

Renata and her husband were very nice. They gave me several tips about the nearest places. The apartament itself is very cozy  and location is great - very close to Copacabana beach, with restaurants, shops and bus station around :)
Really a great host. The place is exactly as listed. The area is among the best of Rio. And I will certainly return
Emplacement idéal. Appartement propre et sécurisé. Vraiment très bien. Excellent accueil de Renata.

This is the perfect place to stay for a solo traveler or couple!  You will be two short blocks to the beach in a very safe building.  The porteiros (doorman) are very friendly and the neighborhood is clean and safe.  There are many shops in the area and the subway (for cheap access to Centro) is a short walk away.  This really is the perfect place to stay if you want good value and good access to all that Rio has to offer.

Mi novio y yo quedamos en el apartamento de Renata y nos encantó. El barrio es seguro, limpio y tranquilo, a dos cuadras de la playa, cerca de metro y todos los buses. Muchos restaurantes, tiendas y supermercado a menos de 5 minutos caminando. Ella y su marido son personas muy simpáticas, amables y nos dieron buenos consejos. El apartamento estaba muy limpio, justo como en las fotos, tamaño perfecto para una pareja. Muchísimas gracias Renata!

Renata's apartment is very nice and clean as well as perfectly located. You are two blocks from the beach. 5 minutes from the metro. There are many restaurants and bars near by and Reneta is a very helpful hosts. Definitely recommend

Everything great! Cosy and clean apartment with great location. Getting to the beach could barely be easier. Several super markets and gyms nearby which is convenient not having to go too far for. Renata was super helpful and communicative. Made check-in very easy and even showed me around to two gyms in the neighborhood so I could check them out.

Lo que ven en las fotos es al 100%
Un lugar bonito, seguro, cómodo y bastante limpio. La ubicación es excelente, y aparte de tener Copacabana a 1 cuadra, tiene mercados, bancos, restaurantes y todo tipo de locales cerca.

Para mi y mi pareja fue exactamente lo que buscábamos en nuestro viaje a Río. Y Renata es una increíble HOST! Sin duda volveríamos a ese lugar
This apartment is perfect for solo travelers, it has everything you need and a great location. Renata is an amazing host, incredibly helpful. Highly recommend.

This is a small and cosy apartment in an older building in the very heart of Copacabana.  Beach, shops, transport, Metro ... all at your doorstep.  The building staff are very friendly and keep you safe.  Your host, Renata, is wonderful.  I recommend this apartment to you.  xx

Renata's place is wonderfully located, close to the beach and in the heart of Copacabana with Ipanema in walking distance. The apartment is larger than the pictures suggest and has ample space for a solo traveller or a couple. The flat is clean and has working air conditioning, which is a nice bonus.
Renata and her husband were flexible with regards to check in and check out times and gave me a list of local places to go to. I would definitely recommend this flat!

name: Rose Bay: Large 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: Charming one bedroom apartment available in Rose Bay. Quiet leafy street. Close to public transport (bus & ferry), shops, cafes, water and a quick hop to Bondi Beach. Great for a couple, huge for a single.
space: Charming one bedroom apartment available in Rose Bay. Quiet leafy street. Close to shops, water and a quick hop to Bondi Beach. Great for a couple, huge for a single.  The Apartment: Large single bedroom in an art deco, secure ground floor apartment available to rent, only 200 metres walk to Rose Bay Ferry Wharf and 5 minute drive to Bondi Beach. Features of the apartment include: - Fully furnished, including kitchen equipment and utensils - Television and dvd player - Linen provided - Internet ( wireless) included. - Secure carpark with direct apartment access via private back door.  - Modern kitchen and bathroom.  Location: Rose Bay is a beautiful, leafy suburb with a large park right on stunning water's edge of Sydney harbour. The Apartment is only 200 metres from the Ferry Wharf, where you can catch a beautiful ferry ride into the city. It takes only 15 minutes to get to Circular Quay! Plumer Road village with supermarket, restaurants and cafe are within 20 metres stroll. Transport
description: Charming one bedroom apartment available in Rose Bay. Quiet leafy street. Close to public transport (bus & ferry), shops, cafes, water and a quick hop to Bondi Beach. Great for a couple, huge for a single. Charming one bedroom apartment available in Rose Bay. Quiet leafy street. Close to shops, water and a quick hop to Bondi Beach. Great for a couple, huge for a single.  The Apartment: Large single bedroom in an art deco, secure ground floor apartment available to rent, only 200 metres walk to Rose Bay Ferry Wharf and 5 minute drive to Bondi Beach. Features of the apartment include: - Fully furnished, including kitchen equipment and utensils - Television and dvd player - Linen provided - Internet ( wireless) included. - Secure carpark with direct apartment access via private back door.  - Modern kitchen and bathroom.  Location: Rose Bay is a beautiful, leafy suburb with a large park right on stunning water's edge of Sydney harbour. The Apartment is only 200 metres from the Ferry Wharf,
neighborhood_overview: This is a great, safe neighbourhood that offers people with an active lifestyle plenty of options. Foodies are also catered for with popular places to eat only a stone's throw away.
transit: Rose Bay is close to heaps of busses and is right near the ferry wharf. Bondi Junction and Edgecliff stations are the closest - access via bus.
access: Access to all areas of the apartment; kitchen, lounge, study, bedroom, wardrobe, bathroom and carspace.
interaction: I will be there to welcome you and give you a quick tour of the place and to hand over the keys. I live nearby and will happily take calls about where to go and what to do during your stay, allowing you to control how much contact you receive.
house_rules: Looking for neat and tidy guests who respect the space and others in the building.

host.host_about:
Hey, I'm Julia. I'm in my thirties I use Airbnb when I travel, usually with my partner Daniel, and as a host for our apartment in Potts Point as well as on behalf of my mother when she travels and her great apartment in Rose Bay is vacant. 
As a guest I understand what it is to be a host and as such, I will treat your place with respect. 
As your host, I can then be in contact with you as much or as little as you like. Both properties have a key box so access can be within your time restrictions. I can be on email/text if needed during your stay.

reviews.comments:
We stayed here for several weeks during a gap between leases. This is a lovely quiet apartment situated close to public transport (buses and ferries) connecting you to the city. The apartment was clean and spacious with all mod cons available. Julia was excellent to deal with, and was very responsive to any queries that we had.

I'd recommend this apartment to anyone looking to stay in Sydney.

The apartment was perfect!!!
So much space!!!
Definitely a place to recommend.
Julia & Adele were so helpful.
The bus to the city was a couple of blocks away and to get to Bondi Beach was also pretty close.
Being 2 blocks from the Bay made the trip to Manly so nice!!!!!
100% recommended.

Julia and her sister Adelle are friendly and helpful, they always respond to my enquiry within a day. When we reached their place after a tiring flight, Adelle gave us a warm welcome and they even prepared some snacks for us. That was very thoughtful.. The unit is clean and tidy, with a big bedroom and a cute kitchen. It's located at a great neighborhood, convenient and quiet. The unit is within walking distance to ferry and bus stop. We stayed for two months and spent a really great time there. PS, do try the pizza shop nearby, you won't be disappointed!

Very nice place. Very spacious and cozy at the same time. I had some problems with the wifi (my fault) and Julia helped solving it very fast!

We stayed for almost 2 months and everything went very well.

Getting to the city by ferry is very nice, passing in front of the Opera House and the Harbour Bridge. I took it almost everyday and did not get tired.

The apartment is fantastic.  We stayed for over a month, and really enjoyed being there.  It is easy to get from Rose Bay to the CBD on the ferry.  And Julia is a great host.  I thoroughly recommend this place.

We had a lovely time staying at Julia's place.  The place has a spacious living room, bedroom and bathroom.  Great shower pressure.  The location is quiet but not isolated.  Ferry is pretty close by, though we mostly take the bus to get around.  Communication with Julia was very fast and easy.  Julia is very friendly.  She met us upon check in and walked us through the apartment.  Would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a short term home in Sydney/Rose Bay.
Great place in a fantastic location with lots of nearby amenities . Julia is an amazing host with lots of local knowledge. Highly recommended.

name: Pin Porto City Center
summary: PinPorto flat has a perfect location for those who want to stay in the heart of the city. This recently remodeled flat is spacious, clean, with excellent sun exposure and 3 balconies.
space: This spacious, clean and cosy flat set on the 4th floor has 4 rooms and a comfortable living room. It is as perfectly suitable for a couple as it is for a group of 9.  We provide you with everything you need to have a comfortable stay such as laundry service, wi-fi and tv with international channels.
description: PinPorto flat has a perfect location for those who want to stay in the heart of the city. This recently remodeled flat is spacious, clean, with excellent sun exposure and 3 balconies. This spacious, clean and cosy flat set on the 4th floor has 4 rooms and a comfortable living room. It is as perfectly suitable for a couple as it is for a group of 9.  We provide you with everything you need to have a comfortable stay such as laundry service, wi-fi and tv with international channels. Let us know if you have any special request before arrival - we will be happy to assist you. Subway "Carolina Micaelis" is right across the block and takes you to the airport in 22min. There is also a bus stop literally downstairs.
neighborhood_overview: You will stay 5min walking from one of the most historical pedestrian road "Rua de Cedofeita" which quickly takes you to some of the downtown hotspots. Most of the touristic attractions are a within walking distance.  Casa da Musica and the new gourmet market Bom Sucesso is also a few minutes walk away. The neighbourhood is quiet and provides you with all the facilities you might need.
transit: Subway "Carolina Micaelis" is right across the block and takes you to the airport in 22min. There is also a bus stop literally downstairs.
interaction: Let us know if you have any special request before arrival - we will be happy to assist you.
house_rules: - Common Sense - Não é permitido fazer barulho após as 22h/ Do not disturb the neighbors after 10pm. - Necessário fornecer dados pessoais de todos os hóspedes para cumprir a legislação do Serviço de Estrangeiros e Fronteiras (SEF), antes ou durante o check-in. - It is necessary to provide personal data of all guests to comply with the legislation of the Immigration Department (SEF), before or during check-in.

host.host_about:
Two friends willing to provide quality stays in our city. Your visit is our pleasure.
Welcome

Somos dois amigos com empenho em vos receber no Porto. Venham conhecer a nossa cidade. Bem-vindos. 

Gião + Pedro

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Fue todo perfecto, trato excelente, disponibilidad horaria total, en el apartamento nos pusieron todos los utensilios de cocina nuevos, e incluso nos regalaron unas cuantas cervezas!! Excelente y totalmente recomendable

A fantastic stay in Porto, our host was excellent, waiting for us as we arrived and welcoming us with a small gift! He also spend the time to recommend eateries, give us a run down of what's around and what we could do in the city. The apartment and was well situated and had some free parking nearby which we left the car for the whole weekend and walked everywhere. Highly recommended!
Es un apto grande, agradable y limpio, tal como se ve en las fotos. Ideal para viajes en familia, está a una distancia caminable del centro y los hosts fueron muy amables y atentos. Muy recomendable!
Excelente apartamento! Limpo, bem equipado e a localização é óptima. Fomos muito bem recebidos e a disponibilidade dos anfitriões foi total desde o primeiro dia. Recomendo!!

El piso está genial, ideal para 8 personas, ropa de cama nueva y todo muy limpio. La comunicación ha sido muy rápida y te resuelven cualquier duda y recomendación de forma inmediata! Nos ha sido de gran ayuda. La ubicación es perfecta, a 10 min caminando del centro de la ciudad con facilidad para aparcar. Muchas gracias por todo.

We briefly met with Gião at the apartment when we arrived and he gave us all the info that we needed to explore the area and the city. There's a big world map made of cork (which is one of materials typically used in Porto, not only for bottling but also for arts and crafts) fixed at the wall of the dining room where the guests mark with a pin the place they're coming from (ours were Italy, Galicia and Argentina). We were also given a complimentary bottle of white wine, which, by the way, was really good. The neighborhood is nice and safe, there's a big market just a 10-minutes walk (Mercado Bom Sucesso) with gourmet food (try the leitão), stalls of fruit (delicious clementines from the Azores) and fish. Just around the corner, close to the metro station, you can find some terrific pastéis de nata and a very good coffee at Cake Studio. If instead you're looking for a square meal after a day of rambling walks, then, just crossing the street, there's Restaurante Universal which has excellent reviews (but unfortunately we didn't try). Nightlife around Galerias de Paris, its beatiful buildings with their tiled façades and hundreds of small quirky bars is not more than 20 minutes on foot. Portuguese people are extremely friendly anyway, so, if you're unsure on where to go, just ask! Back to the apartment, we noticed a lot of nice little details: a book in English on every nightstand, a paper with the forecast for the next few days. Quick tip: opening the main door could be tricky, as one of the two locks is down at the bottom of the door. Gião was also extra-accomodating with check-in and check-out times.

Pedro welcomed us warmly to his flat in Porto and was very flexible on check-in and check-out time. The flat is good value for money for a larger group needing 4 bedrooms. We found parking easily on the street out front and were able to walk to the city center from the apartment even with our young kids.

That said it has a few quirks: light from the bathroom shines into one bedroom, one bedroom set well apart from the others (one with bunkbed), and can be a bit cold in the main room.

Pin Porto is a nice, very big, flat. It is ideally located, we were able to travel around the city quite easily and it is a 30min travel to the airport.
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto and had good times in this warm and cosy place.
very helpful from beginning to end and the place was fantastic

We had a lovely Time in Porto in Giao's appartement. Everything was really clean and neat. Giao was very available for us before and during our trip. I recommend this place to enjoy a good Time in Porto

Very nice host and cozy aprtment, perfect for 8 people to stay in. The apartment is close to the metro station and other city landmarks, it is fully furnished with any kind of essentials and the wifi speed is great. We really enjoyed the stay in Porto, and the host was very kind and helpful for any type of information. Suggested!
Si, la descripción era correcta

O Giao tornou-se um anfitrião fantástico conseguiu ao máximo auxiliar-nos em todos os aspetos da nossa estádia. A casa é incrível e encontra-se muito bem localizado junto do metro (Lapa e Carolina Michaelis), paragem de autocarros e das zonas mais emblemáticas da cidade (Boavista e Casa da Música e Rua de Cedofeita).

Appartement très agréable, proche du métro
Nous avons été très bien accueillies par une connaissance de Pédro qui nous a donné de bons renseignements
Merci encore pour le vin et les parapluies qui nous ont été fort utiles dimanche

Appartement très fonctionnel et propre.
Étant 10 filles, nous aurions apprécié une deuxième salle de bain ;)
Hôte très accueillant et facilitant !

Appartement très agréable et très bien situé!
Propriétaire très accueillant et disponible.

Logement très agréable, hôte extrêmement sympathique... Comme à la maison! Bien desservi par les transports en commun, accès facile à l aéroport par le métro.
Rue commerçante piétonne non loin. 
Notre séjour à porto de 4 jours c est super bien passé....
Gros merci à PinPorto de la part de nous 7  ;)

Très bon accueil de Pedro, logement très agréable, près du métro.
Encore merci!

We really enjoyed our stay here in PinPorto. Very cosy place and it looks amazing. Our host, Pedro was a warm and gracious host. Good location as well that easily accessible to city landmarks. Recommended!
The host left a nice wine bottle for us and all rooms were nicely prepared.

La casa está situada en un barrio tranquilo y a 10 minutos andando del centro de Oporto, tiene 2 salidas de metro cerca.
El anuncio se ajusta al completo a la realidad de la casa.
Muy adecuada para grandes grupos. Fuimos 8 y era el tamaño ideal.
Repetiríamos

Hôte très arrangeant et accueillant malgré notre arrivée tardive. Il a aussi été disponible avant notre venue pour nous donner de bons conseils sur comment se déplacer à Porto, où aller...
L'appartement est très fonctionnel et les lits confortables. Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable.
Merci !!!

I traveled with a group of 7 friends for a festival in Porto and the apartment was perfect. Spacious, clean, central enough to walk to the city centre and close to the metro. The hosts were also very accommodating and helpful. We had a wonderful time in Porto!

We are a group of 10 girls who stayed for a weekend at Pin Porto. It could not have been better. Hosts were so welcoming, recommending a fantastic restaurant which we loved.

10 of us slept really comfortably in the spacey appartment with 2 bathrooms and 10 beds. Lovely touches like a coffee machine and coffee, and a bottle of wine on the table. Of course the place was clean

Location is perfect, Porto is an amazing city and we walked everywhere.
Pedro is a nice host! He welcomed us with a big smile and a huge bottle of Porto! The apartment was clean and as described in the announcement.

Très bon accueil, très bonne disponibilité du propriétaire (restaurants, trajet etc), appartement spacieux, terrasse plus petite que ce que l'on pensait mais on tient à 8 pour prendre l'apéro!
Pas très bien insonorisé mais ca nous a pas empêché de dormir! 
Très bonne expérience

The apartment was really nice and Pedro waited for us already at the apartment. He shared a map of the surrounding area with us, showed us the way en explained in short how we would get to the city centre. We even had the option to stay the whole last day instead of having to leave at 11 in the morning. I would really recommend this apartment, it is a 10 minutes walk to the city centre and if you take the metro (which is around the corner of the apartment) than you are at the Sao Bente metro station in 5 minutes or something. So we received a good service, the apartment was good and everything went really smooth.

Pedro welcomed us and was very informative. He explained amenities and locations of interest in Porto. The apartment was clean, neat and spacious. The bedrooms perfectly accommodated our families whilst offering privacy. The apartment is a 5-10 minute walk to the City Centre. Nearby free parking is available.

De verhuurder(s) zijn erg vriendelijk, behulpzaam en zijn bereid om tips te geven over Porto en wat er zoal te doen is! Daarnaast was hij erg flexibel en niet streng qua in- en uitchecken. Het appartement ziet er precies zo uit als op de foto's, is ruim, goed onderhouden en is erg goed bevallen met 8 personen. Daarnaast is de locatie goed bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer, en is het een klein kwartiertje lopen naar het centrum!
Séjour très agréable. L'appartement est très bien placé, l'accès au centre de Porto peut se faire sans problème à pied.

Lovely appartment and host! Pedro was waiting for us with a little welcome gift and helped make our stay in Porto as comfy as possible. The location of the appartment is great too, everything you need is just around the corner and the city center is only a 10 minute walk away. Would recommend to anyone and would definitely come back here :-). Thanks for everything Pedro!
Great city and nice apartment 10-15mins walk from all the action. Parking easy enough and free as well if you have a car with you. Great place for groups to stay!

Nous sommes partis début septembre avec des amis ( nous étions 8) et tout s'est très bien passé! Pedro nous a bien accueilli, a su répondre à toutes nos questions et a eu l'amabilité d'être là bien avant l'heure indiquée du check-in. L'appartement est bien situé: près d'une station de métro, près du centre et près d'un supermarché. Le seul petit hic à mentionner serait le chant du coq le matin qu'on peut entendre du côté terrasse. A part cela, nous gardons un très bon souvenir de notre séjour dans ce bel appartement et cette charmante ville, nous le recommandons sans hésiter.

Pedro a été très aimable et s'est adapté à nos demandes. L'appartement était propre et les lits sont très confortables.

C'est un endroit idéale pour découvrir Porto.

Merci Pedro.

Très bel appartement proche du centre historique. de nombreux sites et lieux de visite sont accessibles à pied. Le métro est très proche à 2 minutes. 
Les photos sont fidèles. l'appartement est traversant et donne sur l'avant et l'arrière. Il est au 4eme avec ascenseur (plein de charme !). on entend un peu les bruits de la rue et les coqs, mais ce n'est pas un souci compte tenu de l'étage.
Giao qui nous a accueilli est très sympathique et nous a bien aidé dans notre séjour, toujours avec le sourire !
Merci à lui !
Great apartment with easy access to the old town and the beach. We had plenty of room with 9 of us in the apartment.
La verdad que las 9 hemos estado muy contentas en la casa. El anfitrión PinPorto estuvo siempre pendiente cuando le necesitamos tanto antes como durante la estancis

Fomos recebidos pelo Pedro, pessoa muito simpática e cordial. O imóvel é bastante espaçoso, tudo funciona bem e a roupa de cama e banho estavam impecáveis. A localização é muito boa, permitindo conhecer muitos locais a pé. Ficamos muito satisfeitos com o local e com o suporte do Pedro. Valeu muito!

Logement agréable et bien situé. Quelques améliorations à accomplir pour accentuer son confort (seconde salle de bains, réparation de la pomme de douche, avoir du double vitrage et sécurisation des gardes corps des terrasses). Déconseillé pour une famille avec enfants.
The host was very accommodating.  He provided regional wine at our arrival and was prompt at our arrival. He made sure to give us contact information in case we needed anything

Perfect! 

It is the place to be in Porto, near everything you need! 

The flat is the same than the pictures no surprise and we loved it!

We were 6 persons, it was more than we need!

Pedro an Giao, were really kind and always here to advice us and they made our trip easier !

Nous avons adorer l'appartement, il est dans une rue qui est proche du centre ville, des bars, des restaurants et des visites touristiques.

c'était propre et pas de surprise c'était comme sur les photos!

Nous étions 6  et nous avions plus de place que ce nous en avions besoin!

Pedro et Giao sont supers, ils nous ont bien reçus, conseillés et sont rester disponible par téléphone à tout moment!

Wij werden erg vriendelijk ontvangen door Pedro, nadat we vroeg in de ochtend aankwamen. Hij nam alle tijd voor het geven van informatie. Het appartement is ruim, schoon en licht. De locatie is prima; vlakbij de metro (rechtstreekse lijn naar het vliegveld) en op loop afstand van het oude centrum. We hebben een dag fietsen gehuurd bij 'Velurb rent-a-bike'. Vlakbij en erg leuk. De weg langs het appartement is vrij druk. Slechte slapers kunnen het beste de slaapkamer naast de keuken nemen.
Pedro and giao gave us lots of useful info before our stay. Flat ideally located for visiting Porto  and ideal for a group of friends or large family. Definitely reccommend.

Logement conforme aux photos, quartier pas très attractif mais très proche du centre, facile d'accès à pied même avec les enfants et sinon métro et bus dans les rues voisines.
Un peu bruyant la nuit, il manque du double vitrage peut-être.
Literie parfaite. Il serait appréciable d'avoir une douche supplémentaire au vu du nombre de couchage.
Et pour les enfants, essayer de sécuriser les balcons peut-être. Sinon tout était parfait et surtout nous avons eu une météo exceptionnelle à cette époque (25degrés en moyenne!). Pedro a répondu à toutes nos interrogations et nous a très bien accueillis.
Apartamento a 5 minutos del centro. Muy bonito y acogedor, repetiremos seguro! Obrigado

Prima locatie alles is op loopafstand. Verbleven met 7 meiden en meer dan voldoende plek. Fijn dat er twee toiletten zijn. De bedden liggen heerlijk! Hele aardige eigenaar en zeer behulpzaam en goed bereikbaar bij vragen. Snel antwoord op berichten. Verbeterpunten: Soms was het wat koud in het appartement doordat de elektriciteit er vaak af sloeg en het plafond in de badkamer os beschimmeld maar de douche verder is wel fijn en overal verder was het heel schoon!
Fantastische Zeit. Gastgeber war sehr gut und half Lasten.

We stayed as a group of ten within the apartment and still had ample room for us all. Giao (Pinporto) was extremely helpful and flexible with regards to checking in and out and made us feel very welcome. The location was perfect as we needed to meet with other groups at Casa de Musica and it was also between 15-30 minutes walk to every designation within Porto. Overall an excellent stay - thank you!

The apartment is a perfect base for exploring Porto and was really good value and really nice and homey - the pictures are accurate. Pedro was waiting for us on the street when we arrived and everything was very easy. Thank you!

Fue magnífico el trato, la atención desde varios días antes del viaje incluso y toda nuestra estancia en el departamento. Es tal cómo se ve en las fotos e incluso mejor. Felicidades por su gran trabajo y muchas gracias por su gentil ayuda.

Gutes Appartement für viele Leute, zentral gelegen, alles ist exakt so wie auf den Fotos. Die Küche ist nicht komplett ausgestattet, aber dennoch ausreichend, um einige Gerichte zu kochen. Die Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern war super einfach, schnell und sehr hilfreich! Alles in allem ein tolles Airbnb!
Todo estuvo bien! Hicimos el check in bastante tarde y nos esperaron. Gracias!

Nice flat, in good location. We had some problems with the electricity. Because there are only electric heaters. it was not possible to use water boiler an heater at the same time. And in January it is also cold in Porto! There was a lot of mildew in the bathroom. All the other things were very nice. Perdro was really nice.

We had a really nice time, the location was really good, about 10 minutes away from the city centre. The apartment was just as the pictures show and really quite comfortable. The only thing would be the problems we experienced with the current, as the fuses at times kept turning off and making the light go out.
This house is amazing and perfect location to discover the city. All amenities are present.
Emplacement  idéal mais terrasses danjereuses pour enfants et très bruyant car simple vitrage devant boulevard très passant

Nice flat to share with friends or family. Some mattress could be better, but for a couple of days it is ok. The hosts were really nice people and they allowed us to leave the luggage in the morning even though the apt was not ready (super helpful!). Communication was really easy. The apt is 10min away walking from the center. We would stay there again with no doubt!

PinPorto was fabulous for us, a company of 8! Hyperflexible on arrival and departure times, Nice, light appartement with clean bedrooms and fully equiped. Good and easy communication. Thanks for a Nice stay in beautiful Porto!

Super séjour à Porto. Le logement était très bien conforme aux photos. Il est très bien situé par rapport à l'aéroport et au centre, on peut tout faire à pied. Nous avons été très bien accueillies par Pedro. Merci à lui.

Super séjour ! Accueil et logement top ! Logement correspondant tout à fait à la description et aux photos. Très proche métro pour l'aéroport, et à quelques minutes de marche du centre. Je recommande !
We were with 7 friends (female) and had a great weekend in Porto.

Je recommande, très bien, très agréable
Parfait pour un week-end en famille

Pedro ist ein sehr freundlicher, hilfbereiter und netter Vermieter. 
Wir sind zu 8 in der Wohnung gewesen und hatten keinerlei Probleme.
Ein paar Kleinigkeiten, wie ein recht kleines Bad oder merkwürdige Lichtschaltungen sind nicht wirklich schlimm, fast schon lustig. Wenn man in dem zweiten, kleinen WC das Licht anmacht, geht auch das Licht im Nebenzimmer an ;)
Ansonsten war Preis/Leistung absolut in Ordnung und die Lage der Wohnung ist toll. Man kann in 10 Min in die Stadt laufen. Auf dem Weg befinden sich zum einen wunderbare Restaurants als auch ein großer Supermarkt.

Wir würden wieder kommen! Danke für Alles!

We went in Porto with friends.
Pedro and Giao are 2 very good hosts. You can count on them for any question.
Porto is a great city and the apartment is very close to good bars and restaurants.
30 min walking from the center and 3 min walking from the metro.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, arejado, ótimo para grupo de amigos ou família. Contém todos itens necessários para uma estadia confortável .
Central quiet location. Only about a mile walk or less to the center of the town were there is sight seeing, restaurants, shopping, and nightlife. Had a great time!
Tiene una buena ubicación y está a 15 minutos caminando del centro.
Great location where it is close to centre but not too close. Easy to get by metro. Shops and bars near by. Great bakery and wine bars for the port!

We had a great stay in the apartment! On arrival we were greeted by Pedro who took the time to explain everything and answered our questions. The apartment itself is really nice and the beds were comfortable. Also the location is perfect. Unfortunaly someone broke in during the night, however the situation was handled quite well by Pedro and Giao. Please make sure that you close the blinds and lock the doors, so then you will be fine! We definitely recommend this apartment.

Le logement est impeccable. La literie est très confortable 
La situation géographique est Genial. Bien placé. 15mn à pied du centre touristique 
Les hôtes sont adorables. N'hésitez surtout pas

Family friendly apartment with the spacious salon. Very comfortable. There are many both cafes, restaurants and supermarkets near the the apartment. We enjoyed the charming neighborhood where cute traditional houses are.
Estancia agradable.

Appartement très bien situé ,très accueillant et d'une propreté exemplaire.
Parfait pour 8 personnes , literie impeccable.
Hôtes très sympathiques et très faciles à joindre.

Exmos. Senhores,
quem não ficar neste apartamento é porque não abona na inteligência.

Simplesmente impecável do início ao fim, quer na localização, comodidades, atendimento, limpeza, simpatia.

O nosso obrigado por tornarem a nossa estadia no Porto muito positiva.

the location is very fine for the airport. Near at metro and to the centre. The appartment is large and clean. The bath is without window. Pedro is very polite. Heating is present but only with electric heaters and a gas heater for the living room but with the blankets is all ok.The kitchen is ok but not very equipped.  We were a large group with two children and we found ourselves well. There is elevator
Nos encantó el lugar, muy limpio y agradable. Céntrico y Giao fue muy amable. Definitivamente regresaríamos!
El piso muy bien. La anfitriona muy amable!! El piso un poco frio, pero muy limpio, no cambia de las fotos y muy comodo y acogedor
Genial!!
A casa é exactamente como nas fotos e os anfitriões foram impecáveis. Certamente voltaria. Recomendo

Piso muy bueno, muy bien localizado. Anfitrión muy simpático, presente en todos nuestros problemas y no duda en absoluto en recomendar sitios o ayudar en cualquier problema. 
Si volvemos, repetiremos seguro.

¡Muchas gracias por todo! La estancia ha sido perfecta! Un espacio perfecto para tanta gente, ha sido todo maravilloso. Gracias por ayudar a que fuera un fin de semana perfecto! Es tal cual pone en la explicación, además de tener todo lo necesario. Baño completo con toallas, jabones, etc. Cocina equipada para todos los que éramos.. Está genial situado, muy muy cerca del centro (7-8 minutos andando). La estancia ha sido perfecta! Gracias!!

Una estancia cómoda, con muy buena ubicación. 
Todo muy limpio y los anfitriones muy atentos. 
Sin duda lo recomiendo.

Awesome apartment in a perfect location. Easy access to everything whether it's somewhere to eat or sightseeing. The hosts accommodated our early arrival and kept in touch in case we needed anything and helped us with a taxi back to the airport at 4am. Beautiful apartment for family and friends. Couldn't ask for more. Highly recommended
Tutto ok zona a dieciminuti piedi dal centro.  Bar sotto che fa brioches eccezionali

Joao and Pedro are really nice hosts. Communication is great and hospitality is at a high level. The location is pretty nice and again the hosts are great. Unfortunately, the photos of the place on Airbnb are what it once was but no longer is. The place is now “old” and needs plenty of refreshment. The bedrooms on the side of the street are super noisy even at night. Basic stuff like shower lotion was not provided.

We had a nice stay at this big appartment in Porto! Close to the center and two metro stations, it was easy to get around. It is on a 4th floor but it has a small elevator. It only has one bath so coordination is key if you are a big group. It was clean and in a quite zone.
Very good
Very good
Again a great stay in this pearl near the city centre! looking forward to come back. Thanks Giao!
Un grand merci à Vivian pour son accueil chaleureux! Une très bonne adresse !
Nice location,close to the center.Extreme care until we arrive at place,everything was as listed in the website.
El piso es muy cómodo y grande. Aunque su ubicación no es céntrica, es muy accesible para llegar a pie a todos lados. Muchad gracias por la hospitalidad!

La ubicación es perfecta para llegar desde el aeropuerto y a no más de 15 minutos andando al centro. La casa muy acogedora y limpia, y muy cómoda para un grupo de personas. Es como estar en casa! Muchas gracias por todo.

Our group of 9 had a great stay in PinPorto. The check-in was easy, quick, friendly and informative. Decent sized bedrooms for all, with a large communal area. The apartment was perfectly located for NOS Primavera (the festival bus stops right outside). PinPorto did just the job. Thanks all!
