Très bon acceuil, l'appartement est bien situé à une vingtaine de minutes à pied du centre ville. L'appartement est parfait pour des voyages en groupe.
Excelente hospitalidade e bastantes flexibilidade no check-in. Espaço limpo e cuidado.

The flat was lovely, and the images on here are very accurate. Being only 10 a minute walk from the centre made it was easy to get home in the evenings, and the mini market that is a 2 minute walk from the flat was handy at all hours of the day. The hosts are lovely and the recommendations we got on our first day were definitely worth following! I would highly recommend the stay!

Alina

We had a really great stay at this apartment! We were here with 6 Dutch girls and had everything we needed. There was enough space for all of us to eat and to sleep. Besides, the contact via (Hidden by Airbnb) worked perfect and we liked the recommendations of Vivian. It was around 10 minutes walking to the city center. We would recommend to stay here!

Very stylish, very quiet, lovely ! I totaly recommend this!! The host was very welcoming and gave us so many good restaurants and adresses !
The airbnb is clean and big we had a great time

Super accueil et réactivité des hôtes, appartement très propre et très bien équipé. Légèrement excentré mais en cas de fatigue, c'est seulement 4€ pour rentrer en uber à l'appartement depuis le centre ! Une seule chose : une seule salle de bain, il faut juste etre bien organisé quand on est nombreux.
Great localization right next to the city center. Very nice host.
A good walk to center of Porto, good communication from the host who also recommended some local places! Great for groups.

I recommend for all guests the PinPort’s place. The house, hostels and location are amazing. 
I really loved Porto city.
Wow, what a perfect place, great location and a lovely apartment. Great communication from the host too, thankyou!

Appartement très confortable et très bien placé. Très propre et bien agencé, parfaitement adapté pour 8 personnes. Facilités de stationnement gratuit dans le quartier. Toutes les visites peuvent etre faites à pied à partir de l'appartement.
Appartement super bien situé pour visiter porto.
Great location!
Hôte très réactif nous avons passé une excellente semaine. Literie et serviette de très bonne qualité

We had a wonderful time! 
4 of us travelled to Porto and we all had more than enough space. We each had a bedroom which was fantastic and there were two toilets. 
The place was incredibly clean and all the beds were very comfortable. 
There were also great tips in the memo book and the host was always quick to reply. 
We would recommend this place! 
Ps, it’s not right downtown but it’s about a 10-15 minute walk.

Espaço muito bom, bem localizado, atende bem grupos com muitas pessoas, pois o apartamento é bastante espaçoso, mobiliado com muito bom gosto! Roupas de cama /banho limpos e de boa qualidade. Indico com segurança!!
Pretty good location. A lot of beds... Just a small note, if you have small kids, don't let them in the balcony. It's a little dangerous... But we just locked the doors and had a wonderful time.
Super appartement super emplacement super ville!

Excellent appartement pour les groupes. Très propre avec des lits confortables. Il y a une petite marche pour rejoindre l'hypercentre mais en passant par une rue commerçante c'est très agréable. Vivian nous a très bien accueilli et indiqué ses préférences pour les spécialités locales.
Our stay in Porto was special because of our hosts and hospitality. Plenty of room and beds as well as accommodations. We will come stay again. Many thanks and warmest regards, Markelle
Very welcoming, good neighborhood and very close to center by foot, the host were very welcoming and gave us good reviews and tips of points of interest. The place was very clean as well
Très bon rapport qualité prix
cool place
Good location, a 10-15 minutes walk to the city center. Nice host, good communication and helpful tips for sightseeing and tours. For five people it was really spacious.
Bel appartement a part la salle de bain et des rangements dans 3 chambres.

We visited Porto to run the Marathon and to expore the city for some days. The communication with our hostess Vivian was outstanding, she responded very quickly to all of our questions and provided us with some nice information about the local shops and restaurants. The location is also great, not to far from the city centre and a lot of small supermarkets and really good restaurants within walking distance. In most of the bedrooms, you can however hear quite a lot of noice coming from the street and from the old elevator inside the appartement. But in overall, we had a very pleasant stay.
It was just amazing! The apartment is beautiful and very good located and we got some great Tips!

Gut gelegene Unterkunft, die sich ideal für eine größere Reisegruppe anbietet. Die Wohnung bietet viel  Platz und einen großer Balkon, sowie eine ausreichende Küche. Lediglich ein Badezimmer ist etwas knapp für mehrere Leute, es gibt allerdings noch ein weiteres WC. Die Unterkunft ist leider sehr hellhörig.
Hem estat 4 nits. 6 adults i 2 nens. L'espai es molt comfortable i tal i com es veu en les fotografies. La rebuda  comunicació amb la Vivian ha estat molt fàcil i amable. Moltes gràcies per a tot!

Good welcom and good availability. We spent a good Christmas week and we enjoyed a lot visiting Porto, walking in its typical streets and on the beach. But the rua da Boavista is noisy and it is a pity that most of the rooms are on the street side.

Apartamento que cumplia todas nuestras expectativas. Quizás en las fotos parece un poco más grande de lo que es pero es muy bonito y acogedor, Lo unico que faltaba era una ducha más ya que eramos diez personas y aunque habia dos lavabos solo teniamos una ducha. Por lo demás perfecto.
amazing
Excellent service and a comfortable flat. the beds were the best we slept in throughout Portugal. Thanks!
Amazing place. Totally recommendable!! Great location!

one of the best place to stay. our train was very late and because of that we had to call the host at around midnight. she didn't even complaint once and welcomed us amazingly. even in midnight, she explained about the places to be visiting nearby.... she was very polite.... I strongly recommend this place to stay....
Très bon séjour dans cet appartement à Porto !
Es justo lo que indica en el anuncio, hemos estado muy cómodo y la casera ha sido muy amable

Everything was clean und the apartment was big enough for our group of 7. Vivian is a great host! 100 % 
recommendable
Apartamento confortável, perto do centro histórico, de fácil acesso, ótimo  custo benefício, os anfitriões super atenciosos, adoramos a experiência, super indico.

Our stay at PinPortos was nice. Check-in with Vivian was great, communication went smooth and she told us all about the city, things to do and see and where to find supermarkets and such. The apartment had pretty much all the things you'd need for a couple of days. Our only big concern was that it was cold. The apartment is poorly insulated and equipped with a couple of electric heaters and a gas heater. The electric heaters however made the lights and electricity fall out, so we didn't use those, the gas heater was fine. We bought some hot water bottles and slippers, and luckily the there were tons of blankets in the apartment to use. But it is something to keep in mind if you're there during winter. Other than that, we really enjoyed our stay, thanks for having us :)
La casa cumplía las expectativas, limpia y ordenada, camas comodas. La casera muy atenta, nos dio recomendaciones sobre la ciudad.

name: Charming Home 10 Mins from Beach
space: The House: "The Sudan" is a gorgeous 1880 Victorian Semi, with beautiful floorboards throughout and high, decorative ceilings and plenty of privacy. Relax in our elegantly furnished spacious lounge room with beautiful bay windows. It has a 32 inch flat screen TV. There is a separate dining room and a fully-equipped kitchen.  Outside, there is a leafy back garden with a covered courtyard and gas Barbeque, perfect for alfresco dining. A modern bathroom with shower and bath plus heated flooring. It has three bedrooms. Bedroom 1 and Bedroom 2 both have Queen beds, while the third bedroom contains a Double bed. Luxurious hotel quality linen provided. There is also a spare fold out bed if required. Location: Only a 10 minute walk to Coogee beach, this beautiful place is only 50 meters from the buzz of "The Spot" at Randwick, which is famous for fantastic cafes and restaurants, including a great tapas bar. There is also a heritage cinema and a local heritage pub. We are also located very clos
description: The House: "The Sudan" is a gorgeous 1880 Victorian Semi, with beautiful floorboards throughout and high, decorative ceilings and plenty of privacy. Relax in our elegantly furnished spacious lounge room with beautiful bay windows. It has a 32 inch flat screen TV. There is a separate dining room and a fully-equipped kitchen.  Outside, there is a leafy back garden with a covered courtyard and gas Barbeque, perfect for alfresco dining. A modern bathroom with shower and bath plus heated flooring. It has three bedrooms. Bedroom 1 and Bedroom 2 both have Queen beds, while the third bedroom contains a Double bed. Luxurious hotel quality linen provided. There is also a spare fold out bed if required. Location: Only a 10 minute walk to Coogee beach, this beautiful place is only 50 meters from the buzz of "The Spot" at Randwick, which is famous for fantastic cafes and restaurants, including a great tapas bar. There is also a heritage cinema and a local heritage pub. We are also located very clos
neighborhood_overview: The location is very central. The house is in the middle a great selection of restaurants and cafes and Coogee Beach is only a 10 minute stroll down the hill. The house is in a very quiet street but around the corner from a great Heritage Pub and heritage cinema.
transit: Plenty of buses leave from 50 meters away and they head to the city, and local beaches such as Bondi, Coogee and Maroubra. There are also buses to shopping centers at Bondi Junction.
access: You will have the house to yourself.
interaction: We don't live in the house, but I communicate with guests via email or phone as we are only a few minutes away.

host.host_about: I love travelling so it's great to have so many travelers stay at our guest house. I look forward to welcoming you! And I hope you really enjoy your stay in Sydney.

reviews.comments: Wow! What a lovely house! Freshly painted, beautiful old floorboards, ( they are floorboards so a bit squeaky!)  clean minimalist furnishings, and in a QUIET area of Randwick about 17 minutes from the airport, and straight down Coogee Bay Rd  to the ocean. You have the SPOT around the corner, and the best Japanese, on Belmore Rd ( TEN). Best of all there is a garage, because parking in this area is a big problem.  Thank you so much Simone and John for your kindness in accommodating us. We had a lovely stay.

The Sudan is an excellent house,very well maintained and in a great (Website hidden by Airbnb) is exactly as described and  Simone ensured the booking arrangements were conducted entirely smoothly. Garage parking is a major bonus although the location is well served by Taxis and frequent buses both to Central and the beaches. At the end of the road is The Spot, with great Cafe's and Bars. We look forward to our next visit ! Alan and family

Simone was extremely helpful and thoughtful.
It was so good to not have to move out until Sunday afternoon when our flights left.
The accommodation was very clean and spacious just perfect for the 4 of us plus a baby. It was so good to have a garage too.
It was perfect location to walk to bus transport and cafes and supermarkets.
We would stay there again.

I had a wonderful stay at Simone's place. The house was clean, modern and stocked with everything we could need, right down to cling wrap and oil and gas for the BBQ. 

The location was fantastic, a lovely walk to the beach and Simone was fantastic in all her correspondences.

This is a great holiday house to stay in.  We are a family of 5 and were very comfortable in the space.  The flat was nice and clean with all the kitchen essentials, plenty of seating and an outside area which we used a lot too.  The area is great, the shops are close enough to walk to and just up the road there are lots of different restaurants and a fantastic patisserie.  The bus services are excellent with buses every few minutes into the city and down to Coogee Beach... Look out for the family funday sunday tickets at $2.50 per person for full day travel on buses, trains and ferries (if you are travelling with kids)!

The Soudan is beautiful and homey, just like the photos. We felt right at home especially in this wet weather we've had in Sydney! The rooms however did get a bit humid due to the weather but we are not too worried about it. All in all It was a wonderful stay. Thank you Simone.

Myself and two friends stayed at Simone's lovely home in Randwick for a little under a week.  The home was extremely neat and clean and she was kind enough to leave us a bottle of wine in the fridge too!  It was absolutely perfect for our needs during our trip since we had a car, it made transportation easy however, I saw many bus stops in the area.  We had a really fantastic time exploring Sydney and having Simone's home as our base.  It was a quiet and peaceful neighborhood and the home was really charming :)

We stayed at Simones beautiful home for nine days in March. The home is exactly as described with everything supplied. The location is perfect with bars and restaurants literally around the corner. Coogee beach and Bondi Junction(for the shoppers) are just a few minutes drive away. There were five adults and an infant staying and Simone also supplied a cot and high chair for the baby.
We enjoyed our stay immensely and would highly recommend Simones home to anyone staying in Sydney.

We had a great stay at Simone's house in Randwick. The house is very spacious and well appointed and well stocked with necessities. It is located very close to shops, cafés, and public transport, but in a quiet street. The house also has a large outdoor entertainment area which unfortunately we didn't get a chance to use. Highly recommended!

We stayed in Simone's house for a week (two couples with two babies) and had a wonderful time! The house is lovely - beautiful linen and towels provided; well appointed kitchen & laundry, and even a lovely little courtyard with outdoor setting! We loved it and can't recommend it enough. Also so impressed by the professional cleaning service who left the house in pristine condition for us.
The reservation was canceled 101 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay at Simone's home was everything we expected and more. Great location, within walking distance from shops and beaches. Short cab ride to Allianz football stadium and Randwick race course which was perfect for our weekend plans. The house was very comfortable and had everything you would need. The off street parking was an added bonus. Would definitely recommend Simone house to anyone wishing to stay in the Randwick area. I know we will be back!

We had a great week at Simone's place in Randwick. The home was very clean, well equipped with everything we needed and exactly as presented in the photos. Public transport and shops were very convenient and it was helpful to have a garage as street parking was a little difficult on some days. Simone was very responsive and we would love to stay here again when in Sydney.
Beautiful house, well-appointed and deceptively spacious. So close to the shops.

What a perfect stay in Sydney. The "Sudan" is ideal for staying near UNSW, the beautiful Coogee Beach and close to transportation into Sydney. The semi is spacious, comfortable and well appointed. The back area is a bonus for barbecuing, and relaxing in the open-air.

This was a lovely property in a great location. Simone had left a comprehensive welcome folder and a bottle of wine, which was a nice touch. The property is just around the corner from The Spot which has a great range of restaurants and cafes.

The house was clean, comfortable and all that I expected. It is a charming house. It was perfect for our stay. The neighborhood is quiet and pleasant and close to cafes. I would be happy to stay again.

We stayed in the Sudan for a week and the place was lovely. It is in a great location that is 5 minutes walking distance to a shopping mall with a supermarket etc, and only 2 minutes walk to the bus stop and to local bars and restaurants.

The house itself is nice with everything there that you would need. The garage is really handy, albeit with a bit maneuvering required to get the car in if you have a longer car due to the back lane being fairly narrow.

We didn't have any interaction with Simone but she left us a bottle of wine, some milk and a great welcome pack with guides to house, shop, transport, etc., but everything was there so no interaction was required.
The property was in a great location, close to cafes, shops and transport.  It was quiet, clean and exactly as described on the site.  Would happily stay again.

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Simone's beautiful house. Very spacious, with everything you could possibly need. The house was spotlessly clean, beds extremely comfortable and provisions left for us in the fridge. Also very convenient to local shops and only a bus ride away from the city. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Our host made us feel very welcome. There was a bottle of wine in the fridge and a carton of milk, to get us started. The apartment located in a fabulous area...2 minute walk to a street full of great restaurants, short walk to Coogee Beach and to UNSW. The apartment is on the older side...very funky and extremely clean! Beds were comfortable and kitchen had everything we needed. There are laundry facilities as well which was very helpful for us. Only negative is that only one window had a screen on it so it didn't feel comfortable to us to sleep with them open, both from a bug angle and a safety angle since the front bedroom is right on the street. There is an air conditioner in the living room but it does not work well so it was a bit warm in the apartment. Other than that, a great experience!!

Simone's house was the perfect location for our purpose in attending a conference nearby at the uni. It was bright and airy with plenty of room for 3 of us. It was also quite handy having the extra toilet outside!
The pantry is well stocked with the basics like salt, pepper, oil etc and there was a lovely bottle of wine in the fridge on arrival.
The nights were a little cool and although we found an extra blanket, we all felt we could have done with a quilt/doona as well.  The WIFI seemed a little slow...perhaps it was shaped at that time? but i found i needed to use my own personal hot spot on my phone rather than wait for the house wifi to load up.
The location is great as is also close to Coogee beach and The Spot offering a great variety of restaurants.

Communication with Simone was very easy and quick.  She is a very responsive host.  The property was lovely and very clean.  It was a little warm as there was only an air conditioner in the lounge (which didn't work brilliantly).  The kitchen had everything you could need.  The beds were comfortable and the lounge too.  Fly/security screens on the windows would have been useful - there were a few mosquitos around which we couldn't stop entering the house if we wanted to keep the windows open.  The location is brilliant - so close to the shops/cafes etc.  Yet, the house itself is on a quiet road and we didn't hear any noises at night.  Perfect!

Simone's house was perfect. She was a flexible and excellent host. Super close to town and extensive bus network. I almost didn't want to leave a great review in case other people want to book the place and I can't book it next time I'm in town! Thanks!
Simone's house is very well located, spacious and very nice. My grandchildren enjoyed the outside sun-sheltered space.

A perfect home in an ideal location, very convenient to UNSW where we were attending a conference. House was exactly as described, and had been well maintained and cleaned. The bedrooms are large and beds comfy. Courtyard is perfect for a relaxed BBQ, with outdoor couches and fresh herbs. We will definitely stay here again when next in town.

What a wonderful house to stay in - it is as described 3 excellent bedrooms with very comfortable beds, plenty of space for us to sit in the lounge, dining room or the lovely outdoor shaded area. Simone responded quickly to all enquiries & organisiational points with the key being very easy to access. We really appreciated the extra unexpected touches i.e. complimentary wine  & milk in the fridge as well as sauces etc in the pantry. The location is fabulous .... not a long walk to the beach or the wedding we attended, it is a quiet neighbourhood with shops nearby. The house is spotlessly clean. Having a garage was very important so we could leave the car there for the duration. Thank you Simone we'd love to come back.
Great location, comfortable home

Simone was always very quick, informative and welcoming with her communications, on arrival to her beautiful home there was even a bottle of wine to greet us. The home is large, fresh, light filled and located in a quiet centrally located street. It is perfect for three couples or a family (as was our case). It was especially great to have the car port out the back as we had driven from Melbourne and wanted to use the car to get around whilst we were there. Having said that, there are a number of different bus stops all within 2mins walk from the home, there's also many cafe's, bars and a cinema all in close walking distance. We very much enjoyed our stay thanks Simone!

Simone thank you for your wonderful house for us to stay! We loved it! It was perfect, warm and welcoming. 
Our family loved it too. The little outdoor garden was beautiful for our champagne breakfast. 
The house is large, nice big bedrooms and plenty of space. 

We would highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay. Very cleAn, very comfortable
很好的房东,周边生活很方便,房子很干净,很有本地生活的味道,推荐!

The house is perfect for our stay. It's 10mins walking distance to UNSW and a few mins away from supermarket and eateries. The house and rooms are very clean and our stay made pleasant with the amenities provided in the house like washer and dryer, a big kitchen with a separate dining and living room.

We had a great stay at Simone's lovely house. It is very spacious, the bedrooms all a nice size, living room, breakfast room and kitchen all easy to be in. The area out the back is also a nice little escape. We appreciated the complimentary bottle of wine and the equipment in the kitchen, which we used each night. The location is very handy, 20 minute walk to to Coogee beach for a swim, or bus stops so close for a ride into the city. Simone was also very flexible with the check in and the check out which made things very easy for us. So all good!
This place is amazing! Simone is a great host, replying very quickly to my queries. The house is very welcoming, comfortable and perfectly located. Would love to stay here again!

We had a great time at Simone's place despite the gloomy weather. The house was the perfect size for 4 adults and 2 kids and nicely furnished. Very handy to have the garage for parking with all the rain we had. Also enjoyed the complimentary bottle of wine, nice touch! Very handy to local coffee shops and we loved the Creperie just around the corner!

Simone has been a wonderful and attentive host. Her property was brilliant for our family stay in Sydney. The location offers great strategic access to both Coogee / Randwick life and transport links to city centre attractions. A great place to stay to base yourself in Sydney.
This was our second stay in this property and we enjoyed it as much as our first stay. The property is lovely and very conveniently located.
A beautifully furnished place in close proximity to the SCH.

A wonderful warm and inviting home with lots of amenities in it to make our stay comfortable. A great location with lots of shops, cafes, restaurants and public transport nearby.
This is an excellent base for visiting the local area as well as having great access to the city.
The outdoor area with BBQ is brilliant and we just wish we had more time to enjoy the house.
Comfortable home in convenient location.  Simone was very helpful organising everything quickly and promptly communicating.

Simone's place was fantastic. Great location close to shops and cute cafes and restaurants. My sister had stayed here before and it didn't disappoint.. Thanks Simone for offering your place to us, we will definitely be staying here again whenever we are in Sydney for a couple of days or more. Highly recommended!
Great house Simone! My family stayed here while my wedding was on and it was so close to Randwick shops. The house itself was very beautiful and had everything we needed.

We didn't meet Simone but she was very responsive to messages and made it easy to get into the house. The house was pleasant and close to shops and the beach. Simone had left a bottle of wine in the fridge, which we appreciated!  A nice place to stay in the beach suburb of Coogee.
Great house to stay in, very conveniently located with bus stop two mins away, beds very comfy and was provided with everything we needed! Hidden gem!
Great place to stay, close to the shops, city and all the attractions around Sydney..

Simone is very friendly and willing to help. The Sudan with great location that can easily find, about 20min drive to the city, 5min drive to Googee Bay, 8 min drive to Bongdi beach. You can also take the bus by 2min walk to bus station; the bus 377,373 can take you to city of Sydney. The house has plenty of space, conformable bedding and various sauces in kitchen. Outdoor couches and garage are also handy. The wifi is very helpful let us get in touch with friends. Thanks again for the bottle of wine. We enjoyed the stay and thanks Simone.
Emily
Wonderful location with many cafes and shopping around each corner. Easy 10-15min walk to Coogee beach. The home is well laid out with good mingling areas and an outdoor patio with BBQ.

We were absolutely delighted with Simone's gorgeous house and enjoyed our stay. The house is a stones throw from cafes and restaurants at the Spot in Randwick. It was great to have the garage for undercover parking and also the outdoor area. I would highly recommend this place to anyone rating in Randwick. Simone was excellent to deal with responded to straight away when we had a small problem with one of the taps. Her husband was round to fix it ten minutes after we spoke.

Beautiful home on a nice quiet street just around the corner from shops and restaurants. Walking distance to Coogee beach. The garage is very useful and the house itself is lovely. Thanks for the bottle of wine cooling on arrival, it was a really nice stay. Zero complaints!

This property is just a short stroll to shops, cafes and restaurants and just a 10 min walk to the beach.  It is roomy and very comfortable with Simone, our host, thinking of the little things that make your stay more pleasant.

We had a great weekend here. The house has lots of room and is equiped with everything you need. Fantastic location - 2 mins walk to cafes, restaurants, movie theatre and a delicious French patisserie. And the main shops of Randwick just up the road. We would recommend to couples, families, groups of friends, travellers or anyone looking for a great pad in the Randwick area.

Perfect spot for my family. My partner was working at the hospital, while we had easy access to transport, food etc.  
Comfy Clean Perfect

We had a short stayed in Simone beautiful family friendly home. The house is very warm and cosy central to surrounding coffee shops and petrol station. We all enjoyed our stay and will be booking our next trip soon with Simone.

A lovely, spacious, and neat home with all the accommodations a family of four would want, one half block from the bus line going right into Sydney CBD and Central Station. The host was communicative and helped us make arrangements as needed during our stay. We highly recommend this rental unit.
Very well presented, quiet, great spot
Enjoyed our stay tremendously.  Very clean, well appointed and convenient. Would come. Ack to stay for sure....
Great place, thanks

The Soudan is a beautiful house that is decorated well. It is close to The Spot and a supermarket. Instructions on how to enter were perfect. We were provided a later check out which was greatly appreciated. We all left agreeing that we would return to this cottage in the future.

Very comfy home. 
Great location for restaurants, and walking distance to the beach.
The house is gorgeous and spacious. Great location close to shops and cafes! So beautiful, really enjoyed our stay.
Great location and very clean and tidy - probably ready for a kitchen and bathroom upgrade!
Great location, spacious rooms, rear lane garage and friendly neighbourhood. Nice and solid with polished floors but a little musty so keep those windows open!

The house is in a fantastic location, with the best resturaunts in Randwick just at the end of the street. And yet it is very quiet with no street noise even when sleeping in the front bedroom. The house was comfortable and would be a great base to explore Sydney. The small touches like milk, wine and basic cooking needs were lovely.
Beautiful home in a very convenient location! Will definitely come back!
It’s a very wonderful place to be!!!
Great location in a lovely character house with plenty of space.

The Sudan is a lovely place to stay, a good amount of space, and all the facilities you need to make a home away from home. A perfect location if you need to spend time at the Prince of Wales hospital (as we did). The Spot (around the corner) has great eat out options, and supermarkets and other shops are all in walking distance.
Simone is a great host, responsive and very easy to connect with - we felt welcome and Simone accommodated extensions to our stay easily.
Thanks for making a hard time for us easier Simone!

Simone’s place was fantastic! We stayed for 4 nights with 3 adults, two babies and two kids and there was plenty of room for all of us. Simone left us a portacot and high chair, both of which were very useful. 
The location was fantastic, we walked, and on occasion took the bus, to the beach. And the proximity to The Spot was great for dinners and early breakfast at the bakery!
We would definitely stay here again.
Perfect location. Warm home. Comfortable beds. Everything you could wish for in a place away from home.
We had a lovely 2 night stay at Simone’s house, within walking distance to shops and a lovely outside area and convenient lock up garage as limited parking out front.
Great location - central to everything without being noisy. Well maintained and safe for family and pooch.
Heel leuk huisje, voldoende dichtbij centrum Sydney en stranden. Winkels op wandelafstand.

Simone’s house was perfect for a few days in Sydney. Randwick is a great area if you need to get in and out of the city easily and the beach is an easy walk from the house. 

Simone makes everything a breeze with great communication and clear instruction. The house was clean and well laid out for a small family and a few friends. Will definitely rebook in the future!

Great house- it had everything we needed for a great stay with two kids, the car park was wonderfully handy, perfect location for all Randwick and Coogee had to offer, quiet, clean, comfortable! We would definitely stay again if visiting Sydney.
Perfect home, perfect location, perfect hosts resulting in the most magical, memorable family moments ... we loved every minute of our 4 day stay at this beautiful Randwick home!!!
Simone’s place was beautiful, extremely convenient and her hospitality made our stay very easy. Thank you so much for hosting us!

The house is charming and cosy and in the most perfect area! An easy 2min walk up to cafes and bus stop and about 5mins walk to Randwick central. Simone was a great host and very responsive, she even had a lovely welcome present that was enjoyed sitting out the back in the sun! We will definitely be back

Simones place was very well maintained and clean. It was perfect for our young family and the kids loved the place. Simones place was so close to the local shops and beach which made staying there very convenient.

This house is a perfect base to explore Sydney. It has three comfortable bedrooms, with a dining room and living area to enjoy. 

We enjoyed the space and the proximity to Coogee beach and other areas. It is a quiet area with lovely gardens. We enjoyed the smell of the jasmine flowers coming from the front garden.

We did not have time to enjoy the outside area, but can imagine that it can be a great spot to have a barbecue.

A great find in Randwick!

We thoroughly enjoyed the premises for our family weddings weekend at centennial park. The close proximity to the shops allowed us ease to services. The garage parking was invaluable. We enjoyed the facilities like sufficient glassware when we hosted refreshments for our families between church and reception. Very charming house! Thank you
Peaceful, spotless and close to everything

Great house, great location. Just perfect couldn't have asked for anything better. Everything was just right. The special touches were just a nice highlight. Will definitely come back. Would recommend everyone to stay here, just has such a nice feel you won't want to leave!!
Comfortable and well located, had a great stay.

Simone's home is perfect - well appointed, excellent location with great shopping, food and transport just around the corner.  Easy 20 minute bus trip to the center of the city, 5 minutes to Coogee beach. The house was the ideal base for our family when attending our son's wedding.  We were able to have friends over between wedding and reception as there were plenty of glasses, cups etc and a beautiful lounge and dining area to entertain in. As it was  quite hot the air conditioning and fans in all bedrooms were most welcome. Communication with Simone was effortless and we greatly appreciated the special touches and care shown for our special circumstances..

name: Elegant flat in romantic old city
summary: Stylish modern flat in the heart of the trendy Born area. Easy access to the metro, the central business area and the city's best park. Perfect for business people, students or others visiting Barcelona for one month or longer
space: Located in the trendy Born area of Barcelona's old city, the flat is modern and recently renovated. The living, dining, and kitchen area are all in one large, elegant loft-style space. Behind this large main room is the bedroom and a large bathroom. The open-style kitchen is large and modern. The flat is fully equipped with all amenities needed for your comfortable stay in Barcelona - fully equipped kitchen, washer, high speed internet, etc.  The flat has one bedroom with a queen size bed and a comfortable double size air mattress can be placed in the main room for guests who need more than one bed.  The Born area is one of the most elegant and popular areas of Barcelona. Part of the old city, it has beautiful architecture, pedestrian only cobble stone streets and romantic street lights at night time. The Born and neighboring Gothic area are full of great restaurants, cafes, bars and live music venues. Barcelona's most popular park, Parc Ciutadella, is only a 5 minute walk away.
description: Stylish modern flat in the heart of the trendy Born area. Easy access to the metro, the central business area and the city's best park. Perfect for business people, students or others visiting Barcelona for one month or longer Located in the trendy Born area of Barcelona's old city, the flat is modern and recently renovated. The living, dining, and kitchen area are all in one large, elegant loft-style space. Behind this large main room is the bedroom and a large bathroom. The open-style kitchen is large and modern. The flat is fully equipped with all amenities needed for your comfortable stay in Barcelona - fully equipped kitchen, washer, high speed internet, etc.  The flat has one bedroom with a queen size bed and a comfortable double size air mattress can be placed in the main room for guests who need more than one bed.  The Born area is one of the most elegant and popular areas of Barcelona. Part of the old city, it has beautiful architecture, pedestrian only cobble stone streets an
transit: The flat is in easy walking distance to Jaume I metro station (3 minutes) Gothic area (5 min.), Placa Catalunya (10 min.), the Picasso Museum (1 min.) and other major sites. The beach is one metro stop away or a 15 min. walk.
house_rules: 1. No parties or other loud noise that may disturb the neighbors  2. To avoid problems with my neighbors, please do not tell them you are renting from me. If you interact with any of my neighbors, please tell them that you are a friend of mine visiting Barcelona.  3. No one other than the guests declared in the booking may enter the flat.  4. No smoking in the flat 5. No pets

host.host_about:
Hola from Spain! I'm Steve, an entrepreneur living in Barcelona. 

Travel and discovery are two of life's great pleasures. I've visited much of Europe, Asia and North and South America. Favorites destinations include Barcelona, Copenhagen, Stockholm, Berlin, Paris, San Francisco and Tokyo. 

In addition to traveling, I love music, art, film, and especially good food and wine. I'm an avid cook and host regular parties for friends and for a gourmet Meetup group I organize.

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments:
We had an excellent experience at Steve's flat and I would highly recommend it to anyone traveling to Barcelona. First, it's a beautiful flat and my girlfriend and I were extremely comfortable during our stay there. It has romanitc touches like high ceilings with Spanish style wooden beams and hard wood floors, but is recently rennovated with all the furnishings and ammenities one would expect in a 4 star hotel. 

Steve was a friendly and flexible host. He generously shared all his favorite local restaurants, cafes and bars and passed on insider tips about must see local sites and those that are overated. Our checkout was delayed by an hour or so by an urgent work matter I needed to take care of on our final day in Barcelona, and Steve was totally flexible in giving us extra time in the flat. 

Finally, you couldn't ask for a better neighborhood to stay in. Located in the heart of the stylish Born area, the flat is within walking distance to the beach, Placa Catalunya and many of the best sites in Barcelona.

Staying at Steve's place was a really great experience, and I can't wait to come back here again! Barcelona is one of my favourite cities, and Steve's flat is an amazing find right in the middle of one of the liveliest, most interesting neighbourhoods in the city. The flat is bright and well-designed, and I enjoyed cooking in the well-equipped kitchen. I had to do some work during this trip, so I was happy to have the fast wifi connection. 

It was also a pleasure interacting with Steve. He gave useful directions to his place and was very welcoming. I felt very at home and relaxed staying at his place. Looking forward to another visit!

Really cool place! Had a great stay here. The flat is beautiful and has all the essentials. Location is perfect too - right in the center of things, with great parks and museums and cafes all around. Highly recommend it.

Absolutely recommend Steve's apartment for your perfect trip to Barcelona.  It's situated in prime location, walking distance to most touristy places, but also perfect for seeing how the locals live.  Steve's communication was second to none, always ensuring we were comfortable, and helping with loads of excellent tips on places to eat.  The flat itself is lovely, very modern, clean and well equipped.  Guaranteed enjoyable stay at Steve's.

awesome location and layout of the apartment is great!
A week in this apartment was amazing! comfortable bedroom and a large bathroom! minute walk to the lovely cafes, and the Picasso Museum! to Barceloneta and Las Ramblas is only 7 minutes walk! The apartment is located in the friendly neighborhood of Barcelona! very convenient subway station, convenient to the airport.

We had a great stay at Steve's place! Located in the middle of El Born it's the perfect spot to enjoy Barcelona. Just a 15 minute walk to the beach, surrounded with some great bars and nice restaurants. Enjoy your stay!

If you love Barcelona, or have always dreamed of spending time there, this the place to stay.  As all the other reviews say its close to most of the sights, if not by foot metro is 2 min away. Born district, Gotic, la Rambla, plaza Reil are all  walking distance. 
My partner and I would spend a full day sight seeing then come back for short siesta and go back out refreshed ready for full night out. Right next door Rubi offers nice refreshing mojitos for 3.5 €, a great way to start the night!
The flat has all the amenities you need from kitchen to sound dock. Steve is very helpful for anything you might need. The only thing to call out is there is no AC and can be a bit hot in August. He does have a fan that helps a lot.
In terms of noise, there is some chatter from the people hanging out in the ally ways at night, but not too much to disturb your sleep.
It's an amazing place. I would go back again in a heartbeat.

Although we never met Steve, we had a great time at his apartment! Steve left us a note with all kinds of tips for restaurants/bike rentals etc. His assistent Wendell met us at the apartment and showed us Steve's place. There was also a bottle of wine especially for us! A great welcome!

The apartment was exactly as shown on the AirBNB pictures. It is on the second floor (approx. 40 stairs) and located in a very nice area, the heart of El Born. We never saw any neighbours. The apartment has no airconditioning, but a fan was available and sufficient.  The bathroom is big and Wendell gave us some clean towels. If you want to have a good home dinner, Steve has a great kitchen. 

We e-mailed Steve several time (for some scooter rental tips etc.) and he answered us within hours! 

Although you may find it a bit pricy for Barcelona AirBNB standards, you'll have a great time in a well-located, clean apartment with an excellent host!

Steve's apartment is right in the heart of the charming neighbourhood Born in Barcelona's old city, a perfect location for getting lost in the lovely narrow streets packed with beautiful boutiques and nice restaurants.
The apartment is spacious and very well equipped, especially the kitchen (you will even find lots of sticks if you fancy Japanese!) 
Steve was very kind and fast at answering our mails, even though he was out of town during our stay. We were received by his very friendly assistant Sara. 
Steve left both wine and drinking water for us in the apartment, and Sara came by with some sweets during the stay!

It was a great stay in a lovely flat in the middle of old town in Barcelona. Everything was prepared perfectly and there was a nice surprise waiting for us. Thank you very much Steve! Highly recommended.

Steve is a very friendly person! 
The apartment is well equipped, you can find everything you need, except hairdryer. I'm sure it is important to know for girls. 
Flat is located in the center of Barcelona and surrounded by bars and gallery's. You easily can get to any showplace in Barcelona from this apartment. It is not truth that the beach is near this place. 
Very strange that no one noticed that it is very noisy in this place. You hear everything what your neighbors do, and what is going on outside, so it is rather hard to relax and fall asleep.  
Anyway I recommend you to stay in this apartment!

My friend and I were staying at Steve's apartment for 10 days in July and it was just what doctor ordered )) the area is great, really for us who love to stay in old part of the city with nice little shops, Picasso museun is near, and bars to visit at night and in walking distance of the georgeous food markets and the cost. Interior of the flat is really elegant it has it's charm and you have all you need there. And if you want to go in some distant part of Barcelona you can take a metro which just in 4 minutes yo walk. Steve was responsive and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended

First of all i would like to thank Steve for his quick reply on our request to stay in his appartment. Steve was very helpfull and gave us loads of tips of nice things to do&see in barca. He recommended us some good places to eat and drink aswell and he was right, those places are worth to pay a visit, sip a cocktail of have breakfast/lunch/diner..

The location, the appartment nothin else but good!
The location is perfect in the center of barcelona, everything is just a little strawl or bikeride away. The appartment is great,nicely furnished, kitchen is fully equiped, bathroom big and most important its was very clean!!

We will definately come back , thank you Steve

I liked his place!! It was cozy and lovely! His assistant Florence was so kind and helpful! 

I had a really great time in Barcelona! Thank you!

The appartment was fully equiped and we found really everything that we needed. It was the perfect place to stay for us because everything we wanted to see, visit and do was just a few minutes walk away (cafes, sights, beach, restaurants, shops and much more). Thanks alot!

When you come to Barcelona, this is the place for you. Steve's flat was perfect in every aspect. The apartment was clean and spacious and very quite. As for the location, it was right in the center of the boutique district, which is a few steps away from the Picasso museum. Everywhere is walkable from here but if not the metro is right around the corner. If and when we come back to Barça this will be the first place I will look for.
Steve è molto preciso e disponibile,  la posizione della appartamento è ottima, pulito e silenzioso. Consigliato
Flat was great!  Very clean and obviously his own home. Perfect location in Borne district.
Great flat in a great area. Very spacious and plenty big enough for 3 guests. Griet and Steve were very helpful thanks for a great trip. Highly recommend this flat for the price and location.

Our experience at Steve's flat was wonderful! It's conveniently located  in the Born district, in between narrow, winding streets filled with shops and restaurants. We walked everywhere - Gothic district, Las Ramblas, the beach, Sagrada Familia, etc. The flat itself was very clean, spacious, and comfortable. Steve and his assistant Griet were extremely kind and helpful from start to finish. Upon making a reservation, Steve provided us with the best directions from the airport and an extensive list of area recommendations. We really enjoyed El Xampanet and Sagardi for tapas and Milk for a delicious brunch. We highly recommend this flat to anyone traveling to Barcelona, and plan to stay here again during our next visit!

Excellent stay!! Absolutely beautiful appartment, bigger than seen in the pictures! The location couldn't be better-directly in the heart of El Born. We didnt get to meet Steve but had a very nice welcomegift from him:-) Griet, his assistant is an adorable girl! Altogether definitely going back!

The apt was exquisite and in the best location of barcelona! The restaurant recommendations were great! Steve was very hospitable and his assistant helped us get arpund very easy! They even gave us a sweet bottle of wine, Would completely come back to that apt again! Thank u
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A fantastic flat in a fantastic location! Steve was a helpful, considerate and most attentive host and ensured everything from check-in to check-out went smoothly. The flat is located in what we considered to be unequivocally the best area in Barcelona; el Born has a great vibe with great bars, restaurants and other points of interest within walking distance. Thanks Steve!

Para quem quer conhecer Barcelona, o Born é a melhor opção. E o apartamento de Steve é perfeito, pela localização, perto ou de fácil acesso a todos os pontos de interesse, bastante confortável, com tudo que precisamos e lindo. A atenção de Steve para conosco nos encantou. Ele deixou sugestões de bares, restaurantes, pontos turístico e juntamente com sua assistente Griet nos acolheu com total atenção, antes de chegarmos à Barcelona, durante toda a nossa estadia e depois. O fato de o apartamento estar no segundo andar, não atrapalha em nada, pois quem conhece a Europa sabe que prédios antigos não dispõem de elevador. A rua é agradável e o flat fica juntinho do Rubi, um agradável pub, que tem o moçambicano Simonal (homenagem a um músico brasileiro) para uma agradável conversa sobre música. A rua é bastante silenciosa e, para quem ficar no flat, sugiro passar algumas horas na pequena varanda, comtemplando a movimentação, a qualquer hora, de preferência tomando um bom vinho. Recomendo Barcelona, o Born, e o apartamento do Steve.

The apartment was just as we expected.  It was such a convenient location, with most things within walking distance.  Steve left us a map with suggested restaurants in the neighborhood, which was so helpful.  It was a fantastic neighborhood and experience!

The size of apartment, the location and very attentive hosts (thanks Steve and Isabella!!) were perfect. I was traveling with my teenage son, so two big size beds, comfortable space with kitchen & washing machine were must for our 10 days stay in Barcelona. The apartment is exactly what you looked here in photos, just note it on the third floor and no lift. We especially enjoyed the location in charming old historical neighbourhood and everything(shops, F&B outlets, tourist attractions etc) is near and the area feels quite safe even quite late at night. Since we stayed during July and the temparture was quite high(28-30c), it was a bit tough without aircon and one fan in the apartment. We kept windows wide opened every nights. It was pleasant stay overall, I'll be back when I travel down to Barcelona next time during milder seasons.

Everything worked perfectly in this really nice flat. Great welcoming even though our flight was delayed and Steve was a great and kind host. Most amazing area that I will stay in again for sure, hopefully in Steves flat! Truly recommend this one.

Steve's flat at the old city of Barcelona is as beautiful as shown on the pictures. The whole trip was fully organized - the contact with Steve was friendly, clear and easy. His friendly assistant Isabelle warmly welcomed us at the flat - explained everything very well and was always there for specific questions or if we needed help. The view from the small balcony made us feel the real Barcelona and we enjoyed it every day. The quarter is pretty artistic and is very well situated to visit the beach by walk or all many main points in bcn. A big thank you to Steve and Isabelle for the best airbnb experience so far.

Perfect location, very tastefully decorated, bright and spacious apartment. Can easily accommodate 4 guests.We had all we needed , could use washing machine, iron, fully equipped kitchen. Totally recommended!

Everything was good! Friendly and uncomplocated contact. Really nice area with bars and everything what you need..Close to the beach, las ramblas and placa catalunyia. The apartment is in
a very good and nice area located! If i would come back to barca, I would take the same apartment. Good price and nice apartment and a helpful host. Thank you.
Fantastically located apartment with really friendly hosts! Close to the beach and lots of lovely restaurants and bars. Really clean apartment well equipped with everything we needed! Thanks so much!

We loved our stay at Steves flat! It was in the ideal location for us, so central. The flat itself was exactly as described and really clean with everything you could possibly need. The communication with Steve before was really easy, he gave us loads of information and the guides/maps in the apartment were so useful. Both Steve and Isabelle were really helpful during our stay. It was great to get tips from someone who knew the city so well. I would recommend this apartment to anyone coming to barcelona. We will definitely stay here when we next come. Thanks Steve!!

Steve by emails and  Isabelle in person made us feel completely welcome. She met us late at night, was charming and had a  bottle of wine, useful maps marking shops, tapas bars, bakeries etc close by, waiting for us. The apartment is in a fantastic location in a charming old part of Barcelona, very close to the Picasso Museum, within walking distance of  sites, good restaurants, museums and the ocean. It is comfortable and attractive, if quite simply furnished, although it is better for a couple. The second bed is an airbed in the sittingroom so you have to go through the bedroom to reach the bathroom. When the airbed didn't keep fully inflated at night, they replaced it punctually and politely - and left us another bottle of wine! We loved the place and its setting and had a delightful time, even if the neighbours were a bit noisy at times!

We had a great experience staying at Steve's flat. The communication before was great. Isabelle, Steve's assistant, met us at the flat and was very welcoming and was available to contact throughout our trip. The flat is in a great location, close to shops, bars, restaurants and a great food market. We would definitely stay again!
The location is absolutely perfect, and Steve and Isabelle are more than helpful. Great place to stay in Barcelona.

The apartment was perfectly located in the heart of El Born, and Steve and Isabelle were very good at communication and making us feel welcome. There is a good shower, wifi, and a comfortable bed, and it was very peaceful and quiet. I'd highly recommend staying here, everything is within easy reach, with glorious Barcelona on your doorstep.

Communication with Steve and his assistant, Isabelle, was very easy. The apartment's a bit tricky to find the first time even with Steve's help, but it's in a great location and convenient to everything. It looks exactly like the photos provided and was very clean. We'd certainly stay there again our next trip to Barcelona.
Great apartment. Beautiful zone and very nice flat.

Steve's assistant Isabelle was very welcoming and helpful. The flat is conveniently located and very central with lots of bars and cafes in the immediate neighborhood. This means that it can get a little loud at night, especially on the weekend. This being an old house also means that you can hear what is going on in the other flats. We were three people sharing so that one person has to sleep in the living room on an air mattress which is not the most comfortable. We did have a good time there, and it looks just like it was described.

Ja, die Schlüsselübergabe hat prima geklappt und ich wurde auch sehr nett und freundlich in die Nutzungsmöglichkeiten des voll ausgestatteten schönen Appartements eingeführt. Die Lage ist absolut Zentral und trotzdem sehr ruhig. Würde es jederzeit wieder buchen.

The flat was very nice, and in an excellent location, close to many restaurants, shops, and bars.  Steve was extremely helpful before-hand in getting me information about how to get around, and what to do around the area (with excellent suggestions), which made checking in very easy.

The flat was just as described / seen in the pictures, comfortable, and clean (with the sole exception of the shower mat, which is about ready to be replaced).

We had a great time in our stay here.  Thanks Steve!

End of November we paid a visit to wonderful Barcelona and LIVED in Stevs’s apartment. Everything went smooth like a clock, from booking the flat, via very useful tips and recommendation from Steve prior to arrival, to a very warm welcome by Isabelle (who surprised us by speaking Swedish besides perfect English and Spanish). Both Steve and Isabell were extremely helpful throughout the week and although we enjoyed a lot of the city, every time we came back to the apartment it was like coming HOME. Location is PERFECT with walking distance to many of the “must-sees” in B. Beds, furniture, kitchen etc was as described and met our expectations. I really recommend this apartment!

The apartment exceeded expectation. The neighbourhood was fantastic and it was super quite at night time as it was down a side street off two main streets. The hosts were very attentive and helpful recommending lots of restaurants and different places to visit. The bathroom was bigger than it looks in the pics and the shower pressure was great. The bed was a good comfy size and the bookshelf had lots of info on Barcelona. High speed wifi and overall a fantastic experience. I would recommend anyone to stay here. Also the balcony has a great view of the church. In the morning you could here other people above walking around but this is to be expected in flats. Thank-you for the stay it was great.
Steve was a great host-- communiciative, easy to get a hold of, and helpful.
Cool place in a great part of the Born. Lots of indie shops, quaint bars and tasty restaurants nearby.
Steve and his assistant Isabel did a great job all through the stay and helped in anyway possible, even when I managed to mess up the booking and had to extend.

Steve was away, but both he and Isabelle were responsive to any questions or concerns I had. The map of recommended places in El Born and the bottle of wine were particularly appreciated amenities! The flat was lovely and spacious, and I loved the area. Check out the organic bakery just around the corner!

Our stay at Steve's place was very good. The flat is located in a fantastic area and has many bars, restaurants, etc. located in easy walking distance. The space was clean and as it is described, nothing to complain about.

Also, we got in very late and our connecting flight was delayed, yet Isabelle was there smiling when we arrived (finally). We were contacted by Steve and Isabelle several times, just to check in on us and see how things were going.

Highly recommend!

Appartement un peu sombre mais idéalement placé et les hôtes sont accueillants et arrangeants ! Rien a redire super voyage ! 
:) 
Merci Steeve et Isabelle

Great flat in excellent location. Everything in walking distance. Communication with Steve's assistant was great at all times. 
Everything went super smooth. Would definitely book again.

Nous avons été reçu par une amie de Steve qui a été d'une grande disponibilité tout en étant très discrète, merci!
L'appartement confortable est vraiment très bien situé, proche du centre, proche de la mer, et très calme sur la rue piétonne.
Steve nous a donné des adresses, un plan du quartier personnalisé que nous avons utilisé avec grande satisfaction.
Merci Steve d'avoir contribué à la réussite de notre séjour.
El departamento cumplió con todas las expectativas, con una ubicación excelente, Steve e Isabelle muy atentos y felxibles con los horarios.

Perfect Location, charming & typical appartment, everything went smooth with Steve and Isabelle, they were very helpful. 
Highly recommended.

As other reviewers will tell you, this is a well-furnished, picturesque flat in a prime location, with lovingly attentive and communicative hosts.  Although it's in the heart of El Born, you won't worry about nightlife noise because it's on a quiet street.  You could technically sleep four, but it's best for a couple because you must enter the bathroom through the bedroom.  I found the bed, which is a bit on the firmer side, exceptionally comfortable. Having a washer is convenient, and although there's no dryer, there is a large drying rack that I used.  Overall, I loved the apartment and will try to stay there again when I return.

We really enjoyed our stay in Steve's flat - it was in a fantastic location, with lots of restaurants, bars and attractions nearby, such as the Picasso museum, and within very comfortable walking distance to the city centre and the Gothic quarter. The flat was clean and comfortable, and Steve and his assistant Isabelle were both extremely helpful. I would definitely recommend this flat to friends and family! Thanks for a great stay!

Our stay at Steve's was excellent. The flat was clean, comfortable, perfectly located, and well equipped. Steve and his assistant Isabelle were both attentive and excellent helps throughout our stay. I would recommend Steve's place and can't wait to come back!

WE had a fantastic week staying in Steve's beautiful apartment in the heart of El Borne. The lovely Isabelle made us feel very welcome upon arrival, and both Steve and Isabelle couldn't help us enough. Steve even shared a wonderful map of the local area so we could discover all the best tapas bars, bakeries and shops in the nearby area. 

This location is perfect for a quick walk to the beach, or to the sights dotted around the city. 

I would definitely recommend this accommodation to a friend.
It was a very good experience in Barcelona. It was a very nice apartment.

Steve's apartment is bigger than it appears in the photos, which was nice.  We really enjoyed the location of this apartment. It is near many restaurants, boutiques, and the park/zoo is about 5 minutes away (walking distance). Isabelle, Steve's assistant, was helpful, and very accommodating  about our flight being delayed by several hours.  My husband and I don't drink, but there was a bottle of wine for us when we arrived.  I should also mention that the apartment is located near nightlife, but is very quiet after 10pm-even on a weekend!  That was a bonus!

A very good place to visit Barcelona.
I recommand everyone.
The apart is nice and Steve really care about us.
Thanks a lot

Très bel appartement qui correspond aux photos proposées. Il est idéalement placé. 
L'accueil a été très bon et Steve a été très disponible pour l'ensemble de nos besoins. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour.

Steve made sure we had all the information possible before and on arrival. The welcome bottle of wine was a nice gesture. Great location, right in the middle of the Born neighborhood. Please be aware that one of the beds is actually an air mattress in the living room.

To echo the other positive reviews, Steve was very helpful and responsive to our messages, despite not being present. He and his assistant(s) were also great in helping with a smooth check-in. The location of the flat was great, just a few blocks from a metro stop. It was decently quiet, being on a traffic-free pedestrian street, with a little noise from the bar/restaurant below and next door.  

The Barcelona travel books were very helpful and inspired a day trip into La Costa Brava for us. The included printer was also very useful and easy to use for printing tickets and confirmations. The kitchen was modern and well stocked with cookware and coffee makers. The water could get quite hot and never ran out for baths. The washer was also great to have for our week-long stay, which helped us pack relatively light. Quite spacious for two, and decent for four, though the bathroom is only accessibly through the bedroom. Overall, definitely recommended!
Steve was a great host,  although he was out of town left detailed instructions for the house and surrounding areas.  great apartment brilliant location

Steve's flat was the best we stayed during our Europe trip. It was so spacious and comfortable. Steve's communication was great and had an assistant, Isabelle, who was so helpful and kind. One the best things about the flat is the location. It's near the harbor and in one of the hippest neighborhoods of Barcelona. Highly recommended and hope to be back one day.

The flat is perfectly located in the district „El Born“ which is basically the city center, above a nice bar called „Ruby Bar“ and is easy to find. The metro station and a supermarket for groceries are available in five walking minutes only, so is the harbour and the „Arc de Triomf“. The museum of Picasso is just around the corner.

In the apartment there is one double bed and an extra air matrace for another two people. The kitchen is well equipped with all the necessary things you need for cooking and even includes a microwave and a dish washer. Also there is a washing mashine that you can feel free to use. The style and decoration make it a very comfortable place to stay during holidays.

We spent one week in this beautiful flat. Unfortunately, we didn’t meet Steven in person, but he prepared our stay very well (for example by a map he did himself that includes information about all important places in the neighbourhood) and sent his friend Isabelle to give us the keys and help us with the first orientation in Barcelona. Isabelle was available for our questions during all of our stay.

We really enjoyed the time we got to spend in Steven’s flat and highly recommend it to everyone looking for a nice place to stay in the city center.

Хозяин-супер! Предоставил всю необходимую информацию. Всегда был на связи, отвечал на все вопросы в кратчайшее время. Предоставил множество советов. Бутылка вина-прекрасный подарок, очень милый жест. 
Квартира чистая, удобная. Расположение очень удобное, близко ко всем необходимым точкам города, местам для посещений. 
Great host! Pleasure to communicate, very supportive! The present was left by Steve (bottle of wine). 
The flat is very good, clean, expectations were met. The location is great! Extremely positive feelings after visiting Steve flat!
Loved this neighborhood! The apartment was very comfortable and Steve was always available in case we needed anything.  We enjoyed our stay so much.

Steve was very helpful in providing information beforehand, and both Isabelle and Steve were very helpful and responsive throughout our stay. When I pointed out that a fan was broken it was replaced with a new one on the same day. We also were late in giving our arrival arrangements but Isabelle was extremely flexible and accommodating in making sure she was there to meet us.
The flat has tasteful and simple decoration, making good use of the space so it feels uncrowded, the wifi is fast.
The location is wonderful, on a pedestrian street right in the heart of Barcelona with plenty of life all around (bars, restaurants, museums). This can make it a little noisy at night so this place may not be ideal for light sleepers, but that is just what comes with living in the vibrant heart of the old city.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a really nice stay in Steve’s apartment. Steve and his friend Isabelle were super friendly and always available to answer my questions and helped immediately. 
The apartment was very clean and was located very central.
Everything was great about this apartment and Steve and Isabelle were really polite and easy to communicate with. Recommended!

Steve's apartment is perfectly located in the middle of a lovely neighbourhood in Born. Despite being very central, the street is relatively quiet and I had no issues of noise whatsoever. The place is really spacious and has everything from comfortable bed to clean bathroom and well equipped kitchen. Steve and Isabelle were really nice and easy to communicate with and they were happy to help me with all the small issues I had. I can highly recommend this place to anyone wishing to stay in central Barcelona.

name: Lovely apartment in Central
summary: Located in Sheung Wan within walking distance of Central, Mid-levels, LKF and Soho. Close to the Sheung Wan MTR.  One bedroom with a double bed.  Balcony Kitchen Bathroom with large shower Washer  Wifi TV and Apple TV
description: Located in Sheung Wan within walking distance of Central, Mid-levels, LKF and Soho. Close to the Sheung Wan MTR.  One bedroom with a double bed.  Balcony Kitchen Bathroom with large shower Washer  Wifi TV and Apple TV Security code Collect key
access: Security code Collect key
house_rules: Absolutely no smoking please

host.host_location: Central And Western District, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Great little place with a cute view of the city and a very comfortable se t of furnishings!

Location was perfect! House is very close to Shanghuan so it was very convenience to go to MacauHongkong Ferry terminal. The water and kitchen stuff were prepared. 
The host, catherine was also very nice and took care us well before we got HK and after got HK. 
The things that the guest need to prepare were hair dryer and shampoo things.

The description was very accurate.  The location is ideal and you're a few minute walk from Central and LKF.  It is a cozy apartment, but was perfect for 2 nights in Hong Kong.  We are big people and it was a little tight, but that is to be expected.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Clear and prompt communication, flexible timings and easy to deal with. Place is great, exactly as advertised.
Clean room,convenient transportation,great choose!

Catherine is very nice. Her place was really cozy, with a good taste of ornaments and decorations, and with all the facilities well-equipped. Location is great; A-Few-minutes-walking distance to the metro; Wandering around the community is also an excellent choice. Just one more reminder that the hot water was not stable enough. But still highly recommended.
Nice and cosy place , will stay again for next visit Hong Kong .
Excellent location, great flat. Would definitely come back next time I'm in HK!
the host is nice, the place is clean and its closes to the sheung wan mtr station. I would recommend it.

Location is perfect! Easy to go everywhere you want in Central Hong Kong on foot!
Just 200m from MTR Sheung Wan station and just 1 station from Airport Express.
The building is new and safe. It has 2 lifts, mini gym and door man.
Apartment is cozy - everything was as described. It's completely quiet and we weren't disturbed by any street or neighbor noise. Normal Hong Kong apt. size - there was enough space for us 2.
It has everything for staying - full kitchen, washing  machine and comfortable bed. Big windows and balcony to see nice view of Hong Kong.

Catherine was a great host, easy to communicate.
We definitely recommend Catherine's place to future guests. Good value for its location and space!

name: 3 1/2  sur le Plateau !
space: Situé dans un des quartiers les plus prisés de Montréal,  cette location vous permettra de découvrir les charmes de la ville en vous déplaçant facilement via les transports en commun. Une station de Bixi se trouve au coin de la rue et le Métro et l'autobus sont facilement accessibles. Une carte du réseau de métro et des parcours d'autobus seront d'ailleurs laissés à votre disposition.  De style moderne, cette appartement a été entièrement rénové. Petit balcon avant et arrière qui donne sur une rue paisible et une ruelle verte très conviviale.  À proximité de tous les services (épicerie, pharmacie, station de bixi, autobus, métro, laundromat) vous êtes aussi à un coin de rue de la rue Mont-Royal, parfaite pour sortir, un bon resto ou pour une journée magasinage.  Vous vous trouverez aussi à quelques minutes des plus beaux parcs de la ville!! On retrouve une piscine au parc Baldwin. Le parc Lafontaine est à proximité. De plus, nous vous conseillons de consulter les sites du Nightlife Mon
description: Situé dans un des quartiers les plus prisés de Montréal,  cette location vous permettra de découvrir les charmes de la ville en vous déplaçant facilement via les transports en commun. Une station de Bixi se trouve au coin de la rue et le Métro et l'autobus sont facilement accessibles. Une carte du réseau de métro et des parcours d'autobus seront d'ailleurs laissés à votre disposition.  De style moderne, cette appartement a été entièrement rénové. Petit balcon avant et arrière qui donne sur une rue paisible et une ruelle verte très conviviale.  À proximité de tous les services (épicerie, pharmacie, station de bixi, autobus, métro, laundromat) vous êtes aussi à un coin de rue de la rue Mont-Royal, parfaite pour sortir, un bon resto ou pour une journée magasinage.  Vous vous trouverez aussi à quelques minutes des plus beaux parcs de la ville!! On retrouve une piscine au parc Baldwin. Le parc Lafontaine est à proximité. De plus, nous vous conseillons de consulter les sites du Nightlife Mon
neighborhood_overview: Notre quartier est reconnu pour ces nombreux petits cafés, restos, bars, boutiques et magnifiques parcs. Plusieurs rues animées se trouvent à proximité, ce qui offre un bel équilibre avec la quiétude de notre rue. Le bonheur.
house_rules: Ce logement est non-fumeur, incluant cannabis. Nous demandons le respect des autres locataires et des voisins par une bonne utilisation des espaces communs et en évitant tout activité pouvant causer du bruit passé 21H.  Il s’agit d’un milieu de vie où des familles résident. Tous les produits d'entretient et produits essentiels (nettoyants, papier hygiénique, sel, poivre, huile d'olive...) vous sont fournis à votre arrivée, par contre nous demandons aux locataires de remplacer les produits utilisés. Ce logement vous est prêté en excellente conditions et nous souhaitons le retrouver ainsi..

host.host_about:
Début trentaine, moi et mon conjoint sommes toujours prêts pour des vacances... Air bnb nous aura permis de voyager, visiter dans le confort et avec la chance de vivre un peu le beat local de chacune de nos destinations... Nous souhaitons faire vivre ce même plaisir à quiconque souhaite vivre l'expérience Montréalaise!!!

Au plaisir !

reviews.comments:
J'ai passé six semaines dans l'appartement de Marie-Helene et il était parfait ! Il est tres bien situé, a deux pas de l'avenue mont-royal, avec un supermarché a moins de 5 minutes a pied. L'arret Frontenac est a 15 minutes a pied, et l'arret Mont Royal a env. 20 minutes (plus vite si vous prenez le bus qui part de l'avenue Mont-Royal). L'appartement lui-meme était exactement comme dans les photos et était tres propre et bien équipé, il y avait tout ce qu'il fallait. Marie-Helene est disponible et tres réactive en cas de probleme ou de conseils. La prochaine fois que j'aurai besoin de m'héberger a Montréal, je n'hésiterai pas a contacter Marie-Helene :)

I spent six weeks in Marie-Helene's apartment and it was perfect! It was very well located, a short distance from Mont-Royal Avenue, with a supermarket less than 5 minutes walk away. Frontenac metro was 15 minutes away, and Mont-Royal metro was about 20 minutes away (faster if you took the bus that leaves from Mont-Royal avenue). The apartment itself was exactly as shown in the photos and was very clean and well-equipped, it had everything I needed. Marie-Helene was quick to respond to any problems or questions. The next time I need somewhere to stay in Montréal, I won't hesitate to contact Marie-Helene :)

Once again. Marie was excellent. She provided everything I needed and goes above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable. This was my second time at her place and would not hesitate to stay again. Thank you Marie.

We had a great stay in Marie Helene's flat. The flat is well located close to Plateau Mont-Royal, with plenty of shops and many restaurants nearby, and a 2 minute walk to the bus stop(or 30 minute walk to the Metro station). The flat itself is well-equipped with everything you could need for an extended stay, and tastefully decorated. Marie Helene was very friendly and helpful, and provided us with useful books on the city. We would definitely stay here again next time we visit Montreal.

We had a very nice time at Marie-Hélène's appartement. The location is perfect as it is situated in the middle of the Plateau Mont-Royal and not more than 20min from the city centre and all the important sights of Montréal! The appartement is clean, modern and tastefully decorated. Fancy restaurants and shops are located just neraby the very frequented Avenue du Mont Royal. 
We totaly would go again!

I had a wonderful time staying here! The location is wonderful, its close to shops and transport and i found it a breeze getting places while living there. The apartment is lovely too, all modern and new with everything you need. Unfortunately i did not get to meet Marie-Hélène but she was only a text or call away if i needed anything and her brother who lives upstairs introduced himself and was there if anything was needed. 

Overall if this is your first visit to Montréal or you come here often, this place come highly recommended.

O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado, todo renovado e equipado.
Fica a pouco mais de uma quadrada Av Mont-Royal, avenida central do Plateau. Tem supermercado e ônibus perto e boa conexão com o metrô.
O apartamento tem tudo. Cozinha equipada mesmo para quem gosta de cozinhar. 
Não tem secadora mas realmente não precisa, pois as roupas secam muito rápido no varal.
Não conheci Marie-Helene, apenas seu irmão. Sempre foram atenciosos e responderam ao que precisei. Me deixaram bastante à vontade durante todo o período.
Totalmente recomendo!!!

J'ai passé 4 mois chez Marie-Hélène. Tout c'est très bien passé l'appartement est conforme a la description, décoré avec goût et calme. Le quartier est très agréable avec beaucoup de boutiques et de magasins d'alimentation, le parc lafontaine,bon restaurants... En revanche l'appartement est a 20-25min a pied du métro mont-royal je recommande de prendre le bus 97 pour s'y rendre. Marie-Hélène et son frère (qui habite au dessus) se sont montrés très accueillants et obligeants. 
Je recommande fortement cet appartement et y retournerais avec plaisir!

Super endroit, très cosy, bien équipé et avec un charmant petit balcon arrière.
Bien situé dans le Plateau, beaucoup de commerces à proximité, beaucoup de bus pour se rendre au métro/centre-ville. 
Marie est très accueillante et réactive. Nous recommandons ce bnb à tout ce qui veulent découvrir Montreal et en même temps résider dans un endroit calme !

J'ai été tres bien acceuilli.
La description du logement est parfaitement exacte.
Super séjour merci beaucoup A Marie-Helene pour tout, super appartement!  A très vite :)

We enjoyed a month at Marie's apartment. It was just as described, very clean and arranged with much attention on details and good taste. We found the necessary in the kitchen. 
The area is very nice and quiet but also close to a lot of things to do (park, pool, shopping, bars, restaurants and groceries stores).

We stayed there six weeks and found that the location of the apartment was perfect with a big varieties of coffee shops, restaurants and bars nearby. The Baldwin parc is great for picnics.
The apartment is the same as in the pictures and did not disappoint.
