L'appartement de Marie-Hélène est très agréable, parfaitement situé sur le Plateau, spacieux et bien équipé. Les alentours du quartier sont calmes, mais à deux pas de l'appart on se trouve sur l'Avenue du Mont-Royal, une des rues les plus "buzzing" de la ville.
On peut facilement se sentir chez-soi dans l'appart et je vais certainement revenir ici pour mon prochain séjour à Montréal!

Nous sommes restés 6 mois à l'appartement, quartier très calme et familial, à 3 minutes à pieds du supermarché et de l'arrêt de bus, station de métro facilement accessible à pieds si vous aimez marcher un peu (15/20 minutes, ou 5 minutes en bus). Pour les sportifs, le gym du plateau est à moins de 10 minutes à pieds ;)

I thoroughly enjoyed my month staying at the apartment.  It was so quiet, cozy, and secure.  I was surprised to find a nearly new front load washer.  It made it very convenient as I didn't travel with a lot of extra clothes.  The apartment is well located close to many stores and restaurants.  The apartment is supplied with lots of dishes and utensils to cook your own meals.  There's plenty of room to have guests stay on the pull out couch. Several bus lines easily connect to Metro in a matter of minutes. I'd recommend that if you don't have a car, pay for a one month Opus card.  I'd stay in the apartment again!  Many thanks!

Logement très fonctionnel, propre, et idéalement situé.

Perfect appartment, clean and very well situated.
Highly recommended
Logement calme et bien équipé à proximité des commerces, restaurants et transports en commun. Excellent accueil.
Logement impeccable et bien situé.  Quartier tranquille et sympathique.  Belle expérience de vie Montréalaise

The apartment was very nice and well equipped - ideal for a longer stay. Also the neighborhood on the plateau is great - nice and friendly people and lots of nice shops, boutiques and cafes/restaurant at Avenue du Mont-Royal. 
We also appreciated the many parks arounds, the bixi stations and the comfortable connections nearby with STM.
Appartement dans un quartier calme,proche des commerces et des transports.

name: Conforto e comodidade a uma quadra da praia
summary: Very cozy and functional apartment in Copacabana, just a corner from Copacabana's beach. In a walkable distance of restaurants, bars, tourist attractions, markets, bike rental, etc. Also very close to subway Cardeal Arcoverde and bus stops. In the heart of Rio!  High standard cleaning service. Comfortable bed, with high quality linen, bedspread and pillows. Soft towels. Information and tips about the city is provided by the host.  We negotiate discount for long term periods.
space: The apartment is located in one of best spots in Rio: Copacabana. It is just one corner from the beach. It is a cozy apartment, perfect for couples that want to be close to most of Rio´s attractions. And also for those who just want to relax and chill at the beaches.
description: Very cozy and functional apartment in Copacabana, just a corner from Copacabana's beach. In a walkable distance of restaurants, bars, tourist attractions, markets, bike rental, etc. Also very close to subway Cardeal Arcoverde and bus stops. In the heart of Rio!  High standard cleaning service. Comfortable bed, with high quality linen, bedspread and pillows. Soft towels. Information and tips about the city is provided by the host.  We negotiate discount for long term periods. The apartment is located in one of best spots in Rio: Copacabana. It is just one corner from the beach. It is a cozy apartment, perfect for couples that want to be close to most of Rio´s attractions. And also for those who just want to relax and chill at the beaches. The apartment will be entirely yours. Comfortable bedroom, cozy living room, functional  bathroom and fully equipped kitchen. The guests can make contact so as to receive tips or if they have any doubts and concerns about the apartment or the city. You
neighborhood_overview: Rio´s craziness and beauty can be seen and felt in Copacabana better than anywhere else! You are going to delight yourselves in this wonderful mess. :)
notes: The building has 24/7 doormen service.
transit: -The apartment is located quite near subway station Cardeal Arcoverde. So you can go to several places, including Maracanã stadium (subway Maracanã) and Barra da Tijuca (integrated subway + bus). -In the building block you can find buses to Pão de Açúcar (Sugar loaf) and Corcovado. It will take from 15 to 30 minutes to reach those places to reach the attractions.  -Public transportation: from both airports and bus station you can go to the apartment in a special bus numbered 2018. You just have to go down on Copacabana Palace Hotel stop at the beach.
access: The apartment will be entirely yours. Comfortable bedroom, cozy living room, functional  bathroom and fully equipped kitchen.
interaction: The guests can make contact so as to receive tips or if they have any doubts and concerns about the apartment or the city. You can take a look at the apartament´s Guide here or ask me for tips anytime by mobile or e-mail.
house_rules: We expect you to have fun in Rio and just treat the flat as if it was your own.  Please: -Do not make noise after 10 pm. This is a building rule; -Respect neighbors and staff. -Be careful with electrical equipment that might be one when you leave the apartment. Specially air conditioning and electrical shower.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I am a geographer and I am passionate about travelling. Specially into nature sites, so as to know new trails and paths. I have been in lots of countries - over 30 - and I would like to know even more.

Most of my life I have lived in Rio, so I always have tips of what is best to do in town. Plus, I also lived in Portugal for studies and I loved living this experience in Europe.

I administrate apartments for rent in Rio for 3 years now. And it has been a pleasure getting to know so many people. I assumed this task because I love to present our beautiful city to visitors. 

My goal is to make sure the guests have everything they need in our apartments, therefore they can have an amazing travel experience in Rio. So we provide clean, safe and high quality environment in our apartments. 

And, of course, I am able to help as much as you need.

If you would like to know a bit more about us and the city. Please, access our (Hidden by Airbnb) @entretropicos and check tips about Rio. 

Welcome to Rio and have a pleasant stay! :)

Rafaela

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Really nice 2/3 persons appartment! Nice host (gives good sightseeing tips), very clean, nice atmosphere, safe and very complete equiped (tv, music installation, WiFi, good functioning and well equiped kitchen and bathroom. Best of it all: the location. The appartment is literally around the corner of Copacabana beach. Good restaurants nearby and public transportation located in front of the appartment. Good price for quality. We were here for NYE but decided to extend our stay with 1 week. We really recommend this appartment.

I really enjoyed my stay here.  Its a great location close to the beach and all of the key  necessities (grocery stores, restaurants, etc.).  Plus Rafaela was the perfect host providing me with a map for all of the key sites, water in the fridge, and everything to make my stay all that much better.  I had a great time and would definitely recommend staying here.

I would like to thank Rafaela  for the great help and information she provided tu us since the first day.Great value for money and very well located.1Block away from Coppa Cabana beach.Very well connected with subway ,buses and supermarkets.The apartment is clean and  tidy with all the amenities.We felt like home since the beginning.I definitely recommend it for longer stay during the year and not only for the Carnaval Time.We will come back for sure at some point very soon.Keep up with the good work. Amazing Host.

A nossa estadia na apê da Rafaela foi fantástica. Foi a primeira vez que utilizamos o aplicativo e a experiência não poderia ter sido melhor. Muito bem localizado o apartamento tem uma excelente estrutura, além de ser muito limpo e agradável. Tivemos um pequeno contra tempo com nossos celulares na cidade do Rio de Janeiro e de forma extremamente solicita e prestativa a Rafaela nos emprestou seu notebook particular. Foi uma atitude extremamente proativa e de muita consideração. Nossa nota para a estadia e para esta querida anfitriã é 10 porque não conseguimos dar nota mil!! Muito obrigado por tudo e das próximas vezes no Rio já temos endereço certo para ficar. Um beijo grande Gustavo e Doris

Excelente recepção, muito simpática e atenciosa. Ficou em contato durante a estadia auxiliando em todos os aspectos mesmo que não relacionados ao Ap. 

ap funcional. bem equipado. recomendo
Great location and price! Easy access to subway or bus (literally on door step) and copacabana beach Is just around the corner. Building is safe. Rafaela  is super sweet as well. Highly recommend!

A Rafaela sempre é muito atenciosa e educada. Além de sempre estar disposta a ajudar caso precise de alguma coisa.
O apto é exatamente como demonstra nas fotos. Sem surpresas. Funcional!!
Adoramos a estadia e com certeza voltaremos.

Todo fue tal cual lo esperábamos, o mejor!!! Rafaela es una gran anfitriona!! Súper servicial, generosa, atenta...nos ayudó y oriento en todo aquello que le pediamos. Una crack!
El apartamento súper comodo y a la vuelta de la playa...! 
Frente, lineas de bus que te llevan a todos lados.
Nuestra 1era vez en Río fue preciso!!

Apartamento pratico, com tudo o que é necesario para uma boa estadia.... é muy comodo, tem tudo, maquina de lavar, productos para uma limpezinha rápida para quem vai muitos días, chuveiro elétrico, forno e fogao, geladeira grande espaçosa, cama confortavel, ou seja o ideal para uma excelente acomodaçao!  Fica uma quadra da Praia, perto do Metro, de supermercados, farmacia e de frente um ponto de ônibus e na praça pertinho dali ficam uns taxis parados, fora q passa taxi todo o tempo, ah e importante para quem vem de fora, logo ao lado tem varias casas de cambio! A comunicaçao com Rafaela foi excelente pois esteve sempre disponivel para solucionar qualquer duvida! Assim que super recomendado!!
Rafaela mejora de manera permanente el departamento. Tuvimos algunos inconvenientes con el aire acondicionado y ella nos compensó con una cena.

O apartamento é exatamente como mostram as fotos. A Rafaela foi muito atenciosa e flexível com os horários. Bem localizado, próximo ao metrô, restaurantes, bancos e farmácias. Apenas um quarteirão da praia. Super recomendo!

Our stay was simply awesome. The apartament is really close from the sea, and Rafaela is an excellent hostess. The place is cozy and functional with everything we needed for our stay. I strongly recommend!

Anfitriã excelente! 
Está cidade já é maravilhosa por si só, e além de tudo chegar em cantinho que pareça seu lar de origem não tem preço.
Todo cuidado desde entender minha necessidade de horários, toalhas, roupa de cama. Amei o lugar, casinha de bonecas! Quero muito voltar e curtir novamente este lar
O apartamento é limpo, bem organizado e bem localizado. Adorei!

Het appartement is brandschoon, heeft werkelijk alles wat je nodig hebt. Ook als je thuis een maaltijd klaar wilt maken, zijn er voldoende potten en pannen. Het ligt slechts één blok van het Copacabanastrand
Spent 10 days at Rafaela's place and loved every moment of it. The location is perfect!

A princípio ficaria 5 dias, acabei estendendo e ficando 10, excelente espaço, limpo, confortável, tem tudo o que precisa.
Mãe da Rafaela me recebeu com muita simpatia, Rafa excelente pessoa, sempre disposta a ajudar. Me senti em casa e com certeza voltarei!

name: Sunny and styled 71/2  in posh area
summary: Two spacious bedrooms in a large, sunny and trendy apartment located in the Outremont neighborhood.  Nice living room and dining area to ensure great memories. Just a few minutes’ walk from the metro station, great restaurants and cute cafes.
space: 1500 square feet, sunny well divided for privacy and great common areas.
description: Two spacious bedrooms in a large, sunny and trendy apartment located in the Outremont neighborhood.  Nice living room and dining area to ensure great memories. Just a few minutes’ walk from the metro station, great restaurants and cute cafes. 1500 square feet, sunny well divided for privacy and great common areas. It will be my pleasure to recommend restaurants and sight seeing activities during your stay in Montreal.
neighborhood_overview: Outremont est comme un petit village au coeur de Montréal.  Ce quartier (Website hidden by Airbnb) d'un charme unique tout en étant pas trop loin du centre-ville et collé sur le quartier plus trendy du Mile-End. Un quartier sympathique et où il fait bon de vivre.
transit: j
access: Appartement au complet
interaction: It will be my pleasure to recommend restaurants and sight seeing activities during your stay in Montreal.
house_rules: Please respect my cute place, keep it clean and be respectful.

reviews.comments: Zoë's place is absolutely gorgeous! Emaculately clean, light, and airy with trendy decor. The kitchen was perfect for preparing meals and the back porch provided a peaceful spot to snuggle up with tea and a good book. It is in a safe, gorgeous neighborhood with easy access to a bunch of shops, restaurants and the metro. This was my first stay in Montreal and it was the perfect home base for exploring such an awesome city. Zoë was the most gracious host! She suggested a bunch of must see/must do things and was even sweet enough to leave a hand-drawn map to guide me on my adventures. I will definitely be returning ASAP!

Zoe is a very sweet host. Prepared all items we need. Even more, prepared some fashion items which we never experienced in other landlord we lived in AirBnB condo, even in Paris condo. It's a great living experience in last 2 days. And the condo location is very convenient. Will definitely recommend for others who want to have a awesome family trip. Thanks, Zoe! Fairmount Bagel taste is good! :)

Zoe's apartment was immaculate and the photos represented it accurately. I really appreciated this because I'd just come from another AirBnb which was messy & super-lived in! Getting the keys was easy, and the neighborhood was okay. It's a safe, pretty, residential neighborhood, not at all touristy, which was great --  but there aren't a ton of restaurants & services right near by, so some might prefer to stay in a neighborhood with more cafes, etc. But the spaciousness & cleanliness of Zoe's very cute apartment were great. 

A couple of things to note: There is a long flight of stairs to the apartment (you enter the front door & then come to the flight of stairs once inside). This would be difficult for anyone with mobility issues, anyone dealing with a young child -- stroller, etc. -- or an elderly person with a cane or walker. 

And although the kitchen had brand-new stove, electric kettle, French press coffee pot, good selection of knives, it would have been wonderful to have a microwave. When you're in a city for only a night or two or three, it's really nice to be able to heat up take-out quickly, without having to bother with the oven!

The TV had Netflix on it & I watched  a movie one night, which was great, and the shower was wonderful!

But all in all, a great place to stay.
Zoe's place was just as amazing as everyone else says!  Comfy beds, beautiful views and a great pizza place right around (pendeli's pizza).  Book it today!

Zoe's apartment is adorable, thoughtfully furnished with a modern design. It was clean, and quite big, bigger than we expected--and with a dishwasher, washer/dryer in the basement, etc. It is walking distance to the French restaurants of Outremont, with their terrace seating, and lovely parks/a yummy ice cream parlor/several cafes (we loved Cafe Prague). A little longer walk (but definitely walkable, and we did it with a five-year-old in tow) is Mile End, with a hipster vibe, even more restaurants/bars/and the awesome Drawn and Quarterly bookshop.

Zoe was responsive and kind. Definitely recommended.

Zoe's place is beautiful.  I would love it if she could decorate our home flat! neighborhood is great, especially with kids: you are two short blocks from the pool and splash zone at Kennedy park.  you are a bit far to walk from the main resto and bar areas, but there is bixi at outrement metro next door so everything is an easy ride (esp. mile end).  would stay again.
All perfect! As described. Very recommendable.

Zoe was a fantastic host. She was extremely responsive and communicative, as well as very accommodating to our arrival and departure times. We had a fantastic stay at her place.

The neighborhood is safe and beautiful with easy transportation anywhere in the city. Metro Outremont is 5min away, and this apartment is off the main street, but 2mins away from major bus stops. It's also walking/biking distance to Bernard Street, and to the Mile End, where there are many restaurants, bars and coffee shops.

For future users, Zoe has recently renovated the dining and kitchen space, and it's so much more modern, open, and beautiful than the old photos still up. Our 2.5yr old son loved playing in this newly renovated space. 

We would definitely come back! We hope you love this apartment as much as we did!

Zoe was on point in terms of preparing in advance for my arrival, and it was so easy to figure out the logistics of entering the apartment. The apartment was very clean and beautifully styled. The neighbourhood is quiet, cute, and easily accessible - very close to a subway station.

The neighborhood was quiet and beautiful - lots of trees and very scenic overall, but still had a little pocket of good restaurants! The ride to downtown Montreal was not very far, so the location overall was convenient. 

Zoe was extremely communicative throughout the process, from pre-arrival to  during our stay. Her apartment is absolutely beautiful and SO spacious. The light is also gorgeous.

Appartement spacieux clair et vraiment bien placé (proche métro, bus...) dans quartier très agréable.
l'appartement est également très bien agencé et décoré.
Zoé est une hôte très disponible répondant à nos questions très rapidement et chaleureusement.
Ne pas hésiter si vous voulez séjourner dans cette belle ville de Montréal.

Zoe's apartment was fantastic for my husband and two little girls.  We very much enjoyed having a place that was so comfortable, spacious, and well designed away from home.  The kitchen and bathroom have been renovated since the pictures in the profile were taken and both were done very well.  Zoe's apartment is in a great location, near Bernard St., Miles End, and a short ride downtown.  When we come back to Montreal, we would definitely stay here again.

Zoe's place is stunning, much bigger than we expected and very comfortable with a new bathroom (great shower!) and a balcony as well. Outremont is a great little neighbourhood, the apartment is close to the metro, lots of good restaurants and bakeries nearby. I joked I should probably move to Montreal and rent from her permanently! Zoe was very helpful before our arrival, and is easy to get a hold of. I would certainly stay here again.

C est notre second séjour chez Zoé.
Comme la première fois, tout à été très bien ! L appartement est magnifique et très bien situé. Zoé est une hôte chaleureuse et disponible. 
N hésitez surtout pas, si vous venez à Montréal.

Appartement adorable, très agréable à vivre, dans un quartier paisible mais néanmoins pourvu de tous les commerces nécessaires. Le stationnement y est très aisé.
Zoé est une personne charmante, arrangeante, disponible, avec en outre  beaucoup de goût. Encore merci.
非常棒!犹太区,安全,安静,方便,远离旅游区的杂乱;房间非常大,干净整洁;布置精致有品味;床舒适｡值!

name: Cozy, 1 bedroom Brownstone Apt
summary: Beautiful lower level entire apartment with all amenities included. Own entry, laundry room, access to backyard and bar styled kitchen. Great for vacation, business trips and/or leisure. One bedroom, one bathroom gorgeous place available in amazing area close to all major train stations. *THIS APARTMENT HAS BEEN COMPLETELY RENOVATED*
space: A beautiful brownstone that has been in my family for years in the Crown Heights section of Brooklyn. Cozy, newly renovated apartment with all amenities included, even down to your favorite snacks, laundry detergent and fresh flowers on the dining room table:) Direct TV throughout the entire house with 800 channels, free wifi and cordless phone service.
description: Beautiful lower level entire apartment with all amenities included. Own entry, laundry room, access to backyard and bar styled kitchen. Great for vacation, business trips and/or leisure. One bedroom, one bathroom gorgeous place available in amazing area close to all major train stations. *THIS APARTMENT HAS BEEN COMPLETELY RENOVATED* A beautiful brownstone that has been in my family for years in the Crown Heights section of Brooklyn. Cozy, newly renovated apartment with all amenities included, even down to your favorite snacks, laundry detergent and fresh flowers on the dining room table:) Direct TV throughout the entire house with 800 channels, free wifi and cordless phone service. Guests will have access to backyard, allowed to bring pets. Cable, free wifi, food, private laundry, private entrance, etc. I have completely remodeled the lower level. Guests can feel free to contact me at any time and whatever they need I am always available. My family lives in the other two apartments so
neighborhood_overview: Excellent residential neighborhood. Close to all major train stations. Plenty of parking spaces right in front of home. Grocery store within walking distance and city bus directly across the street. Apartment has access to a beautiful backyard where guests are welcomed to use.
notes: Staying in this beautifully renovated apartment, you will receive all of the amenities as you would in a hotel: Fresh flowers Alcoholic beverages  Food / snacks Unlimited cable television channels Private backyard  Private entrance  Access Grill for BBQs  Free Wifi Very friendly hosts that make sure you are comfortable and happy the entire time Dessert / treats before and after your stay Thank you note with options for travel, upcoming events and neighborhood restaurants in the area!
transit: Close to all major train stations. 2,3,4 and 5 trains, within walking distance to stores, museums, and supermarkets. City bus is directly across the street and will take you downtown Brooklyn.
access: Guests will have access to backyard, allowed to bring pets. Cable, free wifi, food, private laundry, private entrance, etc. I have completely remodeled the lower level. Guests can feel free to contact me at any time and whatever they need I am always available.
interaction: My family lives in the other two apartments so we are always available if you need us! I respond within seconds to requests and inquiries. We will recommend great food in the area and events that are going on in and around the city and even available for a cup of coffee :) Our brownstone is less than 15 minutes from Manhattan by subway, 20 minutes driving. Local buses are right across the street. You will receive fresh flowers, snacks and your favorite drinks when you arrive :)
house_rules: We expect that the house is kept very nice, the same in which you entered it. Parties or gatherings are absolutely NOT allowed. Please do not plan to have a party in my home as we live in a residential area and will disturb the neighbors.  Thank you!!

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It was really wonderful! The apartment (and everything else) was just like described. There was everything we needed and more from the very start. The fridge was filled with water, orange juice, milk and even german beer. And there were snacks, cornflakes and a bottle of whine. We had access to the backyard with a grill. Once we made a request for a powerstrip / surge protector and the next day it was provided.
Ashley was such a very friendly and wonderful host! She was always available on the phone and answered my questions within approximately 15-30 minutes. She had a lot of suggestions for going out in Manhattan, etc.! It was such a great hospitality. If I ever be in New York again, I hope Ashley's apartment will be available.

Ashely and her daughter helped us feel welcome in many many ways. Quick responses about subways and delayed arrival, amazing variety of kitchen and household extras, flowers, & wine! The apartment was immaculate, the master bed wonderfully comfortable. The private Terrance garden allowed a family reunion. Overall Exceptional! My first choice on my next visit!

While I would not say that I am an Airbnb veteran, I have stayed in about six different rentals and this one was far and away our best experience.  I only wished that I had arranged our trip so that we could have stayed longer.  I don't think that you can find a more hospitable and gracious hostess than Ashley.  She proactively thought of every detail and was incredibly considerate before, during and after our short stay.  The apartment is absolutely lovely and every detail was lovingly considered.  The area is a lot of fun, and includes a real diversity of Brooklyn life.  It's a short walk to Prospect Park, including the botanical gardens, zoo, library and museums.  Eastern Blvd, designed by none other that Frederick Law Olmstead is a treasure and not even two blocks away.  One a 10 point scale, this rental rates an 11, and Ashley rates a 12!

I have stayed nine days at Ashley's apartment along with my family. This property is a great option in NYC, for sure! The apartment itself was exactly as described and shown in the pictures. When we arrived it was very clean and organized, in every detail. In the kitchen and bathroom had everything you could need and more! The bed and sofa-bed were very comfortable. The location is absolutely convinient, in a walking distance (1 block) to the 2 and 5 trains, which makes easy to reach any point of the city. We felt safe in the area, even late night. It is close to restaurants, market, bakery, pharmacy and more. Ashley is a gracious hostess and makes every attempt to make your trip a pleasurable one. She is very thoughtful to the guests and we contacted her several times during our stay. She always had the right answer or suggestion and quickly! She also  helped us a lot with our transfer to the airport on the last day. I highly recommend this property and this wonderful hostess!

Ashley was super hospitable and kind throughout our entire stay. If at any moment we needed anything, she was there to provide it for us. My girlfriend hadn't brought a hair dryer for example. Ashley was so awesome, she went ahead and picked one up for her before we even landed :). The place was clean and comfortable for us and we never really had any issues. Thanks again!

Ashley and dad are super hospitable hosts. It is lovely to be welcomed in person after a long flight with bottled water, juice, a variety of snacks and fruits. I requested for a small fan and got a brand new fan as well as a brand new air-cooler. The place is spacious and comfortable with almost everything you will need. With two subway stations within walking distance, this is probably the  best place to stay in Brooklyn.  Will want to stay here again if I come back to New York. Thank you for being such good hosts.

I stayed at the end of June traveling with my hubby for our wedding anniversary. Ashley exceeded our expectations by providing some groceries including cereal, eggs, fruit, milk, chocolates, a thank you card upon arrival as well as when leaving and stayed in constant contact with us. One morning, I pointed out that I needed a plastic spatula to avoid damaging the Teflon pan and Ashley immediately provided me with one. The apartment was more than enough room for the two of us. It smelled like a bouquet of flowers which reminds me of the bouquet of tulips (real) as a center piece on the dining table. I have officially out this apartment on my list for where we will stay whenever we are in Brooklyn if it is available. Our stay was truly a home away from home. Book this apartment through Airbnb if you plan to stay in Brooklyn! You will not regret it!

Me and my friends  really enjoyed our stay at Ashley's. She was the best hostess ever. Her place is as exactly how it is picture. Very clean and inviting. The communication was excellent. Anything we ask for it was Johnny on the spot. The location is perfect. The 2 train is right up the block gets you anywhere in New York City. I can't wait to come back.  Thanks to  Ashley and your Dad.   I feel as I have made a friend  for life.

Wonderful experience. The apartment is  exactly equal to photos and better.
I hope in close future to stay there again.
Thank you Ashley and her father .

The apartment was great, very cosy and comfortable. It has a very good kitchen and two comfortable beds and laundry. As for hostess, she's very cool. Thank her very much! When we had just come , the snacks and essential food for the breakfast was in the fridge. We love her ! Everything was great!

I recommend staying with Ashley if you're going to be in New York. Her place looks exactly how the pictures in her posting ad looks like. She and her dad were very prompt in responding whether it be an issue we had, to any questions we had or recommendations. The snacks and water she left were very nice of her considering the long haul for me and my kids. The washer and dryer were a big plus because I hate traveling back home with a lot of dirty clothes. The apartment was very spacious. Better than a hotel! She provides almost anything you'd need as if you were at home! The area seemed shady when I pulled up but very safe to walk, even at night with my kids. The subway train is literally right around the block from the apartment. The train closest to the apartment was just a short ride to any of the touristy spots you'd want to go to in NYC. I drove and parking was very easy to find. At night though, you might have to drive around a bit or park a block or two away. Your car is safe. Any questions or concerns - Ashley responds w/in seconds. You will not be disappointed. Ashley is awesome!
Ashley a été très disponible. Elle ne ménage pas ses efforts pour recevoir ses hôtes et avait vraiment tout préparé pour que l'on se sente "chez nous". C'était parfait.

Our experience at Ashley's place was just great ! We have been welcomed so well and the apartement is really convenient and great: you feel so comfy in it and Ashley is always available if you need something ! On top of that the place is located in a typical Brooklyn neighborhood and close from the subway straight to Manhattan downtown (20-25min). 
In conclusion my friends and I spent a great week in NYC at Ashley's apartement ! We definitely recommand it, for anyone who wants to visit NYC and stay in a calm neighborhood !

Ella es un amor y nos recibió muy bien! Estuvo atenta a nuestras necesidades y nos contestaba cualquier inquietud al instante. La casa realmente es muy cómoda, mucho más de lo que me esperaba. Es muy grande y esta muy bien equipada. Es para recomendar. La ubicación estaba genial a 1 cuadra del subway. Volvería a ir sin dudas!

This place is amazingly comfortable and convenient in terms of public transportation and restaurants. I would highly recommend it to others who need a safe and comfortable place to stay with amazing amenities.
Had a wonderful stay, no problems. Ashley was a great host.
Great little apartment. Close to subway and a bus stops right outside. Ashley is a lovely host who promptly answered any questions we had.
Ashley was a great host. Good, prompt communication. Her place was clean and well kept. I'll definitely consider staying here again.

Мы были приятно удивлены вазе со свежим букетом цветов. Не стоит упускать из внимания чистоплотность и опрятность хозяйки, а также предусмотрительность в мелочах.
Эшли, благодарим Вас за наше комфортное пребывание!

Ashley accommodated us at the very last minute and graciously allowed us to check in earlier than the usual time, which was greatly appreciated as we were arriving on a very early flight.
She also allowed us to check out when suited us. Her flexibility in this regard was a huge help and made our trip so much easier! Thank you!
The apartment was exactly as described, and really warm, cosy and welcoming.
She left fresh flowers, fruit, water, juice, eggs, milk and snacks for us. It was so great to have these supplies having only just arrived in New York.  
The flat felt very secure and was an easy block's walk to the subway station. The journey into Manhattan was a little longer than I'd anticipated, although as we spent all day outside exploring it didn't matter so much.
On the upside, there are loads of Uber cabs in the area and I can recommend using the Uberpool, which makes rides in Brooklyn really cheap :-)
The wifi was working impeccably so we had no problem booking a few taxis.
The flat was spotlessly clean and well provided for in terms of dishes, pots and pans. The laundry facilities were a huge bonus.
Ashley checked up on how we were regularly. We never met in person, which was a great pity, but we also valued the privacy she gave us.
I would 100% recommend staying at Ashley's place and would definitely come again.
Ideal para familias con chicos. La proximidad del transporte público, no tiene competencia.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nice neighborhood 
Host made it easy and convenient to occupy the house

The appartment is amazing! It is very confortable and spacious. It is very clean and Ashley is very friendly and she helped us in every momento. The subway stop it´s just three minutes on foot and it´s very quick to arrive to NY downtown. This is my second time in this appartment and I will repeat as soon as I can! =)

Ashley's cozy apartment is a great place to stay in Brooklyn! There are 2 train stations that are just walks away which will surely get you to all the popular spots. Ashley is easy to communicate with and flexible with check in and check out times which came in handy when our flight got delayed. I greatly recommend staying here, I had a great time at this apartment!
This place was very cozy and clean. We felt safe and it was close to the subway. I would definitely stay there again!!!
The lower level apartment was spacious and clean and had any amenities we needed (including a space heater for the cold winter nights). We really enjoyed our stay!

Amazing host. Already planning a trip for next July and staying in Ashley's apartment is the only option. She was very prompt, helpful and accommodating.  100% recommendation.  Close to subway and bus!

As someone who threw a party in this apartment, Ashley was very friendly and understanding. She didn't complain about anything and responds quickly to every question and is more than willing to help with anything you need. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful and her apartment is beautiful, spacious and a great stay! I loved it, I love her energy and I would definitely stay again :)

The apartment is perfectly located and very well furnished. We really enjoyed our stay here thanks to the many available commodities in the spacious apartment. Ashley made herself very available and welcoming, and helped making our stay easy and enjoyable. I sincerely recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to enjoy a pleasant neighborhood in New York without being far away from Manhattan.
Ashley was an excellent host. Easy to communicate with, and my family loved her place. Thank you for accommodating us in such short notice Ashley.
Ashley was very helpful and communication was amazing.

Ashley's place was fantastic ! She was always available and quick to answer any questions we had . The private downstairs apartment is beautiful . Being my first time using AirBnB I was happy with my choice .  Super clean , comfy , smelled great , well equipped . It was perfect for me and my family of four . The beds cozy and comfortable . Very Central and with the train station right around the corner , leaving you in Manhattan in 15 minutes . We were happy and recommend Ashley place .  Ashley and her daughter Jayden were super host and very gracious .  Glad we
Got to meet them :) Will definitely book here again for my family trip in the future .

Staying here was so perfect, I am totally in love with her home. It is beautiful and quite. Ashley communicates with you very well and accommodates you as well. She is a great host and I told her I will definitely be back to come stay again

Ashley's home is a beautiful and cozy apartment that is spacious and perfect for small get togethers and parties. Filled with all the amenities you can ask for. She is always available and willing to be helpful with all of your needs.

The place is very nice and clean.
The people are very nice an welcoming.
Ashley is a wonderful host; our flight left NYC in the evening and she graciously extended our check-out time.   Great location!

Ashley's place is well apportioned and very spacious. It is exactly as the pictures portray it; tres chic. It was also very quiet with very little to no street noise, affording for great sleeping conditions. I highly recommend Ashley's place!
The quiet street and great location were perfect for us
Just as advertised, clean comfortable apartment.

Ashley est une hôte extraordinaire  très serviable et gentille toujours présente lorsque j'avais besoin de renseignements sur n'importe quelle sujet.
 Je recommande fortement ce logement très agréable bien équipé et bien situé à 40 min en taxi de l'aéroport et tout ce trouve à proximité 5 minutes à pied du metro avec la ligne principale !! 
Ashley est pleine de petite attention frigo avec oeuf, lait, jus, céréales ect... un petit mot et des fleurs pour nous accueillir encore merci à elle et son papa !!
Nous sommes très satisfaits dans la globalité de notre séjour à New York ville magnifique et vivante de jour comme de nuit.

Ashley's apartment is the place I really very recommend for to stay in New York!!!!
Everything is comfortable, Metro is on the next street, the apartment is very nice and  there are everything you need there.
And of course Ashley herself!!!! She's the best owner I've ever met before. When we asked her some questions we had immediately feedback. Anytime!! 
Ashley, many-many thanks to you!!! You really helped us to fall in love in New York
❤️
Very great place to stay and looks just as described in the picture. The area is great and the host herself is very friendly and responsive.

We enjoyed our stay in Ashley´s apartment very much. The apartment absolutely correspond to the description given. The price-performance ratio is very fair. The apartment contains everything you need and is clean. You can easily reach Manhattan and its attractions. The subway station is only 5 minutes away and bus station is even nearer.
Ashley is very helpful. All our problems could be solved by e-mail communication.
We can recommend this apartment and in case of another stay in New York we will probably contact Ashley again.
This place is amazing , it has a very warm and welcoming energy .

Ashley’s place was just as described, it was clean and comfortable and has everything you need. It was close to the subway and in a nice neighbourhood. 

Ashley was a great host, she was very helpful with everything and responded very quickly with answers to our questions. 

Great place!

Ashley's place is great! Very clean, great kitchen that is fully stocked, and a great space for a relaxing night. The place felt very homey and is perfect for a couple or a few friends. The whole check in and check out process was super simple and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again! Thanks so much Ashley!
Ashley's place was clean, private and roomy and just as it was pictured! Ashley was so gracious and patient with all of my questions. Easy check-in and check-out and flexible.
This apartment is very clean and spacious. It has every amenity you could wish for and Ashley is a very nice host.
Everything was amazing.. I extremely  recommend this space. Not to mention the host was so caring, helpful, reasonable and overall amazing.
Thanks, Ashley!

Ashley's place was even better than the pictures. It was spacious, clean, and very well-decorated. We had everything we needed and Ashley was very communicative throughout our entire stay. I threw a BBQ here to celebrate my birthday and Ashley was extremely accommodating and didn't complain about anything at all. I would definitely stay here again!!! Thank you so much for a wonderful weekend, Ashley.
Ashley allowed us to check in much later than the destined time and check out later as well which was super dope. The pics are underrated. The place is much bigger than advertised

We stayed in Ashley's place for a whole week. The house is clean and inviting. My wife and two teeneagers and I had plenty of room. Having the kitchen was nice and convenient. We enjoyed feeling like we were living in the city, not just staying in a hotel. The subway to Manhattan is just a short walk away and very convenient. We absolutely loved our time in Brooklyn and look forward to visiting again.
Ashley's place was very nice! My family and I really enjoyed staying there and we will be back!

Ashley responds consistently and promptly. The place is nice and neat, the process of checking in and out is smooth. Ashley does not interfere with your stay at all. The only issue is during my stay a window was broken and she tried charging us double what it cost to fix. For future reference, get your own contractor and avoid being scammed if you encounter any problems.

Over all, this is a good value for the price.  The photo is a bit deceiving as it shows the apartment to be upstairs.  It is actually a downstairs basement apartment with very little natural light.  The neighborhood is nice.  I felt safe walking around.  Go one block over and it changes, but that's typical in NY.  There was an issue with the cleaning person, and we could not check in by 4p, but were told the place would be ready by 7p.  The space plenty big enough for a family of four, although the pull-out beds on the sofas were really uncomfortable, even for teens and they'll sleep most anywhere.  All you could feel were springs.  The floor was sticky and the bathroom smelled like a cat had been there before us.  Pets are allowed which is awesome.  We loved the outdoor space.  Our host left us some breakfast items, coffee and plenty of towels.  Checkout is at 12n which is great. Good communication with the host.  Like I said, for the money, it was a good experience.
Neat and tidy, basic overnight visit
This was my first air bnb. I had a great experience. Ashley was so accommodating throughout my entire stay. I would definitely stay here again and recommend this spot to anyone.

The apartment is exactly as described.  The subway is only a block away.  There is also food, nightlife and markets within walking distance.  The apartment is very quiet and comfortable.  You feel at home.  Check in was a breeze.  Very safe neighborhood!
Awesome place for a couple or  couples. Close  to public transportation to the city.
Location idéale pour une famille proche de toutes commodités logement très bien équipé pour un long séjour Times squares en 40 min De Metro séjour très agréable

Ashley responds very quickly to all queries. Check-in was smooth and we were very kindly allowed to check-in at 9am as we arrived on an early flight. Apartment was spacious and comfortable with everything we needed for a great stay (2 adults and two 10 yr olds). Great washer and dryer and coffee machine. Lots of shops nearby and some really nice restaurant one stop away on the subway.  Easy access to Manhatten and other areas. Nice, safe area. Would highly recommend. Many thanks Ashley!

Nice and cozy apartment very close to subway. Perfect washing and drying facilities and nice kitchen where fruit, snack and cold juice is welcoming you. Easy, fast and nice communication with Ashley - she was very helpful when needed.  We knew we would spend a lot of time in the city and not so much time in the apartment so it was ok that the apartment was in the basement with only a little window with daylight.

Ashley is a wonderful host! Extremely flexible and available to her guests. She checked in everyday just to make sure that we were enjoying our stay. We had one small problem that she took care of right away, plus there were fresh flowers on the table when we arrived. Very clean apartment and a quiet neighborhood. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

We were looking for a place with a parking spot and close to public transit since we drove down to New York and had no intention of trying to fight traffic to visit downtown.  Ashley's place fit the bill perfectly.  Located just a 5 mins walk to several subway lines, it was super convenient and at no point did we feel unsafe walking through the neighbourhoods after a late night in Manhattan.  Street parking was plentiful and easy to find right in front of her place.

Check in and check out were very easy, and Ashley is a very responsive host.  We had a small leak coming from the ceiling in the bathroom and she was quick to resolve the problem.

The apartment itself was clean and comfortable, with plenty of space, and stayed nice and cool through some hot humid days in the city.
Just a block from the subway and very spacious!

We stayed 4 nights at Ashley's with our 2 kids. They were sleeping in the main room on convertible sofas, so everyone had enough space. It was very clean.
We didn't meet Ashley, but picking up and returning the keys was very easy, even tough we arrived at night. The communication with her was very good.
The big washing machine and dryer are a plus. I don't know if it's always the case, but Ashley left some snacks and corn flakes in the apartment, that were more than welcome as we just landed from an overseas flight and hadn't slept for 24 hours.
That was a good place to stay at to visit New York.

지하지만 너무 좋았음
집이 옴청 넓음
비온 후에 갓더니
바퀴벌ㄹ ㅔ 나왔음!!!!근데 집안에는 없엇음
집주인도 처음인지 당황함
엄청 넓음 개편함
에어컨이 멀리 잇어 요리하면 더움

The place is beautiful, has a new feel and is larger than I expected. Ashley communicated with me at lightning speed, our stay was great. The subway is only a 3 minute walk. Street parking was fairly easy. Direct TV was a great perk.

We (myself, husband and two young children, 2 and 1) had a great stay in Ashley's apartment. When we first arrived there was an issue with the laundry machine and we were unable to use it, Ashley was very apologetic and took our dirty washing to be cleaned (when needed) which was a great help. 
The apartment itself was brilliant.  From small things such as washing up liquid and sponges in the apartment, to a bbq outside, this apartment was ready for people to arrive and it made it so much easier not having to worry about going to a shop straight away to pick up small things. 
The apartment is really close to the subway station which was great, we often came back really late at night and there was no issue. I should point out that there is no elevator from the street to the the subway, so it did mean having to lift the double buggy up and down the stairs. But, we found that this is a common issue throughout New York! 
Communication with Ashley was brilliant. Really good host, she sent us a list of restaurants around the neighborhood when we arrived and kept us informed of the local on-goings, she even let us know she had bought the Mayweather - McGregor fight and told us how to access it!
Would recommend!

Ashley's place was very clean and so close to the subway station.  It took us about 20-35 minutes to travel to Lower Manhattan via Metro.  Thank you for the snacks the kids enjoyed them.  We will definitely stay at Ashley's place again when we go back.  

Thank you Ashley!
A very nice place to stay. A fairly long subway ride BUT worth it considering hotel prices in Manhattan. Ashley responded very quickly to all/any questions/requests.  An excellent experience.
Нам понравидось все. Близость метро, всего в трех минутах ходьбы, в двух минутах магазины и кафешки, все что нужно туристам! Отлично провели время!))
Ashley's place was adorable and she was so sweet and attentive!

Ashley's place is perfect for those not wanting to stay in the city. It is about 5 min to the subway and close to small deli's. It is also a very safe neighborhood.
Ashley is always quick with her communication and answered all questions. I would recommend her space for those that want the neighborhood feel.
Clean apartment, all amenities great and special touches appreciated. Hosts were very helpful
It was a pleasure to stay in Ashley’s apartment. Very close to public transport.
Ashley's place was perfect; super clean, great location and amazing outdoor space. She was so quick to respond to any questions and even brought us wine! Can't wait to go back!

Ashley's place was perfect for our weekend getaway. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Nice neighborhood and close to subway stations. Communication with her was awesome, always responsive and attentive. Plus, she had left beautiful flowers and snacks for us to enjoy. We will definitely be back soon. Highly recommended!

Ashley is an amazing host. She was so helpful and patient! She answered all my questions and was always readily available. Ashley was so kind, she left some food for us (fruits, bread, cookies and some frozen food as well). 
The place is very good and you will find there everything and even more. There is a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom (yes, there are even different kinds of shampoo :)) 
The bed was very comfortable, we also used air beds and they are very comfy too.
The location is also perfect. Only three minutes from subway, many grocery stores around (they are small but have good stuff).
The place is a bit dark, because it is on the ground floor, but for us it wasn't a problem. 
The bottom line - highly recommend Ashley's apartment for staying in NYC!
Ashley’s place is great for both short and long term stay. Located 5 minutes walk from transport,cafes and shops. Great host and beautiful place.
My girlfriend and I enjoyed our stay at Ashley's place.  She was very friendly and helpful throughout our stay.  Would definitely recommend.

Exactly as described in the listing. Ashley made us feel so welcome, from special treats and periodic check-ins to see if we needed anything. Space was clean, comfortable, spacious, and a great place to call home for a long weekend.

Ashley was a wonderful host! She responded to our questions in minutes!We actually never met her but she was very helpful and thoughtful. She welcomed us with delicious cookies and the fridge was full (eggs, milk, bagels, butter, etc) and the bathroom had shampoo, conditioner, body wash, toothpaste, etc! Everything that was advertised was included. Although, my friends were looking for the booze lol! Everything you need is in the house so go ahead and book it! My favorite part of the Airbnb was the laundry room! We used the washer and dryer every single day (laundry detergent included!) No need to pack a lot of things! ;) The travel from Brooklyn to Manhattan is about 40 minutes. The subway station is 4 minute walk away from Ashley’s place! It was awesome!
Ashley was an awesome host! Such quick responses and the space was perfect!

Ashley is really a nice host.  The apartment is very nicely decorated, full of treats, great laundry.  It is located in the basement below Ashley's apartment.  If you don' t mind riding the subway to visit Manhattan, this is a good option.  In fact, The Prospect Park and other interesting places can be reached by foot.

Ashley was the best ever. She made sure we were comfortable and even gave us tips on where to go! Our checkout time was at 12 and our train didn’t leave until 3 so she did everything she could to accommodate us and made sure we were comfortable. I’d recommend her to anybody looking for a wonderful home and an even better host!
Great apartment, close to transport, with a superb host who was great with communication and added the little extras like snacks to make our stay just that bit nicer

This place is awesome! Only a few minutes from the subway station and everything was very clean! But most of all Ashley was amazing! She was really nice and very helpful! Even offered to push back our check out time because the weather was bad! Will definitely be staying here again when I return to new york!

You get a whole brownstone floor to yourself with a private entrance and a full kitchen and your own bathroom. You’ve also got all the tv channels you could ask for, including all the premium channels. Ashley is very nice and when I got there she had cereal and lemonade for me. The 2/5 subway is a block and a half away too which was really nice. I was there for 10 days so she would randomly text to make sure everything was good. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for an AirBNB in the Brooklyn area.
Agree with past excellent reviews!! Plenty of staples and toiletries. Do not hesitate to book!!

Ashley's Place is perfect for anyone wanting to stay in the Crown Heights neighborhood. We felt safe walking to and from the subway station, which is conveniently close by. The communication between her and her guests was always prompt and efficient. The place is cute, the kitchen is great, hot water was plentiful, the extra touches (milk in fridge, cereals if needed, coffee) were nice! Our only issue is that the bed is only a full size, which for 2 older adults, was just too small. Otherwise, you can't find a better value in the area!

For NYC, you truly can't find a better deal! It's a huge apartment, complete with a full kitchen, cable, wifi & a washer/dryer. The only issue we had was upon arrival, there was no street parking in front of the home. We had to park around the block and carry our heavy things into the apartment. BUT, a spot opened up after a couple hours & then we didn't need to touch our vehicle for our entire 3 day stay. The apartment is only a block from the Subway - which made getting to Manhattan very fast and easy. It's also the perfect spot if you're attending an event at the Barclay's center (as we were). It's only 3 or 4 stops on the Subway - very convenient. Ashley responded in lightning speed - very impressive & appreciated. Would absolutely stay here again!

Ashley’s place is very clean and comfortable. I loved how close it was to the subway and the neighborhood felt safe and quiet. Ashley responded super quickly to any questions I had. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Ashley est très accueillante et très arrangeante. Son logement est proche du métro et de petits commerces on s'y sent chez soi. Quartier calme. Je la recommande.

El apartamento era tal cual se describe. La zona de Brooklyn donde está ubicado es muy linda. Hay muy buena locomocion hacia todas partes, con 2 estaciones  de metro a poca distancia del apartamento.
Ashley fue muy amable y siempre estubo atenta a cualquier consulta o solicitud de parte nuestra.

Tout y était. Logement très pratique dans un quartier résidentiel typique de Brooklyn. On s’est vite senti « chez nous ». Prise et rendu des clefs faciles. L’appartement est très fonctionnel, la literie comfortable. et super les lumieres bleues ! Et tout y est : rallonge, adaptateur prise électrique, adaptateur usb, produits de toilette, pharmacie, linge à disposition, produits petit-déjeuner,...
Génial les deux grosses machines XXL lavage et séchage de linge ! 
Le métro est à 5 minutes à pied et direct Manhattan en 30 minutes. Quartier très sûr même le métro tard le soir. 
Ashley a toujours été très disponible et réactive par message aussi bien avant notre arrivée et pendant. Elle a même pris des nouvelles régulièrement. Malheureusement nous n’avons pas eu le temps de nous rencontrer. Nous partions le matin et rentrions que le soir tard avec souvent de quoi dîner sur place. 
Nous sommes ravis et reviendrons surement une prochaine fois certainement. Nous recommandons ce logement sans hésiter ! 
Merci encore à Ashley pour toutes ses gentilles attentions.

Great place to stay when visiting New York City.  Ashley was very helpful; the apartment is clean, comfortable and one block from the subway.  1/2 hour from Midtown makes this a great base from which to see the city.  Shops/restaurants nearby provide all you need to relax after a day in town.
I would definitely recommend this place.
This is a perfect location to visit Brooklyn or be close to transit to NYC. Very stylish and comfortable...our comfort was Ashley's priority!

Una gran experiencia en una gran casa. La acogida es genial, y a pesar de no conocerla en ese momento todo fue muy bien. Durante toda la estancia ha estado pendiente de nosotras en cualquier momento, preguntándonos, así como nosotras pidiéndole algunas cosas. Tuvimos un retraso en la maleta y ella nos ayudó para que llegara, igual que imprimiendo nuestros billetes de vuelta a España, o dándonos más papel que faltaba. 

La casa también, muy bien. Nos ha gustado mucho. 
Un placer y hasta la próxima.

Ashley is a fantastic host!  She was so easy to get in touch with, and was so gracious whenever we needed something.  The apartment is a great value!  It was so nice to be away from the crowds and enjoy the patio in the evenings.

We enjoyed the trip very much, Ashley is a great host, responsive and always willing to help. The place is very nice, spacious and comfortable even for 4 people. There are enough shops and places to eat in the surroundings, and it takes about 5 minutes to get to the closet subway station. The trip to or from Manhattan takes about 40 minutes so I think this place is a very good deal for visiting NYC.

The apartment is very clean and tidy. Cable tv and Wi-fi  
Ashley is really helpful and lovely the subway is near by
Little far out of New York for us and no bars or restaurants on doorstep but its well worth a visit in a very relaxing apartment
Very cute apartment! We used the bedroom as well as both pull out couches.  Easy to park on the street!  Very well located.  We had a great time and would definitely recommend!

Wonderful place to stay when visiting New York City. The apartment was clean, comfortable and just a short 5 minute walk to the subway. We eat in two of the restaurants that we walked to on Franklin Street - one Mexican , one Caribbean - there are lots of choices and the area is lovely to walk. We spent two very busy days in NYC. We saw lots of the main attraction: 9/11 Memorial and Museum(amazing), Central Park, Rockerfeller Centre, boat cruise around lower Manhattan. We got an on street parking spot right in front on the apartment and never needed to use our car. We would definitely recommend this place and would love to rent it again. Joan and Les (Canada)
Excelente ubicación, muy linda casa, todo muy bien.

Ashley was GREAT! Her place is clean and in a great location. She is only 5 min from the train station as well. She had fresh fruit, snacks and even left a bottle of wine on the table. Sometimes when you travel you forget the small amenities but not to worry Ashley has you covered. There was soap, shampoo,conditioner, tooth paste etc.... I would recommend her place to anyone.
Great location off the metro, very clean, nicely equipped, comfortable bed. Kitchen is very well equipped for cooking.

Ashley’s home offers fantastic value for money, you won’t find better in NYC.
So much space and spotlessly clean, with all the comforts of home. Ashley goes above and beyond by including more extras than your average 5 star hotel.
Check-in couldn’t be easier and you are very close to public transport which makes access to Manhattan so simple.
I’m not sure when we will visit New York again but at least I know where we will be staying.
Ashley was a wonderful host. I didn't ever meet her in person, but she checked up on me several times via text, just to make sure I had everything I needed. So kind and thoughtful!

Great proximity to the 2, 3 and 5 trains, although the bed did leave me with a sore back after a week. Nice place to spread out and spend some time if you need a break from the city. Very quiet, which was a very nice surprise considering the amount of activity around. Thanks for your hospitality, Ashley!

La casa è molto spaziosa, il quartiere tranquillo e la posizione molto comoda per raggiungere Manhattan. La metropolitana è a due passi. C’è tutto quello che puó servire, comprese lavatrice e asciugatrice che sono state molto utili. L’unico piccolo neo è che essendo in un seminterrato la casa è un po’ buia, ma uscivamo la mattina e tornavamo la sera  quindi non è stato un problema.
Great place. Wonderful host.
Appartamento carino a pochi metri dalla metropolitana in zona tranquilla e sicura

Ashley truly is a Superhost. The place is well decorated and homely. She was very responsive and provided a great list of recommendations for local dining. The snacks and beverages provided were also greatly appreciated. Solid location and enjoyed the vibe of the area. Would definitely recommend and return next time I'm in the area.

Nice place in Brooklyn! 20 minute walk rom Brooklyn Museum!!!! Subway was less than 10 minutes away. Comfortable for two. Furniture was a little uncomfortable but I’m also 6’4”. Dope spot in a nice neighborhood!!!!
Boa localizacao, fácil acesso ao metrô, rua tranquila, sem barulho para dormir.

Ashley was helpful, she checked up several times. The place is a very short walk away from the 2 and 5 metro, stop President Street. 

Place is clean and we very much liked the instant noodles!

Thank you Ashley!
This place was a great stay, public transportation was near by and overall housing was beautiful

Ashley is an excellent host. I have stayed at her Airbnb twice and plan to return whenever I am in Brooklyn. Ashley goes over and beyond to make you feel welcome each time. She provides a very personal touch. You don’t feel as if you are just staying in the home of a stranger but as if you are visiting family. Ashley is available when you need her, responding with a smile, and accommodating as much as possible. Thanks Ashley! Until next time!

Ashley est une personne très accueillante et qui s'assure que vous ne manquerez de rien. Elle est très réactive aux messages via la plateforme, j'ai toujours eu une réponse dans l'heure et ce pour mes questions avant et pendant mon séjour. On se sent comme à la maison. Le voisinage est calme, nous avons passé un séjour inoubliable.

My family and I had an incredible time during our stay.  The location of the subway made it so easy and quick to jump on and go, which was fantastic.  At the end of a long day of sight seeing, it was nice to know we only had a couple of minutes  to walk back from the subway and get much needed rest to prepare for the next day. When we had a request or question, Ashley was quick to respond.  We have already discussed heading back in the future to catch upon on things we did not get a chance to do and would look at Ashley's place to stay again. Thank You for the hospitality.
Fabulous location, huge space, very clean, nice personal touches and Ashley responded quickly and was very helpful. Great hostess and lovely apartment.

Ashley is an absolutely amazing host! Not only was the apartment extremely clean and beautiful, but Ashley went out of her way to make sure our stay was perfect. She provided us with tons of information on spots to eat for dinner and things to do while we were in town. Anyone who stays at this spot will not be disappointed.  Thanks again Ashley!!

Квартира расположена в удобном месте, рядом метро, магазины, кафе. Хороший район. Удобно и недолго добираться до Манхеттена. В квартире есть все необходимое. Эшли очень внимательна, сразу отвечает на возникающие вопросы и всегда доступна. С удовольствием остановимся ещё, если будем в Нью Йорке.
Fantastic space, location and host! A rare find that we highly recommend and would stay at again.

This is a great apartment in a wonderful location.  Short walk to  2/5 subway lines and a slightly longer walk to 3/4 subway lines.  The neighborhood was beautiful and safe for walking at night.  We were able to do everything we wanted to do on our trip with ease.

We just had a great stay at Ashley’s place for the NYC marathon this past weekend. Ashley had so many nice touches waiting for us, to include fresh-cut flowers and wine. The apartment is very well decorated and Ashley was quick to respond to any questions or concerns we had. The pull out couches weren’t super comfortable (but when are they ever?), however there are several air mattresses if you don’t like the pull out couches, plus more than enough linens and pillows. Don’t hesitate to book here!

Excelente apartamento no Brooklyn! Aconchegante, todo arrumadinho e bem decorado! Próximo a duas linhas de metrô com ligação direta a Manhattan. Sala espaçosa, banheiro ok e uma cozinha toda equipada! A host é muito atenciosa, responde rapidamente às solicitações, e preocupada com nosso bem estar! Recomendo!!

This was by far the best place I've ever stayed in outside of my own home. Ashley was so responsive and accommodating. Honestly, there were too many wonderful things to list them all. The entire place and especially the bedroom was so spacious. The kitchen was beyond perfect. The laundry room was excellent. Every single thing I could ever need was fully stocked with so many extras. Just walking into the space started the trip off to an amazing start. Couldn't be happier!
Her place was beautiful

Two points to remark about the days we spent in Ashley apartment:

- Ashley is on-line all the time. She answer any question, doubt inmediately.

- Ashley tries to  help you anytime.

It´s very important to know that you´ll have her support all the time.
Great little place to say while visiting Brooklyn or the City. Very helpful and friendly. We felt like we were at home. Loved the short walk to the subway.
My family and I had a great stay! Close to bus stop and metro!

It is no wonder why Ashley is a Super Host! She answered each question immediately and even randomly messaged us to check in on our stay. We felt safe in the neighborhood, only had to walk a few short walks to the subway stations, and were able to wash our clothes each day. What stuck out to me the most were the little touches she put to welcome us into her home. Everything from cereal and milk to filtered water to a bottle of wine completely put our stay over the top. I think that’s what sets apart all AirBnBs, the small “extras” help guests feel more comfortable and wanted. If I have any friends taking a trip to NYC in the future, I will definitely recommend Ashley’s place!

Superó nuestras expectativas, la casa increíble, estuvimos muy cómodos 8 días, utilizamos prácticamente todo lo que promociono la anfitriona (los amenities que nos esperaban, horno, etc) a 100 mts del subte 2 y 5... y unas cuadras mas otra estación con más opciones -25 minutos de Manhattan-  la zona muy segura (volvíamos de noche tarde, varios días estacionamos el auto en el barrio -ojo los horarios de limpieza de calle-), creo que encontramos nuestra opción para volver y para recomendar a amigos! Feliz 2019!

Ashley is a fantastic host. There are little touches around the apartment that make it really homely and welcoming. 

The accommodation is clean, spacious and extremely well situated in a safe neighbourhood. The area is well located if you want to experience what Brooklyn has to offer as well as easy access to the subway into Manhattan. 

Would highly recommend this place and already planning our next visit back to New York. 

Thank you again Ashley.

Ashley was an incredible host!! She was incredibly hospitable and communicative, and the apartment was very lovely! 

The place had lots of extra sleeping spaces including a mattress, air mattresses, and a pull out. The kitchen and laundry spaces were also nice. Also very close to public transportation. 

Overall, fantastic host and fantastic place— would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place in Brooklyn!
Clean, good location, comfortable!!!!

Ashely definitely deserves her superhost status. Her communication was on point, every question was answered quickly. The apartment was clean and in a great location and absolutely worth what we paid for. The amenities were great and we didn’t have a tough time finding parking on the street. Grateful for Ashley for providing such a comfortable stay.
Un petit bijou d'appartement où l'on se sent comme chez soi. Proche de toutes commodités et Ashley répond très rapidement à nos demandes ce qui n'est pas négligeable.
Wonderful host!

O lugar é exatamente como nas fotos. Bem bonitinho e arrumado. O local foi entregue limpo e organizado, nada a reclamar...
Pra quem for  ficar por longos dias, não se preocupe em levar muitas roupas, pois no espaço da Ashley tem máquinas de lavar e secar, foram bem úteis. A localização é ok pois fica a 3 minutos a pé da estação, que te leva as principais estações. No bairro tem bastante judeus e afro americanos, de princípio achei bem tranquilo. Tem um mercado próximo à casa também, o que facilita bastante.
Não tive a oportunidade de conhecer a anfitriã pessoalmente, porém ela foi bem prestativa e rápida ao responder todas as duvidas que tive. Acho que é isso! Voltarei assim que possível. Thanks Ashley xx
Ashley was very attemptive. She was easy to get in contact with. The house was cozy, close to the subway. I will definitely stay here again when I come back to NY.

host.host_about:
Hi there! Thank You for being interested with me here!
I work around the area, I like to travel, try out different cuisines, hotels & motels.  Learning how to intergrate others' great living ideas to enhance mine & for my society!  Travelling allow me to widen my vision & inspirations to all feilds of life!
After travelling a little around different parts of the world, staying in many different residental for travellers. I found that i can also offer travellers from my own origin as a global citizen a comfortable, easy access & most of all affortable price compare to the hotels that is within the similar location
!
I hope i can have what Air b&b suggested to b able to make b&b as a substainable & prosperous business for myself &people that i know.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
We stayed at Gigi's place for a week (Saturday to Saturday) and the location was fantastic. It is located on Cannon street, just off Lockhart road in the middle of busy Causeway bay. The MTR is only a few minutes walk away, as is Times square, and all the local shopping and food areas. Could not ask for a better location. The downside of a central location in a big busy place like Causeway bay is that there is unfortunately some traffic noise at night. 

We went during 30+C degree days and the two aircon units + ceiling fan in the room were more than adequate to cool the place down.

Gigi is extremely responsive and was an excellent host who saw to us and ensuring our stay was as best as it could be. Gigi provides detailed instructions on how to access the building and how to get to it from the airport.

Would definitely recommend and look forward to staying again next time. Thanks for the stay!

I stayed at Gigi’s place for 2 months. HOST: The BEST host you could find in Hong Kong. Unlike many hosts, Gigi put a lot of thoughts and care into making the stay comfortable. Very responsive for any issues I had, for example requested her to install sound-proof drapes she got it done very fast. Above and beyond duty to make sure everything is well taken care of.
LOCATION: Prime location, next to many good street food and restaurants, such as the wtc mall. Wellcome supermarket is just around the corner. Walking distance to Victoria Park. 5-minute walk to the MTR subway station.
THE PLACE: Excellent view of the Victoria Harbour. Cleaning service to keep the place sparkling clean, changing sheets often etc. All the amenities as described, including a washer. Building itself is old but Gigi's place is very well maintained.
Great location, great value  and a super, superhost. We will definitely  rent this place again.
这次来香港旅行最满意的就是住的房间了,离地铁站特别近,出门都超级方便,附近也有很大的商场,逛街也逛的超级开心,房东也特别的贴心,房间里面的东西也很齐全｡当我们说房间里没有拖鞋的时候,房东就立马为我们每人买了一双拖鞋｡非常感谢房东可以提供这么好的房子给我们｡如果下次还有机会来香港的话,还想要住这个房子｡

Ha sido una gran elección 
Hemos estado 3 personas durante 5 noches.
 El apartamento muy limpio con gran cantidad de servicio en la cocina, con café Nespresso, mermeladas, cookies, frutas, y aceite de oliva. El baño con ducha completa con grifo de ducha y efecto lluvia además de chorros de masaje todo ello acompañado de geles, champús, colonias, pasta y cepillos de dientes. Además zapatillas para entrar al apartamento y poder dejar el calzado fuera .
La habitación principal suficiemente amplia y comoda. En cambio el sofa- cama fue incómodo para dormir por su dureza y por la claridad que entraba a través de las cortinas.
Buena anfitriona pendiente de darte toda la información necesaria y preocupada de que el autocheckin fuese sin problemas.
El apartamento con excelentes vistas de la bahía con Kowloon enfrente. Muy bien localizado para llegar y regresar al aeropuerto con bus A-11 con zonas comerciales, supermercados, restaurantes   cercanas y con estación de metro a 5 minutos.
En fin una gran elección repetiriamos

Gigi is really a superhost. She take care everything meticulously and very thoughtful. Anytime I need her help, she responded immediately. She even prepare drink and snacks for her guest ;)  Surely I would recommend Gigi's place to all my friends
Gigi's homestay is really worth every penny! It is very spacious and is very accessible. The surrounding area is very nice too. Will definitely book this place again!

The listing is just few mins away from the Causeway Bay MTR and Sogo. It's also surrounded with lotsa food and even there's few convenient stores around. Not much to worry about food and transportation, as it's just so convenient to everything.

Gigi’s place is clean and comfortable for an short stay in HK. The apartment clean,spacious and good size for 3-4 people in HK standard. Gigi is very detail oriented and stock up with all type personal toiletries  one might need but have forgotten to pack including facial cleanser and cleansing oil. Location is very convenient to everything and very close public transportation and easily accessible getting to/from airport. Self check in/ out process is easy and hassle free. Gigi is very informative and easy to communicate. She provides very details step on how to get to the apartment. Overall, had an enjoyable stay and would stay again.

Gigi is very kind , friendly, and through. She sent me messages with video on how to get into the apartment from the street view. Also sent me a video on how to get into lift, get the keys, and unlock the door to apartment. She also lets us check in early which is a plus! Thank you so much for your hospitality!!
非常满意
Great host, fast responses and the location is very convenient, near MTR. Would definitely stay there again.

Gigi is a gracious host, very hospitable and friendly. :) The location is  quite easy to access, very convenient. The room can accomodate 3-4 people comfortably. She also provide coffees and teas, their tap water is filtered which is really great.  I would definitely recommend her place.

A super nice room with everything you need! Gigi is so nice and replies super fast. 
The location is super good( which means the homestay is near everything).
Plus the price is good. You can only get a small hotel room in which the suitcase would be hard to open on the floor with the same money in Hong Kong .
 I would highly recommend this place to all my friends

First we would like to thanks Gigi for being a great host for the last two weeks, not only did she go above and beyond our expectations to ensure her entire apartment is in the cleanest state but more importantly responded to any questions that we had in a timely manner. Our family of 4 felt very safe being in her entire apartment with virtually no noise from neighboring apartments or upstairs at nighttime. We loved the amenities at your place, especially the bath tub and spacious toilet that usually is non-existence in Hong Kong. The convenience of staying in a central location whether its for shopping or for a quick jog at Victoria park in very short walking distance is bonus of this place! Thank you for providing your place to us during this busy time, we did enjoy the panoramic views of Victoria harbour each morning and amazing  night lights shows across Kowloon! We hope we can book at your place again for our next yearly visit to Hong Kong!
Good stay, should stay longer

Great location, amenities and view. 
Apartment was just a 2 minutes walk from the MTR station and there were many shops right below it. 

Gigi was also very prompt in her replies and gave numerous food and transport suggestions. 

You would definitely not be able to find anything that tops Gigi’s apartment at this price range!

我先说明我不是托,这家店是看好评很多然后有一个番茄锅就预定了｡首先比在尖沙咀的名宿性价比高,3晚上在香港不算啥｡其次住这么多次airbnb,这一次这么认真写评论是出于gigi准备房间得细心｡每个型号的充电线都有准备,厨房咖啡机使用很方便及便从来没做过咖啡,床看起来很普通 睡上去发现两边的加宽小床还能放衣服,准备暖风机,香薰仪(虽然我不会用),厕所连衣物去味剂都有准备,真的很用心了,还不是旅馆套装,都是起码有品牌的小样
房东非常细心的安排,一家人很好的体验｡外出也非常方便｡完美的体验
Nice location, Gigi is quite kind and gave us many suggestion about shopping and others. I will definitely choose this apartment when visit HK next time
We (4 adults) were happy with the apartment. There was everything you needed. The location was excellent, mtr stop nearby. The apartment was very clean. Gigi was very helpful in all matters.

name: New Downtown Condo Perfect location
summary: Centraly located, at a walking distance from shops, downtown, Plateau, Village, Old Montréal and subway main station, this modern condo fully equiped with one closed bedroom will be perfect for your stay!
space: In the heart of downtown, this condo is a few steps from the Metro (Berri UQUAM, St-Laurent and Champs-de-Mars) and at a walking distance of Old Montreal, Plateau Mont-Royal, the District shows, the universities, the CHUM, grocery stores and shops. 	 This modern closed bedroom with Queen size bed condo comes fully equipped: appliances in stainless steel and quartz countertop, HDTV cable and double sofa-bed in the living room, Internet, air conditioning and heating included, washer-dryer and mini-balcon overlooking a pedestrian street. With its 9 feet ciling and its big windows, this 675 square feet apartment offers a chic and urban environment. It is the ideal place for your stay in Montreal, whether short or long term! For more details : www. condomontrealen. (Website hidden by Airbnb)
