For more details : www. condomontrealen. (Website hidden by Airbn
house_rules: Les animaux sont interdits. Il est de plus interdit de fumer dans l'appartement. Les émissions sonores doivent respecter la quiétude des autres locataires de l'immeuble selon les régles de bienséance. Les clés seront remises à l'arrivée.

host.host_about:
Je suis un Montréalais qui adore sa ville et paradoxalement, adore voyager!
J'espère que vous passerez un beau séjour chez nous et que vous aurez la piqûre de la ville!

reviews.comments:
Eric's apartment was a fantastic choice for our stay in Montreal. What a great location! The neighbourhood is close to the excitement of the theatre district, restaurants, bars, and museums, but quiet enough to relax at home away from the bustle of the busy downtown. The apartment itself is in excellent care. We had everything we needed for our stay. All the appliances are new and in good repair, and the furnishings are comfortable and stylish. 

Eric is a great host. He was there to greet us and make sure we got settled in okay. He even checked-in part way through our stay to ask how we were doing, which was very thoughtful. Eric also left us great information about the attractions and amenities around the neighbourhood—another thoughtful, personal touch!

If you're looking to stay in a great part of Montreal and have a fantastic host, I happily recommend Eric and his apartment. We already miss "our Montreal apartment."

Eric's apartment was bright, clean and beautiful. The location was even better, right downtown within walking distance to everything we needed. Highly recommended, Eric is very friendly and was accommodating to our arrival/departure schedule.

Thanks Eric!!
Justine

Un accueil chaleureux et décontracté. Des renseignement précieux sur les commerces et les restaurants à proximité pour pouvoir profiter de Montréal dès le premier jour sur des chapeaux de roue !!!
L'appartement est neuf et très bien placé entre deux stations de métro et à moins de 100 m d'un arrêt de l'autobus 747 qui relie l'aéroport à la ville.
Tout est donc parfait !!!

Eric's 1-bd/1-ba condo was in excellent condition - brand new with all the appliances, supplies, and furniture you'd need.  The location was great, with easy access to the metro and bus lines.

Eric was very easy to communicate with.  He was also very responsive to my questions, and left a binder with very helpful information about the neighborhood and nearby restaurants, shops, even ATMs and delivery menus.  He was also very flexible with check-in & check-out times, which we really appreciated.

We had a fantastic stay at Eric's condo in Montreal.  I would definitely recommend his place, and would gladly stay there again when we return to Montreal.  

Thanks for everything, Eric!  It was such a pleasure to meet you.

Eric was super nice and friendly. He was extremely helpful and flexible with check in and check out time. The apartment is on a great location, clean and beautiful. Eric left a binder with lots of tips and information about the city. I will easily go back to his place :)

My friend and I had a very enjoyable stay at Eric's condo.  The accommodations were very clean and everything was provided that we needed to enhance our visit to Montreal.  Long term parking was easy in a nearby garage, so I could park and then explore the city.  My friend took the #747 bus from the airport which dropped her off right on Eric's corner.  I slept in the very comfortable bed.  My friend choose the couch which folded down into a bed, rather than those pull out couch mattresses which can be uncomfortable. The neighborhood seemed in transition, but we felt safe and had no difficulties.  The location was convenient to Old Montreal, downtown, the entertainment district and museum area either walking or by the metro.  All and all an excellent choice.

Erick's apartment is the perfect place from which to explore the city of Montreal. It has a Walkscore of 99, a Transit score of 100 and a rider's score of 100, all from (Website hidden by Airbnb) What a location!

You can walk to the old port, the Place des Arts for the festivals, Rue St Denis for 100s of restaurants and bars etc.  

The main Metro interchange station, Berri UQAM is a few blocks away, which is key to move around town, check it out on the Montreal Metro map to see what I mean.
 
If biking is your thing there is a Bixi (Montreal's public bike rental scheme)  stand one block away, 5 dollars for 24 hours.

The building is part of a block that is being gentrified with new, modern apartment buildings. The police station was literally our next door neighbor and the apartment is facing the police station parking lot, so it must be one of the safest places in the downtown core. 

Everything inside the apartment was in as new condition, the kitchen was very well equipped and Erick was kind enough to leave a full supply basic items such as  dishwasher and laundry detergent , toilet paper, etc... so we didn't need to buy anything other than food in the first few days. 

I was there with my wife and 2 young daughters and the apartment was functional and airy enough that we didn't feel crowded. The sofa bed was perfect for our 2 daughters to sleep in.

You really can´t go wrong with renting this apartment, it's a no brainer if you find it available.

Avons passé 9 nuits en famille et tout s'est très bien passé. L'appartement est récent et très propre, et surtout placé en plein cœur de ville.
Nous n'avons manqué de rien durant notre séjour sur place. On se sent chez soi !!

name: Triple studio apartment in Taksim (K5)
summary: Welcome to the Hotel Element Taksim... Hotel Element Taksim enjoys a priviledged location in the historical neighborhood of  Tarlabasi, which is located just 300 meters from Taksim Square,  İstanbul. Turkish hospitality with European modernism.
space: Welcome to the Hotel Element Taksim... Hotel Element Taksim enjoys a priviledged location in the historical neighborhood of  Tarlabasi, which is located just 300 meters from Taksim Square,  İstanbul. Turkish hospitality with European modernism.

reviews.comments:
Отличное место! Очень рекомендую. Совсем рядом главная пешеходная улица Истикляль, метро Таксим. До многих мест, которые рекомендовано увидеть ходили пешком.

Комната чистая, уютная. Администратор хостела - Алексей, очень нам помогал.

Спасибо за гостеприимство! Приезжайте сюда, останетесь довольны!

the place looks exactly as it is in photos, however the moment you get in, you can smell that there is something wrong with the toilet.
overall the stay wasn't bad and the price was very affordable, but the location of the place - because of the noise, dirtiness of streets and just general area was really bad.
Ev konum olarak iyi temizlikte biraz sıkıntı var
Хорошее расположение. Есть много транспорта.

name: Studio @ the Waikiki Grand
summary: Awesome condo at the Waikiki Grand Hotel which is located at 134 Kapahulu Ave. just a block from Famous Waikiki Beach, Zoo, and all Waikiki attractions. You will be less than 200 steps to beautiful Waikiki Beach and the Honolulu Zoo.
space: Awesome condo at the Waikiki Grand Hotel which is located at 134 Kapahulu Ave. just a block from Famous Waikiki Beach, Zoo, and all Waikiki attractions. You will be less than 200 steps to beautiful Waikiki Beach and the Honolulu Zoo. This studio is highly renovated with a full kitchen including a full-size refrigerator, cook top, microwave, coffee maker, and several other kitchen conveniences. There is a flat-screen TV mounted on the wall with cable, free wireless internet.
description: Awesome condo at the Waikiki Grand Hotel which is located at 134 Kapahulu Ave. just a block from Famous Waikiki Beach, Zoo, and all Waikiki attractions. You will be less than 200 steps to beautiful Waikiki Beach and the Honolulu Zoo. Awesome condo at the Waikiki Grand Hotel which is located at 134 Kapahulu Ave. just a block from Famous Waikiki Beach, Zoo, and all Waikiki attractions. You will be less than 200 steps to beautiful Waikiki Beach and the Honolulu Zoo. This studio is highly renovated with a full kitchen including a full-size refrigerator, cook top, microwave, coffee maker, and several other kitchen conveniences. There is a flat-screen TV mounted on the wall with cable, free wireless internet. 1. Use of the laundry facilities. 2. Pool, Roof Top Patio deck. There are wonderful restaurants nearby, including the well-known Cheesecake Factory; Hy's Steak House for a very special dinner; Tiki's Grill & Bar for great food, inexpensive drinks and Duke's Canoe House, oceanfront, food
neighborhood_overview: There are wonderful restaurants nearby, including the well-known Cheesecake Factory; Hy's Steak House for a very special dinner; Tiki's Grill & Bar for great food, inexpensive drinks and Duke's Canoe House, oceanfront, food, drinks, with both places great spots for sunsets, people watching and nightly entertainment; and Cheeseburger in Paradise, always crowded, located at each end of Waikiki.
notes: W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
access: 1. Use of the laundry facilities. 2. Pool, Roof Top Patio deck.
house_rules: Follow rules of the hotel. No Pets are allowed No smoking in the building

reviews.comments: Nobu was awesome to work with. Easy communication - unit was exactly as described, great location and price. Will definitely contact him again next time I'm coming to Oahu. Aloha from NYC...
便利な場所で､快適に過ごせました｡

The room was as described (with one exception) and I enjoyed my stay here. The location is convenient for walking around Waikiki and there is limited parking on property (first come first served basis). The place is a bit small but still the description is accurate. The exception is that there is no wifi in the unit. Apparently there used to be but the building changed internet providers recently and wifi is no longer available by entering a code. In fairness I didn't give this feedback to Nobu and give him a chance to fix it because I felt there would not be a solution and that it would be a waste of time. However, I believe it is the owner's responsibility to know all of the details about the unit even when something changes such as this. I would not have stayed here had I know there was no wifi in the room as I needed it for my work. Still, I enjoyed staying here and have no complaints. It all worked out fine!

Nobu made my stay real simple, we just talked once throughout the time being. The room was exactly has specified in the page, quite comfortable and with more than I expected, specially in the kitchen. The neighborhood was completely a tourist area, with open mini-marts open till really late hours and close by. I always felt safe in and out of the hotel. The location was walking distance to most of the attractions Waikiki has to offer. No need to rent a car if you're an active person. The people all around are friendly and courteous. The view from the rooftop is breathtaking and the all around maintnance of the hotel was clean and neat. I would definitely stay here again in a not so distant future and also recommended to everybody I know. Weather wise, it was sunny, breezy, cool and great for a stroll even at night. Great place to make good memories!

Nobu's place was great for our first time in Hawaii. Me and my boyfriend were even able to stay and additional two days! The location was next to everything you need. Food,beach, and shops all in walking distance. The room itself was clean and stocked with everything we need. Towels, beach necessities, appliances, utensils, plates etc. There was also a laundry room on the premises(was able to clean everything on last day). The room was worth the price we paid for. My one and only con with the place was the wifi wasnt either working or accessible. Other than that i highly reccommend if location and value is a must.
The place was just as described. It was clean and close to everything. I would stay again.

This was our first experience with Airbnb, and I'm glad to say it was a success. A lot of this has to do with simplicity and straightforward nature of Nobu and his studio at the Waikiki Grand. The studio was clean, and had all of the necessary amenities. The location was key, as it is located close to free parking (if you want to rent a car) and Waikiki beach. You will have to walk a bit if you want to go to the western side of Waikiki but we found ourselves gravitating towards the restaurants lining Kapahulu Ave. Nobu was very accommodating. He was quick to answer any question and give suggestions. He is as involved as you need him to be. Everything was straight forward and it resulted in a good experience. If you are visiting Waikiki and intend on renting a car and exploring the whole island, this would be a very good and affordable option.
Nice clean place. The location was great and communication was quick and responsive.

First time in Hawaii and I am fairly new at using AirBNB. I used it once before so for this being my second time it was great! Communication with Nobu was a breeze before and during our trip! The location is great and it is literally a 2 minute walk to Waikiki Beach Pier and great location for local restaurants, grocery centers, etc. Parking is tough during the day time but in the night it gets better. You can park across the street (pay to park). The room was exactly how it is described and the pictures are completely accurate! Clean, comfy, and felt right at home! Thank you Nobu for your hospitality would stay here again and also reccomend!

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが良く､徒歩圏内にﾚｽﾄﾗﾝがたくさんあるので､ﾋﾞｰﾁを見ながらの朝食や､お酒を飲んだ夕食後も歩いて帰れるので助かりました｡

近くに無料で停められる通りがあったので､ﾚﾝﾀｶｰの駐車代が安く済みました｡

NOBUさんのﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽが早く､助かりました｡
Place was awesome & exactly as pictured! Wifi worked too.
Nice, clean place.  I recommend it!

Communication was great and everything was super easy.  Location was brilliant, walking distance to everything we needed and close to trolley stop.  Good value for money.  Only thing is that the apartment is very dark and even in middle of day needed light on, however saying that we were not there a lot during the day

My fiancee and I had a great time at Nobu’s place, it was clean, quiet, and the hotel staff were very friendly.  It was easy connecting with Nobu and gaining access to the suite.  The suite had everything we needed which included TV, internet, AC, and a clean kitchen.  The suit is also situated close to many shops such as Starbucks, bars and a convenient store.  It was a one minute walk from the beach which was awesome. 

I would highly recommend staying here.  I felt comfortable, the area is safe, and is away from the heavy commercial area filled with a lot of traffic.  This side of the strip is also closer to some of my favorite restaurants which include Leonard’s Bakery, Ono Seafood, and Pioneer Saloon.  On my next trip, I would definitely book the same suite.
Apartment was nice and comfortable.  The AC kept it nice and cool when needed.  It was in an awesome location.  There was tons of free street parking just on the other side of the zoo.
We had a great stay. Perfect location steps away from the beach. Would definitely stay again. Great value

This is my second time staying in an airbnb unit in the Waikiki Grand.  It is a great location near beach and zoo. Conveniently near bus line to/from airport 19 or 20.  Nobu's apartment has an alley view which makes it quieter than the first unit we stayed at facing the zoo which is over the bar.  Of course this means no views of Diamondhead from the unit unless you check out the outdoor patio.  So you get quiet but sacrifice the view.  We liked the quiet more. Good WiFi, A/c and kitchen. My wife and I would definitely stay here again.

Nice studio with well equipped kitchen! Very walkable to restaurants, stores, and the BEACH! Cable, wifi, and AC made it so nice! View from the top of the hotel is amazing- view of diamond head and the beach!

The place was everything we expected it to be and it was very close to the beach... about 1 block.  The staff at the Waikiki Grand was very helpful and friendly.  We would definitely recommend this place for anyone looking for a comfortable place to stay.  While is is not a luxury place, it is very nice and has everything needed for basic comforts.  It is well worth the price!
Nobu was always available for questions or concerns.

Nobu was super responsive and the location couldn't be beat. No real view from the room, but the silence at night while sleeping due to being on an alley was GOLDEN. Plus, we spent very little time in the room outside of sleeping, but it has everything you need.

I had a great stay here in a nicely updated and well equiped unit at the Waikiki Grand.  The unit is very quiet on the alley side and the kitched has every concievable pot, pan, utensil, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, cutting board, serving ware, ice chest bag, that you could possibly need for a short or extended stay.  The television and wifi were trouble free and I was even able to record some late night tv shows on the DVR for later viewing.
The Waikiki Grand is a very unique place to stay in the area with the best sundeck over looking the Zoo and Kapiolani park and Queen's Beach.  More than ideal.
1/2 block from beach and very close to all Waikiki shops. Easy access to bus line and activities. Very clean and Nobu was extremely helpful with any details we needed.
Nobu was really responsive and eager to help make my stay amazing. :)

We spent 10 days here and really enjoyed the place. It's in a great location in Waikiki, away from the hustle and bustle but close to everything. It was quiet and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!
Highly recommend this studio we think it's it the best location in Waikiki
Perfect for a week in Waikiki

Great location! We loved going up to the sundeck to enjoy the view of the beach, Diamond Head and the flamingos at the Zoo across the road. Nice sized apartment for two people. The bed was nice and comfy and the room was quiet at night. Nice and clean room with beach towels, beach mats, sun umbrella and chairs to take down to the beach. A great experience, we would definitely stay again.

Nobu was an excellent host. He was responsive and accessible throughout our trip. His unit is clean and convenient to restaurants and shops in Waikiki. For 1-2 people, it has plenty of space, and you have access to towels, kitchen, etc. It is not the most luxurious location, so if that's what you are looking for, I would recommend looking at some of the other options on Waikiki. However, we did not plan on spending a lot of time at the unit itself, and we were very comfortable and pleased with the affordability of this location. It was a great home base that provided all of the household necessities we needed at a reasonable place.
Nobu's place is in a great location, close to the beach and at the end of the busy Waikiki strip.

House was clean and location also good. 
집 에어컨이 오래된 것이라 소리가 나서 조금 불편했지만, 방은 시원했습니다. 그리고 집에 채광이 안들어와서 낮에도 조금 어두워서 불을 켜고 사용을 해야 하지만, 낮에는 집에 있지 않아서 괜찮았습니다. 주방이 잘 되어 있어서 음식을 해먹어야 하는 상황이라면 편리할 것 같습니다. 침대가 하나가 있어서 커플이 쓰기에 좋은 원룸 이라고 생각합니다.

動物園の入り口がすぐ横にあります｡公園の近くなので朝の散歩が気持いいです｡
二階にﾊﾞｰがありますが 部屋は静かです｡

I and my wife spent 14 days in the apartment.
It was a great time. The apartment has a excellent location. You are in front of Zoo and 3 minutes walking from the beach. That is amazing, we returned to the apartment during strong sunshine. The apartment is in a quiet part of Waikiki. In the apartment you have all the kitchen utensilies you need to cook.
It is very quiet during the night. The apartment faces a alley. You are only going to hear some noise after eigth am, it is perfect. The apartment is clean and the bed is good.  Only thing I would suggest is a bigger bed. But that is not a problem.
Other point, you have available umbrella beach, chair and beach towel. 
Nobu is very helpful and reply my messages very fast.
My suggestion is to rent a bike using biki. It is very helpful. I used a lot to go around the Waikiki. You have a lot of ABC stores near the apartment. You can get almost everything you need there.
If you want to go further, you can rent a scooter or mop in the alley. 
Probably because of the date I went to Waikiki, we did not face any problem using the public transportation.

Nobu's place is great. Right in the heart of Waikiki only about a 5 minute walk from the main shopping and eating strip. The place is nice and big with a solid kitchen. Only thing to be aware of was that the garbage trucks pick up out the back of the room and are quite loud (woke us up at 5am one morning), not sure if this changes depending on the time of year though

Location - access to beach was great. Views from level 10 excellent. Close to parks and the zoo and Diamond Head. Appreciated the sense of space rather than just tall buildings. Open walkway from lift to room added to feeling of space.  We liked the quieter, calmer end of Waikiki but access to other beaches, shopping, restaurants was easy to reach by walking. Liked the comfortable feel of the lobby - very welcoming.
Convenience - Code for the door, no keys makes security simple. Well equipped - lots of kitchen appliances. Appreciated the beach mats.
Able to organise great trips from the lobby - snorkelling was highlight.
Communication was good. Would consider staying there again.

Awesome place. Modern look, fully stocked kitchen, clean and Rgt next to the beach. Nobu was very easy to contact and responded back Rgt away. Any question or concerns I had, he was there to answer. I would definitely book with him again. Highly recommend.

We stayed there for the Honolulu Marathon and it was perfect! Cute place, well stocked, with great extra touches. We had everything we needed! Steps away from the beach and the heart of Waikiki. Right across from the Zoo as well. Would definitely stay again. Nobu was very responsive and check-in/out was a breeze
Nice little apartment. Well presented. Would stay there again.

Check in was super easy, the space is better in person than in pictures and it is clean. It is walking distance to everything and we loved that it was down the street from the beach, a 3 min walk. I recommend eating at the restaurant on the second floor of the building, they have good food for cheap prices and alcohol pitchers for $12! This location was perfect.

Great location! Close to bars/restaurants/beach!
Great host, easy communication!
Amazing location! The view from the roof lanai is incredible! This is a wonderful option  for an affordable stay in Wakiki. Just feet from the beach. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

You cannot beat the closeness to the beach, and having Hula’s in the complex is an amazing bonus! I will share that our room was facing a side street, and every night I was awakened to people walking by around 1-2am. Not fun. To compensate, I turned on the AC to drown out the noise.

Nobu is a great host. Quick at responding, not much interaction needed though as everything just worked the way it should. Check in and check out was a breeze.
Location is fantastic. Almost as close as you could possibly be to the beach. On the edge of the chaos of Waikiki so it was easy to find free parking (5 minute walk away). 1 minute to 15 minute walk gets you to almost anything you might need. 
The only thing that isn't perfect is a couple loud noises. The air conditioner is a little louder than what you might be used to in a hotel. If you're a light sleeper, this could be an issue. The unit faces the alley and it seems that the garbage trucks are always around at 6am to 7am. It's loud enough to wake up a fairly deep sleeper like myself. My 9 month old baby would always wake up because of this and cause him to cry. 
Other than that, great place and would stay here again when my baby is a little older.

We really enjoyed our stay at Nobu's place. The location is excellent (very close to the beach, restaurants and shopping), check in was easy and the apartment had everything we needed. Great value for money.
Exactly as advertised. Right next to the beach, great to have a full kitchen so you can cook up a delicious breakfast before hitting the waves. Nobu was quick to respond. Would highly recommend.

Nobu was a great host, with quick responses. Check-in and check-out was very simple. The location is convenient (almost right next to the beach, ABC stores, Starbucks, restaurants). Free street parking is only a few blocks away. The unit was clean and organized. Had all the amenities for a vacation stay. Very good view of Diamondhead, the Zoo, and beach from the top of the hotel. Great value, and would highly recommend!

Waikiki Grand is in an ideal spot. The beach is so close as are the many shops and places to eat. Our room was well equiped, and clean. I would definately go back here. The rooftop area is great, what views,Diamond Head and the beach.
Great location in Waikiki! Nobu is quick with any questions you may have.

This place is in a perfect location. Walking distance to Waikiki beach, surrounded by local shops and restaurants and right next to a public parking. The apartment was very clean and the host provided clear check in and check out instructions.
Excellent location! Steps from beach, bus stop, ABC store, running path...and easy walk to the busyness of Waikiki.

Great host, great place! I’ve stayed here three times already and all of them has never been any problems. Location is awesome! You can walk anywhere and the beach is just steps away! I’m also a light sleeper. Where the room is located, is on the alley side. So you don’t hear any music coming from the bar. I would stay here again for sure!

Thank you Nobu for the awesome stay! I love the location of the Waikiki Grand and have stayed there previously. I’m kind of a freak about cleanliness, and have been disappointed by that and bugs when staying before. Seriously, the unit was so clean that even we were getting the extension cords from behind the bed, there was not one speck of dust. Loved everything about the condo! Thank you!

Great location. Literally right across the street from the Honolulu zoo and Waikiki beach. Tons of restaurants to choose from coupled with great places to shop. The unit was cozy, more than enough for my wife and 11 month old (if you’re the type to travel light). Unit was stocked with pots and pan to cook with (although we didn’t do any of that since we were here for vacation). Great place to stay is all I have to say.
Great location, 1 block from beach, walking distance to most of Waikiki.
Very clean space in a great location with all the amenities I needed.  Nobu was very helpful with responding to inquiries.
Great place. Close to everything. Didn't meet Nobu but he was prompt & courteous in responding to all communications. Check-in and check-out were easy.
Very clean room. Room is exactly as pictured.

Lovely studio apartment as advertised. Very quiet (apart from the loud air conditioner!). 
The apartment is in the Waikik Grand Hotel which is right near Honolulu Zoo and at the quieter end of the main Waikiki beach strip which is definitely a big plus! Note there is a bar/nightclub on the 2nd floor of the hotel however, we heard no noise from this in the apartment!

The apartment was clean and there was a decent sized kitchen. Beach gear (body boards, towels, bag, mats, umbrella and chairs) was provided in the apartment which was much appreciated. The 10th and highest floor of the hotel has a deck which is beautiful for watching sunsets and offers panoramic views of Diamond Head!

We had some logistical issues at check in, but Nobu responded immediately to resolve them. The unit was great and as described. Location is close to the beach and has a good amount of parking nearby for Waikiki. Nobu was a great host, he was very responsive and available during our stay. Overall would recommend
A great place to stay. The apartment is one block away from the Waikiki Sea Walls. Several stores, restaurants and shops in walking distance. Shower had awesome pressure.
Nobu’s place is clean and within walking distance of the beach/nightlife/shopping. It’s packed with the essentials to hit the beach and has a cozy setting to come home too.

The location is so great, and overall this place is great value for money and we would certainly stay here again. The place itself is large and spacious with everything you could need; however, it can be a tad dark as the placement of the apartment means the view is another building, and thus sun doesn't really come in. BUT, this didn't effect us or our stay at all as "why be inside when you could be outside in the beautiful Hawaii?!"
Nobu’s place was perfect and you cannot beat the location!
I would definitely sty here again next time I’m in Hawaii
Great place to stay in a great spot. We’ve already come back twice and we’ll likely come again.
Great location near Honolulu Zoo and Diamond Head.  City view.  No lanai.
Perfect location at Waikiki. Kitchen has all amenities needed. Easy checkin with key code. Laundry at the basement. Perfect for 2 person accommodation.
Great place to stay. Location is excellent, apartment was clean and full of useful items such as bodyboards and other things to take down to the beach.

Nobu’s place is exactly as shown on the profile. The studio is completely stocked with cups, plates, and utensils. Everything was well organized. He even has a beach umbrella, beach mats, beach bags, body boards, chair, snorkeling gear, and beach towels stocked for you to use. More than enough bath towels for use as well. Only issue I noticed was that there was no bathroom fan or one that worked. The only way to airout the bathroom was by the window. Even so, it still felt musty inside of it. If your window is slightly open, people outside can potentially have a closer look inside by pushing the shutter open since it’s a louver style window. Luckily we didn’t have any issues with peeping toms. Overall, the place was great. The best takeaways from Nobu’s place is that it’s located right across the Honolulu Zoo parking lot, which allows hourly parking.  Having the extra beach equipment also saved me a lot of money and made beach days more convenient. Great place!
Good location next to beach and zoo with lots of eateries nearby. As others have said a bit dated and dingy

Apartment is as described, not new but not old, location is good. AC window unit is very loud and old, but powerful enough to cool the room down and then you could leave it off.  Front desk will store luggage in their office if you arrive early or have a late flight.
Awesome location! So convenient to the beach and great places to eat.
Great place in a good location

name: Big&bucolic apt in the heart of Rio
summary: Big apartment (90m2) in a quiet street in Botafogo with 24 hr security. TOTALLY REFORMED. Very well located: 10 min from the lagoon and 10 min from Copacabana beach.  View to the Christ, Balcony, 2 living rooms, 3 rooms, area, 2 bathrooms. With wifi.
space: The apartment is large (90m2). It has 2 living rooms, a kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, complete kitchen and a balcony with view to the greatest symbol of the city: the Christ.  More details about the apt:  One bedroom is very big (of 16m2), with two large windows, a big closet, a double bed (new), AC and fan. The other room is also quite large (12m2) and has a big window, AC, fans, closet and double bed. The third room is a bit smaller, but very cozy: a big window with view to a mango tree, a single bed and fan.  The living room has a sofa bed that sleeps 2 people. The apartment has everything that you need to have a great stay: wi-fi, cabal TV, fridge, AC, fans, washer machine, microwave, and everything you need to be comfortable! Enjoy! The ape is localized in a quiet in a very quiet and residential street (with no cars), with trees and 24 hour security. It is possible to sleep with your windows open and see the beautiful view that all the rooms have.   Even though it is in a buco
description: Big apartment (90m2) in a quiet street in Botafogo with 24 hr security. TOTALLY REFORMED. Very well located: 10 min from the lagoon and 10 min from Copacabana beach.  View to the Christ, Balcony, 2 living rooms, 3 rooms, area, 2 bathrooms. With wifi. The apartment is large (90m2). It has 2 living rooms, a kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, complete kitchen and a balcony with view to the greatest symbol of the city: the Christ.  More details about the apt:  One bedroom is very big (of 16m2), with two large windows, a big closet, a double bed (new), AC and fan. The other room is also quite large (12m2) and has a big window, AC, fans, closet and double bed. The third room is a bit smaller, but very cozy: a big window with view to a mango tree, a single bed and fan.  The living room has a sofa bed that sleeps 2 people. The apartment has everything that you need to have a great stay: wi-fi, cabal TV, fridge, AC, fans, washer machine, microwave, and everything you need to be comfortable! Enjo
neighborhood_overview: Botafogo is a very central, safe and artistic  district.  Very close (10 min) to the beaches (Ipanema / Copacabana). Close to sugar loaf (20 min).
transit: The apartment is close to several bus stops, it is very easy even get around by public transport.
access: It has a bike available for use.   Experience Rio by bike is simply increduble.
interaction: We like to receive well our guests, interact with them as such as possible an help with information and whatever they need to feel welcome.
house_rules: Smoking only allowed in the balcony!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá, sou a Gabi. Adoro arte, artesanato e plantas.
Sou professora de meio ambiente, adoro a natureza, praia e curto uma alimentação natural. Amo viajar! Já viajei por dezenas de países e cidades incríveis e pretendo viajar ainda mais. 
Gosto de compartilhar a minha casa e conhecer pessoas novas! Sejam bem-vindos!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Gabriela é uma anfitriã incrível!
Nos recebeu pessoalmente e fez questão de mostrar todos os ambientes de seu apartamento maravilhoso!
O lugar é incrível! Cantinho de paz e muito bem estar.
Amamos o apê e cuidamos como se fosse nosso. Gabi, além de tudo, se tornou uma amiga :)
Obrigado por ser a melhor anfitriã que já conheci!

Apartamento muito gostoso, caminhando 10 minutos você chega ao metro, varios mercados e opções de comidas próximo, fora a hospitalidade da Gabi, super atenciosa e querida, recomendo super pra todo mundo :)

name: Modern Diamond Head One Bedroom Apartment
summary: Large one bedroom apt w/separate, private entrance, Wifi, hi-def TV, split air conditioning.  Complete kitchen, including an ice maker and dishwasher.  Also a Washer & dryer.   Walking distance to restaurants, Diamond Head hiking trail, and Honolulu’s largest farmers market.  Waikiki & Kahala beaches close by.  Reserved Parking for one standard car.   Outdoor shower, Beach chairs, umbrella, body boards, snorkel gear included.  Ideal for couples or solo traveller.
space: Large one bedroom apartment with a queen bed, split air conditioning, a complete kitchen, including a range, microwave, dishwasher, fridge w/ ice maker, washer and dryer, and outdoor shower for washing sand off after the beach.   Guests will have access to Beach chairs, towels, Boogie boards, beach umbrellas, coolers, and snorkeling gear.   Entrance is controlled by a keypad where you are given your own access code.    On site parking is available for one standard car in the driveway  in front of the apt.   Larger vehicles like vans or SUV’s may use street parking.  This one bedroom apartment is very private.  You have your own entrance and there is very little interaction between residents and guests.
description: Large one bedroom apt w/separate, private entrance, Wifi, hi-def TV, split air conditioning.  Complete kitchen, including an ice maker and dishwasher.  Also a Washer & dryer.   Walking distance to restaurants, Diamond Head hiking trail, and Honolulu’s largest farmers market.  Waikiki & Kahala beaches close by.  Reserved Parking for one standard car.   Outdoor shower, Beach chairs, umbrella, body boards, snorkel gear included.  Ideal for couples or solo traveller. Large one bedroom apartment with a queen bed, split air conditioning, a complete kitchen, including a range, microwave, dishwasher, fridge w/ ice maker, washer and dryer, and outdoor shower for washing sand off after the beach.   Guests will have access to Beach chairs, towels, Boogie boards, beach umbrellas, coolers, and snorkeling gear.   Entrance is controlled by a keypad where you are given your own access code.    On site parking is available for one standard car in the driveway  in front of the apt.   Larger vehicles lik
neighborhood_overview: walking distance to some of Hawaii's finest and trendiest restaurants like "12th avenue grill",  "Town" & "3660 on the Rise".  Great Italian, Greek, Mexican, Japanese and Napalese restaurants are also within walking distance.  The entrance to Diamond Head State Monument and it's hiking trail to the top is 10 minutes away.  Honolulu's largest farmers market takes place every Saturday morning just 2 blocks away.  Waikiki beach is less then 5 minutes by car or a 25 to 30 minute walk down the hill.
notes: Kahala beach is nearby and a great alternative to Waikiki.  Kahala hotel features a great snack bar, nice sandy beach and dolphins swimming in a giant lagoon.  Waialae Ave Is 5 blocks away and features many award winning restaurants like “3660 on the Rise”, 12th Ave Grill, Town, and many more.
transit: There are two major bus routes a few blocks away from the apartment as well as a freeway on ramp just six blocks away.  And of course it's a great area to walk in.  Street parking is available for guests who prefer large, oversize vehicles.
access: Easy access with a 4 digit entry code making it very easy for self check in.
interaction: This one bedroom apartment is very private.  You have your own entrance and there is very little interaction between residents and guests.
house_rules: No smoking on the premises.  Do not disturb the current residents or housekeepers by showing up before 4 pm Please respect  the neighbors by not making excessive noise or playing the TV or radio too loud Do not run the washer or dryer in the evening after 8 pm Do not leave the air conditioner running when no one is in the apartment or with the windows open!    If you rent a small car, you can park on the left side of the driveway near your entrance.  If you prefer a large rental car, there is free street parking within a block from the apartment.  Please do not park on the sidewalk or block  our neighbors driveway.   Any violation of house rules could result in losing your security deposit.

host.host_about: Artist that enjoys travel, skiing, playing tennis and cycling whenever I can.    Favorite places are anywhere there is great music, great people and great food.

reviews.comments: Kevin was a great host! He suggested restaurants and things to do, all of which were great. The apartment was clean and perfect for two people. Kevin let us use bikes, beach towels and anything else that we needed. We will definitely stay with him when we travel back to Hawaii! Thanks again Kevin!!

We had a great stay at Kevin's one bedroom.  Kevin met us even though we arrived late.  He even provided a welcome bottle of wine and bag of coffee.  The place is nice and close to some good restaurants and nice little hikes.

Kevin's house was absolutely perfect for us and it made our weekend a dream. It is 20min to the Waikiki beach strip that we walked down every morning and very easy/close to the freeway, shopping and a Whole Foods. The apartment had everything we could have needed and more and was so clean and cute. We recommend this home to anyone and it will be our first choice next time we visit Hawaii!

Kevin's place was exactly what we were looking for. It's a completely private 1 bedroom/studio--super clean and stocked with new appliances, TV with cable, and wifi access. Kevin was a great host and even went out of his way to let us check in early. He supplied us with everything we needed and was responsive and accommodating. We would've stayed longer, but it was a last minute booking and was only available for a few days. Next time, we will definitely book it earlier!

We enjoyed our stay at Kevin' s place. The apartment is really nice and spacious as it appears on photos. The location is very good, close enough to the city but away from its traffic and noises. Shopping centres and nice restaurants are nearby. Everything was fine except that on  arrival  the apartment was dirty and dusty.

My wife and I took our first trip to O'ahu last week and had an amazing time. Spent 3 nights in the North Shore at a resort then stayed 3 nights at Kevin's place.  It was perfect! Was my first time using airbnb and was nervous about it but it was very secure. This one bedroom aptmt was very well kept, full kitchen was great. The bed was a bit hard but can't complain for the price. Had everything we needed. Didn't get a chance to meet Kevin but he always replied to my text and calls. Would definitely recommend this place, is close to Waikiki and Diamond head. The free parking space was also key. Great place, price can't be beat. We will definitely be staying with Kevin the next time we go back to Honolulu.

Kevin's apt's location was great. The place was clean, updated and had comfortable everday amenities. It was great to have a washer and dryer, WiFi, complete kitchen with appliances and he provided beach chairs and wake boards, very awesome for my mother daughter trip to Honolulu.
Staying at Kevin's, gave us an opportunity to stay as locals.  We were close to Rainbow cafe,Diamond head grill, Leonard's, the beach, and ofcourse Diamond Head park. Kevin was very attentive, i most def recommend you to check it out. :)

This was my first experience with Airbnb and I was overwhelmed! The apartment was fantastic - very modern, spacious and cool. The bed was one of the most comfortable I've ever slept in. It was way more than my expectations - I would wholeheartedly recommend this place.
After experiencing the awful traffic of Honolulu, we realized how lucky we were to be staying near Diamond Head. It's a short drive into the city, a very short drive or walk to Waikiki and very close to Diamond Head. We stayed 3 nights, and the location was absolutely perfect.
Kevin was a perfect host. We had no issues to report, and Kevin answered basic questions very promptly.
Loved the place - would stay again!

This is our second time staying at Kevin's rental; it's clean, updated, has all the amenities for comfort on a beautiful island. Great Kitchen to cook in, has roku and free wifi, washer and dryer, location friendly; near the freeway and he has beach chairs and wake boards for you to use. Kevin is responsive and an awesome host!!!!!! Must stay here if you want to feel at home on a vacation!!!! Thanks Kevin! See you again soon.

We were in Oahu for about 10 days and plans for another hotel in Waikiki fell through. We booked with Kevin a few days before we actually stayed there. It was late notice, but we were able to get in. Kevin was an incredible host. His place is beautiful, clean and has a washer and dryer. He always responded in a timely manner to any question we may have had. He greeted us with wine and bagels with cream cheese for the next morning. The apartment had everything you could think of and then some. His kitchen was even stocked with ingredients for a pasta meal. He also recommended a great place to eat for Greek food and it was delicious. We will definitely stay here again if we ever come back to Oahu. Thanks Kevin!

Kevin was very responsive to emails and phone call prior to my arrival and available during my stay. The apt. is located close to Diamond Head and Waikiki is very close by as is the highway. Very well kept and maintained and I had everything I needed and felt right at home. I stayed here for almost a month and hope to stay here longer next year as I will be returning to Hawaii  for business and will stay at Kevin's place again without a second thought.

My husband and I spent 5 days in Oahu celebrating our 1 year wedding anniversary. We didn't want to be in the hustle and bustle of Waikiki and this location was perfect! Kevin's place was our home away from away home. We rented a car while we were there. I'm not sure how convenient it is with public transportation to the city from here. It was very cozy and all the needed essentials were there. He even had boogie boards, beach chairs and umbrella to let you use for when we went to the beach! The furnishing were all very modern. We are out everyday but you can definitely make a meal at home if you wanted to. We had an awesome time staying here and would definitely stay here again if we ever come back to Oahu!
Great place! Very modern and cozy! Good location! Kevin is very timely respond to emails and really helped us with a our personal request. Thanks for the excellent vacancy!

Kevin was a gracious host and could not have made us feel
More at home.   The unit was incredible and stocked with everything you could imagine.   Really comfortable, clean and way above what I expected.
The location was perfect for me located between the beach and where I have family living so it was an easy walk or short drive to wherever I wanted or needed to go.   I will be back without a doubt.  Thank you Kevin for having this wonderful home away from home !  It's awesome

We really enjoyed our stay at this apartment! The host made us feel very welcome and even gave us gifts (fresh papaya and bananas along with chocolate and coffee).  The description of the place was spot on, and has everything you need, from beach towels to cooking supplies (pots and pans). I would definitely come back!

Kevin was amazing as was this wonderful little home.  My wife and I only had 3 days in Honolulu, but were able to do a great deal having such a perfect location as home base.  

The house was clean, had all the amenities (cooking utensils, dishes, etc), modern appliances, and Kevin left a number of wonderfully inviting gifts from wine, to chocolate, to a hawaiian calendar.

Kevin - If you read this, thank you again for a wonderful stay.  

Aloha,
Matt & Cami

This was the best airbnb place we've stayed at as far as value and quality goes. 1. Great location, close to waikiki yet far enough from the noise and bustle.  Getting to different parts of the island was a breeze. 2. Fully stocked, I mean he has everything you might possibly need which made our stay so convenient. 3. Clean, modern and updated, beautifully decorated, it was absolutely lovely.  Very private, cozy and ideal for two people. 4. Kevin himself was so gracious and we really felt the Hawaiian hospitality and love during our stay.  I highly recommend his place and I would love to stay here again.
Great apartment. Just a couple of minutes away from Waikiki with a car. Apartment is nice and clean. Kevin was a great host, and a very nice guy. Would stay here again. Thanks.
The best value for money in Honululu! Very clean and tidy apartment, has everything you needed and more. will definitely stay again in future. Highly recommended to everyone.

This was a most excellent place!  Beautifully decorated!  It was as nice as the pictures and every thing we needed was provided ie cooking utensils, soap, toilet paper, washing detergent. Everything! We didn't get to personally meet Kevin but he was only a phone call or text msg away for any questions.  It was a nice neighborhood for walking but I thought the beach and shopping too far to walk.  No worries! Quickly resolved by renting a moped which was So much FUN! We really hated to leave and this would be our first choice to stay if we were fortunate enough to come back to Oahu!

Kevin was a very welcoming and kind host, his apartment was beyond amazing and provided amenities and a level a comfort that no hotel could ever provide!
The location was really close to nearby Diamond head and an amazing Farmer's Market held every Saturday, Waikiki was close and the freeway easily accessible.
As a first time Airbnb user, I will definitely book through Kevin again.

Kevin offers a perfect place to stay on Oahu! Close to Waikiki but much more quiet and relaxing! The apartment is clean and very well equipped. Supermarket is nearby. Kevin makes the stay very pleasant with a warm welcome. He is there if you need him, but also leaves you the privacy you want! We would definitely stay here again if we're there !

Kevin was very friendly, welcoming and gracious. Apartment was comfortably furnished and well-equipped. Location was convenient for all I needed to do. Even discovered high school classmates living across the street.

Kevin was a great host.  He was very attentive beforehand, letting us know ahead of time how to get into the property.  The place was a great value, with a parking space included and all the other things that make you feel like you're at home.  I would definitely recommend staying here to any of my friends!

Kevin's apartment was absolutely delightful. It was bright and breezy and such a gorgeous retreat from the hustle and bustle of  the Waikiki strip. It had everything we needed and more. We were without a car so it was a good 30 minute walk down to Waikiki and a 5-10 minute walk to several different buses that took us to all the places we wanted to visit. The KCC markets were just across the road. With lots of fresh and interesting food it is well worth a visit. We met Kevin on arrival to the apartment and he was very welcoming and happy to answer all of our questions. We loved our stay here and highly recommend it. 
Rosie and Indeana

Thank you Kevin for hosting our stay at your lovely BnB.  It was perfect in every way - modern, spacious, comfortable, great location and amenities, quiet, private, clean.  The place is surrounded by natural beauty.  We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely love to stay here again.  Our family members who live here even considered staying here as a great weekend getaway.   Kevin is a great host and responds to texts quickly.  His kindness and generosity in helping us with a flat tire will not be forgotten.  We highly recommend Kevin's place.
We also found plenty of good eats and things to do close by:  Saturday morning at KCC Farmers market, Kokohead Cafe, Sconees Bakery, Whole Foods Market and hiking at Diamond Head and minutes drive to beaches.

Wow!  What a great first AirBnB experience!  Kevin is a great communicator....answering all of my newbie questions.  He sent us a picture of the house and the parking space so we could easily recognize it.  The property is nicely located in a residential area...we felt "part" of Oahu and not like tourists in Waikiki.  Easy access to different activities without the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.  The property is exactly as pictured...only better!  Thanks for the welcome gifts!  He has thought of everything down to the iron, detergents, shampoos, (Website hidden by Airbnb) much more than I expected.  In fact I almost went to buy beach towels....something made me look in the closet and BINGO- 2 awesome PLUSH towels!  Just perfect...now I know why they call this paradise!  Thanks so much- highly recommend and would love to return some day!!!

Kevin was a fantastic host. I only saw him once during my time in Hawaii (he came by when I checked in) - however, all his prep work ensured we had no hiccups upon arrival or during our stay. The space was perfect for myself and my friend as 1 of us took the room and the other, the couch in the living room. It was clean, safe, in a convenient neighbourhood (we had a car and planned to venture around the island/beyond waikiki - which is a 10 minute drive). We loved having a kitchen and the tools to cook with. Kevin's space is perfect for those looking to get the most out of their stay in Honolulu, I absolutely felt like I was at home. We felt like locals by the end of the trip & were glad to have chosen to go this route rather than book a hotel in the tourist areas as our experience would have been much different.
I would recommend anyone to stay here and hope to come back myself!
Thanks Kevin!

We had a great time staying in this small private apt. It was well furnished and had everything that one might need.  Kevin had it set up to welcome us with lights on, music playing, and some special treats- very nice touch! We did not have a car and walked many places - also learned how to use the bus with a bus stop about three blocks away.
Loved our stay- thanks Kevin!

My friend and I had a great stay at Kevin's apartment. The place was clean, spacious, and in a quiet neighborhood. I had a rental car so I loved having access to a private parking space. Also, Kevin was very communicative and responsive to my questions.

Kevin was a terrific host. The apartment was very clean, in great location, came with a variety of beach goods (such as body boards and snorkels) and we were gifted some complimentary wine and chocolates which was appreciated. The kitchen is also a terrific space with high quality items and pots and pans. Would definitely stay again. However, the experience is improved dramatically with having a car.

What a delight it was to stay at Kevin's apartment.

Our arrival was seamless, the apartment extremely well stocked with all we needed as well as plenty of toiletries including 'Island Coconut' shampoo & conditioner (what else!) ... and a couple of welcoming treats which my husband and I enjoyed one afternoon while sitting under the permanent beach umbrella.

This apartment is located in a quite neighbourhood and is well shaded from the elements.

It was nice to wake up to birds singing rather than the hustle and bustle of down town Waikiki.

Kevin was efficient with communication and very friendly to deal with.
Our host was very informative regarding the area and the amenities. The  condo was very lovely and we appreciated rhe extra effort put in when we had questions through out our stay

Kevin was very accommodating and helpful. Our booking was last minute and he did everything to help make our stay pleasant. We stayed 4 nights and felt that the apartment was very clean, well stocked and as depicted. Would definitely stay again!

I have done several AirBnbs now and my experience here was probably the best!

Once we stepped in, the place was just as pictured with a lot of modern furniture and appliances.  The place was already well lit with the windows and fans on to let in the cool breeze in.  It was pretty much stocked with everything we could possibly need for our long stay.  Plus, Kevin left some wonderful treats for my friend and I to enjoy the rest of our stay.

The location of the place is perfect because it is close enough to the city but also far away enough where we didn't have to face city congestion getting back home after a long day of hiking or going about the wonderful Oahu.

What we also loved was that Kevin respected our privacy throughout the trip, but also was very responsive when we had questions or concerns.  

Overall, I would say that I would love to come back again and highly recommend this AirBnB.

The location was Great! Clean and Spacious! Full Kitchen and all the essentials for cooking and more. Only a few minutes from the the beach, restaurants and stores. Quiet and relaxing with minimal noise. We enjoyed everyday of my stay. The owner, Kevin, is very friendly and always reachable by sms/phone. I would recommend this rental to anyone who visit Oahu.

We had a fantastic stay at Kevin's property!  He was a great host that provided fantastic instructions.  He was a wealth of information about the island.  We look forward to coming back next year and hope to stay at this great location again!

The house was one of the best we've stayed in through Airbnb. The apartment is well set up, the furnishings are just as modern as promised, and the place very convenient to Waikiki and Diamondhead and other spots around Oahu. Highly recommended.

My husband and I and our son traveled to Oahu to celebrate our oldest daughter's graduation from Hawaii Pacific University. This was my first time using airbnb for family travel. Kevin's place was perfectly located just 5 minutes from our daughter's apt. in a safe and lovely neighborhood with nearby beautiful views. Kevin contacted me right away to answer the few questions I had prior to our trip. When we arrived we were able to check in early with our own private key code as Kevin was easily accessible and responded to inquiries immediately. On walking into this exceptional studio, I can say his pictures do not do it justice. It is an absolutely lovely place to stay. Not only was there everything that we needed inside (including chocolates!) Kevin was kind enough to let us BBQ chicken for our little graduation party and made sure we had propane for the grill. Anything we needed he had!  Most excellent beach chairs ever, great snorkels and fins and he even let us borrow some chairs to take to kids apt for the party. Additionally he even included a great write up sheet regarding nearby places to go and eat. Kevin and his lovely place get a five star rating from us and we are planning to return next spring when our second daughter graduates from UH!!! Love, love, loved everything and every minute. Thanks again Kevin for a perfect place to stay! Vicky & Randy Jungers

Nice accommodations and the chocolates were a nice welcome.  Quiet residential area but close to Waikiki and easy to get to the H1.  So much better than a hotel.  We were able to just feel at home.  We would definitely stay at Kevin's again.

We had an amazing stay at Kevin’s gorgeous apartment full of life. The apartment was well furnished, lovely, clean, and has many thoughtful details including easy parking, extra toiletries on hand if needed and much more! The decor and furnishings are full of personality. Exactly like the photos! The kitchen is supplied with pots, pans & utensils. There is plenty of room to unpack your bags and settle in. The bed was very comfortable, and the place is at a calm street, so you get a good night sleep. A very practical thing was that you have a washing machine, great for longer stays. Our stay was just amazing – a great place to stay! Kevin is generous, and conscientious hosts. He was super responsive and easy to coordinate with. A few day’s prior our arrival Kevin sent us a message with a lot of information about the apartment, the nearest grocery store, some local tidbits and beaches, which was very useful. Futhermore Kevin provided us a great gift basket upon our arrival with Hawaiian Host chocolate, Kona coffee, a fresh Mango and a botle of water! Thank you so much! WOW! We absolutely loved staying here. We would definitely recommend this place and Kevin as a host, and would love to come back again! Thank you so much Kevin!
Made sure to welcome us personally. Gave us a tour and functions of the house. Also gave us complimentary wine and chocolate.

Great residential location that provides close proximity to H1, grocery stores, and the Saturday farmer's market at the community college. Pictures provided a good expectation of the layout and the place was clean & pleasant. Kevin provided a good level of communication before and during the stay as well as giving a list of his recommendations. Definitely recommend this place for anyone staying in Honolulu.

We recently spent 11 days staying in Kevin's beautiful apartment in Diamond Head. Kevin very kindly left us a welcome package of coffee and local chocolates and water, and a momento calendar - which was a lovely and thoughtful gift. The apartment is exactly like the photographs - modern, tasteful furniture, a wonderful selection of books, a fantastic kitchen with everything one needs to cook at home - a home away from home indeed! There is a great BBQ and it was so wonderful to have access to a washing machine etc - it makes a big difference during a long stay. The apartment has everything you need - a clothes horse, a cool bag for picnics, table cloth - tables to dine both inside and out. Kevin has absolutely though of everything one needs in order to have an easy and relaxing stay. The bed was so comfortable we are going to investigate getting one just like it ourselves! The apartment is in a wonderful location, very quiet and with excellent access to local shopping - we highly recommend the Whole Foods Market, less than 10 minutes away. It is also within about 5 minutes drive to the beach - with easy parking - perfect! We cannot recommend Kevin and this apartment more highly and we very much hope to return and enjoy this lovely space again.

Kevin is a very great host.
Everything was perfect.
Perfect place to stay in honolulu.
Thanks a lot.

Our flight came in early and we met Kevin as the apartment was still being cleaned. He was gracious and even allowed us to check in a little bit earlier. The space was clean and pretty large for a 1BR. There was also a shed with various beach equipment - chairs, snorkels, boogie boards, etc. which was convenient.

Kevin was always prompt in getting back to me, and answered my questions quickly. When we arrived, he and his wife made a special effort to come over to greet us and answer any questions we had. The apartment was as pictured, and in a very convenient neighborhood. He thoughtfully provided a Hawaii-themed gift basket, said to feel free to use any of the supplies on hand, and gave us tips on places to eat and shop in the neighborhood. We were comfortable and felt like the place was our own. Liked the washer and dryer, outdoor table and chairs, and easy parking. After the initial greeting, we were given complete privacy. We definitely recommend this place.

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Kevin is an exceptional host and has thought of all the little details in the apartment like specialized cooking utensils, laundry detergent and sports gear.  Very nicely furnished and comfortable place. This is a local neighborhood with easy access to the freeway and Waikiki. As a former Honolulu resident and very frequent visitor with many family members on the island, I most strongly recommend his apartment for kamaaina and tourists who want to avoid the hassle of Waikiki. Whenever I am not staying with family, I will try to book again with Kevin.

Tolle Wohnung (sauber und liebevoll eingerichtet), geschickt gelegen zum Diamond Head und hat eine sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung. Kevin ist super freundlich und hat uns sehr nett empfangen. Kurz: Top Unterkunft

This is the second time we stayed at Kevin's place and we could not be happier.  We wanted to stay longer but unfortunately this beautiful place is very popular and desirable and for great reasons.  Kevin is a host extraordinaire--welcoming, respectful, thoughtful, prompt, knowledgable, kind and really go the distance for his guest.  His place has everything you want and need to have a great vacation getaway, including special touches such as the bidet that he installed for the comfort of his guests.  Thank you Kevin!!
It was perfect.

My wife and I spent 5 nights in Hawaii to celebrate the New Year. Choosing Kevin's spot for our stay was an excellent choice. It's a great spot for any couple looking to get away from the hustle of beachfront resorts. Kevin is a very thoughtful host; we easily found all the amenities we needed and more. The apartment was clean, comfortable and very private. Another great feature is the location. This was our first time visiting Hawaii, and we found the location to be perfect for accessing nearby sites like the Diamond Head summit trail. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thanks for such a wonderful stay!

Kevin was the perfect host. He was helpful to us before, during and after our stay.  The description of his place and its location were accurate.  Kevin's communications were helpful in planning our trip to Hawaii.  His home is convenient to Diamond Head and Waikiki Beaches--we had a rental car and having a dedicated parking space was very convenient.  The condo is clean, tastefully furnished and had all the conveniences a traveler would need.  The appliances are all new and modern.  The amenities (towels, soaps and supplies) were all first-rate. We appreciated the welcome basket Kevin left for us-- it included Kona coffee, chocolates and bottled water.  The bed was very comfortable and the air conditioning worked well (the apartment has a washer and dryer but we did not use them).  All in all, Kevin's place was perfect--the best place I have ever stayed in using Airbnb!  When I return to Hawaii I would certainly try to rent Kevin's place again!!

Great experience!!!! We arrived in the middle of a rainy night to a fresh, lit. Inmaculately clean apartment. It was very late so we did not meet Kevin, but he left us a basket of Delicious local goodies we enjoyed upon arrival.
The apartment is beautiful. It has everything one might possibly need. Internet works very well and the private garage is very comfortable.
The location is perfect. Very easy access to Waikiki without being there. It is bliss to wake up in the quiet area of the apartment where all you hear are birds. It is  "en route" to the most beautiful beaches on the island, further south.
I would highly recommend staying at Kevin's apartment. I hope to meet Kevin next time!!!

This was our first time using Airbnb and I must say we were completely blown away with our accommodations and host.  Kevin was always quick to respond with any questions we had.  It was so nice to not have to worry about towels, beach chairs, snorkel gear, etc.   The neighborhood was great and we felt very safe.  I definitely recommend Kevin's place and hope to be back soon.

G (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) d location!!
Kevin's apartment is cozy and very peaceful.
There's everything I need.
If I have more time to spend, I'd like to stay here longer.

Walking in for the first time, our expectations were exceeded even though the pictures gave us a great sense of what the place was going to be like. The apartment is easy to find in a nice quiet neighborhood. Location is prime, I felt like we were in the middle of everything.  Kevin is an amazing host and always replied in a timely fashion. He even left us a gift basket for us to enjoy during our stay. The beach amenities (beach towels/chairs/umbrella, snorkeling gear, boogie boards) are an added plus. One thing the pictures don't show is a huge closet equipped with hangers and a drying rack. I assume past guests have left behind hair dryers and an iron since the listing shows that those are not available, so no need to bring those. We also left a travel sized garment steamer for future guests to use. Overall, we very much enjoyed our stay and we would be more than happy to stay here again. I would also recommend this place to anyone looking to visit Oahu.

Great apartment.  It is well-appointed, fully stocked, and the location could not be better.  Kevin is a great communicator.  We even got a welcome basket :-). Couldn't ask for much more in an Airbnb experience!

So happy i stayed here! It literally felt like I was at home! So perfect has enough space that is definitely better than a small hotel room! It is literally right next to waikiki and just right of the freeway. Very close to everything. Definitely coming to hawaii more often and staying here!

A great pied-a-terre in vibrant Kaimuki. Many high quality local cafes and restaurants  on Wailea Ave within a 10 minute walk (Koko Head Cafe, Sprout, Curb, to name a few). Kevin's place was well situated to visit all of Honolulu, the well visited and the off beaten path. The accommodations were impeccable as was Kevin's hosting. My wife and I travelled with our infant son (10 mo. old) and we found Kevin's place comfortable for all us. A definite thumbs up!

Had a wonderful stay.  Clean, close to all and Kevin was very helpful.  We loved staying in a residential area.  Was great to have snorkeling equipment which we used!  Would highly recommend staying here.   Uber is popular on Oahu so easy to get a cab if you don't feel like walking or driving.

We loved staying in this apartment in a private house. Parking right outside the front door. The neighborhood is walkable and quiet, and the apartment thoughtfully outfitted, clean, and carefully maintained.  Kevin provides all the beach gear you might need, plus a basket of welcome gifts. We loved Ala Moana Beach Park--even on a Sunday it wasn't crowded, and on Monday we had it almost to ourselves. I'd stay here again if I could.

Kevin's place was exactly as the picture shows.  It was neat and clean and enough room for the 3 of us.  It was well stocked with kitchen items, towels and bedding, beach chairs and snorkeling gear.  I actually didn't expect it to have so much available to us as this was my first time using Airbnb.  Kevin also left us a lovely welcoming gift basket.  When I needed to get in touch with him, he was very quick to get back to me and very helpful.  I would absolutely  recommend his place to anyone.  Thank you so much Kevin.

We loved our stay at Kevin's place. The apartment itself is great. It's immaculately clean, it's got brand-new furnishings and AC, and there were some lovely arrival gifts waiting for us in the form of chocolate and local coffee. It's also a great location, centrally located in Honolulu without being caught in the tourist trap that is Waikiki. You will need a car to get around, but thankfully the place comes with a parking spot and reasonable street parking. While I didn't get to meet Kevin in person, he was very responsive over the phone and made sure our stay was nice and pleasant.

Kevin's place was just what we were looking for during our stay in Oahu. he met us right at our front door when we arrived and welcomed us from our long flight! we definitely had enough space, the place was very clean, and it was close to almost everything we wanted to see and was close to the freeway, so getting around was super easy. the driveway right out front was definitely a plus as well. we felt right at home, and kevin was a wonderful, friendly host leaving us a welcome basket and being available to answer any questions. we were surprised to find the kitchen stocked so well of pans/utensils/condiments/spices which made cooking a breeze. would recommend this condo any day!

Kevin was a great host. He was friendly and provided some nice local gifts for us (coffee, chocolate and water). My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean and nicely decorated. I liked what Kevin did with the place particularly the setup. It was practical and very comfortable. The apartment is walking distance to Diamond Head which was convenient when we went hiking. The apartment is in a safe neighborhood a little ways from the downtown hustle and bustle, but still close enough - just a short drive. I really liked the place, and it came with a parking spot!  I would definitely stay here again! Thanks again Kevin!

This was a super place to stay. Kevin was a great host and always responded VERY quickly to any text message that we sent him. His place is spotlessly clean, very quiet, comfortable and a perfect place to relax. Wonderful accomodations!

From the minute you walk into Kevin's apartment, there is a very cosmopolitan feel.  The blend of Hawaiian and Parisian decorations make the apartment very hip.  We had a great time walking to places like Koko Head Cafe and KCC farmer's market and the Diamond Head Hiking Trail (as all are recommended by Kevin).  The included parking spot allowed us to feel like a local and venture around the island with reasonable drives to places like Pearl Harbor and Waikiki.  

The included washer/dryer and kitchen gave us a great home base during our adventure.  Knowing this, it allowed us to travel light and prepare meals in advance for our hikes.  

Kevin was very low-key and made great recommendations as mentioned above. He was always available and prompt to responding to any questions or requests.

This was the best AirBNB apartment that we have stayed in... in Honolulu. It looks exactly like the pictures. There is no need for me to post any. Very comfortable to stay in. I'd like to keep this place a (Website hidden by Airbnb) I can get back in next time ! The carpark spot helped immensely, especially as we needed a car to get to all the places that we wanted to go. Restaurants are so close (not the one's in Waikiki, the ones that the locals eat at!)
Perfect host, appartment was well equipped,   Very good communication. We"ll recommend.

We really loved this place!  Perfect size for two with the ability to cook in, and close enough to Waikiki to taxi in to town for shopping/dinner without breaking the bank.  Diamond head hike and the nearby farmer's market are must-do's for the full neighborhood experience.  Kevin also had a bunch of beach stuff (chairs, towels, boogie boards etc.) for us, which was great!  We would definitely stay again.

Our host Kevin was wonderful! Upon our arrival I had a question and he immediately came over to assist me. Very kind, courteous and helpful! The accommodations are exactly as you see in the photos. Very spacious and modern and welcoming.

The place is in a quiet neighborhood. Kevin made it easy to check in and out. I also loke the fact that he communicates fteauestly through text and email keeping you posted on yodur status of your room. Loved how clean and cozy the place is. This place has everything you can think of. Im very satisfied with this place will definitely stay again if i were to come back to to hawaii.

Kevin's place is simply awesome.  It must have been professionally designed and set up.  It felt like home with everything being perfect.  Ok, I prefer bar soap over liquid body soap, but who cares!  Down to the tiniest details there was no expense spared in the set up.  USB power outlets, dimmers on ceiling lights, a safe, bidet (which I thought was overkill), welcome basket, etc.  Even the paper towels and tp were high quality and not the budget variety.  I appreciated such thoughtfulness and attention to detail.

The apt is as described and pictured.  Everything felt new.  Neiborhood is a quite residential area and feels really safe.  It's a great base and convenient location to explore Oahu.  You'll really appreciate being away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki's tourist traffic.  But if you need retail therapy they are close.  Private parking space is always a good thing too.

What can I say, Kevin's place was great!!  This was my first Airbnb and I may never go back to staying at hotels.  I didn't actually meet Kevin since I was out most of the time, but I felt his welcoming spirit from his messages and the feel of his place.  I'm definitely staying here if I get to go back to Oahu.  Thanks, Kevin!

Kevin was an exceptional Host! He was extremely gracious to us and even greeted us with a wonderful gift basket full of goodies from Hawaii! This was our first time using AirBnB and boy are we glad that Kevin's place was our first experience! He is fully equipped with extra towels, snorkeling gear and spices for cooking. His apartment was very clean and loved the French theme! We would definitely stay here again! Kevin is spectacular!!!!
He lives adjacent to the property so was there as soon as we drove up.

Kevin's place is perfect, it really can't get much better.  Honestly, it's this type of Airbnb setup that probably has hotels worried. The place is stocked to perfection with every convenience you can need.  Great price, great location, clean, modern, and a super cozy feel.  “Check in” and “check out” is easy because there’s a remote keypad entry system - so no having to arrange for key pickup if you get in really early or late.  The neighborhood is quiet and close to everything interesting.  

In any case, the number of glowing reviews for his place speak for themselves.   We’d stay here again in a heartbeat. 

Thanks for the good stay.

We loved our stay at Kevin's place. The neighborhood was in a perfect central location-quiet, safe, and close to everything. The home was clean and cozy. Kevin provided everything we needed including a gift basket which was a very nice touch. We are lucky to have found his place and will not hesitate to stay again!

Kevin's place was so nice and looked just as shown in the pictures. It was definitely the nicest place we stayed at in HI, and we'd certainly look to stay there again when we return. 

Location was in a cute neighborhood on a hill near Diamond Head. It was nice to be out of Wakiki, but still very close by if we wanted to venture down there. 

Having the private parking spot may be the best part of the whole deal. Saved us so much stress and time!

Kevin was extremely accommodating and generous. Coffee was supplied and of course that is always the priority for us. There was also a parking spot which was very convenient. The beach chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards, etc that were provided were a life saver since we flew over from the mainland and there was no way we were able to bring all of that with us. The place was left very clean and inviting and Kevin was always quick to respond to all questions. The neighborhood was also very accessible and close to H1 highway and in a central location. I would definitely recommend Kevin's place too all friends and family of mine and would love to stay again!

Kevin's Place was a great stay! He was always available and easy to get in touch with. He provided lots of amenities. There was a wonderful welcome basket, washer, kitchen appliances. The best part were the equipment we could use to go to the beach, umbrella, snorkeling gear, chairs, beach towels. We wished we would have taken more advantage of that. It was a great place to stay. Not only would we recommend this to all of our friends and family but would definitely stay there again. It is a hidden gem!

Kevin's place was great! A short distance from Waikiki and downtown and had a parking spot for our rental car excursions. The apartment had everything we needed and included some thoughtful snacks/drinks for arrival. I'd definitely consider staying again if I return to Honolulu

Our stay at Kevin's place was fantastic.  The pictures are very accurate.  A great little neighborhood close to everything.  The kitchen was fully equipped, so we could make some meals there.  Comfortable bed, very nice shower and air conditioner.  Kevin was a wonderful host who answered our questions quickly and left us to enjoy our vacation.  We definitely would stay there again.  Very pleased.

Very quiet neighborhood , well situated for the city and other interesting places .
The apartment is very well equipped and stylish , perfect for a couple .
We stayed at Kevin's apartment for 4 nights and could not ask for a better place! Everything was so close and the apartment was very well equipped! We really felt like at home! Thank you Kevin!
Great place. Highly recommend this place.

Central location, clean, quite. I never prepared a meal there but found the kitchen fully stocked with utensils. Residential area with its own drive. Close to H1 , and most things tourists like to do.
