Perfect location in Kaimuki/Diamond Head area. Kevin is one of the best hosts I've ever stayed with and I've stayed at airbnb's all over the world. Everything was completely organized and professional from the get go. 

aloha, peter

Kevin is an excellent owner, his suggestions is very helpful. Because we are in Christmas vacation, he prepared a bottle of vine, chocolates, and local coffee for us, that's so sweet. The apartment is very beautiful, much better than we expected. I love the tree in front of the door. The location is not far from the most of scenic spots in Honolulu, so it's very convenient.

Everything in this rental was better than it looked in the pictures. The space was much bigger than I imagined and it was well stocked with everything we would need and all the extras we didn't anticipate before the trup. The little touches made our vacation and Kevin was super helpful! 
Navigating Oahu from this rental was easy! Great location for Waikiki and Hanauma Bay (plus Kevin had all the snorkleing gear and boogie boards to make day tripping to nearby beaches fun and easy). 
Can't say enough good things about this entire trip.

For two people, Kevin's place was more than sufficient for a week's vacation.  The kitchen was fully equipped, the bed was soft and comfortable, and bathroom/shower was big enough for a very tall person.  We especially enjoyed the room safe which kept our valuables safe and the beach chairs, sun shade umbrella, and snorkel sets.  We didn't need to use the room air conditioning as the two ceiling fans and floor fan adequately kept the place cool.  Kevin greeted us on the first day of check-in and then kept in touch by text even though he lived next door.  We appreciated the privacy.  TIP:  Rent a small car such as a Prius to park in the driveway (only the left side, no part of the car should be in the sidewalk area) and get around the neighborhood's narrow streets.
Exactly as described. Clean. Well appointed apartment. Would stay there again !!

Kevin is a fantastic host and is super responsive! Would definitely stay here again. Place is well furnished / stocked with all the essentials and close to the highway to get to all the sights. Thanks again Kevin!

Kevin was a great host! The place was very clean and had everything you need. Conveniently located within 10-15 minutes drive to Downtown Waikiki, we felt it was close enough to everything we wanted to see, but when we wanted a quiet night's sleep, we had it. The washer and dryer was also a great addition. Also, having access to the boogie boards, snorkeling gear, and beach umbrella was a huge plus. I would highly recommend Kevin's place and will happily return if given the chance.

Kevin was a very accommodating host, it was our first Airbnb stay and he made the process very smooth.  The location is great, we walked to the Saturday Farmer's Market and to Waikiki.  The welcoming gifts made us feel at home, especially to coffee drinkers!  Plenty of room, parking spot, clean and quiet.  Outdoor shower and beach gear (snorkels, flippers, beach towels) came in very handy!  Great value, hope to stay again in the near future.
Overall excellent

Kevin's place near Diamond Head is a real treasure. It is in a beautiful location on a hill with easy access by foot to Waikiki, ample parking and quick access to freeways so it's easy to explore the whole island.

The place itself is truly delightful--it's cozy, quiet  and extremely well-appointed. Kevin has thought of everything so you don't have to. One last finishing touch is the extremely comfortable bed. It's often an afterthought, but there's nothing like getting really good sleep on vacation.

If you have the opportunity to chat with Kevin, he's friendly, welcoming  and very knowledgeable about the area, having lived in Honolulu most of his life.

We look forward to staying again in the future!
My husband and I had a great time at this location.  The apartment was exactly as described on airbnb, and it was very nice.

Had a great time at Kevin's place. Many thoughtful details for our comfort. Location is ideal if you like being a short drive from all the action of downtown, but having a quiet, private place to come home to. Very close to Diamond Head for hiking and Diamond Head state park beach for great surf and beautiful beaches.

Advance communication and clarity of what is available couldn't be better; there was a little more noise during the night (animals, neighbors, ?) than we are used to at home but nothing that was the least bit disruptive to our comfort. Location requires rental car or private vehicle availability but otherwise has easy access to get around city and island.
Great place in a great location!

Kevin's housein Kaimuki/Diamond Head was spacious, clean, super comfortable, and in a great neighborhood. Kevin made check-in very easy and the space was extremely well furnished and equipped. Having our own parking spot in the driveway was another big plus. I would highly recommend both this rental and Kevin as a host.
Place was great. Kevin was a wonderful host and was very accommodating! I would definitely recommend this place to anybody going to Oahu and would come back again.
Great host and great place. Kevin's hospitality, place and the information he shared before and during our trip made our trip to HI even more meaningful and memorable.
Great location and very clean! Kevin was a great host!

케빈의 집에서의 숙박은 필요한 것이 모두 갖추워진 완벽한 숙박이었습니다. 편의시설이 잘 갖추어져있고 위치가 매우 좋습니다. 웰컴선물을 비롯해 호스트의 많은 케어와 환대를 느낄 수 있었으며 동시에 프라이버시를 최대한 보장받을 수 있었습니다. 평범한 가정집에서 숙박하는 느낌을 받을 수 있으며 깨끗하고 편안합니다. 하와이에 온다면 꼭 다시 숙박하고싶은 숙소입니다. 적극 추천~!

Kevin's place was great! Close to Waikiki without any of the parking chaos. The location perfectly matched the pictures. Kevin provided clear communication on check in, general apartment information, and check out. The location was quiet and felt very safe. Easy freeway access and proximity to take side streets to nearby Waikiki. Kevin also had great restaurant recommendations that we really enjoyed. Would definitely stay again and already recommended to our friends!

The house is in an absolutely perfect area. Near enough to the city to go explore but far enough that you don't have to worry about the hustle and bustle if you just want to have a quiet vacation. Communicating with Kevin was easy and he made the whole process as smooth as possible. Overall I had an excellent experience.

Wonderful place to start our honeymoon! I loved waking up every morning and going for a walk through the neighborhood. It was easy to find at 2am when our flight got in. Great location next to delicious restaurants, walking distance to the KCC farmers market and Diamond Head, and also close driving to a very quiet and windy beach. Kevin provided everything that was needed for a great experience. Forget Waikiki!

My boyfriend and I enjoyed staying over at Kevin's place! Kevin was very welcoming and his place was an ideal spot to spend a weekend in Hawaii. Great location. Great host. I highly recommend staying here! :)

The place was clean and pretty easy to find. We were able to walk to Diamond Head and walk up. Great morning hike. We were able to get to Waikiki to enjoy so touristy locations real quick but were able to stay away when we wanted. Close to the highway to go wherever we needed!

Would recommend

Kevin's place was great. We loved its location. It's proximity to shops and the freeway were really great. We rented a car and so were thankful for the parking. I would recommend his place to anyone that is looking to adventure all over the island which is exactly what we did and what we love to do.

The host is awesome. He's friendly and helpful and did everything he could to make sure we were happy and comfortable. He was happy to answer any questions we had during our stay and replied really quickly. 
The house was really nice and had everything you'll ever need. The little outdoor seating area was really lovely to sit and have a drink in the evenings. 
The property is really close to the Diamond Head trail which is definitely worth a visit. 
If we went back to Oahu, we'd like to stay there again.
Great little spot, close to town but quiet, safe, and secluded. Perfect for living like a local!

Kevin was a great host. He provided me with everything I needed to know. Any stores or food places close by within walking distance. We also bought groceries and Kevin provided us with anything we needed for cooking. Beach towels, beach chairs, snorkeling gear, boogie boards, and etc were also provided. He was very quick with communication if there were any questions I had to ask. His place is just as pictured it was very comfortable and me and my girlfriend really enjoyed it. It wasn't too far from Waikiki or downtown but was far enough to get away from the night life for peace and privacy. Overall our stay was amazing and I would most definitely suggest staying here. Thank you again Kevin for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home.

First experience Airbnb,
Above and beyond.
Couldn't have asked for anything more.

Everything you could ask for and more. 

Kevin kindly greeted us upon arrival. His place was fully stocked with everything you need while exploring Oahu from a portable cooler with speakers to snorkeling gear. 

The studio apartment was very clean and a welcome basket was provided with coffee, water and snacks. The kitchen had a water filter jug, coffee maker and microwave for our tasty leftovers. 

The bathroom had everything you would need even shaving cream and aloe vera, which was a lifesaver since we were burnt toast by the end of our trip. 

Kevin's place is in an ideal location: away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki but not to far from the action. 

I would definitely recommend this spot to couples, small families and solo travelers.

Perfect location for a couple's getaway to Oahu. It's a very quiet neighborhood that is conveniently located to Diamondhead, several beaches, and the main highway to get to attractions like Pearl Harbor and the North Shore. Kevin is a great host - very accommodating with our flight delays and great communication throughout our trip. The apartment has a well stocked kitchen and the beach essentials to make any vacation easy. Definitely will stay here again when coming back to Oahu.
This was such a great place.  It felt almost like staying at an expensive hotel without all the fees or hassle.  I’m glad stayed at Kevin’s.  I love love love his place and the price was perfect!

The place is in a quiet neighborhood but at the same time close to Waikiki and many other attractions at Oahu. Great location and very well maintained apartment! The beach amenities were great and made our trip a lot more convenient! Kevin was very nice and really responsive to any questions that we had. Definitely will stay again! Thanks Kevin!

I'm from Oahu so when I come back to visit family & friends I don't like to be stuck in Waikiki in some overly floral hotel -- I want to pretend like I'm living there and I haven't left.  I've stayed in a handful of airbnbs but this one was the best yet!
Wow...the decor was so stylish!  Parisian-tropical.  Loved it.  There's a bidet!! Big mirrors.  Cozy yet so classy.  No rattan or loud floral; refreshing.  Loved the outdoor shower with the little nautical light on top -- awesome little touch.  Greenery all around.  I sat out front at the little table (so private) and had delicious (complimentary) coffee in the mornings and tried to soak in all the chill beautiful vibes before I had to go back to LA.
Loved that we could park right in the driveway.  It's a downstairs unit but it was so quiet... we could hardly hear any footsteps from above.  We could walk to Kaimuki and Kahala and even Waikiki.  
The communication was amazing also.  Didn't get to meet Kevin in person, but he was so clear and welcoming in his emails from the start to finish.
This is the only Airbnb that I am seriously going to try hard to book again in the future.  I was so impressed by all the little details and truly felt at home. 
 Thanks Kevin!!
This was an A+ experience for me.  It was convenient, quiet, clean and comfy.  Kevin was very easy to work with and communicated all that was necessary in a timely manner.  I'll definitely be back.

Kevin's place is in a perfect location and perfect for anyone traveling as a couple. The airbnb is well outfitted with beach equipment, which proved to be very handy. Being able to park in the driveway was also a huge plus. Definitely would look to re-book if I ever visit Honolulu again.
Very pleasant experience, updated and spacious with everything you need in a place . Close to everything and best of all:  free parking. We ll rent here again.

Kevin’s home is very nice, it is located in a peaceful & quiet neighborhood. All the information provides on his listing are accurate.
We enjoyed reading the books on his book shelves at the time we didn’t feel like going out. We recommend this place to anyone who are visiting Honolulu.

My husband and I recently stayed at this Airbnb which was such a lovely find.  The location was ideal for accessing the many restaurants and cafes in Kaimuki and we really appreciated the parking spot that was included.  It was also a convenient walk to the KCC Farmers Market.  The space was clean, comfortable, and nicely decorated, and the host had thought of everything needed including beach towels, shampoo, spices for cooking, and even an umbrella!  Kevin was very responsive in all communication and very flexible.  Thank you Kevin, it was a pleasure to stay at your property.

Very clean welcoming cottage close to a Diamond Head. Kevin makes sure you have all that you need to have an enjoyable stay. It is perfect for two people that don’t need to be in the center of town but it is still close enough to be convenient to everything.

A great place to stay, feels like you live there. Located on a nice quiet street, but situated perfectly to get to the beach, shopping, restaurants, attractions, etc. in no time. A perfect studio apartment for a lone traveler or couple.
Great location, communication, and very clean place! The apartment is well furnished and has all the essentials! Would definitely stay here again!

Kevin’s place has everything we thought we needed and everything we need that we hadn’t thought of. Kevin met us upon arrival to show us around and was super nice on giving us advice about what to do. He answers messages almost instantly. He has outdoor showers that I didn’t think we needed because we didn’t go to the beach but when we came back from a hike, the showers were perfect for washing off our sneakers. There were the things you’d expect like towels, bed sheets etc.. and then there were all the extra amenities I didn’t expect like chairs, coolers & full stocked kitchen. I wish we cooked because there was literally every utensil available. We loved that there was water in the fridge upon arrival because after a long flight we were parched. It is a quiet neighborhood. It’s located next to everything though! We were 10 minutes from downtown Honolulu & a24 hour Walmart & 5 minutes from the Kahala hotel. 8 minutes from Koko head and a Costco. Love it! Thanks Kevin.

I would highly recommend this place to anybody coming by themselves or with their beloved. Clean quiet environment with nice attractions in close proximity. I would definitely consider coming back here for another Hawaii visit.

The place is *exactly* as advertised. Very clean, well-maintained, comfortable bed and well-appointed. Walkable to Diamond Head is a huge plus. Parking made our life so easy. So quiet and relaxing. proximity to Whole Foods was extra convenient. We’d stay here again on Oahu before going anywhere else.

Kevin's place is a really good value.  The location is perfect in a really safe neighborhood.  Good restaurants, beaches, and Waikiki are all within a 5-10 minute drive.  The studio itself has everything you would need!  Would highly recommend this place - I know I'll be on the lookout to stay here when I'm back!

Kevin’s place felt like such a hidden gem, and gave us the authentic Hawaiian experience that we were after. Situated just minutes from Diamond Head, and near quite a few tasty local restaurants, we had the chance to try so many things ‘off the beaten path’ that we never would’ve seen had we stayed off Waikiki in the touristy area. *if you’re up for a good hike, Moana Falls was AMAZING and so worth the short drive*. Kevin had lots of recommendations for nearby dining that we loved, and was super quick to respond. There were thoughtful touches in the place such as spices, cookware, sunscreen, beach towels etc. Check in and out were a breeze- would definitely recommend Kevin’s place, and would be happy to visit again! 

*Whole Foods was just minutes away and of course, was amazing for getting fresh groceries and delicious food  (Times grocery store next to Kahala Mall was a good option too and we found to be much cleaner than the other Times location) 
*There’s a fantastic little gelato stand inside Kahala Mall that we frequented
*Ichikiri was a 5 min drive away and had delicious Japanese hot pot 
*12 ave grill was one of Kevin’s recommendations - worth making a reservation for

Aloha!

Kevin’s place was truly amazing!  My girlfriend and I had an extremely memorable experience in Oahu.  This was hands down one of the most beautiful Airbnb’s we have ever used.  The washer and dryer came in very handy and was easily accessible right on the side of the apartment.  Parking was never an issue since Kevin also had a small parking spot on the left side of the driveway available for us to use.  Having a full size kitchen was definitely a plus since many other Airbnb’s in the area did not have one available.  We hope to stay at Kevin’s place again.

P.S. The snorkeling gear that Kevin provided for us to use came in very handy as we were able to use them as we explored the Hanauma Bay which was definitely one of the highlights of our trip!

Mahalo,
Derek & Stephanie

So many lovely touches to make your stay truly a “home away from home”-fully stocked kitchen with everything needed to cook your own meals and huge fridge to have multiple days of food on hand. Very comfy bed, soft towels and lots of bathroom admenties. Fans,a/c,hairdryer, extra towels,iron...you name it, everything you could possible need is supplied. The response time from host is amazingly fast and very helpful when we needed an emergency clinic. We are already suggesting this host to other family members for future adventures!

What a great place! 
Kevin literally has gone all out on this one folks. Every little detail is taken care of...
Such a relaxing neat apartment to enjoy your holiday in.
Book this one with confidence

Nice apartment with lots of extra amenities. Nicely appointed furniture, artwork, flowers, books, etc. All the cooking utensils, silverware, dishes that you’ll need if you want to prepare meals. Nice quiet residential neighborhood. You’re not in walking distance to beaches, restaurants or attractions, so you’ll need a car or lots of Uber rides. Easy 5 minutes drive to Diamond Head and Waikiki. Plenty of beach gear available for use, including 2 nice and comfortable beach chairs which we enjoyed.

Very clean, stylish and spacious studio. The kitchen and is top of the line and fully stocked, really nice. Amazing cross-wind breezes and birds outside to greet the day :) no ocean view but it’s on top of a hill so you can walk a block down and get a really nice view of the ocean that way. Definitely helps to have a car if you stay here. Diamond head hike is within walking distance if you’re up for an adventure - go in the morning and watch the sunrise for a treat! Park opens at 6. Thanks for a great stay Kevin!
Great and relaxing place!
Wonderful place; we had a wonderful stay.  Recommend it highly.
Charming one bedroom apartment conveniently located near Diamond Head and heart of Waikiki.  Could not have asked for a better host and stay.

Such a wonderful place away from the hustle of Waikiki but close enough to anything you would want to do. We especially enjoyed the proximity to authentic restaurants and hiking Diamond Head. Check in was so convenient. We slept so well after each full fun day! Would definitely stay here again.

Kevin's & Yukie's place was awesome. Lots of extra little things that made the stay nice. The bed & pillows were amazing and we slept great. Plenty of close easy street parking if your car isn't short enough to fit in the driveway without blocking the sidewalk.
Great place to get away from the busy parts of Waikiki yet close enough to get to in no time! Great communication and helpful with everything you need to have a successful trip to HNL.

What a great spot for a couple that want to be in a super location.  The trade winds were great while we were there, and you truly don't need the a/c when that's going on... I would pick this location over Kahala or just about anywhere else on in the Honolulu area - so close (walking distance) to all the fun stuff in Kaimuki, plus Kahala Mall, and easy access to the highways in case you want to beat it to more remote beaches, etc.  The apartment is nicely sized - plenty of room - quiet, and with an excellent library including lots of good guide books.  We would definitely stay again.
Amazing stay, Kevin was extremely helpful and the place was fantastic.

Kevin’s unit is absolutely fantastic! I’ve stayed in numerous Airbnb’s and this one is one of the best I’ve encountered. So many thoughtful touches, SO clean, comfortable and modern! Would stay again!

Kevin’s place is amazing. It’s everything that is in the picture plus more!!! The amenities are outstanding!!! Snorkel gear and beach things were provided and very well organized. This place is kept VERY CLEAN. I can’t stress that enough. Communication with Kevin is top notch, he’s very quick with responses. If you are looking for a nice and quiet place to rest your head after traveling the island, this is the place to book.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This apartment is wonderful. The location is very nice - quiet and less crowded than Waikiki but still very close to that area (a few minutes driving distance). There are beautiful views of the ocean from the street and you are within walking distance of Diamond Head (about 20-25 minute walk to the trail head). The amenities of the apartment are excellent - so much better than a hotel and a much better value! Kevin was a great host and was super helpful with recommendations for local restaurants and things to do in the area. We loved it and would be happy to come back and stay again! Aloha!

Kevin’s place is amazing! It is well located near Diamond Head and close to all Waikiki has to offer. The apartment is very clean, the bed is comfortable, there is a large kitchen, and parking for one small car. Kevin immediately responded to all our questions and suggested things to do in the area. We went to an incredible Farmer’s Market on Saturday, right up the street within walking distance. We highly recommend Kevin’s apartment for your next stay in Waikiki!

Kevin's place was great! I appreciated how quiet the neighborhood was and how close it was to Diamond Head and central Honolulu. I definitely recommend this listing and will visit again next time I'm in town.
A++ from A - Z!! Would definitely return without any hesitation!
Absolutely delightful! Beautiful space, thoughtfully decorated and everything we needed! Kevin was super easy to get a hold of, friendly and communicative. Definitely recommend this lovely apartment!

케빈의 숙소에는 하와이 여행에 필요한 모든 것이 구비되어 있다. 
비치용품, 취사도구, 침구류 모두 충분한 수량이 준비되어 있고 심지어 두 개의 water purifier도 있다. 집의 구조는 privacy가 충분히 지켜지는 구조이고, 집 밖에 샤워시설이 있어 물놀이 후 귀가 시 모래를 제거하고 집으로 들어올 수 있다. 
집에서 보내는 시간도 충분히 활용할 수 있도록 두 개의 요가매트와 요가교육DVD, 여행관련 책자들과 가족과 함께 보기 좋은 DVD 또한 구비되어 있다. 
케빈은 체크인 시간에 맞추어 적절한 조명 및 fan을 켜 두었고, 웰컴선물을 준비해 놓았다. 욕실, 주방을 포함한 집 전체가 매우 깨끗하게 관리되고 있으며 주차 또한 편리하다.
와이키키에서 도보로 거리가 가깝지는 않으나, 가장 유용한 2번버스 정류장 까지의 거리가 가까워 렌터카 없이도 충분히 여행이 가능하다.

reviews.comments:
Die Gastgeberin hat uns vom Flughafen abgeholt und hat uns sofort einen Plan über Barcelona übergeben. Die Gastgerber waren sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Es war wunderschön bei Ihnen zu wohnen. Wir haben uns immer gefühlt wie zu Hause. Der Blick auf der Terrasse war ein Traum auf La Sagrada Familia und die Stadt Barcelona ob dies bei Sonnenschein am Morgen oder am Abend bei Beleuchtung. Die Wohnung war sehr ruhig sauber und (Website hidden by Airbnb) gibt einen Aufzug und die Wohnung ist im 8. Stockwerk. Es war ein gemütlicher Ort. 
Wir konnten die Küche immer benutzen sowie die wunderschöne Terrasse.

Blanca's place is awesome - a lovely clean room with plenty of privacy due to the layout of the apartment. There are nice touches of style and design without being too overbearing. There's a desk and plenty of storage space for clothes and luggage etc. I was pleasantly surprised to find that there was even a private bathroom with shower.

The listing was accurate, other than the location, which was much better that indicated on the map - the apartment is VERY close to the Sagrada Familia - just the other side of Plaça Gaudi.

The room opens out through large glazed doors onto a beautiful large balcony (private to the apartment) which has really stunning views - immediate magnificent view of the Sagrada Familia, and a wonderful panorama of the rest of the city and the Mediterranean.

Blanca and Alex were extremely welcoming and friendly, and helped me with any questions I had. I really enjoyed meeting them and hope to stay at their place again. Hopefully next time I will have more time to spend on the balcony drinking in the atmosphere.

The location is fab, it's a clean and quiet room, access is easy, and overall it was a very enjoyable stay - what more could you ask for?

Il week end trascorso a casa di Blanca è stato indimenticabile! La posizione della casa é ottima, a pochi passi dalla Sagrada Familia e dalla metro! La terrazza è ancora più bella di come appare in foto e lei é davvero gentile e disponibile! super! Da ripetere!

Perfect location for looking around the city and seeing an enormous and beautiful cathedral with a drink. Blanca and Alex are amiable and good listeners. You guys who are watching this review, if you choose this house for your holiday, you will never regret.

L'accoglienza di Blanca è stata totale, siamo stati un solo weekend dove lei ci ha dato indicazioni perfette per sui luoghi da visitare e dove andare la sera come di giorno.
La casa è molto accogliente ma sopratutto la terrazza con la vista sulla Sagrada Familia non ha paragoni in tutta Barcellona.
5 stelle non bastano per dare il giusto voto a questa struttura.

Together with my father I stayed 5 nights at Blanca's and Alex' apartment and it was a true joy. The apartment is perfectly located to visit the city center (close to metro), but also the neighborhood around the apartment is very nice and worth to look around.

Absolute highlight of the apartment is the sunny terrace with the view on Sagrada Familia and the rest of the city.

Both Blanca and Alex were super helpful and supportive to tell us where to go. I can recommend their place to everybody who is going for a city trip to Barcelona.

Blanca and Alex are wonderful people who also love travelling and hence understand the needs of travellers. They shared many tips about Barcelona that was very helpful. The room  has an access to a terrace that faces La Sagrada Familia which is lovely. As both of them are busy working couples,you are very much on your own,so a lot of privacy. You also have a private toilet for your use. Will highly recommend this place as it is near a quite area with easy access to metro. Both Alex and Blanca are easy and fun loving couple. You will like their company. Cheers!

Prima Unterkunft. Das Inserat hält was es verspricht. Die Dachterasse, ob zum Frühstück , Abends oder Nachts mit Panoramablick über Barcelona und die Sagrada Familia, ist einzigartig. Mit der Metro lassen sich viele Hotspots in Kürze erreichen. Blanca und Alex sind sehr sympathische, unkomplizierte Gastgeber, die uns zusätzlich noch gut versorgt haben mit Infos und Tipps. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

On a adoré notre séjour à Barcelona ! On a apprecié la proximité du métro et du marché! ..Salle de Bain privé et la petite chambre cozy avec accès directe Sur la térasse avec cette vue sur cet étrange monument qu' est la Sagrada familia! Charmant accueil de Blanca et de son copain! ...Des gens simplement sympathiques!
Merci!
Michel et Nathalie
Amazing place, exactly as at the pictures. Hosts were really nice and friendly.

Blanca and Alex are very welcoming, friendly and knowledgeable hosts who have a rather lovely apartment with an incredible view of the Sagrada Familia and of Barcelona. The guest section is quite private and separate, with a spacious, comfortable room, private bathroom (such a bonus!) and own entrance onto the huge balcony. The living space and kitchen are shared, but really you can be entirely independent if you wish, or else the hosts are happy to chat and get to know you. It would be a very good location for sight seeing, and if you want to go to the beach, it's about 30 minutes on public transport. The apartment was pretty quiet at night and Blanca and Alex are out at work a lot too. The festival of Saint Joan was on when I was there and they invited me to join them and family on the balcony to watch the festivities, which was very thoughtful. Everything was clean, worked properly and the guys are generous and helpful Blanca even loaned me her phone charger and her yoga mat while I was there! X

seriously i recommend to stay in here.
great location to see sagrada familia!
and metro is very near from here.
they are very helpful.
my flight was delay at that time but they were waited for me few hours.
bathroom works well. 
i want to stay in here again

We loved our stay with Blanca and Alex!  Their apartment is so lovely and the terrace view is incredible. Blanca and Alex are so friendly and welcoming but we also felt completely private. They allowed us a super early check in, and bought us some bottles of water on arrival. The location is central with a very short walk to the metro. We wanted to stay longer with them. Would definitely stay there again.

The place was nice. It had a really good view of Sagrada Familia. Blanca and her boyfriend was really nice good hospitality! Only downside is no aircon which was difficult with the geat during midday.

This flat was magical!!! My friend and i had a blast!!! Its close to everything, the view is fantastic, its clean and Blanca and Alex were very good host!! Thank you so much and we recommand it to everybody!!! Ciao!

Blanca à su nous mettre à l'aise avec ses grands sourires alors que nous étions très gênés d'arriver après minuit ( annulation+retard de vol) et de l'avoir réveillé! 
La vue est splendide et permet assez bien de se repérer dans la ville après 2-3 jours ( Tour Agbar/Montjuic/Tibidado/Barri Gotic/Sagrada etc)
Je conseille fortement! A refaire absolument !

Blanca a été une hôtesse parfaite et très sympa. L'appartement est très fonctionnel et magnifiquement situé avec sa belle et grande terrasse donnant sur la Sagrada. Rien à redire sauf un grand merci à Bianca

Breathtaking views from the terrace and very helpful and friendly hosts were the highlights of our holiday.
Nice room with bathroom and access to terrace with a lot of privacy.
Thanks again Blanca and Alex.

We hebben genoten van Bianca appartement ,een zeer goed king size bed en een private badkamer. Een zeer groot en prachtig terras met een uitzicht om van te dromen.Bianca die klaar staat om al je vragen te beantwoorden .Wij zullen er zeker terugkeren en raad deze plaats aan iedereen aan.

Wir waren 5 Tage bei Blanca und ihrem Freund zu Gast.
Die Wohnung hat eine Toplage .mit SuperBlick auf die Sagrada Familia.
Metro ,Bäcker,Restaurant,Supermarkt alles ums Eck.
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und Blanca als sehr aufmerksame,gastfreundliche und unkomplizierte Gastgeberin kennengelernt.
Kann man nur empfehlen und würden jederzeit wieder buchen.

We had a great stay at Blanca’s apartment. 
The room was peaceful, clean and comfortable. It steps out onto a terrace with the most spectacular view of the beautiful Sagrada Familia. We spent every late afternoon soaking up the sun, drinking wine and watching the world go by from there. 
Blanca and Alex were welcoming, helpful and communicative. Would definitely recommend. :-)
위치가 성가족성당 코앞이라서  좋았고  가우디의작품의 충분히 감상할수 있어 좋았고 테라스가 넓어서 좋았다  아쉬운점은 개인실이라서 호스트와 마주치거나 호스트가 늦은시간 주방을 사용하거나 남친과 밤늦게 싸울때는 좀 안좋았고 불편했지만 개인실이라서 어쩔수없는것같다 가격대비 그래도 만족스럽고 주변에 큰슈퍼마켓도 많고 지하철도 집앞이라 교통도 편리했다

The location is great. The room is on the other side of the apartment so there is a lot of privacy and it has your own bathroom. Alex and Blanca are so nice and let us check in early. Great value for the space and location. Very easy to get around the city from here.
Tolle Unterkunft, tolle Zeit, super Gastgeber!

Beautiful apartment, breathtaking views, cracking location, wonderful hosts! 
(We will be back soon!)

We had such a great experience staying in Blanca's place in Barcelona. The location is very convenient ( a short walk to good restaurants and most importantly 2 min walk to Sagrada Familia). The view from the balcony is just breathtaking and one of a kind. The room was super clean and well organized. Comfortable bed, well equipped kitchen and a great balcony area, ideal for chilling and taking amazing pictures. We will definitely be back for another break. Thank you Blanca and Alex for sharing your home with us:)
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We really enjoyed staying at Blancas place! Her and Alex were extremely nice, as we got to spend some time talking to them on their lovely patio. The room is on the opposite side of the house so we had plenty of privacy, along with our own bathroom which was a plus! It got pretty hot since there is no air conditioner, but they provided a fan that helped a lot at night. Since we weren't there much during the day it was not an issue! 

We would definitely recommend their apartment room!

name: Gorgeous One Bedroom Apartment
space: Our gorgeous 1 bedroom apartment is on the most sought after block in the East Village and likely the city.  See “our block has” below. This is a floor through loft – like apartment - meaning we have views down to the street below from our bedroom and see the gardens out the back of the building from our rear windows.    We are on the first floor of our walkup. The apartment has beautiful finishes and fixtures like marble countertops throughout the kitchen and bathroom.  The bathroom has an extra deep soaking tub with massage jets (perfect after a long day of walking in the city!)   Typically, you’d have to be in Brooklyn to find the space this apartment offers.  This is a very rare apartment which is decorated impeccably is spacious and clean AND is located in THE BEST neighborhood.    The dining room has lovely high quality furniture and a beautiful mantel adorned with fantastic original artwork.   The dining room also has a massive piece of artwork (9 ‘ x 4’) designed by a Japanese

house_rules: We hope you will keep the apartment in the condition in which you find it while you are staying with us.  Please be respectful of the neighbors when playing music in our home.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
5 Things I can’t live without:

1)My bike!
2)A good pillow!
3)My favorite tea! – PG Tips!
4)My Friends and Family
5)Good Food!

We have a great love of travel and we love NYC … between the two of us we have lived in the East Village for 18 years!... That’s a lot of knowledge and we can’t wait to share it with you!!

We love to travel in all different ways… Sometimes roughing it other times rolling in luxury…  

In terms of life motto…  Life is short… Celebrate often.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Great Penthouse with a view in a friendly Favela
summary: Discover the life of Tijuquinha, a small, friendly & very safe favela and stay in a 5 stars penthouse (Luxury Suite Master +  terrace with a fantastic view on the most prestigious Polo Field of Rio de Janeiro and the Tijuca Forrest).
