reviews.comments: The suit is incredible. Across the street the street from the polo club the apartment offers great views of the surrounding mountains and you can literally sit on the huge balcony and enjoy a polo match. Unique and safe location. Highly recommend it!
Great place, good location and very safe. I will be back for sure. Alexandre is great host.

name: Economy Family Room for 4-5pax (306)
summary: We are at the heart of  Jordan area,  across  Nathan & Austin Road. Just 2 minutes to/from Jordan MTR station Exit D & E and airport buses. Best for tourist! along Nathan Road, walking distance to TST and Yaumatei. There are lots of Shopping malls, local Food and sightseeing within the vicinity.  Despite of it's busy location, we have a quiet and secured apartment, safe entrance and lift access as well as we maintain  clean & hygienic place to give you a complete peace of mind.
space: A double bed for couple and a double decker bed with pullout suitable for another 3 members of the family. The room is suitable for a group of 4 travellers looking for a low budget room.  Our apartment is about 1,000 s.f located in 3/F of Block A of Pak On Bldg Austin Road. We have 2 lifts for the convenience of our guest and our building is accessible 24 hours daily.  We have total  8 bedrooms that comes in different sizes. We have rooms from single to double occupancy as well as we have also rooms for family of 3 to maximum 6 occupancy. Each room have it's own TV, aircon & wifi access. Some of our rooms have  shared bathrooms which means bathrooms are within common area for sharing. While we have also en-suite rooms with it's own private bathroom inside, depending on the guest preference. In the receiving area, we have a small counter and a bench to welcome our guest or a resting area for some guest. We have wifi access everywhere of our premises. We have also computer incase some gu
description: We are at the heart of  Jordan area,  across  Nathan & Austin Road. Just 2 minutes to/from Jordan MTR station Exit D & E and airport buses. Best for tourist! along Nathan Road, walking distance to TST and Yaumatei. There are lots of Shopping malls, local Food and sightseeing within the vicinity.  Despite of it's busy location, we have a quiet and secured apartment, safe entrance and lift access as well as we maintain  clean & hygienic place to give you a complete peace of mind. A double bed for couple and a double decker bed with pullout suitable for another 3 members of the family. The room is suitable for a group of 4 travellers looking for a low budget room.  Our apartment is about 1,000 s.f located in 3/F of Block A of Pak On Bldg Austin Road. We have 2 lifts for the convenience of our guest and our building is accessible 24 hours daily.  We have total  8 bedrooms that comes in different sizes. We have rooms from single to double occupancy as well as we have also rooms for family o
neighborhood_overview: We are nestled in the heart of Kowloon Central, in the centre of Jordan and TST Nathan Road. Public transportation is accessible including MTR, the fastest vehicle to reach all destinations around Hong Kong.  Going to the West side of our place is 2 minutes walk to Kowloon Park and 30 mins walk going to straight direction is a West Kowloon Promenade, Elements, Kowloon Station  as well as Hong Kong Macau Ferry. Going to South Direction is Tsim Sha Tsui area, 15 mins walk to TST Harbour City as well as TST Cultural Centre and HK Space Museum. To the East is going to the direction of Polytechnic University, Hung Hom KCR station and TST east, Science Museum and Rosary Church. To the North side is walking distance to  Temple Street Night market or Two (2) MTR stops to Mong Kok Ladies Night Market & Nelson Street, a place famous for all branded rubber shoes.
notes: “No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow" Lin Yuntang We are your home away from home! We are your home here in Hong Kong! We welcome all kinds of guest coming from Different parts of the world and from all walks of life. Our place is suitable for tourist who intend for a short stay to long staying guest. Most of our guest are budget travelers looking for an affordable, clean and safe place within the vicinity of shopping area of Kowloon. Another group of our common guest are families looking for a low budget home for a family but where they can cook simple dishes before going for a long day trip around HK or Macau. “Are you planning to come to Hong Kong? Let us understand your requirements and we'll make sure to make your stay unforgettable in an economical way" We provide a safe, affordable & clean residential unit. Located at the heart of Kowloon area and accessible as you can ever imagine, 3rd bus stop from th
transit: -2 mins walk from MTR exit E & D  -Taxi cabs stops in the front & back of our building -2 mins walk from the 11th bus stop of Airport Bus A21 -Airport Express free shuttle bus stops in front of the bldg -7 mins walk to Kowloon ferry pier to Macau -Green Minu bus 6  stop to/ from TST & Hung Hom area  -By MTR access to Disneyland, Ocean Park, The peak, Asiaworld Expo, HK convention & Exhibition Centre & others parts of HK
access: Our place is located in the 3/F of Pak On Bldg. We have 24 hours building access with lift service. Our apartment is accessible 24 hours daily. Each guest has their own room key for their safety and privacy. We have a landline available in the counter for use everyone. Please understand that our place is a Homestay like accommodations, therefore we have someone stay in the place 24/7 to maintain cleanliness.  Our common 2 bathrooms are for sharing among other  We charge HKD 50 per load for use of washing machine. Our  hair dryers and irons are found in the common area for sharing among other  guest. We also provide free hot and cold drinking water.
interaction: My husband Ken is most of the time staying in the counter to meet everyone of you. He gives assistance  and his best tips based on your travel needs to enrich your local experience in Hong Kong. Although we urge you to plan ahead your trips but incase you need some suggestions, please feel free.  As our Add on service to you, we provide you FREE Tour Advisory; we will help you plan your tours to maximize your stay. All you have to do is discuss with us your tour plans & expected destination, we can arrange referral for cheaper theme park tickets & other destinations (i.e Disneyland, Ocean Park, Ngong Ping 360, 1 day Macau trip) including transportation schedules and directions. We also provide Airport pick up services. Just incase you need a personal guide for your tours, just let us know & we can also arrange referral for your convenience. We also refer cheaper tickets for Disneyland, Ocean Park, The Peak and Ngong Ping 360 . Buying tickets a day before your trip will save you more ti
house_rules: This apartment is now your home during your short  stay in Hong Kong. Please handle all our facilities with care like your own.  Please use all resources such as electric and water in a moderate way. Turn off aircons, lights & water heater when you're going out of the house. Use bedsheets, pillows and towels in an appropriate manner. (E.g do not use the towel to wipe the floor or do not eat in the bed which will easy spill out in the bedsheets) any improper use of facilities that causes damage, we reserve our rights to charge the guest according to the actual price of the damage item.  We love pets personally but we do not allow entry of pets in consideration of other guest.  As we are located in a residential area, Guest are expected  to minimize noise as neighbours do not like Loud and Noise. In addition, from 11pm onward most guest are sleeping in preparation of next day long day trip.  This is a non smoking property, according to Hong Kong Government no smoking is allowed to any pr

host.host_location: Unit A2 3/F Block A Pak On Building 105 Austin Road Jordan, Kowloon, Hong Kong
host.host_about:
I live to eat! So I travel to meet new friends, see new places and explore different delicacies of different places in the world! 

I am a Filipina and my husband Ken is a local HK person. As a host, we match most of our guest expectations. We are hospitable and friendly family and we put cleanliness of our premises as priority. HK is also our expertise being a residence here for few decades. We give good tips to our guest to maximize their enjoyment during their stay in HK. We will be happy to host all kinds of tourist in HK coming from different parts of the world and from all walks of life.

我住的吃!所以,我出差到结识新朋友,看到新的地方,探索在世界不同的地方不同的美味佳肴!

我是菲律宾人,我的丈夫肯是当地的香港人士｡作为东道主,我们最符合我们的客户的期望｡我们是好客和友好的家庭,我们把我们的场地作为优先清洁度｡香港也是我们的专长在这里是一个住所几十年｡我们给予好的建议给我们的客人他们在香港逗留期间,最大限度地发挥他们的享受｡我们将很乐意举办香港各类游客来自世界各地和各行各业的到来｡

reviews.comments: Have a great stay in Hong Kong. The host was very helpful in accommodating to our request. Clean and quiet environment and very near to the MRT station. We certainly highly recommended this place to those who are looking for a budget room.
The place was amazing and had really friendly staff. We felt right at home and best part was it was in the heart of nathan road. :) we'll definitely come back
Zyla的房没有了,很热心地帮忙介绍其他房给我,人很不错｡

Convenient for being 10mins walk from Tsim Sha Tsui, 3mins walk to Jordan Station. A 7-eleven, watsons and restaurants in the opposite as well as a bakery just beside the building. The hostel provides basic needs from soap to toothbrush/paste, chopsticks, hot/cold water, hairdryer.
房間非常乾淨,雖然不大,但是很溫馨,這裏讓我覺得像住在家裡一樣｡房東很Nice,很熱心地與我們溝通和交流,無論是工作人員還是房客,都非常友好｡這裏的交通很便利,200米処就有地鐵站,出門就可以坐巴士和的士,下次若再來香港,會再來這裏住呢!
我喜欢这里房间没有异味,交通方便,生活方便｡可以不带任何旅行装,然后在楼下买｡周围还有几家茶餐厅､西餐厅和日本料理,面包店等等｡地理位置就在佐敦港铁站附近,去逛街､购物和感受香港文化都非常方便｡房东和员工人非常nice!在元旦旺季非常热心地帮助我们临时决定办理续租｡

JORDAN역 주변에 위치하여 MTR을 이용하는데 편리했다. 가격이 매우 저렴했으나 방 크기는 비교적 작았다. 그러나 적절했던 가격이였다. 호스트분들은 매우친절했고 방은 깔끔했고 화장실이나 샤워실 또한 깨끗했다.
This place was nearby jordan station, so very convenient using mtr when we went to center of Honkong. Price was very cheap but room was very small, I think that price is proper. Host is very kind. Room, toilet and shower booth was very clean.
虽说地方小是小了一点,好在东西也都还齐全,环境也比较干净,尤其地理位置很方便,可以步行到尖沙咀
房东十分热情,让我们有在家的感觉｡虽然住的地方小,但交通非常便利｡并且周围有很多餐厅｡
Very hospitable! So nice and went out of their way to make sure we enjoyed our stay!

Tita Zyla and Tito Ken...absolutely hospitable and friendly! They suggested things to do in practical ways so that we could enjoy our stay in Hong Kong. A walkable location to – Victoria Harbour (A Symphony of Lights), Kowloon Park, Cafe de Coral (budget-friendly meals), Jordan station (MTR), bus stops, Temple Street Night Market and a lot more. You may take an MTR, about 2-4 stations away, and explore the Ladies Market, Goldfish Market and another best place is the Flower Market (potted plants and seeds could be bought here.) When you get there, do not forget to visit Tian Tan Buddha and Ocean Park (tell them in advance so that they could find you a discount). Street foods are everywhere so try them. Before heading to the airport, Tito Ken and Gab treated us some milk tea, pineapple bun and another cute-looking bread, incredibly delicious.
Great food, great people and a very memorable travel with my family… Thank you so much!

第一次用airbnb订房,本来挺担心安全问题的,不过,这家宾馆的评论都很好,而且房东也很热情,有问必答,所以,我最终订了房,事实证明,这是一个很正确的决定｡宾馆的地理位置很方便,可以走去庙街,九龙公园,甚至海港城等,离旺角也就一个地铁站,如果认识路,完全可以走过去~房间也挺大的,我165cm,不会睡不下,还有桌子和电视,wifi也很快｡厕所挺大的,不过几个房间一起用,所以,每天都是厕所争夺战(¯▽¯)噪音问题也不大,不过香港的车都开得好快,车声比较大｡房东很温柔也很好人,还请我们吃了很好吃的椰挞｡重点来了,我离开香港去到关口,才发现,通行证不见了!!把行李翻了很多次,都没有,打开 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,才知道,漏在宾馆了,只能打车回去拿了,350的打车费,真心心疼,所以大家一定要看好,检查好通行证再走,挂失要一天,如果没有身份证要三天｡当然,也很感谢房东告诉了我,其实房东在我离开香港前已经发 (Hidden by Airbnb) 给我了,可是我没有流量,所以没看到,说真的,弄一张香港的电话卡吧!没有流量,不能打电话,其实真的很不方便,我就试过逛街找不到朋友,各种找,各种等,很不方便｡还有,这次旅行遇到了很多好人,有提醒我身份证掉了的,有提醒我背包拉链忘记拉上的(两次忘记拉上都没有不见东西),有主动指路的,有热心帮忙拍照的,大家都很好,所以,这次旅行还是挺好的~我们都很满意,也已经推荐给了朋友们,下次去香港也会再订的~
Great location.
Ken and Zyla was a great house. They made us feel welcomed.
挺不错的,房子在佐敦,出门上大路就是地铁站,往北是油麻地和旺角,往南是尖沙咀,往西可以走到海港城,都是一整条街的路程,很方便｡由于不处于闹市区的正中,所以周边也不会太嘈杂,银行､便利店､饭馆都很多｡房东很热情,有什么需求告诉他们就好了,房子也很整洁,靠里的房间也不吵｡唯一就是由于厕所是公用的,所以有时候用厕所需要等,不过一般也不会太久｡

Its a good choice that i book in Zyla's apartment . There location is great near to malls, restaurants and night market no need to ride u can actually walk from it. Since its ny first time to HK i really dont have idea how we can commute and go in some places . Im glad that Zyla and his husband ken is very helpful and give us direction how to get there . I  highly recommend this to all filipino travellers and also other foreign practically wise and will truky enjoy there Hongkong trip.

เจ้าของห้องใจดีมากๆ ช่วยแนะนำสถานที่และวิธีการเดินทางให้อย่างละเอียด ห้องเล็กแต่ก็คุ้มค่ากับราคา ห้องน้ำมี 2 ห้อง สะอาด มีสบู่เหลว แชมพู ครีมนวดผม ยาสีฟันให้บริการ 
สถานที่อยู่ใกล้สถานีรถไฟใต้ดินมากๆ สะดวกมาก จอร์แดนมีห้างร้านและร้านอาหารมากมาย เดินไปจิมซาจุ่ยได้สบาย
房东很热情,房内设施齐全,楼下交通非常便利,下次还住这里
‍房间很干净,房东的人也很热情 ,位置也不错,离地铁站很近

My friends and I would highly recommend Zyla's place. The location is very accessible to MTR, nearby convenient stores, various shops and a walking distance to the Temple Street Night Market also! We weren't able to meet Zyla personally but her caretakers were very hospitable and helpful to our queries. Also, she's just a call away too! She was very much willing to extend her help to us which we really loved about the whole duration of our stay in HK. We really felt at home. Even Ken accompanied us to the Ferry Terminal so we won't get lost. The place was well maintained, comfy and clean. We really had a good sleep. Their WI-FI connection is also very fast!  Plus, the price of the room is reasonable too! Will definitely be back here for our next HK trip. Thank you Zyla and Ken for a wonderful experience ! :)

Zyla was very helpful even before we arrived in HK. She gave useful travel advise and was generally accommodating. 
The place was clean and cozy. The shared bathroom was well maintained as well.
Will recommend to friends and family who want affordable and quality lodging with no frills.

Thank you Zyla!
房间虽小,但却干净整洁,温馨舒适｡地理位置不错,交通方便｡工作人员很友好,在我退房那天,老板邝先生还亲自来到酒店说再见｡唯一觉得不太理想的事,旅店木有提供洗漱用品｡而我这一次还木有带牙膏,希望房东可以在网站上面写清楚呢,当然这也不是什么大问题啦｡总体来说我这次行程很满意,下次一定还会来住!

The location is very convenience, just right around the corner of the Jordan MTR, but the bathroom is not like the picture. The shower drain clog and the water couldn't go through. The feet were full of shower water and I felt nasty. The bedroom is nice, overall I think what it needs to improve is a functional and clean bathroom!!

Good ratio quality/price.
Zyla and her husband are really kindly and helpful.
The localisation of the room is really convenient, next to Nathan Rd and all of shop / restaurant. One thing, you're in center, so is not really quite if you search this.
房源的位置优越｡价格实惠｡
服务态度超好
住的地方挺方便的,虽然小了点,不过要啥自行车,哈哈………Nice And friendly.

For a very short period we live in here,we felt very good for finding such a good place to stay.Ken was very nice to us,helpfully gave us so many advices.And the place is very close to the metro,so it's very convenient.Wonderful experience!:)
非常完美的一次旅行住宿体验!房东和工作人员都非常热情!房间很干净,床很舒适,虽然身处闹市,但是感觉很安静,一晚上睡到天亮!最幸运的是地段非常好,佐敦地铁站出来后步行3分钟就能到,到哪里都很方便,楼下就能购物,真的是一次完美的住宿体验!在寸土寸金的香港能住到性价比这么高的房间真的让人很开心!强烈推荐!下次一定还会再来的!

Great location, cozy and clean room condition. Exactly same as the pictures.  The host was helpful. But they provided 1 towel per 1 person even though we stayed 2 nights, so bring your own towels as you need.

Looking for a cozy place in Hong Kong? Look no further than Zyla's Guest House in Jordan, Kowloon. HK is known to have many high-risers, tight spaces, and mimic urban metropolis China in many ways. For any FIRST-TIME travelers (like I was), I did thorough vigilant research on the best, most cost-effective place to stay in HK and Zyla's was the best! For under $50 nightly, you get your own private bedroom and access to 2 communal bathrooms and some kitchen appliances/amenities.  You also will realize quickly, HK is split into 2 main regions- Kowloon and Hong Kong Island. I recommend staying in Kowloon as it is closer to the airport and the fun areas were closer and within walking distance. HK Island's areas were more spreadout and most of the island is inaccessible anyway due to nature. Zyla's Guest House is located in a quiet building on Austin/Nathan Road. It's also a 5 minute walk to the Jordan MTR station which is amazing! 7-11, Starbucks, and McDonalds are all right across/within walking distance. Service was also amazing. Zyla responds to messages and inquiries within 24 hours. I had the pleasure of interacting with her, her husband Ken, and the caretaker Kok who is there 24/7 mostly. Zyla and her husband do not reside in the guest house but come frequently (if not, daily) to check in on the AirBnb. All my accommodations were met- fast WIFI, towels, bathroom/shower access, drinking water, microwave, etc. There will be other guest coming in 'n out, but I did not experience any rudeness/loudness :) HK is a humid country, so your A/C will be on most of the time when you're in the room. With a small space, make sure to handle your space/luggage well! Otherwise, enjoy Zyla's Guest House and Hong Kong!

조단역에서 가까운 오래된 맨션으로 방이 너무작고 에어컨 소리크고 모기많고 , 와이프랑 애들이 너무 불편해해서 방 옮겼네요.
가족들에겐 비추입니다.

The place is at the heart of the city, you can ride mtrs and buses to any key points of hong kong. There are also convenient stores, coffee shops, restaurants and money exchange booth.

The staff was very hospitable, they even went out of their way to contact us when we our way when we arrived. The facilities they mentioned in their description was also accurate.

For big group, you might want to pack light or know how to manage the space in your room.

Overall, our stay was fun and worthwhile. And highly recommend this place for future backpackers and travelers.

Ms Zyla and her husband was very assistive. They were very accommodating and helped us about our itinerary. They gave us tips for the different attractions as well as clear instructions about the places. Literally our "home away from home". Wifi connection is great and the place is easy to locate. Communication with host is also easy and the room itself was clean and in order.
Great place to stay when you are in HK! Definitely we will book again when we come back to HK. Very accessible to MTR and Bus Terminals and Taxis too. Two thumbs up!

We enjoyed our stay at Ms Zyla's place and the location is very accessible. Ms Zyla is very helpful in giving us instructions and is very accommodating to all our  requests. You can feel the warmth of Filipino hospitality, thanks to kuya who helped us in all our concerns. Good value for money for all budget travellers!
location is good, and host are very friendly...
it's a nice clean hostel!
Good location. Host was hospitable, friendly and accommodating.

Upside - Location is great, very close to the Jordan MTR. The owner replies to messages promptly. This apartment is very close to how the local Hong Kong people live. The shower is strong enough as well. Downside - the curtain is not very thick so some light will get into the rooms at night, some noise from the road as Austin Road is very busy.
Overall it is a good value place to stay if you are looking for cheap private room in a very expensive city.
good location, near Jordan MTR

this is the best budget place you can have. the location is just perfect. in the heart of the city. just 2 minutes walk from jordan station. easy. starbuck and seven eleven just down stairs. Even didnt meet Zyla so often but her husband mr ken is a very nice and helpful guy. 10 star out of 10 :D

The place is cleanand quiet. The room is small for a family of four. What is great is Ken's hospitality and friendliness to his guests. If you are looking for a place to stay for only sleeping after a long tiring day then I will recommend this place.

Overall Zyla & Ken are very nice, they give us information about transportation which was really helpful, they suggested to take bus instead of MTR from airport to Jordan which was much more cheaper than MTR. The room is OK as I expected.

Great place to stay! It is near the station, restaurants, and shops. The house is very clean. It has everything you'll need. I love the small details that they added like the clothes hangers, plastics, slippers, water and shower needs. Ms. Zyla and her husband Mr. Ken were very nice and super helpful. Me and my friends enjoyed our stay. Everything was hassle-free and convenient. Would definitely stay here again!

Location wise, this place is awesome. The train station is just around the corner. On days where the weather is good and you aren't in a hurry, you may even walk to Tsim Sha Tsui or Mong Kok, is just 10mins walking distance. 

As for the room, the room is pretty small but it's comfortable. It's not noisy at night. As for the washroom, its small too with some water stains on the tiles. I'm not a fussy person so I didn't mind at all. The washroom is also equipped with a washing machine, and the hot water is incredible (esp during cold nights). 

Zyla's husband, Kent is super friendly and helpful. When we were checking out from their place, he helped us to carry some of our luggage to the train station! So kind of him! 

Would highly recommend this place! :)
The place is perfect! Very close to MTR and other shopping stores. The location is easy to access!
Hi Ms. Zyla,   in behalf of my family.... a great thanks to you and to your husband!  We have a wonderful time with our short time stay in your place.   We definitely be coming back!
房子很漂亮也还有电视机 虽然隔街道很近但是把窗户关上就很安静 房东也很好 耐心的给我们指路 但是床会有点短(对于一米八以上的人)对我们三个女生还是不错的

I Will not recommend this, the reasons are: 1, the room really small, only about 5 square meters, there is no space after put two beds in side. 2, close to street too noisy , I wasn't able to sleep whole night.  3, yes, there are two washroom , but there are total 8 units to share the washroom, you have to queue up for toilet. 4, I would like to say the aircon is more like a fan,  i felt hot in the room even we open the aircon, lastly the bedding a bit dirty I can see some color inside and with some smelling,Anyway, I really don't think that worth it, that was the worst experience I ever got from airbnb.

MTR Jordan역 근처에 있는 게스트하우스입니다. 공항 오갈 때 주로 이용하는 A21, N21 버스 정류장도 3분이면 갈 수 있을 정도로 가까이에 있습니다.

룸이나 침대 크기는 딱 잠만 자면 되는 정도로 작습니다. 바깥이나 옆 방의 소리가 별로 들리지 않고 조용한 편입니다. 더위나 습기가 있으니 방에서 지내는 동안 에어컨은 약하게라도 틀어놓고, 외출 시 체크인 카운터 근처의 전원을 끄면 됩니다.

호스트는 매우 친절하며, 에어비앤비 메시지를 통한 빠른 커뮤니케이션으로 필요한 사항들을 확인할 수 있습니다.

공동으로 사용하는 욕실 겸 화장실은 2개가 있으며, 크기는 작습니다. 샴푸, 비누, 헤어 드라이어 등은 있으나, 수건은 제공되지 않으니 반드시 준비해 가야 합니다.

주방에는 전자렌지, 커피포트 등이 있어 컵반, 햇반 등을 먹을 수 있습니다. 칼, 가위, 컵, 그릇 등도 약간이나마 있으니 필요할 경우 사용하고 씻어 두면 됩니다. 생수통에 들어 있는 생수는 냉수나 온수로 편하게 마실 수 있습니다.

호텔 같은 안락함을 주진 않지만, 실속형 여행자가 지내기엔 무난한 것 같습니다.
房间地理位置超级好 附近就是地铁站还有很多大商场 到海港城走路10分钟就能到 老板人也超级好的啊 很热情我很喜欢!
离地铁站很近,去哪里都很方便,房东人很好,房间很干净,也很温馨,很喜欢
房间很棒,虽然小,但是完全能够住的下四五个人,卫生间是公用的,但是很卫生很干净,互相不影响｡虽然没能和房东太太见一面,但是房东太太一直关心着我们的住宿,问候我们｡感觉很亲切很体贴,期待下一次再会!
zyla和ken人都非常好｡我在发烧的时候很热心的给我找退烧药,真的感到非常的温暖!
房子挺小的,但是特别温馨,房东也特别好,对我们很热情,非常满意
shampoo and body wash are with water. the location is very
地处市中心非常方便
房主热情,水电和空调使用方便;室内卫生整洁;交通便利,紧邻地铁站;租金价格合理｡

Overall, the place is value for money and is really clean. However, it is really a small room for 5 person but that is exactly how the rooms in Hong Kong are. Both Zyla and Kent offered us with many help and communicated with us frequently to make sure we are well settled. The place is good and we strongly recommend this place to those who are looking for a budget stay in Hong Kong.
房東叔叔和阿姨是很好的人喔｡還會繼續去的
房东人超级好的呀,也很贴心｡下次来香港还会入住哒｡
交通很方便
Great location and very accommodating host! :)

Place was perfect for a 3-4 groupies vacation. The location was perfect to go anywhere in Hong Kong at ease. Host was friendly and kind to provide useful info around town. My friends and I really enjoyed staying.
The people/staff are friendly and the place feels like home
Great for short stay
棒!

My room might be to small for group of 3 or 4. But the location was strategic. You can easily take a walk to tsim tsa shui and jordan mrt. You can easily find seven eleven, kfc, starbucks, mc' donalds.
房東態度十分好

I was given a discount for 1 night extend by zyla to HKD720, but when i arrived there, her husband said there's no such discount can be given, so i need to pay HKD750 for that one night extend although zyla has agreed to give me a price of HKD 720/night for my extend. Other than that, the location was superb. It was only two minute walks from the exit of Jordan station. Very close to shops nearby and nightlife.
非常好,有朋友问会直接推荐
Zyla's place is strategically located. Clean and have a great service from Zyla and Ken.
房东太太人很好,只是不会讲中文,会英文

風呂とﾄｲﾚは共同で使います｡
駅から歩いて2〜3分の距離にあるので､気軽に行動することができます｡

We enjoyed a very pleasant stay in the heart of HK. The host are outstanding and made our stay a wonderful experience. They supported us with any of our request and we felt more than welcome...felt a little bit like home.
这是一次很不错的入住体验,房间比想象中更大,并且房东的先生超级nice!住的靠近柯士甸和佐敦站(更近就下楼走不到两分钟!)可以走着去尖沙咀,油麻地还有旺角!最重要走去尖沙咀逛完顺便可以到维港然后也有小邮轮坐去中环!会推荐给朋友!

房東人很好,解決了許多問題
因為我們有帶小朋友,時間上控制的不是很好,感謝他們的包容~
会是比较小的房间,不过只是临时住宿一晚还是OK的
位置交通购物很方便,性价比高
很好,很干净,也很舒适,下次如果去香港还会选择的｡
非常熱情,人也很nice
位置很好找,离海港城那边也很近,基本上不行就好了,房间很干净,住着还蛮舒适的,很好的体验,谢谢房东
房间不大,位置不错,老板人很好
店员超级nice  共有两个卫生间 比较适合学生党吧 简单实惠 大厦电梯上三楼 就在门口
房东很热情好客,房间也挺干净的,设施也很齐全,虽然是公卫,但那天似乎只有我们一间房在住,所以用的很方便｡
这个价钱对于香港的住宿来说真的超划算了,虽然房间真的小,不过比预想中的好,然后地理位置离尖沙咀(购物的地方)蛮近的,然后附近也是一堆美妆店连锁,又在地铁站附近,对面就是便利店｡房东也很热情友好｡安全的话,我是觉得挺安全的｡下次再来,还会考虑住这里的｡推荐~
Es gibt eindeutig bessere Unterkünfte in dieser Preisklasse
位置还可以
房子地理位置很好,交通便利,下次来还会考虑的
房东很热情,地理位置很方便,走去尖沙咀跟旺角十多分钟,坐地铁也很近

Overall was nice, the apartment's location is easy to find and near the MTR. But the room was very small than our expectation, i lived there with my 3 friend and had some trouble back there when we want to open our luggage in the room since the free space is too small.

Ken, the husband of Zyla, is very nice. Even the Filipino assistant (I forgot his name) are very courteous. They are very easy to approach and they give tips for your Hong Kong trip and even Macao. Good thing we learned that we need NOT to change our money (from HK Dollars to Pataca) because the stores in Macao accept Hong Kong money. Also, we learned from the host that the fare for the train going to airport is way more expensive than taking a bus. Very helpful. Thank you very much.
The place is very accessible to MTR.
감사합니다
房间的位置确实很好,很繁华,就是面积呵呵,房东很热情｡
很好的地理位置!推荐

name: Soares Guest House
summary: A renovated apartment perfect for a family or a group of friends. The apartment has 2 bedrooms, an equiped kitchen, a bathroom and a living room with a balcony. In the living room there's a sofa-bed for two people. Oficial reg. number: 22696/AL
space: A renovated space very illuminated and airy with two bedrooms. Kitchen equipped. If necessary, we also can add a baby bed to the house.
description: A renovated apartment perfect for a family or a group of friends. The apartment has 2 bedrooms, an equiped kitchen, a bathroom and a living room with a balcony. In the living room there's a sofa-bed for two people. Oficial reg. number: 22696/AL A renovated space very illuminated and airy with two bedrooms. Kitchen equipped. If necessary, we also can add a baby bed to the house. The entire apartment. We give a phone number to our guests that can be used in case that they need anything. We can also advise about the best places to visit or best activities to do in the city. The apartment is located at 5 minutes from "Igreja da Lapa" and less than 15 minutes from the townhall and the main metro station "Trindade", walking. It's also really close from the metro station "Faria Guimarães", around 5 minutes. The best way to get to the apartment is by metro. From the airport, you need to get the metro station and get to "Trindade" (main metro station in the city). After it you need to change to
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located at 5 minutes from "Igreja da Lapa" and less than 15 minutes from the townhall and the main metro station "Trindade", walking. It's also really close from the metro station "Faria Guimarães", around 5 minutes.
notes: This apartment is perfect to visit the downtown because you'll not need any transport for it. As it's close from the metro station "Faria Guimarães", you can also visit other places of Porto as diferents as "Casa da Música" or FC Porto stadium.
transit: The best way to get to the apartment is by metro. From the airport, you need to get the metro station and get to "Trindade" (main metro station in the city). After it you need to change to the yellow line and go to "Faria Guimarães" station. From there, you're just 5 minutes from the apartment. You can also use the taxi from the airport, it would be around 20/25€.
access: The entire apartment.
interaction: We give a phone number to our guests that can be used in case that they need anything. We can also advise about the best places to visit or best activities to do in the city.
house_rules: Pedimos para que não fumem no interior da casa. No entanto a casa tem duas varandas que poderão ser usadas para este efeito.

host.host_about:
Adoro viajar e conhecer pessoas novas!
Gosto de mostrar o Porto aos meus hospedes e recomendar os locais da cidade que melhor se adequar ao que buscam. O Porto é um mar de oportunidades!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Estuve con mi familia pasando unos días en Oporto en casa de Jorge. Es una casa muy agradable, amplia y luminosa, en nuestro caso fuimos 5 personas y nos sentimos muy agusto. Todo es nuevo y la limpieza es impecable. Está situada muy cerca del centro, a unos minutos andando de la plaza principal pero en un barrio donde es fácil aparcar. Al final de la misma calle donde  se encuentra, hay una iglesia muy bonita que merece la pena visitar!
El trato con Jorge ha sido magnifico. Tanto él como su madre han sido muy agradables y han estado en todo momento pendientes de nosotros, recibiéndonos con una botella de Oporto.
También nos han mantenido informados. Por ejemplo nos avisaron  un día que había una carrera por el centro y las calles que iban a ser cortadas.

Aluguei a habitação para a passagem de ano e o Sr.Jorge foi muito prestável e atencioso.
A habitação é muito acolhedora.
Numa próxima visita ao Porto é uma habitação a ter em primeira opção.

Very nice flat in the centre of Porto! 10 minutes to walk to downtown and the beautiful river-side. 5 minutes to the next metro station. Host always available and helpful. Communication before and during the trip without any problems. The flat is suitable for max 6 people, perfect for a family or group of friends. Super clean, new furniture, everything good. Really nothing to complain about. Recommendable 100%! Not only the accommodation but also the city!! Must-see in Portugal. Go and enjoy ;)
Tanto o Jorge como a Clarisse responderam prontamente às mensagens e contactos. A casa é acolhedora e está em óptimas condições.

The Apartment was very nice with heaters in almost every room. Therefore it was rather cosy and warm. Everything was super clean and anything needed in a kitchen and bathroom was provided. The Apartment is close to downtown and there are good Restaurants Right around the corner. Communication with the host was Great and uncomplicated as was Check-In and Check-Out.

Pasamos un fin de semana muy bueno en la casa de Jorge. Tal y como se muestra en el anuncio, el apartamento está perfectamente equipado y limpio. No falta un detalle para tener una estancia agradable y acogedora. Jorge nos recibió a la hora combinada para enseñarnos la casa y estar contactable durante esos días en caso de que surgiese algún problema.
Para repetir, sin dudas.
Excelente acolhimento, casa com todas as condições necessárias para se passar uns dias espectaculares na grande cidade do Porto. Recomendo a alugarem este espaço e a visitarem a cidade.
Adoramos o apartamento e o Jorge e a Clarissa foram super atenciosos. O lugar é super tranquilo, limpo e confortável. Já sei onde ficar quando for ao Porto.

Juntamente com amigas aluguei este apartamento durante três noites, e todas adorámos a nossa estadia. O apartamento tem boas condições, é localizado numa zona agradável, perto do metro, da Avenida dos Aliados e se tiver pronto para andar dá para ir a pé até a alguns pontos turísticos. Tanto o Jorge como a Clarisse foram bastante prestáveis e tornaram a nossa estadia bastante acolhedora.
Jorge, Olivia e Clarisse são pessoas especiais. A acolhida no Porto não poderia ter sido melhor. O apartamento é maravilhoso, espaçoso, limpissimo e muito bem localizado.

Clarisse was perfect, we felt like home! Everything was like on the pictures, the place is perfectly located, we did nearly everything on foot. The welcoming was the best I ever had with an airbnb host, and she really took us through what specialties to buy at the supermarket that was a real plus!
Can't wait to come back!

Jorge and Clarisse are very nice, helpful and polite. The house is great, very cosy and clean. It looks exactly like the photos and it is fully equipped. The location is very convenient, near the centre and very close to the metro. I definitely recommend this house for a pleasant stay in Porto!

Bonjour Clarisse Jorge SOARES à Porto 
Bravo ,bravo et 1000 fois merci pour votre accueil , pour votre générosité , pour votre dévouement , pour votre précieuse aide suite au vol du portefeuille dans le métro  .
Je veux ( moi et mes amis ) dire à Airbnb que vous méritez tous les compliments et tous les remerciements profonds et sincères.
Que c'est chez vous le plus bel endroit pour visiter porto . Votre accompagnement avec notre groupe de 6 personnes toute la journée comme guide  et au restaurant le soir exemplaire . Merci à Jorge pour la conduite à l’aéroport à 4 h 30 du matin 
Ces mots sont justes vrais .
Nous gardons et garderons ce séjour de 3 jours chez vous en référence .
Je demande à Airbnb de vous saluer et de vous recommander comme point d'accueil !
Sincères salutations et kenavo (au revoir) des  finistériens de Quimper !!  Clarisse vous êtes une femme merveilleuse et d'une bonté exceptionnelle vraiment . Grâce à vous Porto est une ville sublime  , votre appartement est très propre et très bien agencé .Vous avez les félicitations des bretons !! ce texte est sans pommade !!

Jorge's place is nice and spacious. We were welcomed by his mother who made us feel at home right away. The apartment is well located, only a few minutes walking to the city center. Would stay there again, recommended.

Perfect Porto Experience! The location and apartment were perfect. So much room, updated kitchen with everything you need to make a meal, and plenty of privacy with the two bedroom. But the hosts, Jorge and Maria were the best part. So incredibly welcoming and kind!

Uma casa 5 estrelas, limpinha e com tudo para nos servirmos e passar uma óptima estadia! Pessoas muito simpáticas e ao dispor para qualquer coisa. Agradeço mesmo muito ao Jorge e à Clarisse por toda a simpatia e disponibilidade demonstrada. Obrigada por tudo e quando voltar ao Porto saberei sempre onde poderei ir :)

O Jorge e a Clarisse foram ótimos anfitriões. O ambiente era muito lindo e cozinha completa, com tudo o que é necessário para se passar alguns dias no Porto. O apartamento possui estacionamento gratuito próximo (rua), era disponível uma grande quantidade de travesseiros novos e forros de cama em muito bom estado.
All good!  We didnºt need much help/info, but when we did Jorge was their to lend personal assistance.  Good sun from both directions

Appartamento ottimo! Comodo, grande, pulito e a 10 minuti dalla baixa. 
Siamo stati accolti dalla gentilissima signora Clarisse che ci ha mostrato la casa e si è resa disponibile per qualunque cosa avessimo bisogno.
Ci ha anche lasciato in regalo una bottiglia di ottimo Porto!
Lo consiglio e probabilmente tornerò.

Jorge and Clarisse are the nicest host I've ever met. Clarisse invited me to join the very porto breakfast and told me everything about Porto and what to do. The appartment was very nice, clean and not so far from the city center.
Thank you both very much :)

The welcome was fantastic from the family of Jorge. We are delighted with the welcome gift,, a bottle of Porto wine. The place is near to city centre. Its takes 15 min by walk and 3 min by the metro connection. The house is splendid with all required facilities like wifi, well-equipped kitchen, and excellent washroom. Jorge was in contact with us in Phone and giving us all the instructions necessary for our stay. Thanks, Jorge and hope to see you soon.
Jorge's mother met us and she was very lovely person. She explained everything and met us with a bottle of very tasty Port wine. Apartment is very comfortable, light and with nice balcony.

Excelente apartamento!!
Fomos recebidos pelo Jorge, sua mãe e namorada, muito simpáticos e atenciosos.
O apartamento muito bem localizado, com uma ótima estrutura! Gostamos muito da estadia, apesar de curta. 
A limpeza é excelente, cama, lencois cheirosos, recomendado!!
Um abraço!!
Alvaro Monteiro

Foi muito muito agradavel... Gente tao bom simpstico e amavel. Gostavamos bastante do apartamento. Era bonito limpo e bem cuidado. O contato foi rapido facil e muita gebtileza! Posso dizer que e 100% satisfatorio.

Tivemos apenas uma noite no apartamento do Jorge mas foi muito bom, o apartamento é grande e muito limpo, a comunicação com ele foi excelente nos deu todo apoio necessário. A localização é ótima em um bairro tranquilo e próximo a estacão de metro. Ele nos recebeu para a entrega da chave e ainda deixou uma garrafa de vinho do porto para degustarmos.
Very clean, a good location and thank you for the porto !!!

Jorge y su madre Clarisse, son dos anfitriones increíbles. Tuvimos un recibimiento muy agradable, con mucho cariño y lo que nos sorprendió es un vino de porto de bienvenida. El departamento es muy muy lindo, super acogedor, las fotos del anuncio son reales, nos sentimos tan a gusto. Muy recomendado. Muchas gracias Jorge y Clarisse. Hasta pronto. Saludos de parte de todos y todas.

My trip to Porto turned into a disaster when my flat got cancelled, if it wasn't for Jorge and Clarisse it would have stayed this way. They have welcomed us with open arms at the last minute. Their flat is incredibly clean and comfortable in the heart of Porto. They even gave us instructions for all the things we could do in Porto and offered us a delicious bottle of Porto wine. They have been delightful and very helpfull a ll the way through. I strongly recomend them to anyone who visits Porto. Five stars!!

Une très bonne expérience que je recommande sans l'ombre d'un doute. L'acceuil de Jorge, sa mère et sa grand-mère a été remarquable, des personnes très très symphas et disponibles en tous moment; même après notre départ.
L'appartement très propre, très bien équipé et proche du centre-ville.

Appartamento per 6 persone comodissimo per muoversi senza mezzi e con grande facilita'. Trovate lenzuola e asciugamani puliti, e tutto e' perfettamente in ordine! Proprietario di casa estremamente disponibile, vi consiglio assolutamente questa casa!

Jorge and his mother were really kind and helpful from the beginning. The communication was good. House was very neat and clean. We enjoyed the wine they left for us, as they promised. Overall it was a quiet nice experience for us to be hosted by them. Thanks for everthing.

Wonderful hosts, fantastic location, marvelous city - that's how we would describe in short our stay at Jorge's place in Porto.
Jorge and his mother gave us an amazing welcome (a big smile, a bottle of Porto wine, and a very informative city guide - what more do you need!?:) 
Porto is one of the most beautiful and special cities I have ever visited and we couldn't have found the better place to stay than Jorge's apartment: not only it is fifteen-minutes walk to all major sights, but it has plenty of space (for a group of five people!), all necessary amenities, and beautiful views from all rooms. All in all, we strongly recommend staying at Soares Guest House.
Jorge, thank you very much for your kindness and welcome!
excellent attention , well located, apartment correspond to description,
Accueil très chaleureux et très efficace.

Guesthouse Soares is a great spot to explore Porto!
The apartment is clean and had enough space for our family of five.
A 15 minutes walk brings you in the beautiful centre of Porto, which we really enjoyed! Unfortunately we didn't meet Jorge, but Clarisse was a wonderful and very kind host to us. We really appreciated her warm welcome and recommend the apartment to others for a nice stay in Porto. Many thanks Clarisse and Jorge!
Great place! spatious, well located and with all the amenties. Jorge was always in touch and made our stay at his place run smootg an easy. Thanks a lot!

The hosts were very welcoming and provided us was lots of information about Porto on arrival. The house was clean and Had everything we needed. It was exactly how they described it and the pictures are a good representation. Thanks for letting us stay :)

Muy buena atención de clarissa, el apartamento nos encantó, está a unos diez minutos andando del centro. 
Sin duda, lo recomendaría a algún amigo que vaya a la ciudad.
Gracias por la cuna y el vino!

Clarisse nous a accueillis avec beaucoup de gentillesse. L'appartement est très propre et très bien équipé, on peut véritablement y séjourner et y prendre ses repas en famille, et comme il est traversant et pourvu d'un balcon on peut y faire circuler l'air et ne pas souffrir de la chaleur, même au cœur de la canicule. Il est situé en périphérie du centre historique, qui est à une demi-heure plutôt qu'à un quart d'heure de marche à pied. Le quartier n'a pas de charme particulier, mais il est tout à fait sûr,  très bien desservi en commerces et par le métro (à 5 minutes deux stations) ou les bus, avec la possibilité de stationnement gratuit dans la rue. On rejoint le centre historique en à peine un quart d'heure porte à porte si on prend le métro. La ville de Porto a un charme fou et cet appartement est une excellente base pour la visiter.

El piso está bien situado y muy limpio. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar una estancia cómoda y agradable. Jorge y su madre nos facilitaron el check in, al igual que una plaza de aparcamiento para nuestro coche. Recomendamos este alojamiento.

Accueil très agréable, appartement idéalement situé.
Idéal pour accueillir une famille.

Me and my friends got a perfect stay at Jorge's flat. We all arrived at different times but Clarisse (Jorge's mother) let the first of us in before check-in time. Communication with Jorge was very smooth all the time. All the rooms are spacious and clean and the kitchen had everything we need. the apartment is walking distance from the city center so it was perfect for us attending a music festival. The city itself is amazing and the people lovely. I recommend the city and Jorge's flat 100%.
Gospodarz zadbał żeby nic nam nie zabrakło. Pomógł nam odnaleźć transport z lotniska, dodatkowo mieszkanie było dla nas przygotowane. Lokalizacja miejsca daje również wiele możliwości.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit! Soares Guest House war sauber, top ausgestattet und sehr schön. In die Altstadt musste man zwar ein bisschen laufen, trotzdem immer noch sehr zentral und gut gelegen. Danke an die sehr netten und immer erreichbaren Gastgeber - wir kommen gerne wieder.
Had a great time at Jorge's place. The terrace is great andJorge was always available for our questions. Everything worked really well and we enjoyed our time in Porto a lot!

Clarisse foi sensacional, nos recebeu muito bem, de forma cordial e calorosa, nos deu informações interessantes sobre a cidade e nos levou a conhecer um restaurante delicioso. Nossa estadia no porto foi fantástica, o apartamento estava impecável, muito espaçoso, foi perfeito pra nos. Perfeito!.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Clarisse et Jorge a été plein d'attention pour nous tout au long de notre séjour pour s'assurer que tout se passait bien.
Une bouteille de Porto et des biscuits traditionnels nous ont été offerts à notre arrivée.
L'appartement a répondu en tout point à nos attentes. Il est calme, bien équipé et parfaitement adapté à un usage familial.
Il est aussi très bien situé pour se rendre dans le centre historique à trois stations de métro de Sao Bento sans changement
Un petit supermarché est facilement accessible à pied.
Nous recommandons cette adresse!
Céline & Family

Een warm hartelijk ontvangst. Een prachtig appartement zag er keurig schoon en verzorgd uit. Jorge appte enkele keren om te checken of alles naar wens was.  We konden altijd met vragen bij Jorge terecht. Wij hebben een geweldige vakantie gehad in Porto. Zeker voor herhaling vatbaar. Bedankt!
Everything was perfect!

La casa es sencillamente perfecta, esta bien situada cerca del centro, y presenta todas las comodidades que puedas necesitar.
Lo anfitriones son muy atentos y el trato mas que agradable.
Recomendada sin duda.
Very welcoming people. Met us our front, assisted us with our things upstairs.  Place was clean, had everything you could ask for, they even left us some wine!
Gostamos muito, muito acolhedor e casa mto bem equipada,

Generous housekeepers! Bottle of a good Port vine included! Flexible time to arrive and to leave. Very fast answering and helpful communication in perfect english before and during the stay. All the equipment in a perfect condition. Lot of space on the balcony to dry your towels and swimsuits or wet clothes. Easy to warm up with the electric heaters. 

Highly recommend to consider this option!
This place ruled!!!
Casa muito acolhedora e confortável. Perto dos de interesse no Porto, sendo possível ir a pé. Local muito tranquilo. Clarisse e Jorge são excelente anfitriões e agradecemos a sua simpatia.

The flat is well located. Excellently equipped. It was very nice and clean. The owners (Jorge and his mom) were very friendly and attentive (before/after the trip). Only one thing, the heating system can be upgraded a bit. My family and I will recommend this place to stay. Porto is a very beautiful city and its people are amazing!

Tivemos uma ótima experiência no apartamento do Jorge! Acomoda sem problemas 6 pessoas, limpeza impecável, toalhas e talheres, TV, Wi-Fi, uma bela cozinha e 2 quartos e uma ampla sala com sofá cama. A recepção no check-in e o acompanhamento e prontidão do Jorge e família também foram sensacionais!

Alguns detalhes que podem interessar algumas pessoas: o apartamento é no 2º andar sem elevador; há vagas de estacionamento na rua, por 1€/hora (dias úteis) mas o anfitrião conhece um parceiro com estacionamento por 8€/dia e a casa não possui aquecimento central (há 3 aquecedores portáteis bons, um para cada quarto / sala).
muy buena atención y ubicación.
A casa e muito confortável, bem localizada e o anfitrião muito solicito
un alojamiento perfecto, cómodo y muy limpio. La comunicación con Jorge ha sido fácil y fluida, muy recomendable

Très bon emplacement, appartement très propre, tout est mis à disposition pour que nous nous y sentions comme chez nous. La cerise sur le gâteau: un accueil chaleureux qui nous a convaincu de revenir au Portugal le plus vite possible.

El piso está muy limpio, es acogedor y los anfitriones te dwjan toallas y todo listo. El trato muy bueno, se preocuparon por recibirnos y tuvieron un detalle. Lo único que pilla un poquillo lejos del centro, pero es bajada. Muy recomendable!
Me agrado el departamento

The apartment is extremely clean, lovely and comfortable! Close to the public transport stops + city center is within the walkable distance. There are several grocery stores nearby. The hosts are very warm, hospitable, friendly and helping! Thank you for making our stay in Porto more pleasant!:)
Apartamento con espacio y confortable, límpio y perfecto en cuanto a la calidad-precio, bien ubicado, zona tranquila. A 15-20 minutos andando hasta el centro.
Très bon séjour ! Appartement idéal lorsqu'on est nombreux, calme et propre! Situé à une demie-heure à pied des quais mais tout près du métro ! Bon accueil !

Hello,

We were well received by Jorge's family. 
Always in contact during the trip.
The apartment is great and well located. We highly recommand this apartment.
Lovely place..clean,comfortable ,Clarisse and Jorge are lovely,friendly and always willing to help.Many thanks for all..we had a wonderful time there...I recommend a lot...

Ficámos hospedados 3 noites na Soares Guest House (um grupo de 5 pessoas) e ficámos muito satisfeitos com as condições da casa. Além disso, a Clarisse recebeu-nos de forma excelente, muito simpátiaca e prestável e disponível para esclarecer todas as nossas dúvidas. Uma avaliação muito positiva.

O Apartamento do Jorge é perfeito, bem localizado, limpo, organizado, e tem tudo que é necessario para uma otima estadia, o anfitrião nos recebeu de forma calorosa e afetuosa, estive em seu apartamento pela segunda vez e nas proximas viagens ao Porto ficarei novamente.
Logement conforme à la description et situé près des transports en commun.  Jorge et sa mère sont des hôtes très sympathiques et disponibles.
Muy buena atención por parte de Jorge. Nada que reprochar a nuestra experiencia en Oporto.

Super indico! Lugar lindo, limpo, organizado e aconchegante! Anfitriões bem educados, hospitaleiros, cuidadosos, prestativos, carinhosos e super simpáticos! 
Um lugar ótimo para se ficar!!
Não há do que reclamar! 
Gostei de tudo!!! ❤️
Atendimento prestavel e casa limpa e bem localizada.

It was really wonderful to meet Clarisse and her both sons! We were late and they kindly waited for us 2 hours with welcoming bottle of porto! Clarisse was always fast to reply when we needed help or advise and took good care of us. The appartement is cozy, clean, located within walkable distance from the centre.
vivienda fria. clefacción electrica radiadores

name: •F61 Mid of Waikiki girls Unit Private room
summary: a few blocks away from Waikiki beach. restaurant , shopping mall, 10mins . This is a Private bedroom with a full size bed. shared bath, shared kitchen . i accept Max 2 females in this bedroom.  but you will have to share the full size bed with your friend. if you don’t wanna share the bed then i suggest to book another room for your friend!! I pay tax about 15% from the total price .  I charge super minimum . please don’t expect to get luxury space. i’m providing minimum basic stuff!!
space: this is just shared unit. own room, shared bath, shared kitchen. nothing fancy. not a hotel not an entier apt. please understand. live simple save $$  spend $$ for outside!! the location is a middle of Waikiki.  Near restaurant, store, beach, everywhere walk distance!! The bus stop (Bus #19,20) to the International Airport is a one minute walk from here.   you can pick up the key anytime, you can just leave the key when you leave :) Super simple.  The condominium is a secure entrance.  Can not go in side without key for the entrance.

neighborhood_overview: Ritz Carlton Waikiki Tower across the street is our building (so old lol) closest , newest building in here
notes: be happy ;)
access: Please refer the bottom section for english ++++++交通の便利+++++ •ｻﾞﾊﾞｽ(市ﾊﾞｽ) $2.75 (十九､二十番)で乗り換え無し､約1時間でｱﾊﾟｰﾄに到着です｡ ﾊﾞｽ内にお釣りはないのでご自身で用意するのをお忘れなく｡ 大きなｽｰﾂｹｰｽをお持ちの方は乗車出来ませんが､機内持ち込みｻｲｽﾞで来られる方はﾊﾞｽで来れたら格安です! ﾊﾞｽは寒いので上着必須です｡ 空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ前行き(7:00-8:30) ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ前発 空港行き (15:30-18:00) 通勤ﾗｯｼｭなので確実に1時間以上はかかります｡私もこの時間は運転しないように気をつけています｡ 空港発ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ行き降車  "Kuhio Ave and launiu street"  ｸﾋｵｱﾍﾞﾆｭｰ ｱﾝﾄﾞ ﾗｳﾆｳｽﾄﾘｰﾄ (ﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝ目の前) 運転手にﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝに行きたいと伝えたらｽﾑｰｽﾞです｡目の前のﾊﾞｽ停で降りて下さい｡ ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発空港行き "Kuhio Ave and Launiu street" 同じくﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝの道を挟んだ向かいにﾊﾞｽ停が設置されています｡だいたいﾊﾞｽ停は登り､下り､道を挟んで対に設置してあります｡ ﾊﾞｽ停から歩いて30秒でｱﾊﾟｰﾄ発見､到着!ﾊﾞｽに乗り慣れていない方も一度試してみてはいかがでしょう~｡ ﾊﾞｽを降りてﾋﾟﾝｸの3､4階建の建物(個人的には一番の目印にしております)が見えたら､その角がﾗｳﾆｳ ｽﾄﾘｰﾄです｡必ず分かります｡ ﾊﾞｽ道を背に一軒先に行った左手にあるのがこの建物 414 launiu streetです｡ •ﾀｸｼｰ 荷物の積み下ろしやﾁｯﾌﾟだのでだいたい20分､30分かかります｡ ﾁｯﾌﾟ入れて$35-$40が目安でしょう｡ •ｼｬﾄﾙﾊﾞｽ $17くらい｡ ﾜｲｷｷ行きはﾎﾃﾙで降りなければいけないことがおおいのでその際に､ﾎﾘﾃﾞｰｲﾝﾜｲｷｷｴｸｽﾌﾟﾚｽがｸﾞﾚｰﾄﾞ的にも降りても差し支えなさそうなﾎﾃﾙ(個人的意見)｡もしくはｺﾝﾄﾞﾃﾙのﾌｫｰﾊﾟﾄﾞﾙはｱﾊﾟｰﾄの真向かいなので､止まってくれるならとても便利) •ｳｰﾊﾞｰ､ﾘﾌﾄ $21からと記載されています｡(変わっている可能性あり) ｱﾌﾟﾘにどこで拾ってもらうか記載
interaction: 日本語は下記を参照にして下さい｡——————————————- - SELF CHECK IN !! - Try to minimize the cost!! NO greeting when you arrive. ——————————————- - LUGGAGE HOLD SERVICE -  more than welcome to DROP OFF luggage before the official checkin time. (2:00pm)  could you tell me before hand. i can put the key in a key box before you arrive.  ONLY drop off to the DINIG area . you are not allow to enter the bed room yet even the bed room is empty. (cleaning lady needs to enter the bedroom 12:00-2:00pm) ——————————————- • AFTER 2:00pm check in • not necessary to give us heads up! usually 12:00pm - 2:00pm is cleaning time. ——————————————- This is the actual address: 414 launiu street Honolulu Hawaii 96815 right across the Ritz Carlton hotel !!  ——————————————- Bring Your Own Shampoo !!!!!!! if it’s Lucky, previous guests left it in a room.  ——————————————- CHECK OUT BY 12:00pm. or luggage holding service after the official checkout time. in a Dining area only. you are not allow to leave your luggage in a bed room after
house_rules: ++++++ a little HOUSE RULE ++++++ •your RESPONSIBILITY to REACH to this apt. follow below after you make reservation. 1,  click reservation page  2, click details  3, click self check in •Please remove all the sands incl beach towels sands, your feet, before you get in to the apt.  • I know it’s annoying but please USE SQUEEZE right after the shower to keep clean the glass wall for next user! (every time) and REUSE your towels !! please DO not use fresh towel every single time.  • please read the welcome note on the bed is the FIRST THING TO DO.  all my recommendation is there, also tell you HOW to check out(where to leave the keys) where is trash ex.  • this is NOT A HOTEL !! NO concierge service, NO changing your sheets everyday, NO breakfast ,  NO phone line, but YES wifi. thank you for your understanding. mahalo thank you!!

feel ALOHA while you are in Hawaii.

to All : Enjoy stay in mid of Waikiki!!
takes only AN HOUR from the air port to get to the apt by the bus without transfer $2.75

location is the key for this apartment in this price ;) beach/restaurant/night life/shopping is 2mins - 10mins walking !

(please make sure your air bnb app is newest version otherwise some process /page might not working)

Feel free to ask any question!!

Mahalo
