reviews.comments: Tomoko was really helpful and friendly!  Room was a perfect little haven after a day of wandering, and even had a little sofa to chill out on :)
The room was clean, and the host was so nice! Very convenient to go to beach.
I had the best time ever on Hawaii. Perfect place to stay and Tomoko is incredibly helpful. Mahalo!
Tomoko was so kind and other share mates were also good. I think the room had changed to other guest's room, but it didn't matter. It was good enough to stay one night.

Tomoko was the most gracious host.  My daughter was flying from Australia to Vancouver,  but had an 18 hour layover in Honolulu.  With very short notice, Tomoko was quick to respond to a last minute request for accommodation.

The room was perfect.  Big, clean and comfortable.  It was walking distance to beaches and shopping.  And Tomoko had left a detailed list of things to  do and see during her layover.  Perfect spot for a short stay in Honolulu.

The location was very closed to wikiki and there are many shops and restaurants near the area. The room was same as pictures; very cozy and warm. One thing i was not satisfying was that the room was little bit noisy and cold since the window in the room is located next to the street. Other things are all satisfied.

It is a well maintained apartment and the room is spacious for one person. Nice and clean though little stains on the carpet but just a minor issue. Tomoko was very accommodating and always available by giving quick response. Good neighborhood and easy access to the center of Waikiki beach. There is a building under construction across the street so little noisy during the day. Some noise from cars and buses on the street.
Thank you Tomo for two wonderful weeks in Hawaii! - Lulu

Tomoko is very friendly and welcoming and invited me with a big hug to Waikiki ! I came alone and felt completely safe in the neighborhood even late nights and early mornings while still dark out. My room had plenty of space and was within walking distance to everything including all bus tops to go around the island which was perfect! but also means it can get pretty noisy outdoors at night if you are trying to sleep. my only wish is that the windows opened further. This was the perfect place for me and I look forward to coming to stay every time I'm there!
Clean apartment! Super friendly Tomoko has everything you need laid out for you in her welcome guide.
Clean and cute place with everything I needed, the beach is very close (like 10 min walking) and Tomoko was very fast is answering my questions, I really recommend it!
Tomoko was an absolute pleasure. She was so kind and great at responding back in a timely fashion. Her place was clean, comfortable and perfect for the stay!

Tomoko is very nice and welcoming. Her place is clean and comfortable, although I ended up staying in a different place than advertised, so I can't speak to the bedroom that is normally offered. The location is perfect for walking to the beach, restaurants, shopping, and exercise (I run). Would definitely come back!

This was a wonderful spot in a great location in Waikiki. I felt very safe and Tomoko makes sure you have everything you need to be comfortable. Very basic accommodations but price and location can't be beat!

Tomoko was super sweet and accommodating. The location is perfect for walking everywhere right In town & uber / bus everywhere else like airport etc. it was perfect for me to come in for the night for a concert. I flew in from Maui took the bus from the airport dropped off my stuff & got ready to go out. I walked to eat & explore a bit, took an uber to the republik, did my thing got back to the pad  ($6 ride back to the house) Crashed out & woke up & walked to grab coffee & the bus to the airport. Perfect for a solo traveler like me who doesn't need fancy just safe & welcoming. It felt like I had the whole place to myself too!
It was perfect location and I didn't feel I shared with 4 people, always quiet and often felt like I was staying by myself.  I choose the right place to stay in Waikiki. Thank you , Tomoko!
Wow great place to stay in Waikiki!! I loved my stay! The room was very clean and pretty spacious! The host very helpful and sweet. Great location and great value!! I will definitely be back!
Tomoko is a great host!  Warm welcome as soon as I arrived at the building, and clear breakdown of everything in the apartment.  Thank you for making my short stay comfortable!

Tomoko and Mary were wonderful hosts. I had made a mistake about the day I was arriving but they worked it out and were still able to accommodate me. Also I had underestimated how tired I would be after my flight and although it was hours before the check-in time they let me have a shower and leave my bags with them so I could go explore the beach and Waikiki before returning to my room to crash. It was so easy to contact them, everyone was really friendly and helpful and I felt very safe and secure. Thanks for a great stay :D

Great location! Very close to all the restaurants, bars, and the beach! It's about a 15 minute walk to Waikiki beach. The room is as pictured, but there's no lock on the door. However, I felt fine leaving my things in the apartment. I rented a car and Tomoko was very accommodating. She rented out a spot in the garage to me for $10/day, which I didn't mind paying for because finding street parking in Waikiki is impossible. My only issue is that the bathroom shower could be a bit more cleaner or updated.. Maybe it's not pictured for a reason.. Other than that, this is a CONVENIENT location that provides AFFORDABLE accommodations.
Very close to restaurants bar and the beach
위치가 매우좋았습니다 수건도 제공됐고 편했어요
ﾜｲｷｷﾋﾞｰﾁから近くてとても便利でした!

Host wasn't the woman I was expecting but she was pleasant and accommodating nonetheless. Had a brief stay here and enjoyed its location and the accessibility to 'new friends' within the host's scheme of rooms.

Clean home, communicative host, great convenient location, comfortable bed. Room got a bit hot without a/c and were strict about check in/out times (though they were ok with me leaving luggage). Recommended overall
Tomoko and Mary were awesome.  It felt like I was staying with friends.

I wouldn't have wanted it any other way. The room(s) were a decent size and Tomoko is beyond hospitable- I'm talking "help yourself" instant ramen in the kitchen and an entertaining itinerary. I'll definitely book here again next time I visit. Super affordable and an even super location. Aloha ~
Great place to crash for a night super close to the beach

Tomoko and Mary were wonderful hosts! 
I inquired about the Airbnb and I had gotten a response within 15 minutes! The photos are exactly what the place is like and it's such an amazing location! Tomoko provided me with extensive details on ways I could get to their apartment. I only stayed for a day on a long layover but would recommend it to anyone looking for a inexpensive room next to everything you need including yoga & the beach! 
Thank you Tomoko and Mary!

L'accueil était bon. Tomoko est à l'écoute pour faciliter le séjour. La chambre correspondait aux photos.
Ce qui m'a moins plu est qu'il y a 4 chambres louées dans l'appartement et une seule salle de bain avec toilette à l'intérieur pour les 4 chambres. De plus la porte de la salle de bain n'a pas  de verrou, donc pas commode !
La cuisine qui fait office de salle à manger n'est pas très conviviale.
Plusieurs fois quand je suis rentrée, j'ai trouvé la porte de l'appartement grande ouverte, ce qui n'est pas très rassurant. Les portes des chambres ne fermaient pas à clé non plus.

The ppace is extremely close to many things so it made travel really convenient. Also the host was very nice with helping me out to find food and with my many many bags. The room itself wasn't bad. It's cheap, it has a ved, you get what you pay for. It wasnt bad for the price at all. I just needed a bed for the night. The room does get extremely loud at night, so if you cant sleep with noises then it'll be troublesome. Also, beware of the slamming door! I did also find the curtain a litttttle too small for the window considering I was facing other apartments which nade it hard to change. But I guess if you maneuver it the right way you can get some coverage. Other than those things I was happy with the place. I had no issues.
Great location!!!!! 10 minutes can get everywhere around waikiki. There are bus stop and two abc markets near the room. The room perfectly same with tomoko's photo.
Great host,  straight forward,  amazing location close to everything!
Had a good stay! They're all nice and the apartment is in a pretty good area
good location, lovely room, you can keep privacy, earplugs is must-have item

立地が良く､本当にﾜｲｷｷのど真ん中で徒歩でいろいろと散策できました｡お部屋も清潔でよかったです｡ありがとうございました｡
Conveniently located,Clean room,Friendly host
Thank you, Tomoko and Mary!

ともこさんが笑顔で迎えてくれます｡
ﾋﾞｰﾁやｶﾗｶｳｱ通りからも近く､ﾊﾞｽ停も近いのでどこに行くにも便利です｡

Tomoko was very friendly and welcoming. 
The location is great, few minutes walk from the beach and the Kalakaua Ave. And bus stops nearby. It's convenient for you wherever you go.

Sayaka checked me in and was very nice.  The room is like a dorm room.  As advertised, it's small and very bare bones.  It's a great location if you just need a place to crash for the night.  Only one window in the room opens and there's a lot of street noise at night.  You can't close the window, however, since there is a lack of AC and without the window and fan, it would be very uncomfortable.  I'd recommend ear plugs if you have them.  The apartment itself is extremely tiny and there is no living room space.  There is a kitchen area with a table and a couple of chairs if you want to hang out but I felt discouraged from doing so.  When my friend and I were chatting at the table at 7:20pm we got scolded for talking too loudly because one of the girls could have been sleeping (which it turned out she wasn't).  We didn't even know if any of the other girls were home since the other ladies are fairly private.  The rental is very close to the beach and a lot of shopping too so that's a bonus.  Overall, this is a great place if you just need to crash for a night or are really strapped for cash.
たまたまﾎｽﾄの方は不在だったのですが､代わりの方が快く迎えてれてよかったです｡ｸﾘｰﾝな部屋で､ﾊﾞｽ停も近く､立地も良いと思います｡
Very accessible and just as described. Thank you for your hospitality!

This place and the people would probably the worst on Airbnb. I booked this place after reading the reviews, but the reviews were absolutely misleading. First of all, the place was ok for the price but the way the host and her assistant Mary treated me was bad. They checked me into the wrong wrong initially and then forced me to get out of that place without even having the basic courtesy. Then when the door was banging due to its defect, Mary started to bang her room wall which was extremely arrogant. They never tried to fix the door. The other two girls at the place was okay. Overall the people don't know how to treat fellow people.

個室で短期滞在しました｡ともこさんは温かく迎えてくれ安心して過ごせました｡同じ建物内の住人も挨拶しあえ危ない感じはしませんでした｡
どこへ行くのも便利な立地､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ後もｼｬﾜｰを使わせて頂き出発ｷﾞﾘｷﾞﾘまで有効に過ごせました｡
It was nice staying there, the walls are just really thin so you literally can hear everything or every movement.

This is a great location in the heart of Waikiki. It's not luxury in any way- minimalist, great if you'll mostly be out and about. The bathroom could use some sprucing up.  Tomoko is a very sweet lady, works hard for her family.

The location is so convenient. You can walk to the main strip in Waikiki and the bus stop is just a few meters away in case you want to explore other parts of the city.

Tomoko was superfriendly and was very accomodating with check-in
Very central, as promised. Great host, very fast with responses.

朝早くの到着でしたが､荷物も置かせてもらえ､早めにお部屋も用意してくれたので大変助かりました!
空港までのﾀｸｼｰ手配もしてくれ､順調な旅が出来ました^ ^ありがとうございました!
ともこさんの対応がとても良く､ｺｽﾊﾟを考えるを重視の方にはお勧め｡ ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝも最高でした｡
I was only there for one night.  It was easy to find, a short walk to a really nice beach, shops and restaurants.  Staying there let me make the most of my one day stop!

Great neighborhood, very close to multiple buses, stores, restaurants, easy access from/to the airport, walking distance to many tourist attractions and the beaches. Very clean and quiet room/apartment, comfortable stay.  Tomoko is a great host, very responsive, provided everything I could need during my stay, including all the necessary information about Oahu. Thank you.

Tomoko is very easy going and I didn't have any problems to check-in and out. The best part of this place is the location for sure. It's very very convenient, only a couple of blocks to the shopping area and a few blocks to the beach. It may gets some noise since it's very close to main streets, but as far as you are concerned about location, totally worth it!
I had a great stay in Tomoko's place. Location is unbeatable. Tomoko is very nice and helpful too. Great value overall!

Location was good. Room was tidy and clean. One problem was there was no proper door in the room so you cannot lock it and there was no sound proof, could be noisy as you hear what everyone else in the flat was doing. But overall value was good.
I booked her one of her rooms again. It was a good room indeed. Tomo is one call away when I need a not pricy yet good deal room. Mahalo!

Tomoko was very lovely. She was friendly, helpful, communicated well and was pleasant to meet.  This room is in an apartment that has been divided into 5 bedrooms with a small shared kitchen and bathroom.  There is no other common living space. It is quite old.  Having said that, it was in an amazing location and I felt very safe.  I think it's a good place for young girls.  Everyone there was very nice.
It was very good location at such a reasonable price! I would definitely come back again.

Tomoko's rooms are very well located and are just like you can see on the pictures. You can walk to waikiki beach  within 7 minutes and to a Very Nice park. There are close, but expensive food stores. Also, you can go jogging at the canal! There Is more than enough hot water to shower and appliances work properly. Since it Is located downtown, there Is noise. So ear plugs arent luxury! I was supposed to have a Room with a doorlock, but ended up without. Tomoko gave me 70$ US refund. That was honest (: The appartement Is somewhat small and could be a little cleaner, but I would still recommend it. The price Is correct for what you get and it was fun meeting the other girls from différent countries! Hope to stay there again ! (:

The host is very friendly and nice. The bedroom is clean and comfortable. I really had a great time there. Also the place is near beach and a lot of shops. It is really the best deal you can find in this area.

立地が非常に良く､買い物や観光に出掛けるのに便利です｡
部屋もｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑも清潔で利用しやすいです｡
Loved her place, central close to the beach and functional. She's also easy to communicate with and super sweet.

Very convenient, clean and awesomely located place that I enjoyed very much! The cost performance is amazing! 
There is a lot of street noise though so if you're sensitive to it I would not recommend this place.
Great place for price!  I read in another review that she would recommend ear plugs for street noise, so did that and it was a tidy, private apartment room in paradise.

部屋はとても清潔で､陽当たり風通しが良かったです｡
ｽｰﾊﾟｰやﾋﾞｰﾁにも歩いていけ便利です｡

ﾏﾝｼｮﾝの管理人さんや住人さんも挨拶してくれたり､ｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰの使い方を教えてくれたり親切でした｡

GWでしたが宿泊でき良かったです*゜
Lovely, clean apartment that's in an excellent location. I would definitely stay here again!
ﾜｲｷｷの中心地､お部屋もｷｯﾁﾝもﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑも清潔でとても過ごしやすかったです｡
早めに着いてしまったのですが､対応して頂いてとても助かりました｡部屋やﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑなどもきれいでｱﾊﾟｰﾄ内にも鍵がないと入れないようになっていてｾｷｭﾘﾃｨもしっかりしています｡歩いて買い物やﾋﾞｰﾁなどにも行ける立地でとても便利です!逆に不便なことや不満が見つかりません!
Host was great so was Location
Great place to stay, very central and Tomoko is extremely accomodating!

Private, cozy room with a wonderful window breeze that keeps your room cool day and night. Very clean and allows great walking access to great tasting restaurants, convenient stores, shopping malls and beautiful Waikiki Beach.
2日の滞在でしたが､不自由なく過ごせました｡お部屋やｷｯﾁﾝには必要なものはそろっています｡買ったもののﾀｸﾞを取ったり､以外にあった方がいいﾊｻﾐ筆記用具などもあります｡初めて利用される方でも､安心して滞在できると思います｡
Tomoko's place is clean and convenient. She is a great host!

What an experience! The room I stayed in was cozy, lots of windows for cool breeze. It was perfect for my stay. Tomoko's place is clean and so convenient to everything. I didn't need to rent a car because everything was walking distance. Tomoko was so friendly, understanding and accommodating. I appreciate her hospitality and the aloha spirit she shares to everyone. I will definitely stay at her place again. Mahalo Tomoko!
Loved this place!!
Nice little place, very central location, great for single traveler~
Very friendly and helpful host.

ﾄﾓｺさんにはお会いできずでしたが､何の問題もなく過ごせる事ができました｡
全て清潔感があり良かったです｡
ﾊﾜｲは1人で来る事が多く､ﾎﾃﾙなどだと高くついてしまうので､また来るときは利用させて頂きたいと思います｡
Locating is amazing, parking was a Breeze for me and the room was windy and cool with great air flow
Simple and clean. Perfect for single travelers!
great!

ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝも明確に教えていただき､不安なくｾﾙﾌﾁｪｯｸｲﾝできました｡部屋もｽｰﾂｹｰｽを広げるには十分ｽﾍﾟｰｽがあり､ﾄｲﾚなどの水回りが綺麗にｷｰﾌﾟされているのも良かったです｡他にも同じく旅行者や固定の住人もいらっしゃるようでしたが､特に気になることもなくﾌﾟﾗｲﾊﾞｼｰもありとても快適でした｡ただ､私のやり方が間違えていたのかもしれないのですが窓を全閉できず､ｸﾋｵ通りに近いため深夜の騒音が気になりました｡外にいるのと同じような音の感じ方で普段は寝たら起きない私ですら2.3回目が覚めたので､敏感な方は耳栓を持っていくことをｵｽｽﾒいたします｡それ以外は単身旅行者には本当に素晴らしい滞在先でした｡
Great location! Personable and quick to respond and help out!

The location was excellent. I spent 3x as much on a hotel a block away. The room was bigger than I thought it would be, too. It was a pleasant surprise. It’s a city, so expect a little noise. The bed was not super comfy, but well enough to get a good night’s sleep. I will say, the instructions made it sound like the host did not want to be bothered at all, but the check in was super easy so this was not a problem. Plus, I ran into her on the way out & she was friendly to me. ... All in all, this has got to be the best deal going in Waikiki! If it’s available, you won’t be sorry you booked!!

Tomo is a great host! I've stayed with her for several years now and I'll never stay anywhere else in Honolulu as long as she's still on airbnb. Perfect for the low maintenance traveller who wants something simple and private. I love the city noise at night and having a kitchen available as an option. My room had a clothes rack and hangers and a little table and chair so I could really unpack and settle in. It was just perfect. The self check in was a new feature that was really helpful, too. I'll keep coming back.
Quiet, pleasant room, would definitely recommend. Wonderful location in the heart of Waikiki.

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist unschlagbar. Sie liegt direkt in Waikiki, öffentliche Verkehrsmittel sind direkt vor der Haustüre und zum Strand sind es nur zwei Straßen weiter. Das Zimmer ist klein aber völlig ausreichend, wenn man sowieso nur zum Schlafen dort ist. Das Zimmer und auch das Bad ist sehr sauber und gepflegt. Tomoko ist sehr freundlich und sympathisch, die Kommunikation mit ihr einfach und die Infos und Beschreibungen, die sie gibt sind sehr genau. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt hier absolut, wenn man bedenkt wie teuer Waikiki ist.
Very good place. Great location.

This is budget accommodation.

It was the best budget accommodation I have ever stayed in.  Small, private, no fuss, use of a nice shower (that was amazing), VERY clean, and the location is absolutely top notch.  Tomoko is a fantastic host.

とても充実した生活を送らせていただきました｡
ｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑに泊まるのは初めてで､ﾄﾞｷﾄﾞｷしたけど､ﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄもちゃんと確保されていて､よかったです｡
ともさんのおかげでたくさんの素敵な方たちに出会いました｡
本当に感謝してます｡
また必ず戻ってきます!

立地もよくﾋﾞｰﾁや街まで歩いて10分程で行けましたし､お部屋は階によって環境が違うと思いますが､泊まった女子専用のお部屋は個室に鍵もかけられますしとてもよかったです｡
ﾎｽﾄのともこさんもとても親切で感謝しています!
お部屋の窓が密閉できるﾀｲﾌﾟではなく､中心街なので音が気になる時があるので耳栓があった方が夜などは過ごしやすいと思います｡
必要なものは全部揃っていますし泊まれてよかったです!おすすめです :)

There’s nothing I don’t love about this place. The kitchen and bathroom were kept super clean all the time, not to mention the convenience of access to clean towels. 
Location was excellent too. 5 min walk to T galleria, and a bus stop literally 15 seconds from the building. You can get to anywhere you like from the bus stops-ala moana center, diamond head, walmart, hilton hawaiian village, Iolani palace, the airport, and all the other hotels in Waikiki. Pink line trolley stop is  also nearby, which was super convenient. 
For this price, I don’t think I can find a better place to stay. Definitely would stay here next time I visit Waikiki.

This was a great spot to crash after I arrived in HI. It was awesome to be close to food and the beach. I stayed here one night to get over jet lag before meeting up with friends and it did the trick! Also, Tomoko was communicative and responsive.

Simple, clean, great to be able to easily come and go as you please. Shared bathroom was never busy. Great location! Bed is very firm. Room is quite bright and noisy, so bring eye cover and ear plugs and you'll be just fine!
Good location, close to restaurants and the beach.
Apartamento bem localizado,  auto-check in sem complicações .
特にいうことはありません｡

At Tomokos you can't really complain to much given the price. The apartment is right in Waikiki and much cheaper than a hotel. However, there are a few small changes that could and should be made to this unit. For instance,  there is a 6 inch gap between the top of the door and the ceiling allowing the kitchen light to come pouring in at night. When I tried to turn it off one evening someone just turned it back on. It was nearly impossible to keep it dark. Second, the walls are paper thin. Sounds like people are drag racing outside the building at 2 am. So bring ear plugs. Mostly the gap above the door bothered me. Seems like a simple fix. Otherwise I enjoyed my stay. Thanks!
Didn't actually end up staying because I mixed up my flight dates but Tomoko was super understanding and got back to me right away when I messaged her!

I really thankful to Tomoko.
She is such a nice owner and we became a friend:)
The place is located only 2blocks away from DFS and the room was really tidy. Only the noise from outside was a bit loud though I would love to stay her place again one day soon!
清潔感のあるお部屋で快適でした｡また､Tomokoさんのﾘｽﾎﾟﾝｽがとても早かったので安心でした｡
とても清潔でﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄもしっかりしてて良かったです｡

If you’re looking for a quick and inexpensive place to sleep and shower in Waikiki without the prices of a fancy hotel, this is it! It is a simple place with no frills but it is definitely a steal when you compare prices to other options in downtown Waikiki. The checkin process was easy and straightforward - and Tomoko was quick to respond always. 

One note - if you’re a light sleeper this place is not for you (it gets LOUD at night with cars and people). Also, no AC - but the fan should do the trick for you in the room to keep you cool. 

Overall though, I would definitely recommend for single female travelers looking to spend their money on adventures instead of luxurious hotels.

Good location:)
Clean room;)
Close the bus stop to go to the airport!

立地条件も良くｺｽﾊﾟも良く快適に過ごせました｡ﾊｳｽﾙｰﾙがしっかりしているのでお部屋もﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑも綺麗です｡

朝はごみ収集の音がうるさかったり､夜は12時くらいまでは外の騒音が聞こえます｡音に敏感な方は耳栓をした方がいいかも

ﾊｲｷﾝｸﾞで汚れた靴を玄関の外に置いておいたら翌日無くなっていたので､しっかり荷物は鍵のかかる個室内で管理することをお勧めします｡

The place has long list of instructions to follow. If you are ok to follow, then the clean, cheaper, good location, self-check-in/out choice is here. If you don’t like to be instructed how to stay there, then you shouldn’t.
I loved the location. It has all basic things exactly as she mentions in description.
2回目の利用です｡前回とは違う階のお部屋でしたが､とても綺麗に保たれ､お部屋も必要なものは揃っているため､快適な滞在ができました｡ﾜｲｷｷにあり､ぷらぷら歩くのが好きな人には何でも行ける距離だと思います｡最中心部よりは静かだと思いますし､建物内で会った他の住人の方も皆さん親切な方で安心して過ごせました｡有難うございます｡
Very convenient location
立地は最高でお部屋も綺麗でした!が立地が良すぎるのか夜､外がうるさいうえに部屋の窓がしっかり閉まりませんでした｡お値段がお安いので相応かと思いました!家のｼｪｱﾒｲﾄが朝7時頃からお友達と朝食を作り始める話し声がとても響き目が覚めました｡

前回利用させていただきとっても快適だったので､また利用させていただきました♪
全てが快適で､返信も早く､何も困ることはありません*^^*
ﾜｲｷｷに1人で行くなら､とってもｵｽｽﾒです!!
ありがとうございました!

Tomoko’s place is in an excellent location, it’s close to the beach, to the mall and to amazing restaurants. There is easy access to public transportation and taxis as well.
I’m already planning to come back.

Great place! Was a little nervous about check in due to late night arrival, but it ended up being very easy to find the building and keys. The room is perfect, clean and quiet. Would totally stay here again!

女の1人旅には最適です!Great for solo traveling! (English below!)
Waikiki beachから徒歩15分前後､好立地な場所にあります｡徒歩でﾚｽﾄﾗﾝ､DFS､ｲﾝﾀｰﾅｼｮﾅﾙﾏｰｹｯﾄﾌﾟﾚｲｽなど､行きたい場所へはほとんど場所へは徒歩でどこでも行けます｡空港からTHE BUSの19または20番Waikiki行きに乗ると乗り換えなしで1時間ほどで到着します｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ､ｱｳﾄはとても簡単でした｡
ただ､建物が広い通りに面しているので夜､朝方でもかなり車の通りがあり､気になるかもしれません｡それでもこの場所､立地でこの値段はとてもいいと思います!Tomokoさんもとてもいい方でした!

Just 15 mins walking to Waikiki beach. It's in the middle of Waikiki. A lot of restaurants, DFS, International market place etc...they are walking distance. You could go almost  everywhere you want to by walking. THE BUS takes you to this place from the airport for 1 hour without any transfers. Check in and out were super easy. The building is on the busy street so you'll hear a lot of sounds even late evening and early morning. However, it's very reasonable in the middle of Waikiki!
Tomoko was a great host!

Nice place if you're going to stay 1 or 2 days in Honolulu. Very noisy, but not because it's noisy outside, but because the windows are not like the windows we have back in Europe. 
Follow the instructions and the rules, and everything will be fine. 

+ Best: Location. Parking was hard to find, but I ended up finding free parking Ala Wai Blvd. Try Eggs and Things for breakfast, 5 mins walk. Delish!
Instructions are pretty clear, good recommendations from Tomoko.
- Worst: Noisy. Windows not real windows and there was a noise coming from the kitchen, something like a smoke extractor that I couldn't figure out how to turn off.

Perfect place for a solo female traveller to touchdown on her first night in Honolulu. I only stayed for one night and was able to leave my luggage after check-out for a few hours while I waited for my friends to arrive the next day. Perfect location close to the beach and everything within 5 minutes walk.

The place is small but well ventilated and very comfortable for the price. Everything is kept very clean and fresh. Room has very nice natural lighting, which made it so much nicer than the photos. Thank you!

初めてairbを利用しました｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの鍵の説明などとても分かりやすかったです｡ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙやｼｰﾂもお借りできて良かったです｡そして女性1人だと色々と怖かったかもしれないですけど女性限定で安心ですし､誰かが隣にいると思うと安心して眠れました｡お手洗いもｼｬﾜｰﾙｰﾑもﾋﾟｶﾋﾟｶに磨いてあったので気持ちよかったです｡若干外の騒音はありましたが私は少し音がする方が眠りやすいので気になりませんでした｡場所もﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝのすぐ裏あたりなので何処へ行くにも便利でした｡
ただ朝ﾄｲﾚに行こうとして部屋から出ると風でﾄﾞｱが閉まってしまい､その勢いでなのか部屋のﾄﾞｱの内鍵が掛かってしまって中に入れなくなりました｡(本当は鍵を掛けてから扉が閉まらないと鍵はかかりません｡)風の勢いなのか…朝から裸足で何も持たずにﾘｯﾂｶｰﾙﾄﾝに泊まっている友達の家に助けを求めに行きました､､  ｡笑
友達の携帯からどうにかtomokoさんと連絡がとれて迅速な対応をして下さいました｡感謝です｡ありがとうございました!!

部屋に置いてあるTomoさんお勧めのﾋﾞｰﾁやお店の案内がとても役立ちました!毎日の様にﾌｫｰﾄﾃﾞﾙｯｼｰﾋﾞｰﾁに歩いて行きました｡滞在期間､他のお部屋にはｵｰｽﾄﾗﾘｱの方､ﾎﾟﾙﾄｶﾞﾙの方が居て､それぞれ一人旅で今日何をしたかなどｷｯﾁﾝで顔を合わせた時に話したりしました｡共有ｽﾍﾟｰｽを綺麗に保てるかは､一緒の時期に滞在しているﾙｰﾑﾒｲﾄ次第だと思います｡空港からの移動はｼｬﾄﾙで片道16ﾄﾞﾙ｡帰りは隣のﾌｫｰﾊﾟﾄﾞﾙ前に迎えに来てくれたので､大きなｷｬﾘｰﾊﾞｯｸﾞでの移動距離が短く済んで楽でした｡これから3ヶ月旅を続ける最初の宿､且つ初AirbnbがTomoさんのお部屋でしたが､最後の宿もこちらにしようと決め､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ前に予約させて頂きました｡またお世話になります!
とても良い滞在になりました
Very clean and quiet. Fresh, soft towels and clean bathroom made me feel at home :)

Tomoko’s place is exactly I wanted. Breezy quiet private room with full of natural sunlight. Bathroom and kitchen are very clean. Check-in was very smooth. So much better than the photos! I will definitely come back. Thank you Tomoko!
I had a very long layover in Honolulu and finding the room was easy and it was worth the price. I had a nice bed to sleep in and was refreshed for my flight the next morning.

Tomoko's place was EXACTLY what we were looking for! Communication was fast, Check in a breeze, apartment was very clean and bright! The value for the location was unbeatable! We were within walking distance of everything we wanted to do in Waikiki!

기대 이상이었습니다 :) 장기 여행을 하느라 저렴한 숙소를 찾고 있었는데 방도 집도 깨끗하고 중심가에 있어서 편하게 지냈습니다. 다른 방 여행자들도 대부분 혼자 여행하는 일본인이어서 깨끗하고 조용했어요. 

방은 무척 작습니다. 침대 옆 큰 캐리어 펼치면 끝. 그래도 테이블도 있고 옷걸이도 있고 책장도 있어 혼자 쓰는데 불편함은 없었습니다. 

와이파이도 빨랐구요. 완벽한 숙소는 아니지만 가성비 대비 짱이라 생각합니다. 다음에 와도 머물 의사 있어요 :)

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが最高でした｡
事前の宿泊のﾙｰﾙも丁寧に教えていいただいたので､困ることはありませんでした｡
ほとんど寝に帰るだけでしたが､快適に過ごすことができま出来ました｡

ただ､繊細な方は音が気になり眠れないかもしれません｡
This is a great place in a great area. Convenient, comfortable, clean and affordable. Zero issues!!  Ill rebook again.
Good for just needing a place to sleep. Great location.

My experience at Tomoko's was honestly the best! As a first time international traveller, staying at Tomoko's all female apartment made me feel very safe. From the beginning prior to coming to my destination, Tomoko was very accomodating and helpful in regards to communication and answering questions with early check in. On arrival, I was fortunate enough to meet Tomoko as I was entering the apartment block and she helped me get the keys. She had clear instructions throughout our communication. The place was better than i expected! The room was so cute,  and both room and bathroom was so clean! Bed was comfortable and there was also a fan in the room. Earplugs were available to use as it was quite noisy due to the thin walls but only used it on the first night as i got used to the outside noise quickly. I would definitely stay here again and recommend Tomoko's place for first time travellers or frequent solo travelers for an affordable, clean and awesome place to live that was only less than 7 minutes walk from Waikiki Beach. The apartment was 1 minute walk from a main bus stop and 2 minutes walk to the nearest ABC store and cafes! Overall 10/10 place to stay. Thank You Tomoko for everything!

name: Little house on 12th Street
summary: Lovely, private, light-filled attic room with your own bathroom available in popular Park Slope/Gowanus neighborhood in Brooklyn, N.Y. Neighborhood is within walking distance to Barclay Center, Prospect Park, restaurants and bars. The house was built in the late 1890s and features original wood floors, molding and pocket doors.  The attic room is very private, there are a total of 3 flights of stairs including the stoop.  Private bathroom is located one flight below the attic.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a native New Yorker and love to travel.   The best way to get to know a place is by meeting the people who live there.  I'm a home owner, responsible and clean. Also,  semi-retired and am looking forward to new adventures.

name: Incredible space with amazing views
summary: This magical home offers a slice of island living most never expect of Hong Kong. A spacious bedroom with shared kitchen, bathroom, large living and dining room and exceptional outdoor space, all nestled on top of a secluded cove facing the South China Seas. We have a second guest room listed as: Sublime setting, a room with a view.
space: Welcome! After a peaceful walk up Peak Road (around 20 minutes walk, some of which is uphill + no cars on Cheung Chau) you will be rewarded with a unique detached 1950's home nestled above a scenic cove.  This spectacular home offers tranquility and unparalleled views of the South China Seas, whether reading in the hammock , watching the brown kites nesting in the casuarina trees or enjoying breakfast at one of the garden tables.  At night, waves will lap you to sleep and in the morning you'll be woken by birdsong. This south facing home is ideal for short or longer breaks, for couples or singles who desire a refreshing and peaceful holiday..  We have two guest rooms available. The second room is listed at: "Sublime setting, a room with a view"
description: This magical home offers a slice of island living most never expect of Hong Kong. A spacious bedroom with shared kitchen, bathroom, large living and dining room and exceptional outdoor space, all nestled on top of a secluded cove facing the South China Seas. After a peaceful walk up Peak Road (around 20 minutes walk, some of which is uphill + no cars on Cheung Chau) you will be rewarded with a unique detached 1950's home nestled above a scenic cove.  This spectacular home offers tranquility and unparalleled views of the South China Seas, whether reading in the hammock , watching the brown kites nesting in the casuarina trees or enjoying breakfast at one of the garden tables.  At night, waves will lap you to sleep and in the morning you'll be woken by birdsong. This south facing home is ideal for short or longer breaks, for couples or singles who desire a refreshing and peaceful holiday..  We have two g
neighborhood_overview: A very quiet and residential area.  There is a small rocky beach just 20 metres below the house where you can go swimming.  A few  minutes walk takes you to the peaceful Nam Tum Beach . Around 300 metres from the house is another beach near Kwun Yam Temple. There are many scenic walking routes to explore on the island.
notes: We are happy to provide our guests with a light breakfast, on request. We have two young dogs - Ella and Pepper.  Like all dogs when they hear the front gate / door open they will bark but will stop once they see you. Ella is very friendly and once you are in the house she will have already made friends with you. Pepper is younger but bigger. She's well-behaved and likes to do her own thing. There are a number of steps leading down to the house from the front gate which may be an issue for wheelchair users.
transit: Cheung Chau has a friendly and relaxed atmosphere where the best way to get around is on foot.  Ferries depart Central ferry piers to Cheung Chau every 30 minutes.  Fast ferries take 35mins and the slower ferries take 50mins. Cheung Chau is famous for its street snacks and seafood restaurants.  Enjoy your stay!
access: One of two guest bedrooms, this south-facing room with sea views is equipped with a queen sized bed, a large built-in wardrobe, air-conditioner and hair-dryer. Directly opposite the bedroom, you will have access to a bathroom with shower. You have access to all the outdoor space, the kitchen, living room and pool room. You are welcome to come and go as you wish, as you will be given your own keys. A designated tea/coffee table is in the kitchen for guests where they can help themselves to the variety of tea infusions, coffee and snacks. The conservatory pool is ideal for cooling down in the hot humid Hong Kong summers. You have access to the outdoor space. You are welcome to come and go as you wish. There is no curfew.
interaction: If we're around we are always happy to help with what to see/do/eat on Cheung Chau and in Hong Kong.  But we will stay out of your way.
house_rules: Please note that check-out time is 12pm / midday. For occupancy of more than two persons, we charge $250HKD per person. This charge applies to children aged 5 and over. Please leave the room as you found it.  We take our shoes off in the conservatory/pool area and it would be great if you would too. We do not provide guests with toothbrushes so please bring your own. You are welcome to smoke outside.

host.host_about: I have been teaching English in Hong Kong for the past 15 years  I love travel, eating and meeting new people.  I love to host people from around the world. Please feel free to inquire. We have a house with great garden space and sea-views on Cheung Chau. Two guest bedrooms available.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
My girlfriend and I planned to stay in Cheung Chau for a night to escape from the noisy and crowdy urban area. We tried to organise a similar trip before and the information we found showed that the condition of the average hostel in Cheung Chau were just acceptable. 

Robin and Yan's place is an exception. After seeing the photos they posted on Airbnb website we made the reservation without second thought. The outcome proved us right. I dare say that it is the best accommodatin I have ever found in Cheung Chau.

Yan and Robin is a nice and friendly couple with exceptional taste in different aspects of living: books, furniture, food, etc. They are willing to suggest where we should visit during our stay (e.g. the delicious chilli chicken pot!) and tell us how to get there in detail. They have paid attention to every detail to guarantee they are providing first-class service. It is indeed our honor and fortunate to be their second pair of guests. 

When we arrived at the pier, my girlfriend and I took time to walk around the commercial area and visited the catholic church nearby, and then Robin came and showed us the way to his home. Although his house is located at the middle of a hill, it is not far away from the commercial area. The road to his house is quiet and well-maintained; it is not physically demanding to walk through it even we were with our luggage.

After entering the gate of his house, Robin led us through a large garden to the veranda, which is facing a marvelous and astonishing view of the coast. My girlfriend and I enjoyed reading books there during daytime. At night, it would become so romantic to stay there when the star-shaped light decorations hanging from the ceiling are all turned on. Next to the veranda is the indoor pool area. As the weather was turning cold these days, it felt so warm inside it. It is decorated with plants and oriental style decorations and furniture. It made me feel like I had travelled to Bali. 

The sitting room and our bedroom are spacious, clean and well-lighted. The interior design is in harmony with the outdoor area. As soon as we had settled ourselves in the sitting room, Robin served us hot tea and traditional local pastries. Then he gave us the key of our room - they have attached a mini flashlight to the key ring, and it helped us a lot when we were looking for our way back to the house at night. The next morning, Yan was so nice to have prepared some fruits and her homemade bread for our breakfast. The jazz music played in the sitting room was just excellent (my girlfriend and I even danced).

We will always remember Robin and Yan and our time staying at their place. We will definitely come again the next time we visit Cheung Chau.

Beautiful, Amazing, Fantastic...for the house 
Considerate, Warmly ...for Robin and Yen .
I'm afraid that I describe it  in English isn't accurate,so I can only use a few key words to express it. 
And I'm very lucky to have afternoon tea and delicious breakfast that  Robin and Yen provided specially.
I consider it's my best experience in Hong K
ong. I will plan to come again with my wife and daughter.

Robin and Yen are one of the best hosts I've ever met. Their house is gorgers -- beautiful, clean, comfortable, artistic, and fun. Robin and Yan were enthusiastic, even though we don′t speak the language, but it didn′t feel strange, to pick us up at the station, a temporary increase in a friend are very active to help us solve, special study released to us, really thanks!”Yan” prepare a rich breakfast for us every day, and still do from time to time a snack to share, we are like at home. Next time will go down but also to your friends.

The view is better than the photos.Open the door to all our big surprise.Robin and the family is very nice.We get along very happy.Its very memorable holiday memories.If we go to Hongkong next time, we will choose to live here.

I Stayed with my friend in Robin and Yen's place for 1 nights, it was a very pleasant experience! Robin and Yen were super nice, they welcomed us with a warm smile . They were very informative, answering every question from us. The listing itself was great. My wife and I have had a great time during our stay at Yen and Robin’s house. They are extremely kind, polite and very generous. 
They gave us a hint for nice restaurants, beaches and walks in the beautiful nature of Cheung Chau Island.
Sharing kindness, music, food, and their passion about the island…… 
We felt like at our home immediately and at the end of our stay we became friends.
The house is like a dream, perfectly clean nicely decorated with large terrace and a breath taking view on the sea.
I highly recommend this place for short and long term vacations.

Robin and Yen are really nice. Robin picked us up at the dock and kindly advice us on restaurants. The apartment is beautiful and clean, with a lovely garden watching the sea. The couple also gave us lots of freedom using the kitchen and lounge. Really nice to stay with them!

This place is a little  paradise. The view is amazing , the house is  cute and cosy and big . ThE room and bathroom are very confortable . And the décoration is greaT . Besides, we played with the new family member Ella, a playful and lovely puppy :) Hope to visit you again and again! God bless!

We love to live in again!

Hong Kong isn't usually associated with paradise....But Robin and Yens have created exactly that! An absolute jewel location with truly super hosts. This is what Airbnb was meant for - feeling at home, in a paradise. Highly recommended!

Yen and Robin are absolutely amazing host! After we agreed on the time we would meet at Cheung Chau pier, Robin picked me and my friend up and led us to their place. The house is hosted by Robin and his wife Yen. Robin picked up us at the Ferry. His house is located in the peak road which is about 15 mins walk from the Ferry. But it's too hot in Summer that we are not able stay for long time in outdoor. Both Robin and Yen are very nice, they keep the room clean and comfortable, Yen prepared the rich breakfast for us before she went to work. Great place that recommend to stay here.
A good experience and wonderful room. Yen and Robin is nice to give us suggestion on dining and travelling place. Ella is adorable and welcome us warmly. we will come again.

the house has amazing sea view and very nice room. received warm welcome from Robin from the moment arrived at Cheungchau, he showed me all the way to the house and recomanded tour spots and foods in Cheungchau, also prepared nice breakfast the next morning. Excpet that the house is on top of the peak and takes about 15 minutes walking from the pier, perfect choice to stay in Cheungchau.

Thank you for your good catering. Your lovely house and dogs gave us unforgettable journey. We will certainly choose your house again when we come to Cheung Chau next time. Thank you again!

Best regards

Mason and Poem
yen和Robin拥有一个很棒的房子,装修的很漂亮舒适,喜欢他们的玻璃室内花园还有舒服的大客厅,想念有体香的狗狗Ella｡在繁忙的都市生活中抽个周末去休闲放松一下很棒!

Our stay in Cheung Chau with Robin & Yen was great! They made us feel very welcome in every aspect from communication on how to get there to restaurants to try in the area.

The house itself is wonderful with a great view of the sea and adjacent cliffs. The space was very clean and there was even a puppy, Ella, as an extra perk.

Cheung Chau is a walking or biking island so keep that in mind. We spent many hours exploring large swathes of the island from the Tsa Poi cave to the main Cheung Chau pier and some temples and beaches, all which were very easily accessible from the Airbnb.

It was a great experience and we would recommend it to anyone wanting a quieter few days on their Hong Kong trip.
超高性价比,在长洲岛度假非常放松｡感谢房东的热情招待,丰盛的早餐,美妙的海景,让我和太太及三岁大的儿子都很享受!

Awesome spot if you're looking for a bit of an escape from busy Hong Kong. The house is in amazing location and view was epic. room was spacious and the bed comfy. Cheung chau was great for a night away, we wish we had stayed longer. thanks to robin and yen who were great hosts and couldn't have been more accommodating. We'll be back!

We had a wonderful stay at Yen and Robin's place! The area is super quiet, the dogs are really nice and cute and the view from the room is perfect. Yen and Robin were super nice and friendly with us, ready to help whenever we had a question, and they even prepared super delicious breakfasts for us. We would definitely stay here place again!

Yen and Robin's house is any holiday dream. It is a 10 minute walk from the ferry and extremely easy to find. 

Location is perfect, up out of the hustle and bustle of the shopping area. You are woken by the sounds of birds or the waves coming in. The views are just stunning with so many seating areas out the back . 

Robin is a superb host, prepping a brilliant breakfast each morning and providing such great tips on where to go and eat on the island. He was always happy to answer any queries but also gives you space to holiday. 

The bedroom was beautiful with fresh towels and a comfy bed. There is a lock on each door so you don't have to worry about your things. 

This is an absolutely fantastic airbnb and we would not hesitate in recommending it. We look forward to returning ourselves.
The view is so nice, and I love the decoration of the house. I took numbers of pictures of all those little lovely stuffs. Thanks for the welcoming cookies and ginger tea. They taste good.

Yen & Robin are spectacular host of the house, they provide wonderful and extremely well hospitality to us. E.g. Making breakfast, giving fruits, exchanging culture, etc. This house faced with a overview for a corner of the sea in this island, it is enjoyable for visitors to do anything at the yard of their house when facing the sea. And there are two lovely and friendly dogs, Ella and Pepper, both of the dogs are nice to people, you don't have to be afraid of being bite by them and it would be wonderful if you are a dog friendly person. The bathroom is quiet clean, shampoo and shower gel are supplied, also clean towers. Robin have so many ideas for recommending trip routes or restaurant, you could ask him if u haven't make any plans. I would say this is a fabulous place to take rest when enjoying vacation. Best place ever!

It is a beautiful place, with a beautiful view. Yen and Robin are realy Nice, open minded people who know what you want when you're on holiday.
They give you privacy, but help you with advice when you need it or ask for it.
In Cheung Chao there are a lot of very Nice restaurants, you can easily reach by foot.
Yen and Robin have two young dogs, you .

It's a suprise to stay in Yen's house, it is clean, bright, with artistic decoration, we can feel the host has good sense of art, and the great passion towards life. Yen is kind and patient, she gave us detail guide so we find the house easily, when we get home, she prepared things we might need, and nice breakfast for us. The place is 10min's walk to the ferry pier or to the beach & swimming site. We can see the sea scene from our room, also we can sitting in the yard, watching the wave hitting the rock, it's a great experience. Thank you Yen, you made my day!
house很棒很大,robin人很好,可以看海,特别舒服｡
半山别墅,山上空气清新,风景优美｡房东及狗狗们很热情｡房间干净､舒适｡夏天去,要备些防蚊子的物品｡

Yen and Robin's house is an amazing place that it is hardly find among other Bnb in Cheung Chau. It is spacious, lively, magnificient view of the sea from the terrace and your room's window. We follow their advice to have dinner at a local sea food restaurant. Its price is so reasonable and food is bundle and yummy

The location of Yen and Robin's place, hidden away on Cheung Chau island, isn't so much charming as enchanting! This kind of quiet peace amongst trees and overlooking the sea is rare enough in any city, let alone Hong Kong.

I would characterise my visit as perhaps like staying with your favourite auntie and uncle. I am full of gratitude for the kind, generous warm hospitality as well as genuine interest in ensuring I had everything I needed.

In terms of tips that might help other travellers, other than the "don't hesitate and book now" cliché, I would probably mention:
1) The house is uphill from the ferry. Therefore try to pack light.
2) Be sure to go for sushi and tea at the Hometown tea house. If you have time, stop by for a photo and chat; and sign the guest book as well.
3) The internet on Cheung Chau has a reputation for being patchy by HK standards, particularly during storms. By European standards it was more than adequate for accessing files over the company VPN.
4) Try to visit mid-week when the island is practically devoid of other visitors. You could have the beach to yourself!

A nice traveling experience living in Yen & Robin's house. The house is a little bit far from the ferry pier, but have a wonderful view and comfortable environment.Yen & Robin are very nice and freindly,made us feel (Email hidden by Airbnb) we are the first time visit the island, they give us a clear direciton the the house and also useful recommendation for travling the island.Thanks for their hospitality.
Everything was perfect!

房间:非常干净,香薰的味道很喜欢,浴巾的味道也是香香的,忘记问下是什么牌子的了｡洗浴用品全,但是私人牙具要自己准备｡狗狗会叫不过总体还好,很听主人的话｡
早餐:很好吃!主人家准备了辣酱喜欢吃辣哈哈哈｡
位置:需要往山上爬些坡但两侧有树风景不错,很幽静,避开了喧闹的游客｡很安全｡
总之很好,会再来｡

We couldn’t have wished for a better place to stay in Hong Kong whilst visiting our daughter. Cheung Chau is a charming island, less than an hour by ferry from the piers at Central, but has managed to preserve a traditional feel, with a working harbour, no cars, narrow streets, plentiful inexpensive restaurants, sandy beaches and multiple walks around the island. Wen and Robin’s delightful house is a 15 mins walk uphill from the ferry in an excellent location overlooking the sea. Unusually for Hong Kong, the house, both inside and out, has plenty of space, including a large terrace, spacious open plan dining and living room, pool room with plunge pool, separate bathroom with a shower for guests, and a well-appointed bedroom with air con, large double bed and good storage. As if this wasn’t enough, Yen and Robin were perfect hosts, inviting us to share their home and enjoy their company, together with their friendly dogs Ella and Pepper. We didn’t want to leave!
Yen&Robin他们非常好,我迷路了还带着狗狗来找我,海岛上的空气质量很好,岛上很多小吃和海鲜大排档,很热闹的小岛｡早上起来的房间打开窗帘就能看到海,来到庭院看海风景更棒!特别要说一下,房间的香氛很好闻,茶也好好喝,睡前还有水果零食,特别亲切｡早餐搭配的很好吃,狗狗们也很乖,我们的互动很开心,谢谢这么用心的房东,下次有机会还要住他们家｡
Yen & Robin are the very nice host. The house is special and comfortable. The view is execellent.

想不到香港會有這小角落｡睡房一睡醒就能看到日出,真的很享受｡我一定會再來｡
Robin & yen 很熱情好客和貼心｡天氣凍了,他特意煮了薑茶｡
真的很推薦這個地方｡
Awesome hosts, great house, and friendly dogs! A great place to stay while exploring the island.
Yen & Robin's house is great and you can see beautiful sea views. And they are also very friendly,choosing their home is a great travel experience.

Всем советую отдыхать именно у Йен и Робина. Хозяева поделились  уютом и теплотой своего дома. Очущение счастья и блаженства не покидает. Именно в этом доме чувствуешь себя дома. Йен и Робин очень дружелюбная пара. И очень интересные собеседники. Дом окружен садом. С веранды вы будете наслаждаться бесценным видом на море, которое соединяется с небом и образует безграничный горизонт. Дом находится на самом верху самой высокой улицы. Это место просто уникальное.

The house is located in the nature, with a magnificent sea view, walkable distance to the harbour and the beach, guests can enjoy walking along the paths. Yen and Robin are very heart warming hosts, they provided us breakfast and drinks during our stay, the two dogs are so cute too

非常漂亮的房子,干净的房间､洗手间｡
Robin和Yen都很热情,为我们烹饪了早餐一起享用｡
抵达长洲岛时是晚上,比原先约定的时间提早了,费了蛮多时间找到房子,大家要注意看行程单上地址,Robin提供了详细的信息但上面没写门牌号,这一点可以加进去｡
总体而言是非常棒的体验,谢谢Robin和Yen｡

The house is a bit far from the ferry pier. But there is an excellent sea view and the host had decorate it very well and relaxing.  The host is nice and thanks Yen"s recommandation on Cheung Chau    food.  We have a great time there.
非常好的房子｡房东热情好客,不仅提供好的住宿,还尽力帮助我们拥有更好的旅行体验｡除此之外,有两个宾客房间也让我朋友和我得以认识更多的人,非常开心｡值得一提的是风景,窗外就是海洋,不在眼前,但是却很舒服｡晚上听不到海浪声,但是睁开眼睛就看到蓝天,让我们心情愉悦｡床和枕头真的太舒服了,刚考完试缓解疲劳非常有效!房东的早饭做的很用心,两只狗狗太可爱了!!这是非常好的一次旅行｡

Yen and Robin are very great hosts! Their place was very nice. We were unfortunate to visit on a rainy weekend. Otherwise, I really hope we could enjoy the patio a bit more. 
The place was stylish and you won’t be able to tell the place is very old. However, we did experience a few incidents of electrical circuit breaks. It was being resolved quickly.

I believe our trip would have been less wonderful if not because we found Yen and Robin's house. Fantastic house, fantastic garden, fantastic sea view, fantastic homemade herbal tea and breakfast, and of course, fantastic Yen and Robin.

Yen and Rodin are really nice people, and they will help with with any questions when you stay in Cheung Chau. Guests can enjoy incredible sea view form their house, and spacious garden. Moreover, I really appreciate the decorations in their house and delicious breakfast they cooked for us. BTW, Yen and Robin have two cute dogs, one is Pepper and the other one is Ella. Please don’t be afraid of them, they are just braking when strangers enter their house, and they will not hurt you. It’s really a wonderful experience staying in Yen and Robin’s house!

房东夫妇待客热情,在入住前后会主动沟通,只是沟通需要英语,如果英语不好,那就肢体语言补救,或者用翻译软件｡房子的位置有点偏,离码头有一段距离,但是景观很好,屋内设施齐全,还有一个大花园｡可惜的是由于受到台风山竹的影响,花园内不少绿化被毁,没有看到以前美丽的花园,希望花园可以快点恢复以前的美丽｡房东养了两只狗,pepper和ella 对人很热情,特别是pepper比较容易紧张,如果是比较怕狗狗的客人需要小心｡

Being at Yen and Robin’s was a magical retreat from the hustle and bustle of urban HK. We were greeted by a pair of energetic dogs, and welcomed warmly by Robin. Despite the chaos that Typhoon Mangkhut created a week earlier, much of the house was already restored. We were stunned by the natural greenery, and also the calming blues that their house opened into. After a good night’s sleep, we were woken by the smell of fresh coffee and avocado toast by the lovely Yen. We had a good chat about life, love and culture. For a night, we could almost swear we lost ourselves. We would highly recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a romantic getaway.
Nice people and sweet dogs.
Sweetie host, nice view and good breakfast
Robin and Yen are definitely good host. Strongly recommend this place. If you’re into laid back and relaxed weekend, please forget the walk from pier to here. It’s definitely worth.

Yen & Robin的房子离码头大约10-15分钟路程,在Peak Road上,环境相当幽静,远离烦嚣｡
房子的大花园就可以看到无敌大海景,尤其是天气好的时候可以看到非常壮丽的日出｡真的是晚上听着海浪声睡去,早上听着海鸟声起床｡在这里住上一晚也令长洲之旅增色不少｡房间的设施很完善,有即热式的热水,水压也充足,需要注意的是记得自备牙刷｡
Yen和Robin非常热情好客,不仅供应茶水､啤酒,还有准备了丰富的早餐,而且还为我们推荐了不少岛上乃至市区的小众景点､餐厅｡交流基本是英语,Yen会说一点粤语｡房子里有两只中型犬,虽然有时候会吠叫,但不咬人｡
性价比超高｡

Please excuse my feedback in delay. I was swamped with work recently. Just wrote this feedback. I and my friend Elsa had a great day here. Robin and Yen are very nice. Ella and Pepper are so cute. The Room is very clear and comfortable. Thank you so much. I would definitely choose this house again if I come to Cheung Chau again!!!
All the things are very good! Yen’s a really sweet host! Wish to come back next time! Perfect!

name: Behind the Red Door II
summary: Beautifully renovated apartment on a quiet tree lined street, steps from the subway, minutes from midtown in one of the most culturally rich and exciting neighborhoods in New York City.  Harlem is gem in which to stay when visiting New York.
space: Craig and I would love to have you come and visit us at our brownstone that is nestled on a quiet tree lined street in the village of Harlem.  The apartment is a full floor in a privately owned home. Our newly renovated vacation and short-term rental is a spacious and private apartment-style suite, complete with a separate entry, full kitchen for cooking, living room, dining area and private bath, all conveniently located in the heart of historic Harlem. We employed the services of a professional interior decorator so that we could offer you the very best. Each apartment includes flat screen televisions, cable (with all the premium cable channels) and internet service and are completely air conditioned. This apartment includes a king size bed with a twin size sleeper in a private room off the living room.  An air mattress is available to accomodate a fourth person.  We’re steps from all major mass transit lines (the nearest subway is three blocks away), some of the city’s best restaura

Harlem is gem in which to stay when visiting New York. Craig and I would love to have you come and visit us at our brownstone that is nestled on a quiet tree lined street in the village of Harlem.  The apartment is a full floor in a privately owned home. Our newly renovated vacation and short-term rental is a spacious and private apartment-style suite, complete with a separate entry, full kitchen for cooking, living room, dining area and private bath, all conveniently located in the heart of historic Harlem. house_rules: We’ve have been up and running with airbnb since April 2013 and our experience with them and their customer base has been great.  We are very pleased with the apartments we’ve created and judging from the customer feedback, our guests have been too.  In order to maintain the standard that’s been set we’ve established these rules to maintain the space for you and all our future guests. 1.	Check in will be after 3:00 unless previously arranged. 2.	Check out will be noon unless previously arranged. 3.	If you are staying more than three days, please take the garbage out and place in the binds located outside the building. 4.	We know many people are coming for vacations and are here in New York to have a good time.  However, please keep noise levels down after 11 pm. 5.	No pets. 6.	No smoking in the apartments 7.	No hanging out on the stoop 8.	Please turn off the lights and air conditioners when leaving the apartment. 9.	Please lock the front door of the building each and every time you lea

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Diane and Craig are proud to welcome to Behind the Red Door at 154 our new short term and vacation apartment rentals.   We have two apartments nestled in a beautifully renovated brownstone on a quiet tree-lined block in Harllem.  We're long time Harlem residents who have had the opportunity to travel the world both for work and leisure and we look forward to sharing with you the private space we've created.  Whether it's music, dance or art, dining or shopping, we are a resource for all that New York has to offer and that we enjoy ourselves.  For a closer look at our service, visit our (Email hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Very nice place with extremely nice hosts right in the middle of one of the most inspiring place in NY . Diane ,Craig and this beatiful appartment are highly recommended .

Beautiful, modern, and luxurious.  Apartment is roomy by NY standards, completely remodeled, and comfortable.  The bed was very comfortable.  Diane and Craig were lovely hosts and checked a few times to make sure everything was OK.  There are 3 flights of stairs since this is the top of the Brown Stone - so not a good place for older people or perhaps someone with a baby.  The apartment also has several sky lights - so that was a real bonus.  The street is a quiet one by NY standards.  Only a few blocks from two subway lines and around the corner from the Apollo Theater.  Everything was top notch.  Thank you.

Dianne and Craig were wonderful, they met us as soon as we got to the apartment and were there within 20 minutes of when we were ready to check out.  The place was clean, lots of towels, and such a great location, just a couple minutes to the A, D, or 2/3.  We went to Harlem Tavern for dinner down on 116th, which is a great casual place, but it sounds like Corner Social right around the corner on 126th is a place to check out too.  Lenox Coffee also had great, fresh coffee, just up on 129th. And, if you plan ahead or can brave the crowds, Red Rooster and Sylvias are just a couple blocks away as well.  Overall, fantastic and I would definitely stay here again.

We had such a great time staying in Diane and Craigs beautiful apartment! Right from the beginning Diane was so quick with communication and made everything so easy and smooth. It had absolutely everything we needed and the place was so clean and new! Would definitely come back and highly recommend!!

Thanks so much for a great stay :)
Hannah

Diane and Craig were really nice hostess! The apartment was big and roomy..... It was in a decent location. The neighborhood was quiet. My friends and I had a great time. Thank you for always being avail if we needed anything.....

Diane was extremely nice from initial contact until our departure and always responsive. We feel we made new friends. We were a family of 4. Diane and Craig were more than accommodating and very welcoming. As hosts, they truly cared about us and made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay pleasant. It was a pleasure staying at their beautiful apartment. The place was immaculate and had everything ready. All the amenities listed were right-on and it is located in a very safe neighborhood. We would definitely recommend the place to anyone looking to staying in the NYC area or simply passing thru. All the buses and trains are very close and Time's Square is about 20 minutes away. Thank you for making our stay so unforgettable.

Nous avons été très heureux de résider à Harlem, un quartier qui a joué un important rôle dans l'histoire de New York. De plus, le quartier était très intéressant pour faire du shopping et pour visiter New York dans la mesure où la station de métro était très proche. L'appartement est très beau, très fonctionnel et très propre. Diane et Craig sont des personnes très plaisantes. Nous sommes très satisfaits d'avoir fait leur connaissance.

Hi I'm from France and I just spent 9 nights at Diane and Craig's place, I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

Everything was brand new, clean, working and Diane and Craig are wonderful people.
In fact the place looks better in real than the pictures and it's quite a spacious appartement. The three of us really enjoyed it.

Don't worry about the neighbourhood, it's really safe and in fact there's really a lot to do and see in Harlem. The 125th street station is 3 blocks down (it's a 3min walk), with subway lines 2 and 3, you will access to any part of the city easily.

There are 2 supermarkets, grocery stores, all majors fast food chains, and quality restaurants very close to the appartement. Don't forget to go to the Apollo Theater Amateur Night, it was one of the best night of our stay.

In the end, if you want to feel home away from home in NYC, this is the place to go !

Thank you Diana & Craig for your hospitality! 

We couldn't have picked a better place to stay. 
The apartment was just as it is pictured. Perfect location to all the subways and great restaurants. We will definitely recommend your apartment to any family and friends traveling to NY. Best vacation ever.

thanks again! 

Erik and family

Awesome! Maravilhoso! ¡Impresionante!

Diane and Craig were great hostess. We loved to stay for 3 days in the beautiful and cozy apartment. The apart had everything that we needed, it is complete. It is located at the best place of Harlen, very close to subway, market, bars and restaurants.

Thank you Diane and Craig.
Fabiano and family!

We stayed 5 nights and had a wonderful stay at this apartment.  It was well-equipped, location was good, near to laundro mat, restaurants, supermarket, bus stops and subway stations.  Apartment was clean and wi fi worked like a charm.  Perfect for our group of four.  Diane was super fast in our email correspondence and met with us when we checked in.  Overall, a great airbnb experience! Thank you Diane! 

Tracey & family,
August 2013
Malaysia

Very nice apartment, clean and cozy. All you need for few day trip or maybe 6 month stay. Quiet neighborhood, convenient location, just a few minutes from a subway station, also several bus stations near by. Fast and reliable internet over Wi-Fi.
We have literally nothing to complain about.
We enjoyed every minute staying there. Definitely looking forward to coming back on our next trip to NYC.
Craig and Diane are realy nice and friendly people, helpful in everything you need.
Thank you once again.
MERCI ! Appartement superbe et bien équipé, à proximité du métro dans un quartier extraordinaire ! Merci Craig pour l'adresse du resto Haïtien, à très bientôt !

It was cool. The apartment is very comfortable, beautiful, everything was clean and new. We did not feel discomfort moving across the night Harlem. Craig is really cool man! Thanks, Diane And Craig!!!

What a great place. Diane and Craig stayed in contact and met us at the apartment as per plan. The  apartment was  large, clean and very comfortable. It was perfect for us. Good location, close to grocery stores, subway and buses. They are great hosts. Thank you.
     We would definitely use them again.

We had the best time!! Craig let us in and showed us around when we arrived.  The place was great, very clean and beautifully decorated. The neighborhood was safe; we were able to arrive back late a night with no problems. We were there the day of a block party and were able to meet some of the neighbors.  The place is close to everything; we were able to eat at Sylvia’s and only had about a 5 min walk back on our full tummies.  Diane met us a check out right on time.  Although we didn't need anything while we were there I'm sure if there were any problems they would have been taken care of right away.  I emailed Diane a few times before checking in and was always responded to quickly. I would def. recommend Behind the Red Door to anyone looking for a nice, convenient place to stay.  I hope this place is available every time I come!!

Our stay in the surprisingly quiet, 3rd story walk up was lovely.  Diane emailed, and  Craig met us and gave a quick overview. The place is large for NYC, esp the bedroom. King bed, cotton linens, elegantly decorated. We slept with windows open , and it was fairly quiet til morning rush. Same deal with bath and kitchen; nice linens, everything works. Same deal with internet and a million movie choices; everything works. Beautiful wood floors; just like in the photos. What they don`t tell, is that Craig is a jazz luminary; we asked with whom he`s played, and he said " pretty much , everybody "...   and he has !  I saw Sun Ra more than 30 years ago at Chicago Jazz fest, and Craig might have been in the band !  My husband told me he has tried to buy some apparently rare  CD`s that Craig composed, or produced and they were available in the $300 range. We only learned as we were leaving. Don`t let the mild mannered demeanor fool you, folks; we`re talking big talent.

Diane is a lovely woman and the apartment is just as lovely. She has done a wonderful job with the brownstone. The apartment is well maintained with beautiful finishes. The block is quiet and looks like something out of the Cosby Show. We enjoyed our stay.

We were there for 3 nights in october and I recommend this apartment to everyone.Location is great, in a very nice area of Harlem, the street is very quiet and you are close to the subway.
Thanks Diane and Craig

Everything as expected, very clean and cosy and the hosts forthcoming. Would reccomend it to everyone. Harlem is an excellent neighbourhood! Just when we asked via sms for additional informations about restaurants we didn't receive a reply :(

We just got back from our trip to NY, and thoroughly enjoyed our stay behind the red door. Diane and Craig were very accommodating with the check in time because we had an early flight. And whenever we had a question, Diane was super quick to respond. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Diane face to face, but we did meet Craig and he was really friendly. The apartment was located in Harlem and on a quiet street lined with trees and brownstones. It was in a perfect location to the train station. We also felt very safe at the location. The apartment itself was perfect and clean and neat. We all ( there were four of us) felt right at home. I recommend Diane and Craig's to anyone visiting NYC. We would definitely stay again. Thanks again Diane and Craig!

Very good accommodation. Clean, fully equipped kitchen, close to transport and shops. The owners are very friendly and easy to contact during our stay. I would highly recommend this accommodation to anyone. The area is very safe.

Be sure to talk to one of the hosts to let them know when you will be getting into town so they can meet you with the key. They don't live in the building. There are three apartments in the building and this one is on the top floor. Quite a few stairs, no elevator. If you have mobility issues this might be the best place for you.

The second bedroom is really small. As in REALLY small. The main bedroom is huge! Overall the apartment was in really good shape. The kitchen and attached living room are really cute. Bathroom is normal sized. All the amenities that you could need are there. We didn't have to call or text to ask for anything while we were there.

It is Harlem and if you're not used to the inner city life you might not enjoy it. I love Harlem so I was happy and comfortable here but it should be in your comfort zone to stay here.

We went to Marcus Samuelsson's restaurant which is right down the road from the apartment. That was a treat!

We really liked the apartment ! It was big enough (we were with 4 adults) and clean and in a very convenient area for visiting NY: the subway was close.
Also  a good connection to La Guardia with bus M60. 
Just round the corner were nice places to eat and a good supermarket . We never felt unsafe, although I must say that the latest we came back was 8:00 pm. Diane and Craig were very nice people and did everything to make us feel comfortable.
We would certainly recomment this apartment to our friends !

We are a family of three (2 adults and an 18 months old baby) who stayed at the Behind the Red Door II for one week. Diane and Craig are great hosts. We didn't meet Diane but she was very quick answering to our questions before our arrival, helping us with different information and all that showed fantastic professionality and responsability. When we landed, we had some issues with the phone connection but still we sorted it out quickly. We got into the apartment as soon as we arrived without a problem. We met Craig and his brother and they were very helpful too. Craig gave us all the information we needed when we arrived and he was also available at any time if we had any problem.  
The apartment is fantastic and big enough for everything. It is even better than in the pictures. It has natural light all around and it really makes you feel like at home. You have absolutely everything you need,  and as I said, we travelled with a baby and all his different baby needs, and we felt home :) 
Everything was very clean and super comfortable bed with plenty of room for the three of us. You also have other room and an inflatable bed that you could place in the main room. Although we were at the top floor and we had to carry a stroller, it was not an issue. 
The central heating works perfectly well and the apartment is nice and warm. But if you travel in summer, there are fans all around the apartment, so it should be nice and fresh too.
The neighbourhood is very safe. We were walking around late at night (New Year's Eve, and the rest of the days at about 22.30/23 some days, one of them just on my own after a Broadway musical) and not a problem. You have cheap supermarkets and restaurants around. Harlem is a great neighbourhood, very  beautiful, full of culture and really exciting.
Moreover, The apartment is very well connected to the city centre. Lines 2 and 3 take you everywhere and you are in times square in 15 minutes as the most. The subway station is two blocks round the corner (more or less 3 minutes walking from the apartment). It works 24 h and with the metrocard you have unlimited trips for one week both by bus and subway. :) 
EVERYTHING is ABSOLUTELY POSITIVE about the apartment, the neighbourhood, the location and the hosts. I recommend this place to everyone.I already recommended it to all my family and friends wishing to visit NYC :)
Without a doubt, if any time we come back to NYC, this will be our first choice!
Thank you very much for everything!!!!
We enjoyed our stay to the maximum and We spent a fantastic week of holidays. It has been a Great family experience and that will stay in our hearts forever!!!:)

I stayed at Behind the Red Door II in Harlem for 3 weeks for work and absolutely loved it. The apartment was spotless, beautifully decorated and comfortable. Great bed, nice linens & towels and everything you need for a short or extended stay. The location is amazing! Centrally located for everything in Harlem and close to several train and bus lines to get you to other NYC locations. I was traveling alone and came and went at all hours and always felt safe in the neighborhood. Diane and Craig are great hosts. They communicated with me throughout the process and Diane went above and beyond to make sure my stay was absolutely perfect. If you're looking for a place in New York I would suggest booking this one now before it's taken!

Hemos estado muy cómodos alojados en lo de Diane and Craig. El apartamento es espacioso, totalmente equipado y en un barrio tranquilo. Hay mucha cosas que se pueden hacer caminado, de lo contrario tomar el subway es fácil. Muchas gracias por todo y recomendamos el lugar.

My friend and I had a great time at this place, thanks to Diane and Craig who were really kind and always ready to help/advise.
The place was even bigger than expected and with all the modern convenience that could be needed, and thanks to Craig we profit of all the neigborhood was offering. 
 
 I warmly recommend this place and will definitely come again.

We had a great time in NYC and the space is great. The size of the apartment is a LOT larger than the pics show. There are fans and air conditioning to keep things cool for the summer. Diane and Craig were very responsive to any issues that we had. Subways and buses are easily accessible. There are great shops and restaurants around the neighborhood.
Excellent place, classy and comfy, great friendly neightbourhood, Diane and Craig make the best hosts..
Stayed in Diane and Craig's apartment for 3 weeks had a great time very clean tidy and cosy ,I would reccommend to a friend

The apartment was really nice, very clean, recently renovated, and comfortably furnished.  Diane and Craig were friendly, informative, and welcoming.  The street was attractive, and the neighborhood interesting,  and well-maintained.  My wife's relatives live in a more expensive area nearby, and I found staying in Harlem to be more interesting and fun, as well as quite convenient.

Behind ghe Red Door II was just as described and reviewed.  The only slight difference from the pictures is that the unit is much brighter than shown.  Both bedrooms and living room have windows and the bathroom and kitchen have skylights.  Our son opted for the queen sized air mattress rather than the narrow sleeper in the 2nd bedroom, but he fit just fine in the big bedroom with us and was comfortable.  This was our first experience with airbnb and would gladly try it again.

It was a very pleasant stay at Diane's apartment. I stayed here for 4 nights. The apartment's conditions were exactly the same as the pictures, at some points even better. I love the silverware. We cooked a lot and we could find everything we need. All kitchenette were clean and good. There was a concern for guests with large baggages because the unit is in  the third floor and there was no elevator. We had to lift three large baggages through the small stairs. However, the apartment condition's was worth of that effort. The neighborhood was relatively safe. We had no problem coming home late at 10pm. The apartment also near to the train stations and bus stops. Only in 5-10 minutes walking distance. Overall, I'm satisfied with Diane's apartment and would love to come again if I have a chance to visit NY.

Really nice people, quick to respond to our queries and easy going. The apartment was comfortable and well equipped. Second bed is either a blow-up mattress or a small futon so the apartment is more suited to couples (perhaps with young kids) as oppose to adults wanting to sleep separately. All in all a good experience - would recommend to a friend.
The reservation was canceled 57 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Communications before arrival were excellent. The apartment was very nice and very clean.  We had no problems at all but Diane checked with us to make sure all was well.

Thank you Diane and Craig for giving our stay in NYC that home-away-from-home feeling. The apartment was exactly as promised. It is located in a nice neighborhood. The subway, markets, and restaurants are available in walking distance.

I highly recommend this apartment!

Abbiamo soggiornato da Diane  e Craig a natale con i nostri due figli grandi, casa molto comoda per vicinanza alla metro, supermercati ristoranti e lavanderie. L'appartamento rispettava la descrizione dell'annuncio, abbiamo cucinato nella cucina attrezzata e pulita. 
Solo le scale sono un pò strette per portare bagagli grandi al secondo piano ma alla fine è tutto ripagato dal calore della casa. Persone molto disponibili, gentili e veloci nelle comunicazioni. Veramente consigliato.

I had a lovely stay at Diane & Craig's apartment. It is very clean, comfortable & well heated to keep us warm in the cold winter. The free wifi was excellent & the kitchen was well-equipped. Location wise it is very closed to the subway (5-10 minutes walk) with many different lines allowing easy access for sight seeing around NYC & Brooklyn. It is also at a walking distance to many restaurants, shops & even pharmacies. The only issue that we had were some delays in response in communication. 

As a whole, I definitely recommend this apartment as it really makes you feel like home despite being located in the busy city of New York.

Our stay behind the red door II was very pleasant. The apartment is as advertised, nice and clean. From my experience, it is probably significantly better than a lot of hotel rooms. Diane and Craig were friendly hosts.
The neighborhood, as  stated in other reviews, is also nice. We did not feel unwelcome, unsafe or encounter any hostile behavior. 

We would gladly stay there again :)

Thank You Diane & Craig,
Honestly this experience execeded all our expectations.
Simplicity of communication was effortless & quick from the reservation process to arrival & departure... Diane is a super nice lady and very accommodating to our early arrival & departure times.
The apartment was very clean, well maintained & decorated in  a modern simplicity. We enjoyed the large open spaced bedroom and were amazed the amount of space for the price (felt like a high-end suite).
 The neighborhood was quiet and easy to navigate with great food & 2 blocks from the subway. 
We will easily stay here again for our future NYC trips hands down.
Way larger & more comfortable than most hotel rooms in nyc..
that and the hosts were SO NICE
Thanks again
Chaz & Rodney

The apartment was centrally located in Harlem allowing for easy access to transportation and entertainment. Renting the apartment opposed to a hotel made us feel like locals and more relaxed. The apartment was clean and cozy, prefect for a few adults ready to enjoy New York. 
We really enjoyed our stay at The Red Door II and would definitely stay again. Thank you Diane and Craig!

La casa de Diane estaba muy buena y la ubicación muy estratégica. Todo fue como estaba en el anuncio y la relaciòn precio/calidad es óptima. 
Nosotros eramos cuatro- incluyendo una pequeña niña- y el apartamento resultó muy cómodo.

After staying at a hotel in a very dodgy part of Brooklyn, we were delighted to find this gem in a fantastic part of Harlem.
