Diane was extremely helpful and an absolute pleasure to deal with - we couldn't have asked for a better host. The street is delightful and extremely close to shops, bars and the subway. The apartment itself was very spacious, comfortable and clean, superbly decorated with an amazingly comfortable bed! After our bad experiences in the first hotel we stayed at, Behind The Red Door II was a welcome oasis and completely restored my faith in New York. I couldn't recommend this place highly enough!

We loved the hosts Diane and Craig!  Craig met us there at the time we arrived which was later then we expected with traffic.  The neighborhood was awesome, quiet and lots to do on either end of the street.  Everything is in walking distance which was great because in NY you have to walk everywhere and we felt safe which was important because we have young kids.  The apartment was as described, clean and modern.  They provided us with linens, pots and pans to cook and blankets for the extra bed in small room.  There was plenty of room for my family of four.

Apparement fonctionnel, très bien décoré, dans une rue calme mais très proche d'un quartier très animé. Très proche aussi de la station de métro et des commerces. Notre hôte est très sympathique et disponible en cas de question ou de problème ( nous avions redu un jeu de clés à la Statue de la Liberté !!!). Nous avons été plus que satisfaits de cet appartement !

We were three adults and a 3-year-old staying together in this apartment. Diane made sure we felt welcome by establishing communication before we arrived and ensuring we had all necessary contact information for when we arrived. The listing was as described, and we were thrilled to find a blender in addition to add to our meal options. The two air conditioners installed in the windows were on full blast for the duration of the stay due to the heat, and we were certainly relieved to have them! The neighbourhood was, as a friend residing in New York put it, "an up-and-coming trendy place to be but still a bit messy." We felt safe walking around during the day and in groups at night, but I don't think I would have walked by myself at night as a lonely female. Regardless, everyone we met in the neighbourhood was respectful and helpful and the businesses were clean and professional inside even if there were interesting characters outside. It wasn't really much different than riding the subway with a plethora of interesting characters anyways. For a good price and quick access to the subways, groceries and restaurants, the apartment was definitely a good place to stay. We were absolutely satisfied and would recommend it.

La casa es muy confortable, bien equipada, limpia y se correspondió con las fotos del anuncio.
Está bien comunicada y el barrio fue seguro.

Diane was a wonderful and helpful host giving us hints on restaurants, parking, metro stops, etc. the apartment is perfectly located about three blocks from the metro stop and from the tour bus that we used. there is a grocery store two blocks away, reasonable and covered parking two blocks away and restaurants galore. the apartment is more than adequate for 2 to 4 people and we enjoyed the stay very much. we would recommend this as a great value in a great location; we are planning to return to the apartment in the future.

Beautifully finished property in an exciting community. Better for a couple than three and up three floors on narrow, steep stairs. But as a comfortable, well priced apartment for your New York stay it beats hotels hands down. It's near great restaurants but, if like me you like cooking and relaxing in front of the TV in the evening, it's perfect.

I highly recommend staying at this apartment! It is exactly how it appears in the photos: very clean, comfortable, and tastefully decorated. We had everything we needed. Diane was extremely helpful and accommodating, making sure we knew what transport was best to get us there on the day of the NY marathon, and even giving us directions to see the tail-end of the marathon as it passed through Harlem (the carnival atmosphere was fantastic). It was a nice personal touch that we appreciated.

Everything was perfect. The place is very nice, the bed is awesome :-) and the street very quiet. The subway is close to the appartment et ant the neighborhood was really peacefull. Diane and her husband were very kind, we had a great time in New York...
Diane var en bra värd och lägenheten var väldigt fin! Grannskapet är trevligt med flera barer och restauranger. Kan rekommenderas.

We had a delightful week in Harlem; an excellent base for Manhattan and further afield. The apartments is exactly as described - plenty of space and well equipped kitchen. Great bed, nice and clean. Diane is an excellent host - good communication between booking and the trip itself, and she was there to welcome us as promised with a quick intro to the flat and its workings. Would certainly consider again if in the area. Very close to Lines 2/3 and a sort stroll to A/B/C/D with direct connection to JFK.

la casa era esattamente come descritto. Il quartiere molto piacevole, vicino a negozi, supermercati e metropolitana. Vacanza splendida, la messa Gospel una piacevole scoperta.
Diane sempre disponibile, l'ho vista solo all'inizio del soggiorno ma ha sempre risposto ai messaggi. Appartamento fornito di tutto e pulito.
ci tornerei anche domani, se potessi...
We had a very nice stay here. Felt very at home and comfortable. Diane let us know about some good spots to visit and things to do, so that was very helpful.
Diane and Craig's listing was beautiful, spacious, and comfortable. My parents stayed here for my graduation and they had a wonderful time.

Had a really great experience here. Diane was very responsive, helpful throughout my entire stay. Whenever I had a question or concern she was quick to reply. I would definitely come back here in the future!

Diane was great at communicating with me prior to my stay. She made sure the keys were available for me as I was arriving on a very late flight. She also had a friend of hers check up on me the days following arrival which was very helpful.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Stayed here with two colleagues while attending a conference at Columbia university. The apartment was very comfortable and clean. Diane was very friendly.

Diane is a great host. We booked last minute and she was able to accommodate us. She made great suggestions on restaurants and stores in the area, helped us navigate parking, and checked in to see how things were going during our stay. The apartment was perfect for three of us. The main bedroom is a great size and the bed was comfy. In the heart of Harlem, we loved the energy and proximity to the subway. Thanks for everything!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Craig and Diane's place.  The apartment is super clean and exactly as shown in photos.  I especially enjoyed sleeping in the big comfy bed and the spaciousness of the bedroom.  Diane was helpful in helping me to find a bus line that went right to Columbia Univ where I was attending a conference.  Will definitely look to stay there again the next time I'm in town.
Had a wonderful 3 day stay! Place was as pictured; clean, spacious, and super comfortable. Loved location and Diane was very friendly and very helpful!

Had a great three day weekend trip with friends. Diane was really friendly and helpful. The place is huge compared to other places I have stayed in New York. The subway lines A,B,C,D,2 and 3 are about two blocks away. We landed in La Guardia and we took the M60 and left us about 3 blocks from Diane's place. We would definitely stay again.
Felt very welcome. Really glad we stayed here instead of a hotel. Definitely recommend.

Superbe appartement à HARLEM. Trés trés propre. Nous étions une famille de deux adultes et deux enfants agés de 5 à 7 ans. Et c'était parfait. Aussi grâce à un lit king size.
Les supermarchés sont à proximité et le métro aussi. Nous recommandons cet appartement.
Super contact avec Diane.
Great Location. Apartment was very clean and had everything you would need for a great stay!

The apartment was nice, very clean and true to the pictures. The metro is close by and there are plenty of restaurants around. 

Diane was swift to respond and helpful. She had great tips on where to find things in the neighborhood.

Diane was very responsive and helpful.  Did not get a chance to meet in person, but everything went smoothly via text/airbnb.  For Manhattan, the place was surprisingly spacious, and we really appreciated the amount of natural light as well as the well appointed kitchen.  Very cute/renovated brownstone, and nicely decorated to boot. Just be prepared for two flights of stairs to get to apartment ;) 
Location was a very easy walk to points of interest (Apollo, Sylvia's, Red Rooster, Ginny's Supper Club, etc), and nearby groceries/wine shops, bistros, bars and cafes as well. Pleasant hike to upper end of Central Park, and just a few blocks to get to subway.  We found it easy to get hold of Uber when necessary as well. I've stayed in Manhattan many times before  and this was among the best of experiences, despite the need to think a little further ahead of time to get to the Theater District and other places of interest further downtown -- on the other hand, we really enjoyed getting to know Harlem, and finally made it to The Cloisters in Washington Heights, too. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
Highly recommend. Beautiful bedroom and kitchen and close to the train.

Diane and this place were great. The apartment was super clean and nicely decorated. The street and building were nice and quiet. Diane was friendly, on time, and extra helpful. She gave me a lot of tips about transportation and restaurants. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

I took my son and cousin for New Years Eve and this apartment was amazing! It was so super easy getting around tow. Diane was quick to respond to all of my questions. They neighborhood was so quite! We felt completely safe, and and everything was exactly as described! I would and have recommended this apartment and I can wait to come back.
The host canceled this reservation 99 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed in the Red Door apartment for almost five weeks and really enjoyed our stay. The apartment is very roomy for a central Harlem apartment and it was an asset to have so much room. The bed was huge and super comfortable and the linen and pillows were of a high quality. The kitchen had all we needed to cook almost every night. There is a smaller room that can accommodate one person and that is handy if you are travelling with a child or a third adult. The apartment was on the top floor of three and you have to navigate a narrow staircase. Staying in Harlem is an experience on many levels. It can be noisy at times and sirens continuously wail. That said we never felt unsafe and freely walked the streets. For a different New York experience, the Red Door and hosts Diane and Craig would be hard to beat.

Meu marido e eu ficamos hospedados neste apartamento por um mês. O apartamento é muito  espaçoso, aconchegante e dispõe de tudo de que necessitamos durante nossa estada. A localização é excelente, muito próxima da estação de metrô. Tem restaurantes, bares, cafés e supermercado por perto. Diane mostrou-se muito atenciosa e sempre  disposta a nos ajudar com qualquer coisa. O bairro é movimentado e animado,  mas a residência é calma e silenciosa. Adoramos tudo e esperamos poder voltar.

Endroit idéal à 3mns de la ligne 2 qui vous mène au coeur de Manhattan. Appartement spacieux, parfaitement équipé. Nombreux commerces (Whole Food) et bars/restaurant tout prêt. À 1,5kms de Central Park, que demander de plus !

Diane is an excellent hostess, I highly recommend staying with Diane and in her cute and complete apartment (very complete!), With easy access to everything. This region of Harlem is very beautiful, safe, musical and with a lot of diversity. The street of the apartment is very beautiful. 2 laundries in each corner, supermarkets very close and the metro 5 minutes walk. All perfect. We love, thank you very much Diane for everything, I will certainly stay with you again

name: New apartment near Sagrada Familia
space: HUTB 009406 Hi everyone! We are renting our nice and modern and centric apartment. It's sunny and quiet; perfect for couple and professionals! It's only 2 min walking to the metro station el Clot (line red and purple: 10 min for Catalunya square and only 4 min for la Sagrada Familia). In the same station  is available the Renfe train to and from the airport of Bcn (30 min)    The building (only five years old) is located in a nice zone, well connected with the touristic parts of the city and not so crowded. You can walk to the beaches of Poble Nou in about 20 minutes, and you are very close to the tower Agbar, the National theatre, the Encants market and every kind of store and restaurants.   The flat is full equipped. Please contact me for more informations. Francesco.
description: HUTB 009406 Hi everyone! We are renting our nice and modern and centric apartment. It's sunny and quiet; perfect for couple and professionals! It's only 2 min walking to the metro station el Clot (line red and purple: 10 min for Catalunya square and only 4 min for la Sagrada Familia). In the same station  is available the Renfe train to and from the airport of Bcn (30 min)    The building (only five years old) is located in a nice zone, well connected with the touristic parts of the city and not so crowded. You can walk to the beaches of Poble Nou in about 20 minutes, and you are very close to the tower Agbar, the National theatre, the Encants market and every kind of store and restaurants.   The flat is full equipped. Please contact me for more informations. Francesco. Turistic Tax included in the price
neighborhood_overview: Clot is a nice and safe zone of the city, it’s well connected and still authentic, a taste of real Barcelona life!
notes: Turistic Tax included in the price
access: There is a terrace in the top of the building where you can dry your clothes.
interaction: You can call me write me or send me a (Hidden by Airbnb) when you need it!
house_rules: Respect the rest time of the neighbours

host.host_about: Hola, tengo 40 años y me gustan los libros, los animales el cinema y viajar.

reviews.comments:
This is a great flat. It is new, clean, furnished with good taste and has all the necessary amenities you can think of (washing machine, dish washer, microwave, large TV, Wifi, large Sofa, etc...). The rooms are not extremely large but for me it is more than enough and I actually renewed my stay here as I was feeling so comfortable living in this flat.

The closest metro is 2min walk and has a direct link to the airport (30min) which makes it very convenient. You will also find a big commercial center, at 5min walk, which offers: a supermarket, restaurants, shops and a cinema.
This is a great apartment to rent out. I've renewed my initial stay there as I was feeling so comfortable. Very much recommended!

L'appartement est tres bien situé et equipé, proche d'un grand centre commercial avec carrefour.
Le metro est tout pres .
L'appartement est super mais le menage n'est pas hyper clean rien de dramatique mais bon!

I would recommend this appartment to everyone. Francesco is a very nice and accommodating host who is open to many questions and gets back to you very fast. That is very helpful. The appartment is only 3 minutes from the metro (train station) away and is easily accessable from the airport. It is clean and comfortable. Just like at home because it has everything you may need while being away from home. Would be back any time. Loved it. :)

The flat was perfect for our needs and everything was clean for our arrival. The kitchen is quite new and it was nice to have a dishwasher and washing machine in the flat. Everything we needed to cook all our own meals was available for us. The flat was also very quiet and dark at night. Since we were there for a 3-day music festival that went very late each night, we were easily able to sleep until 2pm the following day thanks to the very effective shutters and blinds.

The neighborhood was great as well and the walk to the beach is not too long. Plenty of nearby restaurants and there was also a market and a supermarket very close by. Francesco and his wife were very friendly and helpful as well.

Все очень понравилось, Франческо очень хороший и отзывчивый хозяин.
Так как прилетали мы только в 12.00 ночи, и были на месте около часа, Франческо согласился нас встретить, чтобы передать ключи.
Квартира находится рядом с метро Эль Клот, расположена в спокойном районе, несколько остановок до площади Каталоньи, пешком можно дойти до моря в течение 20 минут, рядом находится супермаркет.
Квартира полностью соответствует фотографиям, в ней очень уютно и комфортно, современный ремонт, есть все необходимые удобства: посуда, плита, холодильник, стиральная машина, wi-fi, кофеварка, телевизор.
Рекомендуем! Спасибо хозяину за гостеприимство.

We loved it at Francesco! Clean and comfortable apartment! Very convenient location, near the sea and the city center. Also very close to Metro station. In the next time we will again stop at the Franchesco. Thank you very much Franchesco!))

I fully recommend Francesco's apartment! The flat looks like in the uploaded pictures - you can find there nearly everything you may need during the stay. There were beddings, sheets, towels, availabels, as long as the kitchen equipment (dishwasher, washing machine, oven, glasses, plates, cutlery etc.) and some may be happy with hair dryer as well. There is also air conditioner in the flat (can be really useful sometimes). The apartment is not located in the city center, but it definitely is not a problem - the communication with the city center and other districts is great thanks to the underground (3 minutes walk) and the RENFE trains (direct connection with the El Prat airport). 
Near the apartment you can find supermarkets, bakery, fruit market etc. 
It took us ca 25 minutes to get to the beach with slow, holiday walk pace.
Communication with Francesco was smooth and he answered all our questions before the arrival and during the stay.  
To sum up, we were very happy with the apartment and the stay itself, you'll be too! :)
Very nice modern apartment in great area of Barcelona. Convenient location near metro, train, shops and restaurants. Francesco was very helpful.

Francesco is a great guy! He found me when I was looking for the apartment on the street. Because I didn't have an available phone in Barcelona, he must have waited for me for a quite while. The apartment is very cozy and clean. The kitsch is also fully equipped with everything you could think of. The location is excellent. It's very close to the metro station and also not far from Sangara Familiar  We had a great stay in the apartment. Highly recommended!

"Hola!" Apartment comfortable for my family to rest and visit Bcn. Convenient localisation to metro, train-airport. Way to the beach on foot across beautiful Rambla del Poblenou avenue. Franchesco is very complaisant. I would recommend this apartment. Rafal

Our stay in this apartment was wonderful! Nice and welcoming hosts, the apartment has everything you need and, in addition, excellent located: two minutes walk from Clot station ( metro and Renfe ), two minutes from Glories shopping center ( Carrefour, Zara, H&M, Sfera and another stores, restaurants etc. ) and 30 minutes from Rambla del Poblenou walk up the beach.
We would recommend to anyone who want to visit Barcelona.
Thank you Nuria and Francesco!
Gabriela, Sorana si Marian.

la casa di Francesco è in un'ottima posizione, vicino alla metro e alla stazione dei treni, ben collegata con il centro e il mare. l'appartamento è pulito, tenuto in ottime condizioni; accogliente e corrisponde alle foto postate dall'host. 
l'host è gentile, simpatico e pronto ad aiutare in qualsiasi evenienza.

Great location, minutes away from El Clot metro. The apartment is awesome and the whirlpool in the bathroom rocks. My friend and I enjoyed staying at Francesco's place, there is a nice park close by and its 20-25 minutes walk to the beach. His response and help is very fast. Thanks for letting us stay at your place.

Всем, кто собирается в Барселону, рекомендую данное жилье. Отличная транспортная доступность. Франческо очень радушный и приветливый хозяин. Аппартаменты отличные. Все удобства для проживания. Район достаточно тихий и приятный.

Everyone who is going to Barcelona, I would recommend this accommodation. Excellent transport accessibility. Francesco is very welcoming and friendly host. Apartments are great. All the amenities for living. Neighborhood is quiet and pleasant enough.

Sono stato in questo grazioso appartamento con la mia famiglia in agosto. Che dire, Francesco ci ha atteso nella casa che si è presentata pulitissima e ordinatissima. Location ottima. Aria condizionata. Idromassaggio. Wifi. Ci siamo trovati benissimo. Lo consigliamo vivamente.

Первый раз заказывала квартиру на этом сайте. Конечно волновалась. Но мои переживания были напрасными. Франческо ждал нас в квартире, прилетели в 23 часа. Квартира полностью соответствует фото. Дом новый, в 2 минутах от метро. В квартире есть все что нужно для проживания. Франческо очень быстро отвечает на вопросы. Мы с мужем остались очень довольны. Рекомендую. Спасибо, Франческо!

Francesco was wonderful. Communicating with him prior to our trip was great, he always responded very promptly. We had asked for an early check-in which he graciously accommodated and he was there waiting for us when we arrived. The apartment was exactly how it is pictured, very cute and very clean and comfortable. Felt very safe. Francesco was very helpful with recommending restaurants in the area and helping us with directions to the airport using the metro. The metro is really close by (walking distance) and a straight shot to the airport. The only negative is that there was street noise at night. Other than that it was perfect. He provided a water bottle in the fridge for us as well as coffee! Would definitely recommend.

We stayed at Francesco's apartment for 5 days while we were in Barcelona.  Francesco was waiting for us when we arrived and showed us the apartment, which was exactly like the photos.  It was also conveniently located near the Metro (2 minute walk) so that was a bonus!  The apartment was quiet and had everything we needed for the time we were there. The bed was the most comfortable bed we slept on while in Spain (we were there for 3 weeks)! Francesco was very friendly and we enjoyed our stay at his apartment!

Very comfortable and nice apartment. Great location, very closed to metro Clot station, RENFE railway station, shops, excellent walking zone etc- Great host. 

Отличная удобная квартира, имеется все необходимое для проживания. Тихая улица. Великолепное расположение - магазины, парки, метро и электричка рядом. Замечательный хозяин.
Muy agradable la estadía en el apartamento, tamaño ideal, servicios completos, limpio, buen ubicado, muy recomendable

We've stayed there for four nights and had an excellent holiday. The apartment is new, clean, quiet and really close to Clot metro station. Sagra da Familia is just ten minutes walk away, then you can walk to Placa Catalunya in about thirteen minutes. We preferred walking in the mornings and returned home via metro. The house is enough for two people, the bed in the bedroom and leather sofa are really comfortable, you can have uninterrupted sleeps. There are stuff in the kitchen that you may need. The heat control works perfectly, the house stays warm. The bed makes some noise when you move but it can be fixed. Francesco and his wife often ask if you need anything, they are kind and thoughtful. I strongly recommend this place and would like to stay in there again.
Simply perfect. Really really nice appartement. We had such a good time. I would recommend this place to anyone.

its a very nice apartment in a good area. supermarkets and pharmacies are around the corner and also the metro- and train-station is nearby. the apartment is clean and cosy, the beds are absolutely comfortable. francesco is a very friendly guy and always available if you need help.
Great host and great flat. Nice neighborhood and the flat was spacious and clean. A+.
We enjoyed our stay.  The flat was comfortable and very well equipped.  The location was ideal for us and only a couple of minutes walk from the metro and the train station.
Alles Top! Gastgeber sehr nett, Wohnung sauber, gut angebunden (Metro in ca. 200m Entfernung) und Viertel auch absolut ok! Fazit: würde jederzeit wieder bei Francesco absteigen! :-)

Отличное расположение. Хороший вариант, чтобы остановиться в Барселоне. Тихое, уютное место. Здесь же парк Clot. До метро и электрички (на ней удобно добираться от аэропорта без пересадок) - 2 минуты пешком. В шаговой доступности - торговый центр Глориес, гипермаркет Меркадона, продуктовый рынок Clot.  Недалеко Собор Святого Семейства. Хозяин всегда на связи, доброжелательный и общительный.
Grazie, Francesco!
Francesco is really great host! Apartment was super we spent nice time in Barselona and I hope back here nearest future!

Francesco was a great host, very helpful and fiendly and we had a wonderful time in his apartman. The apartmas was beautiful, very comfortable and clean. The apartmans location was perfect very close to the center.

We had a great stay at Francesco. It was a very nice and clean appartment with all things you could need available. Even with a bubble bath and nespresso machine! Our daughter loved the bath. The nearest subway station Clot was closeby. It was on the second floor but had elevator access.

The flat is nice and clean. Situated in a quiet and non touristic part of the city it was pleasant to be where people from Barcelona lives.  However the subway is very near the flat and it s easy to go to the touristic places. Francesco has been very nice and carefull with us.

Super appartement tout équipé , situé tout près de l'entrée de métro dans un quartier calme.

Il y a de petits commerces et un centre commercial à proximité ce qui facilite les achats pour les besoins quotidien.

je recommande cet appartement !!

Francesco es un excelente anfrition, el apartamento es super cómodo con todo lo necesario, excelente conexion a Internet y cerca de una estación de metro. 
Definitivamente volveria a hospedarme. 

Silvia Herrera
Costa Rica

We had a lovely stay at Francesco's appartment. The place was as shown in the photos and had everything we needed. It is close to Clot station and in a walkable distance to Segrada Famillia. Francesco was helpful and got back to me on any questions I had. Would definitely reccommend.

Everything was clean and perfect. Good place. We were surprised by Francesco's attention to us. 
All the best for You, Francesco.

O anfitrião foi extremamente cordial e prestativo, pois nos perdemos para chegar ao apartamento e ele foi nos encontrar no meio do caminho, auxiliou-nos com as bagagens. Quando precisamos de informações sobre supermercado no entorno e como utilizar o transporte para o aeroporto, o Francesco sempre foi muito prestativo e ágil nas respostas.
O apartamento é excelente. Muito bonito, limpíssimo, bem equipado em um prédio bem novo com elevador. O bairro Clot é um tanto afastado dos principais pontos turísticos da cidade, mas isso era facilmente contornado pela proximidade da estação Clot do metrô / Renfe.
Lush apartment, Francesco was super helpful and kind to show is everything (especially the great coffee machine), nice location and great city. Highly recommend!

Very nice place with all services by walk:  shopping center, wine, fresh fish and meat, cooked meal, cafe, terrasse, metro, train, park etc.

I recommand it and take the time to walk around to discover the place.

Francesco was a gracious host.  We were an hour late to the place but he stayed behind and made sure we had everything before he left.

Once we were there, the place was spacious, clean, and air conditioned.  Although it was not too hot there during the night, it was good to have it during the day (mid-June).

The apartment was close to the Clot subway station so we were able to get around quite easily.

Очень удобное месторасположение: достаточно тихо, комфортно.
Близко от центра города. 
Апартаменты  просто замечательные. Есть всё необходимое:
телевизор, WiFi, замечательно оборудованная и укомплектованная кухня.
Хозяин внимателен, тактичен, заботлив.
Большое спасибо за прекрасный отдых в прекрасном городе!

Francesco is a good host! He will answer any all of your question right away. He's friendly and kind.  He has a real nice and neat appartment  which is equipped with a washing machine microwave, dishwasher which is of course very handy! It's a 5 min walk from the centrum of Barcelona  and if u travel a lot by metro I reccomend you to get the 10-travel tickets. It's only €10,- and u can travel, like its said 10 times! Nice place, nice host and the location is allright as well!

Inmejorable experiencia. Desde la acogida de Francesco, su confianza y disponibilidad, hasta el apartamento que nos resultó muy cómodo, con todos los servicios y amorosamente decorado. Excelente ubicación, con muy fácil acceso al metro y a cualquier punto de esa hermosa ciudad.

Francesco replies Very fast to our reservation and emails, and the.appartment was excactly how it looked like ons the pictures. Its a two minute walk to the Subway and the train. For a bigger supermarkt you have to walk 10-15 minutes, but there are all the shops you need. I didnt see any nice restaurants close by the appartment so for that we went to the ramblas.

Прекрасное место, чтобы остановиться! Очень хороший район, прямо за домом - парк Clot, рядом есть супермаркеты, пекарня, рестораны, а также в 7 минутах ходьбы находится торговый центр Glories, где есть многие массовые марки одежды типа Zara, недалеко - Burberry Factory store. До пляжа можно дойти минут за 20, так же примерно до центра  города. Метро находится прямо за углом, там же остановки автобусов и железнодорожная станция.
Хозяин встретил нас очень гостеприимно, рассказал про то, что интересного можно посмотреть;) в квартире было чисто и приятно. Очень функциональное место для комфортного отдыха без каких-либо излишеств.
Спасибо, Франческо! Ваша квартира была нашим домом 2 недели и стала совсем родной :)

Francesco did a really good job. His appartment is very clean and provided us with everything we needed. Including city maps and Barcelona's Lonely Planet. The appartment has not a very central location, but is close to the Sagrada Familia. Renting a bike is definetely recommended.

Overall Francesco is a very good person. Helpful and fast in respond whenever we ask anything. He waited for us upon arrival at Metro station and brought us direct to his apartment. The place is very strategic close to many attractions. We enjoyed our stay here..feel like at our home! Highly recommended to anyone that looking for a modern & cosy stay at heart of Catalunya :)
Francesco was very easy to deal with and met us at the apartment after a short delay on our end.  Apartment is newly renovated and close to train station, making it easy to get around all Barcelona.

Nous avons adoré cet appartement à Barcelone ; propre, climatisé, moderne tranquille avec tout à portée de la main (épicerie, station de métro, bar à tapas !). Nous avons eu un séjour exceptionnel et n'hésiterions pas à recontacter Francesco pour y retourner ou pour lui référer des amis. Merci !

Our trip to Barcelona was very nice also thanks to this beautifull appartment. First day we arrived Francesco was waiting for us giving a brief tour in the appartement and gave us a lot of brochures to-do in Barcelona and information. Was very nice to see this appartement is well equiped with everything you need standard and more to feel like home. When there was a problem we could call or senw him a message the same day we had feedback. The appartement is in a very nice place with no tourist and a real spanish community and atmosphere. Not far walking there is a bakery with VERY NICE CROISANTS! And also not far is a market place that's a bit like the Bocqueria. There is on a 5 minut walk at Glories a big carrefour where you can buy your grosseries and more. 
You have everything at your disposition from plated, forks and knifes to towels and soap. The metro station clot is a very good metro line 1 that goes to a lot of beautiful places. Next time I go back to Barcelona I am choosing again for the appartment of Francesco. He is a good host please support him and big thumbs up!

My sister and I had a really great time staying at Francesco apartment. It's a moment from the airport on the train and within walking distance to La Sagrada Familia and many other sites! Be sure to check out La Boqueria which is a moment away on the metro and Xuerria- a skip down the main street for super fresh, hot churros!

The apartment itself is perfect for everything you need, compact but complete and Francesco is on hand for anything you need help with too!

Piso muy bonito, limpio y no le falta de nada! Ademas esta bien conectado, a pocos metros de estación de metro, renfe y autobuses. Francesco ha sido muy amable y rapido en las comunicaciones! Totalmente recomendable!
Very helpful host. The place was very spacious and had everything we needed.

Mi novia, su hermana y yo pasamos Navidad en el departamento de Francesco, todo estuvo perfecto. No sabíamos llegar y el llego por nosotros al metro y nos ayudo con nuestras maletas, es muy amable. El departamento está muy bien ubicado y con todo lo necesario para una excelente estancia. Sí vuelvo a Barcelona sin duda me hospedaría de nuevo ahí.

Superbe, Génial, Formidable, Fantastique…. pas assez de superlatifs pour décrire ce petit nid chaleureux qui nous a accueilli pour notre séjour de la nouvelle année à Barcelone. Tout d'abord l'accueil de Francesco qui nous attendait le jour de notre arrivée, ses explications claires et utiles pour le bon fonctionnement de l'appartement et son sympathique sourire.
L'appartement est superbement équipé que ce soit au niveau de la vaisselle ou des ustensiles de cuisine, frigo et congélateur, four, micro-onde, superbe plaque de cuisson et lave vaisselle. Francesco nous a fourni le nécessaire de ménage, produits d'entretien, sac poubelle, éponge, etc et également huile, vinaigre, sucre, sel et une bouteille d'eau au frais dans le frigo pour nous accueillir.
Salle de bain de belle taille avec une baignoire à remous (très agréable pour la détente après une journée de balade touristique)
la chambre bien spacieuse pour deux avec un débarras pour les valises avec penderie et une petite armoire. le lit confortable (à notre goût). L'immeuble et le quartier tranquilles et sans bruit pour un bon sommeil récupérateur après nos kilomètres de visites.
le séjour fort agréable avec une table pour quatre et un bureau pour l'ordinateur avec le réseau internet direct.
L'appartement est idéalement situé dans une petite rue tranquille à 200 mètres d'une bouche de métro à 2 stations de la Sagrada Familia.
Hormis les petits commerces, boulangerie, épicerie, primeurs, pharmacie et le marché couvert situés dans les alentours, les amateurs de grands centres commerciaux seront ravis de se rendre au "Glories" un grand centre aux pieds de la tour Agbar  (le suppositoire) à 10 minutes à pieds.
En résumé Francesco et son appartement ont contribué pour une bonne part à la réussite de notre super séjour à Barcelone.

This place was fantastic! Francesco had everything ready for us for our arrival. This included a ready-made cot and some toys for our little one. We were all certainly spoilt!

Our month here was fantastic. The apartment was clean, very comfortable and complete with all necessary items. This included central heating which was great for the month of January... it is cold in Barcelona!

The wifi was fast and reliable :) 

The location was perfect. A short walk to many shopping and eating establishments and transport options.

We totally loved it here. Thank you all :)

La descripción es correcta, la equipación suficiente, completa y de buena calidad. No se oyen ruidos de los pisos colindantes. La zona es céntrica y bien comunicada, y el barrio esta dotado de una buena zona de servicios. Francesco atento y amable es ejemplo de buen anfitrión.

Fantastic weekend in Barcelona and in the apartment of Francesco. Very nice and convenient place to stay, close to the city centre, the flat has everything we needed. Francesco was very welcoming and even came to pick us up from the train station on the night of our arrival. We had wonderful time.

An ideal apartment, close to Clot train/Metro station, with local amenities nearby.  The apartment was clean and well furnished with everything we needed for our stay.  Francesco made us very welcome.  If we return to Barcelona, we will definitely stay here again!

Świetne miejsce bardzo czyste nowoczesne blisko wszędzie 
Bardzo miły gospodarz bardzo polecam

Das Appartment war genauso wie beschrieben. Die zentrale Lage und die Nähe zur U-Bahn haben es uns sehr einfach gemacht, in Barcelona viele interessante Orte zu erreichen. In nur 15 min zu Fuß an der Sagrada, in 10 min mit der U-Bahn an den Ramblas, perfekt.
Gleich um die Ecke gibt es Supermärkte, eine schöne Markthalle und einen netten Park. Unbedingt einmal auf die Dachterrasse, schöner Blick auf den Torre d'Agbar. Francesco hat uns schon erwartet, Übergabe problemlos, Wohnung mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. Haus mit Fahrstuhl, sehr komfortabel. Vielen Dank

Amazing appartment located very close to el clot metro station (direct connection to airport and city). The appartment is very comfortable and clean and Francesco is a great host. He is very helpful and punctual. Thanks a lot for the stay!

Stayed at Francescos apartment for three nights with a friend. Full recommendation! Well located near a well-connected metro/train station, fully equipped, very nice and clean, very nice bathroom. Had enough towels and Francesco was available all the time just in case we had some problems or questions. Will definately come back if possible, very nice place!!
I can very much recommend Francescos flat. He is a very nice host, the place is clean and comfy. The neighbourhood is quiet, nice cafes and metro are located very close.

Francesco is an amazing host. Not only the apartment is great, comfortable and incredibly quit but he also takes care of you to the very last detail.  We got lost trying to go to the apartment and he came to bed, when we got to the apartment it was equipped to the point that the coffee machine had capsulesthere was detergent to wash the dishes, laundry detergent to wash our clothes and so on. If you go to Barcelona you definitely are in for a treat if you book this apartment.

Amazing apartment and perfect located. We stayed at Francesco's for 2 days but could have stayed more than weeks there. It's a really nice,clean and cozy apartment. Francesco was really kind an very helpful. Would stay there anytime again.

We spent a lovely week in Francesco's apartment in Barcelona. He was a good host, was waiting for us on our arrival. He showed us the apartment and recommend places to visit and to eat. The apartment itself is very clean and very functional. Its situated in a nice part of the town, very close to Metro Clot, which has great connections to different sites in the city. There are supermarkets, market and huge shopping center a minute from the place. We had a great time. Thank you Francesco!

L'appartement était très confortable et l'acceuil numero 1. Un aventage étant un petit peu hors du centre était que la nourriture dans le coin semblait pas beaucoup moins cher qu'au centre.
Le metro et le train pour l'aeroport sont très proche.

Francesco was a great host and was very helpful with making the stay comfortable anf baby friendly! The place was is a quiet neighborhood but was also walking distance to many tourist attractions. I would recommend his place to anybody!

Sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend.Flexibel und komplikationslos(wir kamen 2std.verspätet an)Die Wohnung liegt in einem typischen Wohngebiet.Ruhig, Park, Supermarkt, Marktplatz mit Tapasbars alles gleich ums Eck.Mit "einheimischen"Preisen also viel billiger als in den Touristischen Ecken!Auch da waren alle unheimlich freundlich und offen, obwohl wir kein spanisch sprachen.Super Anbindung an die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel. 3min zur Ubahn in die Stadt (3Haltestellen)oder Zug zum Flughafen.
Francesco war ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber, die Wohnung sauber und gut ausgestattet. Der Bäcker um die Ecke bietet ein leckeres Frühstück. Alles in allem eine gute Wahl !
Everything was good, Francesco is very helpful.

Although we arrived late in the evening due to a delayed flight, Francesco was so kind to meet us at the underground station near the apartment. The location is very practical: only a couple of minutes walk to the subway and the shops (bakery, supermarkets) are also nearby.

Francesco was a great host, we felt very welcome, he showed us apartment, give all necessary information, but he wasn't intrusive at all. Apatment is at very good neighborhood, apatment building is great, and apartment itself too. We had every appliance we needed, and everything that is listed in the ad was accurate.

Excelente apartamento y muy buena ubicación cerca del metro / tren. La zona es muy buena y tiene cerca el mercado del clor y muchos pequeños restaurantes además el centro comercial las Glorias ata cerca.
Francesco nos recibió y espero hasta tarde el día que llegamos, es súper  atento y disponible a ayudar cuando lo necesitas. El apto. esta muy bien equipado y tiene prácticamente todo lo que necesitas. No hay sorpresas por que la descripción y fotos son tal cual es el apto. Definitivamente recomiendo este apartamento.

Francesco met us at the apartment when we arrived. He was very helpful with directions and had maps and coupons ready for us to explore the city. The apartment was spotless and very modern. Good amount of space and the apartment was 1 block from the train station and marvelous local
Market stores and cafes. A 15 minute walk to S. familia. And easy train ride to Ramblas. 
I definitely recommend this host.
Phil
Todo excelente , gracias Francesco.

Francesco a été très accueillant.
L appartement est propre et très bien équipé . Super séjour  je conseille cet appartement

We had a fantastic time - Thank you Francesco for everything. We loved the neighborhood, the beach was walking distance and the apartment itself was a delight. Our one and a half year old had a baby cot and baby chair and a beautiful park - just two minutes down the road. Getting to the airport was a breeze as well - the R connection directly to the airport meant we didn't have to worry about a thing! We really appreciated Francesco showing us the place when we arrived and all his suggestions were critical in turning our Barcelona vacation into a beautiful memory for life!

We spent 4 nights at Francesco ' s flat..The unit conforms accurately to the description given on Airbnb . The host was very helpful in providing information about Barcelona with all kind of maps and booklets. The flat itself is quite comfortable with all the amenities necessary to make it a pleasant stay. We highly recommend this flat for anyone wishing to stay a few days in Barcelona.....

A fantastic little apartment in Barcelona.  I stayed here while traveling through Spain.  By far, the best shower!  The apartment is close to transit and Francesco is vey nice.  I recommend staying here.

Francesco was a great host! When we arrived, he showed us the appartement and also provided us with a lot of information regarding Barcelona, which was very helpful. The appartement itself was great and really well-equiped.

El apartamento es una pasada. Moderno, totalmente equipado y perfecto para una pareja. Estaba muy limpio.
La bañera de hidromasaje y el aire acondicionado hacen de éste apartamento un 5 estrellas!
El apartamento, aunque está un poco alejado del centro, tiene una parada de metro a pocos pasos. ¡Perfecto para moverse por Barcelona!
Francesco fue muy comunicativo y súper amable. Nos facilitó de todo para que nuestra estancia en Barcelona fuese perfecta. 
Si vuelvo a Barcelona, repetiré seguro!
Nice place, great location. We really enjoyed our stay there.

Francesco was waiting for us when we arrived by train from the airport (a little late - sorry!) - the apartment is situated only a couple of minutes walk from the train/metro station El Clot and the area is delightful, not too touristy, but with lots of interesting cafes, bars and restaurants around.  Francesco's apartment is very well equipped compared to some we have been too and everything was superb, apart from a creaky bed!
La descripción del anuncio era perfecta. El departamento es grande y hermoso.
Nice appartment. Well located. Recoomended. Thanks.

The apartment is spacious and lovely! Lots of amenities (hairdryer, washing equipment etc). Air conditioning was amazing!The lift is handy! The location is perfect for staying out of busy Barcelona but has a lot going on just 5 mins away. Ideally located for the metro and train. Francesco was lovely ( calling us as we came down the street, very friendly!) thank you for letting us rent your apartment!

Francesco hat uns vor der Wohnung empfangen, die genau seiner Beschreibung entsprach. Alles war sehr sauber. Handtücher usw. alles was man braucht war vorhanden. Francesco hatte uns sogar noch eine Flasche Wasser bereit gestellt.
Die Wohnung liegt direkt an der Bahnstation Clot und sehr gut zu finden. 
Ich würde diese Wohnung jeder Zeit wieder mieten :-)

Appartement très sympa ! Tout équipé, la climatisation est un véritable plus ! Quartier agréable très proche des commerces (centre commercial avec Carrefour a 10 minutes a pieds), proche d'un grand parc ! Francesco est disponible, très accueillant ! Excellent séjour a Barcelone, je reviendrais sans hésiter !

We've stayed in this apartment for 6 days, and we couldn't have chosen better. It has absolutely everything needed to enjoy a marvelous stay, with lots a commodities (AC, washing machine, spacious bathroom). The location is perfect, being outside the crowded part of Barcelona, but close to everything. The nearest metro station is really practical. I would absolutely recommend this appartment to anyone.

Francesco made us feel welcome.  He scheduled our meeting with our arrival time. The apartment was great, as described, making our trip to Barcelona feel like we were in our home away from home.  The windows have privacy shades, helpful when you want a siesta or just simply privacy anytime.  The location was easy as we were able to walk to many places, and otherwise there is a nearby train/subway station to go elsewhere in the area.  The washing machine was great, as it is helpful to have the ability to do laundry on your trips, especially when visiting a beach town like Barcelona!  We would definitely look to stay there when we return to the city.

Our stay in Francesco's apartment was great. Everything was provided like promised and the whole apartment was very clean. Francesco was a nice host and explained everything perfectly at our arrival. Furthermore he had city maps and guides from Barcelona for us and also made sure we had everything necessary (like drinking water, toilet paper, spices,...)
Our departure and everything else was very straightforward and easy.
Altogether we had a lovely stay in Francesco's apartment and would recommend it to anyone.
PS.: the whirlpool is great ;)

Francesco met me at the apartment which was very easy to find and to get to by train from the airport. Had everything I needed, in a good location, and immaculately clean! Will definitely be recommending this place to friends.

The accomodation was good and in a nice area close to the metro and a nice park. Francesco was ther to greet us and was helpful and spoke good English. He organized a taxi for us when we left which was great. All in all a good experience.

Francesco is a very nice person. The apartment is wonderful. New, very clean, fully equipped. I also loved the area where it is located: it is in the center but it is very quite. Next year, I would like to visit Barcelona again and with no doubt I will reserve this apartment. I heartily recommend it. Daniele

Francesco welcomed us on arrival. He was very charming and explained everything we needed to know, and then left us to enjoy our break. The apartment is perfect for a couple, and equipped with everything needed for a short or long stay, and is comfortable and pleasant. The area is quiet - mainly residential. We found the local people friendly and helpful, in the small supermarkets and shops all within a few minutes, as well as in the cafes and bars. We ate locally too, and enjoyed being away from the very busy tourist areas. Getting around Barcelona was quite easy with the nearby bus and metro routes.

Vi tilbragte en meget behagelig uge i Francescos lejlighed. Den var et glimrende udgangspunkt for vores ophold i Barcelona. Kvarteret var roligt og der var gode, billige restauranter tæt på. Her vil vi især anbefale "Marlen -Taskets" i nabogaden. Selvom det var et stykke fra centrum, kunne man hurtigt komme ind til seværdighederne  fra den nærtliggende metrostation. Lejligheden var rummelig og udstyret med det nødvendige udstyr Francesco var meget imødekommende og hjalp os til rette. Vi kunne sagtens tænke os at benytte os af lejligheden en anden gang!

The apartment is located in a quite convenient area where u can get to Sagrada Familia by walk. Train station just opposites it and Francesco was so kind to pick us up at late night. The house is very good and comfortable for two person. We enjoyed staying there and would like to recommend to everyone.

Francesco nos recibió como si fueramos de su familia, se ocupó de que nos nos faltara nada e incluso tuvo la gentileza de ocuparse en conseguirnos el taxi para partida. Estuvimos solo tres noches, nos hubiese encantado quedarnos más tiempo. El departamento resultó ser cómo lo imaginabamos de acuerdo a lo que ya habíamos leído de anteriores usuarios y más también, todo moderno y muy limpio. El barrio muy tranquilo, queda a 1 cuadra y media de la estación del metro y en 10 minutos y cuatro estaciones llegas a la Estación Cataluña que es el centro de la ciudad. Volveremos gustoso y dejamos en Francesco un amigo.

Very nice apartment, has everything you might need. Convenient transportation options nearby, supermarkets within walking distance. Francesco was a great host, very open and helpful. Would definitely rent this apartment again if the situation arises.

Francesco was a great host.  Upon my arrival he arranged to meet me at the apartment.  The unit was clean and very well suited.  A couple of items which exceeded my expectations and made my stay very nice.  The hot tub listed on the posting is actually in the room, also the bedroom window and living room window come equipped with electric shutters, a very nice feature for privacy and noise control.

Francesco was very friendly and welcoming host. The place was exactly the same as it described in the photos - very clean, cozy, spacious, and it was very warm and quiet at night. Lots of good restaurant options in the neighborhood, and it is pretty close to Sagrada Familia. I highly recommend Francesco and his place, we totally loved it!

I visited Barcelona for the first time together with my wife and we were looking for a nice flat and found this one which was perfect for our stay. Very close to the metro station as well as to the train station to the airport. Zhe kitchen was well equipped and we could easily male some steaks we bought in the market la boqueria. The flat has a very nice small bacony which we used to have breakfast together in the sun. Everything to travel lightly was there: Bedsheets, towels, water and even coffee. 
To visit Barcelona this flat is an excellent pick.

Alles super!

Netter Gastgeber, sehr bemüht - übrigens Danke für das Wasser und das Bier :-)

Appartment ist sehr sauber, frische Bettwäsche und Handtücher sind vorhanden.

Lager Top!

Gerne wieder.
It was easy to talk to Francesco, he was available and helpful. The apartment was clean and bright.
Francesco was welcoming and the apartment was perfect. The neighborhood is real and near everything.
Beautiful apartment in a good part of town, easy access to multiple businesses and Francesco was extremely helpful and very friendly! Would return!

Francesco is a really nice host, our flight was delayed for 3 hours and Francesco was waited us until 2 AM. And the house was really nice, full of equipment with a good location, next time I will also choose his house!
This is the second time we have stayed here and all things were just as good as before. Francesco is vey friendly and the flat is clean.

The apartment was lovely, clean and modern. It was exactly how it looked in the photos! It was also a great location- about 5 minutes walk to the metro and 20 minutes to the Sagrada Familia. 
Francesco was very welcoming and gave us some good advice about things to do/how to get around. 
Would really recommend this apartment and would definitely come back!
Francesco est charmant et nous attendait dans la rue pour nous guider a l'appart qui est génial, propre et bien équipé. A recommander car calme et très bien situé.
He met us and showed us all the features of the apartment, directed us to the local shops and was just generally friendly and helpful.

L'appartement correspond bien aux photos, il est propre avec toutes les commodités. Il est très proche du métro. Le quartier est calme avec de petits supermarchés à proximité.
Merci à Francesco pour son accueil et sa sympathie !

Wonderful cozy apartment is equipped with modern appliances. The apartment has all the essentials.
Francesco is very friendly and hospitable host.
We are delighted with the conducted vacation.
Todo lo que se ofreció en el anuncio estaba en perfecto condiciones

We had an amazing 7 night stay in this lovely apartment. Francesco kindly met us off the Metro and showed us around the apartment, which is even nicer than it looks in the pictures. The location of the apartment was perfect, it allowed us to experience Central Barcelona within a few Metro stops and also to experience the more peaceful area of Clot! 
The Metro is literally around the corner, which made it really easy to get everywhere and anywhere we wanted to go.
The apartment had everything we wanted and more - we ate our breakfast on the balcony, had everything we needed to cook with ourselves (with food bought from the supermarket within walking distance from the apartment), we were able to wash our clothes and hang them up on the terrace - I cannot fault the apartment and it's amenities. Francesco was an excellent host, and we would definitely like to stay in the apartment the next time we visit lovely Barcelona! 10/10
Incredible stay. Francesco's apartment is beautiful and in a great area very close to the metro. If I had a question I could send a message to Francesco and he answered right away. Very recommended.

The apartment was even more amazing than in the pictures and  the description. Francesco waited for us to reach the apartment and showed us around. He was very nice and helpful and available at all times. The apartment had everything we needed and more. It was very clean and comfortable. The metro and tram stops are only a couple of minutes away, as well as cool restaurants and bars, along with various stores and markets.

One of the best stays I've had since using AirBnB. When I come back to Barcelona, I will definitely look this apartment and Francesco up.

This was my first time ever using AirB&B and I could not be happier with my experience. We stayed in Francesco's apartment for a week, and could have happily stayed for a month. Francesco was so helpful in the lead up to the trip and even throughout the holiday, sending us a nice message halfway through the week to check in and see how we were enjoying our stay. The apartment itself is exactly how you see it in the pictures and is super clean. He quite literally provides you with everything you could need in the apartment from towels, to a hairdryer, clothes rack, domestic products from washing detergent to surface cleaner and even spare toothbrushes (new in the packet of course). He had also given us a fresh bottle of mineral water which he had kept cold in the fridge for us, as he explained that although the tap water was drinkable, it sometimes doesn't taste too nice as the we were so close to the sea. We enjoyed spending every morning and evening relaxing on the balcony, which was such a bonus. 

In terms of location, the apartment is quite literally in the most perfect place. The RENFE station is honestly 30 seconds away and the METRO is only 2 minutes away. The neighbourhood is a lovely place, and we felt so safe staying there. It has its own share of restaurants and bars which are nice, but it really takes no effort to catch a metro and experience the food and drink places that the rest of Barcelona has to offer. There is a park just around the corner also, and it really is a cool place. It is just under a 10 minute walk to get to the nearest supermarket (Carrefour) where there is also a shopping centre around it.  

I could go on and on about the apartment and it's surrounding area. I cannot recommend this apartment enough!

Increíble, la verdad el departamento de Francesco superó nuestras espectativas, se encargó de cubrir hasta el más mínimo detalle las necesidades.  El barrio es hermoso, tranquilo y muy céntrico. Nos fue muy fácil llegar desde el aeropuerto con el metro. Nos quedamos con ganas de más días, definitivamente volveremos!

Le séjour s'est super bien passé. L'appartement à beaucoup de charme, il est tout neuf et très bien équipé. Alberto s'est montré très disponible, patient et souriant. L'appartement se trouve 20 min à pieds de la plage. Idéal pour visiter la ville plus pour aller à la plage. Je recommande vivement cette adresse
Very comfy and sunny studio close to metro and train station , we had great time and got extremely comfortable relax here
We had an excellent journey, Francesco's flat is really great and very well located ! I would definitely tell my friends to rent it if they go to Barcelona

Francesco a était très accueillant avec nous. L'appartement était super, bien propre avec tout le nécessaire pour passer un excellent séjour. Cette appartement est très bien situé, au calme avec le métro et un centre commercial à proximité.
Fantastic guy, lovely place with a great location

We stayed at Francesco apartment for a week. It was fantastic :) Perfect for a couple. Near by have a small town and a good coffee shop( we went there for capuchino  every morning. Francesco is a very nice host, friendly, kind and super helpful. The place has a small balcony that you guys can  also enjoy the sun outside. Less than 10 mins by the train to the beach. If we ever go back to Barcelona we'll for sure stay there again. Highly recommended ;)
La verdad es que para lo que fuimos, una estancia corta tres personas es perfecto.

Francesco était là à notre arrivée. Il était accueillant et chaleureux. Il m'a reçu avec un expresso divin. L'appartement était tout à fait génial, tel que sur les photos. L'équipement était de fine pointe et tout fonctionnait à merveille. L'air climatisé était de qualité et refroidissait tout l'appartement, nous étions vraiment bien compte tenu de la chaleur à l'extérieur :) Pour le quartier, nous étions collé sur la station de train au coin de la rue. Super! Le métro était quelques pas plus loin. Génial! C'était un quartier tranquille, pas de bruit. Je recommande sans hésiter cet appartement.

Francesco's apartment was perfect and he was a great host! We arrived slightly earlier than the 13:00 check in time but Francesco had no problems with us arriving early. He gave us the tour of the apartment, showed us where everything was and how everything worked. Francesco provided us with some information on where the nearest supermarket was etc and gave us a few recommendations which was great. He then left us to get on with our weekend. He even left new toothbrushes in case we had forgotten them and a fresh bottle of water in the fridge. If you're a coffee drinker too there is a Nespresso machine in the kitchen and some pods were kindly provided by Francesco.

The apartment had everything we needed which was a massive plus for us as we were attending a wedding over the weekend. Loved the air conditioning as the weather was very hot.

We'll 100% be looking to stay here again when we next come over to Barcelona.

Wir verbrachten 2 Nächte in der Wohnung von Francesco und würden es immer wieder tun. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber, hell und mit den wichtigsten Sachen ausgestattet. Wir haben nichts vermisst und fühlten uns sehr wohl. Die U-Bahnstation ist in 5 Minuten zu erreichen, auch Supermärkte befinden sich in der Nähe. 
Francesco hat uns sehr nett empfangen und vieles erklärt. Das wird bestimmt nicht unser letzter Aufenthalt in Francescos Wohnung.

If you are searching for an apartment in Barcelona stop looking because this is the perfect one.
First of all Francesco is a great host. He is very welcoming, hospitable and helpful. He let us check in earlier because we were flying overnight and we were very tired.
Everything in the house is brand new and very clean. Actually the house in reality is way better than the photos. There is everything you need for your stay.
The location of the apartment is perfect it is a quiet and safe neighborhood. There is a very beautiful park nearby and lots of coffee shops, bakeries and supermarkets. The most important thing is that the house is a 3 min walk away from the metro station. You can go anywhere in Barcelona quickly and easily.
Overall the house and the host are great and if I visit Barcelona again I am definitely staying in Francesco's apartment.

Really nice place to stay in Barcelona. A bit far from downtown but subway is only 5 minutes of walk away. Really quiet city area. Many restaurants and convenience stores close to the apartment. Excellent communication with the host. Waited for us even if we arrived very late in the evening. Place was clean and we had access to a complete kitchen. Really enjoyed our stay. Thank you Francesco!

Super accueil de Francesco lors de notre arrivée, l'appartement est vraiment tout équipé, il se situe à 20 minutes de la plage 
et à proximité de plusieurs petits commerces.
Cet appartement est vraiment génial pour passer un bon séjour   à Barcelone!!!

Francesco was a very nice host, very accomodant on the arrival time, and the place was really well equiped. He setup a notebook in which you can write the nice places/restaurants/bars/museums to go, we were the first tp use it but I think this is a great idea.

The flat is very well located, with the train (Renfe), the metro and the tramway pretty close, and stores nearby as well.

I would definitely recommand this flat.

Francesco was the best air bnb host I've had so far! He was great with communication, and even made me a coffee when I arrived because I had mentioned I was tired! He was so helpful, and beyond that the apartment was great. All modern features to make for a perfect stay, and it was extremely clean upon our arrival. The location was good, just a few minutes walk to the metro line.

Francesco, souriant et disponible, était présent à notre arrivée pour nous accueillir malgré le retard de notre avion.
L'appartement correspond aux photos, très bien équipé et très propre. 
Je recommande +++

We arrived earlier than schedule time, the host is kind enough to allow us leave our luggage there while he was cleaning the apartment. A bit further out from city centre but close to public transportation. The apartment description is accurate. Host is very responsive to messages and generally helpful.

Fransesco's place is clean, nice and has all the stuff needed for a nice visit in BCN. AC works really well as does  WIFI. Excellent location, red line metro (THE line) runs close by. Would recommend.

Francesco is a nice and kind host who makes sure you have a perfect stay in Barcelona. He provided us with everything we needed so we didn't have to make unnecessary expenses. Lovely appartment with all the facilities you need to relax and enjoy your trip!

We had a fantastic stay at Francesco's apartment. The apartment is extremely clean, comfortable, safe and well equipped. The internet was lovely and fast. The Nespresso machine and Jacuzzi bath were unexpectedly wonderful touches.

The location is very convenient, the Clot Metro is only a 5 minute walk away. Within walking distance is the Clot market selling delicious fresh produces and the Glories shopping centre with a huge Carrefour. The beach is about 20 minutes walk down the lovely Poble Nou Ramblas.

Francesco was a fantastic host and I would love to stay at his apartment the next time we visit Barcelona.

Francesco's apartment is great, clean, quiet and with all the amenities we needed.   3 min walk  to train or metro station, 20 min walk to Sagrada familia.
Francesco was very kind and he waited for our arrival even when it was very late. Thank you! 
Barcelona is a beautiful place.

Everything was as expected, from location (near Metro) to the flat itself (nicer than the pics actually)
Francesco is very friendly and responsive.

We had a great stay at the apartment from Francesco. He was very friendly and gave us some tips what we should visit in Barcelona. The apartment was very clean and equipped with all the neccessary kits. There is a good connection to the metro - only 2 minutes to walk. With our best compliments!

We thoroughly enjoyed our Barcelona stay and Francesco's place was great.

The apartment was extremely clean, well equipped and had everything you would need for a pleasant stay (including maps and books of Barcelona).  Rain shower head was amazing!

Francesco was there waiting for us and was friendly upon arrival despite us arriving late (thanks British Airways).  He explained the neighbourhood, restaurants and tube system.

The apartment is in a perfect location for exploring Barcelona, right near a metro station (1 minute walk) and around half an hour walk to the Basilica. Also quite a few restaurants near by including a cheap kebab store up the road if you arrive in late.

Our only negative was the noise outside was a little loud although this is understandable considering it was during the weekend.  The constitution noise outside was also a tad annoying every morning. 

All in all an awesome trip and this is a perfect place to stay 

Can't wait to visit Barcelona again!

Neil & Kathryn

The apartment was very clean and looks exactly like the pictures. It is located very close to the metro. Francesco was very good at writing back to us quickly and he was at the apartment when we arrived. We enjoyed our stay but found it a little noisy.
Send this message

Los 4 días en el apartamento de Francesco fueron muy agradables. El barrio es tranquilo pese a estar en un lugar cerca del centro, muy bien comunicado y cerca de comercios. El apartamento no es muy grande pero cumple con todas las necesidades, y Francesco es muy buen anfitrión. La única pega que le pongo a esos 4 días es la imposibilidad de aparcamiento gratuito en la zona; Barcelona es un caos es este aspecto. 
Volveremos, ¡pero sin coche!

Francesco's place is perfect! 
Very safe and secure, and exact to its description. 
A short walk away from the sagrida cathedral, and the metro is on the doorstep which made getting around the city a lot easier. 
Perfect host, before and during our stay. 
I would highly recommend this to friends and family! 
Thank you Francesco!

El departamento de Francesco es muy lindo, comodo y muy bien ubicado. A 1 minuto del metro L1. A la vuelta encontraras los negocios que quieras. Francesco nos brindo su confianza, nos espero, nos explico el funcionamiento de su depto. TAmbien nos brindo su confianza, ya que debiamos abandonarlo en la madrugada, facilitandonos los medios para realizar la entrega de sus llaves. Cuando regrese a Barcelona, no dudare en volver a este lugar. Lo recomiendo.

Our flight arrived early in the morning, but Francesco was still happy to meet us and let us have the apartment from before lunchtime. It is in a very quiet area, but within a few minutes of a metro station with two lines. Compared to how much a hotel room would have cost, this was such a bargain and I would totally recommend it. Many thanks Francesco

Francisco was a great host, explained everything in detail, and gave us tips to move around the city. He was punctual both when we arrived and were leaving, and was very easy to communicate to. The apartment was clean, appliances were new, was very functional and had everything we needed. The El Clot neighborhood is very nice and calm, good for walking around, and well connected (even the train from the airport goes through El Clot without the need for connections). We plan to come to the same apartment the next time we visit Barcelona.

Francesco's apartment was a pleasure to stay in as it had everything we needed and more. Francesco provided maps, books and guides on how to make our Barcelona experience that much better. Definitely recommend staying at Francesco's place.

Francesco si è dimostrato un host davvero cordiale e disponibile sin dal mio arrivo, nonostante il ritardo con cui mi sono presentata rispetto all'ora pattuita, ed è fatto in modo di rendere il mio soggiorno quanto più  confortevole.  l'appartamento poi, è molto,molto accogliente...dotato di tutto, pulito e situato in una zona strategica, circondata di aree verdi ma anche di ogni tipo di servizio, e collegato benissimo con ogni punto della città (sia per l'estrema vicinanza a 2 linee di metro, che per la possibilità di raggiungere a piedi molte zone di interesse). Esperienza consigliatissima sotto ogni punto di vista!

Francesco's flat is in a real neighborhood next to a great urban park. Lots of transportation close by as well as an untouristy market square. We have stayed here 3 times to be close to family and hope to return.

Appartamento pulito e letti comodi. La posizione è un po' decentrata, ma la fermata della metro è vicinissima. Senza problemi si raggiunge comodamente il resto della città. Ad aspettarci c'era Francesco, molto disponibile per darci consigli su dove e cosa fare.... in casa ci sono diverse guide e mappe della città , molto utili.
L'appartamento si trova in una zona tranquilla, lontano dai rumori del traffico.
Siamo stati molto bene, siamo una famiglia con una bambina di 6 anni. Consigliato!
Clean and cozy apartment with everything you would need. Francesco was friendly and check in was smooth. Would stay here again!

My wife and I stayed for 3 nights in late March and loved Barcelona! I would totally recommend this apartment to people visiting Barcelona, it is good value for money with great restaurants nearby, easy transport access and the apartment itself spacious with new appliances. Francesco was very helpful with any questions before our trip via email and explained everything to us clearly when meeting us upon arrival. Beach and La Sagrada Familia in walking distance (20-25 mins). We would definitely stay here again.

Francesco was helpful in finding the location and made himself available during my trip should I have needed anything. He also offered tips & tricks on this area, and provided details on things to do. His location is right next to the metro & the apartment  is perfect for 1-4 travelers. Thank you for letting me stay here!
Anfitrión muy responsable . El apartamento muy bien ubicado a cinco minutos del centro en tren . Lugar muy tranquilo. Muy recomendable. Esperemos volver
A very nice place, with everything that you need. The host is very helpful. I will stay here again next time.
The apparentment was spotlessly clean and ideal for a short break or longer. Francesco was the perfect host and we had a wonderful time.
Tres bien place.tres propre et bien equipe.hote tres gentil.

Francesco à été clair, concis et arrangeant sur le Check out.
Appartement nickel, situé à deux pas du métro.
Zéro problème !
Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés !

We were delayed at the airport because our luggage were in another flight but we advised Francesco who answered shortly and patiently waited. He was at the train station when we finally arrived so it was easier for us to go to the appartement. We were not disappointed: it was so clean and we felt welcomed!

The next morning we visited around and found really nice places to eat. The appartement is in a calm area but near metros and trains. 

When we left the appartement, Francesco came with us to Help finding a taxi. Thanks to him and we certainly will come back!

I really loved this place, and Francesco was very helpful in getting me set up. His apartment was a quiet gateway from the busier parts of Barcelona but very easy to get to by train. There's a beautiful park nearby where I spent some time, as well. The place is great for people who want to enjoy a quiet dinner at home or who want relax in comfortable place after having a great evening in the city.
Francesco and his home are amazing. He responds quickly to any questions. I would definitely stay here again on my next visit to Barcelona

Francesco's place is absolutely beautiful and in a perfect location. Its located just minutes from the Clot metro station, with two of the main metro lines, which makes moving around the city very easy, and also El Clot - Aragon train station, from which it only takes around 30 minutes to get to the BCN airport. Also just around the corner there's a lovely park! The apartment itself is quite modern and has everything you might need, a fully equipped kitchen, a super comfortable  bed and a lovely bathroom. Even a balcony with a table for two which is a nice bonus. Everything was super clean and in a very good state when we arrived. On top of all that, Francesco was an amazing host and made sure we were happy during our stay, he answered any questions that we had and was super nice. Would totally recommend staying at his place, amazing Barcelona experience!
全部五星,房东非常非常友好｡去地铁口接我们,介绍了家里的各种设备｡干净,舒适,毛巾和浴巾都是全新的｡走路25分钟到沙滩,4分钟到地铁口｡非常好的体验｡

Francesco est un hôte très attentif et son appartement est très agréable à plus d'un titre. 
Il est très propre, calme, bien équipé. Le quartier est très agréable et pratique, tout proche de deux lignes de métro et direct vers l'aéroport. Pour les marcheurs il n'est pas si loin du centre. 
C'est vraiment une adresse que je recommande, et j'en parlerai à mes amis.
Francesco's apartment is lovely! Exactly like the pictures. We had a wonderful time here!

Francesco's appartment was perfect. Its close to public transport and very cosy. The place was clean and all the equipment was working perfectly. It has everything you need to enjoy your stay. I would definitely recommend it and hopefully rant it again for my next stay in Barcelona !

Wir waren für ein verlängertes Wochenende in Barcelona und hatten mit Francescos Wohnung eine super Wahl getroffen. Super Lage und aber auch sehr ruhig gelegen. Die Wohnung hat alles wo man braucht und war sehr modern eingerichtet. Francesco hat uns super empfangen und sogar einen späteren check-out gewährt! Immer wieder!!

Francesco was amazing and so helpful with check-in. He gave really good advice on where to eat and spend our time in Barcelona. The apartment is nice and clean. Metro is just around the corner and the beach is a easy 20 minute walk away. Would totally stay here again!

Великолепный вариант по соотношению цена/качество. Франческо очень пунктуален. В квартире есть все необходимое. Продуктовые магазины очень близко. Удобно добираться в аэропорт на электричке, рядом метро. Рекомендую!

El apartamento de Francesco es hermoso, muy limpio y muy cómodo. Cumplió todas nuestras expectativas. Es muy fácil llegar en metro, está muy cerca a una estación. Cuando llegas te das cuenta que el lugar es tal cual como está en las fotos. Francesco es una persona super cordial que nos trató con toda la amabilidad. Cabe resaltar que la cama es muy cómoda y el baño es muy limpio. Definitivamente volveríamos a hospedarnos allí si volviéramos a Barcelona.

The pictures are accurate of the apartment. It is roomy, clean, and in a nice quiet neighborhood. The bed is very comfortable and the shower was great, with two different shower heads. There was even a nice tiny balancy where we sat and enjoy our coffee. The metro was an easy two minute walk. Francesco was very attentive and very prompt with responds to any of our questions. He even called us a cab for our return trip to the airport. We would stay here again. Thanks Francesco!

This apartment had everything we needed and more for a pleasant stay,  It is located in a great area right by the metro and a nice, local area for markets, restaurants.  We washed some clothes and he even had a basket for us to put our wet clothes in to carry up to the roof to dry.  I could easily live in his place as he had everything that we needed and more.  Very good communication and he suggested a good jazz club for use to try.  I wish every airbnb was as nice as Francesco's.

Nice, clean, bright, second floor apartment in a mainly residential area. Close proximity to the metro. Some nice little shops and restaurants in the vicinity. Host was friendly and left a few nice touches such as water, coffee, some toiletries, tourist information and some metro tickets. We had a great time in Barcelona.

El apartamento de Francesco es muy bonito y está muy bien equipado. Queda a 20 min caminando de la iglesia de La Sagrada Familia y muy cerca al metro y a varios mercados. La llegada fue muy fácil, pues Francesco nos estaba esperando y nos enseñó el apartamento y cómo usar los aparatos electrónicos!
Muy recomendado!

I had a super stay at Francesco's. Francesco is mature and is a professional super host (I met unprofessional Airbnb hosts before and had to be careful). The flat is well maintained and suited my needs. I couldn't have asked for more!

Мы с дочерью останавливались на одну неделю. Это был уже третий наш визит в Барселону, поэтому мы специально выбрали апартаменты в стороне от туристического потока и не разу не пожалели об этом. Всё что нужно для размеренного отдыха - в шаговой доступности: многочисленные супермаркеты, рынок, пекарни, кафе и бары,  замечательный Парк за углом, Rambla Poblenou пешеходная очень приятная улица идёт прямо до моря. А если вы хотите восхититься основными достопримечательностями, то в нескольких шагах есть станция метро. Отдельное спасибо Francesco за пунктуальность при заселении и возможность немного задержаться в квартире при выезде.
It is a nice apartment which is near the city center.

Francesco's  apartment was perfect! The bed was comfortable, the house was clean and nicely decorated. We enjoyed the tiny balcony off the bedroom every evening.
