Francesco went out of his way to make us happy! The Clot metro is a block away and gives easy access to this beautiful city. We would definitely recommend you stay in this apartment.

Francesco's hospitality and apartment made our stay in Barcelona great! Unfortunately, we were vacationing at the time of the awful attack on las ramblas. We were okay, but Francesco checked in just to make sure. His apartment is right near the metro and an easy commute to the center of the city and the airport. I would recommend this to anyone staying in Barcelona!

Die Wohnung war etwas kleiner als wir es uns vorgestellt haben aber völlig ausreichend für einen Städtetrip. Es war alles super sauber und ordentlich! Francesco war so lieb und hat uns ohne Aufforderung von der Bahnstation abgeholt und uns dann bis zur Wohnung begleitet. Sehr zuvorkommend! Die Lage ist etwas abseits des Zentrums aber durch die gute Anbindung an die nahe Bahnstation war auch das kein Problem! Wir waren sehr zufrieden und würden jederzeit wiederkommen!

Francesco's home was lovely. He was waiting for us on arrival. It was decorated lovely and had all we needed for our week stay. It was myself and two children for the week and my husband arrived the last day and it still was perfect size. We had a car the last day and parking was easy. Thank you so much. Would stay again. Internet was fast.

Francesco is fantastic. Personable, charismatic, friendly, and really patient with his guests. Great at communicating how to arrive and very responsive for any questions. 

If you want a quiet, low key, residential area with decent local sites this is a good spot. Location isn't recommended if you wish to be right in the middle of the action like (las ramblas, eixample, etc ) but great for those who love quiet. Still a bit of a walk to Sagrada Familia but in that general area. It's a vast city so it is what it is there. 

Everything else is taxi ride away. Walk outside and you get a real taste of the local life away from the crowds of tourists. For us, starting with a walk to the park next door and witnessing the locals play futball/soccer was a cool experience, following up with some local paella and beer which btw is "muy bueno" and insanely cheap. 

In terms of the place itself, we have no complaints. Bed is comfy for a large bunk bed, kitchen has all the amenities you need (including a washer!), the bathroom offers an amazing shower/bathtub spa with jets, and there is a balcony with a semi decent view (plus a terrace upstairs for a nice panoramic!) 

Overall, we were impressed and would recommend Francesco's place to anyone.
Francesco's place was clean and comfortable. It had all the amenities you could need. Francesco was very kind, friendly, and flexible.
Loved staying in Francescos flat in Barcelona.  Very comfortable flat.  Very close to transport.  We like walking so walked everywhere but the transport is very convenient if you want it.
Appartement identique à la description faite sur le site .Immeuble calme , situé à 2 stations de métro de la Sagrada .Bien équipé .Francesco nous attendait lorsque nous sommes arrivés

Excelente el apartamento de Francesco, bien ubicado con todas las comodidades y el un excelente anfitrión, de volver a Barcelona no dudaríamos en alojarnos de nuevo en su hogar 
Muchas gracias Francesco

Wir waren für 2 Nächte bei Francesco, die Wohnung war super für uns. Die Lage ist top. Francesco ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber. Er hat in der Wohnung auf uns gewartet, obwohl wir 3,5h Verspätung hatten. Außerdem hat er uns alles gezeigt und erklärt. 
Alles notwendige war vorhanden. 
Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

Francesco met us at the apartment and took the time to explain how everything worked and where everything was located. The apartment is spacious, very clean, and has all the amenities you would need. The bed is so comfortable! The apartment is in a good area, centrally located, and very close to transit. Francesco had a whole bunch of travel books, and pamphlets that we used while we were there. He responded promptly to any communication and provided all the information required. We had a great stay here, and would pick this spot again on another trip to Barcelona.

Great neighborhood - you feel like you're integrated with the local people. Lots of friendly people, families, pets - not just tourists! We thoroughly enjoyed being able to walk to see most of the popular attractions and getting back to a nice quiet neighborhood. Train station is really close by. Perfect!
Hermoso lugar recomendable para visitar Barcelona

Great apartment very close to public transportation.  Francesco met us at the set time for check in with no issues.  The apartment is as described.  Loved the location, could walk to many attractions or take the metro.  Thank you Francesco.

Francesco's apartment was perfect for our two nights in Barcelona. The apartment was very clean and modern, and had a lift to get to the second floor. It was located in a very convenient location - only a few minute walk to the metro. Francesco was great with his commucatin and was also perfectly fine with a slightly earlier check-in. He was also so kind to provide a bottle of water for us. Definitely recommend Francesco's apartment to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona!

The home is really good. It is minutes walk from subway el clot station, the el clot park, and food market, as well as to the el clot restaurant. The home is clean, quiet and modern. We all love the massage bath tube, it is really a good relax after traveling in the city. Francisco is nice and speak very good English, so don’t worry if you can’t speak Spanish:) the home is also near the famous cathedral, you will have a good time here.

El piso de Francesco es muy acogedor. Cuenta con todos los servicios necesarios para disfrutar de una estancia familiar y segura. Dejó a nuestra disposición, café, agua, aceite y otros elementos para cocinar cositas sencillas; además de un variado kit de utensilios y materiales de limpieza.
La ubicación es estupenda porque a dos minutos caminando está el metro y una estación de trenes de cercanía que te lleva a diferentes localidades periféricas a Barcelona. Viajé con mi madre de 80 años quien no se cansó de celebrar el lugar,  sobre todo, el barrio donde está localizado. Un barrio pintoresco que permite sumergirse en la vida local, gastronómica y cultural de Cataluña. A unos cuantos metros está un parque muy bonito y varios bares y restaurantes típicos de la ciudad que juntos crean un ambiente muy agradable. Estuvimos siete días pero podríamos haber estado más. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Appartement de qualité , service de qualité

El departamento de Francesco es tal cual se ve en las fotos y más también. Las respuestas fueron rápidas y nos explicaron todo el funcionamiento de las cosas. Tiene transporte público cerca a todos los destinos. Hemos tenido una estancia muy agradable, como si estuviéramos en casa. Viviana
Francesco is a pleasure. His apartment is clean and cozy. The neighborhood is real and very convenient. We've stayed here four times and will be back.

В квартире чисто и красиво,все продумано до мелочей,в рабочем состоянии. 
Спасибо Франческо за гостеприимство!

We have stayed at Francesco's flat many times. It is always clean and the neighborhood is not touristy but very real. He is always helpful
and we are always returning!
Perfect
Great place. Neighborhood feels authentic. 3 min walk to the metro station. Place was very clean, description is very accurate.

L’appartamento è fuori dal centro comodo alla metro in posizione tranquilla. Non molto pulito e manutenzionato. Il proprietario parla bene l’italiano è molto gentile e disponibile. La terrazza e la camera se pur con letto a castello non sono molto spaziose. Esiste l’eventualità di presenza di scarafaggi, durante il nostro soggiorno ne abbiamo riscontrati due.
Francesco ha sido un excelente anfitrión. Muy atento para responder consultas. El departamento es tal cual se lo presenta, muy cómodo y completo. Lo recomiendo!
vous ne trouverez pas mieux

The Appartement was super clean and very modern. The Whirpool was super nice After a day of sightseeing. The Appartement ist Central. If u like to Walk u can reach Sagrada Familia in 15 min. And other Famous sightseeing in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) min buy foot. Or Public Transportation - very close and with (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps easy to use.
Thanks for the Great Stay !

Мы останавливались в аппартаментах семьей: двое взрослых и полутарогодовалые двойняшки. Франческо предоставил нам 2 кроватки, постельное для детей (+сменное), несколько игрушек и даже спальные мешки. Мы эти вещи везли с собой из Украины, но было очень приятно такое внимание и забота!  Покорила бутылка холодной воды и кофе для кофемашины - то самое, что было нам так необходимо после дороги :)  В апартаментах индивидуальное отопление - тоже было очень важно нам с детьми. 
Расположение удобное - пару минут от станции Clot.  Мы как раз ехали до этой станции из аэропорта (к поезду лифт есть). Правда, так и не разобрались есть ли лифт (нам с коляской для двойни нужен именно лифт) на линию метро L1, так что когда была необходимость - прогуливались до станции Glories - это всего в 7 минутах ходьбы. Там же огромный супермаркет.  Супермаркет поменьше есть и в пару кварталов от апартаментов.
Неподалеку хорошие кофейни (мы были в Merlyn - находится в том же доме).

Tres beau séjour dans un des plus beau quartier de Barcelone juste à côté du Glories avec tout les centre d'achat et supermarché carrefour, l'appartement est tout équipé avec un jacouzi en prime je le recommande fortement et c'est sur qu'on reviendra si on repasse à Barcelone

The apartment is really cosy, neat, well-equipped and suitable for a short city stay for a couple or a small family with a couple of kids. We especially loved the little nuances like a bottle of water, capsules for coffee machine, a lot of tourist info. We enjoyed the little cute terrace. Francesco is an amazing host, responsive and attentive to the guests' needs. We'll definitely come back.

Excellent apartment  to Tour Barcelona from.
The Apartment is new and clean with secure access.
 It is a 2min walk to the Metro and Train station at El. Clot. This makes it easy to explore all areas of Barcelona.
Even though we arrived very late at night Francesco was there to meet us and show us the apartment and point out Local amenities .  No doubt I would use again.
It's a great apartment with a friendly host. Thanks so much for making our quick stay so easy and fun!

Perfect apartment if you’re visiting Barcelona!
Francesco was a great host and waited for our arrival although our flight was delayed for 6 hours.
The place is spacious and clean. Everything you need is close and the metro station is 5 a minute walk. 
I Highly recommend this place!

Francesco was a fabulous host! He even met us at the metro exit and guided us to the flat. The flat was perfect for me and my friend. I loved the lay out and it seemed much larger than it was. There were plenty of amenities near by I wish we could have utilized more. Plenty of walkable places including a grocery store.
Nice, cosy apartment. Close to the metro but far from city center
Great space and easy easy to navigate the city from here!

Tout est parfait. Près du métro el clôt. Beau quartier chaleureux avec le parc El Clôt tout près. Le Mercadon pratique. Le seul hic, lit double tres confortable mais nous sommes habitués à King, donc on a trouvé ça petit. Sinon, tout est parfait et propre.
Nice new place near a great park and lots to do. Would stay here again when visiting Barcelona.

Francesco a été très accueillant et nous a même mis à disposition tout le matériel pour notre bébé.
Joli appartement, très fonctionnel.

Francesco was very helpful. His place is superbly located. Quiet neighborhood to sleep and just a few minutes walk to the metro station and the Renfe to go to the airport. Most of the attractions are just a few metro stations to go. We had the Barcelona 4 day ticket . It is worth it.
great spot that is quiet and close to the metro
Great location. Loved the apartment.

Had a pleasant stay in Barcelona at Francesco's place. The apartment is well equipped, clean, nice & location was good. Host is really helpful, very prompt in responding & very accommodating.. Would recommend to friends who are visiting Barcelona to stay here.

Francesco’s condo was in a great location with lots of places to eat in close proximity, as well as a large grocery store and fruit veggie stands close by. The subway was a short walk and quickly takes you around the city. With Francesco’s advice, we purchased a T10 ticket and used the one card for the 2 of us which made traveling easy and economical.  We walked to Sagrada Familia and Park Guell (the park was a bit of a hike, but doable.)
The bed at the condo was probably the most comfortable we’ve ever slept in. I have back issues, so that says a lot.  As we’ve found everywhere we’ve stayed so far in Spain, there is construction noise.  It didn’t bother us as it was during the day when we were out, but if you like to sleep later in the morning, some earplugs would be helpful. 
Francesco was a great host. I received an immediate reply to my text saying we were at the airport and leaving for the condo. When we unfortunately left my husbands cell phone in the taxi he did everything he could to help us locate it. We felt very supported while we were in Barcelona since he responded to texts immediately.  We highly recommend Francesco as a host!
Very quiet. Good shower.

We went to Barcelona for a quick weekend trip, and were looking for something convenient and not too expensive. Francesco's place was great. 

He was at the apartment when we arrived, and showed us everything. He was very friendly, and it was easy to communicate with him whenever we needed to. He was also flexible about a slightly later checkout time.

The apartment had everything we needed for a few days. It has a subway and a train station nearby, but we mostly walked everywhere. 

One thing to note is that the apartment is on a small street that most people haven't heard of. Every cab driver had to look it up. One night we were nearby and only had the exact address, and no one could give us directions. I would note the cross streets nearby.

"Clot" region of Barcelona is a good location, plenty of shops & restaurants on adjacent blocks. Metro nearby. Its near a school & some neighbors dont mind expressing themselves boisterously when communicating w ea other but some noise is part of city living & the culture. We ate breakfast lot at 'Marylin' crepes & pasteries on the corner & the Clot Restaurant is just a block away which we liked a lot. We'll be back.

Francesco was a great host! Fantastic communication and his place was great in an amazing neighborhood. A true home away from home we had all the comforts of a great apartment that made our trip that much more pleasurable.

Convenient location to subway and beach and lots of affordable supermarkets. Having a stocked kitchen makes it easy to get up and running. No complaints. Sensitive sleepers will enjoy the light/noise blocking shade in the bedroom and the A/C unit in the living room. Great time.

We had a very pleasant stay at Francesco’s. His response time to messages were very fast. The apartment is exactly as described. What we liked most about the apartment is the size, amenities and very close to train/metro station. The large size of the bathroom and room made the apartment very comfortable for us with big luggages. All amenities were provided from washing detergents, lots of towels, tissues, tea/coffee, etc. The air conditioning was a great plus too! Even though the location is a bit far from the city center, the El Clot station is very near (5 Min walk) and operates the Renfe and 3 metro lines (green, purple and red) which then takes you to the city. Overall, would recommend Francesco’s place.
Francesco was an excellent host tentative to all my needs
Very modern, clean apartment in great central location of Clot. Air conditioning a big plus and Nana restaurant a must to visit for beautiful food and great service.
Great location and a very charming apartment. Communication was very efficient, amenities and local tips available! My parents and I absolutely love the apartment.
Francesco was a very hospitable host! His place is very clean and accessible by transit to major tourist sites in Barcelona!
A beautiful apartment in a wonderful location in Clot. Francesco was *extremely* helpful in terms of check-in and check-out. Thank you for everything!
Great apartment - fabulously equipped and extremely responsive host.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed this (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a convenient location and easy to access. The apartment was perfect and we felt right at home. Would stay here again if we returned to Barcelona!

El alojamiento superó nuestras espectativas. Francesco en todo momento nos ayudó tanto en la llegada como en la salida, las respuestas a los mensajes eran al instante, mas no se puede pedir. La casa está muy bien distribuida, tiene de todo y es super acogedora.
Logement très très propre. Bon accueil de l’hote, très bon séjour.

Good and cozy apartment. Around 15-20 min (at our speed) to Sagrada Familia. Not that easy to park the car, but the apartment itself has no issues. You'll have everything to cook and to serve meal. It has a lift, small balcony and you'll be able to get to the roof. There's no special views though. Nevertheless we like the stay there a lot, thanks Francesco for the good day in Barcelona!

Simply THE BEST Airbnb that i have ever been in. Perfect location with train stations minutes away. Complete with all amenities! Don’t look elsewhere. This is the best place to stay while in Barcelona
Would highly recommend!

Чисто, комфортно, продумано все до мелочей, недалеко от метро. 
Спасибо, Francesco!

Francesco's place is unique! I may say it could be easily considered an Airbnb Plus. Everything you could possibly need is at hand. Plenty space for a couple or two, with a truly fully equipped kitchen and a huge and comfortable sofa to enjoy a good rest between walks. And that jacuzzi made our days even better! It's important to mention the great location too, considering we left the apartment less than 10min before our train right to the airport. The closest station serves 2 subway lines and trains! As a superhost, Francesco is always ready to answer and very supportive. I would definitely recommend this place and won't look anywhere else when I decide to come back to Barcelona.

Amazing place to stay at while travelling Barcelona! Francesco was a fantastic host. He greeted us upon our arrival, showed us around the apartment, and provided maps along with helpful suggestions about what to see in Barcelona. The apartment was very clean, spacious, and equipped with everything you could ever need- and more! It was very close to a metro stop which made it very easy to travel around the city. Highly recommend staying here!!

Francesco was great host! He told us every detail about his place and open to any question. And it was very thoughtful they prepare some coffee capsule enough for our stay. There were also enough dishes and cutleries for 4 people. Besides we don’t need to buy olive oil, salt, sugar etc. We’re very satisfied for the stay, and definitely will come again when visit Barcelona again.

Francesco's apartment was a great place to stay. Quiet area with several restaurants around, easy access (a few blocks to the Metro), and a gracious responsive host-everything we were looking for. And it helped that there was a elevator! We would definitely stay there again.
This place is awesome! Nice and clean and very close to many things. Easy to navigate to from the airport!
Un departamento muy completo, en excelentes condiciones. Muy recomendable.

Great location to experience a real Barcelona experience.  Couldn’t get over how you could turn a corner and fall across more drinking and eating establishments 
Close to metro , train and short 10 minute walk to a large shopping mall if that’s what you need 
Appartment has everything you need and is in great condition 
Walkable to Sagrada Família .
Francesco was great and knew English well 
If coming from airport buy a 10 trip ticket and get the train from terminal 2 to el clot-arago.  Then you’ll have 9 more rides on the train,metro or buses to use for your vacation
Great appartment. Very clean and great size. Host was amazing.

Francesco's Airbnb is fantastic: clean, modern, practical and comfortable. Francesco met us at the unit after a little trouble finding it, since (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps provides a different location when you input his address from the app, but strangely provides the correct one when you click on it from the Airbnb app..  Other than that hiccup, Francesco's introduction to the unit was appreciated. The unit has everything you need for a short or long stay in Barcelona. We especially enjoyed the espresso machine, strong shower, AC for hot nights and comfortable bed. The unit is also conveniently close to the Metro so you are able to get to the heart of the city in no time. Finally, Francesco is very responsive to all our questions and requests. We appreciated that he was able to order a taxi for us on our last day which took away any anxiety of hailing one. Overall, highly recommended and we will be back if we are ever in Barcelona.
Um espaço muito agradavel , bem localizado .

Nice apartment close to las Gloria’s 
Francesco is very friendly... communication was always easy

Nice flat, close to the metro.
Nice view from the roof.

Francesco was the most perfect host for the two of us in Barcelona! We had the misfortune of our luggage getting lost by the airline, and Francesco was incredibly resourceful and accommodating. His apartment was even better than we expected and was in the greatest location near everything we wanted to go see. We would absolutely recommend this apartment for anyone staying in Barcelona!

Excellent apartment and really enjoyed staying here. Flat has coffee machine with pods, amazon tv, aircon, dishwasher, everything you can want. Close to supermarkets, 300m. Metro 400m away and red line takes you to most attractions. Highly recommended!

La comunicacion con Francesco fue inmejorable.
Nos puso todas las facilidades del mundo tanto para la entrada como para la salida, cosa que es de agradecer,ya que no se lo pusimos facil.
El apartamento es tal como las fotos, muy comodas las camas, limpieza absoluta en todo el apartamento.
Y algo que no se aprecia en las fotos y yo particularmente agradezco es la mesa y sillas en la terraza.
Asi que no puedo sacarle fallo alguno por que todo fue perfecto, lastima que fuera con tan poco tiempo.

The apartment was nice and clean. The location is superb. It is very close to the subway station and the train station for R2 train line that goes to the airport. The farmers market, bakery and small supermarket are 5 minutes walk from the apartment. Check in was easy. Francesco quickly responded to my texts and gave me clear directions how to get to the apartment from the airport.  It was very pleasant stay.

The condominium really is nicely decorated, quiet and secure. Being close to the subway and train station was very convenient. The neighborhood is full of small  shops and restaurants. So much to enjoy.
this apt is exaclty the location for the Barcelona vive experience. will definately stat here again. amazing value and Francesco is a mega host
Excelente!! El apartamento es tal cual se ve. Limpio, seguro y con todos los servicios. Ampliamente recomendable.
Très bel appartement, très propre et bien situé
Really lovely apartment. Has everything you need and is very well located next to train and metro lines. Very clean and tidy. Highly recommended.

Loved staying in Francesco’s place. He stayed up and met us at 11pm to welcome us - (thank you again). The unit is small but very clean and cosy. Free parking is available nearby. Wifi is acceptable speed. Second floor with elevator. 20 minute walk to Sagrada Família, and maybe 35 minute walk to Gothic Quarter. Or catch a train, which is only 5 minutes from his apartment. Kitchen well appointed, flat screen TV with amazon TV connected. Overall, a great stay. Thanks very much Francesco!

Francisco‘s apartment was clean and well stocked with the basic amenities. Our only complaint would have been for cable TV to keep up with News and the location was a little farther from the city center then we would’ve liked but otherwise a beautiful apartment.  Madelines restaurant at the corner saved us in the late hour for food. There was also quite a bit of noise in the streets, but that is to be expected in a busy city of this size. All in all we enjoyed our stay.

It was so nice and comfortable and lovely !  He prepared an umbrella for us.he’s very kind and good person~
he helped check in early.
I recommend staying in this house 100%.I just say thank you to him :-) 

이 집 정말 너무너무 좋고 친절하고 호스트 분 메세지 답변도 정말 빠르세요!
일찍 체크인 할수있게 도와주시고 체크인할때 하나하나 다 설명해주시고 비온다고 우산도 가지고 마중 나와주셨어요!
이 집에 없는게 없음ㅋㅋ최고!:)

Super clean apartment, great location, everything one needs for a great visit to Barcelona.
Train, metro, tram all right around the corner,  food market local. Beach walkable.

it was so lucky to stay this place! As it is so close to the metro station ‘clot’ and easy to get several spots for us. 
And his place is clean and cost, safe and comfortable to stays for 3nights! If you are 2 people staying this is perfect place to chose!
Nice clean wonderful apartment very near to the metro . Very safe surrounding . Reasonably priced cafes and many grocery shops near by . Definitely recommend it to the friends and family .
Amazing guy, amazing apartment, great location! I would stay there again? Very helpful host indeed. He made my stay very easy and comfortable!
Excelente apartamento, óptimas condições. Tudo o que necessita disponível. Gostei muito.
Excellent!!

Francesco is a really lovely guy how helped us out on short notice in a difficult situation at 22:00 at night. He had the apartment ready for us within two hours even though he has to drive in from outside Barcelona.
Beautiful place with a lovely whirlpool tub, cosy little balcony (and rooftop terrace, but it was too cold to use it in December) and complimentary tea and coffee. Also a nice mix of spices is available for cooking. And let's not forget the free Wifi AND you can use his Amazon Prime account for watching TV.
The Metro station CLOT is 2 walking min from the apartment. Couldn't be better!!

The apartment is exactly as described and even better. 2 minutes walk to metro station and grocery stores, and the park. Quiet, really sparkling clean, with comfortable beds, little balcony and a terrace upstairs. Perfect for families. Thank you, Francesco!

Had an amazing stay at Francesco's place. Not only is it really stylish, safe and in a very central neighborhood, but Francesco himself was such an awesome guy. He met us when we arrived, gave us some good tips, and was also super helpful in being flexible about our check out time. I highly, highly recommend his place. He's truly a nice guy and you won't be disappointed!
Ottimo. Appartamento molto carino e spazioso. Zona tranquilla e a due passi dalla metro. Francesco è stato preciso e disponibile. Lo consiglio davvero.

Séjour très agréable dans cette belle ville de Barcelone. Francesco a été adorable. Il est venu nous accueillir à la sortie du métro !! Arrangeant sur les horaires du check in et out et très réactif sur les demandes. Rien à redire au top !
 Je conseil cette adresse qui est plus bien située (2 min meteo et train direct aéroport 30 min !!!

Franceso was a great host and has a very clean and modern apartment with many amenities.  We personally appreciated the washing machine which was very easy to use.   The bed and pillows were also very comfortable.  He met my daughter and I at the train station which was greatly appreciated considering it was late at night.  The location was perfect with a train and metro station within walking distance.
El alojamiento de Francesco estuvo muy bien, recomendable 100 % por ubicación, funcionalidad y amabilidad del anfitrión.

We had a great stay at Franceso's place. Franceso was a very nice host, and his apartment is stylish, clean and has all the amenities. It is located in a great location,  close to a metro station. He was helpful and flexible about our check out time. Ι really recommend this place.

Casa perfetta! A 5 minuti c’è la metro, sotto casa ci sono 2 supermercati e un parco meraviglioso. Quartiere molto tranquillo. Casa pulita e fornita di tutto il necessario. Francesco è disponibile e serio. Mi ha permesso di anticipare il check in e posticipare il check out. Consigliatissimo!
The apartment is very clean and tidy.TheThis supplies inside are very complete.This apartment is very nice. I'll choose it again next time.
Très agréable logement,baignoire avec jets, métro à proximité lumineux et calme...

name: Copacabana a 3 quadras da praia :)
summary: Apartamento no coração de Copacabana, na rua mais arborizada do bairro. Próximo ao metrô Siqueira Campos, a 3 quadras da praia e ao lado do bairro Peixoto que possui feira orgânica e parquinho para crianças.Pertinho de bares e restaurantes maravilhosos também. Apartment in the heart of Copacabana in the street with most trees in the neighborhood. Next to Siqueira Campos metros, 3 blocks away from the beach, righ by the side of bairro Peixoto: organic fair, playground for children, restaurants .
space: Apartamento alto,arejado e claro, perfeito para quem quer curtir férias ou vem a negócios mas quer aproveitar o tempo livre para uma escapada pra praia. High apartment, windy with a lot of daylight. Perfect for vacation or business but if you come for business enjoy your free time with a quick escape to the beach.

Próximo ao metrô Siqueira Campos, a 3 quadras da praia e ao lado do bairro Peixoto que possui feira orgânica e parquinho para crianças.Pertinho de bares e restaurantes maravilhosos também. Apartamento alto,arejado e claro, perfeito para quem quer curtir férias ou vem a negócios mas quer aproveitar o tempo livre para uma escapada pra praia. High apartment, windy with a lot of daylight. Perfect for vacation or business but if you come for business enjoy your free time with a quick escape to the beach. O apartamento inteiro está disponível para aluguel. The entire apartment is available for rent. Estou viajando mas minha mãe cuida do apartamento pra mim. Falamos inglês espanhol e por
neighborhood_overview: Próximo ao apartamento tem a praia de Copacabana a 3 quadras, tem o metrô Siqueira Campos, o parquinho do bairro Peixoto que é perfeito para crianças e para quem gosta de feira tradicional e orgânica, tem também muitos bares restaurantes ótimos para sair à noite. Near the apartment there is the beach just 3 blocks away, there`s the metro Siqueira campos, the playground on bairro Peixoto which is perfect for kids. On wednesdays and saturday there`s regular and organic fair 2 min away from home. A lot of bars and restaurants around.
notes: O Sofá da sala é sofá-cama, por isso cabem 2 pessoas a mais. The sofa in the living room turns into a bed, so there fits 2 people more.
transit: O apartamento é próximo ao metrô Siqueira Campos, existe um ponto de ônibus bem em frente à casa e muitos outros pontos de ônibus além de taxis.. o transporte é abundante aqui e além disso é possível fazer muita coisa à pé. The apartment is close to Siqueira Campos metro, there's a bus stop right in front of the apartment and a lot of other bus stops around and 1 min away a taxi station. You can do a lot of things walking as well and the area is super safe.
access: O apartamento inteiro está disponível para aluguel. The entire apartment is available for rent.
interaction: Estou viajando mas minha mãe cuida do apartamento pra mim. Falamos inglês espanhol e português. Somos super solicitas e prontas para ajudar com o que pudermos :D I`m travelling but my mom takes care of the apartment for me. We speak english, spanish and portuguese. We`re always available to help with whatever we can.
house_rules: Não é permitido animais de estimação e o prédio possui uma regra de silêncio após as 22:00, ou seja baixar o volume ;)

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Meu nome é Camila tenho 28 anos, sou empreendedora social, adoro curtir o dia ao ar livre e ir ao cinema :) 

Já morei em muitos lugares no mundo então sei como é bom ser bem recebida e desejo fazer o mesmo por quem eu receber.

Falo inglês e espanhol

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Hale Kea - A Relaxing Apartment with Ocean Views in Kona
summary: Make breakfast in a warm kitchen with traditional cabinetry and hardwood floors in this radiant apartment. Open a sliding glass door and walk out onto a covered lanai to behold breathtaking views of the ocean from the dining or cozy seating areas. Listen to your favorite streaming app on the Bose 500 smart speaker.
space: Enjoy this fully furnished studio with over 600 square feet of living space. Private lanai with ocean views, This unit features a Queen size Murphy bed with an additional day bed if necessary. A kitchenette with a cooktop, microwave oven and refrigerator provides for extra convenience. Ceiling and floor fans provide cooling and airflow when trade winds are light. Centrally located just minutes from town and Alii drive, this unit offers an exceptional value to visitors to the Big Island. I've always disliked lengthy minimum stay requirements so that's why ours is only 2 nights. If you're looking for accommodation close to town and activities, you need look no further.  There are predetermined check-in and out times but depending on availability, these times are flexible. Inquire about special rates on specific dates. Nightly rate Room Charge        $96.99 TA(URL HIDDEN)8.97 Gen. Excise  Tax    $ 4.04 Tota(URL HIDDEN) $110.00     Discounted Rate $99.00 Applicable at certain times through
description: Make breakfast in a warm kitchen with traditional cabinetry and hardwood floors in this radiant apartment. Open a sliding glass door and walk out onto a covered lanai to behold breathtaking views of the ocean from the dining or cozy seating areas. Listen to your favorite streaming app on the Bose 500 smart speaker.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is set in a quiet hillside neighborhood of Kailua-Kona. Wailua trail is minutes away offering a path for both walking or running. Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park and Kamakahonu National Historic Landmark, for sea turtle viewing and ocean activities, are a short drive away, as are beaches and art galleries in downtown Kailua-Kona.
notes: We have beach gear, snorkels, masks, etc available free of charge for our guests as well as chairs, umbrellas and a cooler for use during your stay. W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: The unit is in a residential area but it's very close to restaurants, activities and beaches. You will however need a car to take full advantage of everything Kona and Hawaii has to offer. We are located approximately 15-20 minutes south of Kona International Airport.
access: You will have the run of the place. This is a completely separate unit located on the property. Private access from stairs (20 steps) located right by the parking space. Your keyed entry will be programmed specifically for your stay with us offering hassle-free 24 hour check in.
interaction: We make ourselves as available as you wish. From suggesting places to eat to activities to do while you're here, we are just a quick message or knock on the door away.
house_rules: No smoking. Please follow the Hawaiian tradition of removing shoes when entering.

host.host_about: We have lived in Kona since 1999 and built our home. We enjoy an active outdoor lifestyle with our two kids and look forward to meeting you.

reviews.comments: My wife and I stayed here for our 4th wedding anniversary and fell in love with this place. The decor is awesome, the view is amazing, and the bed is super comfortable. Lots of privacy and great to have a working kitchenette. We saved money on our vacation by buying food at Costco and eating in while enjoying the awesome ocean view and sunset!  Thank you Thomas (Kurt) and Nicholas!
Absolutely wonderful spot. Great location and view. New everything. Thomas was very welcoming.

We are a couple of French tourists and we stayed here with our 4 month old baby and we had a very good experience. We even extended our stay. This is a very private studio with everything you need to feel at home. We saved a lot of money by cooking using very nice material (cutlery, dishes, kitchen apparels...) and had dinner in the balcony while enjoying a spectacular ocean view. 
Thomas was really nice and advised good places to visit. 
The pictures do really reflect the reality, this place is really nicely furniched with lots of taste.
Super nice place and super friendly!  Would definately recommend.  Thanks Thomas!
I stayed one night is this lovely, spacious studio in Kona and it wasn't long enough. I would definitely come back in the future! Thanks!

The apartment is gorgeous....much more expansive than expected and than the pictures show. We only stayed one night, but after seeing the place, would have loved to stay much longer! The mini kitchen seemed well equipped for those that want to do self catering, the view from the deck was beautiful, and the whole setting just felt relaxing. Thomas and his wife were very responsive via email and phone, and were quite accommodating to our somewhat nebulous schedule (due to driving over after flying in from Hilo). Definitely recommended! Would happily stay again.

Had a great stay — well-appointed kitchen, deck with fantastic ocean view, walk-in closet for storing luggage, and reliable wi-fi. Thomas and Simone were great hosts.

Perfect location for easy access to Ali'i Drive and the beaches (5-10 minute drive), but in a nice, quiet residential neighborhood away from the tourist traffic. Would definitely stay here again if we came back to Kona!

We spent three amazing days in Kailua Kona at Thomas and Simone's place. The view was great and the accommodations were clean and comfortable. Simone was very helpful with travel suggestions and we had a wonderful time. Definitely worth it!
It was really great to stay with Thomas and Simone. The flat is amazing, nicely decorated, awesome view and quite handy if you wanna explore the west coast of Hawaii. Totally recommended!

We spent a week in Thomas and Simone's apartment. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. The apartment is spacious and well-appointed. It is clean, comfortable and very quiet. We would definitely stay here if we were visiting Kona again.

We really enjoyed our stay at Thomas and Simone's "Ohana".  The ocean view was awesome, and the accommodations cosy and comfortable as well.  The area was so quiet that I could even hear what sounded like crickets or frogs in the evenings.  I also enjoyed seeing the Geckos and Anoles each morning!  We would definitely stay there again.  Thank you Thomas and family, we had a very relaxing time at your place :)

First, let me say that Thomas and his wife are wonderful people.  We met after we got in to Kona and had a great talk.  

The apartment is absolutely wonderful, I would certainly stay here again on a future visit.  The neighborhood that they are in is amazing, and it is only a short drive to the village.

The stay was absolute perfect. We saw the photos and feedbacks and expected a lot but the accommodation was much better than expected. Everything was great, very clean, absolute friendly hosts and a safe area. Kailua- Kona is great! we really enjoyed the time there and we wished to have more than just two nights on this lovely place. Thank you for all, absolute perfect. I highly recommend Hale Kea

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. What a beautiful place! It was very centrally located and very close to all the action, yet we felt like we were away from the touristy commercial stuff in this tropical paradise. Comfortable and cosy place with great views, highly recommend it!

Hale Kea was everything I expected it to be. The photos are dead on. The place is absolutely gorgeous. Thomas provided great instructions upon arrival. We spent most of our days out exploring but we finally did meet Thomas as we were leaving on Monday. My only regret is that we did not have more time to spend there and enjoy the apartment. Clean, fresh bath towels, beach towels provided, everything you may need.

Our stay was just perfect. The appartment is spacious and very clean. The interior is of upscale quality. Everything looks almost new. It's quiet - though you can hear the highway in distance. The view from the lanai is great! You have your own entrance and lanai, so privacy is granted. 
Thomas and his wife are lovely people. It was very easy to get in contact. All of our questions were answered within minutes and they helped us in any way. 
So if you are looking for a nice appartment well located in Kona: just book at the Whites!

PS: for all germans: Thomas spricht Deutsch.

This ohana was perfect to kick off our Big Island stay.  It is located in a great neighborhood overlooking Kona.  It is just a few minutes drive to Ali'i drive on the coast where you can find countless restaurants and shops and beaches.  If you go further up the mountain, there is an excellent Slow Food restaurant and cafe that is divine! (holuakoa cafe).  When you book this, the host sends you a welcome video.  You'll hear the chirp of tropical birds in the background and wonder if he added them.  NOPE!  You'll hear this blissful sound when you sit on the peaceful porch and look out over the Pacific Ocean.  The ohana unit is spotlessly clean and very tastefully decorated.  We would not hesitate to book this again on our next trip.  Highly recommended!
The reservation was canceled 38 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Beautiful apartment, clean, wonderful view. probably the cleanest and nicest Air Bnb I've stayed at yet! very modern and beautifully furnished.
Gorgeous house and terrific hosts! Highly recommend! Stunning views and very well kept beautiful accommodation.

We ended up staying in this beautiful place and were extremely happy we found it! The place is super clean with all the amenities you can imagine! The pictures are representing the place perfectly!

We unfortunately did not get to meet Thomas since he was a way for work but got to meet his lovely wife Simone who was extremely helpful even after we checked out already and ran into done troubles with our flight leaving Hawaii!

Would highly recommend this beautiful place to anyone!
Perfect! Book it - you'll love it!

This place is beautiful, and was such a treat, we almost didn't want to leave to explore the rest of Kona.  Not kidding.  Didn't get to meet hosts in person (our schedules were off), but they left us everything we could need and more.  The only (minor) downside was that the bed could have been more comfortable.  The location is great, convenient to all the places we wanted to visit on that side of the island.  It was a retreat in itself.

Absolutely wonderful location for a beautiful ohana with a view of the ocean. Was the perfect place for us to spend the day before, of, and after our wedding! We couldn't have asked for a more wonderful host than Simone. She was so very thoughtful and helpful! Thanks again for a wonderful stay!

We stayed there on our Honeymoon, the place is very nicely decorated and pristine, located 10 min from both Kona and Kahaluu beach park (great for snorkeling, plenty of fishes and turtles).
The hosts were extremely helpful and very kind, exchanging tips / places to go / visit.
If you want to visit Kona, stay there!
Highly recommended

I almost don't want to leave a review because the more people who find out about this fantastic establishment, the more who may book it and then when I want to stay at it again, it might not be free!!  However, I would be doing a disservice to Thomas and Simone by not adding my positive review to the list of others.

I did not meet the hosts while I was there but from start to finish, it was a superb experience.  First off, the photos, while beautiful, don't really do the room justice.  It is a beautiful space.  The hosts have thought of everything for your stay.  There are dishes for your use, silverware, ironing board, beach towels, even a noodle to keep you afloat when swimming!  There are more amenities to mention but not enough characters allowed in the review.  :)  Everything was clean and bright.  The bathroom was stocked with large, thick towels and there's even a soap/shampoo dispenser on the wall.  It is a very spacious, well thought-out room and the view from the lanai just can not be beat.  

The location is fantastic.  It is about a 10 minute car ride to Ali'i Drive and about 20 minutes from the airport.  You're close to everything  you might need (as far as tourist attractions, restaurants, supermarkets, gas stations) without being smack dab in the middle of all the hustle and bustle.

I cannot recommend this place highly enough and hopefully, the next time I'm on the Big Island, the room will be free because I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else!

Right from the day, I requested the possibility of a stay to the day of departure, all interactions with the host were great and commendable! On the day of arrival, we were late. But the host had made all arrangements for easy access. The property was spotless and as described in the photos and notes. Their sense of interior decor is great. All amenities were of absolute help. We had a great stay for 4 nights. We would love to get there again. Easy access to highway and stores. Excellent location for access to sigh-seeing. Highly recommend :)

Our stay at Hale Kea was awesome.  The place was bright, airy, and spotlessly clean.  During our stay, we loved the comfortable breeze that circulated into the apartment, the sound of the birds in the morning, and the tiny day geckos that would sporadically pop out on the lanai.  The White's were also kind enough to leave a towel and some bath toys for our baby which we really appreciated.  There was easy access to touristy areas like Aliii drive, as well as smaller stores/restaurants on Mamalahoa Hwy.  My husband also liked taking a short drive in the morning to Kona Joe's Coffee where they have a great garden area.  All in all we highly recommend Hale Kea.

I don't think there is anything else to add that hasn't already been said. This room is absolutely perfect. I really appreciated the high quality of the fixtures! The shower was a dream! I wish I could move right in! Thanks for a memorable stay!
The room was beautiful! It was in a great location, with a great view, and the room itself was very well-decorated and functional. I couldn't be more pleased.
Really nice studio with magnificent views. 10 minutes by car to Kailua-Kona downtown. If we return to Kailua-Kona we definetly come back to this studio.

This is my first time using Airbnb and Thomas' description of the place was spot on with what you're getting. I have no complaints staying here and if I ever come back to Kona, I would consider staying here again.

Had a great stay here last week. The apartment is very clean and very specious. It is situated in a nice quiet street off the main highway so really easy to get around in a car, either exploring the Big Island beaches and Volcano or heading into Kona town for its lively mix of restaurants. Highly recommended.
Very comfortable and everything provided, including lovely thick beach towels. We really enjoyed our stay.
This was by far my favorite stay on Airbnb. The view is beautiful, literally every amenity one could want, and attentive hosts should anything be needed. Just perfect!

The studio apartment was absolutely gorgeous and well-appointed, I echo every other review that states that pictures really don't do justice to the apartment.  Thomas and his wife obviously thought of the little touches that would make someone's stay extra-special, from items in the kitchen to candles  and a cooler that you can take to the beach.  The space was beautiful and allowed for a serene and relaxing visit to the big island.  Thanks to the hosts for making our trip memorable and special!

The apartment had everything I needed and more.  It's on a very
quiet street which made it so nice to "come home" to.

Awesome place, great location, beautifully decorated! Hale Kea is a beautiful, spacious studio and made for a comfortable stay while we were in Kona. If we were ever back in Kona, this would definitely be the place we'd stay.

Hale Kea was the perfect sanctuary and just the perfect way to end our trip to the Big Island. We had everything we needed, and loved all the little touches that made our stay comfortable. The lanai is the best place to sit, enjoy a drink and take in the sunset every day. Everything was clean and organized, and the check-in instructions were very simple and easy. The neighborhood is really quiet. Thank you, Thomas, for making our trip to Kona so wonderful!

Wonderful place with a wonderful view. We really enjoyed our stay.

Clean and very well furnished.

We loved this very spacious studio, we had such a fabulous time staying there. The decor is beautiful, everything is spotless and neatly organized. everything you will need, you can find it in the studio. we enjoyed the lanai and the amazing view. We sat out to enjoy the lanai every chance we get. we felt extremely comfortable and right at home there. 
i would come back to stay there anytime! Highly recommend this real gem.

We had a great experience at Hale Kea. The apartment is very well appointed, peaceful, and comfortable. It is equipped with everything you need for your stay on the Big Island. The view from the lanai is beautiful and we thoroughly enjoyed our morning coffees and lunch out there each day.
Loved it. Great space. Great people!

This apartment was stylish, well organized, squeaky clean, bright and luxurious.  Very private and centrally located in a beautiful safe neighborhood safely nestled up on a hill.  A true home away from home. We left inspired by the hosts professionalism and organizational skills in home keeping.  The bath tub was large, towels plentiful, clean and fluffy, the kitchen well stocked with wine glasses, quality kitchenware and they even provide fresh coffee and a grinder.  The bed was clean and cozy and the apartment was fresh and airy (two ceiling fans).  They kindly leave pamphlets and informational books and brochures about the island and we were sure to visit several of the choice restaurants advertised in our room (Annie's - delicious organic burgers/fresh cocktails made with organic fresh squeezed juice & creative cuisine and Mi's Italian Bistro for Valentine's day which exceeded our expectations).  Their style and care really shines through in this guest house.  We will be sure to stay with them again if ever visiting the sunny side of the big island.  Fantastic place at a great extremely fair rental price.

We had a wonderful stay at Hale Kea last week. Set in a very nice neighborhood, it was quiet & relaxing. The kitchen is well - appointed and we were able to make many meals there. The unit has everything you would need to feel at home and comfortable. We enjoyed sitting out on the lanai and watching  humpback whales breaching in the ocean.  There were also many birds to watch in the yard. The location is a good starting point for many daily adventures - sight seeing, beaches & snorkeling  opportunities are close by, walking trails, or a short hop gets you into downtown Kona. Thomas & Simone are excellent hosts.  We loved staying here.

If you're looking for a peaceful and relaxing place to stay, away from the touristy craziness of Kailua-Kona, then this is it. Clean and quiet w a fantastic lanai and view, we really enjoyed this studio apt. Each morning and night we sat on the lanai and watched the whales play. Be sure to go to the Costco in the area to buy your fresh fish and fruit. Can't beat the prices and its a quick drive from the apartment. Thanks, Thomas for a great first airbnb experience! Mahalo!
This studio is amazing!  We stayed in 5 or 6 places across 3 island and this was the most modern and convenient place we stayed.

Thank you so much Simone and Thomas I had a wonderful time at your apartment! It is just as lovely as described, perfectly equipped and Simone and Thomas are great hosts. They gave me good recommendations for food, laundry etc. and drew my attention to the fact that my rental car was loosing oil and wouldn't even let me help to remove the oil! I highly recommend this place to everybody who wants to go to Big Island!

This is a great space with view.  Room was very clean.
Tasteful decor adds to pleasant stay.  We enjoyed our visit.

Thomas' place was absolutely beautiful! It was very clean, comfortable, quiet and had more than enough room for two people. The view was amazing as well! We wished we could have stayed to enjoy it all longer!

This is a very beautifull apartment, very neat, very modern with all the amenities you need.   Our hosts, Simone and Thomas were most welcoming.  It was the best apartment we rented during our 3 weeks trip to Hawaii.
Now for the view:  extraordinary.  Waking up every morning and seeing the sea was so relaxing for us.
I would not hesitate to recommend this place and if I we ever go back to the Big Island this is where we would stay.
Thank you both for being part of our fabulous vacation
Richard and Christiane

We stayed here for the first two nights of our trip to Hawaii. It was really great! The place was immaculate and well set up. The view is beautiful, the bed is comfortable the directions were super easy to follow and we had a great time! We are sorry we didn't get to meet Thomas and his family but we will definitely be staying in their studio again when we return!! Thank you :)

Thomas and Simone are welcoming hosts and the condo is great, very modern, clean and comfortable. The lanai is lovely and the Sunset neighborhood is so named for the excellent views of the sun dropping into the sea. Their neighborhood is quite posh and has a sort of LA/Malibu type of feel. Less than 10 minute drive to the beach or to the main strip of town.

Don't miss Da Poke Shack (we ate there three times) or Kahalu'u beach which is great for beginning snorkelers.

This was our first accomodation on our Hawaii trip and it was the best! Everything was perfect. Thomas and Simone are so nice and friendly. The condo is large enough, we liked the bathroom and we had everything we need. The location was also very nice and we liked Kona. Our trip couldn´t start better. We recommend this condo to all. Thank you. Sabrina & Stefan

We stayed at this studio for two nights and it was the best accomodation during our trip to Big Island. Thomas and Simone are great hosts, very nice and they do their best to make you feel confortable (I can assure they achieve it!).
The studio is really nice, very big, clean, modern and confortable. The views from the lanai are great and there are both a table to dine and two armchairs where you can relax. 
The place is very near Kona and the best spots for snorkeling and diving.
On our next visit to Big Island we´ll do our best to stay here as many days as we can!

The first word that came in my mind when i stepped in the house was "Waaaaaaaw !" The house is so great, tastefully decorated, great bathroom, a very nice vue... I would love to be living here for real !!! Seriously do not hesitate, this place is an awesome place and the location is perfect (close to the airport, captain cook, all the nice beaches, volcanos...)
Thomas was a perfect host, carefull but not instrusive. He even apologized for the noisy neighboors one early morning (who were not that noisy and it was not that early) !
Thanks a lot for sharing your lovely place with us and see you in paris this summer :)

Our (unfortunately only) two-night-stay in Simone and Thomas' appartement made our stay in Kailua-Kona to a very special highlight. We loved the perfect composition of good taste, comfort and warm hospitality. We are really enjoyed the great view from the lanai and the quiet nights. Thank you Simone and Thomas. We hope we will see us again.
merci encore à la famille White pour un accueil chaleureux! tout était parfait!! Très propre et très bien situé.  Nous avons adorer!!

This accomodation was really perfect! Very clean and modern style and everything in it, which we needed!
If we would travel to Kona again, we would like to stay in Hale Kea for sure!

Thanks to Thomas and his familiy for this nice stay!

We loved the Hale Kea!  It was hands down the best airbnb place we stayed at while we were in Hawaii (both the big island and Oahu)!  It was so spacious, in a great, quite neighborhood, and just felt like home.  Thomas was very welcoming (via airbnb notifications) but also gave us some distance, which was great since we were on our honeymoon!  I'd totally recommend this place to anyone, it was so comfortable, clean , private, and welcoming.

We loved the apartment. It is tastefully decorated..looks just like the photos..and it is very comfortable. There is a lanai with comfy chairs and a table so that we could sit outside to eat, read, relax and appreciate the great view! It's also quiet and very private. Thomas's home is in a very nice neighborhood yet close to everything (short drive by car), It is also a great neighborhood for walking. Thomas sent us a video to show us how to access the apartment, where to park, etc. that was very helpful! Our only regret is that we didn't get to meet Thomas and his family in person! I highly recommend staying with them.

We loved Hale Kea
The decor is an inspiration. 
The location convenient.
The view from the lani is breathtaking.
And the bed is the most comfortable I have ever slept on.
There are so many intuative and thoughtful little touches here and there - it is as though as I desired something it appeard.
Having read the other reviews before arriving at Hale Kea we had high expectations - and we were not dissapointed!
If the resorts are not your thing but a little bit of luxury is what you are after do not hesitate to book this place.
2 days was not enough.
Thank you Thomas

We had a lovely stay at this very nice apartment (2 nights only). Unfortunately, we did not get to meet our hosts personally as they were themselves on vacation, but everything was very well organized (thanks, Thomas, for all the helpful instructions prior to our visit - that was excellent). We also loved the lizards on the lanai... they are so cool and so much fun to watch!

We had a great time at the appartment of Thomas. Everything was very clean and perfectly equiped. We loved the evenings on the lanaii and felt like at home. We really want to recommened a stay at Thomas house. We definately would come back.
Thank you Thomas and Simone for 5 great days!!!
Best regards,
Martin, Emil and Julia

This is an absolute gem of a house! So comfortable, conveniently located, and beautifully decorated. Thomas was so incredibly helpful and welcoming, could not have asked for a more gracious host. We would love to stay here again!

The appartment of Thomas was the most beautiful.place I've stayed at with airbnb so far. Thomas was a great host even though we didn't have the chance to meet him. He explained very specificly how to reach the place and also gave us many recommodations as what to do. I would love to stay there again - awesome view and stylish and proper place. Just loved it with all the details - conditioner, beach towels... everything you need.

The apartment was exactly as depicted in the images and it was a lovely place to stay in Kona. It has a completely separate entrance and the location was high enough in elevation that it was cooler, but an easy drive down to the Kona coast.

Unfortunately, Thomas and his family were on vacation so I didn't get to meet them in person, but they provide a great video orientation once you book your listing and are happy to provide any information or resources you may need during your stay.

Best bnb stay ever!! The place look exactly as In the picture! The place had everything you needed as ex. Coffee, a very comfy bed, towels, shampoo and a beautiful Lanai where you van eat breakfast/chill In the evening! 
Location is perfect to everything, but you need a rental car! We had some problems with the Wi-fi, but Thomas solve that problem immediatly (Even though he was on vacation)
Will recommend this place to everyone, and would definetly stay here again if we come back to Kona!
Have stayed at many airbnb places, but this is nr.1 :)
Thanx Thomas and Simone for a great stay!

Aloha, 
Hoang and Ola from Norway
The studio is such a delight to stay in! Tastefully designed and very clean, located in a perfect location in the heart of Kona with an ocean view porch. We loved it!
Nous avons été bien encadré. J'aime bien le site Airbnb.

Thomas' place was great! It was clean, spacious, beautifully furnished, private and quiet (it's exactly as shown in the pictures, including the great view from the porch). We give this place our highest recommendation, and we'll definitely stay here again if we return to the Big Island (hopefully soon!).

This place was comfortable, beautiful, clean, and quiet. It was close to Kona beaches (about 10-15mins drive) but it allowed you to enjoy some quietness and nice coast view. We enjoyed our stay there and Thomas was very welcoming and helpful. The checkin instruction was very clear. He also provided a list of recommended restaurants and beaches to go and it was helpful.

Hale Kea was absolutely beautiful, and was the perfect place for us to stay on our honeymoon. The pictures don't do it justice!  The location was great, close enough to wherever we wanted to go, but far enough away to enjoy the quiet.  During the time we were in Kona there was a hurricane threat.  Thomas and Simone were so helpful in helping us prepare for any unfortunate weather, and made sure we had everything we needed.
We had a wonderful stay in Hale Kea - the unit was beautifully furnished with great facilities. It felt cozy and comfortable and we appreciated all the little extras Thomas provided.

Our stay at Hale Kea was fantastic. Convenient and safe location, beautiful and clean home with lots of amenities including freshly ground kona coffee. My mom would not stop talking about how well designed the house was. Mahalo for a memorable experience.

Great studio with an awesome view. It felt like home! Althought I didnt meet Thomas in person, he was great and sent us everything we needed to know to get to the apartment and nice places to go in the area. We meet Simone and she was also very nice.

Just one word :
AWESOME !!!!! If you have the chance to book this unit- DO IT ! U will never forget it... The accomodation has everything u need and more :) Well furnitured, and a breathtaking view from the lanai - especially in the morning !!

Thomas and Simone are great hosts, very very helpful and so lovely. 
MAHALO

Holger&Ramona

My best Airbnb experience by far! Thomas was the perfect host and his place is exactly as pictured on Airbnb.  I'm a bit of a germ-a-phobe, even when staying in nice hotels, but Hale Kale was truly immaculate. The hosts really took great care to think of anything a guest would need while staying on the Big Island.  The kitchen was stocked with coffee, tea, a blender, a toaster oven, a microwave, an electric kettle, a small vacuum and a small fridge.  The closet provided us with plenty of room to hang our belongings and store our luggage in an organized fashion.  The murphy bed was very comfortable, we slept like babies throughout our entire stay there.  Next to the bed was a small desk containing very helpful guidebooks and a list of recommendations from the host himself.  The bathroom was fully stocked with anything you might need, including plenty of towels, shampoo and conditioner, sunblock and disposable razors.  What really stood out was the lanai with an incredible view of the ocean.  It was such a treat to wake up to every morning.  It was especially helpful that beach chairs, a beach umbrella, a boogie board and water noodles were there for us to use, saving us money and making our beach time even more relaxing and worry-free (if that's even possible in Hawaii.)  There is no A/C but the ceiling fans, a small table fan and the breeze from outside kept us cool.  We had the opportunity to meet our hosts briefly.  They were very welcoming and friendly and were very quick to respond to any email communication.  Staying here was like a dream. =)

Aloha Thomas und Simone,
wir haben uns sehr wohl bei euch gefühlt. Alles war perfekt!
Die Wohnung ist super ausgestattet, super sauber und hat eine super Lage mit tollem Ausblick. Wir können diese Wohnung nur weiter empfehlen und würden jeder Zeit gerne wieder kommen. Klasse war auch, dass  uns auch ein Boogie board und ein Sonnenschirm zur Verfügung gestellt wurde. Vielen Dank für alles.
Mahalo
Mascha & Marcel

We loved our stay in Hale Kea and definitely recommend Thomas' apartment if you are visiting Kailua-Kona.  The apartment is fantastic and very well finished and is definitely a relaxing place to stay.  Whilst in the area we definitely recommend snorkelling at Two Step (half hour drive) and doing a dive/snorkelling tour to see the Manta Rays. Both are excellent and Hale Kea makes a great base to use for our stay

We loved Thomas and Simone's place and location so much we didn't want to leave. Our gracious hosts provided everything you would need for a visit to Hawaii--a boogie board, swimming noodles, beach chairs, an umbrella, plush towels, coffee...I even needed an emery board for a snagged finger nail and found one in the bathroom! We loved having breakfast and reading on the lanai with an expansive view of the ocean--an even better view than what can be seen in the pics. 

We had stayed in a town near Volcano for three nights prior to our arrival in Hale Kea, and couldn't have picked a more perfect location for  exploring the west and north parts of the Big Island. It was very close to Kealakekua Bay for snorkeling, the touristy Alii Dr, and one of our faves--the Kona Brewing Company. From Hale Kea, the drives to South Kona, Waimea, the Kohala coast, and Hawi were easy and also beautiful. 

Although we didn't get a chance to meet Thomas, we chatted with Simone, who was kind and lovely. We would definitely love to stay here again.

What a wonderful condo! Perfectly clean and has everything you need during a stay on the Big Island - beach equipment etc. Simone and Thomas were great and really nice hosts, provided helpful tips and even let us check out late (thanks a lot!) before our flight back. Wonderful lanai with ocean view and cute green regular visitors (geckos)! Perfect!

Lovely place, great apartment and awesome view from lanai. 10 of 10 points
Defintely a place to be in kona

Thomas and Simone's place was just heavenly! Spotlessly clean, and the set up of the studio works very well and feels very spacious. There are beautiful views of the ocean from the balcony and it is super quiet. The room kept cool with fans, no air conditioner needed. We would definitely stay again!
Place was great. Liked how the space was laid out, clean, great view, close to everything, would definitely stay again.
A beautiful and comfortable space.  Hosts are welcoming and extremely responsive both prior to and during stay.  Highest recommendation.

Many thanks to Thomas and Simone for kindly welcoming us at Hale Kea. The place is very charming and wonderful: you can find everything you need and the place is very quiet and spotless. We really appreciated the interior decoration. The studio is bigger than it looks from the pictures and the terrace has an amazing ocean view.
We highly recommend Hale Kea for a relaxing and enjoying stay on Big Island.
If we are lucky to come back in Hawai we will for sure choose Hale Kea !

My husband and I stayed at Hale Kea for 5 nights during our honeymoon. The studio was beautiful and clean, and the view from the lanai was wonderful. The information and guide books were very helpful, and it was great using the provided beach towels and umbrella. Overall, it was an excellent stay!

Thomas and Simone were really really helpful. Simone was really friendly and took time to explain to us the neighborhood as well as some history of the island.

We really felt among friends which is a truly nice feeling when you are travelling. Again I would like to thank both of us for making our stay much easier and nicer than expected !

Es war der Hammer!Tolle Wohnung, super Einrichtung, herrlicher Blick aufs Meer und in der Küche alles da was man braucht! Wir hatten eine super Zeit und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt! Wir kommen wieder das ist sicher!!!
Absolutely the!  My daughter and I loved this, and it was voted best place by a teenager. Gorgeous and relaxing. Thank you so much.

Thomas and Simone have a real sanctuary up in the hills of Kona. Waking up every morning with a stellar view of the ocean was just fantastic. The space was beautiful and Simone was very helpful during our stay. We could have taken up residence there! Thank you again and we hope to return! Mahalo!

I'm sorry we didn't get to stay longer. This place is so wonderful. It's better than the pictures and very well appointed along with such a peaceful  place to be. Best airbnb I've stayed in. Thank you, Thomas and Simone

If you travel a lot, you know your lodging choice can make or break the trip...I have to agree with all the other travelers who have posted positive reviews for Hale Kea, it's a great place to stay.

Modern, clean, quiet, private plus a fantastic sunset view off the back deck.   Perfect for two people.  Conveniently located for exploring the island. I hope to be able to come back on my next trip to the Big Island.

Our host contacted us several times prior to our trip, providing advice on our upcoming trip, what to bring, and places to see. The place was delightful -- just as pictured and described.
Beautiful view over Kona and the Pacific Ocean in a nice neighborhood with quiet street. Our hosts were very accommodating to our needs during our stay, giving input on restaurants and tours to take. ... and it was fun watching the geckos chase their pray in the evenings.
We felt very welcome at Thomas and Simone's. The unit was just beautiful and had everything we needed. It had a beautiful view and was just a short drive from town.

Hale Kea has an amazing view of the ocean from where you can see the sunset. The home is even more beautiful in person, very comfortable, spacious, clean, and contains everything you need for a stay on the Big Island. It is very conveniently located and close to places where you can snorkel, paddle board, etc. We enjoyed every minute of our stay here. If we came back to the Big Island, we would definitely try to stay here again.
Thank you Thomas and Simone for sharing your home with us.

My husband and I recently spent nine lovely days at Thomas and Simone's beautiful Hale Kea.  The spacious and tastefully decorated suite was beyond our expectations for the price.  We loved it and would definitely go back.   We have since recommended it to a number of friends and family back home.  Having a kitchen with everything we needed to prepare some of our meals saved us money and it was lovely to sit out on the large lanai with a glass of wine and watch the sun go down.  We enjoyed the adorable geckos trying to catch their dinner while we ate ours.  Hale Kea is located on a hill above Kona in a beautiful neighbourhood of high quality homes.  The view from the lanai is fabulous and the serenade of the many local birds was lovely.  Unfortunately we did not meet Thomas but our contact with Simone was enjoyable and helpful.  On the last day she let us keep the chairs  and beach towels until dinner time so we could enjoy another day at the beach before our very late night flight home.  All in all a fabulous holiday!  Thank you so much Thomas and Simone for allowing us to share your home.  Mahalo.  Rosalie and Tony Neville, Kelowna, BC Canada

Ein absoluter Traum!!!
 Die Wohnung ist liebevoll und edel  eingerichtet, es ist alles vorhanden, wie z. B. Shampoo, Toilettenpapier, Sonnencreme, vollständig eingerichtete Küche, Strandartikel, Reiseführer und vieles mehr. Die Wohnung ist gross und sehr sauber. 
Thomas und seine Familie sind sehr nett und nehmen einen freundlich auf. Wir haben uns hier wirklich sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig und von der eigenen Terrasse hat man einen tollen Blick auf das Meer und abends kann man den Sonnenuntergang genießen.
Diese Wohnung hat keine fünf sondern mindestens sieben Sterne verdient.
Einfach ein Traum.

Everything was perfect with our check-in.  The detailed instructions and video was all that we needed.  We did not meet our host until leaving after the 3rd night, but we knew from their welcoming letter that they were close at hand if anything was needed. Their residence was beautifully decorated and clean.  The view down to the ocean from the deck was stellar. It was the perfect location for us to explore the Kona area and head north for a day.
Our host met us upon our arrival and explained where things were in the home.  She was very welcoming and when we needed a little extra time for late check out she was very accomodating.

Hale Kea was an absolutely beautiful place for our stay in February, 2015. Thoughtfully-designed and outfitted; immaculately clean; and with excellent privacy. The kitchenette is well-equipped to enable basic cooking for two; and although on-site laundry is not available, Simone provided soap and instructions to a great local laundromat (we took advantage of their drop-and-go laundry services, which was nice). 

The neighborhood was quiet, set up on the hills over Kailua-Kona and giving us wonderful views of the water from the lanai. The location served us well as our starting and ending place for diverse excursions around the island (we stayed here for the entirety of our trip, excepting one overnight near the Volcanoes National Park). 

Our interactions with our hosts always left us feeling welcome and cared for. Because of their unobtrusive hospitality, the beautiful spaces, and the location, we would return in a heartbeat.

Our hosts were amazing. The suite was very comfortable, nicely decorated and a nice quiet escape from the busy tourist area. The hosts have the suite well equipped with everything we needed for our stay. We especially enjoyed the tourist information

Our host was not in the area when we came but gave us all the information we would need to get into our apartment and left suggestions for things to do and places to go for meals, snorkeling and drives.  Also, before we arrived we communicated with him by email and he called us during the week when we had a further question.  The apartment has everything you could need and the lanai with the view of the ocean made it hard to leave everyday.  We appreciated extra touchs such as coffee, tea and sugar left for us.  The neighborhood was great and cooler because of its elevation.  
Dan and Carol

Would highly recommend this place! Great location, lovely hosts (only met Simone), clean and spacious with your own private access to come and go as you please.
They had snorkel gear/ reef shoes/ pool noodles/ boogie boards there to use (if you would like to) and they also had a really helpful Kona guidebook on the table, which we used to visit places we never originally planned to go to in our itinerary!
Thank you! We absolutely loved your place and the Big Island!

We loved staying at Thomas' apartment. It was a great location, close to everything on Ali'i drive but not in the bustle. We loved watching the whales while drinking our morning coffee. They also had beach gear for our use which we took advantage of, chairs, snorkeling masks, an umbrella, & water shoes. Beautiful home, we would definitely stay here again.
Die Wohnung war genau so schön, wie sie dargestellt und beschrieben war. Wir haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt. Bei der Ausstattung hat wirklich nichts gefehlt. Sofort wieder!

Wonderful accommodations! Hands down the nicest AirBnB we've stayed in during our Hawaii vacation.  Incredible views and super nice and helpful hosts. The video description sent before our stay was so helpful. Mahalo!
Superschöne Unterkunft, stilvoll eingerichter und absolut sauber! Der Gastgeber ist äusserst hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. 1a Beachausrüstung verfügbar. Immer empfehlenswert!

WOW, just wow!  I've stayed at nearly 20 airbnb locations and have enjoyed all of my hosts, but I believe Thomas and his place top them all.  The place is amazing!  I actually think the pictures don't even do it justice, the place is that nice.  Thomas has hosting down to a science and I think he has thought of absolutely everything.   Being able to borrow all of the stuff for the beach was so handy.  I was really glad we were able to meet Thomas and his family before we left.  He's just as nice of a person as he is a host.  Such a cool guy, I could have talked to him for hours.  If we're ever fortunate enough to go back to the Big Island, we won't even look for other places, we'll just book Thomas' place!
This is a beautiful guest studio that is classy and comfortable. The setting is in an safe and quiet neighborhood with a view of the ocean.  Very comfortable bed, great shower and complete kitchen.
Beautiful studio just as depicted. Yes,  everything was there for a welcoming stay. Location peaceful and beautiful.

One of the best airbnb experiences we had with my husband! It's the best location on the Island: close to everything, but quiet. It feels like luxury resort and I want to say big thank you to our hosting family for such a great job they did with this guest house. It has everything and feels cozy, super cool view from the patio makes every morning inspiring for new adventures!

I booked the condo for my parents' first trip to the Big Island.  They loved it! 
They raved about the condition, interior design, and how everything was perfectly set up for them.  Thank you for making their stay so positive.

This was our best AirBnB experience on the Hawaiian Islands.  Everything was perfectly prepared - including upfront a small video. This makes arriving very easy. The guest condo has a luxury and beautiful interior and is very quiet. We enjoyed the breakfast on the lanai - great view and relaxing. This place is a great location to stay on the west coast Big Island.
Our stay was great.  Just as advertised, we were very comfortable and were able to use it as a launch pad for the whole rest of the island.
This apartment was in perfect condition, comfortable, easy to find and get to, great view and the hosts were friendly. Highly recommended!
