What an amazing spot! Nestled on hill looking over the the ocean, we couldn't ask for more! Everything in our room was immaculate and we both thoroughly enjoyed our stay here! I only wish we could have stayed longer! The best accommodation of our trip!

We had such a great time in Hawaii. The condo is very beautiful and looks just like the pictures. We enjoyed sitting on the lanai eating dinner, watching sunset ,and watching the geckos run around everywhere.

The apartment is very nice and clean and the view from the terrace is amazing. It's located in a residential area so you have to drive a little to supermarkets, bars, restaurants etc. but that was no problem for us.

My husband and I stayed at Thomas' little cozy house for two nights and we loved it! This was our first airbnb experience and it was awesome! The house/apartment itself is quite big, has a fridge, a sandwich grill, a little seating nook with a tv, a super comfy bed and a huge bathroom. Everything was very clean and at night it was very quiet and relaxing. Thomas even provided us with snorkeling gear, beach towels, a beach umbrella and a beach mat. The apartment is located conveniently and you can reach the downtown area within 5-10 minutes, and beaches are close as well (tip: go to the makalawena beach, that one is a bit further away-about 30 minutes, but totally worth it! For dinner: the kona brewery was also delicious!) 
I forgot one of my shirts at the place and Thomas was so kind to text me and let me know about it, so I was able to pick it up later. Great host, great airbnb - highly recommended! We hope we can be back soon (especially because that would mean another hawaii vacation;)) Thank you for everything Thomas

Beautiful place to stay while visiting Kona! Thomas had every guidebook and map one could need to explore this side of the island! It was great to have a beach umbrella and goggles to use while staying there. Everything inside the home was exactly as pictured, very clean. Definitely would recommend to anyone traveling to the Kona area!

This was our first Airbnb experience and it turned out to be better than we anticipated. The pictures, descriptions and reviews were accurate. The place was located  in a very nice, quiet,  safe and convenient neighborhood. We enjoyed the water view and privacy.  The apartment seemed to be designed, decorated and equipped with lots of thoughts and care. All you need to do is just to show up and enjoy your vacation. The guide books and print outs were very helpful. We especially enjoyed amazing view on our last day at Daylight Mind Coffee Company which I found from Thomas' print out. Thank you Thomas for making our vacation a memorable one. 

Issaquah, WA Kate and John

The space was beautiful, warm, inviting, conveniently located and quiet! We were made to feel very welcome by the owners.  This is a special place - perfect way for us to end our stay on the Big Island! Thank you!

Thomas's apartment was in a nice neighbourhood, very easy to get in and out of by car. It's close to the Kona beaches (5-15 min), close to the airport (~25 min) and close to the Captain Cook coffee plantations. The apartment itself is clean and comfortable with a kitchenette & fridge that made it easy to cook at home rather than eating out all the time. It was perfect for me as a single person & would work well for a couple. It would probably be a bit tight for a family with grown children - the apt is open plan. Thomas supplied beach equipment like snorkels and a boogie board.

Very beautiful, spacious appartment. Many helpful details: snorkeling gear, boogie board, guide book, information about stores in the area, good knives :) ... Even adapter, sun block and body lotion.
We enjoyed the openness of our hosts very much. If it was less far to travel to back to Big Island we would come again next year :)
Christine and Darius, Switzerland

This was our first airbnb experience, and surely we have been spoiled by this property. Thomas and his wife Simone have thought of everything to make your stay here complete as if you were at a hotel but with the island lifestyle in mind. The views are spectacular! And the cute little lizards greeting you everyday were such a treat. There were lots of travel recommendations ready as well as snorkel and other water gear for your leisure. Thank you so much for having us, we are so grateful to have found this beautiful property.
Wow tolle Wohnung, sehr sauber und eine traumhafte Gegend mit wunderbarem Meerblick.

Our stay at Hale Kale was exceptional.  Though accurately represented in the photographs, Hale Kale was actually more beautiful and comfortable than we expected.  My wife frequently uses Air B&B and Hale Kale was a gem.  Expect a luxury getaway with all the comforts of home.   As other guest have commented we truly appreciated the high quality beach items and the well appointed kitchen.
Very pleasant and comfortable stay. Good ocean view from the deck. The host is very accommodating. Definitely a 5-star plus. =)

We have enjoyed staying at Hale Kea. The apartment located in a nice and quiet residential neighbourhood is beautiful, clean and well equipped, and has a spacious bathroom. We enjoyed having breakfast on the lanai and watching the little green geckoes. The views from the lanai are stunning. Snorkel gear and other beach gear were provided and good guide books and other travel recommendations were available. Hale Kea is ideal for a stay on the west coast of the Big Island and Thomas is a great host.  We highly recommend this place. 
Anne-Marie
Aug. 2015

This apartment is fantastic and Thomas and his wife were wonderful hosts. My rental car broke down in their driveway and even though Thomas was overseas, he was responsive and super great helping me out. His wife waited out with me while the car was towed and made sure I was all set. Really appreciated that they were accessible during a stressful time. The apartment is beautiful and a great place to stay.

We had a very nice stay. The appartment is very tastefully decorated, spacious, a nice view down the hill on the ocean. The bathroom is not a cubbyhole with a sink but as nicely done as the room. Also everything you need if you feel like cooking ( the oven is small, do not buy a big frozen pizza) . Simone was very welcoming   We very much enjoyed our stay. 
Bel appartement, arrangé avec beaucoup de goût. Salle de bain spacieuse, dressing, cuisine équipée,
Terrasse avec vue sur l'océan, affaires de plage à disposition. Un logement à recommander

My stay at Thomas and Simone's was very comfortable and pleasant. Their home is beautiful, located in a picturesque neighborhood and very close to beaches and restaurants. Simone was very warm and welcoming and I enjoyed talking to Hannah as well. Ocean view from the Lanai was gorgeous. I will definitely be back. Mahalo, Thomas and Simone!

I'm an Architect and I loved the taste of the overall design.  
This house looked just like the pictures that I saw in the web site.
Nice timber flooring with ceiling fan.  
The house is very cool even during the summer.   
Breakfast at the Lanai with ocean view was breath taking. 
This house also had Hotel like amenities (First aid kit, towels, shampoo and conditioner, body board, chairs and umbrella for the beach, snorkel set for two

Very good, very clean, eco friendly and the view is just gorgeous. Location was perfect, about a 10min drive to the beach and shops. Thomas was very friendly and helpful. My husband and I had a great time on our honeymoon there. We would definitely stay there again the next time we're on the big island.

Thomas made us feel welcomed by greeting us when we first arrived, and letting us know everything was ready for us.  He also had a print out welcoming us and letting us know basic information.  The listing was exactly the way it looks in the pictures and even more beautiful in person.  The neighborhood was nice and quiet and easy to get to places from. A great location.

We had a great stay at Hale Kea. Thomas and Simone were warm and welcoming and even loaned us a basket of beach toys and books for our baby. The space is roomy and we particularly enjoyed the spacious lanai and bathroom. The location is perfect for exploring the areas north and south of Kona - plus, the neighborhood is beautiful and quiet. Highly recommend!

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Thomas und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet, sehr sauber und mit allem ausgestattet, was man braucht. Auf der Terrasse kann man mit einem schönen Blick Frühstück und Abendessen genießen. Thomas stellt zudem Strand-Equipment zur Verfügung, das man in der Region sehr gut nutzen kann.
Eine wirklich tolle Unterkunft. Mahalo!

Thomas and Simone are phenomenal hosts. They take a lot of pride in ensuring the studio is clean. Their attention to each and every detail were well thought out. The studio is located on a quiet neighborhood and in a centralized location close to airport, Ali'i Dr, etc.  The view each morning is amazing! That is one of the thing we will certainly miss much. Check in process was simple and well communicated. Thomas is available within a phone call's reach in case you needed anything. Thomas was also very kind to give us tips and advice on our hike in Mauna Kea. I would certainly come back again if we get a chance. Thank you for hosting us. Mahalo!

Thomas and Simone’s apartment is really the perfect place to enjoy holidays. The interior is really tasteful furnished. Tips and information for activities on the island can be found in the apartment. The location of the apartment is excellent to start several activities. 
Thomas we unfortunately could not meet personally but Simone was very helpful and it was great to meet and talk to her. We also appreciated a lot the fruits we got from her garden. Thank you very much.
I definitely would recommend this place to enjoy sunsets on the terrace and simple to have a great time on the island.

Thomas and Simone are perfect hosts.
They are very relaxed and easy to communicate with. 
The suite was very nice and well equiped.The room was just as described or even better. Especially the beach equipment was awesome and very usefull.
You have a beautifull from the terrace. Perfect for breakfast !!
Great stay, unit just as described. Lovely hosts.
We stayed 2 nights at Thomas' place. The studio has a great view in a quiet area. the place was clean and very comfy! We loved it. Many thanks.

What an absolutely stunning place to stay! Clean, tidy and with sea view, our host Simone and Thomas were more than accomodating.  Soon after we arrived we met Simone and followed the instructions Thomas had left for us and soon went on to set up our little home away from home.  It was wonderful, thanks folks.

Die Unterkunft "Hale Kea" ist sehr stilvoll eingerichtet und hat uns gut gefallen. Die Ausstattung lässt nichts zu wünschen übrig; es ist alles vorhanden. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. Es ist ruhig, die Lage ist einmalig, Blick von der Veranda auf den Pazifik, besonders die Sonnenuntergänge haben es uns angetan.
Wir hätten gern noch ein paar mehr Handtücher im Bad gehabt. Aber das ist auch schon alles, was wir anzumerken haben. Alles gut!

We felt welcomed, partly by the introductory video--totally high tech! The studio was larger, even more visually appealing and comfortable than I had anticipated from the photos. My husband was stunned by how gorgeous this studio is upon arrival when one first sees it. We were impressed by Simone’s responsiveness when I had inquired about the disposal of fruit scraps (to avoid fruit flies) while there. Even though the studio is attached to the main house, 
the sense of privacy is remarkable. We really enjoyed spending time on the back lanai with an ocean view, whether watching the sun set or having a tropically-inspired breakfast… The bathroom has been recently remodeled and is exquisite! The rental's location is high and therefore cooler than downtown Kona. It’s well located near the highway, the Captain Cook area, coffee country as well as Kona. There's snorkel gear to use while there as well. Mahalo Thomas and Simone!

Both the location and the space are wonderful. A lot of care and thought has gone into designing this space and providing for every possible need, including beach items, aloe vera, etc. Instructions for parking, getting into the unit, etc. were perfect - everything was easy. We felt very welcome and had a lovely time. Beyond that, Thomas' recommendation for a breakfast spot (Daylight Mind Cafe) was spot on. 10/10 - would stay with Thomas and Simone again in a heartbeat.

We had a wonderful stay! The house was beautiful (and uber clean)! The view of the ocean from the lanai was breathtaking! The location was great and felt pretty central to everything. We especially loved the huge, modern shower!

Thomas is a very kind and considerare host who had prepared anti-mosquito, snorkel gear and beach cooler and chairs. Fully equipped in the house. The whole place is clean and neat. Lanai is facing the ocean. so romantic place. Thomas is tolerant when we asked to borrow the snorkel gear after checking out. Highly recommended in Kona.

One word..PERFECT. Good location, clean, quiet, and stunning view. Thomas supplied the suite with things we didn't think we needed until we came across them. He sent us a short you tube video prior to our arrival instructing us where to park, recycle, and with the entrance code. Impressive. During our time in Kona, dengue fever was present. Thomas left us bug repellent as well as an info sheet educating us on everything we needed to know about it. His attention to detail could be rated at a 5 star level. There is no question we would stay with Thomas again. Book now before someone else does.

Hale Kea was the perfect place for my fiance and I to stay during our time on the Big Island. The place is tastefully decorated and the bed was comfier than expected. I loved the suggestion packet of places to visit that Thomas had on the front table. I loved how clean the apartment was and that everything you need was available from dishes to beach towels and more.

Our experience at Hale Kea was fantastic from start to finish.  The reservation, communication and check-in were all straight forward.  There was even a video sent to me explaining where to park, how to get in, etc.!  The place was clean, new, and well appointed.  Everything was perfect from the nice sheets, comfortable bed and pillows, plates, cups, to the basket of children's books, toys and towels for our children.  Everything we needed was there.  We loved staying there and would stay there again in a heartbeat.

Thomas has great beautiful property with gorgeous view. We love it waking up with all the sounds of talking birds. Thomas provides us with great snorkling and beach gears and also ponchos just in case. What a thoughtful host!  Thanks so much. We highly recommend his place.
Everything exactly as described.  The apartment was clean and beautiful.  We had a terrific time and had no issues.  We would definitely recommend and stay here again!  Aloha!

Our 14 day stay was relaxing in this little ohana off the main house ,the space very clean and comfortable and well outfitted and just a shown in the photos. Lovely breezes on the lanai , which  overlooks kailua bay. You must have a car and be prepared to drive for groceries, restaurants  and shopping, but the upside is a very quiet and relaxing area  .There is a lovely designated walking trail just down the hill for  those morning walks/ jogs. The hosts are warm and welcoming but also respect your space.  We would recommend this with pleasure.

We were very impressed with the accommodation. It felt like home. Every little detail was well taken care of.  The view was beautiful, the room was large and the bathroom was modern, clean and all little provisions were there. Just a lovely property.
Amazing place to stay! Great views to watch sunset! Super convenient location! Would stay there again in a heart beat!!!

Hale Kea is beautiful & immaculate.Thomas has thought of "everything", although it is not right at the beach, Thomas posted a guide book which I basically used for everything from eating to exercise. He even checked up on me from the mainland to make sure all was well.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

5 STAR SHOWER BTW :)

Thomas was a wonderful host who reached out to us well in advance and was super helpful throughout our stay. The property itself was clean, well-maintained, and full of nice touches like extra sunscreen (needed) and even aloe vera gel for the inevitable sunburn (much needed and appreciated!). Would have no hesitation about returning.

Host made us feel welcome and explained the best things to do around Kona and surrounds. Apartment has lovely views of Kona surrounds and ocean. Quiet area but central location. Good snorkeling gear. Good bed

Pat and I very much enjoyed our stay at Thomas and Simone's studio during our visit to the Kona area.  Thomas and Simone are wonderful hosts. Simone was very welcoming, and she was very helpful. The studio is clean, comfortable, quiet and well-appointed. The studio has a balcony with a gorgeous view of the ocean, and is located in a lovely neighborhood just minutes south of Kona. We would gladly stay with Thomas and Simone again.

An absolutely perfect spot for exploring the west side of the Big Island! The kitchen is well stocked for making breakfast at home before heading out. The lanai offers a beautiful view and sounds of the ocean. Don't miss Da Poke Shack. For an adventurous and breathtaking hike, check out the city of arches hike. Pure magic!

Thomas war der perfekte Gastgeber, bei Fragen half er sofort. Die Wohnung war ideal für den Besuch von Kona. Perfekt eingerichtet mit allem was man benötigt. Auch für den Strandbesuch. Alles sehr sauber.
Kann es voll weiterempfehlen.

Thomas's place exceeded our expectations. It was clean and well equipped. Thomas was very thoughtful and provided everything a visitor would need. I will definitely recommend this place to all my friends who are intending to visit the big island of Hawaii.

Das Appartement war ein Traum! Liebevoll bis ins kleinste Detail eingerichtet fühlt man sich sofort willkommen und wie zu Hause! Simone & Thomas waren tolle Gastgeber und vor allem Simone hat es uns mit ihren Tipps für die Umgebung super einfach gemacht sich zurecht zu finden! Wir kommen gerne wieder!

Lieber Thomas, liebe Simone,

danke für die äußerst spontane Unterbringung in eurem wundervollen Appartement!
Um 20.00Uhr abends konnten wir uns noch für eine Anreise am selben Abend anmelden!

Das Appartement ist sehr schön und modern eingerichtet, sehr sauber, und eine tolle Lage zur Erkundung der Umgebung und des Städtchens Kailua-Kona!
Strandeuipment wie Boogie Board, Schnorchelausrüstung, Handtücher waren vorhanden!
Schön ist es auch auf der Veranda mit Meerblick zu frühstücken!

Wir danken euch vielmals für die tolle Erfahrung!

Marja und Philipp

Everything about this home was beyond expectation, it was awonderfully comfortable, exceptionally clean, beautifully relaxing home, lanai, and ocean view.  I hope to return to explore even more of this glorious island .

This is beautiful place and even nicer than the pictures. It was impeccably clean, comfortable and had everything I needed, plus many extras. I especially loved the shower. Just a lovely place with a fantastic view.

The entry and balcony were separate from the main living quarters, which we liked for privacy reasons.  The space was lovely, really nice bathroom/shower, there were 3 or 4 fans to keep air circulating besides the ceiling fan, the kitchen was nice, and the view was amazing.  We found that it was pretty close to other little city hot spots and enjoyed our stay.  Also, it was very clean, wifi was quick, and Netflix was provided:)

We had a great stay here. The studio was perfect for our little family. The extra amenities, the ocean views on the balcony, a ton of guide books, birds chirping and geickos (Website hidden by Airbnb) provided a wonderful Ohana experience. The place was extra clean with an amazing shower. Would definitely recommend and would stay again.

Very beautiful place, looked exactly as described in the pictures.  Extremely clean and was very quiet with amazing views of the ocean on the lanai.  Highly recommended if you want a great place to stay while exploring the Big Island!

Our stay at Hale Kea was simply amazing! The studio is the perfect place to stay, very spaciuos, super clean, a nice well equipped kitchen, an awesome bathroom and stunning ocean views from the beautiful lanai. The are tons of things provided in the studio that make the stay even better (beach equipment such as chairs, umbrella, boogie board etc, guide books, maps, fan, iron...), simply everything you need is there. The location is very good as well, only a short car ride away from town or the nearby beaches.
Simone and Thomas are great hosts, super friendly plus they were always there for questions and were very flexible regarding our needs. A big Mahalo for that!
I can highly recommend the studio to anyone staying on the Kona side of the Big Island. Best airbnb experience so far!!!!

Hale Kea is a lovely location with thoughtful amenities included.  The view was great and in a nice quiet neighborhood.  This was the first time my husband and I used Airbnb, and Thomas and Simone set the bar for the future.  We had a clean and relaxing home to come back to after a long day at the beach.  Would love to return if the White's will have us.  Unfortunately, we didn't get to meet them because they were out of town.  We miss this place already!

We had a wonderful stay at Hale Kea.  The space was beautiful and we enjoyed the view from the balcony.  We especially appreciated the snorkeling gear, guidebooks and maps, and the well-equipped kitchen.

We had an amazing time in Kona and Big Island. The ke' ena from Thomas is marvelous, well sorted, nice decorated, good located with a wonderful view. You will find everything you need in this apartment, even a good snorkeling gear and a very usable bodyboard. We can recommend this accommodation to everyone.

We can recommend Thomas as host as well, he is answering every question as quick as needed and always strives to give you the best tips.

Thank you White Family for giving us those unforgettable memories!

Hale Kea was the perfect place to start our week long honeymoon in Hawaii. The apartment was spotless and had all the comforts of home. It was also refreshing to have a quiet place to stay in a residential neighborhood away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Kona. While we didn't get a chance to meet Thomas and his family, the guest material that he provided was very helpful and gave us great suggestions on what to do in the area. We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again and would highly recommend this guesthouse to anybody else planning on visiting the Big Island!

Amazing studio with superlative view. Thomas attention to details is extraordinary.He was on holiday and we didn't met him. Just a misunderstanding concerning the arrival that Thomas solve from the other side of the world. Great stay.

We can say that our stay in Hale Kea was the BEST stay during our whole honeymoon!! This apartment is just amazing, and so is the host Thomas! Unfortunately we couldn't meet him because he was on holidays too. On our last night we had troubles with the wifi but Thomas fixt it righ away even being on vacation himself!!

We stayed at Thomas's beautiful home for our honeymoon in Kona. It was a perfect fit for us and absolutely met all of our needs. The apartment itself is a great size for couples, with a cozy nook to relax with DVDs or books, a comfortable lanai for morning coffee, and an amazing bathroom with a spa-like shower. Like most rental spaces in Kona, there is no air conditioning, but there were fans, etc, and with the windows open, a lovely breeze that made for a nice stay. Thomas was expertly communicative - he provided videos and emails beforehand that detailed arrival logistics, and he also provided a folder with hand-selected local recommendations for food and activities, including running and swimming routes, which my Ironman husband greatly appreciated :) We truly felt like we were being welcomed into someone's home. Location is excellent; just a few miles from the busy Ali'i Drive where many shops and restaurants are, and only a few blocks away from a darling family-run coffee estate that offered lovely private tours (Kona Blue Sky Coffee). Communication was swift, clear, and friendly, and even though he and his family were on the mainland during our stay, we felt that we could have reached out with any issues. We would whole-heartedly recommend Thomas's apartment, and we were very sad indeed when we had to leave! Until next time! Maholo!
Beautiful and big apartment. Equipped with everything that is needed for a vacation. We can definitly recommend it!

Staying at Hale Kea was my first Airbnb experience and I must say everything was absolutely perfect! Thomas and Simone are definitely super hosts who have an immaculately maintained home and who think of everything to accommodate their guests to the most minute details. The arrival instructional video, the guidebook which lists restaurants, beaches, and even the nearest urgent care center (which thankfully we didn't need!), Netflix, sunscreen, insect repellent, beach towels and gear and even nail polish remover were all thoughtfully provided. Hawaii is such a beautiful place and staying at the Whites' home with its phenomenal grounds and view added to that beauty and the Aloha spirit. If you plan to visit Kona Hale Kea is the perfect place to be. Five stars!!!
Mahalo!
Thomas was a great host. The apartment was great. Shower was amazing!

First off, omgeeeeee - the shower! Out of this world. Worth staying there to experience it alone. But otherwise, wonderful home. Quiet street, great location. Had a lot of nice little extras that I don't recall being mentioned in the listing - hair dryer, cooler, toiletries, snorkel gear, boogie board. A+ experience.

Great little place to stay! My wife and I loved it. Close to Kona and the airport. The apartment was clean and they provided all the extra amenities one would need for a Hawaiian vacation. Also, the view of the ocean was breathtaking. We will definitely stay here again when we are back on the island.

Hale Kea was absolutely perfect!  The location was spectacular and the accommodations were exactly what we were looking for and more.  It is the best Airbnb experience we've had.  Thomas is an extremely thoughtful host and made it super easy to navigate the island and check in/out.  We loved the suggestions he made for local eateries and things to do.  I wish we had booked our stay for longer, but since we didn't, we want to come back to the island and make sure we stay here.  We highly recommend this place!

Everything is perfect about this location. 
Every detail is catered for and you will be guaranteed an amazing time on the big island if you stay here :-)

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in dieser wunderschönen Wohnung. Es war super sauber und ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Simone spricht fließend deutsch, was für uns eine angenehme Begrüßung war.
Das Apartment ist gut ausgestattet und geräumig, der Balkon lädt zum Frühstücken draußen ein. Auch Strandausrüstung steht zur Verfügung. 
Wir können die Unterkunft und Gastgeber nur wärmstens weiter empfehlen.

My husband and I were in Kona for a last minute outrigger race trip. We loved Thomas' place. It was super clean, peaceful and quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed the view from the lanai. Thomas thought of everything from providing snorkel gears, ponchos, to extra beach towels and chairs. We'll be back for sure!

다음에  코나에  오게된다면 고려할 숙소  1순위 입니다
청결도  위치  세심한  시설  조용한 환경  특히  샤워기가  넘  맘에듭니다  
테이블 위에  있는  게스트 노트를  발견하고 방명록을  쓰지 않을수  없었습니다 ^^

We just loved staying here. The home was lovely, the location and cost were great, and the ease of communicating with Thomas put my mind at ease for my first ever Airbnb experience.

The welcome video, snorkeling gear, and local tips were also extra perks, and of course I can't leave out mention of the fantastic shower. 

Thanks for everything. Mahalo!

Just 3 words :
Great great great !!!!
We stayed only 2 nights but we loved this place !
All is done to feel us like at home.
Thank you !

Thomas has thought of absolutely everything: our stay couldn't have been easier or more comfortable. I love that he sent us a little video of where to park, where the stairs are, and a quick tour of the apartment! I'm a visual learner, so this was extremely helpful in getting us settled in. All the amenities were thoughtful and useful, everything was extremely clean, and the location was very quiet. And my goodness, the view they have from the lanai! A fantastic start to our honeymoon. Thank you Thomas!

Thomas and Simone's apartment is beautiful, just exactly as described. Its a really luxurious apartment with a great view and a good location to explore the island. Just a great place to stay! We felt very welcome and enjoyed every minute of our stay.

Thomas and Simone are excellent hosts. Everything that you could possibly need, they have it ready:) we needed a headlamp for the volcano hike, they have it. Need to snorkel? No problem, the gears are ready.
The home is well designed and super clean. Bathroom/shower is amazing. Also love the TV area, it's so relaxing to watch some Netflix after a busy day of touring.
Overall, we loved it and will come back:)

Superb location with incredible views. It has everything you need for storage, cooking, relaxing - you name it! The home is private and has its own entrance.

Thomas is an amazing host, very friendly and helpful.

What a gorgeous private space to stay on the Big Island. My guy & I thoroughly enjoyed our time with a quiet lanai for breakfast looking at the ocean, the Murphy bed was super cozy, the shower was beyond my wildest dreams (seriously, can I take it home?!), and it was super clean and fully stocked for us to stay. We even forgot a few things in a drawer and they sent a care package to Oahu for us on our next stop. HIGHLY recommend staying in this adorable space.

Good for comfort rest it is!
The place was spacious with big size bathroom. The neighborhood was quiet so we could take deep sleep during our stay. All gadgets and kicheneries were clean. Overall it was a great choice to stay here. Thank you Thomas for this wonderful house!)

The location is perfect; there's an ocean view. The place is clean, which is all I really ask for when staying somewhere. I like that there is a boogie board, snorkel gears, cooler, umbrella and chairs available. Our experience was easy and enjoyable so Thank you Thomas and Simone!
Beautiful apartment, had a fantastic time in Thomas and simones place!

Wunderbare Unterkunft mit Sicht aufs Meer. Perfekte Ausstattung und sehr sauber, es hat an nichts gefehlt. Die Gastgeber sind sehr zuvorkommend und nett. Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und können die Unterkunft wärmstens weiterempfehlen!

We had a great experience at Thomas' place! It was our first airbnb and we weren't disappointed. The view was amazing. My husband and I watched the sunset at the lanai and it was pretty cool. There are so many great things about this place including the bathroom, kitchen, and all that space for a great price! I highly recommend Thomas' place!
Close to dive and equipments provided!

Aloha Thomas, thanks a lot for your beatiful, clean and very nice appartement. We missed nothing there! The shower in your bathroom is very great, the sunset you can see from the balcony is fantastic. Thanks a lot, we hope we can come back someday. Mahalo, Susi
Our every need was anticipated. Very nice sleep appointed. Quiet neighborhood.  Fantastic shower

My husband and I stayed in Thomas' place during our honeymoon on the big island and we both agreed that we couldn't have picked a better place. The studio was spacious, clean, and had a ton of great amenities-- a full kitchen, a beautiful ocean view from the lanai, a really nice shower, and more. There were also lots of small extras that we didn't know we needed until we got there, like a binder full of restaurant recommendations, ponchos (which saved our butts big time), and all the beach gear you could ever need. Thomas puts a lot of time into making sure guests have everything they need for a fun and comfortable stay, and his going above and beyond made our trip that much more memorable.

The neighborhood was nice and quiet and close to all the shops, restaurants, and attractions in Kailua-Kona. My husband and I rented a car and drove to multiple spots on the island, but Kailua-Kona was definitely the best area to stay in. By the end of the week it was starting to feel like home. We were so sad to leave!

We very highly recommend Thomas' place for anyone vacationing on the island of Hawaii-- it'll be your best AirBnb experience yet.

This was a great place to stay in Kona.  The location was excellent and the view of the ocean was terrific.  The apartment had plenty of room, a comfortable bed, nice shower, and everything we needed including beach chairs, snorkel gear, cooler and rain ponchos.  Everything worked well to make our stay comfortable.  Highly recommended for two people.

Everything was as anticipated from the Airbnb listing. Check in was super easy, simply park your car and punch in the door code given to you. The studio was plenty roomy for my wife and I, and even has us questioning the wasted space in our own home. The studio was in a perfect location, a few minutes from every convenience you could need in Kona. The best beaches and snorkeling spots are ~30 minutes away. We enjoyed our stay and are already planning our return to the Big Island.

Thomas's studio was just as advertised. A clean, tranquil spot with a solid view of the Pacific, a well-organized open interior and a short drive from restaurants and beaches. Thomas was quick to respond to any of our questions via text even though he was on the mainland. Oh yeah, and the shower was bomb. 5/5

Perfect, Perfect, Perfect!!!
If you have a plan to stay in Kona area, do not hesitate to choose and meet Thomas family... I regret why i staied only 2 night at here.
Definitely i will stay again and even more days!
What a beautiful place and people they are~~
Perfect space! Great views. We loved the shower and netflix. Easy access to Kona and freeway to other areas of the island.

If you really want to relax in comfort, this is the place. The apartment is decorated with taste, it is very clean and the sunsets from the lanai are spectacular. We did not want to leave. Lilly and Hao
Such a perfect place to stay. Ocean view, beautiful balcony, clean room. We were here for three days and the place definitely made our trip more comfortable and memorable. Highly recommend.

Wonderful place! we definitely recommend staying at Thoma´s place. The apartment was extremely clean (what for us is really important), it is cozy, nicely decorated, and the view from the terrace is amazing. We met Simone and she was really nice giving us tips of what to visit around Kona. It was a great experience. 
Silvia and Joan

We had a wonderful stay at Thomas ans Simone's studio on Big Island. The studio was spotless clean when we arrive and it was a very easy check in. Close to everything, so the location was perfect. Wonderful beach towel to bring to the beach. Everything was just perfect and it was so relaxing to sit on the lanai and have breakfast or a drink in the afternoon. I will be back!

Ich kann (und werde!) diese Unterkunft nur wärmstens empfehlen: Das Apartment ist großzügig geschnitten, äußerst liebe- und stilvoll eingerichtet und lässt keine Wünsche offen. Mahalo, Danke und thank you - wir kommen gerne wieder!
Les photos sont très représentatives de la réalité. L'emplacement, la décoration au gout du jour et la tranquilité sont les points forts de cette maison.

Excellent place to stay and explore Big Island from. Thomas and Simone are great hosts and the place is amazingly  well kept and provides a  fantastic ocean view to enjoy your morning breakfast or just a relaxing snooze after a busy day of exploring the Volcano Park  and Observatories at Manu Kea. ...Tony&Cecilia

We stayed for 4 nights in this nice little flat and enjoyed it very much. The apartment was spotless clean, tastefully decorated and good equipped. We didn't meet Thomas in person during our stay. Nevertheless he was easily accessible online in case of problems or questions. Overall we recommend his place.
Beautiful apartment with lovely decor , fabulous sunset views , quiet . Just a short drive to the beach or snorkeling areas.

Everything was so thought out, from the extra beach equipment, to the baby bathroom stuff, and even the welcome guide. We also enjoyed some of the Hawaii books they had. The Lanai and it's view were probably our favorite parts.

Our stay here was very enjoyable. The apartment was the perfect size for me and my husband, in a great location, and came with everything we could have needed for our stay on the big island (beach chairs, towels, umbrella, and snorkeling gear)!

Our stay was fantastic! The lanai is gorgeous and my fiancé and I enjoyed our coffee and meals there. We loved watching the nature with a distant-ocean view. After staying at other airbnbs, we have realized how equipped Thomas and Simone's place is with amenities (especially cooking-related). Another big plus was that there were snorkels, fins, a body board, beach chairs, a beach umbrella and towels - this was so helpful! The shower is also very nice and upscale. The entire studio is beautifully furnished and decorated; it is well taken care of. Highly recommend!

We loved everything about this place. It was decorated so tastefully and very classy. Amazing touches throughout and we didn't want for anything. I would highly recommend this place over any other place around. Location was terrific and so were our hosts.

Thomas's place was extremely comfortable. All amenities and extras were provided. My fiance and I had a great stay, we wish our stay was longer! The location is close to town but secluded enough that it was relaxing after a long day out. We didn't rent a car but the Big Island has Uber now and it was only a 10 dollar fare going into kona town. We really appreciated all the instructions and recommendations left for us plus the little treats! Thank you Thomas and Simone for a wonderful stay!

What an awesome find! My husband and I were so impressed with the location and beautiful apartment. Everything was beyond our expectations! Thank you,Thomas, for your hospitality and making our vacation so perfect! Will definitely return!
Super place.  The shower is top notch. Great location.

This studio is perfect to get away and relax. It's clean, spacious and quiet. The mornings were so peaceful. I loved waking up in the morning and sitting out on the lania while drinking my coffee. It's the perfect way to start your day on Big Island. Even though it's private you're still only 5 minutes away from town so getting around isn't a problem. I hope this place is available the next time I come back to Big Island.

Thomas's place was in the perfect location for our stay in Kona. It was close to restaurants, beaches, and points of interest on the west side of Big Island. The suite was clean, cozy, and just the perfect size and fit for two people. The shower and the patio with the view of the ocean was our favorite part! We will be sure to book again with Thomas on our next trip to Kona.

Sehr schönes kleines Apartment, sauber und modern eingerichtet.
Nette Gastgeber, die leider selbst nicht da waren, sich aber laufend nach uns erkundigt haben.
Wir würden auf jeden Fall wieder buchen.

Great place that's within 5-10 min driving distance to all the shops, restaurants and attractions. We found the place so clean and everything was thought of so that our stay was comfortable and taken care off. We made good use of the snorkel equipment provided and had a great time snorkelling at Turtle Beach.
The house has everything you need. great.

Ein Top Unterkunft für Leute die nicht die Party in der Stadt suchen, sondern einen guten Ausgangspunkt für die Attraktionen um Kona. Die Räumlichkeiten sind sehr modern, geschmackvoll, schön und sauber. Super sind die Strandutensilien die zur Verfügung stehen, wir etwa Schirm, Flossen, Sesseln oder Kühlbox. Auch die Terrasse ist ein Highlight. Dusche ist großartig. Hier passt alles

My wife and I really enjoyed staying at Thomas' house on the Big Island.  It was quiet, neat and clean and had lots of little extras ( like beach chairs, towels and an umbrella.)   We were able to make breakfast everyday in the kitchen and the ceiling fans kept us cool at night.   We had a wonderful honeymoon and would recommend his house to anyone planning  trip to the Big Island.
Nice host! Perfect place for a short visit.
Awesome place to stay! This was our first airbnb and it was a wonderful experience. Gorgeous location, clean apartment, close to everything... I could go on.

Prima verblijf . Voldeed helemaal aan de verwachting. Moderne ruime studio van alle gemakken voorzien. Ook is er  een prima strand uitrusting. Zitje buiten lekker comfortabel, net als binnen. Heerlijk bed. Met door open geslapen, wel,prima horren.  WiFi perfect.

The 2 days and nights we spent in this  beautiful residence will be kept in our memory forever as one of our best vacations ever. We truly like the place more than any other top rated hotels we've been staying so far.  The house was sophisticatedly and yet practically decorated with harmonious colors and had everything we need. We would definitely stay there again next time we visit Kona.
Very nice, tidy place. Perfect for a couple staying a few nights in Kona. The use of snorkel gear was great and the place was so quiet.
Easy to find, very clean and feels like a penthouse suite :-)

My husband and I LOVED our stay. It is located in a residential area where it's minutes away from Alii drive. There are a lot of really great places to eat around the area and it is very easy to get around if you have a car rental.

As far as the house, we loved it. You can see the ocean from the backyard and there is a nice porch you can hang out on. There is a kitchen, nice bathroom and the bed is comfortable. Thomas did not miss anything, he provides everything for you as if you are staying at a hotel. 

This was our first time in Hawaii and we really enjoyed it.

This studio was absolutely perfect. We could not have asked for more during our stay. It was comfortable and homey and had a ton of added touches that made everything so much easier. I highly recommend staying here if you're looking for a peaceful yet centrally located Kona vacation spot :)
This home is very tastefully decorated. Close to snorkeling and Kona. We loved it!
Thomas is a great host. Good location. Very private. Had a very relaxing stay. Shower is AWESOME!  Will be back.
we enjoyed staying lovely house with terrace . everything is well prepared  for kitchen, aqua activity and  outdoor.  thanks a lot for kind support of thomas and his faimliy
Very clean, scenic, and accommodating studio! Close to town and the neighborhood was very quiet, and also felt safe enough to take a solo walk at sunset
Perfect hosts, location and amenities. Would stay here again.

We enjoyed staying at lovely house.
Gorgeous location and very clean. We enjoyed breakfast and dinner on a nice rerace.
singing morning birds  besutiful sunset  cool wind,  we loved there.

Es war so toll, besser als wir von den Fotos erwartet hätten. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber, die Küche gut ausgestattet und das Bad / Dusche ein Traum. Wir waren leider nur zwei Nächte und wären gerne noch länger geblieben - aber unsere Rundreise ging weiter. Wir haben uns rundum wohl und heimisch gefühlt. Die Gastgeber waren auch sehr freundlich und haben uns sehr nett empfangen.

Gorgeous, very clean and well equipped apartment. Loved the balcony and shower. Convenient location to main tourist attractions. Highly recommended -
 thanks for a wonderful stay!

We really enjoyed our stay in Thomas' unit. The room was clean and offered many amenities. The bed was comfy, the kitchen was very well stocked. Would definitely stay again. Thomas even notified us when we left a personal item behind and we were able to retrieve prior to departure. Location is very convenient to the sites of Kona.

The place is really nice, quiet, clean and cozy.
Everything you need to enjoy your stay.
No air conditioning. Steep stairs. Difficult for elderly people to carry bags up & down. Unit very clean and well stocked.

We spent the week here (Mon-Fri) and it was amazing. The apartment was perfect, filled with every need you could think of. Maps and tour pamphlets on the coffee table, condiments and coffee in the cabinets,  extra phone chargers to use in the desk drawer, and a lovely welcome book created by Thomas and Simone giving local recommendations on places to eat to places to go see. Along with the beautiful view, the little fulfillment pieces of the apartment set this Airbnb above the rest. Would definitely recommend this apartment stay.
房東非常貼心,房子內的設施非常多且完整,居住地點方便且安靜,景色也很美
Thomas’ place is beautiful and thoughtfully rearranged.  He provides great info on the area and is quick to respond to questions.
Thomas’s place is perfect, quiet with gorgeous views and just a few miles from all the action in “downtown” Kona. The house is fully stocked for all your needs.
還可以 歡迎大家來住

Aloha Simone&Thomas
Very nice accommodation in a great hillside location with sea view. Lovingly furnished and very clean.
aloha
Sonja&Harald

Thomas and Simone’s place was the perfect home away from home! Very open and spacious, and terrific bathroom. They provided everything we could possibly need - even bug spray and aloe, which we definitely needed after our days in the sun. Great location, beautiful view, A+!

This place is amazing! The location is perfect. It is close to the shops and restaurants in Kona, but in a nice neighborhood away from the main strip. The view was absolutely stunning and we watched the sunset from the lanai. The property is beautiful, clean, perfectly furnished, with everything you could possibly need for a stay in Kona. The shower was awesome too!
Thomas's and Simone's place was absolutely amazing!! I feel lucky to have stayed here.

This place is very close to downtown. Lanai has a great view facing the waterfront. They also had guidebooks that helped us plan our time here. The host provided us Snorkeling goggles and tubes. This place is close to Kahuluu which is super great for Snorkeling. Mauna Kea beach and Honaunau is also very close by and it's very good for Snorkeling. All the amenities are super new and modern (really cool shower).

Their guidebooks also had suggestions for breakfast. We found that helpful as well. Try out Daylightmind Cafe.

We are definitely stay here when we come back!

We had a wonderful stay in Kona. The room was the best we have ever had: big room with all you need, amazing view on the sea and very clean. Simone was so helpful and give us so many tips. We can recommand it to everybody, we come back if sure!

Super Unterkunft als Ausgangspunkt für Unternehmungen rund um Kona! Wunderbarer Meerblick von der tollen Terrasse, die Wohnung ist sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Bad und Dusche sind ein Highlight. 
Super sind auch die Strandutensilien wie Flossen, Schirm, Kühlbox etc. Hat perfekt gepasst. Jederzeit wieder!
Beautiful studio with magnificent view. Well supplied. Highly recommend. Would love to stay again.

We enjoyed our stay at Thomas’s place very much. It’s very clean and nicely decorated. The bathroom is spacious and the shower is super! We brought our 18m little girl with us. So we did use the kitchen a bit for cooking pasta. We also used the beach umbrella. It is great. Will come back for sure next time if we come visit Kona again in the future.
非常美丽干净舒适的房子｡大岛基本都是自驾,所以交通也相当方便,出门不远就有浮潜,沃尔玛和美味的当地美食｡房东推荐的浮潜地真的相当棒,比檀香山的水干净很多,人也不多｡而且房东提供了很多便利的设施包括浮潜工具,请一定定好好使用
전체적으로 만족했습니다!!  빔에 조금 무서운거 빼고는 ㅋㅋ 와이프가 나가질 못하네요!!
Exceptional location with everything you need to enjoy the Kailua Kona experience. Thomas and Simone are great hosts. Do be prepared for stairs. Just wonderful!

If you are looking for a wonderful and relaxing place to stay for a day or even a week, then this is the place for you. Clean and open space with a lanai that overlooks the ocean. Thomas and Simone have created a warm and welcoming environment and include several thoughtful amenities for their guests.

Love this place! They have everything you need for a vacation, sun cream, beach chairs, umbrella, snorkels, really convenient and handy. We cooked one time and the even the cooking pots are high quality, something you would buy for your own home. Definitely recommend it!

Tom & Simone were fantastic hosts! We had a great stay in their beautiful home, which was conveniently located near the Kona Airport and town center. Would definitely stay again on my next trip to the Big Island. Mahalo!

We loved the gorgeous sunsets overlooking the water from our private lanai. Check in was super easy and smooth. Great communication from Thomas - he sent us an email with our key code months in advance. He also sent us a video explaining where to park and how to get into the apartment, which was very helpful and made check in easy. As other reviewers have noted, the shower is great. It was perfect after getting home cold and wet from the Manta Ray dive! Thomas also provided all of the amenities including shampoo, conditioner, soap, sunscreen, and beach towels. The location is close enough to everything, but far enough off the main strip in Kona, which gets crowded and noisy. Highly recommend!
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは中心街に近く､車があればすぐに買い物にも行くことができます｡料理道具も充実しており､自炊にも最適です｡部屋自体もとても綺麗で清潔､ﾀｵﾙも充実していました｡ぜひまた泊まりにきます｡

Thomas's place is a lovely, stylish studio in safe and pretty neighbourhood,  with an ocean view. It's perfect for a couple. You will be within a 10 min drive from shops and restaurants, and have everything needed, including some beach supplies. We had great experience!
Spectacular apartment, with all the amenities you need and more. Very easy check in and plenty of privacy with an amazing view!

Thomas's place was a great central location to many of the big island's best beaches and sights. Check in and out was easy. It was comfortable and clean, with a great sunset view. We also really appreciated how well equipped the space was in all ways needed. Boogie boards, rain ponchos, chairs, snorkeling gear, beach  umbrella and more. There also was coffee! Thanks Thomas!

Place is awesome...set up on hill just off the main highway. Quiet and secluded from the main house, it offers a great view of the ocean and sunsets.  Perfect spot to explore the west side of the island.
Great place to stay. Clean and quiet. Excellent communication and easy experience.
房东好贴心,房间干净整洁舒适,给我们很多出行建议,我们常常在房间外的长廊上边吃早餐边看海,风景优美~~房东也非常热情｡住宿设施齐全,像自己的家一样温馨｡然后以后有机会,我们还会选择住在这里

This is THE place to stay in Kona. You will not find a more comfortable and inviting space for your vacation. The view from the lanai is fantastic for morning coffee or sunset dinners. The kitchen was stocked with everything you would need to cook a good meal and the attention to detail was fabulous.  We will come back again when we can and definitely recommend this place to our friends.

Thomas and Simone are a fantastic couple to rent from. Their unit is very clean and comfortable, close to great restaurants and attractions. They respond quickly to emails. They respect your privacy, yet are quite willing to meet you if you want. Perfect deck for your morning coffee too!!

This studio apartment was an amazing place to stay. My wife and I stayed here for two nights of our honeymoon and loved it. So much space and really well decorated. Just a great laid back but luxurious place to spend some time.  Highly recommended.

We appreciated the quality of everything—from the towels and kitchen furnishings  to the bed. This place has a lovely lanai for early morning coffee, and comfortable sofa and chairs for cozy reading at night. The plentiful kitchen amenities surpassed expectations.

This was an amazing place to stay. It was sparkling clean, had outstanding decor, excelllent ocean view, many extra amenities and a quiet neighbourhood for those that enjoy walking. As mentioned in many reviews, the shower is outstanding. We would not hesitate to rent here again.
I can't recommend Thomas's place enough, the location, views, amenities and service are all first rate.

Thomas & Simone are great hosts. The special touches and cleanliness of the apartment were outstanding.  The lanai is a great place to relax after a long day at the beach. The view is amazing.  The apartment is centrally located near White Sands Beach, other attractions and great restaurants.

Thomas did a great job for the check-in process. Ahead of time he sends out a video with all the important information about the unit and how to get in, where to park, etc. Very helpful, since we are both very visual. Such a great idea. 
And the unit is outstanding on so many levels. We loved sitting on the lanai and enjoying the wonderful view down to the ocean in the mornings and the evenings for the sunset. While being centrally located (10 min away from all the main restaurants and shops) and close to the main street, the unit was very quiet and private. We also loved the spacious shower and the well equipped kitchen. We would definitely come back and highly recommend this space.

This place was beautiful. Wonderfully decorated and located with all the amenities you need and extras for all your needs (including a poncho for any jungle visits). The bed was super comfortable. Definitely recommend staying here of your ever in need of a place in Kona.
We loved staying here! The views are gorgeous and everything was so clean and welcoming. We would definitely stay here again.
Wonderful unit in an excellent location.  Communication and check-in were a breeze and we had a lot of fun staying here!  Would recommend highly.
Wir waren begeistert von der Ausstattung und der Qualität. Super sauber und sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet.

Awesome place in a great location. Everything was spotless and the bed was super comfy. Super fast communication and easy check in. Lots of advice for local spots and things to do. Amazing view of the ocean. Would highly recommend :) there is a trampoline that we wanted to jump on but were unsure if it was allowed :) lol you won’t regret staying here. They allowed early check in and late check out as they could which was much appreciated. And chocolate caramel Mac nuts was a nice touch :)

A perfect set up for our planned (and unplanned) activities.  The apartment exceeded our expectations; the hosts were kind and helpful.  If our travels have in the Kona area again, we'll certainly book Thomas' place.

Wir hatten 2 schöne Nächte bei Thomas und Susanne. Alles tiptop. Die Wohnung ist wirklich toll und es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Die Wohnung ist mit sehr viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet. Toller Echtholzboden im Wohnbereich ;-) Und die Dusche ist der Hammer. Riesig! Auch die Lage ist super. Nicht weit von Geschäften und schönen Stränden entfernt. Und davon hat Kona ja einige zu bieten. TipTop. Immer wieder gern.
tolle Gastfreundschaft

Thomas and Simone were responsive, flexible, and more than willing to help us out in any way possible.  There place is beautiful and very cozy.  Wouldn't hesitate to stay with them again!
-Aloha

El apartamento es preciso y está todo puesto al mínimo detalle.
La terraza es perfecta para desayunar o cenar tranquilamente mientras disfrutas de las vistas.
Muy recomendable, un sitio para repetir y disfrutar de pasar alli varios días
Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in dieser super ausgestatteten und sehr komfortablen Wohnungen. Die Lage ist zentral und Thomas und Simone sind sehr nette und aufmerksame Gastgeber - Rundum perfekt!

Thomas place was a great place for my wife and I to end our honeymoon. Despite the haze from the vog, the view was still great look at from the balcony. The place has everything you’d need for a short or long stay. We especially enjoyed the futuristic looking shower. They have lots of books and guides to help you get around Kona as well as snorkeling and boogie boards.   We would not hesitate to stay here again and highly recommend d the place.

This is a lovely place. The Decour is very tasteful and well designed. The balcony overlooks the coast and is a pleasure to sit at when having morning coffee. The hostess that greeted us was very supportive and accommodating and a pleasure to meet. The accommodations were the best part of our entire hallway visit. I would not trade it for any other experience.

Lovely and stylish! High ceilings, lots of wonderful amenities to borrow such as beach items, chairs, sunscreen etc! Loved the wonderful private ocean views, and large deck. Clean, comfy, lovely modern and upgraded shower fixtures. We preferred staying here versus a hotel. Cozy, comfy, spacious and good location. Loved staying here, would come back again!
Our stay at Thomas and Simone’s place was outstanding. Stunning view, wonderful apartment, perfect host last but not least best shower ever!!!
Die Unterkunft war wie beschrieben und hat uns positiv überrascht :-) jedes Detail hat gestimmt nur zum empfehlen

This is the most wonderful living experience I have ever had! Everything is well-prepared and the view of th room is really breathtaking. If you have the chance to visit Kona, I will recommend you to choose Thomas's apartment!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Thomas’ lovely place.   Thomas always responded promptly and courteously to our communication.  The check-in and checkout processes went very smoothly, due in part to Thomas’ thoughtful planning and organization.  Dining and chilling on the lanai after a day of snorkeling, while gazing across the ocean down below, added a lot to our experience.   Fresh coffee beans and a coffee grinder were a bonus.  We hope to have the pleasure of staying here again.
Great location! Super quiet at night. Great outdoor deck for sipping Kona coffee and watching the ocean in the morning!
This is a very large, beautiful studio apartment. It’s private, and the view is gorgeous. Excellent!!!  The bed was so comfortable!

Thomas house is well equipped. You lack nothing! There is a thought behind every detail from kitchen utensils to beach gear. The lanai, with a great view of the Pacific, is the place for breakfasts and a cold beer after snorkelling. The neighbourhood is very quiet, the only thing you hear is the wind and (Hidden by Airbnb) ing birds. The fans in the ceiling keep the right temperature. The bathroom is big and modern. If you want to leave your car behind and go to Kona for a night out the Uber taxi is 12 USD one-way. Thomas’ house is relaxing, practical and comfortable. Don’t miss it if you plan to go to the Big Island. It’s a great basecamp for activities on the west coast. We do recommend Thomas’ house.
Peter and Kerstin
Sweden

A wonderful place to set anchor while in Kona. My boyfriend and I were only in town for few days, and this place was one of the few that could accommodate our dates. And it was perfect. We would spend the day diving (only ten minutes away), have dinner at a nearby restaurant (on the way home, also very close), and were relieved to go back to a place all to ourselves. We appreciated the lengths our host took to make the stay convenient and enjoyable. The space has everything a couple of adventurers could need - bowls and utensils for instant ramen, towels to help wash off the ocean spray, and bandaids for bumps on the boat.
Lots of local tips, smooth check-in/out, lots of amenities, extra touches. Would come back

Wir haben 3 Tage in Kailua-Kona verbracht und hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in dem Appartement.  Alles war so wie beschrieben, die Ausstattung ist super (zum Kochen war alles vorhanden,  Stranduntensilien und sogar Sonnencreme war vorhanden) und der Balkon ist wirklich sehr schön mit einem tollen Ausblick auf das Meer. In 5 Minuten ist man mit dem Auto an einem größeren Supermarkt und an einem sehr schönen Strand.  Auch für Ausflüge ist die Lage der Wohnung gut geeignet. Sehr zu empfehlen!

My husband and I stayed here for part of our honeymoon and we really enjoyed our stay! The ample information (magazines, brochures, menus, maps, etc.) that Thomas provided was very beneficial! The unit was very neat, clean, and exactly as pictured. We anticipated that it would be awesome, but the unit exceeded our expectations! My husband and I were very impressed! I would highly recommend staying here!

This is a great place to stay. You can tell that Thomas care about providing a good experience for his guest. I would recommend it to anyone wanting to have a relaxing vacation in a quiet place with a good view.
Beautiful view and a luxurious apartment. Highly recommended.

Thomas & Simone's place was just as it was advertised. Very clean, large space for a studio, private, and very comfortable. It has a beautiful ocean view yet was just far enough away from town to escape the crowds. It was easy to check in and out using the keypad lock. Perfect for a couple or a single. We would book with them again without hesitation.

A little haven in paradise. Everything from the decoration to the selection of birds to follow in the mornings from the terrace were splendid! The communication with Thomas has been smooth, the studio is impecable and has everything one could possibly need. The recommendations provided were well thought and even the neighbors  and the grey cat that popped by were nice! We would love to come back one day! Thank you! Gracias and Kiitos :)
Very lovely appartment and a gorgeous view from the balcony! We would stay here again!

My husband and I enjoyed staying at Hale Kea during our trip to Kona. The studio is just minutes away from many points of interest, and we found it very convenient! We appreciated the amenities (and more) provided (i.e. rain shower, TV, refrigerator, beach towels, sunscreen, aloe vera, etc.), and felt very comfortable there. We also loved the beach/sunset views! Thomas is very quick to respond to any questions or concerns you might have. We will definitely stay at Hale Kea the next time we visit the Big Island. Thank you, Thomas and Simone!

10/10 for this place! Highly recommend this private gem to anyone visiting on the Kona side of the Big island. Perfect location- near everything. Biggest thing was waking up to that gorgeous view off the balcony/deck. The place was sparkling clean as well. Would love to stay here again if we ever come back to visit!
Simply the best!  If this place isn't booked, don't hesitate to lock in your time here.

Die Wohnung ist ein Traum. Es ist wirklich alles vorhanden was man benötigt vom Sonnenschirm, schnorchelsachen, über Kühlbox und sogar Sonnencreme. Es fehlt an nichts. Die Wohnung ist mit viel liebe zum Detail eingerichtet aber das Highlight ist der Balkon mit dem Blick aufs Meer. Wir vermissen es schon jetzt dort zu frühstücken.
Wir haben Simone kenngelernt, sie ist super lieb und hat uns super Tipps für Ausflüge oder Lokalitäten gegeben.
Wir kommen sicher wieder.
Viele Grüße Alice & Daniel

Great location and size. Everything looked new and was clean. Shower was amazing! We borrowed some snorkeling gear and beach towels from Thomas and really enjoyed our time. Gets a little warm at night but they have plenty of fans to keep cool.

Hello,

we can highly recommend this accommodation without any exception! It is in a nice area with great ocean view from the lanai and offers everything you could possibly look for (e.g. snorkeling equipment). The rooms are very well and cosily equipped and nicely decorated. Everything was very clean. The contact to Simone and Thomas was uncomplicated, everything was well prepared. She gave us some recommendations on our arrival and had a chat with us. 

Tank you, Simone and Thomas, for the great time we had in your house.

With best regards,

Katja & Christian

For a sunset view and a location convenient to the Kailua-Kona area, this studio is great. Checking in was easy and there was a book with detailed information about the area right beside the door. We even found a "The Big Island- Revealed" guidebook on the desk, perfect for exploring the island with. The kitchen was perfect for our short stay, and was stocked with the necessities. On check in it was a bit toasty. The mid-afternoon heat can be tough, but we made use of the fans provided and were more comfortable. If you're used to climate control and brisk air conditioned escapes from the heat, you won't find it here. When the windows are open and the breeze is going, it can be nice though. Overall, a pleasant place to spend part of our honeymoon and rest between adventures.

das appartment ist sehr schön gelegen, mit blick vom balkon auf den pazifik. so zu frühstücken macht doppelt freude. es war sehr sauber und man findet in der küche wie auch im badzimmer alles was man braucht und noch mehr. auch der check-in funktioniert dank zahlenschloss schnell und einfach. die gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. war definitiv das beste appartment welches wir je gebucht habe.

The studio apartment was beautiful, comfortable and well located. The view was amazing.
The quiet of the neighborhood was refreshing after busy days. Would love to come back someday. We highly recommend it.
Thank you Thomas for having us!

Eine der besten airbnb Unterkünfte,die wir seit vielen Jahren hatten: die Veranda mit dem tollen Blick, die  saubere , gut ausgestattete Küche ( wir haben viel gekocht) , die geschmackvolle Einrichtung, super Dusche und natürlich die netten Gastgeber, besser geht's nicht!!
Gerne kommen wir wieder, Regina und Fritz

Tolle Unterkunft mir viel Platz,  sehr schöner Einrichtung und außerordentlicher Dusche.  Es war alles da (Küche,  Shampoo, Bugyboards, Schirm, Stühle....) was man so braucht und der Balkon hat einen grandiosen Ausblick.  Die Gastgeberin hat und gleich mit allem versorgt! hier wären wie gerne länger geblieben!
Great location, beautiful house and ocean view, and great host, very nice and responsive :)

Sehr schöne Wohnung auf der Sonnenseite der Insel, mit tollem Meeresblick vom Balkon. Perfekter Ausgangspunkt für alle Unternehmungen auf Bis Island. Supersauber! Sehr nette, unaufdringliche Gastgeber.
We loved Thomas’s place.  It was cozy and inviting, and the view was beautiful. The birds and the morning sun make this a wonderful place to wake up in the morning.
Amazing place and location!

It was one of the best AirBnB experiences! We stayed here for honeymoon and it couldn’t be better. The ocean view from the bed and lanai was AMAZING. Thomas and Simone were welcoming and sweet. Communication was clear. Responses were quick. The place was neat and had everything we needed. We loved everything about Hale Kea!

We chose to stay here initially because it looked so cozy and we needed a few extra days of lodging before a hotel stay.  It turned out to be much more.  A great location in a quiet neighborhood, with total privacy in a clean, tastefully appointed apartment, many little extra touches such as beach gear, and a fabulous shower to name but a few.  After staying here, our hotel was a great disappointment.  Our hosts gave us complete privacy, but were available anytime if needed.  We highly recommend Thomas's place and would gladly stay here again.

Schöne Wohnung mit mega Ausblick auf den Ozean. Die Ausstattung ist super und es gab einfach alles was man brauchte. Es fehlt wirklich gar nichts! Thomas und Simone sind sehr nette Gastgeber und die Tipps waren super. Leider waren wir nur 2 Tage dort. Wir vermissen es jetzt schon und wenn wir nochmal nach Big Island fliegen, werden wir hier wieder wohnen. Wir würden sehr gerne nocheinmal kommen.
Mahalo das wir bei euch wohnen durften. 

Liebe Grüß
Jannes und Mandy
Clean, quiet, modern & comfortable.  A nice place to stay.
Just a beautiful Studio

Gorgeous place with fantastic view and in a great location, about 10 mins south from downtown Kona. The place was spacious and separated from the main house so we felt that we had good privacy. It was clean, had everything we needed, and the bed was very comfy. It had maybe the best shower I've ever seen. I don't think it had a/c but it wasn't needed, since the place stayed relatively cool. Would highly recommend.

Thomas is a wonderful host. Incredibly quick to respond to any and all questions or concerns. The studio is fabulous. Spacious, comfortable, well appointed and well situated near beaches, town and other amenities. The view of the ocean (and those sunsets!) is spectacular from its perch on the hill. Plenty of privacy and many amenities to help you enjoy all sorts of local activities (in addition to snorkeling gear, there's even a yoga mat, a cooler, an extra backpack, and rain ponchos). They've thought of everything!

Very nice space in a great location. Thoughtful touches included ponchos, umbrellas, beach towels, cooler, etc. Sparkling clean, private, and comfortable. The lanai is the perfect place to enjoy coffee with a view. Close proximity to all Kona has to offer. We hope to visit again.

I thoroughly enjoyed staying in the house.


It was the first time for me to experience Airbnb, so I was  a bit nervous about staying at a private accommodation. However, hospitality that Simone and Thomas showed eased my tense. They were a great host showing kind treatments for the inexperienced traveler.


 The house was located in a quite and secure area with just a few minutes away from a shopping mall as well as Kailua-kona.

The accommodation was nicely furnished and immaculately cleaned with a plenty of towels , toilet papers and other daily necessities.


In addition to the beauty of the house, I was also amazed by the view from the lanai. Having Kona coffee on the lanai while watching the blue ocean was  unforgettable.


I would definitely recommend the place and would love to stay again.
Wow, what a place! Totally agree with all other reviews, this place has everything you’ll need and more.

Easy Check-in
Very clean
Beautiful Views
Great location 
Quiet and comfortable 
Gorgeous bathroom 
Tremendous value

Very easy, prompt communication and an incredibly thoughtfully provisioned space. From the kitchen to the bathroom to all the awesome beach gear (chairs, towels, boogie boards, snorkel equipment)...Thomas and Simone anticipate every need! I’m a geek travel planner/packer, and I didn’t even need the sharp knife or vegetable peeler I’d packed. :) Also want to add shout outs for the comfortable bed/pillows, sunset view from lanai and amazing shower. All around one of our best AirBnB experiences to date!

Diese Unterkunft lässt keine Wünsche offen! 
Groß, sauber, komfortabel und mit Liebe eingerichtet und von der Terasse einen traumhaften Blick auf's Meer....Top!

One of the best AirBnB's I have ever stayed in. The home was very clean, comfortable and had all the amenities one could ask for and then some. The ocean view from the balcony is a nice place to start the day or relax in peace. I highly recommend Thomas and Simone's place to anyone visiting Kona, I will definately stay here again next time I am on the Big Island.

The house was in an excellent location with a stunning view of the ocean. Perfect to sit and sip on a cup of coffee to start the day. Mini fridge was good sized if you want to buy items to use the stove. Very spacious with a comfortable bed, awesome shower, and couch area to watch tv. They have beach chairs, umbrellas, books about the island to browse, cups, silverware, and plates. It was one is the best places I've stayed in and I travel quite a bit; it is right up there with any extravagant hotel. I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting that side of the island.

We loved our stay Hale Kea.  I've stayed at many Airbnb rentals from Vancouver, BC to Inverness, Scotland to Loreto, BCS.  This quickly has become my absolute favorite!  The studio is beautiful.  Thomas and Simone have thought of everything.  I cannot wait to come back again for another stay.  Mahalo!
Beautiful, modern, convenient and spotless studio.  What every AirBnB stay should be.

name: Surry Hills - Large Room w Balcony
summary: This beautiful large room with private balcony comes with a tv/cable, WiFi, dresser, night stands, full wall built in closets for all your things, and a beautiful balcony overlooking the quite tree lined Bourke Street.
space: It is located on the second floor of a two story townhouse.  There is a full bathroom with heat lights and glass enclosed rain shower that is sometimes shared (if another room on that floor is occupied) but more than likely just for you during your booking.
description: This beautiful large room with private balcony comes with a tv/cable, WiFi, dresser, night stands, full wall built in closets for all your things, and a beautiful balcony overlooking the quite tree lined Bourke Street. It is located on the second floor of a two story townhouse.  There is a full bathroom with heat lights and glass enclosed rain shower that is sometimes shared (if another room on that floor is occupied) but more than likely just for you during your booking. You will have access to the rest of the house (other bedrooms are locked by tenants when in use), the kitchen, lounge and tv area, and dining area, and beautiful garden outside with a deck, table and chairs, and full washing/drying machine for your clothes.  The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you would need for your culinary desires and is equipped with an oven, gas fire burners, toaster, mixer, microwave, pots and pans, dishware, and so on.  There is also a full sized refrigerator and freezer with some comm
neighborhood_overview: Our newly renovated terrace home is on a quiet street, close to all the action in Sydney's heart. Although the Central Station is only a 10 minute walk away and can quickly jet to you anywhere you want to go, we are also walking distance to Sydney's downtown, Chinatown, Darling Harbour, Opera House, and the Sydney Convention Center.  We are right in the center of Surry Hills's "scene" offering Restaurants, Bars, and Coffee shops.  There is also plenty of shopping, art galleries, markets, and parks nearby. If you want to know more about the area, check them out on AirBNB's new Sydney Suburbs guide! There are plenty of kid friendly areas and playgrounds nearby. The terrace home is kid friendly, but please keep in mind that the home is not modified for small children and has steep stairs that do not have a gate and no children toys are readily available.
notes: There is an entrance in the front and the back of the house.  There is one parking space allocated for the house, though parking on the street is sometimes available at own accord.  There is a gas BBQ on the patio for your grilling enjoyment.
transit: Central Station is only a short 10 minute walk away and it is easy to get around most of Sydney to see the attractions this way or by foot!
access: You will have access to the rest of the house (other bedrooms are locked by tenants when in use), the kitchen, lounge and tv area, and dining area, and beautiful garden outside with a deck, table and chairs, and full washing/drying machine for your clothes.  The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you would need for your culinary desires and is equipped with an oven, gas fire burners, toaster, mixer, microwave, pots and pans, dishware, and so on.  There is also a full sized refrigerator and freezer with some commonly used condiments.
interaction: There may be other guests occupying the terrace house at the same time of your stay.  Please be courteous to your fellow mates and neighbors.  Respect common areas by keeping them clean and only keep personal items in your designated room when not in the house.  Make new friends who love to visit Sydney as much as you do!
house_rules: The open dining space and lounge/TV room greets you when you enter through the front door down the hallway. The dining room table accommodates 6. Wi-Fi is available throughout the home. You are then led to a big beautiful kitchen stocked with all your culinary needs. There is a dishwasher, gas burner cooktop, oven, microwave, mixer, toaster and full sized fridge/freezer for your convenience. The townhome has a full sized bathroom on each floor equipped with heated lights and glass encased rain showers. Each of the 4 bedrooms is accommodated with its own flat screen TV and cable box for personal enjoyment. The rooms are equipped with floor to ceiling sliding mirrored door closets with plenty of space to hang or store all your items. Bedroom has a queen bed and is at the front of the house on the second floor, with balcony overlooking Bourke Street. There are full wall built in closets with mirrors, a dresser, and night stands. (There are a total of 4 bedrooms in the house) I am availabl

reviews.comments: I had an absolutely lovely week staying at Bj's comfortable home. The room itself was nicely equipped, with a comfortable bed, and plenty of space. I really enjoyed the little balcony too. I LOVED the neighborhood of Surry Hills too - so many cute shops and restaurants a hop away. Bj was super responsive and accommodating. I highly recommend a stay at Bj's home!

name: Elegant apartment Sagrada Familia
summary: The Sagrada Familia, Barcelona’s most instantly-recongnisable icon, is at your fingertips with this excellently-located apartment in Eixample. License: HUTB-003745
space: With a surface of 40 m2, this lovely apartment is perfect for your next stay in Barcelona!  Entirely renovated in 2013, the building has 8 identical apartments. Your apartment will be assigned to you at your arrival, if you have any preference please let us know, we'll do our best to suit your wishes. The apartment has a capacity of 4 persons and is very functional with a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, vitroceramic hob, fridge, coffee machine, kettle, cooking utensils, washing and tumble drying machine, etc.).  It has  a double bedroom with a double bed. The very quaint living room has a double sofa bed, a TV with 60 channels in different languages, a folding table for your meals and a built in wardrobe for your personal belongings. From the living room, you can appreciate a small balcony facing the street that lets the light go into all the apartment. With double glass windows, the apartment is very well soundproofed. Your apartment will be assigned to you at your arrival, if you have any preference please let us know, we'll do our best to suit your wishes.
