neighborhood_overview: Eixample is the most beautiful neighborhood in Barcelona with architecture recognized all over the world. It was built in the 19th century. It is the birthplace of the modernist artistic movement of Antoni Gaudí, and the masterpiece "Sagrada Familia" is 5 minutes away. You can also go to see the famous "La Pedrera", the Hospital de Sant Pau, Casa Batllo, Arc de Triomp,  etc. One of the Eixample's best streets is the Passeig de Gràcia avenue, which compares with Fifth Avenue in New York or the Champs Elysees in Paris. Passeo de Gracia Avenue has a lot to offer, apart from Gaudi's masterpieces ( Casa Batllo and La Pedrer), there are many nice shops ( famous boutiques among them), restaurants and very authentic venues.  Plaza de Cataluña and Las Ramblas are almost around the corner. In addition, this area has numerous museums such as the Fundació Antoni Tàpies, the Egyptian Museum of Barcelona and the Francisco Godia Foundation, as well as numerous art galleries. In the neighborhood there
notes: Touristic Tax: As from 1 November 2012, the local authorities charge a tourist tax 2,48 euro to all visitors to Catalonia over 16 years of age. Please note: when checking-in to your apartment, any visitors aged 16 and under must present a copy of their passport showing their date of birth, in order for them not to be charged the aforementioned tourist tax. The tax rate is 2,48 euro per person, per day. A maximum of 7 days is charged. The tourist tax must be paid to the member of staff checking you in, upon arrival at the apartment. host.host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 
Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. Son Belén, Mayte, Marta y Anaí.

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Hebe & Ezequiel

reviews.comments:
Great flat and very good hosts.  They are responsive and checked that all was ok

Convenient check-in desk - very nice person, and met me on Sunday.

It's a serviced apartment so other people's things are not in there.  

Modern flat. Very efficient. Everything you need. And newly redecorated. 

Very convenient location - close to public transport. And short walk to Passieg de Gracia (shopping)

My apartment was on 1st level and faced the street. The traffic is loud and continues late. So if this is sort of thing that bothers you, request a quieter flat.

Han sido unos dias estupendos. Magnífica localización, un barrio muy agradable, apto confortable y la comunicación con Hebe muy fácil, ha estado siempre a nuestra disposición. Recomiendo el servicio de taxi de que disponen, supercómodo y profesional. Gracias!!

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour à Barcelone. L'appartement de Hezequiel et Hebe est plus que chaleureux et Fabiola et Isabel nous ont très bien accueillis. Nous sommes ravis de cette expérience et recommandons vivement cet appartement pour votre séjour à Barcelone !

Accueil super efficace.  L'appartement est très bien placé à quelques minutes de la Sagrada Familia à proximité de petits cafés très sympas pour le petit déjeuner, brunch et autres tapas. Appartement très fonctionnel. Adresse à garder.
Localización inmejorable.

Location is pretty great and safe. Also it's 7-8 min walk to metro stations. Clean room, excellent toilet / bath conditions and warm & lovely staff. Outside is a bit noisy but windows are noise proof, so yeah I totally recommend it.

I visited Barcelona with my parents and stayed at one of Hebe's lovely apartments. We liked the place a lot - it is cozy and very well equipped. Our hosts were very polite and professional - with clear communication and respectful from the start.
The neighborhood is clean with wide streets, which makes the appartment have lots of light during the day :) if you are not into bright rooms, there are external blinds as well. I recommend staying here.
The location is very convenience and near by the metro, the house's facilities and equipment are well prepared for our stay. We have a great experience in Barcelona.

The neighbourhood is good and the apartment (the 2nd one we were given) was perfect. I e mailed my requirements well in advance and so was very disappointed we then had all the problems we did as this was my first trip away with my partner I wanted everything to be perfect. However, Hebe did do all she could to give me recompense for the disappointment and inconvenience but I would have rather not had the problems in the first place.
We felt there was an element of 'Fawlty Towers' about the place and the staff who tried to help us seemed disorganised at times but as a place to stay in Barcelona I would recommend it as good value and in a good location and if things do go wrong with your booking the host does try very hard to make amends which was very much appreciated.

O apartamento é muito bom, bem como mostram as fotos. Bastante espaçoso e limpo. Gostei muito da experiência. No geral, o único problema foi na chegada, quando eu estava na porta do prédio no horário combinado e não tinha ninguém responsável lá. Um outro casal (da Russia) também já estava lá há mais tempo que eu, e ficamos juntos esperando na rua, com todas as malas, por quase 30 minutos até a funcionária do prédio aparecer para abrir para todos. Portanto: cuidado com o horário de "siesta" na Espanha, ele realmente levam este intervalo à sério.
Esta muy bien ubicado,al estar la oficina en el mismo edificio,cualquier problema que surja se soluciona enseguida.

Apartamento muy bien situado a 20min andando de plaza cataluña. Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos dias, limpio y confortable. los anfitriones son muy amables y estàn disponibles en todo momento. Lo único negativo es que nos tocó el primer piso y al encontrarse en una avenida muy transitada, el ruido de los coches molestaba un poco por la noche. Por el resto todo perfecto.
Es un departamento muy comodo y limpio ..los snfitriones e traordinarios ...un trato muy padre ...

Apartment is great! It's clean & cozy, kitchen is fully equipped, bed is comfortable. Location is good, 5 min walk from Sagrada Familia, 15 minutes walk from La Rambla. Also, metro and bus stations are nearby. We enjoyed our staying.

neighborhood_overview: Eixample is the most beautiful neighborhood in Barcelona with architecture recognized all over the world. It was built in the 19th century. It is the birthplace of the modernist artistic movement of Antoni Gaudí, and the masterpiece "Sagrada Familia" is 5 minutes away. You can also go to see the famous "La Pedrera", the Hospital de Sant Pau, Casa Batllo, Arc de Triomp,  etc. One of the Eixample's best streets is the Passeig de Gràcia avenue, which compares with Fifth Avenue in New York or the Champs Elysees in Paris. Passeo de Gracia Avenue has a lot to offer, apart from Gaudi's masterpieces ( Casa Batllo and La Pedrer), there are many nice shops ( famous boutiques among them), restaurants and very authentic venues.  Plaza de Cataluña and Las Ramblas are almost around the corner. In addition, this area has numerous museums such as the Fundació Antoni Tàpies, the Egyptian Museum of Barcelona and the Francisco Godia Foundation, as well as numerous art galleries. reviews.comments:
Excellent apartment on 6th floor. The apartment was clean and well maintained. The huge bed was really comfortable and extra pillows and blankets were provided. The living area and all parts of the apartment were as advertised. Our welcome pack includes basic kitchen items e.g. washing up liquid and dish clothes and capsule for use in the washing machine which was very convenient. 

In the bathroom there was an excellent power shower with pumping hot water. 

We travelled with a baby and had a pram with us. The only difficulty was that we had to carry the pram up and down steps to access the lift each time but we managed ok.

The apartments are in an excellent location about a 10 minute walk to Sagrada Familia. Located on a busy corner, there's a supermarket, cafe/bar and restaurant all in the block.

The added bonus of this place is the fact that it is a serviced apt and of we had questions/issues, they were easily resolved.

The pictures of the apartment were accurate, although in reality the place was a little bit smaller than portrayed on the photos but we loved it. The location is wonderful, near Sagrada Familia and the Metro, and not that far from the Rambla either. We are very pleased with the apartment and the hosts so we had a lovely vacation.
El departamento es cómodo y completamente equipado, la zona es muy apropiada con metro cerca. Nos brindaron todo lo necesario.
Perfect,nice and clean apartment located close by pretty much everything you want and need too see in Barcelona.

Very cozy flat and fully equipped. Cold air, wi-fi, tv and a well realized WC. Perfect for 3-4 days during summer. 
Thanks to Ezequiel and Hebe.
This was a perfect apartment for our visit. Had all that we needed. Was easy access to sites to visit.

Altamente recomendados !

Jorge

It was a great place to stay when we were in Barcelona. The bed was even bigger than we expected so we did not need to use the sofa bed. The staffs were helpful showing us around inside the room and answering our questions. Location wise, it was close to couple stations of different lines and very convenient. There were 2 parks close by too, which was a great plus for our boys. Supermarket and couple restaurants were near the apt too. Overall, we were very happy with this place.

Everything was OK, good people, clean flat, nice balcony, cups and dishes enough for 4 people, location, very nice flat for a couple or a family with a child, we liked it vety much! /// Всё было здорово, балкон просто очаровательный, можно поставить на него пару стульев и пить вино вечерами))  в квартире есть все необходимое и для длительного проживания, посуда, сушилка, утюг, фен. Мы очень довольны)
All perfect and as described.
Very nice apartment, good service and helpful hostess!

Good communication, not hard to find. Make sure you ask how to use the washer if you plan on using it because there are no instructions and our clothes got stuck inside. Also had to line dry them which took a couple days. Maria Claudia at front desk is a sweetheart, she was so helpful and awesome. The apartment is very nice.
Todo bien

Thank you very much for the wonderful welcome and hospitality.And also for the attentive attitude.We liked the apartment location, cleanliness.Everything necessary was provided.If we are in Barcelona again, we will definitely stay with you.Thanks.

내부가 깔끔하고 호스트가 친절합니다. 그리 넓진 않지만 침실, 주방, 거실이 사용하기 좋게 나뉘어져 있습니다. 2명이 묵기에 딱 좋은 것 같아요. 사람 사는 집에 묵는 느낌이라기 보다는 깔끔한 호스텔같아요. 인포메이션 데스크가 있어서 문제가 생겼을 때 바로바로 대응이 가능할 것 같아 안심됩니다. 전망이 좋아요. 전 6층이었는데 테라스가 있어 너무 좋았어요. 전망도 괜찮구요. 대로변 코너에 있어서 차 소리가 좀 시끄러울 순 있어요. 테라스 문 닫으면 거슬릴 정도는 아닙니다. 위치도 괜찮아요. 근처에 사그리다 파밀리아가 있고, 숙소에서 20분 정도 걸으면 카탈루나광장 갈 수 있습니다.
appartamento ben tenuto e pulito, in zona comoda per la metro. personale molto disponibile e attento
El departamento es muy lindo, limpio y cómodo. Muy bien equipado y cómodo!
El lugar está muy bien ubicado, está bien decorado y es un lugar muy cómodo para conocer una increíble ciudad. Muchas gracias.

위치좋아요. 사그라다 파밀리아 성당 근처에요.
세탁기 및 건조기가 있어서 좋았어요. 
수세미, 기본 양념 재료 등이 일회용으로 포장되서 제공되서 좋았습니다. 
침실, 거실, 주방 공간도 잘 나눠져있어서 좋았어요. 엘리베이터도 있어서 편합니다.

올라가니 참고하세요. 또한 시티 택스 별도로 부과됩니다.

Perfect

位置可以,但是服务就唔系好得囖,冻噶时候想拿多张被都无,讲真真是唔会再选择呢度,可以被客人使用噶野太少
Very good location. We could do a lot nu foot.
Servicio excelente. El apartamento limpio práctico y cerca de todo! Muy recomendable

Wir waren für ein paar Tage in der Wohnung. Die Kontaktaufnahme und die Klärung der Einzelheiten im Vorfeld hat auf Englisch sehr gut geklappt. Wir haben wie vereinbart vom Flughafen angerufen und haben anschl. die Wohnung sehr pünktlich und sauber übernommen. 
Die Wohnung war größenmäßig vollkommen ausreichend für zwei Personen, da können auch 4 Personen übernachten (1x Doppelbett und 1 ausziehbare Couch). Die Wohnung war sauber, sehr gut ausgestattet (Mikrowelle, Waschmaschine, Küche mit Geschirr, Handtücher und saubere Bettwäsche). Dusche und WC sind vorhanden.
Die Strasse unmittelbar davor ist gut befahren, wir haben aber mit geschlossenen Fenstern kaum was gehört (nur ein Mal war ein sehr lauter Motorradfahrer zu hören). 
Beim Sonnenaufgang scheint die Sonne direkt rein, was einem richtig gute Laune bereitet. Man kann zur Not auch draußen auf dem (schmalen) Balkon frühstücken. Zum Abend hin wurde die Wohnung immer kühler, was aber daran lag, dass wir die Heizung nicht eingeschaltet haben. Also, nicht vergessen, Klima einschalten.
Die Lage war für uns ideal, wir hatten Drei-Tageskarten, wir haben aber viel zu Fuß unternommen. Sagrada Familia ist ein paar Minuten entfernt, nach unten zum Arc de Triomf sind es ca. 20 Minuten zu Fuß, Richtung Via Laietana oder La Rambla auch in etwa so weit. U-Bahnstationen und Bushaltestellen sind auch in ein paar Minuten zu erreichen.
Alles in allem eine super Unterkunft in der man sich auch ausruhen kann zwischen den Stress am Vormittag und den am Abend, und falls man wirklich auf die katalanische Küche verzichten will auch entsprechend kochen kann.
Wir werden beim nächsten Besuch wieder ein Wohnung dort nehmen.

It is almost close to public transportation and in the same time a bit noisy at nights since it is located in a rather big and crowded street. However, good access to many touristis cites.
It was clean and had enough space though the shower was a bit too small and the water drain wasn't working properly in the shower.

Very helpful at giving sightseeing tips(they even gave us a map), the apartment is modern and fully equipped, clean and close to most of sightseeing places.

summary: 550sqft Gramercy Park studio just 3 blocks from the 4,5,6 and N,Q,R,W subways; walking distance to the East Village, Murray Hill, and Union & Madison Square Parks. This studio is modern, remodeled, clean, and fully furnished - 4th floor elevator building.

Gramercy Park neighborhood has several local / small eateries for guests try. I recommend walking down Irving street or 3rd avenue to see what suits you best but you can never go wrong with Friend of a Farmer. Overall I recommend using an app to get around ( (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps or CityMapper)  Don't underestimate the bus system - it's actually pretty convenient & cheap. There are uptown & downtown buses right on 2nd & 3rd avenue and across town buses on 23rd street.   The 4,5,6 is 3 blocks away on 23rd & Lexington. The N,Q,R,W is also on 23rd but further down at Madison Square Park.

notes: Minimum Stay: 28 days - afterwards pro-rated daily pricing. Flexible Stay: Stay for as long as you like, no need to set a move-out date.  Simply give 4 weeks notice before moving out.
transit: 30 seconds from main tram and bus lines that can take you anywhere in Hong Kong.  5 mins walk to Sheung Wan MTR and 2 mins walk to Sai Ying Pun MTR station. One of the most conveniently located places to live in ALL of Hong Kong
access: Guests have access to everything (wifi, A/C controls, etc) in the common spaces and exclusive access to amenities in each of their private rooms. Cleaners will clean the common areas only.

house_rules: GENERAL HOUSE RULES Saving Electricity: - Turn off your air-conditioner when you leave the house; - Turn off the common room air-conditioner (if you turned it on or are the last to leave the area) - Turn off lights/appliances once done using them (i.e. your bedroom lights, shower water heater, etc); - Use the washing machine for medium and large loads ONLY (single or few item washes can be done faster by hand and are highly wasteful in terms of energy and water). Bathroom Etiquette: - If you shower and find water on the bathroom floor, please kindly mop it up and leave the ventilation fan on (safety > incremental electricity cost); - Don’t forget to turn off the water heater after showering; - Keep the bathroom door closed at all times; - Flush after every use (preferably with toilet seat down). Humidity Management (April to October) - Do not leave windows open for extended periods of time and close all windows if you are the last to leave a room. - Turn on the Dehumidifier if the A/C

name: The hidden beauty of Galata 4 :O
summary: Hidden beauty near Galata Tower: The coziest apartment; fully furnished giving a feeling of comfort, warmth and relaxation!  I'm staying in the same building and am always up for helping you around the city or getting a couple of beers together!
space: Greetings! You'll notice that I got a few different "beauties of Galata" on Airbnb; that's because I'm accepting guests to four flats in the same building. This one in particular is on the 4th floor. Now, onwards to some detailed description: Where it is: The apartment is located at Hacımimi Mh., Kölemen Çk. No:4 . You can check out the address on Maps to pinpoint the exact location of the place. It is a 38m2 apartment that is nicely laid out so it doesn't feel too small at all (I've lived here with a friend some years ago and it was quit enjoyable). The area:  The apartment's in the heart of İstanbul (known as Galata district), and the Galata Tower is about 2-3 minutes of walking distance. The building's in a dead-end street so the apartment itself is rather quiet with no traffic passing nearby. Our street is somewhat secluded with many friendly cats that love being fed so it's especially better for cat lovers : ) The street's located right under the famous "Serdar-i Ekrem" street tha
description: Hidden beauty near Galata Tower: The coziest apartment; fully furnished giving a feeling of comfort, warmth and relaxation!  I'm staying in the same building and am always up for helping you around the city or getting a couple of beers together! Greetings! You'll notice that I got a few different "beauties of Galata" on Airbnb; that's because I'm accepting guests to four flats in the same building. This one in particular is on the 4th floor. Now, onwards to some detailed description: Where it is: The apartment is located at Hacımimi Mh., Kölemen Çk. No:4 . You can check out the address on Maps to pinpoint the exact location of the place. It is a 38m2 apartment that is nicely laid out so it doesn't feel too small at all (I've lived here with a friend some years ago and it was quit enjoyable). The area:  The apartment's in the heart of İstanbul (known as Galata district), and the Galata Tower is about 2-3 minutes of walking distance. The building's in a dead-end street so the apartment i
neighborhood_overview: You will have easy access to all splendid attractions such as Galata Tower, Istiklal Street and Beyoglu with unique shops, many restaurants, cafe's and bars and museums. You have to take the time to explore the streets filled with quirky shops, designer boutiques and excellent restaurants.  Especially Serdar-ı Ekrem! It may be just one street but it is home to a wide variety of funky, fancy, and down-right quirky shops and boutiques. I'm definitely not a shopping guy myself but there's no denying that it's got some quite interesting places. I'll be sure to give you a nice list of places to eat&drink at when you get here, compiled from places that I enjoy going to myself. They're all located nearby, but, I wouldn't type'em here since I consider it somewhat of a secret recipe : )
notes: There is NOT a dishwasher in the apartment : (  There isn't an elevator in the building so you'll need to climb three staircases. This is a renovated historical building so the windows are a bit heavy to lift up. I'm literally not allowed to install modern ones (not that I'd choose to do so anyway).
transit: The apartment is conveniently located just 250 meters from Şişhane metro station which goes directly to Taksim Square, the city centre.  The distance from apartment to Taksim square is around 1 km. A single metro stop, a pleasant 20 minute walk along the historical Istiklal Street or a short ride in the nostalgic tramway are different options to get to the city center. Getting to the Old City where the Blue Mosque, Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace etc. are is quite easy as well - just a 10 minute walk to the Karaköy tram station and a 15 min tram ride from there. If you would like to go to the Asian side there are ferries to Kadıköy departing from Karaköy. That ferry ride is lovely by the way. All in all I can freely say that the location of this apt. (or any other in the Galata area really) can not be beaten. It's amazingly easy to get to any part of the city.
access: The place is all yours!
interaction: Personally, I'm not doing Airbnb for the money; I just enjoy getting to meet with new people and heaving a good time really. There's something lovely about making sure people get the most out of their trips, perhaps it's because what I would want to have happen to me when I'm traveling myself.
house_rules: This is a non-smoking room, and we can not allow pets in sadly. But you'll find many cats to pet on the street!

host.host_about:
Greetings! Despite how unnatural it feels to try and "describe" a human being, especially one's own self, let's give it a shot. I'm an independent game developer, which is a fancy term for "a human who's chosen not to earn as much money as he could be earning in order not to be told how to do things". Having lived in almost every part of Istanbul (and therefore having seen its lowest as well as its highest) I found myself unable to move away from the Galata area and eventually settled here.

As a host, I'm doing Airbnb for the sake of meeting with new people and having an excuse for drinking more beer. Being into this sort of a thing solely for the purpose of having an extra income is, tho I respect that choice as well, just not for me. I'm more of a "eh, let's be off with the fake pleasantries, fake smiles, fake impersonations and hit the damned pub!" person, being much more into conversations and interactions where all sides are genuine and not parts of self-made scripts. 

There's something lovely about knowing that I've helped someone enjoy their trip more. It's not always easy getting a taste of the local life in Istanbul since authentic cities such as this are also usually hyper-touristy. What's more is that the understanding of a "local life" will differ from one part of the city to another, it's as non homogeneous as it gets and that's why I love helping my guests around - so that they can experience how we "the Galata area people" live.

reviews.comments:
We spent 4 nights in Istanbul at Kerem's apartment, and wish we had stayed longer! We'll have to come back another time.

The location is perfect—maybe 3-4 minutes from Galata Tower and from the Shishane metro stop. Many interesting and unique shops around, lots of coffee shops and restaurant options, etc. Not nearly so touristy as across in Sultanhamet: the area has a 'real' feel, and there are very few buskers. I'd highly recommend this place (and area) for a first time in Istanbul, even though of course you'll have to head over to Sultanhamet to see Topkapi and Hagia Sophia, etc.

The apartment itself is recently-renovated, all fixtures work great, nice shower. Kitchen is small but serviceable—in any case there are so many good restaurants nearby that we only cooked breakfast here—and there's a washing machine and A/C unit and heaters if you need them. It's a little bit off Istiklal street, so there is not much noise at night or in the mornings ... except for whichever neighbor it is who thought a doorbell that played the first few notes of Für Elise at high volume would be an awesome idea. Somehow this particular sound goes right through the walls, despite it otherwise being adequately soundproofed. 

Bed is comfortable, Internet is fine, host is readily available, etc. I'd stay here again the next time I come to Istanbul, and if all the apartments are rented, I'd definitely still stay in this area.
Kerem's place is excellent, in a very good location.
Very nice apartment and Owner! Quite and in very center. Felt in love with the Galata tower area :)

The location of the apartment couldn't be any better, close to the Galata tower, and the shopping street. Kerem was very helpful, recommended us places to visit and to eat at, and answered all our questions.

Great location, very close to Galata tower, not far from tourist areas and ferries. A lovely apartment, great bed and shower and kitchen. Comfortable sofa. Air conditioning in lounge only. Kerem is an amazing host; so friendly and helpful. Highly recommended

The apartment is the perfect location for exploring Istanbul. It's nearby some tourist sites with easy access for walking or public transportation to others. The place is in a quiet alley so you get the feel of the neighborhood. Kerem was a fantastic host, very easy to communicate with. The apartment has everything you need and was very comfortable. I would stay here again anytime!

Cozy, clean, central, super quiet, easy access, secure, full equipment - everything i would like to have in an airbnb home. Kerem is always available for any communication, his "being there" all the time gives comfort and a relaxed mind. Was a good experience!

The apartment was wonderful! Its situated right between the Sishane metro stop and the Galata tower, so it is super convenient and close to great coffee shops, Istiklal, Karakoy, the Galata area, but its also somehow secluded and private. Kerem was great and super responsive and helpful! I would stay here again! I loved the neighborhood!!

Kerem's apartment couldn't have been better place to call home for a week in Istanbul. Not only was it nestled in the heart of, arguably, the city's hottest neighborhood, but it's location on a quiet side-street made it feel secluded. Kerem was extremely easy to communicate--even while he was undergoing surgery during my stay--and he made me feel VERY welcomed. There's nowhere else I'd consider staying on my next trip to Istanbul.
Everything was perfect!!! Karem was so helpful! He even met me and helped me with my bag! The apartment is so cute and cozy! I will certainly be back!?
I highly recommend Kerem's place. Checking in was easy, the place is spacious, clean and very well located. I would definitely stay here again next time I go back to Istanbul!
Great location, great hospitality and great place at all

Kerem nous a très bien accueilli.
L'appartement est très bien situé et très agréable

A very nice clean apartment in a quiet location yet very close to Galata Tower. My only complaint is the bed with an extremely hard (and slightly lumpy) uncomfortable mattress. I actually like firm mattresses but this one was even too hard for me.
While I did not meet Kerem, communications were great. The appartment is very well located and furnished. Highly recommended!

Great flat near Galata tower, one of the most active zones in Istambul.  Only one warning, it maybe difficult to older people to climb the stairs to the 3rd flor. But other than that its an amazing place.
Kerem is a great host, we had a few problems during our stay in the city and he was always available to help us.

Myself and a friend had a great stay at Kerem's place. The listing was as described - small but clean, quiet and with everything we needed. Kerem was a good host, communicative and helpful (for instance letting us check in early). Thanks!
you can get sweet time at house and near city center and metro station. the house owner is very kindly .give any help if you need soon.

Kerem is one of the best host. 
His response was so quick and even very late night he answered directly. 
The room was so neated and everything was perfectly equipped. We didnt knkw there was no lift so it was quite uncomfortable  to carry our luggages to the upstairs though. And the tub drain was kind of blcoked so it was a little bit inconvenient. A part from this, we had no complain about the room.
I strongly recommend to stay Kerems apartment! Thanks again.
Great place  near one of the coolest spot in Istanbul, super great price and super nice host!

The apartment was perfect for us. Super central location but on a quiet street. The apartment is pretty and clean with loads of amenities. Kerem was a great host, providing a cot and letting us check out a bit late.

Kerem's apartment in Galata is a gem.  You couldn't ask for a better location, the apartment itself is charming, quiet, and thoughtfully decorated, and Kerem was a wonderful host.  He provided us with information on getting to the apartment from Attaturk, was responsive to any additional questions we had, and overall our only regret is we didn't have time to actually interact with him in person!
Good location-clean apartment with simple decor-WiFi is good-shower is good

Go visit Kerem. Very flexible on check-in + out... good at communicating and giving recommendations, Very nice flat and a really good location close to the nice bars + restaurants. 

Not anything bad to say. The room even had nice soap, water in the fridge etc. Just book his apartment ;)

Kerem was a wonderful host and highly recommend  this apartment.  The location is great for all the sight seeing and restaurants. ( make sure to ask Kerem for his favorite places to eat, they wont disappoint!). 
Apartment is lovely cosy and clean.  Perfect for a sight seeing weekend. 
great stay and i think Kerem is the most responsive host I've experienced!

Great Stay at Kerem's place, check-in/check-out made super easy for guests and Kerem has been a great communicator through out.
The area is fantastic and easy to get around. Thanks we will be back!
Great location, easy to reach public transport and all of the tourist must sees.

We had great time, neighbourhood is super cool with small cafes all around.
Karem was the perfect host!
will definitely come back <3

Kerem is extremely helpful and kind host, ready to answer all questions and with a bunch of excellent tips on restaurants and bars as well! His place is on simply stunning location, close to metro, in a super hip neighborhood with cute shops, bars and restaurants around the corner. It's well equipped,  with quality bed, clean bathroom, working amenities...   And if you don't mind a walk over Golden Horn, it's basically on a walking distance to Sultanahmet part! Istanbul is an enchanting city, and Kerem helped us to have a memorable experience! Highly recommending!
房东很热情,并且能够解决我所有的疑问~

Kerem’s place was perfect- clean, comfortable, and in a great location. The neighbourhood is close to great restaurants and shops, and also near the tram and metro. Kerem was extremely accommodating and provided the best recommendations for food and drinks! Would definitely stay there again.

The apartment is quite small but the space is used well, presumably outfitted by a professional interior designer. Location is a quiet side street, pleasantly hidden from the overly-touristy Galata Tower area, with some great local cafes and boutiques around the corner (we loved Galata Kitchen in particular). A very easy walk from Sishane Metro. Unlike many of the AirBnB offerings in this neighbourhood, this apartment does not have a balcony or terrace - instead you're paying for 1) clean, fresh design, and 2) peace and quiet.

The apartment (clean with lots of amenities) is conveniently located next to the Galata tower and its surroundings with lots of cafés and restaurant. Kerem's descriptions made it very easy to get around and from the airport to the apartment. We had a wonderful stay, recommended.

Loved our stay. The location is perfect: easily reachable for a tourist, but just outside of the touristic area, interior looks great. Could easily find the place, arriving to Istanbul at night and getting out of the shuttle earlier than expected.

For someone steep stairs could be a downside, it wasn't for us. Also, wifi info is a bit hard to find :) Otherwise, loved it.

Great location. Quiet. Small. 

Just a note: Few electric plugs, none next to the bed.
Kerem's place is a wonderful location within in walking distance to many of Istanbul's best sites. Highly recommended if you want a convenience and great value. Thanks Kerem!

Wonderfully located apartment in nice neighbourhood. Uncomplicated host, uncomplicated check-in & check-out. We enjoyed our stay  very much and felt comfortable at Kerem's apartment.  Only disadvantage: not that soundproof. Nevertheless we recommend Kerem and his apartment in Galata!
good location, fair price, accurate description. great deal!
Great place in the heart of the city and great host.
Kerem is a great host! Everything was just perfect: minimalistic, clean and cozy apartment, everything needed was handy and super convenient, next time I go to Istanbul, I’ll stay at Kerem’s :)

The apartment is beautiful. The decoration is pretty and the whole place is very clean. I liked the location because it's in a very nice neighborhood, close to many places and the metro. I highly recommend this place. Thanks, Kerem!

The appartment is in a really cool area, surrounded by lots of lovely cafes and restaurants. Very close to the tram which can take you to most of the key sites like the Blue Mosque very easily. A great place to stay to get away from areas dominated by hostels and hotels.
Great place. Had a washing machine which was a big bonus for me after traveling weeks. Nice to wander around the area. Would recommend.

What an incredible corner of Istanbul to explore and call home for a few nights! Kerem was a gracious host and the space itself is cozy, clean, and felt very safe and secure. He was communicative and available for questions and recommendations, and very accommodating. 

The neighborhood is really unbeatable in terms of location, with so many restaurants and shops to explore and super easy access to public transportation, including the awesome ferry to Kadikoy. And after a long day of exploring it was so nice to come home to this quiet space so close to the fun.

I had an excellent stay here. Clean and nicely decorated. Location is amazing - right near Galata tower, Istiklal Street and subway stop. A lot of nice cafes and restaurants nearby. Kerem went above and beyond - on the last morning, I accidentally locked myself out of the room, with 3 hours to go before my flight. Kerem was quick to respond to my messages and showed up with a spare key within 15 minutes. He was very kind and gracious about it too. He's the best.

Kerem’s place was the perfect apartment for exploring Istanbul. It is in the heart of the Galata District just a few blocks down from Istikal St. and a few blocks up from the tram to the Sultanamet neighborhood. The apartment is small but very comfortable and well appointed (with one of the larger showers we’ve seen in Europe). We also really appreciated the ability to do laundry in the washing machine. It is in the middle of a hill and up three flights of stairs so be prepared to hike, but it’s well worth it!

My wife and I had a great stay in Istanbul, and much of it is thanks to Kerem's place. The place was clean and had all the amenities we needed. It is strategically located in the Beyoglu area, which is good for shopping and eating out. We particularly liked to just walk around Istiklal street. It is also not too difficult to get to the Grand Bazaar and Spice Bazaar.

Kerem himself was helpful with the questions we had. He did not personally meet us, but he gave us his contact number and we communicated using (Hidden by Airbnb) .

Be warned that the apartment is on the fourth floor and that the stairs is narrow and steep. While Kerem's apartment itself is good, the main entrance is in a small cul de sac which was not so presentable. We used Efendi Travel for the airport transfer to the apartment and the driver took a while to find the place.

I strongly advice that when it is time to leave for the airport, call the taxi or Uber at least three hours before your flight. For some reason, the driver of our first Uber request cancelled our request. Then, based on Kerem's advice, we downloaded the taxi app BiTaksi and requested for taxi to the airport. Twice, the taxis we requested ignored us. The app had a map and we could see the taxis were moving away instead of coming towards us. We suspect it is because the taxi rate was too cheap to the airport, and so they thought it was not worth it to take us. Finally we made another Uber request and this time the Uber car arrived and took us to the airport in time.

All in all, Kerem's place is very good value provided you are okay with going up the stairs.
Very nice flat, perfect location. The flat was clean. Kerem is a great host,  Istanbul is a great city, we enjoyed it very much!

We loved staying with Kerem. The place is very nice, clean and cosy. It is right in the middle in the absolute best location in Istanbul and Kerem had so many fantastic tipps for us. I will come back for sure!

The flat was really cozy, clean and fully equipped. It was located in the center of Galata (Galata tower it is just two minutes walking) and it was perfect for exploring Beyoglu and enjoying istanbul nightlife since many cafe and bars are really close to the apartment. Moreover Metro station (Sishane)  and tram station (Karakoy)  for sultanahmet can be reached in few minutes. It was really a great experience.

We had a lovely stay at Kerem's. The flat is 5 min away from the Galata Tower, a perfect location to explore the city. Kerem gave us great advice in terms of restaurants and answered all pur questions really quickly. My friends and I recommend the place !!

l'appartement a un super emplacement, très propre, bien équipe , Karem est très serviable , toutes les adresse et recommandation qui m'a donner était excellente , c’était ma deuxième fois dans cette adresse, j'y retournerai avec plaisir a chaque fois que j'irai a Istanbul et je recommanderai cette adresse a tout mes amis

name: Best View In Maui Steps from the Beach
summary: Wake up to the sounds of tropical birds singing, waves crashing - breath taking ocean views and sunsets daily during your stay in Maui. This is a very private and quiet condo end unit with great neighbors and one of the closest units with an ocean front view in the Ekahi Village. With beach and pool access, you'll be able to experience Maui to the fullest! We look forward to sharing our unit and the aloha spirit with you.
space: Located in the Wailea Ekahi Village - 29F has sweeping ocean views and is one of the best condos in Maui. The private remodeled end unit is best suited for quiet couples looking for a home away from home. However, we are now welcoming families spend their vacations with us! Children can sleep on the pull-out couch in the living room, while you can enjoy a stunning master bedroom with a private bathroom.  The Master bedroom has a completely redesigned bath/dressing area with walk in tile and glass shower. The second bathroom also features a walk-in shower with glass wall. The condo is all one floor on the second floor. The gourmet kitchen includes all amenities needed for a great meal! There is also a small gas grill on the lanai great for grilling fresh local catch - opakapaka is my favorite. While staying at our condo, you can either spend your time enjoying spectacular sunsets over the Pacific from the lanai or you can walk just a few minutes down to the pool or beach to soak up the

name: Luxurious Appartement in Downtown Montreal
summary: Luxury apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal. Enjoy a fully furnished 1 bedroom, gym, pool and steam room downstairs, indoor pool, and sauna. 1 minute walk to subway & bus, starbucks, 24hour Tim Hortons, and 24hour Subway with less than 1 minute walk from the apartment.

This luxury 1-bedroom apartment is luminous, very pleasant, safe, quiet and clean. Modern furnishing, 1 bedroom with a king size bed, a long couch, and a two sofa that turns into a very comfortable and spacious bed, open kitchen and a bathroom with both a bathtub, and shower curtain . Washer and dryer in the studio. Small balcony. Gym in the building. WIFI is also available! Also, it was spacious so you do not feel crammed, flexible check out time, which was nice so you do not feel pressure to leave. I would recommend staying here!
Great space that's close to the subway.  Very convenient location that's walkable to downtown.  Communication with Sandro was very easy and quick, would highly recommend this home.
Great location that’s within walking distance of most Montreal attractions

summary: Live like a local near Times Square.  Located on tree lined street in the best midtown location.  The apartment is very quite and gets plenty of sunlight.
