host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Welcome. I have been living in NYC for the past 15 years. I am an outdoor enthusiast and love to ski, snowboard, bike, hiking, and the beach. I am a worldly traveler however I love living in New York and enjoy everything the city has to offer. I can help plan your trip sharing with you the best of New York City that I love. Experience the city as a local and discover things that only locals know about. Just ask how I can help and you will have an amazing visit!!!!!

reviews.comments: Dan was a fantastic host. We met him when we arrived and he went out of his way to make sure we had the best experience of New York during or stay. The apartment is amazing. Clean, modern and in the perfect location. Walkable to just about all the sites and the choices for dining and drinks in the area are countless. Dan made some great recommendations and we really enjoyed our stay. Thanks so much Dan!

My boyfriend and I just returned from a 1 week vacation where we stayed at Dan's apartment in Hells Kitchen. From our  initial inquiry to rent the apartment until  the time we checked out - our experience with Dan was phenomenal. This was our first AirBnB experience and were happy at how easy and smooth the trip went. The apartment is centrally located and within walking distance to amazing restaurants, time square, central Park and most tourist attractions - although in saying this there was no street noise and never felt unsafe walking back at any time of the day or night. The apartment was cleaner that most hotels and a lot of care was taken to ensure it was set up for all your needs. It was a standard apartment size for New York- as a couple it was all we needed as we were out and about most of the time and only really slept there. Dan provided information on anything you could need from Restaurants to the closest Laundromat to catching the subway, to how to plan out things we wanted to do the entire week.  He got us complimentary gym passes at a very fancy gym called Equinox. He even arranged car service to and from the airport for us.   We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would not hesitate to stay again or recommend our friends and family!
We had a wonderful stay at Dan's house. The location was awesome. The house was very clean, evertyhing was available inside. Very silent in a very central place. The kitchen was very easy to use.

This was a great location in Hell's Kitchen.  The place is a short walk away from the 50th St A/C/E lines and 50th St 1/2 lines- which makes the entire city pretty accessible.

The apartment was well furnished and had a lot of thoughtful amenities including a white noise machine so you could fall asleep to the sounds of a babbling brook if the ambient of Manhattan ever got to you.

Dan was a great host and very well organized.  Dan communicated early and often, which made us comfortable knowing he was always just a phone call away if we ever needed anything.

I would definitely recommend to anyone staying for a long weekend or even a week given how livable the space was.

Dan's place was fantastic! He's a great host, made it very easy to get the keys and check out, and was available whenever I needed him. The location is fantastic - right in the thick of Hells Kitchen, easily walkable to Midtown. I was here for work, and this was 10x better than staying in a boring midtown hotel. Thanks Dan!

Dan was a wonderfully attentive host with great recommendations. His home is stylish, clean, & in a very convenient location.  Be sure to check out Totto Ramen while you're there.  Will definitely stay at Dan's property again. Thank you Dan!!

Dan was a generous and helpful host. He was keen to meet us on the evening we arrived, and provided a folder with all the useful information we needed.  He gave us some great restaurant recommendations and even helped get us a trial membership for a gym!  The apartment was clean, well furnished and organised, and is well located for exploring Manhattan.  I would definitely recommend this airbnb to anyone.

Dan's place was great. He was very welcoming and made me feel at home. The location is in a prime spot, with many great restaurants and bars within walking distance. I highly recommend checking it out!

Dan is a super guy. He met us at the apartment upon arrival and sat with us to explain the neighbourhood and where we could find the best places to eat and hang out. The apartment is in a great location to walk to everything that you could hope to do. We never felt unsafe our whole time there. The apartment is as described and just like the pictures.
Dan was very welcoming and flexible with my arrival time. Great place in a very convenient location. I would definitely stay there again next time I'm in NYC.
Great apartment in a perfect location!!! Thanks again Dan for everything!!! We will be back...

Dan was easy to reach and responded quickly. He's an engaged host and eager to give tips about navigating the potentially overwhelming city. The apartment was incredible - exactly as pictured. The mattress unbelievably comfortable. 

If you're planning to see shows on Broadway - snag this place ASAP. Times Square is just a few short blocks away and we felt completely safe. 

My husband and I had different experiences with the wifi. It continually dropped connection for me, but my husband never had an issue. We both have MacBooks. Weird.

Location!Location!Location!This apartment is minutes to theaters, restaurants, subway stations, Central Park and Time Square. It's like living at the hub that leads to everything. The apartment is very clean and roomy. The host is very friendly and helpful. We really enjoy our stay.

Dan was an excellent host! He made move-in and check-out easy. Shared great information about the area. The apartment is in the heart of great restaurants, grocery stores, and a quick easy walk to Time Square. Super clean with a full bathroom. He responds to all texts and answers calls.

Dan was a very active and engaged host. Before arriving, Dan emailed us with the information about the place as well as inquiring if we needed any help with transport. We absolutely enjoyed the apartment. It was a  great location, clean,  had a modern decor and also had some cool amenities that you wouldn't usually see (bluetooth speaker, white noise machine). Dan communicated often and he always picked up whenever we called. Thanks for everything Dan. Highly recommend.

Overall, my experience at Dan's place was outstanding. He is a great host and is very willing to offer NY guidance (for us tourists). I stayed here for 3 nights in mid-July. The apartment accurately matched the description posted on airbnb. I did not have any issues.

I highly recommend staying at Dan's place!

Dan was an excellent host!  He was able to give us some great recommendations for places to eat and the best way for us to get around.  
Location was also great.  Easy walking to Time Square and The Theater District!
I'll be sure to tell everyone about Dan's place if they are planning a trip to NYC!

It was a Wonderful experience for both my wife and me. Dan was very kind, friendly and were always attentive and predisposed. They gave us several tips on new york (what to do and what they do not reccomend). The apartment is very well located near to lot of places to visit; restaurants; bars; times square; broadway; central park etc. It was as it is shown in photos.
I would definitely recommend this listing and I hope I can stay here again.  That pretty much sums it up!
A nice stay. Thanks Dan.

Dan has really though of everything to cater for visitors. He is providing homely, quality, efficient accommodation that allows you to live like a local in NYC. 
Dan's willingness to help and fantastic advice means that you get invaluable hints that only a local knows. From where to eat to where to visit, Dan's recommendations really helped to make our week long trip to NYC so special. 
Dan possesses that wonderful balance between being available to help out and respecting people's privacy - he is the perfect host. 
The location is so handy to everything you need or want, and it is tucked away to ensure maximum peace and quiet. Just over 10 minutes walk to Central Park and even less to Times Square, this is a great place to base yourself. 
There were two of us in the apartment, using both the very comfortable bed and the lounge that converts to a double bed - also very comfortable. Plenty of room for two of us, three would also be okay. 
This is a well equipped, well presented one bedroom apartment. Dan cares about his property and this is evident in the high standard of presentation. He also cares that whoever is using the apartment also has the best time possible - Dan is there to support you  in a professional and caring manner.  A wonderful and memorable experience from booking to staying and departure. All so easy Dan has really though of everything. He is providing homely, quality, efficient accommodation which allows you to live like a local in NYC. 
Dan's willingness to help and fantastic advice means that you get invaluable hints that only a local knows. All so easy, pleasant and hassle free - just what you want in a holiday.

Dan is a very good host, taking care of us. The apt is wonderfully located, for Broadway theaters, Times Square, Central Park and close to suburb. It's very quiet (in the building and no noise from the street).
Very good up to 3 people.
I deeply recommend !

This apartment is quite tiny, especially the bedroom, which is barely larger than the actual bed. But it's in an amazing location, and Dan steered us to some truly great restaurants. He greeted us and hung out with us on arrival, and thereafter he checked in with us often. He took fantastic care of us.

There was something wrong with the with the WiFi--it cut in and out--but Dan quickly offered us the password to a second network (in an apartment he owns upstairs); just be sure to ask for it. There are a few other things that could be fixed--fussy toilet, reversed hot/cold faucet handle--but overall, this place was well-equipped and fantastic.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

If you want a place that's close to Times Square, Broadway, and Central Park, this place is perfect. Even though it's a bit tiny in size and not cheap, it's in a central location where hotels would otherwise be much more expensive. Dan was great. We didn't get to meet him but he made the check in and out process easy. He offered restaurant suggestions when we first arrived and was always quick to respond to any messages.
My wife and I loved Dan's apartment. The location is great for touring Times Square and convenient to restuarants, stores, and transportation. The apartment was very clean and well organized

Dan was fantastic! I have zero complaints. The place is very comfortable and clean.  It very much felt like my home away from home during my stay. It is exactly as it is depicted on the listing.  Location was just a few blocks from Times Square with easy access to the subway.  

I would 100% stay there again and plan on it for my next trip! 

Thank you Dan! You will definitely hear from me again about another stay in the coming future.

Our first trip to New York was great, aided by the location and Dan's apartment. It was walking distance to much of what we did but a subway stop was also nearby if we had needed it. Three blocks to Broadway, about 8'to Times Square.  There was a good grocery store, drug store, and restaurants all within blocks of home.  The apartment size was fine for me and my husband. Three could stay if you're really good friends.  Despite being a half block off of 9th Ave, we found the apartment quiet except for some of the ordinary sounds involved in living in a building with other people.  No biggie.  The apartment was well equipped and we had no problems with wifi, cable TV etc.  Loved the main floor location - no hauling luggage up the stairs. Key pick-up and drop-off was efficient and we used the same place to store our luggage and get a car for the airport.  Dan was very responsive to our needs and it was a pleasure staying here.

We had a fantastic time at Dan's - what excellent accommodations!  Not only did we have a first floor apartment, but being at the back of the building, there wasn't any noise - sleeping was a dream.  I was traveling with a 77 year old and she had the time of her life.  Dan's suggestions were spot-on, he even called and made dinner arrangements for us on our first night there.  Very informative, helpful and friendly - excellent host and fantastic location - very near Times Square with all you could ever want near by.  Thanks Dan!

Dan is a fantastic host. Always available by phone or text. Everything was smooth and amenable. Its really a better place for a couple or single than for separate sleeping partners. The couch isn't the most comfortable if you're a finicky sleeper. But the neighborhood is easy, with lots of character, and options for food.

We had a great stay at Dan's. Smooth check-in and convenient to the metro. The apartment is small but well-appointed, and we found it to be very quiet. Dan made some great restaurant recommendations, and thanks to that we had one of our best trips to NY from a foodie perspective!

Dan's place is amazing and you can't beat the location. Very close to a lot of great food and a short walk to Times Square. The TV has a Roku installed which was great after a day of walking around Manhattan and Dan is quick to respond with any questions. 

Easily one of the best places I've ever stayed with AirB&B, highly recommended.

Great little apartment in the middle of Hell's Kitchen , easy walking distance to just about everywhere ! If your going to be arriving after hours I would use Dan's recommended driver . Otherwise we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it to anyone .
Great accommodation, great host and a great location!! Would recommend this place for a stay any day.

Dan was incredibly communicative throughout the entire process and was easily available via e-mail, text, or phone call. I loved how organized he was and thought it was a nice touch that upon my arrival had some music playing in the background and a pleasant set up/ambiance for me once I got there. He also provided extra linens (just in case) as well as enough simple toiletries which, as a female, go a long way. As for the space, it's plenty of room for 2 people (this is NYC after all) maybe even a third depending on personal preference. The bedroom is nicely dark, so much that you have no concept of time when you wake up which can be good or bad! The bedroom is small, but there's enough room to maneuver and sleep and that's about all one needs. 

The area, quiet street for being t have anything negative to share about the space.
Great cozy one bedroom, easy walk to shows and sooo many restaurants, fast and helpful responses from Dan, thank you so much!

The two strongest points were Dan's excellent and thoughtful communication before and during our stay, combined with the great location. There are many restaurants and small markets within a couple of blocks, Times Square is a short walk and the subway is a block or two away. The apartment is completely quiet and comfortable. It's basically like a hotel room with a kitchenette and an extra bedroom added.

I rented Dan's place for my parents while they were in town for Thanksgiving. 
The apartment was beautifully outfitted, very well maintained and in excellent location.
Dan was exceedingly helpful and made the whole process very easy for my family and me. I would certainly stay here again!

It really is the best location and we loved coming "home" to this charming apartment at the end of each long exciting day exploring NYC!  Dan is extremely organized, responsive and an ideal host, and we especially enjoyed Dan's knowledge of the area and great local restaurant recommendations.     The apartment is nicely furnished and fully equipped with careful details - including umbrellas to borrow for those who forgot to pack one! Everything made us feel welcomed and comfortable for our stay.  We are already planning our next trip to stay here again.  Thank you Dan!
Dan is a great host.  He was communicative and made sure I had all the info to make the stay comfy and smooth.

Dan was a great host! He contacted us the day before our arrival to confirm our arrival plans and find out if we had any last minute questions or concerns. The lights were on and music was playing when we arrived at the apartment, which was a nice way to welcome us to his place. The apartment was very clean and had all of the necessities we needed during our stay. The bed was extremely comfortable and the bedroom has a radio that plays the soothing sound of rain. The building was very quiet, the neighborhood was safe, and the location was fantastic. We were able to either walk or take the subway to reach all of the major tourist attractions. There is a fabulous Italian, Patzeria Family & Friends, restaurant a few blocks aways...make sure to make reservations!

I have nothing but the best things to say about Dan's place - and Dan himself!! Even though our flight was delayed, he still stayed in touch until he knew we were safely in the apartment.  The apartment is in an excellent location for everything we wanted to do and we were thrilled with the apartment itself!  Thanks for everything Dan!!!

The apartment is in a great location - an easy walk to restaurants, subway stations and the theatres/Times Square. We used the kitchen for making dinners and everything you need is there. Loved the layout of the living area - it was a very comfortable space. I am a light sleeper, and had no issues with noise at all. I can't really fault our stay!

Dan was an incredible host! He answered all my questions in a timely manner and accomodated me any way he could (even providing a small space heater on a cold snowy night!) The apartment was as pictured - very clean and cozy (he even added nice touches like fresh flowers on the table.) The bed was wonderful, the location was great, the service was excellent. (There was a bit of noise from the neighbors but that's expected in NY.) All in all I had a lovely stay and I will definitely be staying again!!!
Loved it! Cant wait to come back!

This place was a fashionable apartment featuring contemporary design and artwork. For the price and location in Hell's Kitchen.. it couldn't be beat. 

The host was very accommodating and provided far more than he promised.  This was a very pleasant stay in an amazing apartment within walking distance to some of the most amazing eateries offered in NYC.

I visit NY a couple of times a year and I will definitely be seeking out this host again! Thank you!!

First, Dan is a great host: he ensures a very smooth arrival and departure, is very accessible, personable, and resourceful. The apartment was in a great location allowing access to several places by walk, and very close to metro and buses. Yet it was quiet and we did not feel overwhelmed by the surrounding activities. It was super clean, well-equipped, and felt like "home away from home". I would recommend this place without hesitation.

No need to look any further for a place to stay in NYC.  Dan's 1br apartment is centrally located, well furnished, comfortable, and more than reasonably priced.  Dan is very attentive and does his best to ensure that you are taken care of (check-in, recommendations for places to go, etc.).  He has your best interest in mind at all times.  This was my first trip to NYC and I wasn't sure about using Air bnb.  However, I can say with confidence that we made the right decision to stay here.  Dan is a great resource (readily available if you need anything during your stay).

Alex
The apartment is amazing so central and we walked everywhere and all of the amenities are on the doorstep. Highly recommended!
Dan has a lovely apartment centrally located and spitting distance from provisions, restaurants and bars. The apartment was well appointed and very comfortable.

We had a fantastic stay at Dans apartment. The location is great and the apartment is clean, comfy and well stocked. Dan was very helpful before and during our stay. Even though the apartment is quiet in terms of New York street noise the back bedroom is noisy in terms of apartment noise eg hearing people walking up and down the stairs. Dan has provided a noise machine in the bedroom to help alleviate this problem.

This was a perfect place for a New York experience.  The location is close to the heart of all the attractions, and it's quiet, clean, very well-equipped, accessible and secure, with a perfect host who seems to genuinely want you to have a great stay.
Great apartment in a great location.  Dan is a terrific host.  Very accessible and helpful for all your questions.  Has great suggestions on things to see and do in NYC!

Dan was a great host from start to finish. We were fortunate enough to be able to meet him, once we arrived, which allowed him to make food/activity recommendations based on our likes and my wife's dietary needs. 
We wanted to stay in Hell's kitchen particularly b/c it was close to all of the train stations, but little did we know that the restaurants around there were also spectacular.
Back to the apartment, it was quaint, clean and just enough space for my wife and I. It had all the amenities that one would need and in close proximity to grocery stores, bars, restaurants, Broadway, Time Square, etc. We thought we would make use of the kitchen to have breakfast every morning, but with all of the notable restaurants around, why even bother ("we're on vacation is what we kept on saying")? 
Thank you Dan for creating a comfortable space. We would definitely stay here again on our next visit to NYC.

Dan was one of the best hosts I've ever encountered. He offered great suggestions from places to eat to things to do. He was also super accommodating allowing us to check in early as our flight landed at 7am! His place is clean, comfortable and very central. We loved our stay and would recommend to anyone visiting New York!
Lots of fun places within a few blocks.  Cute, quaint place...and Dan aims to please!

The host's motto, Better Than A Hotel Room, is perfectly stated. There is no comparison between the service provided by Dan and any service you would receive from hotel staff!

On the front end of our trip, we had several flight troubles and Dan was understanding and accommodating throughout our journey to NYC. Upon entering, we were greeted by pleasant smells into a beautiful, quaint NYC apartment.  All we needed was clothes, because our host provided everything else! From kitchenware to bathroom necessities to the softest sheets ever, Dan thought of everything!

We communicated with Dan throughout our stay, in which he was able to answer any questions we had as well as make several recommendations for our enjoyment.  (Taboon for brunch is a must if you are in NYC on a Sunday!)  Hands down, our trip would not have been the same without his input. So if you want a true NYC experience, stay with Dan; next time we are back to NYC we definitely will!

Perfect location to everything you need in NYC.  Safe neighborhood. Lots of restaurants, corner quick stops nearby.  Dan was the perfect host and was very kind and cheerful.  Comfortable bed with beautiful sheets, very clean.  Air conditioner worked extremely well.  Very small apartment but I knew that when I booked it.  It had everything I needed.  I recommend this apartment without hesitation and look forward to staying here again.

Staying at this apartment in New York City made our mother/daughter trip epic! We stayed in a one bedroom apartment but the couch pulled out to a full/double so it was perfect! It comes with all the essentials. It has all that a typical apartment needs (coffee maker, microwave, flat screen TV, etc.) When we walked in there was music playing and the place was immaculate. This apartment is so central to most everything and just a block from subway (which we took a lot). Lots of places to eat right around the apartment. My 27 year old daughter and I felt completely safe walking at all hours in the neighborhood and it was great to end our day at our own place. Dan was SO great in offering suggestions for places to eat and even helped us get great tickets to the Broadway Show Sunset Blvd. with Glen Close. We were SO excited and it was awesome! There is an Amish Market down the street as well as a liquor store where we bought groceries, snacks, wine, etc.. Staying here was definitely better than a hotel! You won't be disappointed! It's all legit and Dan knows the business of hospitality and how to treat his guests! We can't wait to go back again as there is just SO much to see and do!
Location, location, location

Perfect location. Very nice hosts. 
The flat was as described and very well equipped.

A great flavor of midtown residential. Central location. You can walk almost all of Manhattan. Don't be shy about using the subway.
The suggestions for food and fun by Dan are very accurate.
Great to experience a local neighborhood
Great apartment in a Perfect location . All you need is walking distance

This apartment is in a fantastic location - loads of restaurants and bars on the doorstep! Also close to the theatre area and a couple of subway lines. Even though it is right in the middle of everything, the apartment itself was very quiet. Dan was very informative and responsive, gave us tips on what to see in NY which was very helpful. Check in was really easy, even though we arrived quite late on the train. Only negative on the apartment itself is its a bit dark being on the ground floor.

Awesome location - couldn't ask for a more dedicated host full of information and suggestions from transport to places to visit to restaurants so thankyou Dan!
Fully self contained haven with everything you need for a max of 2 people. Safe as well as ground level=winning!!
Definately recommend Dans place to anyone from anywhere.Comminication 100%-...hope to come again soon
Kelly and Becky (Australia)

The guys know how to take care of their guests. They want you to enjoy your vacation. It's clean and in a great location. They provide great suggestions for dining and seeing the sites as well. I would definitely stay here again!

Everything about Dan's apartment was the best part of NYC.  Our hosts we're friendly and informative.  The location was perfect for all we had planned.  We had everything we needed to enjoy a worry free visit.  I would definitely recommend this place.
Great location great host and very comfortable apartment
Thanks again

Perfect location for exploring the city by foot! Apartment is very clean and has everything you could possibly need
Dan and Danny are the perfect hosts and will help you with anything you need 
Definitely recommend!
Dan was great! Very nice  guy to work with !  Loved the apt is was in a great location !   Beautiful updated apt with everything we needed !

Stayed in the hosts apartment for approximately two weeks whilst in Manhattan for the first time over the summer. The location was fantastic, walking distance from everything including two subway stations, the theater district, Columbus circle and central park. Plenty of restaurants, good coffee shops and shopping near by.
The hosts provide a car service (for a very reasonable fee) where their driver will pick you up from the airport, stop past the key pick up location and drop you off at the apartment. This made my transfer from the airport to the apartment incredibly easy and fuss free.
The apartment itself was spacious, spotless, warm and inviting. Both the bed and shower were great and the wifi was fast. It had all of the necessities plus a few additional extras to make my stay comfortable. What makes this place wonderful are the hosts. Dan and Danny really love what they do and are authentically kind people. They were always able to be reached quickly by phone or text, suggested many ways to explore the city and when we did meet they were genuinely interested in looking after me and making sure my stay was the best it could be.
Highly recommend this apartment and the hosts - cannot wait to rebook with them when I'm next in Manhattan!

We loved staying at Dan's apartment! Everything was very comfortable and easy, and the apartment itself was spotless and stocked with everything you might need for your stay. The location was central, close to public transport, and surrounded by great restaurants, bars, etc. Dan was an incredibly kind and accommodating host, and came to greet us and explain everything as soon as we arrived. I'd definitely recommend staying here when you're visiting New York!
Excellent location and very Nice hosts. But beware of the lots of rats outside when night is coming. They are all around outside the appartment and you can see them from the window of the living room

Good-size small apartment in the Hell's Kitchen area of Midtown, suitable for 1 or for a couple. Short walk to Times Square and other central sites, good for access to museums in Uptown and for restaurants and bars in Downtown. Instructions for getting there via Subway were very clear, as were the instruction documents sent. Dan is a really nice guy who met me upon arrival and gave me great advice for places to eat and drink. He was great at communicating via (Hidden by Airbnb) throughout my stay to answer questions.

Dan was a lovely, generous host with lots of local knowledge and lots more time for his guests.
The location was perfect-only 10 minutes walk from Times Sq yet felt pleasantly suburban despite being amidst the chaos of Hell's kitchen.
Could not recommend this place highly enough!
The flat was extremely tidy and perfectly located. Dan was very welcoming and helpful. His restaurant recommendations were top notch! Thoroughly recommend this flat.

Location location location , amazing hosts and an apartment that has everything . We stayed for 9 nights and had the opportunity to get to know the neighbourhood very well - there are so many amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance . Dan was amazing ,helping us Aussies with lots of tips and help - cannot recommend this place highly enough

Quiet comfortable and a restful nest at the end of an active day.
Best location with many great recommendations provided by the hosts.

Dan and Danny are some of the nicest and most attentive hosts. I've been to NYC several times over the years and their apartment blew every hotel I've stayed in out of the water. I will never chose a hotel on the city again and will return to stay with Dan and Dan over and over again. I've already recommended them to so many people and will continue to do so for anyone I l ow traveling to the city.

Dan & Danny's place is absolutely perfect, it provided us an idyllic calm place to escape the hustle and bustle of busy New York. So central, we were really able to experience living in New York like a local! Dan had thought of everything, anything we could possibly need was at our fingertips. Dan was always available to contact if we had questions and made so much effort to get us settled in, including meeting us when we arrived even when he was incredibly busy! The place was super clean and provided so much more space than any hotel room could! Highly, highly recommend! Thanks Dan and Danny :)

What a great, quiet location. Walk to everything.  Restaurants galore, groceries available many places.  Well equipped apartment.  1st floor location with no stairs to negotiate.  Easy, clean and the host was great.  Can highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay like a native in NYC. 
Theatres were easy to get to.  And 9th Ave is not in the crazy part of Times Square.  More reasonable food at charming little places where the locals eat!  Great fun!

Exactly as described but even better!  Location was amazing, near everything!  We loved using citi bikes to see the city differently.  Dan was an amazing host, provided very helpful info, from eateries to at service tips. The apartment was cozy and clean and super comfortable. We enjoyed our stay and hope to be back to this great location!

Dan's place was perfect. It had everything we needed, clean, was super close to really nice restaurants, subway and NY attractions. Dan was very accommodating, gave us heaps of handy tips. Would definitely recommend this apartment or stay here again.
Dan was a fantastic host! He was very attentive at all times giving me suggestions of places to go. The apartment was very clean and neat! I would definitely love to stay again!
Fab host and fab apartment!! Very willing to help! Apartment was clean and about a 10 minute walk from Times Square. Great experience for me and my boyfriends first time in New York City.

O apartamento do Dan está muito bem localizado. É o espaço ideal para 2 /3 pessoas que vão visitar NY. O espaço tem a dimensão ideal, bastante limpo e sossegado. Está localizado numa zona residencial com muita oferta de restaurantes e supermercados. Muito perto de muitas das atrações e locais conhecidos e do metro. A assistência e acompanhamento dos proprietários é excelente. É mais do que um negócio é a atenção por quem os visita. Recomendo vivamente. Manuel

Brilliant apartment in a fab location with easy access to everything.  Dan and Danny are the ‘hosts with the most’.  They think of everything you didn’t realise you need to make your stay in New York extra special, from local tips on where to shop and eat out, to a great driver for airport transfers, to single origin coffee for the coffee machine!   Highly recommended!
He was kind and considerate.When I sent e-mail, he returned quickly.The room was clean and useful.Thank you.
Great place offered by Dan, perfect for 2 people and at a really superb location around hell’s kitchen.Would definitely stay here again
Dan’s place was perfect. We will stay here again in the future, for sure. Clean, private, convenient, good neighborhood, everything you need for a pleasant stay. Thanks, Dan!

Perfect location. Just right size apartment for 2 people with good amenities and so close to everything. Dan was really helpful and welcoming and his communication prior to and during our stay really helped ensure we had a great holiday.
Good heating (we were there beginning Feb), great hot water and water pressure, comfy bed and sofa bed, sufficient kitchen equipment to self cater if desired, very quiet at back of building.
No washing machine/dryer in the apartment - though a good laundromat was just around the corner so that was easy.
Will recommend to our friends if they looking to holiday in NY
Thanks Dan.

Dan is super responsive and the apartment is located in a great neighborhood. Lots of restaurants and theaters in walking distance. It's also dark and quiet inside the apartment (aside from the occasional sound from the stairwell right next to the bedroom). But that's apartment living. No street noise at all. 

Dan supplied us with a great informational document that had recommendations for restaurants, bars, and how to get theater tickets. He even texted us during the week when he found out about a fireworks show that was happening that night. 

Would highly recommend!

Excelente atención, el inmueble se encuentra en excelente estado de mantenimiento y conservación, departamento pequeño para dos personas, Dan y Danny dos personas maravillosas fantástica atención y predisposición para que las vacaciones en su departamento sean impecables, se preocupan por el bienestar del huésped y satisfacen todas tus necesidades. Sigan así da gusto abrazos

Dan's place is AMAZING!  It is a beautifully appointed apartment with an amazing location.  I highly recommend it as your home away from home in New York.  Dan we very communicative and helpful.  Thanks again!!

This was a well appointed apartment that was in a good location for exploring New York. Dan was a very welcoming and helpful host who gave us lots of useful information. The apartment is well laid out and comfortable. We found it to be a quiet haven at the end of our busy days!
Great Location!
Great location and the bed is super comfy! Would stay here again. Highly recommend :-)

Great apartment - top location, well appointed, safe, clean and no stairs (which is a bonus after a hard day sightseeing!) Dan & Danny are great hosts and very informative. Their tips were super spot on - pity we couldn't try everything! We used their suggested driver Mussa to transfer from different airports which was so convenient. The driver also helped me pick up the key after I forgot to bring the details :)  There is a fantastic little supermarket just around the corner with all sorts of foods and a coffee stop (Kahve) also very close.  Totally recommend!

The appartement is on the first floor. It is rather dark. We liked the flower on the table. Although the appartement is close to Time Square, it is quite quiet. However, when it was raining, the raindrops made a lot of noise, because right next to the window of the sleeping room, there is a shaft with old plastic bottels and metal. Furthermore, it was cold in the appartement. After calling Dan, we immediately got an electrical stove.

Dan gave us the wrong address of the appartement. Aside from this point, the host communicated quickly. He gave us a lot of information where to go and what to do.

Check-in: Since we had not the correct address, we had to walk several blocks with the bags. Dan fixed up everything and walked with us to the wright address.

In our opinion, the appartement is rather expensive, although we have to consider that the appartement is in New York / midtown.

We loved everything about Dan's place. From location, close to all amenities, such as grocery stores, pharmacies, restaurants, subway stations, to the outstanding hospitality, we had a perfect vacation. Dan is a thoughtful and accommodating host with attention to details to make us comfortable. The property is clean and tastefully decorated, close to the theater district and withing walking distance to Times Square and Central Park. I would definitely recommend it!

This place was perfect for our NYC trip. Great location, was super easy to find, just a few blocks from the subway. 
Dan is an AMAZING host and communicated with us from the moment we booked until we checked out.  He was there to help us with suggestions, which was good for us and I’m sure if you didn’t need him like we did, he’d give you your space. But it was very nice having someone that knew the city helping us out. 
The apt was very clean and had fresh flowers waiting for our arrival!  
Pick up & drip off of the keys was super easy and close to the apt.  Dan made it a point to come introduce himself & show us the apt; always nice to actually meet your host and for them to let you know where things are located. 
Would highly recommend booking with Dan, I wish all Airbnb hosts were this wonderful and the places were what they claim it to be, like this beautiful NYC apt was. 
If we ever have the chance to come back to NYC we’ll be booking with Dan again!!
A cozy ground floor apartment in a super convenient location.  We enjoyed our six night stay very much!
Nice, clean apartment in bustling neighborhood. Dan was very helpful and a pleasure to work with. Highly recommended.

Great apartment in an excellent location. Loved staying there. The hosts were welcoming and made sure our stay was good. Also I recommend contacting the uber driver that is working with the hosts, made things easier. Overall a great stay and would recommend!
Clean and practical. Smooth check-in. Fast responses to any questions.

Awesome location.  Off the busy streets, but close to everything.   Great restraunts in Hells Kitchen. Close to Subway if you choose not to walk, and lots of hop on hop off buses.  If your in New York awhile, I suggest getting a City Pass.  Saves you a lot of money and just a few blocks away also.

alloggio situato in posizione perfetta Dan persona squisita gentilissimo attento e discreto. veramente consigliato si può raggiungere qualsiasi posto di New York anche a piedi una meraviglia Grazie Dan Sei speciale

We just returned from a 4 night, 5 day getaway in NYC. We had the pleasure of staying with Dan and Danny and cannot say enough about how fantastic their place is, and how they have nailed it as superb hosts!!! The apartment is super clean, stylish and has all the amenities you need! Superb location in Hells Kitchen, that puts you within exact walking, bike, subway distance to all the sites you want to see.
What makes the experience extra special when staying here is that it is "better than a hotel room"!!!! Why??? Because you will not get service at hotel like you do with Dan and Danny. They truly love what they do and want you to "experience" NYC as it is meant to be seen. Like you live there, not like a tourist!. They provided us with early check in and sat down with us and gave us a wealth of tips and ways to enjoy the city. Whenever we had a question or wanted a good place to eat or know how to get somewhere they were a text away!! We took them up on all their advice and we were not disappointed!. We rode the CITIBIKES which was the easiest way to get around the city and see so much more than we would from a bus or subway. We ate at some amazing restaurants that not only had food that was delish, but service and people that were there to help make your experience great too!!! They provided us with a contact for fantastic drivers that helped to get us to and from the airport with ease. Mussa and Abdlai are such hard workers and took the time to tell us about their great city as well. All this with a cozy apartment to escape to and have the privacy of your own home with a nice nightcap and all the amenities you need!!
Thank you so much, we cannot wait to come back!!!
Dan and Danny think of all the details: super clean, soft crisp white sheets, hair dryer, excellent local tips, everything!
The place was super clean, everything we needed was there and Dan was there (via text) to help with anything and everything! Great place! Highly recommend!

The apartment was perfect! The location made it easily accessible to get to nearly any destination we had. Dan and Danny were great hosts, even having the apartment ready when we arrived early. They were great hosts providing the little extras that made our stay even better. The apartment was quiet, clean and perfect for my son and I.

We had a wonderful stay at Dan & Danny’s place - the location of the apartment was excellent as well as being very quiet.  It was clean and tidy with fresh yellow flowers. Dan’s communication was exceptional and provided us with so many great local tips.  Mussa/his brother’s pick up/drop off was fantastic - we flew in late/our flight was delayed and it was all very hassle free. We would highly recommend that too. Thanks Dan, we hope to see you again!
I can’t recommend this perfect apartment more highly!  Dan is the perfect host and the location is superb!

Dan is a very attentive host! His home is tastefully decorated and has all the amenities to be your home away from home . The apartment is small and comfortable . Dan even had fresh flowers  upon our arrival ! We were 1 block off the 50th street subway so it was easy getting around the city . We did use his Uber driver recommendations for when we flew into La Guardia ( La Guardia is the better price through Uber ) but took the subway to JFK going out ... plan on 1 hour 15minutes or more to get to the airport by subway! We felt safe walking in the neighborhood . Close to Central Park, Times Square, theatre, shopping and groceries !   Dan is an excellent host and his recommendations for restaurants were spot on !

Dan’s place was great, perfect location for seeing all the top tourist spots and lots of bars and restaurants in easy walking distance. Dan thoughtfully offered loads of suggestions for things to do in the area and was easily contactable throughout.

I loved staying at Dan's apartment! They gave some GREAT recommendations for where to eat and what to do (along with people to ask for and to tell them you know Dan!). The place was lovely and clean and I LOVED the small touches they provided for my arrival, including lights on, soft music playing, and fresh cut flowers on the table. It's a great place to stay if you're coming to NYC!
Great place, communicative and kind hosts, really good local recs.
The apartment is in an excellent location, not far from the subway and lots of nice restaurants and bars.  Dan was very helpful and provided lots of great tips.

We spent a week at Dan and Danny’s place and everything was as promised.  Before our arrival, Dan provided suggestions for neighbourhood restaurants and activities during our visit.  Everything was great!  Location was perfect and be sure to use the Uber driver suggested as he was outstanding.

It’s hard to find a better location, nicer place, wonderfully communicative and gracious host in NY!   Dan’s place is lovely and so well situated.  And Dan goes out of his way to be extra helpful.  I can’t wait until we go back!!   We’ll definitely stay again.

We learned one great thing about our trip to New York: all you need is Dan. First, his place is clean, tasteful and, for Manhattan, somewhat easy to move about in (the bedroom is a bit tight, but very cozy). It's also extremely well located, within walking distance of Times Square, Rockefeller Plaza, Central Park and even Trump Plaza (if that's your thing, not mine), plus a subway station is a block-and-a-half away. But second, and this is perhaps more important, Dan is a gracious, thoughtful host, with pages of suggestions on where to eat (all delicious, though we didn't always sit at the bar, Dan), when and what to experience, what not to do, and generally how to navigate the Big Apple (and beyond). We can't wait to make another trip to New York. We just hope we haven't made Dan's place more popular than it already is (for our own selfish means).
This is the second time we’ve stayed at Dan + Danny’s place. It’s the perfect central location, and they are amazing hosts.

This is an ideal location for the NYC Marathon weekend. Communications were prompt, friendly, thorough, and clear. Dan goes the extra mile with offering suggestions on how to best enjoy the space and the local area. He knows all of the gems in the area and is happy to share his knowledge. This is a great option if you want to take advantage of having a kitchen during your stay in NYC. An upgrade to the mattress would help with sleeping comfortably here. Otherwise this is a good option for anyone needing amenities that hotels do not provide.

Great! Dan and danny are excelent
The apartment perfect!
Very nice space in a terrific neighbourhood. Dan is a great host.
Great location!  Wonderful restaurants close by. Within walking distance to theaters.

Dan’s apartment was the perfect place to stay for a long weekend in NYC.  Just the right size for two people.  The apartment was comfortable, clean, stocked with essentials, in a great central location and quiet at night.  Check in and check out were both quick and easy. Dan was super helpful and communicative throughout.  He gave many great suggestions for food and drink nearby.  Overall we had a wonderful stay and would definitely book with Dan again!

Location and accommodation was perfect.
Ground floor location was great especially for moving luggage and after a long day walking around the galleries.
Dan and Danny were excellent hosts and provided immediate responses. Their directions and recommendations were perfect. 
If staying make use of their Uber recommendation for airport transfers.
This is the fourth time we have enjoyed Dan’s hospitality. We look forward to doing it again and again.

Everything was completely organized and the place was very comfortable.  The location was very good and I managed to walk to almost all places I planned to go.  Central Park, Broad way, VogueKnittingLive etc.   All the instruction and  recommendation was clear and very helpful.  After knowing our flight arrival time, Dan even let us check in early , arranging it with Uber driver he recommended.  Thank you so much during our stay.

The place is great.  It's small yet roomy enough to invite friends over to and it's stylish so it's a nice place to hang out with friends.  It also has a table you can work from with a laptop. 

As for the hosts, they are great.  Everything you need is in the flat.  Any issues are taken care of immediately.  

They go over and above providing information about the neighbourhood.  Where to buy things, where to do laundry, where to eat and drink.

Highly recommended.
Cozy apartment in a great location with a helpful and attentive host.

This was a brilliant apartment to stay in for our first trip to NYC. Excellent location and Dan struck the perfect balance between providing helpful recommendations for things to do and places to go, while also allowing us to crack on with our holiday. Super responsive, and his suggested taxi driver Abduel made the journey in and out pleasant and stress free.
Wonderful!!

name: the best location
summary: located near the oratory st joseph, restaurants and bars, 10 minutes from the city center by car and 5 minutes to the station Snowdon walk. spacious and comfortable for a couple. well equipped: internet, TV, queen bed ...
description: located near the oratory st joseph, restaurants and bars, 10 minutes from the city center by car and 5 minutes to the station Snowdon walk. spacious and comfortable for a couple. well equipped: internet, TV, queen bed ...

reviews.comments: Très belle place et propre , Adam à été très accueillant j'ai bien aimer ma fin de semaine

I stayed for six weeks while I did an apartment search.  I was very value-conscious when making the booking, and the value was just excellent.  Adam was very eager to please.  The location is wonderful: a quick walk to blue and orange subway (Metro) lines, and right by two very useful bus routes, the 51 and the 165.  Also, many stores, restaurants, cafes, etc. in both directions from building.  If value is important, you could hardly do better.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Really clean all around, nice little kitchen. Will definitely be my first option next time I visit. No complains. Two thumbs up

The apartment is exactly as you can see in the pictures and has everything you need in kitchen appliances and linen matters. The flat could use some repairs (like the floor and the sofa) but it's comfortable and has everything you need to stay for a while (except for a broom or a mop that I'll add). 
But everything was good and Adam was always reachable, helpful and nice :)
Adam was very communicative and the place had everything you would need for a comfortable stay!
Great place to stay. Adam was an amazing host. The place was very spacious and clean. Close to stores restaurants and downtown Montreal

The appartement is extremely clean. The location is great, near metro and bus station. 5 mns to supermarket and pharmacy. Adam is very helpful host. We enjoyed our stay and would high recommend it to our friends.
Adam was a gracious host. Great place to stay. Very clean.

I had a comfortable stay at Adam's apartment.  It was very clean, and conveniently located near Côte-des-Neiges and the Université de Montréal. 
 Adam was very friendly, and flexible with the check-in/out.
Tres sympa, bien situe, propre, equipe, excellent sejour chez Adam. On y retournera, en tout cas on recommande.
We had a great time at Adams, we love the location, check in and check out was easy, place was clean and confortable, communication was good too.
Appartement plus ou moins conforme. Emplacement super.
Good place to stay would recommend

Adam's apartment shows true to photos. The kitchen is small but well stocked for cooking  and the bed is comfortable. The air conditioning is a window unit but it cools down most of the apartment well. There is a working elevator just across the hall from Adam's apartment. It is within walking distance to l'Oratoire and grocery/restaurants. Would definitely recommend as the value is great for the price and Adam was a very accommodating host.
The place is as advertised.  Great place to stay at. Adam is an excellent host. Never had any issue. Would recommend to stay

Adam was a wonderful host. He met me at the apartment for check-in and explained the building and where everything was located. I had to contact him during my stay with a few questions about the area and he responded within minutes. 

The apartment was as advertised and also had a new sectional which was a nice touch. There was plenty of street parking and the apartment was located in a nice quiet area, that was a close walking distance to stores and restaurants.

Adam was very quick to respond when we needed a place to stay last minute. He met us within a few hours to show us the apartment and give us the keys. The apartment was exactly as described. It was very close to a bus stop (right outside the front door) and about a 10 minute walk to the Snowdon metro station.

Adam's place is even better than what you see when you book.  He has all the necessary things you require for your trip and even more, like pasta, olive oil, varieties of tea, sugar, ear buds and even hand soap and body soap.  

The place is very clean,  the washroom is sparkling clean, the linen is washed and smells fresh, the living room is very comfortable to watch TV and just have a relaxing evening.
The kitchen has everything you need to prepare a meal or just put stuff in the oven, the fridge worked very well.  The A/c was a blessing as it gets quite warm in summer.

Adam is very quick at communication and always answered the phone when I called him or messaged him.  He gave us a very good restaurant recommendation for our anniversary dinner 'Rayan'  which specialises in seafood, has very fresh stuff and is decently priced.

Our check in and checkout was seamless and we had absolutely no problem finding the nearest supermarket, tourist sites, easily accessible public transport, close to old Montreal and downtown.  Very close to St. Joseph's oratory.  Safe neighbourhood at all times of the day.  

Adam is an extremely good host, I would recommend his place anytime to anyone without hesitation.  

Thank you Adam for letting us reserve your place.  We hope to book it again when we next visit Montreal.  
Kind regards,
Très propre. Arrivée sans encombre. Bien équipé. Tranquille et accueillant pour une famille. Très correct pour le prix.
Excelente estancia, nos encantó el apto, excelente ubicación y muy cómodo
Great place to relax. Perfect location to explore Montreal. Forgot something at Adams place and he was super helpful and send it back to us. Trustworthy and reliable host.
It was an amazing stay at Adam's place.
Adam was responsive and flexible. Top notch experience. Next time I go to Montreal I will definitely stay here. It is well located to local sites and transit (there’s a stop right outside the door).

Adam a été un super hôte, il a tout fait pour que mes parents s'y sentent bien. Ils ont séjourné 3 semaines dans son appartement très conforme à l'annonce. L'emplacement est idéal par le bus et métro à quelques mètres. Je recommande sans hésitation super qualité prix. Merci Adam.
It was an amazing experience chez Adam!  He accommodated our stay spectacularly, was very flexible, and a very nice host in general. Highly recommend it!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

neighborhood_overview: The residential neighborhood of Laranjeiras Rio is also the seat of government, at Guanabara Palace. Here it is also the stadium Fluminense, traditional carioca team. It is a quiet neighborhood in the shadow of Corcovado and which also leaves the cable car of Christ the Redeemer. It is a good option for those on a smaller budget but still want to stay in the south. The neighborhood has no bohemian tradition, but the Little Market St Joseph boils at night with its bars. It is also easy to go to Santa Teresa or the Cosme Velho.
notes: One entry is allowed in the apartment, the guests who are doing the hiring. It will not be allowed to enter other people in the apartment.
transit: Near to Largo do Machado subway (10 min by bus and 15-20 min walk). Near to Santa Barbara tunnel , to the domestic airport, to the bus station; near to the beaches, cinema, theater, shopping malls, tourist spots like Corcovado (15 min walk), Morro da Urca, Flamengo, among many others.
access: The guest wants to rent the apartment will have access to every room. According to the rented time will be available space in the bedroom closet.
interaction: During my free time I will be delighted to help, guide and, if possible, follow on several tours in Rio.
house_rules: Keep it clean and organized. The entrance to the apartment is allowed only for guests who have rented the apartment. Family building, not being allowed to loud noise, parties, and any other behavior that disturb neighbors. Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment. There is a wide area of the building for smokers. It is not allowed pets.

neighborhood_overview: is located a few minutes away from the Ramblas, in the heart of Barcelona.  The Plaça Catalunya, the Cathedral, the Barrí Gotic (Gothic Quarter), the Boquería food market, The Liceu opera-house, the Colón monument, the marina (Port Vell), Barceloneta beach, the MACBA museum (famous for being the SONAR festival venue as well as an international skateboarding haunt), the trendy Born area, the Picasso Museum, the elegant Eixample district (including the gay district, popularly known as “Gayxample”) and the Passeig de Gracia are all 10 minutes away on foot.
notes: - THERE IS NO ELEVATOR - SUPERCENTRAL, in the heart of Barcelona.   - BEDDING and towels provided.  - KITCHEN - LOUNGE - DINING ROOM, to share  - DIRECT LINKS TO AIRPORT via metro, train, aerobus  - WIFI INTERNET  -Note: The exact address and arrival instructions are detailed on your booking confirmation. Please send me your flight/arrival info when you book.
transit: Easy access on public transport: Metro – 3 stations are close by: LICEU (Green line L3), SANT ANTONI (Purple Line L2), CATALUNYA (Red line L1 / Green line L3 / Regional trains), buses, Airport Bus (Aerobús) and Tourist Bus (Bus Turístic).
access: very pleasant dining & lounge area and a fully equipped kitchen, providing everything you need to prepare meals
house_rules: clean, responsible and respectful people

reviews.comments:
Sehr nette Gastgeberin, das kleine, aber gemütliche ZImmer liegt sehr zentral, alles ist zu Fuß gut zu erreichen.
Kleinere PRobleme wurden umgehend beseitigt.

It was the first experience with AirBnB for the three of us and we were positively impressed of this service. We had any problem, everything was clean, we had the kitchen available for us, everything like it's said in the profile.

Undoubtly recommendable
Appartement tres bien situé proche des Ramblas, propre, très agréable ! Nous avons passé un excellent séjour, le logement est très calme malgré sa proximité avec les lieux animés

Logement très propre, calme et bien placé (proximité avec la bibliothèque de catalogne).
A recommander.
Wspaniała lokalizacja. Jedyny problem to wąskie, wysokie schody. Spedziłam tylko jedną noc. Polecam
Great apartment. Location was excellent, host was friendly and accommodating and the apartment itself was as described.
Sandra is an amazing host, she is very accommodating and the location and the apartment were really nice.
Good. Recommended.

Very clean, great that we had our own bathroom in our room. Also had access to kitchen and washing machine. Kind of had the feeling of a hostel because there are a few other air bnb room within the flat but it was also very private. Great for friends looking for an affordable bnb in Barcelona.

The apartment was nice and the room very clean. It was located just off la Rambla which made it very easy to walk everywhere. The communication with the hostess Sandra was very easy and fast. Unfortunately we never met her because she does not live in the apartment. The apartment was shared with other people we didn't know. All in all it was a nice stay. We were just hoping for a little more personal stay - but since Sandra doesn't live there it was not very different from a good hostel stay.
Nice and big room with private bathroom, apartment very close to rambla. Cons: it is a kind of hostel as other rooms booked by other people, third floor without elevator.

Vi havde et dejligt ophold, værelset var rent og fint, mens det fælles køkken / køleskab var ikke særlig appetitlig, der blev ikke vasket op efter brug af service og køleskabet trængte til en oprydning, det gav ikke en lyst til at lave mad.
Vi blev godt modtaget selv om vi først kom kl. 01 om natten, selv om det var en ven der låste os ind, vi så ikke Sandra.
Ud fra det billede Sandra har på af sig selv, troede jeg fejlagtig, der var altan da det er et billede af 2 liggestole og udsigt, men det var der ikke..
This airbnb is good place to sleep for sightseeing. First of all, it is cheap. and its locatio is very good

The good points for the place: 
Great location in the middle of Ramblas, a kitchen to cook, private bathroom, comfortable beds.

The bad points for the place:
There's a lot of difficulty with the lock of the front door, so getting in could become a problem if you are coming back at odd hours and there's no one to open it from inside; hot water runs out fast, there's no lift so you have to climb all the way to the top floor.
We had to be constantly behind the host to solve the problems, which Sandra was responsive enough to do. She came over to solve whatever she could so yes, she was a responsive host. She also helped us book a cab for our return journey to the airport.

Great stay for us- wonderful location and price. Clean and spacious. Sandra was very helpful recommending things to see. Up a lot of stairs so just be prepared. Our only complaint was how hot it was at night. No AC or fans.

Unfortunately we´ve never met, but Sandra arranged everything perfectly. We got the key from Gladys, who also lives there. The apartment itself is nice and was just perfect for us 3 girlfriends. It´s located right at the centre (only a 2min walk to Las ramblas). Bars, restaurants, bakerys, the big market are right there. 
One more thing: The apartment is on 3rd floor, but feels like being on 8th floor. So make sure you dont bring a big suitcase, since this can be a little tough bringing it up there. ;-) You may need a shower afterwards. :-)

Waiting in front of the door for more than an hour to get in to the appartment. 
Barcelona is very hot, but in the little triple room, we dont have a fan!!!!!
And the kitchen was not very clean.......

The apartment it self is nice and it's in a very good area close to many things! We just weren't aware how many stairs there would be and no AC in the room in the very hot weather with 3 people wasn't pleasant. I'm sure in cooler weather it would be fine!! But on the second day our friend sprained her ankle and wasn't able to walk up all the stairs so we moved to a hotel.

Great location and very clean. Our only complaint was how hot it was but Sandra was quite accommodating by placing a fan inside the room for us. Up a lot of stairs so recommend travelling light but overall we had a wonderful stay!

Nice room and kitchen, we only didn't expect the amount of stairs and we thought there was air conditioning in the room but it's only in the living room. (There was a fan tho) Great location, so overal pretty nice.

Pros: Location is great to La Rambles and other areas.  Street is well lit and many markets nearby, WIFI has a good signal

Cons: The steps are narrow and many, Door is hard to open.  Toilet seat wouldn't stay on, one light in bathroom was broken and we didn't realize there was smoking allowed in the main area, so people smoked at a window directly adjacent to our window so we had had keep the it shut during the high heat of August.
War nett

The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lo único bueno es la ubicación del departamento, No te ofrecen el servicio de limpieza, nosotros estuvimos 4 noches sin limpieza por lo que la tuvimos que hacer nosotras, lo malo es que los ocupantes de las otras piezas no eran muy limpios, por lo que los espacios comunes no fueron muy agradables. Las escaleras son horribles, si vas de viaje con equipaje pesado, mejor elige otro alojamiento. A la anfitriona solo la vimos cuando nos pasó las llaves, solo eso, ningún interés más.
Muy bien ubicado

Sandra was a fantastic host she welcomed us on arrival and made us feel at home before handing us the keys. She gave us all the information needed as far as beautiful cities go, Barcelona has been one of the highlights of my trip I would recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Barcelona this place is in a prime location with a 3 minute walk to the main street with all shops and food places as well as the markets. 
once again Sandra thank you!
Sandra nice person. Flat is god. but there are a lot of steps until you reach the flat. there are very nice people staying there. and host sandra will guide you and help for everything.

Our stay at Sandra's very centrally located and comfortable airbnb has simply been the best . At short notice she accommodated us and looked after us like family . The flat is located in close proximity to la Rambla and de raval . Both very popular spots . We have been traveling for a while and have accumulated quite some luggage so we stored it within 5 mins walk from Sandra's at a very reasonable rate . It overcame the stair issue that has been mentioned in other reviews . ( I think stairs are just a way of life on this city ) This accommodation is wonderful . Comfy beds , lovely doonas, oil heaters in bedrooms clean and tidy as one would expect . Makes for happy travelers
Nice place very close to LA Rambla and market La Boqueria. If you like this area it is really very good option. Lot of small bars and restaurants around. There is also a spacious kitchen/living room.
Location was great, very close to the ramblas and la boqueria. Sandra was on time and exchange of the keys went really well. The room was sober but very clean. Great place to stay at.
El alojamiento estaba bien, pero se debe mejorar la limpieza de las zonas comunes y la atención en la llegada.

Mieszkanie położone jest w znakomitej lokalizacji, praktycznie w samym centrum miasta. Mieszkanie było czyste, zadbane i dobrze wyposażone. Gospodarz jest bardzo miły i wyrozumiały a w razie potrzeby zawsze służy radą. Polecam to mieszkanie i gospodarza każdemu!
Good place !

Sandra nous a très bien accueilli, et quand nous avions besoins de conseil elle a su nous diriger vers les meilleurs prestataires rapidement.
Appartement idéalement situé. Très calm. Attention il est au 5eme étages organisez vous bien pour éviter les aller retour.
Bien chauffé, nous n'avons pas eu froid en decembre.
O melhor da casa é a localização. Muito próximo da La rambla. Quando chegamos a Sandra foi muito prestável e presente para esclarecer dúvidas turísticas.
Boeken ging snel, direct antwoord van Sandra, goede aanwijzingen om er te komen. Rustige kamer, goed geslapen, keuken prima. MIdden in centrum. Top.

Posizione ottima spartano ma economico nota dolente 4 piani di scale senza ascensore per chi non è abituato sono una difficoltà se non si hanno tante pretese la camera può andare la doccia arrugginita la cosa che mi ha dato più fastidio per il resto buono

Idéalement situé mais une odeur d'humidité dans la chambre.
En décembre, il fait froid dans la chambre et la salle de bain malgré le chauffage d'appoint.
Il y a cinq étages à monter (80 marches ) et un peu bruyant la nuit.
Dans l'ensemble, séjour agréable.

Cette première expérience avec airbnb a été plus que satisfaisante.
Sandra a été très à l'écoute et s'est montrée disponible pour répondre à nos questions. Les personnes vivant dans l'appartement ont été fort sympathiques aussi. La rue où nous résidions était très vivante et nous avions tout à proximité (shopping, restaurants, bars,...). C'était vraiment le pied ! Si vous passez par Barcelone, je vous recommande cet endroit car vous pouvez découvrir la ville (à pied, en bus, en taxi ou en métro) avec toutes les commodités nécessaires à deux pas de l'appartement !
Ps : La plage est à seulement 15 min à pied et à 5 min en métro !

It was up a lot of stairs and the wifi in the room itself was a tad slow (I'd walk into the common area to use it if I needed to do something data-heavy), but overall I was really satisfied with the place! The location was absolutely amazing and the room was super spacious and the bathroom was clean. 10/10. Would recommend.

Nous n'avons pas eu la chambre présentée sur les photos. La chambre était propre dans son ensemble. Un peu mal isolée. Nous n'avons pas eu d'eau chaude à plusieurs reprises. 
Malgré tout, logement au calme bien que tres bien localisé, près de tout. Cela reste un bon rapport qualité prix

Déjà il faut savoir que le logement est occupe par 2 gommes et que Sandra ne réside pas sur place et donc en cas de problème il faut attendre qu elle vienne
Nous avons été surprise par l occupation des lieux par 2 garçons sans qu in ne soit prévenu
Bien allumé le chauffage d appoint toute la journée car chambre glaciale et impossibilité d accéder aux autres pièces glaciales et cuisine inutilisable car utilisée par les occupants( vaisselles sales dans evier et frigo laissant à désirer)
Pas eu d eau chaude soir et matin obligé d attendre que Sandra arrive
Pas wifi pendant tout le séjour et soi disant des réparateurs devaient venir....
Et enfin pension au rdc de l immeuble avec personnes peu frequentable( alcoolisé etc) d ailleurs un homme est monte jusqu au logement et était fort alcoolisé 
Sinon bien situe près Ramblas et Metro
Je le deconseille or séjour famille et 2 filles seules
Sandra was very kind and welcomed us into her home.  Great value for price, but be aware there arte lots of stairs to reach the apartment.
Its a grate solution for a short stay, really central, chip and clean. Its all you need to have a good stay in Barcelona.
ottima posizione ed organizzazione da parte della host Sandra

Todo el apartamento está muy bien, aunque no muy limpio. Estuvimos en el apartamento 3 noches. No hay ascensor, que es difícil de subir con las maletas. Sin embargo, la ubicación de la vivienda es muy bueno. Todas las atracciones se encuentran cerca es cerca de la estación de metro. y tseklom bien y la anfitriona era amable y nos dio una primera y necesaria información sobre los destinos turísticos. nos introduce consejos útiles.
Sandra is a very nice host and the location is in the center of city. You can also meet other visitors living in other rooms.
Good ratio between price and quality. Clean room and bathroom.

Logement proche de la Rambla mais avec une chambre donnant sur une cour intérieure donc calme. Problème de l'escalier assez abrupte avec des valises et de l'humidité dans la salle de bain. Sinon, appartement agréable et hôte sympathique.
Location by 5 points; living conditions by 3 points.
Muy céntrico y tranquilo, bien comunicado, limpio, básico, sin ascensor.
The location is amazing! Almost everything is within walking distance and it's really close to the metro for longer trips.
The stairs to Sandra's place were rough!

Nice flat. Very central location. Good host. Walk everywhere from this apartment. Full kitchen facilities but we did not use as there are loads of eating establishments a minutes walk from the flat. Cut through the side alley and you are in the central market. The flat is in an Arab area so if you are looking for halal food, you won't be disappointed. Lots of halal eating places and butchers on Carrer de l'Hospital. For halal curries, go to Rajah's Restaurant on Carrer Nou De La Rambla or Bombay Spice on Carrer de Sant Pau. Overall, a good stay and nice visit of Barcelona.
Hote très accomodante! Beau séjour dans cette chambre malgré les odeurs.

Really close to the Rambla street and the metro and bus stations, great for a few nights stay for sleeping and cooking, and since it is on the third floor its recommend you to have a small piece of luggage with you. Sandra is a great host, we had a very late check in, and left the baggage later after check out without problems. Would recommend to young travellers.

Le logement était très bien placé. Nous avons été surprise par le nombre de marches pour arriver au logement. 78 marches dans un escalier étroit. Le chauffe eau était toujours en panne nous avons du nous doucher a l eau froide pendant tout le sejour ce qui n est pas top apres  avoir visité toute la journée sous le soleil. Le logement est aussi occupé par de jeunes étudiants et la cuisine était dans un état d insalubrité ( vaisselle, frigo, evier).  Impossible d y cuisiner nous n y prenions que les petits déjeuners. Pas cher mais pas top.

It's a convenient location in the center of the city with multiple bus lines and metro entrances near by. However room is located on the top floor of the building with about 6 flights of stairs, so I wouldn't recommend it to the guests who have luggages or if climbing a lot of stairs multiple times in a day is a problem. 
When we stayed there, the hot shower was broken. They were really nice and taught us how to bring hot water back temporarily. It only worked 5 minutes at a time unfortunately, but there just wasn't much anyone can do about it.
TONS of stairs with no lift. Not the cleanest, but appropriate accommodations for the price. Location near Las Ramblas was great!

We hadden een koude douche en er sliepen meerdere gasten in t huis. Die ook gebruik maakten van de keuken. Die daardoor zo smerig was dat wij hem niet gebruikt hebben. Bedden sliepen wel erg goed en locatie ook

Spartanisch eingerichtetes 3-Bett Zimmer mit eigenem Bad. 
Duschvorhang - keine Klimaanlage - Fenster zum Innenhof - Bad ohne Fenster

Achtung: Zimmer in einer 3er Wohngemeinschaft. Die Mitbewohner zwischen 25 und 30 (ca.) sind sehr nett und unaufdringlich. Jeder macht sein Ding.

Aufenthaltsraum, gleichzeitig Küche, Essbereich und Eingangsbereich ist klimatisiert. Dort darf auch geraucht werden.

Super Preis-Leisungsverhältnis! Super Lage! 
Alles in Allem - Empfehlenswert wenn man ohne großen Schnick-Schnack auskommt.
спасибо за комфортное пребывание:удобное местоположение(центр города, магазины,экскурсионное обслуживание все рядом). Демократичные цены, просторная комната,свободный wi-fi.

If you ready to climb 80 steps and share kitchen/dining area with others the place is perfect 
Excellent location
Host is great and accommodating 
Very easy to communicate with her

Great location for cheap accommodation. You pay for what you get - showers were cold, room was boiling in the summer, located on the 5th of 6th floor so lots of steep stairs, our room's window was on the courtyard and noise from residents of the pension on the first floor flowed up and could be quite noisy. There was only one set of keys for our room of 3 and no where to leave the keys which proved annoying at times. Sandra was a great host at the beginning - check out was very straight forward - however she was not seen after check in and failed to reply to any of our messages on the Airbnb app and (Hidden by Airbnb) even regarding checkout.

Habitación en muy buen estado, amplia y cómoda. Buena ubicación y comunicación. Sandra se porto genial con nosotras nos dio un mapa y nos dijo que podíamos visitar y el último día pudimos dejar las maletas hasta nuestra hora de marchar. Repetiríamos!
Es un lugar céntrico, y facilita el acceso a varios lugares, solo si cuenta con muchas escaleras, ideal para jóvenes que no tengan lesión de rodillas, si lo recomendamos

Lage: Top 
Die Wohnung liegt optimal in der Seitenstraße von den Ramblas. So erreicht man zwar schnell Supermarkt, Metro, Shopping Möglichkeiten und Viele Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß, im Zimmer ist es jedoch angenehm ruhig. Die anderen Mitbewohner wohnen dort teilweise länger und sind freundlich und ruhig.

Ausstattung: Für den Preis angemessen 

Es gibt einen Föhn, Bettwäsche und Handtücher. Die Küche hat eine Standardausstattung. Für den Preis gibt es alles, was man braucht.
Was gesagt sein sollte: Die Wohnung ist im 3. Stock und nur über das enge Treppenhaus erreichbar, was allerdings außer bei der Anreise mit viel Gepäck nicht stört. 

Fazit :Wer eine Luxuswohnung erwartet, wird hier nicht fündig, aber für den billigen Preis ist das Zimmer super! Billiger als die meisten Hostels, super Lage und eine freundliche Gastgeberin.

Sandra is erg vriendelijk en gastvrij. De locatie is perfect en midden in de stad. Helaas is de kamer klein en daardoor erg te warm om in te slapen met 3 personen. Er is geen airco aanwezig. Ook moet je 13 trappen lopen voordat je in het hostel bent.

Absoluut pluspunt is de locatie. 1 straat verwijderd van La Rambla. Parkeren kan in een betaalde garage in de straat. (€23,- per dag).
Onze 3-persoonskamer was bloedheet (de gezamenlijke ruimte had airco) maar was ruim en had een eigen badkamer. 
Helaas hebben we geen van allen warm water gehad; we hoorden ook de gasten van andere kamers hierover klagen. Overall gezien een nette prijs voor deze kamer. De communicatie met Sandra verliep uitstekend.

It is a nice and simple room, in a good location. There was no AC in the room, but there was a fan, which made it completely fine. Overall, the room was good. The main issue we had was that the wifi did not work at all, and that was really inconvenient for us (we didn't have Internet in our phones, so we had a hard time). It's important to note that the apartment is in the last floor, so there are a lot of stairs. Finally, I must say that we had a late arrival and Sandra was very accommodating, and had a friend waiting for us. We really appreciated that!
Schöne Wohnung mit perfekter Lage

The appartment is very good! It's very big, has a nice living and dinning room. Room is okay, private restroom clean. 
The worst: sometimes hot water doesn't work, and the stairs are a lot. We were with many baggages and it was terrible to walk them up and down. 
The best: the flat's location and Sandra. It's very centry, so reachable with any transportation you imagine, very near to La Rambla and walking distance to Plaza Cataluña, the beach, and more. Sandra is very friendly and worried about your staying, she bought us water after we arrived and made some recommendations. 
I recommend it!
No

Siamo stati per 2 notti a a casa di Sandra, è andato tutto bene.
Sandra è stata molto gentile ed è stata molto d'aiuto!
Schönes helles und ruhiges Zimmer mit eigenem Bad. Die Küch mit guter Ausstattung, leider ohne direktes Tageslicht. Die Treppen sind ein gutes Training, kein Problem. Gerne wieder.
Great location in the center of the city.
Nette Unterkunft mit gutem Preis-Leistungsverhältnis in bester Lage nur 3 Minuten von "La Rambla" entfernt.
Very cozy, quite, clean and convenient room. Like it~
