Stanza da 3 letti con bagno in camera grande. Tutto molto pulito. Si arriva alla rambla in meno di 10 minuti a piedi. Sandra è stata gentilissima e ci ha permesso di lasciare i bagagli nell'appartamento anche oltre l'ora del check out.
The apartment was very nice and clean. On top of that the host was very welcoming and helpful with all of our needs. I will definitely be back in the future!
God beliggenhed og hyggelig lejlighed. Vi fik nøgle og kunne gå og komme som vi ville. Fantastisk sted til en herlig pris.

Sandra reageert gelijk. Ze is erg vriendelijk en wil je overal mee helpen.We kamer is schoon en het bed en de dekbedden goed. De woonkamef en de keuken deel je met 2 meiden die er wonen. Hebben wij niet gedaan maar de mogelijkheid is er. Het appartement is op de bovenste verdieping en het trappenhuis is smal. Maar voor 2 nachten was het prima te doen. Je zit midden in het centrum bij de Ramblas direct achter de grootste versmarkt van Europa. Je loopt in 20 minuten naar de zee en het strand. Restaurants en barretjes zitten in de buurt. Wij komen graag nog een keer in deze kamer terug. Een aanrader is een fietstocht langs alle grote  bezienswaardigheden en als je ene taxi nodig hebt download dan de mytaxi app. Dan zie je wie je chauffeur is en wat de rit je ongeveer gaat kosten je kunt de taxi direct of ver van te voren bestellen.

Staying at Sandra's place was great. It's located really close to Las Ramblas and our room even had its own bathroom in it, which was a nice surprise! Sandra was also very helpful and a good communicator. The kitchen was pretty dirty though.
Czyściutko, zgodnie z opisem. Polecam !!! :)
Un lugar muy bonito cerca de la Rambla, puedes llegar fácilmente caminando, Sandra es muy atenta y amable, sin embargo el único inconveniente es el ruido de los vecinos por las noches.
Buena comunicación con la anfitriona, apartamento muy bien ubicado, cómodo para jóvenes y limpio.
La habitacion esta muy bien y la situación del piso es genial para visitar Barcelona. Gracias por todo!
Great place! Couldn't ask for much more--great location, privacy, private shower. Came and went as we pleased and had a good talk with Sandra the morning we left.
람블라스 거리의 LICEU 역과 매우 가깝습니다. 주변에도 볼거리가 많으면서도 이동도 편리했습니다.
Super lokalita skvělé (Website hidden by Airbnb) skvělé jak je k dispozici na pokoji rovnou sociální zařízení....
Il soggiorno è stato perfetto. La camera era come descritta e vicinissima al centro. L'unica pecca è stata la cucina, gli altri inquilini l'hanno lasciata sporca, ma non è stata colpa dell'Host
Sandra hoş bir şekilde karşılamadı bizi ve mutfakta bayğı kötü bir koku vardı. Evin yeri fena değildi fakat hijyen konusunda aynı şeyi söyleyemicem .

Muy buena ubicación en el barrio de Poble Sec. Habitación perfecta y muy limpia para un grupo de tres personas. Sábanas y toallas muy limpias! La comunicación con Sandra fue perfecta. Recomiendo hospedarse con maletas pequeñas porque se tienen que subir varios pisos por una escalera estrecha hasta el alojamiento (no hay ascensor).

위치가 정확히 뜨지않아 우리가 겨우겨우 찾아야했습니다. 숙소도 꼭대기층에있고 계단이 무너지기 일보직전. 엘레베이터도 없고 정말 괴로웠습니다. 호스트가 신경질적이어서 힘들게 계단을 올라왔는데 기분이 상했습니다. 숙소는 이미 하숙비슷한 것을 하고있는 학생들이 밤마다 영화를 틀어놓고 보고(애정행각을 하며) 주방도 지저분하여 사용하고싶지않았습니다.
방은 춥고 라디에이터 하나로 견뎌야합니다. 화장실 문은 닫히지않고 샤워부스가 작고 낮아 화장실이 온 종일 축축했습니다. 화장실의 라디에이터는 나오지않음. 샴푸가 구비되어있다거 적혀있었는데 비누조차 없었습니다. 드라이기는 너무 지저분해서 사용하지않았습니다. 최악의 숙소였습니다.

Great location, close to metro station, late night supermarkets and restaurants. Sandra was very hospitality and kind, she's looking for best way for communication and trip advices. Aways look how she can help you!

Wish you best Barcelona experiance as we had :)!
Casa limpia aunque para llegar haya que subir muchisimas escaleras y muy estrechas, bien ubicada
It was ok but the check in was not easy and the host not very polite..I don't know if I would stay here again..

Le logement est situé dans un appartement hébergeant des étudiants.
Il est très bien situe géographiquement.

Die Wohnung ist sehr zu empfehlen. Perfekte Lage und gemütliche Betten ;) leider war der angepriesene Föhn kaputt und bei drei Frauen war das besonders ärgerlich. Aber Sandra ist super freundlich, reichte uns auf Nachfrage sofort weitere Handtücher. Von den Mitbewohnern merkt man überhaupt nichts und die Stufen sind auch nach einem ausgedehnten Sangriaabend gut machbar ;) kommen gerne wieder

Το δωμάτιο ήταν πολύ μικρό αλλά το δικό του μπάνιο ήταν πολύ χρήσιμο! Η κουζίνα του δεν είχε παράθυρο και η καθαριότητα της αμφιλεγομενη. Εξαιρετική τοποθεσία! Πάρα πολλες σκάλες για να φτάσεις στο διαμερισμα
This apartment has a great location, near the metro and city centre.

The apartment is full of people we had some difficulties to use Kitchen/lounge as it's occupied very often. Room is very small. Room is located on the top floor so it look like climbing on Mount Everest to get there but when we finally reached the top floor the main door has a broken door lock which makes it difficult to open the door every single time which is very annoying.

Sandra showed the trick to open the door which makes me laugh as it should be fixed immediately.

Our flight had a delay thats why we had to check in around 11pm, which was no problem for Sandra and very nice of her. The room is very central and vivid! Bathroom could be cleaner. But for that price it was nice.
Great location. Great City. Great Host :)

Would have given this place 5 stars if it had an elevator- it is up a lot of stairs. 
Perfect location, nice clean room as well. Wish the (Hidden by Airbnb) were friendlier though as we were having trouble opening the door a few times. Overall would definitely stay again as most of the day you’re out exploring anyway! Sandra is a really easy host to get in contact with and replies straight away. Gracias sandra!

ottima posizione, centrale, molto silenzioso. Purtoppo la pulizia lasciava a desiderare, soprattutto i pavimenti e la doccia. Se non fosse per questo, sarebbe stato ottimo.
sarebbe utile anche  avere almeno un piccolo armadio per deporre i vestiti.
There’s a few stairs, but has a great location and great host!

Sandra es buena anfitriona, llegada muy puntual, el apartamento estaba limpio. Las escaleras son MUCHAS !  y pequeñas por lo que no lo recomiendo para familias, solo para jóvenes que vayan sin mucho equipaje para pasar unos días. Tiene buena ubicación aunque cuando llegas lo notas un poco inseguro pero luego te das cuenta que está bien. En fin, si vas sin mucho equipaje, y no te molesta subir escaleras este apartamento es buena opción.
This is a budget accommodation. It was clean and as described. Communication was fine,Sandra speaks good English.
Sehr zentrale Lage und für ein paar Tage vollkommen ausreichend. Der Weg zur Unterkunft ist sehr schmal und beinhaltet viele Treppen
Super stay in Barcelona
Great place if you're looking for somewhere cheap and simple in Barcelona - a word of warning though, there is no air con but there is a large fan, so is a bit sticky during the summer months!

The house is in a great location, because of its proximity to the Rambla. On the other hand, there aren't many windows in the house and there is no window in the private bathroom.
Sandra was very kind: she answered soon to my text messages and she allowed us to let our luggage in the house after our check-out until the night when we left Barcelona.

Pro: Great location and nice, responsive host.

Con: Dirty floors and kitchen, extremely foul smell from a kitchen cabinet, no microwave, toaster, oven, missing cooking hob switches, two of the hobs can't be turned on without a wrench, no matches or working lighters to ignite the hob.

Overall the apartment feels very neglected and broken down, window frames are rotting away and numerous things are broken or close to falling apart (furniture).

Great little space for a group of three of us for a couple of nights recovery after Benicàssim festival! No air con so the room was always pretty warm and the stairs are a nightmare! Sandra was quick at responding and was keen to give us helpful advice about Barcelona. Thank you :)
Posizione buona e centrale ma ci sono troppe scale e non c'è l'ascensore

My sisters and I spent two nights at this place while visiting Barcelona. It was about what we had expected for the price. The location was great, and we used our room primarily to crash at the end of a long day. We didn't use the common space or kitchen on our visit. Our only other comment is that it is on the 3rd floor, and even with a fan running, the room was very hot when we visited in August. Would recommend to a friends looking for a well located place to crash with decent Wi-Fi, but it will feel hot for summer visitors as there is no A.C.
Não falamos com a Sandra. O quarto esteve sempre demasiado quente, foi difícil descansar ou dormir. Sandra raramente respondeu às mensagens

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt in Barcelona. Haben das Zimmer aber wirklich nur zum übernachten genutzt. Das Zimmer ist wie beschrieben. Einfach, aber alles was man so zum Übernachten braucht, super zentrale Lage und alles hat reibungslos geklappt. Ich schließe mich gern den Vorschreibern an: Preis-Leistung ist top.
Ottima posizione, ma poca pulizia e comunicazione.
Sandra was a nice and friendly host. Location was allright and the room was like in the pictures.

Ottima posizione dell'alloggio, a due passi dalla rambla. Pulizia più che accettabile.
La stanza si trova in un appartamento di studenti, che comunque sono stati gentili nel fornirci indicazioni e dettagli sull'utilizzo della casa. L'unico aspetto che non abbiamo apprezzato come ospiti è la cucina lasciata piena di piatti sporchi tutto domenica e lunedi, oltre al fortissimo odore di fritto di sabato sera per via di una festicciola (che comunque non è stata particolarmente rumorosa, noi siamo andate tranquillamente a letto abbastanza presto). Sono stati molto carini a non fumare nel cortile interno che da sulla stanza da noi affittata dopo avergli fatto notare che altrimenti sarebbe entrato tutto il fumo da noi, apprezzabile.
Good location
only the room shared kitchen amd lounge srea
was  not bad to stay in this accommodation for 3 days but it was a little dirty and if you have a heavy bags it will be difficult to reach the last floor.
The bedroom clean and confortable beds, but the kitchen dirty, doesn’t work heating, WiFi (first day) and don’t have air dryer. Medium.
Suitale room for suitable price ☺
The apartment was in a great location and for a great price! The space is shared with other guests. One issue was during check in, when I had to wait outside the door for a while before being let in.
Great location ! And the landlord is nice and flexible, which allowed us to leave our luggages in the flat after check out.

Satisfactory and is exactly what you pay for. Perfect for students or young people backpacking around Europe. Location is perfect, right off of La Rambla. Sandra is very hands-off and spoke good English as well as answered her phone quickly.
Nothing too fancy, but that's exactly what we needed.

Sorry but a total disaster with our stay in this apartment (Website hidden by Airbnb) We donot recommend this place at all
Heating system broken shower issues flooding.... water at shower does not get hot enough, toilet paper soap not well supplied nor towels Irma the lady that met us on Check in was in a hurry 
     Room not cleaned on a regular basis 
Only one set of keys given for 3 people no hair dryer 
   So many more OMG !!!!!THIS PLACE NEEDS TO HE MAINTAINED AND CHECKED BEFORE RECEIVING GUESTS AGAIN IN FUTURE

The area was not safe,but located in the center ,close to La Ramplas.The apartment was at 4th floor with no elevator. In apartment there was bad smell. IMORTANT: IT HAS NOT WARM-HOT WATER FOR SHOWER IN PRIVATE ROOM !!! EVEN TO PUBLIC SHOWER.

Место исключительно для тех, кому нужно переночевать. Прекрасное месторасположение, но есть отдельные нюансы: холодное помещение (это касается зимнего пребывания) и практически отсутсвие горячей воды. Но если Вас это не пугает - то это прекрасный вариант по низкой цене и с прекрасным расположением!
It was ok. The house is in a great Place, but there’s no hot water and no internet.
Es un buen sitio, precio accesible, bastante céntrico, con opciones de comida y lugares turísticos muy cercanos.
recomendable, buena relación precio calidad , ubicación seguridad etc .

We had a problem with hot water... who dont like cold showers dont go there..... they didnt solved it for 4days and i wrote to sandra about that and she answered that i have to wait for hot water... but i was waiting like 40 minutes and still nothing happend so it was really bad experience with shower in this apartment ...

name: Amazing 3 Rooms Copacabanas Heart
summary: Big apartment in the best street in Copocabana. Beautiful apartment with 3 double bedrooms , 2 full bathrooms, fully equipped. All rooms with ceiling fan and two of them  with air conditioning.
space: Spacious and charming apartment , fully equipped for a wonderful stay .  All rooms with ceiling fan and two of them  with air conditioning.
description: Big apartment in the best street in Copocabana. Beautiful apartment with 3 double bedrooms , 2 full bathrooms, fully equipped. All rooms with ceiling fan and two of them  with air conditioning. Spacious and charming apartment , fully equipped for a wonderful stay .  All rooms with ceiling fan and two of them  with air conditioning. Full access to the apartment. Located in the most iconic street in Copacabana with all the facilities. Two blocks from the beach and one block from the metro station. Nex to several supermarkets, the best bars and restaurants, banks and buses stops.
neighborhood_overview: Ubicado en la más emblemática calle de la Copa con todas las facilidades. A dos cuadras de la playa y una del metro, con varios supermercados, bancos, bares, restaurantes, paradas de autobuses y todo tipo de comercio.
notes: Located in the most iconic street in Copacabana with all the facilities. Two blocks from the beach and one block from the metro station. Nex to several supermarkets, the best bars and restaurants, banks and buses stops.
access: Full access to the apartment.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Sara was an amazing host. The communication was absolutely perfect. She answered all of my questions and concerns right away and ensured the apartment was perfect for our stay. The apartment is huge! Was perfect for 6 people and sooo close to the beach. We definitely recommend it. Thank you for making our stay in Rio perfect :)

name: Private & luminous room
summary: Beautiful and luminous room in Rosemont Petite Patrie! The apartment has three bedrooms (mine, yours and another for travelers), plus a bureau, a kitchen, a semi-finished basement, a veranda and a large backyard to which you have access! You can find anything you want in the neighboorhood from parc, cafes, bars, grocery stores, etc. You have access to two metro within 10 minute walk and the cycle path is right is passing right in front of the appartment. We look forward to welcoming you!
space: Currently, the house is occupied by Xavier, Jessica and Juliet (my dog). Jessica is completing her MA in Political History; she advocates for progressive causes and is also interested in the arts and the circus. You can look at my profile to learn more about me. Juliette is a truly dog angel (very calm and affectionate)! Thank you for writing a detailed and personalized request to give us an idea of what kind of person and roommate you are.
description: Beautiful and luminous room in Rosemont Petite Patrie! The apartment has three bedrooms (mine, yours and another for travelers), plus a bureau, a kitchen, a semi-finished basement, a veranda and a large backyard to which you have access! You can find anything you want in the neighboorhood from parc, cafes, bars, grocery stores, etc. You have access to two metro within 10 minute walk and the cycle path is right is passing right in front of the appartment. We look forward to welcoming you! Currently, the house is occupied by Xavier, Jessica and Juliet (my dog). Jessica is completing her MA in Political History; she advocates for progressive causes and is also interested in the arts and the circus. You can look at my profile to learn more about me. Juliette is a truly dog angel (very calm and affectionate)! Thank you for writing a detailed and personalized request to give us an idea of what kind of person and roommate you are. Your room, the bureau, bathroom, kitchen, veranda and backyard
neighborhood_overview: Rosemont La Petite-Patrie is a peaceful neighborhood located not far from the bustling summer activity areas of Montreal! Nearby you will find parks, cafes, bars and theaters, in addition to the famous Jean-Talon market where fresh fruit and vegetables grown in the region are offered.
notes: We try to always keep everything clean and ordered. We expect the same from our visitors. However, we take care of cleaning the bathroom, cleaning the floors. Travelers must: - make their own dishes and place in the dishwasher (which serves as a dryer) after their meal. - Leave all surfaces clean after use (tables, counters, oven, etc.) - take off their shoes inside - to be clean and responsible for their person in general - (during a stay of more than a week) participate in removing garbage, recycling and compost, sweep the floor once in a while.
transit: Parking on the adjoining street, public transport everywhere around, whether bus or metro!
access: Your room, the bureau, bathroom, kitchen, veranda and backyard.
interaction: I will be happy to help the traveler if I have the time and the necessary knowledge. However, I am a solitary and independent person and I appreciate that the travelers present are autonomous and mature. Violence of any sort will not be tolerated in this space. This includes: verbal harrassment, physical violence, sexual assault, violations of consent, homophobia, transphobia, racism, and sexism.
house_rules: Les voyageurs doivent : - faire leur propre vaisselle et la placer dans le séchoir.  - enlever leurs chaussures à l'intérieur  - être propres et responsables de leur personne en général

host.host_about: Je pratique plusieurs formes d'art : théâtre, photographie, écriture, musique. J'aime me promener dans la ville sans but précis tout en lisant, prenant des photos, dansant, etc. Je suis quelqu'un de plutôt introverti sans toutefois être timide. J'apprécie les lieux alternatifs, que ce soit des commerces ou des lieux extérieurs. Je suis passionné de musique  et de philosophie.

reviews.comments: Merci Xavier ! Je suis arrivé très tard la nuit après un contrat et l'endroit était exactement comme Xavier me l'avait communiqué. Quartier très tranquille mais pas loin du centre actif de la ville. J'ai aimé les grands arbres de la rue, plein d'oiseaux, la piste cyclable. Le lendemain matin j'ai vraiment apprécié le secteur, le choix était là pour les cafés et j'ai finalement pris le temps d'aller découvrir le coloré Marché Jean-Talon à quelques coins de rues de l'appartement de Xavier. Merci encore et au plaisir, c'est tellement génial Airbnb quand on réalise que c'est si simple être hébergé chez des gens accueillants plutôt qu'au centre-ville bruyant :-)

Un super séjour. Des hôtes accueillant, sympathique et disponible. La chambre est grande et il y a une belle arrière cour pour profiter du soleil. Le quartier est agréable et calme à proximité des commerces, tout y est pour passé un bon séjour !

Xavier's place was amazing... 5 Stars!!!

Both he and Robert were amazing hosts, very friendly and a lot of fun to talk too.

The house is beautiful and in a great location. It was so convienent, with many great coffee shops and restaurants all walking distance. The train station is also close by too, so very easy to get around the city.

I will definitely be coming back to stay there again when I return to Montreal :) 

Their home has been one of my favorite places I've stayed at so far!

I would highly recommend Xavier's place to all travelers.

I spent close to a month in this beautiful apartment, where I enjoyed all of its bright and quiet spaces. The neighborhood is tree-lined and largely residential, but bordered by main streets that are full of hang out spots and whatever food wants or needs one might have. The apartment is within walking distance from many nice parts and parks of Montreal, and accessible by public transportation if one wants to go a bit further. 

Xavier and Robert were really lovely and hospitable, and it was a pleasure to share the apartment with them and their beautiful dog Juliette.

Xavier's place is on a quiet side street but close to many interesting sights: Little Italy, the Jean Talon market, lots of small restaurants and cafes, easy access to the orange metro line. 
The room is bright and spacious, and decorated in retro style with many little touches (as is the rest of the apartment). Really nice semi-closed patio on the back. Excellent value overall! If you like dogs, even better, Juliette is an angel and will let you rub her belly.
Xavier was a great host, he welcomed me warmly and was very helpful in giving me advice on settling down in Montreal. He was respectful and discreet, but didn't hesitate to share a beer and a chat with me. Highly recommended!

J'ai d'abord été accueilli par la maitresse des lieux, la belle et paisible Juliette, ensuite j'ai pu rencontrer Xavier et Robert qui m'ont tout deux permis de passer d'excellents moments en leur compagnie.
La maison est très spacieuse avec une cours à l’arrière parfaite pour "chiller" et travailler au soleil.
Merci pour ces 10 jours
Cordialement

Spacious place to stay and work, I especially enjoyed the patio and backyard - there are so many tables ;) Xavier and Robert are both very friendly and helpful. They are open to share the space and willing to give local tips. La Petite Patrie is a safe, quiet, and convenient neighborhood with access to buses and metro, groceries, cafes and restos. I hope to stay at Xavier’s the next time I’m in the city.
Appartement très bien situé. Chambre spacieuse et confortable.

J’ai passé un très agréable séjour de 2,5 semaines chez Xavier. L’appartement est propre, lumineux, plein de charme, typique de Montréal, très calme et entouré d'arbres. La chambre est très spacieuse et bien décorée, paisible et le lit confortable. Une grande véranda donne sur le jardin. L’appartement est situé près du métro Beaubien, de la rue St Hubert et du marché Jean Talon, à proximité de nombreux commerces et restaurants. 
Xavier et Robert sont des hôtes accueillants,chaleureux et respectueux avec qui j'ai eu des discussions très intéressantes. J’y retournerai avec joie et recommanderai sans réserve ce logement à mes amis.

Fiquei no espaço do Xavier e do Robert por 1 mês.
Eles foram muito simpáticos e hospitaleiros desde o início. A casa é muito grande e conta com um ótimo jardim. É localizado em um bairro muito simpático com fácil acesso ao metro, ônibus, mercearias, cafés, parques, cinemas...
O quarto é muito grande, bem iluminado e confortável.

Obrigado pela acolhida, Robert e Xavier. Até a próxima

Xavier is a thoughtful and friendly host. The room and shared spaces are clean and the home is in a great part of town. I felt comfortable and welcome during my entire stay. Don't hesitate to stay with Xavier :-)
Chez Xavier était sympa et tranquille. J’aimais le quartier, proche du supermarché, la station du métro et le marché Jean Talon.

I had a short but excellent stay at Xavier’s place. It’s unique decor is good for relaxing. And it’s in a very nice and peaceful area.
It was great interacting with Xavier who is full of creative talents. And Juliette was affable as well.

name: Stylish bedroom in Plateau
summary: Chambre disponible dans un bel appartement au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal dès janvier. Chaleureux, spacieux et  inspiré du design scandinave, l'appartement est très agréable à vivre et à 10 minutes du métro Mont-Royal.
space: Nous portons une attention particulière aux détails. Le logement est très propre et les airs communes sont très pratiques. Il y a un petit balcon, un grand salon et une cuisine pour recevoir et deux grandes chambres pour relaxer. Le quartier est très tranquille.
description: Chambre disponible dans un bel appartement au coeur du Plateau Mont-Royal dès janvier. Chaleureux, spacieux et  inspiré du design scandinave, l'appartement est très agréable à vivre et à 10 minutes du métro Mont-Royal. Nous portons une attention particulière aux détails. Le logement est très propre et les airs communes sont très pratiques. Il y a un petit balcon, un grand salon et une cuisine pour recevoir et deux grandes chambres pour relaxer. Le quartier est très tranquille. Vous aurez accès à tout l'appartement qui comprend aussi un espace laveuse-sécheuse. Le quartier est rempli de cafés, bars, épiceries, pharmacies et restaurants. Le Plateau est l'endroit rêvé pour les touristes qui souhaitent découvrir Montréal et les bons endroits prisés des locaux. L'appartement est à 2 minutes de la rue Mont-Royal où l'autobus 97 vous amànera directement au métro le plus près en 10 minutes ou sur le fameux Mont-Royal.
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier est rempli de cafés, bars, épiceries, pharmacies et restaurants. Le Plateau est l'endroit rêvé pour les touristes qui souhaitent découvrir Montréal et les bons endroits prisés des locaux.
transit: L'appartement est à 2 minutes de la rue Mont-Royal où l'autobus 97 vous amànera directement au métro le plus près en 10 minutes ou sur le fameux Mont-Royal.
access: Vous aurez accès à tout l'appartement qui comprend aussi un espace laveuse-sécheuse.
house_rules: Nous recherchons des voyageurs qui sont respectueux.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm the founder and creative producer of a creative studio specialize in the art direction and production of fashion campaigns. I love to meet new people, music, design, going out with friends and discover new restaurants and museums. I'm open minded and easy going.

name: Characterful Heritage Building in a Prime Location in Sydney
summary: Wake up on the super king-size bed in the master bedroom that has a raw industrial look and an eye-catching wine cellar. This 3-storey heritage home boasts spacious open living with a cozy courtyard and exposed brickwork by the dormer window.
space: Master bedroom is located on a lower level than the street and has a raw industrial look with open plan bathroom king bed and wine cellar off to one side  Second bedroom is on the 1st floor overlooking the street with Queen  bed and the main bathroom A great place to watch the acletic people of Darlinghurst  Third bedroom is on the 2nd floor located in the roof space with a dormer window facing north and Queen bed looking over Darlinghurst rooftops It has a small ensuite bathroom with a glass wall exposing the original brickwork from 1840  Living space is located on all of the ground floor it has a 6 person sofa Bose surround sound tv dinning table and a modern kitchen with filtered water and sparkling water on tap the rear of the house is glass sliding doors that opens up to a small courtyard
description: Wake up on the super king-size bed in the master bedroom that has a raw industrial look and an eye-catching wine cellar. This 3-storey heritage home boasts spacious open living with a cozy courtyard and exposed brickwork by the dormer window.
neighborhood_overview: The house is in Darlinghurst in Sydney. It’s within easy walking distance of the Museum Train Station, the Royal Botanical Gardens, and the Sydney Opera House.
notes: Best location in Sydney just have great time in my home
transit: Walking is best but train and Uber are great and very easy
access: You have access to the whole house
interaction: Hello your host meets you on arrival and gives you there number to help if anything goes wrong
house_rules: Not suitable for elderly, children below 12 years old or wheelchair. No shoes in the house please,  No smoking in the house.( rear courtyard allowable ) No partying allow. No one allow to stay over unless listed guests.

host.host_about: 51 year old semi retired. I love to travel and have been to 35 countries. My passion is in renovating old homes,  bringing them back to life. Darlinghurst is my sixteenth major renovation. I love gardening and cooking and I hope you will enjoy my home as much as I do.

reviews.comments: Thanks Philip for providing a really nice design house in a convenient location, we do have a great time. The host is nice and always helpful. The location is really close to CBD and any public transportation. Highly recommend to friends who travel to Sydney with a group of people.

Philip welcomed me and my family to his gorgeous house. He showed me around and explained how everything was working, from the dishwasher to tv. He is easy to communicate with and was very helpful if needed. And he's got such a nice home! It was super clean, comfy beds, great showers and it felt like a home but also like a luxury hotel.
Each bedroom has its own shower and toilet, perfect for a group traveling together. 
Its located in one of the coolest areas of Sydney, just a short walk to Darlinghurst and Surry Hills vibrant cafès, restaurants and shops. Even a short walk to public transport. This is a great place to stay and I would loved to have a home like this! 

Cheers!
Loved the place! Amazing location! Had a lovely time here, and Philip was a great host.

Philip was a great host- good communication from the start and very welcoming on arrival. Great house in an ideal location for restaurants, bars, walking into the city and public transport. Perfect for city break. Thanks Philip.
Location is absolutely perfect:) I really enjoyed to stay here. Specially I loved the sparkling water tab:D Philip is very helpful! I recommend here to everyone:) thanks Philip!!
Fab very easy to deal with the house was great fab location and well equipped  spotless clean

Had a wonderful stay at Philip's place in Darlinghurst. The place was very clean, beds were extremely comfortable and it was a Perfect location for anything you want to do in the city. All very close to wonderful bars and restaurants. Be warned though, there are many stairs! Very much recommended as long as you're fit!

Beautiful townhouse located in the quieter and residential side of Darlinghurst, with walking distance to many resources and tourist destinations. We were wowed the moment we walked in the stylish  and space-savvy apartment, and welcomed warmly by Philip's very kind friends, Trevor and Sally, who also kindly bid us farewell. 

The apartment were well equipped, with everything you need to feel at home. As there was six of us staying here, the bonus were the three showers and bathrooms.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Philip's apartment.

As Phillip was out of town, his friends, Sally and Trevor hosted us during our stay. And they will fantastic! Upon arriving at the house, they showed us every single room and where certain appliances are. The house was just a 5 minutes walk to the Museum Station and maybe 3, to the bus stop on Oxford Street. It was only a few minutes walk to the 'Cafe Street' aka Crown Street and maybe 15-20 minutes walk to Haymarket. Our group truly enjoyed ourselves in the house, the filtered water hose was a huge plus!
Fantastic pace.  Our favorite piece was the ducky shower in the top floor.   Very stylish.  Amazing location!
Philip was out of town, his friend Tate was our host during our stay, he was very welcoming and helpful.

Philip was out of town, but his friend Tat welcomed when we arrived.  A very quaint, tastefully done up house, centrally located, yet in a quiet neighborhood in Darlinghurst. The rooms were all very comfortably setup, and house was well equipped with pretty much everything one would need on a vacation. What we absolutely loved was the continence of getting around, with both the bus & train stations located nearby, and walking distance to the Parks, Opera House, and tons of cafes and restaurants to choose from.  A great holiday home. Thanks Philip. Cheers.

We loved our stay at Philip's house.  His communication was great, and he was easy to get along with.  We felt very welcome.  The apartment is beautiful & is in a fabulous, easily accessible and central location.  We highly recommend Philip's apartment.

We arrive late (after 8pm)  Philip was there to meet us and go over the home.  You talk about Location it was the best location, walking to everything was right.  The home was clean and ready for us.  If we needed anything or questions Philip was just a phone call away and willing to help.  Thanks Philip if we come back to Sydney I would love to stay at your place again.
Philip was there to meet us. Any problem we only had to call him. He even brought us a Nepspreso.  The house was clean and the beds were super comfortable.  Perfect location. Thanks Philip! Ana
House was exactly what we were after, perfect for a group of friends clean & great location
The house was fabulous and Philip made us feel very welcome.

Philip's warm, cosy yet modern home is exactly as pictured and described.  It definitely is in an ideal location, close to everything a visitor to Sydney would need or want to do.  All the beds were very comfortable and Philip's home was very well equipped. Philip welcomed us when we arrived and happily explained how things operated.  Thankyou so much Philip for opening your fabulous home to us, and making our stay so pleasurable.  Our family loved staying there and would have no hesitation in recommending to family and friends.
The accommodation was clean and tidy. Close to transport and walking distance. Close to shops.

Philip is an informative good host.  He has done a great job restoring this 1840 house.  Great location.  Real nice being in a house and not in a hotel room.  Thank you Phil for helping to make our stay in Sydney a wonderful event.
Was a great stay and the host made it all very smooth and easy

Philip was very flexible about check-in and check-out arrangements. He could not have been more accommodating & friendly. The property was great although the stairs would be an issue for children and anyone with mobility problems. A fantastic location with all the sights & great shopping easily accessible on foot. We found the train link direct from the airport & nearby Museum station an added advantage. Would stay here again & recommend to anyone staying in Sydney. So great to be able to get a load of washing done before moving on as well!
By meeting us at the house and showing us around.
Excellent base to explore Sydney and surrounding areas.
Everything was great.  Great location.  Great place.  Would highly recommend it.
Location was fantastic. We had a wonderful experience at this airbnb. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to come to Sydney.

This is a great house! It is so convenient! Tat greeted us and helped us figure out the neighborhood. The home has three bedrooms and had the most comfortable beds. The kitchen is wonderful and the outdoor space is lovely. Each bedroom is on a separate floor and the stair case is steep but each bedroom has its own bathroom and Philip has done a remarkable job in updating the house. It is very modern and comfortable.

A great house for seeing Sydney. 5 minutes from the nearest train station or bus stop and 10-20 minute walk to the shops and restaurants. House was fantastic, renovated recently to a very high standard, equipped with everything you need. Perfect for 2-3 couples as there are four floors. One floor is the living area and the other three floors has one bedroom and a bathroom on each.
Great place in a great location. I would recommend this property to all!

Our stay in Philip's house was excellent.  We were welcomed by Oliver who was very responsive to every request we subsequently had.  The location is great, just 5 mins walk from Hyde Park and the CBD.  The house is very cool, with multiple levels and is well equipped.  Would definitely stay again if in Sydney with the family.

Perfect place!!!
+great house
+top equipment and furniture
+super comfi beds
+great location 
+sparkling water tap
+ super fast communication 
+washing powder and everything you need is available for free

All in all we enjoyed our stay very much and I will definitely recommend your place.  When we come back to Sydney I will definitely book it again.

We had no problems finding our beautiful well appointed house we were given plenty tips from our frienly host Ollie I would recommend this very central home to anyone keenfor a Sydney city break, the cafe next door do great breakfasts and the staff are very friendly. We will definitely be back.

Loved this place! For all it's character, space, location. Everything we wanted was close by and easily accessed by foot or public transport right at the door. Such a groovy space. Looks like a great team that run it, they were all so easy to communicate with.
perfect location and communication; nice house; highly recommend to stay hier.
Secluded place but right in the city. Nice place to stay. Stairs were hard to go up and down, but manageable.

Very nice house with perfect location (walking distance to Hide Park, museum, Botanic garden, opera house, shopping street, Darling harbour, China town, etc.) We enjoyed walking around very much. 
Thanks very to Oli for the wonderful hosting. He's very quick and efficient for communication and very supportive with our requests. It made us a pleasant holiday.
If you want a convenient and central location, modern house with full equipment, and a nice host, that's it!

Great place. Booked it for my family, 5 adults, including elders. They loved it, very comfortable. One of the sinks was a little clogged, but no biggie. They loved the stay and would recommend! Very comfortable, lots of space, central location, and free street parking too.

What an amazing location. We walked everywhere: Circular Quay, Sydney Opera House, Darling Harbour, Haymarket, Central Station, Hyde Park etc. Lovely walks no matter where we went! Darlinghurst is nice in itself. We knew nothing about Sydney but quickly found our bearings. The house is beautiful, has everything we needed and we felt entirely at home. Thank you Philip and Oi. We absolutely loved our stay!!

House is well situated in a "Soho" type fashionable area of the city - with easy access to great restaurants, Hyde Park and other areas of interest. House has been renovated with high end appliances and excellent showers - we only used two floors but note that there are stairs leading to both upstairs and downstairs bedrooms. Beds are very comfortable and there's a lovely small terrace off the kitchen.There's a parking garage space available; directions just need to be clearer.

I don't think the description for this place does justice to the incredible location or quality of this home. SO central. Beautiful inside and out. Well equipped and comfortable. Fantastic hosts. The two mums that went on our trip were a little concerned that the stairs aren't overly child friendly (narrow and steep), but luckily for this fact, we'd left our children at home. Parking was a breeze! I might never stay anywhere else when travelling to Sydney.
Lovely place brilliant location. Really enjoyed our stay.

Amazing location. On a quiet one way street so it's not too loud, but also just a quick walk to downtown. Having a parking spot is key, too. It's a beautiful place! We would definitely stay here again.
Really is a great location & perfect for families, especially with older kids, would highly recommend

A cozy, clean, convenient place.  The decorations are very nice and the kitchen is well equipped.
The host is very nice and helpful.  Highly recommended to stay.
地段非常好,闹中取静,去主要景点都是步行的距离,距离机场十五分钟地铁｡房子装修得很有品味,电器厨卫品质非常高｡唯一的缺点是卫生间有点小通风不够好,没办法,老房子的通病｡由于我们来得晚走得早,没能见到Chris,有点遗憾,但是入住和退房他都安排妥当,非常感谢!
Great
Amazing house, it has everything you need and a great location.
The host canceled this reservation 232 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A very nice house central in Sydney!
Good location and facility! Need some improvement
Wonderful house and amazing stay!

Very nice flat a stone's throw for Hyde Park, close to subway, food market, and the  hip bars and restaurants of Surry Hills.  It is a small flat but the way it was cleverly designed makes it look spacious and luminous, with a nice living room, a well-equipped open kitchen and a small outdoor area.  There are three very comfortable bedrooms each with own shower room, one on ground floor, and two on upper floors. I truly enjoyed my stay and definitely recommend this place to anyone.

What a fabulous space which Philip offers. The place is simply divine; so well laded out with quality furniture, bedding and fittings. I cannot speak highly enough of the place. To complement the apartment is its location on the edge of the wonderful Hyde Park. The place ticks every box and I cannot recommend it highly enough. From the first communications with Philip till our checkout, this was a first class experience. Thanks to Philip for allowing me the privilege of sharing this great piece of Sydney.

These guys were amazing and the house was amazing. There was nothing we did not need that was there. It was close to the city, and the house was bright modern and perfectly equipped. Have already recommended to others and would stay again
Nice apartment in a great location. Stairs are a bit tricky as place on 4 levels. Very good value though
We loved staying in Phillips house. More than enough room for a family of 5. Fantastic central location to some of the best areas of Sydney. The house was very clean and had everything we needed.

location is absolutely great! walking distance to city centre and chinatown public transport is less than 5 mins away. Phillip is a wonderful host, he will response to your message quickly. Will definitely come back the next time Im in sydney

Fantastic place to stay. Central location close to restaurants and easy walk to Circular Quay. Very clean and comfortable. Great value. Accommodation great for 5 people including 3 teenage sons. Would definitely stay again. Thanks Phillip and Chris.

Great place to stay to explore Sydney.  Space was perfect for us as we had elderly children but stairs are steep for young children.  Communication with host was excellent and we would highly recommend.

Absoutely loved it ... 
loved it that much I'm booking it again. 
So close to everything and a beautiful home to nestle in and be away from the hustle and bustle .. 
I honestly didn't need to use my car at all cause everything is so close. 
And anything I wasn't sure about they helped me with right away. 
And make sure you check out the gorgeous coffee shop on the corner . 
Yummiest Italian food and nicest guys who own it .
Perfect apartment for our group of six! Great location, well appointed and stylish. Highly recommended!
Great modern place, well located and equipped.

Excellent location. We walked pretty much to everything, all the major sightseeing spots in the city and to Central Station and Circular Quay to catch transportation for day trips out of the city. Home was clean and had all the amenities to make our stay comfortable. Also just really cool in design. So glad we choose this home.
Great location. Interesting place, perfect for three adults and a kid (as we were)

We stayed for 3 nights! The location is simply awesome, close to everything we wanna see! Room space is enough for 6 of us! Very clean and has everything we need! Just to take note of the staircase, luggages not able yo bring up or down to rooms, toilet we only used lvl 2, the other 2 rooms open concept. Haha.. overall nice place to stay at! recommanded!

Great location on the border of Sydney CBD and Surry Hills . Easy to get to via car and train. Kitted out to a good spec and comfortable.

Beware for the less mobile: steep internal staircases and low ceiling in attic room.
Excellent logement mais attention, difficile accees aux chambres par des escaliers étroites

Awesome location and fuss free check in and out. Nicely equipped for all your daily needs.

Hosts Philip & Chris are always easily contactable. We had a fun time. Highly recommended!!
This place is excellent! We had the best stay, it was so close to everything! Communication with host was great, very comfortable for 6 adults. Would definitely stay again!

Philip has a cozy apartment with wonderful location, close the museum station and those sightseeing spots.  My parent had 11 great nights there.  I just wanna thanks Philip and Chris for taking care of my parents, they are so friendly and patience and wholeheartedly welcome the Asian guests like us.  We really appreciated the welcome bouquet you had sent, they were so adorable and I think I should send you some HK style cookies to taste next time.

Thank you so much Philip, we really enjoy our time there.

The home was in a excellent spot to get around Sydney. Hosts were very accommodating, as we had a late flight we were able to leave our bags at the home till we were ready to go to the airport.
Be warned regarding the stairs, they were very steep and you needed to watch your footing, especially carrying cases to the rooms. The spare folding mattress  was questionable for spending 3 nights on, okay for a child but not for an adult. All in all it was a pleasant place to be while in Sydney.

Fantastic place to stay! Philip generously allowed me to drop my luggage off before official check in time which was greatly appreciated. I was greeted by Matt who was so friendly and welcoming. The house was immaculate in both presentation and cleanliness. The stairs take a little  bit of getting used to but they are very sturdy. Location was convenient for my needs and the neighbour felt safe. Certainly enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend Philip's place. Thank you!

Fantastic, central location in Darlinghurst and within walking distance to lots of sights. As mentioned by previous reviews, the stairs are very steep but for people without mobility issues it should be no problem. Comfortable beds, stylish fit-out, inventive use of natural light and well-equipped for our long weekend in Sydney. No doors on two of the en suites was not hugely ideal for family/friend stay but we made it work perfectly fine and for couples it likely wouldn't have been an issue. Friendly hosts and easy check-in. Would highly recommend.
Great location, charming house, very helpful host, great amenities. Very small sink in a bathroom, narrow stairs but after day or two get use to it. Will recommend this place to a friends.

This is an amazing place for a family to stay. The hosts were quick with their responses and accommodating to our needs. The area is very cool and is well located to properly experience the Sydney area!

House and location excellent. Across from Hyde Park, 10 mins from botanic gardens and Darling Harbour. My family of 6 had an wonderful time in Sydney. Staying in Philips house was perfect. Had everything we needed and more. Host very attentive.  Would highly recommend. xx :)

It's our first time using AirBnb as we wanted our family to experience what it is living like a local in Sydney, as we have lived in Surry Hills for 2 1/2 yrs. We always use hotels and serviced apartments for our holiday trips. The apartment itself is well renovated and the location is great, however there are a couple of misses that we'd like to point out in this review. COMMUNICATION: During our last night, we sent a message to Matthew and asked permission if we can check out at around 12-1pm as we are sending our family to the airport. He replied that we are only allowed to leave our bags in the apartment until 2pm because they need to clean the house. At 9 AM before going to the airport, we neatly placed our belongings including our souvenirs in the living room next to the TV. At 10:19 AM I even gave Matthew a call that we are on our way back to the house from the airport and we will be arriving back before 12 noon. We returned to the apartment on time to pick our belongings. We were in shock to find out that the cleaner/co-host Chris THREW AWAY our souvenir bag in the rubbish bin outside the house!!! The souvenirs are two fragile wax model of our hands from Madame Tussauds which we had made for our 6th wedding anniversary!!! It was kept nicely in a box and a Madame Tussauds souvenir tote bag. We could not comprehend how Chris could mistook it for rubbish! To make it worse, it was raining during that day and the rubbish bin was wet and dirty. This Chris kept making excuses and blamed Matthew that he wasn't informed that we will leave our belongings. However even if he was not informed by Matthew, he still has NO RIGHT to touch the guests' belongings and more so throw it to the rubbish bin. Clearly, communication was not the only issue here but also the lack of common sense. CLEANLINESS: 1.) The basement bedroom has a strong musty odour on the day of arrival and smells like sewage everytime we go back to the apartment after spending the day on tour. They only have a Glen 20 spray which did not mask the odour. 2.) On day of arrival, there is a lock of hair (possibly from the previous guests) in the kitchen trash bin. There are also left over drinks (soft drinks and juices) inside the fridge. 3.) Upon arrival, we strictly followed the No Shoes policy in the house straight away. However, as Matthew was touring us inside...he had his shoes ON while walking around the house which made the floor dirty. 4.) Dusty tables beside the bed and underneath the TV in the basement bedroom. 5.) My brother saw cockroaches in the Attic bedroom on two occasions. 6.) The sheets on the first floor bedroom smelled nice, however, the sheets on the Attic bedroom smelled musty....
Great area and a very cool place!
Great place for a group - six of us fit very comfortably. Very well appointed apartment close to the center of the city. Communication was quick, friendly and very helpful.

Great location in the heart of Sydney, well equipped apartment with very interesting modern design. Matthew was easy to communicate to and very quick to respond. We enjoyed staying there and would be happy stay there again.

Great location. Stairs are a bit steep. I had a hard time with them but I am 61. Also the streaming tv really needed a better router/modem because it was always freezing up. Matthew did try to help but they really need to update that. The bathroom downstairs was a combo toilet and shower in one room. It was very wet after taking a shower. Mostly a good stay though.

As advertised, the location is great! The host is very considerate and flexible to let us check in early so we were able to unload the luggage and start touring the beautiful city right away! Highly recommended!
地理位置非常棒,每一个房间都单独在一层并且拥有独立的卫生间,很适合朋友一起出行｡

It would be hard to find a better location - you are so close to the beautiful streets of Darlinghurst, a short walk to the heart of the city and Circular Quay after that, just 5 minutes to a train station and you’re surrounded by everything you could possibly want. The house is a gorgeous terrace home styled beautifully. Our favourite part was the chilled sparkling water on tap (!!!). Matthew was an excellent host who did everything we could have asked to make our stay as smooth and enjoyable as possible. Highly recommend!
Recomendo vivamente esta casa, muito bem localizada, muito bem organizada e decorada. O anfitrião muito simpático que facilitou todo o processo de entrada e saída. Obrigado.
Handy spot centrally located. Suit a big group. Can walk everywhere.

We loved our stay with our two teenage sons.  Groovy apartment that packs a lot into a small place.  Great location and walked to the CBD, Opera House and Botanical Gardens and only a short uber ride to Bondi and Coogee,  All in all a great apartment and great host.  Thanks for everything
房子位于悉尼市中心,去购物只要走几分钟就到了,去机场有T8二十分钟就可以到达｡建议住两家人比较合适,地下一楼洗澡没有隔间相对会比较潮湿｡房子装修很时尚,设备很全｡住了三个晚上很愉快｡楼梯是真的很陡,要小心慢慢走｡总之是个时尚便利的房子,负一楼很安静,二楼可以听到外面的声音,给大家做个参考｡
Meillä oli erinomainen viikko Sydneyssä. Kohde oli hyvällä sijainnilla ja trendikäs.

Absolutely loved this place! The location can’t be beat. Very nice beds/linens and nice separation of rooms. The air conditioning kept the place comfortable and the spacious living room with the large TV was a great place to hang out. Would highly recommend to anyone. Look forward to returning in the future.
地理位置非常棒,房间设施新,东西全,整洁干净｡
Great location and excellent value
Philip的房子位置很好,就在市中心,市中心的景点基本可以步行到达｡厨房卫生间充足用品齐全,房子装饰品味一流｡唯一的缺点是有个房间在地下,通风稍差,三个房间在三个楼层,楼梯比较狭窄｡

This was a wonderful place to make our temporary home in Sydney. Only downside is we were only able to stay a few nights - wish we could have stayed longer.

The location is incredibly convenient to the Sydney museum, airport (short taxi ride or train ride), local eateries and bars, and sightseeing bus stops. Check-in was a breeze, as we were met by Matthew despite having a late arrival. He showed us where everything was located, and was friendly and welcoming.

Inside, the apartment is filled with amenities and welcoming touches that made us feel right at home. It's very clean and well-decorated. 

We would agree with other reviewers that said the stairs are a bit steep and narrow. It was absolutely no problem for us to navigate, but I would not recommend it for the elderly or those with disabilities, as there are no bedrooms on the entry floor.

Overall, 5-star place that we would absolutely choose again.
房子非常干净,设施也很齐全｡位置很好,去市区所有的景点都在步行氛围内｡周围吃饭的选择很多,绝对是在悉尼停留的好去处
Great location. Very stylish design.
Stayed here with work colleagues as we all got our own rooms and bathrooms. Would highly recommend as its in a great location, clean and as described. Thanks!

We stayed at Philip's house for 6 nights. We were so impressed with the house and the location. Chris was a wonderful host and made sure we had everything we needed. Everything we needed was within walking distance. Would definitely stay there again. Very happy with our stay!

Located 5 mins from Museum station and very close to the city centre. Ideal if you want to explore the city or neighbouring suburbs

Would highly recommend this well presented terrace house, although probably not suited for the elderly as the internal stairs to the first and second floors a quite steep and my mother struggled a little.

Overall it is a great house in a great location close transport and bars and restaurants as well as for groceries.

Would highly recommend for a stay in Sydney.

Leila
The best location. So close to everything that Sydney has to offer!

We stayed here for just under a week and it was a great trip. The location is amazing, such a short walk to the city, and the area is really vibrant. The house is stylishly appointed, and we really appreciated three bathrooms plus a kitchen. The stairs are steep but for my kids it was no bother. The home has been renovated to a high standard. Our communication was fast and quick, and it was a pleasure to stay at Philip's place.

Absolutely fantastic. Couldn't ask for a better location - close to city but fabulous neighbourhood with great cafes and restaurants. Apartment was even better than we expected as with six people having three bathrooms was great. Can't rave enough about this place - a must stay in Sydney.

Unbelievable location.  Only one block from Hyde Park and close to all public transportation.  The house was modern, clean, and had plenty of space for all six of us.  We really appreciated that each bedroom had their own bathroom.

Pros:
- amazing location. Next to oxford st and walking distance to almost anywhere you need to be
- fully renovated property. 
- 3 spacious bedrooms easily fit the 6 of us.
- great hosts and check in process with easy check in and excellent communication 

Cons:
- wifi. For us was fairly inconsistent and slow in patches of the day despite resetting modem.
- tv in main living room has signal issues and unable to watch some free to air channels.
- noise. Stayed over a weekend and due to the fact the terrace is close to the street and a stones throw to Oxford st you do get noise. We had a couple of prank knocks over our weekend and so I wouldn’t say it’s ideal for families or those wanting to get on uninterrupted sleep. 

All in all a great stay despite minor issues. Thanks to the hosts for their hospitality.
Great location and amenities.
Great house, great location, great money for value. Highly recommend.

This is an ideal house for a group of travellers who just want to  visit the main tourist attractions of Sydney  on foot. The house is newly-renovated to a fashionable one. Very comfortable. As it is on the street, sometimes you can hear noises caused the car. But for those who have no difficulty in sleeping, that is not a problem.  Thank you , Philip. We will come back.
Great location. Middle of city. Many choices for dining and entertainment Very comfortable property
Great location, great host!

FIVE STARS!
Hosts were great communicators and very responsive. Place is stylish, clean, well appointed and very centrally located. We loved it!
Excellent terrace in a great location, some extra special features which were wonderful, sparkling water on tap! We’ll definitely be back.

Fun-tas-tic! We had a great stay.
The house is fully equipped as you would a vacation home and is tastefully done. Comfortable bed linens & mattresses. TV with good sound system. Only wish is to have a speedier broadband internet for the Apple TV as it hangs frequently.
Very centrally located. Close to all transportations, restaurants, grocers, drinks, park & CBD. 
Hosts kept us updated on coming stay. Thanks to Phillip & Matthew.

We loved staying at Philip's place! Highly recommend it! One of the best Airbnb's I've ever stayed at. Great location, great host, great house. The amenities: kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms etc. had everything we needed! If you're into cooking, there was a wide range of condiments too. The gas fire kept us warm in June no worries. The stairs wouldn't be great if you had kids or if you weren't up to navigating a tight spiral staircase.

The location of this place can’t be beat. The main level is very stylish and roomy. Bedrooms require either a walk down a narrow spiral staircase or a walk up some steep stairs. There is no door on the downstairs bathroom. The owner, Philip, is very responsive and accommodating.
Great location. Excellent host. Amazing place to stay!

We had a great stay at Philips place. So nicely decorated, favourite space was the living and kitchen area. We loved that there was a bathroom with each of the bedrooms, even surprisingly a shower in the attic ! Location was great, surrounded by great food and not a far walk to Sydneys CBD. Philip was very accommodating on arrival and offered us a map with suggestions of things he likes to do around the city. Also very quick with responses with whatever we needed. Would definitely stay there again and recommend to anyone looking to stay somewhere great in Sydney :)

This is a great home and a great location. The overall design the house is quite charming. Very comfortable for 6 guests. Philip is a great host, and responds very fast. I highly recommend this house.

If you are looking for a place for five or six people to stay in Sydney, this is the perfect accommodation. Very well furnished, three bedrooms and bath. More than enough room for diner and relax. Fully equiped with special attention at arrival. Perfect location nearby city, bus and train. Also parking for one car available.

We had a wonderful stay at Phillip’s place. My family and I were finishing the last leg of our vacation and Philip’s apartment had all the amenities we needed, i.e. a washing machine and dryer. The location was excellent. We were able to walk to the Sydney opera house, stopping at various attractions along the way. Darlinghurst has many quaint restaurants. We felt close enough to all the action and far enough away from the too-touristy areas.

This terrace was perfect for our party of 3 couples.
The location for cafes pubs or shopping in CBD was awesome not to mention how close it was to Blue start group for City 2 surf .
If you want to be in a safe location close to the action this is a gem.

Perfect house and location for our family! We could walk everywhere but also very close to train station. It was plenty big enough for 6 adults. Well equipped kitchen and comfortable beds. Highly recommend and we would definitely come back
Really recommended this place. It was a really unexpected experience
Great location. Wonderful basement room. Nice kitchen! Fast and efficient check in. Great “after sales” service. This was the best.
Fantastic central location within easy reach of everything. Amazing communication and flexibility. It’s a real gem with great amenities and a lovely sunny terrace

I sent our developers here for a tech conference and the location was perfect, the house was great with a few interesting quirks that made it a little fun. All in all it was a great experience by all accounts.
Gorgeous house and we had a great stay.
Philip的房子非常棒!位置绝佳,可以步行到大多数景点,附近还有IGA超市,方便买东西｡房子里有各种生活用品,厨具,甚至煮饭的锅,我们很惊喜!Philip是个超级好的房东,非常大方和贴心,都能第一时间回复我们,帮我们解决问题｡希望下次有机会再来悉尼,再次入住!
Excellent property! We loved how central it was. Perfect for a family getaway. Can’t wait to come back! Matt and Philip are fantastic hosts
We have just had a fabulous few days in Darlinghurst.  Philip's place was amazing - so well thought out.  Very very cool and stylish. Fabulous location!
Great location, quick and easy communication.

Great location and comfortable and clean. Everything you would want for 2 couples or family.  Good kitchen facilities and loved the fact that here was ice in the freezer.  Host made us very welcome and looked after us well.

It's a given that the location was the best part about it. It was very clean and Philip was very attentive and explained everything for us in person which was a nice touch. The downstairs "wine cellar" was a bit scary at first, but it made things interesting. The second bedroom was perfect in the sense that it had a good mix of a specious bedroom and best bathroom of the house. The top floor bedroom's bathroom was very tight and the downstairs bathroom seemed to get soaked everywhere when you showered. Overall, it was a very neat place to stay. It was a lot of fun to hang out at the house. Somewhere you can feel relaxed and really feel "at home."

Great location, we were able to walk to the city such as the harbour bridge, the Sydney opera house etc…. The home was clean and had all the amenities you may need. The space is just enough for the 6 of us, although the stairs going up and down are little tight, but we love the character of this house. Parking spot is a bonus, since it is impossible to find parking around the city. Great communication with Philip, our flight was cancelled and scheduled 3 hours later than expected, Philip was very accommodating with our check in time. Philip provided us with a quick tour of his place, oriented us to his neighbourhood, and recommended restaurants to check our while in Sydney. I would recommend Philips house to my family and friends.

Philip's place was close to everything...we did not need a car to see Sydney. He made the most of all available space and the place felt bigger then it actually was. Although we managed, I could see some people having trouble with getting luggage up the stairs especially if they are in the top (Website hidden by Airbnb) is not for tall or unfit people. That being said, 6 of us had a great stay there and I would recommend Philip's place.
Everything was fantastic, great communication and very helpful. Would recommend
This place exceeded our expectation and we are so happy we chose this place to stay. Everything was easy to use and we were amazed at the great features in your home. Thank you so much!
Great style, great location, excellent host

My friends and I loved this place so much, this was our second time staying! An absolutely beautiful city home in a location in Sydney that can’t be beat. (If you stay, take a look at the awesome before & after photos hanging in the living room to see what a wonderful job was done remodeling this residence.)

The layout of the house (each bedroom+bathroom on its own floor) offers a unique private feel for each guest, which is especially great when traveling with a group. Philip was also gracious, responsive, and accommodating. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay yet again!

Philip's place is very centrally located and within walking distance of the CBD, and Paddington and Surrey Hills neighbourhoods.  Combine that with very close train and bus access and you have a near perfect location for visiting Sydney and all its sights, shopping and culture.
Outstanding 3 bed townhouse in the heart of the action in Darlinghurst.  Philips house is simply brilliant.  Super cool with everything you would ever need for a great stay.  5 stars for sure!
An excellent space in a excellent location. Everything you need at house and Philip went above and beyond with his assistance. Couldn’t be better.

This apartment is in a perfect location for exploring Sydney. The place is stylish, decently quiet for the busy location (as mentioned in other reviews), and well equipped. The kitchen was very functional and supermarkets are within a few minutes walk.
great location and nice apartment!

Fantastic location with everything you need for a home away from home. We walked everywhere. 15-20 min Uber from airport. Philip was waiting for us and easy to reach if needed. Would go back in a heartbeat
Great location and cool house
This place is amazing. Perfect location and great modern facilities. Phillip is a great host, quick response and friendly. Would stay here again for sure.

Stunning, unique place at a great location close to everything. However, there are quirks that may mean it is not suitable for every group. For 2-3* couples it is a nice stay, and groups of friends should consider the review before they make up their mind.

The use of space is stunning and creative, so, as long as the below is ok for you – I would definitely recommend the place.   A little more detail in the description would help match expectations. For example, the top bedroom size is better for a close couple or one single - as it is very small and you can look straight at the toilet, which also has no door. The downstairs bedroom is also more suited to couples, given there is no toilet door on its ensuite either. There doesn't appear to be any extra space to adequately fit the spare mattresses offered, so we would recommend no more than five guests or three couples (if the third couple can squeeze into the top level).  Aircon was not available in the downstairs bedroom. There was no hanging space in the middle-floor room as the cupboard was locked. The stairs are very narrow and need to be navigated slowly & with feet sideways to avoid falls. We had a small hiccup getting access to the carpark at check-in, which I assume was a one-off.
非常好的房东 在门口迎接我们 介绍了房子的所有功能 用品 房子简直就是一个小别墅 一层厨房 二三层 地下一层各有一个房间和一个卫生间
位置很棒｡厨房设施齐全｡房东非常好,给我们很多建议和帮助｡由于晚上的飞机,还主动帮我们寄存行李,非常贴心的体验｡感谢~

Phillip’s place is beautiful and in the perfect location. It is walking distance to bus and train stations. It location near the grocery store and bottle store. This place is perfect for couples or a group of friends.  We enjoyed cooking a couple of nights and a few night lounging on the large couch and watching local tv shows. If you don’t mind a few stairs... this is the place to stay.

We had a fantastic stay for 3 people. Philip was great to deal with and always willing to help, and we arrived to a charming, clean property in a perfect location close to Oxford street, Hyde park and the CBD.

Would highly recommend Philip and his property for small groups looking for a unique stay in a prime position.

name: Dolphin room, walk to ocean, waterfall, amazing!
summary: DOLPHIN ROOM: The Maui Eco Retreat is named “The greenest Spot on Maui”. We are a PERMITTED facility, located on the North Shore where people seek tranquility and want to escape the touristy hustle and bustle. If you are a nature lover, enjoy hiking and adventure, seek authenticity in travel and would like to experience an alternative, green and natural lifestyle, we are happy to host you! We created this amazing place for the traveler like you! This might be just what you've been looking for!
space: *** CHRISTMAS SEASON (12/15/18 - 01/06/19):        7-night minimum stay ONLY (shorter requests WILL be declined) Welcome to our sustainable paradise at Maui Eco Retreat,  located where the sun is rising.  A place “Where your Vacation Becomes a Transformation!” Whether you're seeking sanctuary, writing the next chapter of your life, or simply on vacation, or honey moon gateway. Come explore elegant green living at Maui's magical premier eco retreat. At Maui Eco Retreat You'll Enjoy:  Being directly next to the ocean  Beautiful hiking trails  Waterfall lagoons  Romantic setting  Only 15 minutes from town  Sunrise views  Yoga and meditation classes Our Dolphin Room, located on the first floor of the Opua House with a shared bathroom. A sliding glass door opens to a stunning Brazilian pepper tree, with views of the lotus pond and ocean. Named after the legendary dolphin scientist Dr. John C. Lilly, who loved spending time here, the room features some of his books and even the spirit of the
description: DOLPHIN ROOM: The Maui Eco Retreat is named “The greenest Spot on Maui”. We are a PERMITTED facility, located on the North Shore where people seek tranquility and want to escape the touristy hustle and bustle. If you are a nature lover, enjoy hiking and adventure, seek authenticity in travel and would like to experience an alternative, green and natural lifestyle, we are happy to host you! We created this amazing place for the traveler like you! This might be just what you've been looking for! *** CHRISTMAS SEASON (12/15/18 - 01/06/19):        7-night minimum stay ONLY (shorter requests WILL be declined) Welcome to our sustainable paradise at Maui Eco Retreat,  located where the sun is rising.  A place “Where your Vacation Becomes a Transformation!” Whether you're seeking sanctuary, writing the next chapter of your life, or simply on vacation, or honey moon gateway. Come explore elegant green living at Maui's magical premier eco retreat. At Maui Eco Retreat You'll Enjoy:  Being directl
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the Valley of the white Owl, the Pueo. We have two old Hawaiian churches. We have a really beautiful guestbook in each room that shares more about the history of this place and the valley we are located in.
notes: We offer YOGA Monday through Friday mornings with a suggested $10 donation direct to the teacher.  We also offer  qi gong, shamanic night teaching once a week, meditation, personal coaching, onsite lomi-lomi massage, as well as other special events and activities.  If you would like to get married on Maui, Kutira is a licensed wedding officiant by the State of Hawaii and would love to support you in for this special event.
transit: It is essential to rent a car. It is the easiest way to navigate and see our small island. Our local bus system is very limited and does not pick up guests with luggage and we are not on their bus route.
access: We have full WIFI access in the main house and all the guest rooms for your internet needs.
interaction: If you have any special needs or request we are very happy to point you in the right directions. We have lived on Maui over 30 years and maybe able to support you in your quest.
house_rules: IMPORTANT INFORMATION please take your time and read.  TAXES DUE UPON CHECK-IN: We have a legal Bed & Breakfast permit by the County of Maui, therefore the Transient State Tax and General Excise Tax of 14.42% is mandatory and due upon arrival in CASH. This tax is not collected by AirBnB.  LATE ARRIVALS: Our normal check-in time is between 3pm-6pm. There is an additional $45 charge for late arrivals after 6 pm and $65 after 10 pm till 11 pm. No check-in after 11 pm! PLEASE make sure you have informed us of your arrival time at least 48 hours ahead.    HOUSE RULES: No smoking indoors. Quiet time after 10 pm. Put your own dishes away after each use and leave shared kitchen beautiful and clean for our other guests. We are off-the-grid and practice sustainable living, so we encourage our guests to conserve electricity and water. We only use biodegradable cleaning products and our entire land and gardens are organic. We only provide in-house towels. We rent beach towels 2 for $5 or 1 for $3

host.host_about:
Jennifer is your welcome angel in the office (left pic) and Kutira with her husband Raphael are the wonderful owners of the Maui Eco Retreat. They strive to provide a sustainable and ecologically friendly retreat for beautiful souls to come rest and appreciate our land. Both Kutira and Raphael are excellent teachers and would be honored to have you as their guest. 
We look forward to having you come stay with us and meet our amazing team at our legal permitted B&B.

reviews.comments:
The location is really wonderful. In the middle of wonderful nature and with breathtaking ocean views. 
We enjoyed our week in the retreat very much!
The host was very welcoming, and the location and whole feel of the retreat center was perfect. We really enjoyed ourselves, and would definitely consider returning!

The place is excellent, a beautiful house, very quite, with a very large garden. Kutira is also very nice, show us around the house, and the facility which we can use during the stay. We'd love to come back next time when we are at Maui again.

Jie Chen
Raphael greeted us with an overview of the property.  We really enjoyed the waterfalls and swimming area nearby.  We stayed in the Dolphin Room.  The room itself was sweet and cozy.

My girlfriend and I recently stayed at the retreat and we had an amazing experience! We were upgraded for free to a larger room (the dolphin room) with a view of the ocean and the sunrise in the morning. The grounds of the retreat were really beautiful and well maintained it felt like we were isolated in beautiful gardens in the middle of the rainforest. I would highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Maui. If you stay here make sure to visit their waterfalls and natural pools. It was the only waterfalls and swimming pools that we had to ourselves on the whole trip!!! I will try too book here again on my next trip to Maui. 5 stars all week long thanks guys for a really memorable experience!

The Eco Retreat is a very unique place, and we really enjoyed our stay. The Dolphin Room was exactly as pictured, and was perfect for the two of us. The grounds of the retreat are really amazing—we spent two of our four days just hiking and exploring the grounds. We loved taking the trail down to the private waterfall and natural pool (which empties via a 100+ foot waterfall!), and hiking the breathtaking trail down to the coastline. We actually hiked up the stream to the bottom of the tall waterfall, which had a beautiful, secluded pool at its base. These were absolute highlights of our trip that we'll never forget.

William, the Retreat's concierge, for lack of a better term, was extremely helpful and friendly.  He introduced us to everything the grounds had to offer, checked in with us periodically, and even helped safeguard some items we left behind after our stay.  We never met Kutira; but her husband, Raphael, was a ubiquitous presence on the grounds, always doing some job or another in the proud upkeep of his home, and genuinely concerned with the well-being of his guests.

The retreat's approach to green living also had a clear impact on our experience.  It may sound silly, but when you're instructed to conserve water and electricity, or to save food compost for the chickens, you begin to realize how much you typically waste, and you begin to take pleasure in conservation. Even four days of living under these constraints have changed my behavior in ways that I hope will become permanent.

Other highlights: the outdoor shower, the sizable kitchen with separate and labeled shelves and fridge space for each guest, the numerous spots to sit and enjoy breakfast, the charming hand-drawn map of the grounds.  Until next time!

Alyson and Kutira have clearly devoted their lives and fortune to creating a beautiful, peaceful, and almost hidden garden sanctuary. Their considerable efforts to live in harmony with the environment will forever separate them from their much larger corporate competitors. If you prefer sterile, air conditioned comfort over sleeping with fragrant night breezes under breathtaking starlight vistas, this resort is not for you. If 20-minute hot showers and all-you-can-eat buffets are your idea of a perfect vacation, you're not likely to appreciate this deliberately minimalist eco-resort. But, if descending a challenging rope trail to a pristine rocky coastline or swimming in a spring-fed pool perched atop a 150-foot waterfall appeals to your inner child, you may have found what you're searching for. This rare, return-to-nature experience is literally and figuratively "off the beaten path." I highly recommend you consider this lovely piece of old-Maui paradise.

I had a wonderful stay here while traveling for work, it was a relaxing place to kick back and let the mind go.  I recommend this place for anyone that is wanting to get away from the busy towns and have the great outdoors Maui has to offer.  The views from this place were amazing and that alone bring a piece of mind and the ability to relax.  There was so much to do around the property I wish I could have stayed longer.  Thank you so much for the peaceful stay!

What I love about this place is property - waterfall, ponds, trails and views. You can easily relax in front looking at the ocean. There is no private bathroom, however there is nice one outside which is fun. Place has many amenities and you would probably find anything you need. Room is just basic with garden view. At checkin we were provided with maps and all the information about area nearby, especially Mana food shop was bulls eye.

This place is fantastic, the best accommodations we've found on Maui.  If you're thinking about staying here, do it.

1) It's impeccably clean. Like eat-off-the-floors clean. That's rare on the mainland, much less way out in the jungle. 

2) The property is stunningly beautiful, with mature trees, landscaping that's sympathetic to the environment and neat architecture. 

3) It captures the beauty and feel of Maui's jungle side, without being as remote or hard-to-reach as Hana. And there's no properties like this out in Hana, at all. 

4) Fun/pretty hiking trails throughout the property and in the surrounding area. You could spend a few days just exploring and hanging out on the property's waterfalls, swimming holes and ocean access. 

5) There's good snorkeling, spearfishing and ocean swimming. You'll want to go to Little Beach in Wailea or Hana Bay for the whole reef thing, but there's neat rocks and plenty of life under the water right here. If you're a strong, adventurous swimmer, head out to the "temple" rock you'll see a couple hundred yards away and explore the caves.
