6) Great kitchen. If you're doing Maui right, you're not dining out. All the tools you need to cook great dinners are right here. Just stop at Mana Foods in Paia on your way for groceries. 

We'll be back!

This place is amazing and so peaceful I wish I would have stayed longer. Beautiful !!! I love being surrounded by the tropical forest. Rhanks Raphael and Kutira for all you've done in this property and have it shared to your guest. Magic place !

Such a beautiful place, I would absolutely return again in a heartbeat!!  Exactly like the pictures, which is hard to believe, but it really is true.  The trails on the property are fantastic- if you are a hiker, these trails are great.  You can practically rappel down a dirt cliff to the ocean- so much fun and really beautiful, I loved it!!

We had a wonderful time in the Maui Eco retreat. The place is nestled on a mountain top, accessible only via dirt road through a lush tropical jungle. The experience itself of finding the property and exploring the grounds, trails, and various meditation spaces on the property was quite special. The house had lovingly curated artworks from the East. There was a house that was imported from Indonesia on the hilltop and a music/meditation room that was also nice. From this perspective, I felt like I've been granted access to all the things that Raphel and Kutira have cultivated and treasured throughout their lives and I'm very grateful to have experienced it. While we hiked and explored the grounds, a friendly parrot, stopped by and followed us from tree to tree and we loved the two dogs, Dawa and Mochi. The trail through the lagoon and waterfall was breathtaking and one of the highlights of our trip. We met a few of the other guests who were all easy to talk to and gave us some insider tips on Maui. Raphael was very accommodating and helped give us insider information on the nearby town, Haiku, as well as a thorough survey of the property. He was nice and left us to ourselves most of the time. 

There are some cons to this stay which include: 
The Wi-Fi on the property is spotty and weak. This made it hard to travel plan since all of my research was through the internet. 
Unlike other AirBnb stays, this definitely veers more on the businessy side rather than the friendly home-like feel. Instead of providing coffee and minimal breakfast, they charge you cash for eggs from their chicken farm. We arrived late from our flight and they had a $65 dollar "late arrival surcharge". This is a bit of an unprecented practice in my years of AirBnB use. 
I appreciated the eco-friendliness of the place, but not having lights turned on at night on the main hallways and walkway seems a bit overbearing.

Our one week stay at the retreat was fabulous! It was the perfect setting for a relaxed and magical experience. We enjoyed meeting the other guests and made some very synchronistic connections in this space. 

Every structure was intricately and intentionally adorned with beautiful art pieces and sacred objects. The energy of the property is truly special. 

Thank you, Kutira and Raphael. You have created an enchanting space to share.

Bei unserer Ankunft hat uns Raphael sehr herzlich empfangen. Wir wurden sehr gut über alles was wichtig war informiert. Zudem erhielten wir eibe selbstangefertigte Landkarte mit empfohlenen sehenswürdigkeiten, shops und Resraurants.

Absolutely gorgeous sacred place in nature. Statues, plants and beauty everywhere... I enjoyed hiking down to the beach and the waterfall. Meditating in the music temple. Using the outside shower in the middle of the night with the feeling of nature, darkness and wind was a magical experience.
I experienced that the other people staying there were very friendly as well. All in all I'd warmly recommend Maui Eco Resort.

The only minus was that it was rainy and cloudy pretty much the whole time (5 days) that we stayed there. This might be a question of season, but to get really sunny weather we had to go down to Kihei.
And the wifi is slow, so don't come here if you plan to spend your days running an online business. :)

Raphael was very friendly and helpful.
And yes, the house was very clean and fresh, with volunteers taking very good care of the space.
A beautiful vast space, so much to explore. We would definitely stay again and will make sure to check out some of the other rentals on the property.

Just came home from 3 nights in the Dolphin Room at the Maui Eco Retreat and already anticipating my next trip back. First of all, the retreat grounds are unimaginably beautiful, the best of which was the short hike to what felt like our own personal waterfall (despite the fact that we were greeted with a naked couple already getting it on on the rocks - guess they thought they were alone as well!) We didn't get the chance to meet Kutira and Raphael, but got a few pets with their adorable dog, and of course interfaced with the friendly staff, all of whom made us feel very welcome. Do yourself a favor and stay at this magical place.

Absolutely gorgeous place! The attention to detail in every corner of this house is impressive. We both agree that our favorite moment in Maui is the view of the ocean peninsula (?) on the hike down to the beach. Many thanks for a splendid experience

What a breathtaking experience! The Maui Eco Retreat was perfect and exactly what we where looking for. We currently live in Honolulu and wanted a true off the grid mini vacation. The Eco Retreat feels very isolated, yet its only a couple minutes drive to the nearest town. From the drive to the home to unlocking all the wonderful trails, it was an adventure behind every corner. We met Raphael when we arrived and he was very accommodating and provided us with all the information we needed for our stay. The whole property was clean, from our room to the bathroom to the kitchen, you could tell staff members and guests alike were very Eco conscious which we enjoyed. We saw so many unique places to stay here on the property that we look forward to coming back and sharing this peaceful sanctuary again and again.

We had a wonderful time staying at the Eco Retreat. The dolphin room was simple and cozy with everything one would need. The hosts were very accommodating and we had a very relaxing stay. Would highly recommend for anyone looking to experience a peaceful and sustainable escape from stresses of the default world.

Che dire è stato un soggiorno molto particolare. Tutto sommato non male. Piccolo consiglio: non leggete nemmeno la descrizione per come arrivarci, è troppo incasinata e mette ansia. Ad un certo punto sul hana hwy girate a sinistra (venendo da paia) su una semplice stradina con qualche buco qua e là che va percorsa sempre dritto e ci siete. Va benissimo (Hidden by Airbnb) maps per arrivare.
In questo posto ci sono mille regole del tipo: risparmia energia solare, risparmia acqua, paga 5$ per un mango o un cocco, 1$ per un uovo.... Dicono di essere un posto ecologico ma la cucina è piena di plastica e non ci sono spezie basi. Lo spazio per il cibo è limitato considerando che il prossimo supermercato sta a 25 min di macchina.
Tutto questo essere BIO mi sembrava solo un modo per far risparmiare l'host in energia e acqua.
La parte positiva è stata il silenzio, la bellezza della natura e la gente che c'era in casa! Per aventurieri la strada da fare lungo il fiume fino alla cascata è uno spasso!
Non ho visto nessuna lezione di Yoga e chi ha prenotato è rimasto delluso perchè i proprietari non hanno dato lezione senza un preavviso.
Secondo me le info al riguardo erano scarse. Io avevo chiesto ma mi è stato detto che c'è una lista dove iscriversi. Mai vista la lista.
Consiglierei il posto alle copie in viaggio o a chi vuole stare per conto proprio. Mi è piaciuto ma mi ha lasciato un po perplesso. Comunque a chi piace un mood dovrebbe fare un salto, ne vale la pena solo per la natura!!! Aloah
Beautiful place, wonderful vibe

The eco retreat was an experience. We met Raphael upon arrival and he took the time to inform us about our stay, although Kutrina kind of ignored us when she saw us with an awkward "hi".
 
The grounds are lovely as long as you like untamed nature. The hike to the waterfall and down to the beach were fun and adventurous, but not for the timid. This is a no frills place and expect to pay extra for any add-ons like yoga, eggs, toiletries and beach towels, which adds a little stress to the mindfulness experience.
 
Our room (dolphin room) was clean and the pictures portrayed it accurately, including the ocean view off in the distance. However, the meditation cottage wasn't that clean. This place is essentially in the middle of nowhere, which we enjoyed.
 
The spirituality that you might expect doesn't really play through. You'll see it from some of the reviews and it bears mentioning, this place is not for everyone so be sure it will work for you. We had a couple staying in the room next to us and they were so dissatisfied that they left after one night. There was also a rather nasty review in the guest book in the room we were staying in about our hosts. Also, be aware that the upstairs bathroom looks right over the sink of the downstairs bathroom via a skylight. Overall, we enjoyed the eco retreat, but it is in need of some TLC.

Very cool location. It's really remote, which we loved, but isn't for everyone. We thought the grounds were fascinating, and the hike to the water and to the base of the falls, although at times a little technical, was one of our favorites from our trip. The owners are a bit out there, even for us, but they really are pure love people, and are a part of the island as much as it's a part of them. The farm fresh eggs from their chickens are really tasty;) but go to Nuka (owner recommendation nearby) for one of the best Japanese meals (at $50 a head with LOTS of food and drinks) you could ask for...and we live in LA/NYC. All in all, great non-resort option for Maui. And resorts suck anyway, do stay here:)
Quiet place with 20-30 mins drive to eating options.
It was an unique experience. Missing the island of Maui already. Mahalo and aloooha!!

Raphael and Kutira's place is in a lovely secluded location, 20 mins away from some excellent restaurants and perched on cliffs over the ocean. The property is large and beautiful, but really needs care. Many of the plants need trimming and the property looks like it needs some love. For $200 a night, I had higher expectations of what the place would be like in terms of service and amenities. The dolphin room was alright, but the bed was a super uncomfortable old squeaky spring mattress. The kitchen was lovely but they do not provide any basics for cooking (salt, pepper, spices, cooking oil). You have to buy all basics yourself. They are MILITANT about using the lights and electricity. Kutira is aloof, not friendly. I said hi to her once and instead she cut me off to ask if a light was on (a motion-activated light). She also left me a voicemail on the day of our checkout telling us to vacate our room and if they couldn't get it there would there "would be a problem". We were in the kitchen cooking chatting with the volunteers, had removed all of our belongings so the volunteers could clean - she could have just walked over and checked but instead left a rude voicemail. Raphael is another story. He is creepy. He hit on my friend telling her she seemed "like a really sensual person" based on her handwriting, also asked her age and said you look great for your age. Told us he used to take Jimi Hendrix's "leftovers" in the 60s. It's not the 60s anymore and hitting on young girls when they're on vacation is not a relaxing environment. Paying $1000 for 4 nights means we shouldn't have to be subjected to an old creep's hormones. Most of the volunteers who work there seems disgruntled and are also not friendly. The house isn't all that clean -- the shower has mold in it. Overall, we had such high hopes for the rate and how beautiful it looked in photos, but in person it was a bit dated and unclean and the Aloha vibes were definitely off. This is the first negative review of an Airbnb in the 4 years I've been using. Sad to write but people should know if they're going to spend so much money.

We wanted to get away from big resort culture and loved the really unique and special natural setting. The waterfall and hike down to the ocean are both spectacular. Add in the opportunity to cook in a shared kitchen (which afforded some nice interaction with other guests), yoga every morning, and just lovely energy and team on site.  Perfect place to relax and soak in Maui. We also could drive easily to Haleakala Crater and back to Paia and Hana was only 1.5-2 hours away. We definitely recommend this place and look forward to returning.

Das Maui Eco Retreat hat eine wunderbare Lage, über eine kleine Dirtroad erreichbar, mitten in der tropischen Fülle, Bambus, Palmen...dazu wunderbare Indonesisch-balinesische Tempel...Götterstatuen, Kraftplätze...Dieser wunderbare Ort regt -  inspiriert durch Kutiras und Raffaels künstlerisch-spirituelles Schaffen und Wirken -  an zu eigener Kontemplation, Kreativität, Yoga, Energiearbeit...Zudem führt dieser abgelegene Paradies-Ort wunderbare Menschen zusammen und ermöglichte uns so einen unvergesslichen Aufenthalt. Ganz herzlichen Dank Euch, Kutira und Raffael, für diese so bewegende Zeit,......vielleicht kann ich ja mal wieder kommen...für länger
Alles Liebe, Ariane

Please read before booking. I will give the most honest review that I can. My husband and I travelled with my brother and his girlfriend to Maui. We flew in from Oahu and this was going to be the first time that we shared a house and rented a private room. When booking, the pictures looked great and we were all very excited to stay in the 'jungle' in a more remote part of Maui. We checked in a bit early, at about 1, and met Raphael. We were sure to be on time for check in, because they have a "late fee" because they have to hire an employee to check in after hours, which turns out to be Raphael, the owner. The whole check in seemed a bit odd. We were charged a Maui tax, and they only accepted cash. We have never been charged tax in all of our stays. After we signed our papers, he showed us the house and property. It was definitely a beautiful piece of land, nicely groomed, and beautiful views of the ocean. They had a hiking trail which lead to the ocean, as well as a waterfall and lagoon nearby. We are all adventurous and were very happy to visit the waterfall/ocean. Our room on the other hand, was extremely outdated, and the bed was rock hard. We didn't get much sleep because of how uncomfortable the bed was. In addition, I found blood on the sheets near the mattress, and the bed did not have a mattress protector, which was strange considering this place is in the jungle, and bugs are everywhere. The location and ambiance was great. At night, you can hear a feint sound of the ocean hitting rocks, and the palms swaying in the wind. The only thing strange about the night was seeing Raphael roam the house at late hours. He lived in a house adjacent to ours, yet he had some of his food in the kitchen, and we would see him roaming around in a zombie-like state. It was definitely strange, and I felt a little uncomfortable. As stated above, this was our first time renting a house with other people. All 6 rooms shared the same indoor shower, which was not very sanitary at all. The kitchen/hallways were very clean though. The kitchen was well equipped, and guests had to wash/clean all of their own dishes, and be sure to clean up after themselves, which was fine with us. Overall, we would not be staying here again. We feel that we overpaid for the room that we received, but that was not the issue. The issue for us was the fact that the bed was extremely uncomfortable, and we just did not like sharing a house and shower with 6 other rooms. If you are very spiritual and enjoy a house with 6 rooms and 1 shower, then you may find this place more enjoyable. In addition, as said above, this is definitely...
I appreciate the amount of work that's gone into making this place a true retreat!
Excellent home base for exploring the road to Hana area.

When we just arrived,  Raphael was coming to us and guided us around the area.  He is such a awesome guy and all the volunteers were also so lovely.  The place is like not from earth,  it is more like from heaven.  Waterfalls, nice wooden buildings.  Yoga room,  allover fantastic. 

I will come back for Sure
Perfect place for vacation in Maui - amazing and absolutely unique! For sure we will come back again! And I can fully recommend for someone who wish to discover real Maui!

This is a very special, secluded and spiritual place. It is as close to nature as you can get. If you need some some quiet time in the jungle at the edge of the cliff with a secluded waterfall, where you can swim, this place is for you. 
The amenities are great. There's a modern, spotless kitchen, clean bathroom, additional outdoor shower and a yoga and meditation room. Really fantastic!!!

My favorite thing about this place was the property itself- a gorgeous piece of land, something between tropical jungle and a Southeast Asian monastery. A short but steep hike down a cliffside trail brings you to the ocean. No beach but lots of big rocks to sit on and contemplate. Then if you hike up the nearby stream for a bit (we weren't able to find the trail so we were jumping on rocks and wading), you arrive at the bottom of a breathtaking 150 ft waterfall. It's not a tourist location, even off the beaten track for people who stay at the retreat, and we were all alone. It was one of the most memorable activities during our whole stay!

As to the people there, Raphael and Kutira run an eco-lifestyle program that hosts a handful of volunteers. They help run the Airbnb and were nice and helpful. The only host I met was Raphael, who was pleasant and even shared some tips on meditation when I asked. Some other reviewers mentioned feeling uncomfortable with the people there. I can see how it might get unsettling with the volunteers/hosts going about the house, especially late at night, but in my experience they were harmless and just doing their own thing. Generally they have that sort of peaceful, spiritual, earth-loving vibe, which even if you're not into, make them pleasant to be around.

The biggest thing to consider about this place is probably its location on the island. You're definitely not getting a resort-style experience and it feels like you're retreating into a secret jungle paradise after a day of Maui adventures. To get there from Paia, the nearest town, it's a 20 minute drive on a curvy (but easy) highway then a strip of dirt road. For the dirt road, most people had Jeeps or 4WD's, but we were able to get by in a small compact rental - just be prepared for bit of a turbulent entrance/exit. Paia was also the closest beach. The more popular beaches, like the ones near Kihei, were maybe a 30-40 minute drive away. One thing we learned was that there are something like 14 microclimates on Maui. We were there at the start of March and the Airbnb was mostly cloudy and windy with a bit of rain, although still warm. It wasn't a big deal since we could just drive to Kihei and the sun would bust out and we'd get our hot dry Hawaiian beach weather. Just be prepared to be driving around a good amount to get to places!
I had an amazing time at this super cool retreat. If your looking to feel the spirit of this beautiful island. This is a great place to do it. Location is prime as well. Enjoy!!!

Pros- natural landscape is incredible. Secluded, private, beautiful. Unique setting with a multitude of spiritual goddesses, sacred spaces and alters. 

Cons- cleanliness- bugs/pests. 
A couple of the temples had lots of gecko/mice feces. I understand it’s in nature, but they need to be better maintained. 

Our room had a few geckos show themselves at night, but otherwise seemed clean. 

Although they claimed it had never happened before, there were hundreds of ants crawling in the compost, trailed up the wall into the window frame, which got into our dried cereal in the cupboard (which was our mistake). There were also several ants in the indoor bathroom. 

Male host. Inappropriate. He tucked $20 in my cleavage for our lost food due to ants. He acknowledged the inappropriateness of doing this later- but come on... really!?! He came across as rude and arrogant at times with us and other guests. Made me feel uncomfortable as a female.

Der Weg zu Paula ist ein Abenteuer. Bei Regen empfiehlt sich ein 4x4 zu mieten.

Die Begrüssung war sehr freundlich und Offenherzig. Das Zimmer sehr sauber und mit viel Liebe eingerichtet. Überall auf dem Gelände hat es kleine Erholungsnischen und Platz für Ruhe, Meditation, Yoga und Unterhaltung. Ein Highlight; der eigene Wasserfall! <3
(Der Weg ist zwar Steil, aber feel the feed!)

Irgenwie ist es ein Kraftort dort. Wir sind sehr zur Ruhe gekommen und obwohl wir oft unterwegs waren, sind wir dort in die Tiefe unseres Herzens gekommen.

Vielen lieben Dank für die Zeit. Wir kommen wieder und können es von Herzen weiter empfehlen! Danke für alles...
Beautiful, quiet spot in a great part of the island. Take a yoga class, walk the trails, and enjoy!
It was okay to stay there. The kitchen had a lot of ants. The garden was verry pretty but the house was run-down.

Very beautiful! We had such an amazing morning watching the sunrise, walking the grounds, visiting the chickens and the ocean view, admiring the different buildings and landscaping, and then returning to a breakfast from the eggs of the chickens we just visited. And that was just the first two hours! The pools at the top of the waterfall were one of the most beautiful places I’ve ever been. We did the whole road to Hana and nothing was as perfect, and we certainly had no others all to ourselves! The trail to the ocean and up to the bottom of the waterfall was an adventure! Our hosts were so nice with lots of suggestions and stories, and our fellow travelers there were fun to visit with.

When I booked I saw all kinds of glowing reviews, and then a few that brought up the negatives. I felt compelled to reply but could not, but I can here! :)

1) Yes, the road is a little rough and it takes a few extra minutes. I highly recommend slowing down and enjoying the chickens (we noticed one with four little chicks on the side), the beautiful trees, flowers, etc. 

2) Yes, once the sunset is over the mosquitos did appear. There are fewer when the trade winds blow but the hurricane disrupted them. So, if it’s not windy, retire inside and close the screens.

3) The trail to the upper pools above the waterfall is a bit steep but secured with ropes to hold on to. That said, you should bring some level of fitness and agility. And “feel your feet” :)

4) The trail to the ocean is an adventure that is well worth it but take it seriously, bring water and pay attention to your route and the way back. The first bit is the scariest so that’s a good litmus test. 

All in all, highly recommended!
Wonderful and peaceful place.

We loved spending the last 5 days of our honeymoon here! The property is absolutely amazing. There are so many small details all over the property and the house we stayed in, you just have to soak it all in! We loved the ocean trail/water fall hikes. If you are a little older or have injuries I would not suggest it. I slipped a few times but it was worth it :) 

The location is about 15-20 drive from Paia but we enjoyed being a little more remote. Grab some groceries on your way (especially breakfast food). We enjoyed making our own breakfast then being out and about all day. 

Thanks for the great stay and probably one of the more unique Airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in. It’s not for everyone but it was exactly what we wanted!

Such a great experience and a beautiful place with breath taking views! A little hiccup in the beginning due to our rental car being lower than expected and not sufficient for the road to the air bnb but that was fixed with a quick swap for a Jeep and then everything was good! Great communication and such a cool story behind the place! Would definitely recommend it!

Beautiful facility, but on the rainy side of the island, far from the many beautiful and sunny beaches Maui offers.  We were here for one week in January-February and it was grey, cloudy, rainy, windy and super muddy pretty much the whole time.  We drove many days about one hour to get to South Maui, where it was sunny and gorgeous.  If you are looking for time in the sun and on beaches, this is not the best place to stay.

name: Bright Plateau Studio Apartment
summary: Cozy one bedroom apartment situated in the heart of the plateau, close to great boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and music venues. 5 min. walk to Mont-Royal Metro, 3 min. walk to groceries, pharmacy and Jeanne-Mance Park, all in a dynamic, vibrant and safe neighbourhood.
space: Fully furnished bright and sunny, with wifi, free coffee and tea. Accommodates up to 4 people with a very comfortable pull-out couch. We have a dog Cloe who visits the apartment but won't be there during your stay, We are extra vigilant about keeping the apartment free of dog hair but please let us know if you have an allergy
description: Cozy one bedroom apartment situated in the heart of the plateau, close to great boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and music venues. 5 min. walk to Mont-Royal Metro, 3 min. walk to groceries, pharmacy and Jeanne-Mance Park, all in a dynamic, vibrant and safe neighbourhood. Fully furnished bright and sunny, with wifi, free coffee and tea. Accommodates up to 4 people with a very comfortable pull-out couch. We have a dog Cloe who visits the apartment but won't be there during your stay, We are extra vigilant about keeping the apartment free of dog hair but please let us know if you have an allergy You will have access to the whole apartment, the kitchen includes: fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee machine. 50" TV in the living room with Chromecast and HDMI cable attached. Kate and I will be available 24/7 should you need anything, we're 2 blocks away Bursting with boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and music venues the Plateau is a safe and bustling neighbourhood
neighborhood_overview: Bursting with boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants, bars and music venues the Plateau is a safe and bustling neighbourhood with a burgeoning nightlife and beautiful parks.
transit: 3 min. walk to groceries and pharmacy, 5 min. walk to Mont-Royal Metro, 97 and 11 Bus stop across the street on Mont-Royal Avenue, 55 Bus a block from your doorstep.
access: You will have access to the whole apartment, the kitchen includes: fridge, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffee machine. 50" TV in the living room with Chromecast and HDMI cable attached.
interaction: Kate and I will be available 24/7 should you need anything, we're 2 blocks away
house_rules: Only guests who are registered for the stay are to be residing in the apartment.

host.host_about: Hi! I'm a music composer working in Montreal. Love to read, snowboard and have been known to mix a few cocktails when the mood strikes me. I will be at your full disposal during your stay, I am clean and very easy to communicate with. I'll do my best to help you enjoy this city and all it has to offer! :)

reviews.comments: Alex is an amazing host. Very pleasant, welcoming and great at communicating. The place was just perfect for me and my friends. We felt like home the entire time. We definitely would like to stay here again. And the location is ideal for anyone who likes the Plateau area and everything that it has to offer.

An excellent space, well maintained and atmospheric, perfect for anyone staying in Montreal. The location is close to transit and restaurants and is extremely affordable. The host also provides exceptional service! A must stay Airbnb.

The suite is in a prime location, located in the heart of plateau. The apartment was clean and spacious, and was one of the best places I've stayed at. Moreover, Alexandre provided helpful tips on cool restaurants in the neighbourhood, and was an overall great host.
Amazing location, not far from Mt. Royal or local bars/ restaurants. Very clean and easy to find. Additionally very nice and comfortable furniture.

A clean apartment, located in an noisy neighberhood. Metro is down te street, supermarket is around the corner. Alex and his wife are very nice, checking in en contacting them went really easy, thanks for having us.

The location is great near the subway, lots of small restaurants and bars and two supermarkets. Alex was a great host, and very understanding when we were dealing with return flight delays before leaving the apartment. Would stay again.

Alexandre's place is perfectly located in Le Plateau, with endless shops, restaurants, and food stores closeby. There is air conditioning for those hot summer days, and ample natural light in the living/dining room. The place is clean, and the wi-fi is fast. I would stay here again
Fantastic spot close to so many cool things! We loved thr apartment and the neighborhood!

Alex and Kate are amazing hosts. Very flexible and arranging on arrival time (sorry again, we are still learning to travel with toddlers). The place is perfectly located, very close to the best restaurants in town and well equiped (coffee and towels are very pleasant). We highly recommend Alex and Kate's apartement for a weekend in Montreal.
Great location and Alexandre was easy to communicate with. Unit was clean and as described. Thanks for allowing us to stay!
The place was amazingly located in a cute neighborhood with pharmacies and grocery stores very close. Alex was great about any questions we had, would recommend!

Le logement de Alexandre est exceptionnellement bien situé. Tout est près du Aribnb: banque, épicerie, métro, restaurants de qualité, bars, clubs, etc. Alexandre est un hôte très sympathique, relax et amical. En entrant dans le Airbnb, j'ai été surpris par la beauté de celui-ci, puisqu'il paraissait encore mieux que dans les photos. Je donne définitivement 5/5 à ce Airbnb.
Awesome place to stay! Location is by far the best!!!

Fantastic location and exactly what we needed for a weekend exploring Montreal. Close to shops, amenities, a short 5 min. walk to the Mont-Royal metro. Alexandre's was also quick to respond. Check-in was flawless.

We were very comfortable here and we wished we were staying for more than just a weekend! The location is AMAZING, the apartment was a nice cool temperature (appreciated in all this humidity!), and it offered plenty of space.
Très bon airBnB
This apartment is perfectly located, very very clean, and Alex was super hospitable. The apartment  is exactly as it appears in the pictures and I would stay here again.

Alex was an amazing host! Quick responses & accommodating our early arrival. Location was amazing. And so close to Mount Royal Metro. Great and safe-feeling neighbourhood. Thanks Alex for a wonderful stay.
Alex was very willing to work with us on a late-arrival arrangements and gave great information about parking. The apartment was super clean, cute, and in an awesome location!

This is a great one-bedroom with open floor plan for the common areas.  Host was very communicative and got back to me almost immediately when I contacted him.  The apartment is street level, so I did not have to lug my bags up a flight of stairs.  There was also a privacy finish on the windows and draperies, so that I didn't feel like I was on display to passersby (which there were not many because it is a residential street).  Around the corner on the commercial street are many cool shops and eating spots.  A couple of blocks to some fab restaurants and stores on St. Laurent in one direction and a few more blocks the other way on St. Denis.  The Metro was within walking distance and made getting to and from the airport really easy (and inexpensive).  Many thanks, Alexandre!
Very nice, cheerful place. Well located a few blocks from the metro and around the corner from many restaurants and stores.

The place is so convenient to shops, restaurants and bars. Really trendy area. Lots to explore. 
Kate and Alex are amazing hosts. Very responsive and friendly. 
We will likely come back for another stay since we haven’t got a chance to explore the entire area. Nice change from downtown

Alexandre and Kate were great hosts. This is my second time using Air BnB, and another great experience. He met us at the place (we arrived a touch late) and explained the best place for legal parking. The Apartment was very cozy and immaculately clean. Since it was a 1st floor (Website hidden by Airbnb) made it easy for unloading. There unit almost was too warm, which is great considering the temp in Montreal! He even texted my girl to see how our trip was going. Great guy.  Our trip was amazing and I think it started with meeting Alexandre and staying in the Plateau.  A great experience!

name: La Sagrada Familia (and metro) 4 blocks!
summary: Neighborhood: Gràcia, "La Sagrada Familia" (and subway) 4 streets! Center: Catalunya Square / Las Ramblas/Paseo de Gracia:  3 metro stops, metro L2 PLACE TO SLEEP AT NIGHT AND OFF TO EXPLORE BCN IN THE DAY!!! Shared bathroom.  I DO NOT RENT to live/study/work at home or in Barcelona. I NEVER RENT PEOPLE WHO COME for PARTIES IN BCN. CHECK IN:  btw 14/22. AFTER 22:00, 20€. CHECK OUT: BEFORE 11:00. Gay-Friendly
space: I live at home, there is another single room for guests. Exceptional location: you can visit 2 emblematic places of Barcelona, walking: Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau Hospital.        Only respectful, quiet and friendly people. LGBT.       Very useful double room. It has 2 single beds, with lots of ambient light. It has fan and heating. Only for those who need two single beds.       The apartment is inside the block and you do not hear the noise of the city. With elevator.

Center: Catalunya Square / Las Ramblas/Paseo de Gracia:  3 metro stops, metro L2 PLACE TO SLEEP AT NIGHT AND OFF TO EXPLORE BCN IN THE DAY!!! Shared bathroom. Only for those who need two single beds.       The apartment is inside the block and you do not hear the noise of the city. With elevator. The whole apartment is not rented. * I provide clean towels and bed linens.     * Hair dryer.     * Soap, shower
neighborhood_overview: "Gracia  Nova– Sagrada Familia": Enjoy a quiet place, located in "Gracia Nova neighborhood", One of the busiest area of Barcelona, Just 4 blocks from the "Sagrada Familia", 10 minutes walking from Hospital Sant Pau and 4 subway stops from Parc Güell.      The streets surrounding Gaudí's works are very quiet, a very typical neighborhood where you can enjoy the contact with the local life.      At night, the streets are safe, serene and quiet.      Ideal area if you are looking for a quiet place to stay in Barcelona.      You can walk to the most important streets of Gracia, a typical neighborhood of Barcelona, with streets, passages, squares, bars and restaurant to discover.      You can also walk to the Passeig de Gràcia, to discover the masterpieces of modernism: "La Pedrera" and "Casa Batlló", all by Gaudí.      You can also walk to the "Agbar Tower" and "The Encants market" in Barcelona (15 minutes).      And if you like the "mini-Mountaineering " you can go, walking, to the "El Car
notes: Très calme, Pas de place pour les fêtes.
transit: Places of interest: * Walking: "La Sagrada Familia", 4 streets; "Hospital Sant Pau", 8 streets; "Park Güell", 30 minutes walking; "Passeig de Gracia" (to Diagonal subway stop (2 subway stops)) 20 minutes walking; "Agbar Tower" and "Encants Market", 20 minutes walking. "Bunker el Carmel", 40 minutes walking. * Subway "Sagrada Familia" (4 streets): line 5, two subway to "Diagonal stop" to find "Passeig de Gràcia" and discover the masterpieces of modernism: "La Pedrera" and "Batlló House". And line 2, also to "Passeig de Gracia", only 1 street to "Plaza Catalunya, main square" and "Las Ramblas". * Subway "Joanic" (4 streets): L4, to "Jaume 1º stop" you will be in the "old center of Barcelona", the famous "Gothic" neighborhood (to see "the Cathedral" and its beautiful little streets) "the Born" neighborhood, to see "The Picasso Museum"and the beautiful "Church Santa María del Mar". It will also take you, in 15 minutes, to the beach, "the old port", "the Olympic port", the beach. From Subwa
access: The whole apartment is not rented. * I provide clean towels and bed linens.     * Hair dryer.     * Soap, shower gel, shampoo and toilet paper.      * Wifi      * Guides on Barcelona: English, French, Portuguese, Spanish      * Heating and fan      * The room has a private key.
interaction: After making the booking, I will send detailed information on how to get home, from the airport, with map included. It's very easy.     At home, you will receive information about the neighborhood, transport services, security in Barcelona, etc. * I only accept reservations for profile holders at airbnb. * ensure security: I do not make reservations for third parties (from one person to another person: family, friends,etc.)
house_rules: Airbnb provides recommended to know the following information: * Building Standards: I ask please Non call or intercom door of my neighbors. * Smokers: Smoking is not permitted * Noise: -Please I ask my guests to try not to make too much noise in the building to comply with the standard of the building. -You are not allowed to enter the house with strangers. -It is not allowed to make any kind of parties. -I ask not to wash clothes in the bathroom, or kitchen. -respect the time of check in (after 14:00), check ou (before 11:00am) Kitchen (and table): only available from 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. to prepare breakfast, and quick dinner from 7 pm to 11:00 pm.,  The kitchen can be used for light meals (as pastas, sandwiches, salads) Please: do not do fried foods.  Bathroom: to respect the rest at night, from 23:30 to 7:30 am, Not to take a shower. Ask to be prudent with time in the shower / bath. Please: be clean and fast using the bathroom, the kitchen and the table. Please: be respectful o

host.host_about:
Welcome home!
Hello, I'm Julian, from Argentina, living/working in Barcelona (2009)
I am 45 years old, I am a graduate in Political Science.
I hope to share my home with quiet and very respectful people. 
(no place for parties, I´m sorry)
I speak Spanish/English (a little French)
host.host_neighbourhood: Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments: Julián es una persona muy amable y servicial siempre dispuesta a ayudar con cualquier cuestión que se te presente, desde guía de lugares para visitar hasta recomendaciones para salir a cenar. La habitación es cómoda y el apartamento tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía corta en Barcelona. Esta súper bien ubicado y la estación del metro y autobús están muy cerca. Hay muchos supermercados en la zona, farmacias, centros de fotocopiado, etc. Recomiendo el lugar para visitar Barcelona.

Altamente recomendable
Muy bien ubicado 
muy lindo y  limpio
se puede cocinar,lavar la ropa , es tranquilo,
muy comodo Julian el dueño es muy atento y conoce mucho de barcelona para recomendar que hacer como llegar, etc

Julian was a very pleasant host. The apartment was clean and quiet. I felt safe and comfortable at all times. The bedroom was a good size and the beds were comfortable. The neighborhood is nice and quiet. No complaints at all. I recommend staying at Julian's apartment. All the best.

We had an absolutely wonderful time at Julian's apartment and I would, without a doubt, recommend this to anyone visiting Barcelona. Julian was a fantastic host, our room was extremely comfortable, and the apartment was well-situated for everything in Barcelona. 

Tuvimos una experiencia muy buena con Julian y yo, por supuesto, daria esta recommendation a qualquier persona que viaje a Barcelona. Julian fue lo mas amable, el cuarto fue muy comodo, y el apartmento fue perfecto para todas las cosas que nosotros queriamos hacer en Barcelona.

Julian was an excellent host. He met us at the metro station and was helpful with directions throughout our trip. Julian's apartment is in a great location, very easy to find your way back because it is so close to the sagrada familia and the metro.  I would definitely recommend staying with julian!

Julian was a very kind and generous host, while also being very relaxed. The room was quiet and had a desk with all sorts of information on how to get the best out of Barcelona. 

Julian was flexible around the dates I was staying, and I felt very comfortable. 

The flat has all the amenities you need, and was close to the night bus and the metro system. 

And best of all - sagrada familia is only a few blocks away! 

I will stay with Julian again when I travel to Barcelona. Thanks Julian!

I've just spent the month of August at Julian's place and found the room and location to be perfect for what I wanted and what I paid. I walked from Julians place to almost every sight worth seeing and those days when I was just too tired (or lazy) I had a great choice of 2 metro stations, Joanic and Sagrada Familia, to get me around. 

Julian was a great and helpful host, providing lots of information on Spain. I enjoyed our conversation especially those very few moments when we had to work through our misinterpretation of our respective languages which always ended in a good laugh.

This was my second stay at Julians which is testament to how much I enjoyed his apartment and his company. The apartment had everything I needed, location, cleanilness and well priced. I spent many occassions in long conversation with Julian, each of us learning about each other, our languages and cultures, which is just what I was looking for in an aribnb accommodation, not just a holiday but a cultural learning experience. Julian had lots of info about Barcelona and was very helpful with advice on how to get around and what to see. I look forward to staying in touch with Julian and continuing to hear from him about magnificent Barcelona.

My friend and I stayed with Julian for six nights and have no complaints.  His place is immaculate, well-equipped and in a great location near the Sagrada Familia and the Metro.  It served as a great base for exploring Barcelona.  Julian himself is quite gracious and we enjoyed getting to know him during our stay.  We would definitely stay with Julian again if an opportunity to return to Barcelona presented itself.

I was moving to Barcelona because of work and I needed a place to stay while looking for an apartment. I've been with Julian more than 2 weeks and it has been very confortable. Julian is a great host, always available for questions. I'm Italian and our conversations were funny because, since I do not speak Spanish, I was talking to him in Italian and he replied in Spanish but we were able to understand each other easily :)

I highly recommend him. The apartment is in a very strategic position, very quiet and with many supermarkets nearby. Moreover, seeing la Sagrada Familia every day when going to work has been cool!

My friend and I stayed for 2 nights at Julian's, and it was a great experience.  He was very clear about what we had access to in his house and provided us with helpful guides and maps about Barcelona.  The wifi was reliable.  The location is in a nice area, near a supermarket (Lidl) and about 5 blocks away from the subway line that takes you to lots of major sights, including the beach!  We probably couldn't have stayed in a better place.
It is really nice location and host~ small room but clean and has everything i needed. Nice bathroom and kitchen. It was a pleasure to stay here.
Pasamos muy bien en Barcelona con Julián!
Great host. Great place to stay , easy to find and close by to some of Barcelona's   great tourist attractions.

Julian is very nice. He prepared breakfast for me in the room and also give me any useful information about Barcelona.

The room is clean and comfortable. Nice stay there.

Julian is a very good host and gave me all necessary information for my visit in Barcelona before I arrived. So I immediately found my way there. He is very polite and communicative and we had many nice and interesting talks. The flat is very clean and you can use his kitchen. Although Barcelona is a very busy city the room is really quiet and I slept deeply and undisturbed. This address is highly recommended!

I stayed with a friend for seven nights at Julians and everything was great. The room is small, but it's clean and comfortable even in the spanish heat. We very much enjoyed our stay and even the location of the apartment was perfect for us. I would definitely stay there again if I came back to Barcelona.

Julian is a fantastic host! He is very organized and thoughtful. I had a great time staying in his flat which is in a central location and within walking distance of the Metro and Sagrada Familia. I also enjoyed getting to know him and discussing current topics with him. Julian was very helpful with providing information about the important sites to see around Barcelona as well as great food places along the way. I would absolutely recommend staying with him!

I stayed at Julian's place for 4 nights with a friend in June 2012 and we had a very nice time. The double room is very practical with a wardrobe and a lot of shelves and drawers for storage. We used the kitchen for breakfast. The room/beds were very nice and the house is very clean. Julian is a very pleasant host that gave us a lot of useful information. The location is great, next to the Sagrada Familia, very close to Gracia. Metro is 5 blocks away, bus to the city center is just across the street. Gracias por todo Julian :-)

It's my first time to book a room through Airbnb and I really enjoyed staying at Julian's apartment. Julian is very friendly, helpful and efficient, he told me a lot of stuff about Spain, he responded to my email promptly and provided me some useful information of Barcelona after I booked the room online. When I arrived, he had already got me some maps and a light breakfast for the next morning, how thoughtful he is! He likes to keep his apartment clean and tidy and the room I stayed is very cozy.  I highly recommend this room especially for girls who travel on your own. Julian is a great host and I will definitely stay at his apartment again when I'm back in Barcelona in the future.

Muchas Gracias por la oportunidad de compartir con ustedes la experiencia en la estadia en la casa de Julian ,El es una gran persona ,nos sentimos como si estabamos visitando a un familiar o a un amigo cercano , el es muy servicial nos ayudo mucho explicandonos la mejor y mas economica forma de movernos en la ciudad de Barcelona. Y u casa la mantiene muy limpia y esta ubicada en un lugar muy axcesible a trasportacion y en uno de los mejores lugares de Barselona , Disfrutamos mucho la estadia en su casa y en Barselona , yo lo recomiendo mucho gracias nuevamente
We had a wonderful time in Barcelona.The flat is in an ideal location. Julian was very hospitable, thoughtful and helpful to us. Very much recommend this for anyone coming to Barcelona on a budget.

Julian's apartment is in a great location only a few stops on the metro from the centre of Barcelona,  Julian is a very helpful and informative host, his apartment is clean and comfortable though I stayed in the twin bed room on my own, I would think  it is a bit small for two people to share.  I would defininitely stay with Julian again.

Julian is very conveniently located close to the Sagrada Familia and in the middle of the center of attractions from Las Ramblas to Parc Guell and 4 blocks to the Metro.  Julian was an amazing host!  He had an English guidebook, map of the city and a metro map waiting for us when we got there.  He spent time giving us information on where the attractions were and how to get there. The place was very clean and my husband and I had plenty of room. The only thing I was disappointed with was that we arrived a day late and I didn't get to spend more time getting to know Julian.  Until next time! :) We highly recommend staying with Julian!!!
Julian è una persona molto disponibile. Non vi sono difficoltà per dialogare e discutere. E' una persona seria.

We had a fantastic visit to Barcelona. We weren't there for very long but Julian's flat is in the perfect location. It was brilliant. There are 2 metro stops close by so we were able to get to lots of places quickly. The weather was fantastic when we were there so all in all it was a fantastic few days!
The room is perfect for 2 girls travelling alone, as sometimes it can be a daunting experience. Julian was on hand to tell us where to go and how to get there. It was fantastic. We had a DELICIOUS paella all thanks to him!!!

Julian is a great host, the apartment was really neat, beds are confortable and the room space it´s ok for two, very confortable if you are alone. The location is great.
For the price its the absolute best option in Barcelona! I would totally reccomend to any of my friends!
Julian nous a attendu bien tard pour nous accueillir... Chaleureux moments de rencontres et grande disponibilité pour faciliter ce trop bref séjour. Gentillesse et discrétion... A refaire.

Julian is a very responsible host as he provided us with many information about the place regarding directions, attractions, food, etc. His flat is situated in a brilliant location which is safe and just a very short distance away from many major attractions. The flat is comfortable for two, and is absolutely one of the cheapest option around!
Consigliato, ottima posizione, buona l'accoglienza. L'appartamento è davvero curato e pulito :) Ci ritornerei volentieri!

We stayed at Julian's place last week, and it was very nice. Clean (even towels were foreseen), nice house and walking distance from the very nice neighbourhood Gracia : shops, squares to have a drink and Park Guëll. Julian lives near the metro station, so it is easy to head to the centre (on foot also possible, but quite a walk). Thank you very much for the nice stay!!

Julian was very nice. He gave us a lot of information for us to use in deciding how to spend our limited time in Barcelona. He was very helpful and curtious and also gave us our own key to use so we could come and go as we pleased (which was awesome).

Julian was a great host and provided a lot of information about the city. I wish I had made more time, but plan to return one day soon. His listing is very accurate. It's a great neighborhood. Close to two Hop On Hop Off bus stops and several metro options. There is a little restaurant downstairs (with wifi and outdoor seating), a pharmacy across the street, and a cheap grocery store around the corner.
Julian was a wonderful host. His apartment was in a great location.
Logement simple et suffisant.Manque une machine à café avec filtre.

Julian was an informed host with lots of readable and personal information to hand. The apartment was spotless and the beds were really comfortable. Julian supplied lots of added little extras, shampoo, body wash, tea, etc that make a difference when trying to pack. Julian was not intrusive and we had no time restraints with regard to re entry. Our stay was great the only little niggle was that we were nt aware there is no balcony or outside access for my smoker companion. We hope to revisit Barcelona and would certainly stay at julians again, thanks for your hospitality

Julian's place was a great spot for my friend and I while we stayed in Barcelona.  His directions to the house & surrounding area were very details and super helpful - he even greeted me with an umbrella to walk back down and find parking for my car in the rain when I arrived!
Apartment / our room was very spacious and clean - and a great central point near metro for us to wander and explore the city.
Thanks Julian for having us - we had a great time in Barcelona!

Julian was a wonderful, gracious, helpful and informative host.  The apartment was pretty easy to find from the Sagrada Metro stop.  The flat was clean and well sized for travellers.  There was plenty of shopping, dining and sight-seeing close to the flat.  Julian offered plenty of ideas for things to do in Barcelona and how to get there.  I would highly recommend Julian to anyone and would stay there without a doubt again.

Julian was a very friendly host.  I wasn't entirely sure when I would arrive as I hadn't booked a train ticket in advance, and Julian was able to be flexible with my arrival.  I was shown to my room and then given a very thorough tour of the apartment.  The place was clean and quiet, and my bed was very comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.

Tenía que quedarme en Barcelona y fue una buena experiencia!
Llegué muy tarde a la casa pero Julian me estaba esperando pacientemente y me recibió con cordialidad.
La habitación exacto como aparece en el anuncio, limpia y ordenada con toda la información e instrucciones más un detalle de bienvenida muy dulce. Toda la casa muy preparado para recibir huéspedes, se ve que Julian es muy organizado y previsor.
El lugar es muy conocido para mí en Barcelona,cerca de la Sagrada Familia y muy bien comunicado con el centro por bus y metro.
Se duerme muy bien porque no hay ruido, la verdad es que se merece tener tan buenas evaluaciones.
Volveré!!

Julian's place is in great location, very close to Sagrada Familia. When we get to the place, we got a big bottle of water and some candy and snacks - very nice after my tiring flight. You can easily walk to the most famous Sagrada Familia, or take the metro from there. He kindly provided us very detailed suggestions about the metro and how to get to everywhere. The map and guidebook were also very helpful.   Thank you Julian!

We enjoyed our stay with Julian in Barcelona.  We arrived a bit late due to our flight and he was very gracious and greeted us anyway.  The room was simple, but clean and all we needed for our stay.  Julian was very helpful with giving us directions and telling us how to take the public transportation to get around.  Would recommend for anyone going to Barcelona.  Easy walking to La Sagrada Familia and metro stops as well as Park Guell.

Me and my friend spent only one day in Julians apartment but it was absolutely perfect for us: cosy, calm street, close to metro, clean room and bathroom (the most important for me:) ). And a very tasty (probably local) coconut chocolate:) Thanks Julian!
I had a nice stay with Julian in Barcelona. His apartment is conveniently located, clean, and quiet. A good landing pad in Barcelona.

Todo estuvo excelente! Julian es súper atento y muy flexible, nos dio muchas sugerencias sobre que lugares visitar y todo el depa esta impecable de limpieza.

En lo personal me gusto la ubicación, si volvería y lo recomiendo!

We were here with my friend for one night only. Julian was very kind to explain us everything about the flat in detail. The flat is very clean and has all needed conveniences. I confirm that the location is best as Julian says. Very possible to return when next time in Barcelona.

This was my second stay at Julian's Mussi, Sagada Familia place.  This time for 5 night, the apartment and room very clean. Julian makes his guests feel comfortable, he is friendly, polite and always provides good information about Barcelona and Spain.  Good location close to 2 metro stations, cafes, small shops, supermarkets and of course the Sagrada Familia.

I highly recommend Julián's place. My friend and I stayed for 6 nights. Julián was very helpful with information for transportation and other recommendations. His apartment is very clean, he also leaves space in the refrigerator for us, and we could use the kitchen too. Julián make sure his guests are comfortable. He is a great host. The location is in a very nice neighborhood, where we walked all over.  We were glad we stayed there!
Julian was a nice host, he gave us maps and water and snacks, and his apartment was very close to the Sagrada Familia. Overall, very comfortable.

We stayed with Julian for 3 days. Our stay was very pleasant and very nice location. Julian was very helpful in recommending best modes of transport, things to see and provided useful tips of shopping as well. He also let us use his kitchen to cook dinner and space in the fridge/freezer to store things which was very useful. Overall we thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Julian who is a good host. I would definitely recommend him and his place.

Julian is a great host. He supplies all kinds of information and a brilliant map to help you find the flat. He's also very thorough at showing you where light switches are, how the cooker works etc.The flat is on a main road - a real plus for a single female traveller - but at the rear of the building, so there is no street noise. My room was nice and airy, with a very comfortable bed.
the place is clean and quite near to the sightseeing spots.

I have only spent one night at Julian's place but can say the place is clean and tidy. Julian is very helpful and gave good directions. 

Good location just a few blocks from Sagrada Familia. 

Would definitely recommend the place. 

Cheers Julian

Julian es una persona organizada y responsable de su trabajo de anfitrion. Suministra la informacion requerida de una manera oportuna y clara. Recomiendo la estadia en su piso, el cual es sencillo y muy limpio. Patricia.

Julian was very accommodating. He was flexible when I had to leave my luggage because I still had a day in Barcelona but the other guests needed he space. The room was clean and the apartment itself was well maintained. It is a great location because it doesn't face the street so its not loud at all. The bathroom is large and modern and he let us use his kitchen. Great place to stay.

Julian was so kind and helpful! He gave us a map and told us where good places were. The room was tidy and he had water and a fan available for us. He also let us use freezer space. Would stay with him again when we visit!

Very clean cosy apartment about 10 mins walk from Sagrada Familia metro station. The bus stop to town, Placa Catalunya where you find Las Ramblas and the Boqueria food market, is  directly opposite so very easy if you want a break from the Metro. Julian is an attentive host and gave us lots of information about what to see. He also gives you privacy. Our room was comfortable and neat with a fan for those crazily hot nights. Kitchen quite small but enough for a simple meal.

Julian is a very helpful and pleasant host. He was very kind and careful to his guests. He was always ready to answer all our questions and gave us so many pieces of advice! He provided us with guide-books and maps. We were really impressed how clean and quiet his flat is!!! We felt free and comfortable, like at home. :))

Julian was very helpful. we initially got lost while searching for his apartment and that too at 11:30 in night. But julian walked down and helped us. his instructions about transport services, and house rules were quite clear. even provided us with Map and some tourist info. We had a small stay of 2 nights so couldn't for longer at his place, but overall it was good experience.
Julian is very knowledgable and clean:) he has a very comfy guest rooms and it is very convenient to get around.  It is in a very nice neighbourhood :) I recommend the say :)

Julian is very nice person. he is attentive and helpful. the apartment is comfortabe, cozy, quiet and super clean, what is very important! location also is great. i would recommend the place to everybody!

Julian was very responsive prior to my trip to Barcelona. My friend and I had a great stay at his apartment. Julian was very helpful when with letting us know the places to visit, given our short trip. The bus line is just across the street which takes you to the city center. Familia Sagrada is just a few blocks away. Great location! Thanks Julian!

Julian is a very nice person. I liked staying at his house because it was  quiet and peaceful after a full day of sightseeing..Also it was so conveniently located. We had a pleasant experience at Julian's home. Thanks again, Julian

Julian was very organized and communicated well prior to our arrival. The room was a bit small but comfortable for our stay. He was very helpful and gave advice as to where to go and what to see. The only downside was that the apartment building is pretty quiet and it seems tense in the sense that you have to be quiet all the time. We had to be very careful so as to not disturb other tenants. I would recommend this apartment for people who are willing to be careful when coming home late at night and whatnot.

Julian was a very nice friendly and hospitable host who greeted us on arrival with a continental breakfast and sweet selection together with a large bottle of water. His conversation about local Spanish and Catalunyan issues was both interesting and informative. Transport arrangements were made very easy due to his great advice of how to use the local rail network. The apartment was very clean and comfortable, and had a very convenient location being only five minutes walk from the Sagrada Familia. In addition a Lidl supermarket is just around the corner from the apartment. We would definitely recommend any fellow travellers to Barcelona to stay with Julian as a host. He made our stay in Barcelona thoroughly enjoyable, and kindly organised a taxi for our departure to the airport, and even got up early himself to bid us farewell. We would have no hesitation in staying with again him should we return to Barcelona.

Julian have a great clean place. The location is really good to see the sagrada familia., the metro is really close and the bus stop is right outside so getting to the beach for sangrias is really easy. Thanks Mate

Julian's apartment was quiet, spotless, and easy to stay in.  He was extremely nick and went well out of his way -- walking several blocks to find us when our (Hidden by Airbnb) map instructions failed to get us to his apartment.  It was way above and beyond what any host should have had to do.  We would return to stay with him any time, and would recommend him to anyone (except the very noisy -- he shares a building with people who appreciate guests who can be reasonably quiet).

Julian is a very friendly and a very good host. The appartment is perfect to stay in Barcelone. It is very clean, very well located, peacefully situated and Julian helps you in all matters. We would still come again. Thanks Julian for all. We had a great time.

I am a single woman in my twenties, and my mother and I stayed at Julian's lovely flat for one night.  Julian was an incredibly gracious host.  He took time to give us a tour of his apartment and gave recommendations on what sites to see (including providing directions on a map, with alternate routes).  His apartment is literally a 10 minute walk from the Sagrada Familia and two short metro stops from the center of the city.  Furthemore, there is a grocery store just around the corner of his house (buy your water here rather than at the tourist shops near the Sagrada Familia).  If you buy tickets to tour the Sagrada Familia and need to pick up your tickets from a Caixa ATM, there is one just across the street from his apartment.  The location of the flat cannot be beat! 

My mom and I were in Barcelona only for 1 day, since we were leaving for a cruise the following morning.  Julian provided directions on how to take public transportation to the cruise terminals, which was incredibly easy (you just need to take 1 bus, the #20, which departs from across the street from Julian's flat, and then transfer to the cruise shuttle buses, the T3).  We were very impressed by how gracious Julian was and how much he did to accommodate us.

The apartment and the room itself are very clean.  Julian provided us with two towels apiece, snacks, and cold water upon our arrival.  The bathroom is also extremely clean.

I HIGHLY recommend staying at Julian's place.  Meeting Julian was genuinely one of the highlights of our trip!  If I ever return to Barcelona, I will definitely stay with Julian again.

As two guys just looking for a place to rest our head we found julians place filled with rules and time tables. I think he was upset because we showed up 30 minutes late......Had to say we did not feel very welcomed to his place. 

Overall the place was clean,quiet and secure at a great location. I wouldn't go back but for the price and the right person this place is not to bad.

Julian is very kind and amicable host.  Very helpful at giving you all kinds of information. The price for room was great and location is perfect. 
Room was small but clean and nice. I have enjoyed my stay there completely, definitely considering going back there, if given opportunity.
Julian was a great host. He is flexible with the check-in times of his room. The location description was accurate to the last word. This is the place to be when you are visiting Barcelona. Good Job.

The owner is a friendly guy and the room is alright and clean, in an appartment on the backside on the first floor. So you are looking on a big inner square of the houseblocks, The street in front of the house is very busy, but next door is a café where one can have breakfast or a drink. Just 5 blocks to the metro (Sagrada Familia). Common provisions like bathroom, kitchen and a small living room are good.

Julian is a very helpful host. The room was adequate for 2 travelling, very clean if a little small. The location was good, near to the Sagrada Familia and within easy walking distance of a very efficient Metro system.

Julian was very helpful in showing us about transportation. The accomodations were adequate and very clean, and his info was just what we needed. We could have fixed our own breakfast if we had had time.

L'appartement de Julian est impeccable et vraiment très bien situé (à deux pas de la Sagrada Familia). Julián se plie en quatre pour te donner les meilleures adresses de la ville, qu'il s'agisse d'un monument incontournable ou d'un bar à tapas dans le quartier. On dort très bien dans cet appartement tellement méditerranéen. Je retournerai chez Julián avec plaisir!

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans un logement petit  certes mais très propre et accueillant, de plus  il est très calme bien que central et proche du métro et des bus. D'autre part, bien que nous avions quelques appréhensions quant à une réservation chez l'habitant, nous avons vraiment apprécié la délicatesse du logeur qui a su préserver notre intimité puisque nous ne l'avons pratiquement pas rencontré sauf pour notre arrivée et notre départ.

ESPANOL: Julian es un buen buen anfitrion, su casa es muy limpia y ordenada, y el siempre estuvo dispuesto a ayudarnos con cualquier pregunta o inquietud. El departamento esta muy cerca de la Sagrada Familia y es una zona muy bien comunicada con el resto de la ciudad. Ademas la relacion precio calidad es una de las mejores! Lo recomiendo!
ENGLISH: Julian is a very good host, his home is very clean and tidy, and he was always willing to help us with any question or concern. The apartment is really close to the Sagrada Familia and the area is a very well connected to the rest of the city. The price/quality ratio is one of the best! I recommend it!!

Julián was a very gracious host. We arrived earlier than check in time and he allowed us to leave our bags so we could explore the city - very nice. He gave us a map and good advice about the city. Comfortable room, very clean, good location close to Metro.  Overall a good stay - thank you Julián for making our time in Barcelona memorable.
Muchas gracias

Muchisimas gracias Julián,
Teníamos un tiempo fantástico en Barcelona y en tu piso. Estas muy agradables que pudimos quedarnos en un apartamiento muy central y muy bien limpio. 
Gracias

Julian was the perfect host and gentleman - respectful, helpful and he gave us room to relax in his clean apartment. Our room was lovely for coming home to and getting a good night's rest after a fun filled day in Barcelona. Location is convenient to Sagrada Familia and the metro/bus but we enjoyed walking all over the city from our home base.

Si quieres encontrar un sitio en Barcelona en el que realmente descansar después de un largo día de turismo, éste es tu sitio! Julián es una persona muy amable y atenta. Estuvimos muy agusto allí! Gracias de nuevo. Un abrazo.
If you want to find a place in Barcelona where you really relax after a long day of sightseeing, this is your place! Julian is very friendly and attentive. We were very at ease there! Thank you again. Hugs.

Julian was a great host. All went smoothly: the correspondence, information and logistic. His place is very well located and clean. The room was just what we needed for a two nights stay and the fresh cotton bedsheets highly appreciated.
Julian is very attentive and kind and available to give advice when requested. 
I would definitely recommend this place.
We spent four exiting days in Barcelona. Julián was a very attentive host, we felt comfortable in his welll located apartment and in our nice and clean room. Gracias para todo, Julián!

Julian is a wonderful host and you will enjoy your stay with him in Barcelona.  The apartment is very well located just four blocks from the Sagrada Familia Metro Station.  My room was very nice.  The bed is comfortable and there were fresh towels in my room.  The bathroom is clean and the shower works perfectly.  The wifi connection is strong.  There were maps and guidebooks on the night table.  Julian will answer any questions you have about your stay, and he'll give you recommendations about places to visit, restaurants, etc.  The next time I'm in Barcelona I look forward to staying with Julian.

I spent 3 nights at his home with a friend, we didn't see him a lot but he was very nice. The flat and our room were clean and comfortable. 
+1 for the documentation about Barcelona, the good situation of the flat in the city and soft duvets ;)
Great location and a comfy space. The WIFI connection seemed to work with a mobile but the computor didn't.
Julián has been a welcoming host and was very helpful throughout our stay. The room was very nice and comfortable. It is a very good location near the metro and sagrada familia.
Great room, comfortable stay in a pretty convenient location.
Nos fue genial! Julián fue muy atento y amable, la casa está limpia y ordenada, la habitación está muy bien... No se puede pedir más. :)

Julian's place was comfortable and clean and it was perfect for having a sleeping place while we were intensively visiting incredible beautiful barcelona. Four blocks behind Sagrada Familia we were everywhere very fast. Julian is a very reliable host and therefore also very strict concerning to the house rules. A perfect place for a short-trip to barcelona!

Julian's apartment is really great! Our check in was pretty smooth. We didn't have any problems with the room. Everything was perfect! AND VERY VERY CLEAN! The apartment is close to the metro, about a 10 minute walk. But might take a while to find the place. 
Overall, we really enjoyed our short stay and Julian was very polite and helpful :) 
I would definitely recommend this place!

We stayed at Julián's place for 3 nights.
Everything was very.very clean!! He gave us a guide of Barcelona and some helpful advices concerning sightseeing. The flat is located close to the Sagrada Familia (10min walking distance) in a safe area of Barcelona. The room we were sleeping in had no real window to get some fresh air. It just opened to a "veranda"-like space. But we really can recommend Julián's flat and Julián as a host!
N/A did not get to stay as I could not travel to barcelona
Julian was very helpful, polite and reliable.  His room was clean and well provided and the bed was comfortable.  Thank you Julian

The flat is clean, near the Sagrada familia, the small bedroom is relatively comfortable. These are the only benefits. The host Julian is cold, distant. For example, when we arrived, my friend and I decided to sleep almost half and one hour (1h30) because we were very tired. We wanted to take a break before to have fun in Barcelona. The next morning at breakfast, Julian looked up from his breakfast just to tell us that it was not normal to take a break in the afternoon, he said that it was not "safe" for him. he wanted to know what we have done in Barcelona. He was nervous, unpleasant, the situation was a little surrealist.

Sarah
A very good choice. Basic and verry clean - that is all I want and this is the appartement of Julien. A nice host and a pleasantly accomodation.

The location of the apartment was perfect! It was very close to many of the places we wanted to see in the city. The room was larger than we expected and great for two people. Julian was a good host, he gave us information about the city and advice about transportation, and his directions about how to get to the apartment were very clear. If you are looking for a quiet place to stay in the city I would recommend this location!

I stayed at Julián's home with a friend and everything went according to our expectations. The pictures are very realistic, the house is cozy and extremely clean. Also, it is really easy to go anywhere from his house: there are a lot of transport options nearby. All rules are explained before and upon arrival, but this does not bother the stay: otherwise makes it easier and more comfortable. It was great to be able to use the kitchen for small meals. Regarding Julian, he was always available to answer any questions, gave us advice about transports that was very important for us to save money and recommended some places to visit. Also, his presence was nothing invasive and he always gave us time and space to be at ease. The wifi always worked very well and without any problems. If we return to Barcelona we will definitely want to stay here.

Je suis restée pour une seule nuit 
tout était ok , l' appart propre et julian est serviable 
le quartier est super 
Merci Julian
Very nice house less than 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia. The room and the whole house are very clean and Julian is a very nice person.

Ho soggiornato 2 giorni26/27 febb. nella casa di Julian.Devo dire che e' stata una piacevole (Website hidden by Airbnb) stanza era piccolina ma con tutti i confort e soprattutto pulitissima...Julian si e' dimostrato gentile e disponibile.
Consiglierei l alloggio a coppie o singol.
Julian is a very friendly host and knows a lot about the city. We recommend his accommodation!
Julián was a kind and helpful host. He gave us a map of the city and of the metro. The flat was clean and tidy. There is nothing to complain about, I can strongly recommend staying with Julián!

The room was very clean comfortable and quiet, convenient transportation from the Sagrada Familia is very close, julian is very patient, preparing maps and candy in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) est très gentille ,C'est une très bonne voyage chez lui.Merci beaucoup.
Julian is a very polite and helpful guest, the house is really tidy and clean, location also very nice! Highly recommend to anyone!
Everything was as described by Julian.The location was convenient, the room and the flat were cosy and clean. Julian is a polite and quiet person.
very gooooood!

Julian is a very accommodating host. The house is clean and very conveniently located. Julian was very helpful and prepared maps, guidebooks and other infos for us. He gave us directions and suggested best places to go to for the limited time we were there. Julian's neighborhood is also away from all the tourists so it gave us a feel of a local neighborhood.

clean - nice - trustful - helpful
everything we expected we got - PERFECT
we definitely recommend julian´s place

for us the metro was just a little bit too far away
Julian's flat is very clean and comfortable.  I will definitely recommend this place to anyone planning for a visit in Barcelona.

I visited Barcelona with a friend and we stayed at Julian's place.
Pictures are accurate as well as the description on Julian's Profile.
Julian sent me an e-mail as soon as the booking has been confirmed, with great information and directions. I took this as a learning experience to improve when I host people too!
The apartment is located in a nice area, it seems to be a family building for which you need to be quiet when you get in. You will definitely feel safe here.
Flat, Room, Shared Bathroom, Towels and kitchen are really clean! 
Julian took some time to explain how everything works and gave us good directions with his map.
I would definitely recommend this place mainly to people who want to enjoy a quiet time in the flat. House rules are really clear and direct, so if you are planning to go to Barcelona mainly for fun and noise, this might not be the place for you.
(Please don't take this comment as negative, I think it could be useful both for the Guest and Host to make sure they are good match!).
Overall experience was good!

Julian was an amazing host, with an amazing home! It was super clean, quiet, and a perfect place to rest while visiting Barcelona. In a lovely neighborhood central to everything, highly recommended and would definitely stay there again!

Julian's place was extremely clean, comfortable and quiet.  Would not recommend it for someone looking to party.  In addition Julian was a most gracious host, proving many helpful suggestions on places to visit on our short stay and how to get around Bacelona.  There are not enough words to express our highest recommendations.
Julian was a great host. His place was clean, quiet and in a good part of the city to make getting around easy.

Julian is a very nice guy - we had such a pleasant stay at his pretty appartement! The room and the 2 beds were superclean, cosy and comfortable - we slept very well there :-) Always again - thank you, Julian!

Julian fue muy amable con nosotras, hemos tenido charlas muy agradables y nos recomendo varios lugares donde recorrer, y como movernos dentro de Barcelona , el lugar tal cual las fotos, muy ordenado y limpio, la cama muy comoda, EL barrio es muy tranquilo y desde alli puedes recorrer todo Barcelona por medio de los metros
Lovely,  nice,  quiet room with comfortable twin beds.  Julian is very nice, gives us a lot of tips in Barcelona.  It was such a wonderful trip.  Thanks Julian!

My daughter and I had a pleasant stay in this clean, comfortable room.  Julian, our host was friendly both meeting us upon arrival and at departure.  He also provided useful maps and specific directions to find his place.  His place is nice and clean in a safe, quiet neighborhood.  

Jeanne Lopez-Valadez

Julián was a great host!

Firstly, prior to my arrival, he forwarded vital information about Barcelona especially directions to his place.

Common area of the house and room were kept clean and it is also expected that his guests would also maintain its cleanliness, which is good both ways in my opinion. I felt safe walking around the neighborhood, which is less touristy and maintains a local charm, but still strategically located close enough to the main attractions! Perfect!

Thank you for the good times!
