Julian was a fantastic host! He was understanding of our changed arrival time and very helpful with directions! The entire flat is kept very clean and organized. The wifi was perfect - no problems and fast! Flat is centrally located and in a nice neighborhood - less touristy so nice change of pace upon returning from a busy day of site seeing! Would definitely stay here again when returning to Barcelona! Highly recommended!

Julian is a very accommodating host!

When we arrived he welcomed us and gave us so much great info about the city and how to get around!  His apartment is in a really nice location and was really easy to get to and from each day using the buses and metro. The apartment is very clean, organized and very quiet. It was definitely a nice place to come back to after a long day of sightseeing!

Julian is a very nice host, He told us loads of information which were very useful. The apartment is quite and only 10 minutes to walk to Sagrada Familia. His home is very clean and comfortable. I have a very highly recommend to all of you. Thank you again Julian.

The apartment is just as the pictures show. We really enjoyed our time in Barcelona! Such a fun city! Being so close to Sagrada Familia is really nice. It was very easy to get to other areas of the city. 

Julian is a great host. He gave us a map when we first got to his apartment and pointed out all the hot spots to see. He was very easy to live with and made sure we had everything we needed!

It was really a horrible vacation at Julián's apartment. First of all he did not welcome me and my girlfriend friendly. The first thing that he told us were some house rules written down on a paper. He told us not to take too long showers maximum of 10 minutes before anything else. At this point we thought that he is a little bit fuddy-duddy but it became worse. In the first night we came home at 1 AM and 7 AM very quiet to change our clothes at our room for 10 minutes and left the apartment again. In this morning we had a message written on a piece of paper glued at the door: ''I need to talk to you 8 AM''. I felt like I would be Juliàns' little child who has to be there at 8 AM. Of course we did not meet him at 8 AM but at about 10 AM we went back to his apartment and he catched us infront of the room. He told us that this is maybe not the right apartment for us and that we should think about changing our apartment. It would not be usual that the people come in and go out in the middle of the night. I said that I am sorry but I did not know that we are not allowed to come and go quietly when we want to. I told him that I will change the apartment when he gives me back the money for the next nights, but he refused that option. Thus, we did not leave but just tried to come to his apartment for sleeping. He has not a respectful behavior and his flat is not very clean. The neighbourhood is friendly and nice and the location is central. I would not recommend this apartment and this host.

He is really a nice to get in touch with. This time I went to barcelona without any preparation, only with aid of information from Julian.  It is really helpful for us to find all the famous spots in barcelona as well as the delicious food and wine there.  I have highly recommendation for Julian.

thank you for you receptions.
Hen-Wei
Julian was very informative, polite and specific. Quiet building very accessible to main attractions and public transportation.

Julian has been a very great host (more available in explanations and precious informations for visiting city).
His home was clean, good located and very cute.

I advise all to go to Julian for a trip on Barcelona.

Julian's home is located quite centrally, within 5 minute walking distant to a metro stop. Julian was a very humble and kind host, he made us giggle with some of his explanations and didn't hesitate to give us advice and directions, he was even kind enough to organise a taxi for us upon checking out. Julian's home has a lot of natural lighting, with a nice breeze that constantly flows through, thanks for such an enjoyable stay Julian!

The listing showed exactly what you got. The location couldn't be better and Julian was extremely helpful in helping us use the metros and trains. We felt safe and at home! We will definitely be back!!

Julian was a wonderful host! Room is very nice, exactly like on pictures. Apartment is well placed! Julian was very helpful and polite.Nice experience on airbnb. I recommend this place to stay in Barcelona!!

Julian welcomes you right from the start! He'll email you with info about transportation and helpful tips on Barcelona. 

Things didn't get off to a good start (my fault) since I couldn't decide if I wanted to see the city first or drop off my bag at Julian's place. I know that if I checked-in first I might be tempted to take a nap and miss a day of sight seeing. I stored my bag with Locker Barcelona and went exploring. 

I love the natural light in Julian's apt. I saw the Sagrada Familia during the day and the way it was lit up at night. I had a comfortable stay at Julian's.

My friend and I stayed at Julian's for three nights and had a very comfortable and pleasant stay. We arrived relatively late in the evening, which was no problem and could find the house easily with the by Julian provided route description. The room was exactly as the picture, nice and clean. We could use all the facilities like the kitchen and wifi, and Julian had even arranged a map and tourist guide of Barcelona for us.
So we would definitely recommend this place!
Julian's appartment is really clean and nice, exactly as the picture. His appartment is well located and julian help us with all our question. I recommend !!
Tivemos um ótimo tempo em Barcelona e Julian nos ajudou muito.

Todo correcto y como indicado en internet.
Barrio tranquilo y piso situado a pocos pasos de la Sagrada Familia.
Muy aconsejable para visitar la bella ciudad de Barcelona.

Julian was an excellent host.  He provided me with a map and guide book, in English, on arrival.  Which was fantastic because I arrived late evening and was unprepared.  The House was clean and tidy and the neighbourhood safe and friendly; as well as just a hop, skip and jump from the Sagreda and the Metro.

The location of Julian's apartment is really good,not far away from La sagrada Familia,walk down for few mins. The metro station is also quite close,easy to go to the beach and most visit points. We enjoyed Bacelona a lot!
Julian is a very helpful host,told us exact way to go to his place from airport or train station and organized everything we need...

1. Расположение. От метро идти минут 10, не меньше, и постоянно в горку. Если много вещей и чемоданы тяжелые, не очень комфортно. 
2. Квартира. В квартире сдаются 2 комнаты - эта и еще одна на одного гостя. Обстановка очень скромная, ремонта давно не было, но все очень чисто, хорошо прибрано. Нюанс - ночью слышно соседей, так как конструкция дома такова, что внутри дома - полое пространство, куда выходят вентиляционные окна из кухни. Через них слышно все. 
3. Комната. Очень маленькая. на фото выглядит как-то просторнее. Нюанс: в комнате есть окно, которое выходит на террасу. Находясь на террасе хозяин/другие постояльцы видят все, что происходит в комнате. Чтобы чувствовать себя в полной безопасности, окно необходимо закрывать. Если закрывать ночью - очень душно. 
4. Хозяин. Это самая большая проблема этой квартиры. Неприветливый, угрюмый ботаник и педант. Такое впечатление, что он просто ненавидит людей. Стращал нас правилами: мыться быстро и бесшумно, за собой все убирайте, чтобы все выглядело так, как будто вас здесь не было, не шумите, иначе с соседями будет проблема, в гости никого не водите, громко не разговаривайте, музыку не включайте. Не нравится - я могу аннулировать бронирование. И что вы улыбаетесь - я говорю что-то смешное?
Сам за все то время, что мы его видели, не улыбнулся ни разу. После многочисленных отличных отзывов о нем, было очень странно встретиться с таким человеком. В общем, мы подумали, что он вообще серийный маньяк-убийца. В другой комнате жила девочка из Канады, она была такого же мнения о хозяине - Хулиане.
Останавливались всего на 2 ночи, пережили. Но старались в квартире вообще не появляться, душ принимать по-минимуму, разговаривали шепотом и ходили на цыпочках. На мой взгляд, не лучший вариант в Барселоне, таком солнечном и позитивном городе.
The room was exactly as described. Julian is a very pleasant and quiet host. The apartment is clean and comfortable. The room is great for quiet and respectful guests.
very nice

Julian is a wonderful host, very caring, helpful and reliable, he likes to follow rules and respect for others he made my sister and I feel right at home. I it was our first time in Barcelona, we didn't know what to expect, somewhat intimidating,  but Julian went out of his way and   he took his time to give us instructions on how to get places either by walking or taking the metro or the bus and gave us tip on what to do and what not to do.  
  His place is equipped with everything we needed to have a comfortable visit, from having our coffee in the morning watching the news and checking the internet  to prepare for our next outing, to come home late at night  to make a snack to go to bed or to go out again.
 His place is located in a very centric area, we din't mind walking at all, so while we stayed at his place we walked to  all the tourist attractions that are nearby, La Sagrada Familia, Park Guell, etc. we even walked to Barceloneta, it was a nice "paseo".   Definitely I would go back to Julian's

La descrizione dell'annuncio è perfetta, a me la stanza è piaciuta, è piccolina ma molto accogliente. La casa è pulita tranquilla silenziosa, Julian è una persona chiara e gentile, vuole che la gente rispetti la casa. A lui piace Bcn, la conosce bene e te la spiega con piacere. Il posto è vicino la sagrada famiglia e al quartiere di Gracia (tenete in consideraizone che Bcn è grande, ci sono diversi quartieri, pensate a Roma...Gracia sarebbe il Pigneto o San Lorenzo)... Se volete un posto tranquillo venite da Julian, se volete discoteca casino sbronze yeah allora magari vi conviene andare vicino las ramblas.

When I arrived at Julian's home, he was waiting for me outside.  What is significant about this gesture is that Julian was incredibly conscientious about being a great host!  He provided with with a lot of information about Barcelona in general and the area where he lives specifically.  Since he knew I spoke English, he provided me with an English guide book.  The description of the room and area was very accurate.  The neighbourhood is great to discover.  Transportation was perfect - both to get around the city and then to the airport - there were many options.

My daughter (19) and i had a very nice time at Julian's place. The apartment and room are quiet and clean.  Its near La Sagragda Familia. Julian is very helpfull and friendly.  When in Barcelona, we hop te get back and stay at Julian's place. adio Marijke
방은 괜찮았다. 그리고 깨끗했다. 집도 전체적으로 깨끗해서 좋았다. julian은 매우 깔끔한 사람이었다. 방이 조금 좁았지만 잠만 자는 숙소로는 불편함이 없었다.
Bonjour, le séjour chez Julian s'est très bien passé, appartement très propre, très bien située, Julian es très gentil. Merci beaucoup pour ton acueil Julian, @ la prochaine.

Mi estancia con Julián fue fantástica. La casa es muy acogedora, está muy limpia y recogida, y la situación es formidable. Recomiendo a Julián a cualquiera que quiera sentirse como en casa... Además es muy atento con los huéspedes, y sabe un montón de cosas sobre la ciudad. Un placer haber estado con él.

I stayed at Julian's place for 6 nights.  I arrived from Bangkok feeling really sick and basically stayed in my room about 22 hours a day hoping to be feeling better the whole time.  I only left the my room to buy food, go to the bathroom, or grab food from the refrigerator.  So, I was not one of Julian's typical guests.  Julian was a very good host suggesting and offering foods that he thought might make me feel better.  Thanks, Julian for your concern.

The apartment  was super clean and well maintained.  Julian obviously spent a lot of time fixing it up.

The listing description of the apartment and room was accurate. But there was an irreconcilable problem: Julian is not a very good or kind host. He was anal about being quiet, and once he came to my room at 3 am because I accidentally dropped my water bottle. He didn't respect me, my brother, or my girlfriend, saying it was "weird" that one night one stayed with me and the next the other did instead. On a different occasion, after going out for dinner and drinks with my girlfriend on her last night in Barcelona (I live in Zaragoza though she lives in the US) we came back around 1 or 2 am, which angered Julian who later accused us of being obnoxious people who just want to party even though we came in quietly, respectfully, and didn't wake the other floor mate up (we got along very well with the other airbnb guest). He said he didn't want to host visitors who wanted to enjoy the nightlife, as if it was abnormal.

Essentially, his house rules sound reasonable, but the way he enforces them prove to be absurd. He at least refunded the remainder of our trip when we decided to go elsewhere where we could feel comfortable and relaxed. You, too, can find a better deal in Barcelona; In my time using airbnb, Julian stands out as an exceptionally poor host, which is confirmed by other critical reviews.

Julians home in Barcelóna is an excellent choice..Its neat and very cozy..and just 5 blocks Walk from Sagradafamilia..You have métro as well as bus connections that can take you everywhere..the neighborhood is v nice and Quiet..Park Guell is Also a 20 min Walk..Julian is a very Nice and kind person..he gave me lot of good recomendations. I extended my stay at his place as i really liked it a lot :)

My friend and I enjoyed our stay at Julian's place. Situated close to Sagrada Familia, the place is close to public transport and it was great to see the magnificent building every morning. The room was cosy and clean. It was kept pretty warm at night which I appreciated a lot. The kitchen and the bathroom were always kept clean, too. Our host Julian was friendly and helpful, giving us information about the city and its history and how to use the local transport. The local restaurant he recommended was really great, too. Thank you, Julian!
Julian had a very clean room and apartment located in a great neighborhood for exploring Barcelona. Perfect for those who are looking for a calm, lowkey stay
방이 깔끔했고, 물 한병과 과자도 방에 배치되어 있었습니다. 늦은 시간에 체크인을 했는데, 집 앞에서 마중도 나왔구요. 숙소 위치도 산츠역 근처라서 좋았습니다.
Julian was very hospitable and very helpful in letting us know where sights were and how to get to them easily. Very quiet neighborhood and conveniently located.
If it were a lenient of deadlines, it would be nice but overall nice experience. Host let us stay over the listed check out time.

빠른 메시지 답장으로 집을 찾아갈때에도 큰 어려움이 없었습니다.
집성가족성당과 매우 가까운 위치에 있어 바르셀로나를 구경하시기에 위치상 적절합니다. 

밤 늦은 시간에 체크인을 하였음에도 친절하게 맞이해주고 숙소에 대해 하나씩 설명해주는 등 매우 고마웠습니다.

집주인인 줄리안은 매우 깨끗하고 규칙적인 사람이라서 전체적으로 집이 깨끗하고 편안하였습니다 :)
Very quiet and safe neighborhood,The room was clean and tidy, very warm, and affordable; the owner of the house is very nice, patient and give us a lot help
아랫층으로 마중나와주긴 했으나 친절하진 않았다. 무덤덤하고 깐깐했다.

Très bon accueil. Julián nous fait un petit tour de l'appart, nous expliquant tout ce qu'il faut savoir dans la cuisine, la douche, la chambre et les règles de vie. Dans notre chambre quelques chocolats et de l'eau ainsi des cartes, un guide de la ville en français et une fiche récapitulative des règles de vie, des infos à savoir (adresse, tel, wifi...)et des choses à faire dans le quartier.

De plus l'appartement est agréable, et nous avons aussi fait connaissance d'une autre voyageur australienne.
Merci pour cet agréable séjour Julián
La descripción del anuncio corresponde totalmente: un ambiente muy tranquilo, una casa muy limpia y ordenada y un barrio muy agradable.

I stayed in both rooms. Made a mistake by breaking the house rules on night #1 by using the kitchen. The rooms are nice, clean,  warmand quiet. The beds are quite comfortable. There's a guidebook in the room and Julian will also explain if you have questions about transportation etc. Overall if you don't have a jetlag after 19 hours of flight and you can get up and leave the room immediately in the morning this is the room for you. If you need some extended rest after flights this might not be the room for you as the host is not comfortable with guest resting too long.

The switch from the first room to second room is also quick as when I switched rooms, the bigger room is available and cleaned.
Julian is very nice and quite guy. If you want to spend your time exploring BCN and just have a good place to sleep, I recommend this room.

Julian was a helpful and friendly host who gave us a lot of information and advice and even lent us a guide book while we were there. The room was good and clean and the beds were comfortable. We were provided with everything we needed including clean towels. The location was great too: close to two metro stops and Sagrada Familia. Nice little touches too - a large bottle of water and two chocolates left for us. Great host, location, room and price.

Siamo state 4 giorni ospiti da Julian io e mia figlia casa carina e pulita. Julian molto discreto, quasi invisibile ma sempre pronto a dare informazioni minuziose su cosa visitare come muoversi e dove mangiare ....una ottima guida di Barcellona !!!! Grazie ancora!!!!

Como pienso que de todo se aprende y con la intención de ayudar, tanto a otros viajeros como a Julian, teniendo en cuenta que   esta era la segunda vez que utilizaba airbnb, sólo lo había utilizado en una ocasión con muy buena experiencia. Para mí esta experiencia ha tenido con ver con ciertos aprendizajes lo cual agradezco, entre ellos: que es importante elegir bien,  un lugar que sea adecuado a uno mismo, y tener en cuenta todos los factores, también leer las opiniones, no sólo las recientes, yo en esta ocasión no invertí mucho tiempo en la elección y  me decanté casi exclusivamente por la zona (cercana a un curso que iba a realizar en este viaje) y el precio, si es para eso, el precio es adecuado y la zona está bien comunicada. Gracias
Great neighborhood right by metro-stop.  Julian was a great host who informed us about the city. Very respectful and nice
Our host was very good, he gave us directions and tips to travel through Barcelona.  It is in a very good location and is very to navigate around.
Barrio bien, la casa como en la foto.

The house is really tidy and neat. And the location is good for visiting Sagrada Familia! The neighborhood is safe and has a lot of street lights. If you are a night activity lover, you should think twice about it, because it's not appropriate for taking shower after 23:30. In the conclusion, I still think the apartment is good for travelling.

Julián was a very nice and friendly host. He gave very precise instructions to support the house rules, so it was easy to follow them. He was also helpfull when we had something to ask about Barcelona's transportation or sights. The room was great and very quiet, so it was a good place to rest during a city vacation.

Julián is a nice, and helpful host. We had got useful information.
The room was exactly as it is shown on the pictures. 
Great localization, niear Sagrada Familia.

The room is clean and tidy. It's easy to visit the Sagrada Família, Gràcia and Parc Güell. Julian is nice, and always there for helping us. But I feel like he's a little stern, and not talk to much. And there are many rules to obey...“Be fast and clean”x3.(^^;;

Julián is a nice, somewhat reserved and quiet guy. He's very punctual and tidy. Next to having a map and a Lonely Planet booklet of Barcelona, Julián has lots of tips on what to see and do. 

The communication went smoothly and the appartment is located at a superb spot, on walking distance from the Sagrada Familia and (if you like walking) from he city centre.
tres bon accueil hôte disponible quartier très agréable

Julian was a great host.  He was very helpful and gave us information about getting around the city.  His place was perfect for our stay in Barcelona.  It was very comfortable and is really close to the Sagrada Familia Metro stop which was very convenient.  I definitely recommend this place.

We had an amazing time in Barcelona thanks to Julian. He was  very kind and thoughtful host. Always replied to messages super fast, useful directions and tips. The place was very clean and tidy. Recommended!
Apartamento limpio, muy seguro  y centrico. Acceso facil a Sagrada Familia .

Julián ha sido muy etento y comunicativo, nos facilitó información para recorrer Barcelona, el departamento está en una excelente ubicación y es muy cómodo, la habitación es la que se muestra en la foto y nos sentimos muy a gusto allí.
The room was clean, easy to find, and the bathroom was great. Julian was a great host!

I was there last week for one night. Julian was very accomodating and helpful. I had to travel last minute with my toddler and he was kind enough to accomodate us although the room is really meant for only a single person or a couple. He had everything organized properly with clear directions to get to his place and his house was clean and orderly. He also gave directions for sightseing. I would highly recommend any  one visiting Barcelona to stay at his place. For the price he put, it is practically a steal. Thank you  Julian.

we hadden een heerlijke kamer bij Julian. bij aankomst stond er een fles met koud water voor ons klaar, en ook de kamer was heerlijk koel door de ventilator (buiten 30C!). Bedden en kussens zijn erg goed. Appartement is erg schoon, en heerlijk stil!
Julian is een aardige gastheer, en heel behulpzaam. We hopen nog eens te komen! Julian, bedankt voor je gastvrijheid.
I like to stay in this flat.

Julian is a very nice guy. He is careful ,considerate and patience. He told us the routes ,the decilious restaurants and gave us many helpful suggestions .Our flight is very early, he even help us to book the taxi. The location of his house is good and the room is neat,clean and comfortable.  I think he is amazing host. Love him so much.

The room is as described, the place is quiet and clean. Location is quite near by the "sagrada familia". This journey has been good, but i felt a bit disappointed by the welcome of Julian. You might have been disturbed by people behaviors by the past and you looked like a little stressed for everything and you gave us your stress. I would like to have known what was your Barcelona, if you had some suggestions, but everything was a question of be careful, do that, not that...You asked us to leave the flat at 10am on Sunday to have enough time to clean for the next, very kind of you...This could have been an opportunity to know each other better...

The Julian appartment is a nice place nearly the Sagrada familial. The twin room is very clean and confortable. I recommandate it because it is very cheap and nice. .. Julian seems to be sympathical and like the quiet in his appartment. Good address !!!
Julian was an amazing host! Laid everything out very simply and was very helpful and accommodating.

It was lovely to stay with Julian. We had everything we needed and more. Julian had cold water for us when we arrived and gave us loads of good info and loaned us a lonely planet! The house was very clean, quiet and in a great location. Julian's very thorough directions made it very easy to find. Thank you Julian! :)
We stopped in to this apartment for only one night. It was all we needed. Julian was very respectful and to the point with his rules. Located in a good area. Extremely quiet apartment.
The room was very clean and quiet. If you search for something easy and laid-back this is properly not your first choice.

Julian was a fantastic and very knowledgeable and helpful host. We had an awesome time at his apartment and it's location is perfect. We decided to walk everywhere and didn't even use all the rides on our 10 ride metro card. 

Highly recommended!

The accomodation was clean and quiet. Recommendable when you're looking for a centrally-located place to sleep at. 
Quiet a lot of flat-rules so the trip should be about the city.

Tuve una buena experiencia en el lugar de Julián, el ya tiene todo preparado para cualquier visitante. De aquí esta muy fácil tomar el metro a otras partes, y tan cercano a Sagrada familia. Hay supermercados cerca por si necesitas comprar cosas básicas.

we are a quiet couple therefore we chose Julian house. He help you if to wish any advice about barcelona and your house is clean ( this is mandatory because he charge cleaning fee ). I wasn't free at ease there because Julian imposes much rules in your house when we got there he spent almost 20 minutes explaining mostly obvious things . It seemed that I asked a favor to stay there but I had paid. I wouldn't back there.

every thing is totally the same as description. Julian is very patient and helpful. the room is very quite at night for a sound sleep. the location is near the sagrada familia and park guell. highly recommended for those who wants to sleep well at night. there is a dream catcher outside the room, jajaja...I like it a lot.
Easy accommodation… We really enjoyed our stay here. It was exactly as described. Great location, everything clean, informative host. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to friends!

사그라다파밀리아와는우주만큼멀고오르막길을걸어야하는것으로간절히바라면날씨가덜덥겠지만바르셀로나의성수기는35도이상인것으로방에는공기가통하지않고선풍기하나만덜더덜러털덜돌아가며주인은매우예민하여다른방사람이통역을요청하는데본인을욕하는줄아는미운마흔두쨜.집밖으로나가지않는현직선생의학생들을별로좋아하지않고방에서쉬고있는데왜여기왔냐고시비를터는개복치만큼예민한사람이므로숨이턱턱막혀변비가생기고돈더주고더좋은데가는것이좋습니다

Juliàn est très accueillant, et il s'est montré très disponible, alors que je n'avais réservé qu'une nuit. La chambre est conforme au photo, et l'appartement est bien placé près de la Sagrada Família, les règles de la maison sont assez précises, mais au service du confort des voyageurs.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli, le quartier est calme, proche de la Sagrada Familia (ce qui nous a beaucoup aidé pour se repèrer !!=) )
l'appartement est agréable et bien pensé.
Pour un séjour entre amies, le rapport qualité/prix est très raisonnable. On le recommande!
성가족 성당에서 가까워서 좋았다. 주변에 가까이 마트도 있고 버스나 지하철을 타고 이동할 위치도 좋아서 다른 관광지를 보기에도 편했다. 집은 조용하고 엘리베이터도 있어서 짐들고 가기에도 편했다. 호스트는 설명을 상세하게 잘해준다. 이 집을 추천한다. Thank you!

La casa di Julian è molto pulita e ordinata. Quando siamo arrivate in un pomeriggio caldo ci ha accolte con una bottiglia di acqua fredda. Durante la prima notte nella casa, la mia amica ha avuto un forte mal di denti e dato che non sapevamo cosa fare, abbiamo svegliato Julian alle 4 del mattino. Ci ha chiamato un taxi e siamo andate in una farmacia aperta per prendere gli antidolorifici. Grazie Julian per il tuo aiuto in un momento difficile per noi!

Nous avons été très bien reçues par Julian. Les règles de vie sont carrées et claires et la chambre est exactement comme sur la photos et sur l'annonce. L'appartement est très propre et calme. C'était la première fois que nous partions avec Airbnb et nous n'avons pas été déçues.Julian ne parle pas beaucoup mais en fait nous avons compris que c'est par respect pour ses hôtes, pour ne pas déranger. Il est extrêmement discret.Lorsque nous avons commencé à discuter il s'est montré très ouvert et bavard.
Merci Julian pour ton accueil!
Julian was great at giving us information about the various attractions that we should see.  Room was comfortable and our stay was nice.  Thanks Julian!

Una muy buena opción para visitar Barcelona a un precio muy interesante. Habitación sencilla con un muy buen anfitrión y muy bien comunicada, a un tiro de piedra de las zonas más turísticas.
Un placer y hasta la próxima.

Un apartamento recomendado para aquellas personas que quieran estar en un sitio tranquilo de Barcelona a un precio razonable.. Las normas de convivencia y respeto Julian las explica muy bien para que no haya malos entendidos y la estancia sea de mutuo respeto, lo cual es de agradecer.. Se echa de menos un saloncito de estar... Pero todo esta limpio y aceptable...

먼저 저희는 비앤비 이용이 두번째임을 밝힙니다.
줄리안은 비앤비를 하기에 적합한 인물이 아니라고 생각합니다.
저희는 돈을 지불했지만 그만큼의 대우를 받지 못한다고 느꼈습니다.
줄리안은 굉장히 예민합니다.(처음 만났을 때 문을 소리가 나지 않도록 살살 닫으라고 몇번씩이나 반복해서 얘기하는 등)
저희는 소음에 예민하면서 본인 방문을 항상 열어놓는 것을 이해할 수 없었습니다.
또한 줄리안이 정해놓은 규칙은 여행객들이 지키기에 무리가 있습니다.(특히 23:30부터 7:30까지 샤워 불가능)
방도 정말 좁습니다.
저희같이 큰 캐리어를 가지고 다니는 사람들에게는 불편합니다.
캐리어 두개를 동시에 펼 수 없어서 번갈아 피면서 이용했습니다.
참고로 위치가 사그라다 파밀리아에서 4블록이지만 생각보다 가깝지는 않습니다.
또한 다른 나라 사람들은 모르겠지만 구글맵에 나와있는 주소를 입력하면 엉뚱한 곳이 나오니 주의하셔야 합니다.
욕실 바닥에 물이 튄 것에 대해서는 미안하게 생각하지만 그 외 규칙들은 지키기 위해 노력했다 생각합니다.
3박4일 동안 숙소가 전혀 편하지 않았습니다.
환불 규정이 까다로우니 신중하게 결정하시기를 바랍니다.

We had a great experience at Julián's apartment. We arrived in the city quite late, but he was around to let us in and get us situated. The room was as listed, with two comfortable double beds. Great location, with the Sagrada Familia a few blocks away and easy access to buses to take you elsewhere in the city (the walk is nice too).

Julian was a wonderful host, very respectful and helpful regarding directions and tips around the city. The apartment is greatly located, very clean and neat. The room is exactly as advertised, even though it did not have A/C, the room has great ventilation and its very fresh. 
The apartment itself is very small but perfect if you are planning to be out all day.
Julian is very strict regarding his rules so if you are not a considerate person, you should book somewhere else. He rents 2 rooms at the same time so the rules helps keep order around in a small space.
Overall we had a great stay in a wonderful neighborhood, the apt is very safe and peaceful! We would recommend this place!

그는 규정을 11시 30분에서 7시30분 아침 까지밀 사용해야 해서.시내 까탈루나에서 30분 거리는 거리에서 특히나 10시에 버스가 끊겨서 지하철로 이동하려면 시내에서 9시30분에 출발하여야 해서 블수쇼 야경등을 볼수가 없었습니다 ㆍ 음식도 간단 음 식이외에는 해먹을수 업습니다  거실도 밥 먹을때 이외에는 사용을 할수 없도록 햬요 그는 항상 문을 열고 있어서 소음에 예민하였고 감시받는 느낌이었습니다

The room looked even better than in the picture. Julian actually greeted us outside and helped me take my suitcase upstairs. He welcomed us with a cold bottle of water, gave us a thorough tour of his place and even gave us space in the refrigerator. He explained all the rules, which were also written on his page, and also gave us a printout of everything. We felt welcome and safe and comfortable with his rules. Thank you for the hospitality Julian!

Pase 3 días en barcelona con mi mamá, la casa de Julián es muy tranquilo, limpia y ordenada. Es igual a lo que está  en las fotos. Él es amigable y nos informo muy bien de lo que podíamos hacer en Barcelona

Hôte accueillant et disponible 
Appartement bien situé.
La chambre correspond en tous points à la photo
Salle de bain pratique et très propre
Nous avons passé un bon séjour chez Julian.
I felt very welcome.  The place was clean and as described.  would stay again.

The room was clean and as described.
And the host was very helpful for everything. Also the location was great for the travelers!!
Thanks Julian!

Hola,
Me encantó el lugar, es muy limpio y ordenado, muy bien ubicado y Julián es lindísimo.
!Vale mucho la pena!
Place is super close to sagrada familia! Room was tidy and clean and julián was a nice and helpful host! Thank you!!
Very conveniently located in Barcelona. Small room but ok just for sleeping. Julian very helpful.
Muy exigente el primer día con muchas reglas, pero después todo tranqui no existía

I had a great stay, it was a very good location on the apartment. The host provided guidebook, and information and tips if necessary. There was some house rules, will recommend read it before booking the place so you're aware of them.

El Piso esta en muy buena Zona y muy bien comunicado con autobuses frente a la puerta, el chico a sido muy amable y estaba esperándonos cuando llegamos al piso y nos tenía una botella de agua lista, el piso está impecable, es excelente para visitar Barcelona, si lo recomendaría

When we arrived the room was ready with adequate towels, drinking water and a map of Barcelona. The place is exactly how it is described in the listing. Julian was very present and responsive, he helped us to manage our stay, the apartment is very clean, all described stuff was there, the location is very amazing, we was near to everything, only a few blocks away from Sagrada Familia, all place to visit and all what we need, we cannot find better. Thank you Julian.

Julian gave a very good information prior to my visit about how to find the appartment.He welcommed us with further information about the stay and the facilities in the appartment. The house was quiet and the appartment was very clean. The 2 single beds were good.

Thank you.

Very close to sagrada familia.

Julián has been the perfect host for us. Upon arriving at his apartment, we found the room in perfect condition, more alike to a hotel than an "AirBnB". There was a guidebook to Barcelona, a Metro Map and a description of all the details laying ready for us. next Julián gave us a "tour de chambre" explaining in detail where we could put our toiletries in de bathroom and the likes.

All in all Julián really made us feel welcome and tried to create a bit of home aways from home.

Julian è molto disponibile, la casa molto pulita e ordinata!
La posizione molto strategica!

The apartment is walking distance to the metro and simple to locate. I received my own keys to my room and the apartment which were both clean and safe (I am a solo female traveler).  I only stayed for a night since my travel plans changed but Julian was very accommodating.  I would stay again.

This is my second time staying with Julian and it was just as pleasant as the first.  The room is private with a lock/key, the wifi worked perfectly (I used (Hidden by Airbnb) and (Hidden by Airbnb) messenger to call back to the states with perfect clarity every time), the building is in a safe neighborhood with controlled access, and I walked to the subway in five minutes.  The room is definitely worth the money and when I come back to Barcelona I hope to stay with Julian again.

Julián was there to welcome me when I arrived and gave me lots of information about the apartment and the local area. The apartment is in a great location, only a few minutes walk from many different attractions and the metro station. The room was very clean and comfortable. This is an ideal place to stay if you are visiting Barcelona for a few days and need comfort and quiet at the the end of a busy day of sightseeing.
Was very good

Julián fue un muy buen anfintrión, en todo momento se encontraba dispuesto a la atención del huésped, me indico claramente la manera de conocer Barcelona y sus hermosos lugares iconos del turismo de la península. La excelente ubicación del departamento cercana a la Sagrada Familía permitía una amplia comunicación a pié o por transporte público a toda la ciudad. Realmente recomendaría este departamento a cualquier viajero que visitara Barcelona.

Julian made us welcome, his flat was clean and tidy and he was willing to offer information we needed. It was well situated and quiet at night.  The room was comfortable. Unfortunately we had to wait over an hour for Julian to let us in, however it was Im sure beyond his control.
Recomiendo totalmente la casa de Julián. Pese a sólo estar una noche cabía destacar una cosa sobre el resto, la extrema limpieza de todo. No faltaba de nada y muy bien con el anfitrión.
Very good place to rest
Todo correcto, buena recepción.

In una parola.. ottima esperienza! Julian è un host molto gentile, ci ha spiegato con chiarezza le regole della casa, poche ma utili per una serena convivenza. Tutto come descritto nell'annuncio. La casa è comoda per visitare Barcellona  (città dalle mille meraviglie!), molto pulita e tranquilla! Julian è molto disponibile anche per informazioni pratiche (come viaggiare per il centro, cosa visitare, dove mangiare a prezzi modici). Perfetto per il week end.

I have stayed for two days. During staying there, i have to much stress by host. First, He always stay living room and monitor about my behavior. Even, when i take a shower he waiting for me at living room and he said that "your washing time is too much long" so i have shocked.. Second, He is unkind, too much chatt and not smile. He said that "It is my drinking water. So you have to buy water". Furthermore, check out time was noticed at noon but, he pushed me go away at 9:00AM(early morning). I didn't feel freedom. He was very strict. Finally, I had done laurndry and dryer for my clothes. But, i didn't pick one of my sock up. When i had breakfast, he throwed it to me. I think he was crazy gay. I feel really unpleasant. I loved barcelrona except host. I never recommend that someone stays his flat. He always talk to me that airbnb is not hotel. I didn't hope to stay like hotel but, l clearly paid. So i think that i have claim for own time and freedom.

Julián ha sido un excelente anfitrión. Nos ha sacado todas las dudas y nos ha explicado como llegar a todos los lugares de la forma más acertada. Su departamento es cómodo y sobre todo muy limpio. En cuanto a la ubicación es muy bueno, a pocas cuadras de la Sagrada Familia y el metro. Ha sido una placer hospedarme con Julián.

Julian's place is clean and organized. The double room is exactly as pictured. You will have room in fridge and some room in bathroom to store your stuff. The location is close to metro and grocery stores. It's a residential local neighborhood. It takes about 20 mins either by metro or walk to city center. During our stay, Julian was very respectful and he was very kind to wait until we arrived around 2am in the morning and helped me to carry luggage upstairs. Note, however, there's a €20 charge for late check-in. 

The house rule is reasonable. But I did feel stressful and a little uncomfortable using bathroom, kitchen and other common area because of the strict house rules.
La indicación fue correcta,  salvo un error en la direccion reportada. El lugar es aseado.
房东人很好｡非常贴心｡有什么问题都会帮忙解决｡
Julian's place is very good, closes to metro. The house is clean. He gave us all the info we needes. Thanks Julian!

Nice room and very close to the city centre!

Room is exactly as shown on the picture and everything is very clean

Julian was very enthusiastic about guiding my friend and I in our travels. He gave us quite a few good recommendations and oriented us around the city. The neighbour was good, apartment was centrally located, it was also  extremely near to the "must see" landmark of Barcelona.

The first word Julian said to me is that it is unnecessary to knock the bell twice.  We arrive at the apartment around 12 am due to our flight.( we have already talked about the check in time.) However, we are not allowed to take shower because he asked people not use the bathroom after 11:30 pm. Also, he asked not to wash clothes in the bathroom, which means you have to use the cleaner machine. However, it is not free. He asked to keep science in his apartment. Although ,we try our best, it seems he is still not unsatisfied.
Julian was really helpful and welcomed me and my mom nicely :) The room and everything else was very clean, the neighbourhood was quiet and safe. The place is really close to the city center!

Nice place just a few steps away from the Sagrada Familia.
Juliàn has been super available and everthing was super fine.
Thanks!

I stayed for three nights in this accommodation with my friend. It is very close to Sagrada Familia (max. 10 minutes walking from the metro exit "Sagrada Familia"). Before leaving, Julián gave me all information about how to reach the place... it was very easy to find it! (I've never been in Barcelona)

The bedroom is exactly the same as the photo. It is very clean and comfortable. Also, the bathroom is spacious and clean. 

Julián welcomed us giving some directions and information about the house (to be quiet, use of keys, recommendations for the bathroom in terms of time and cleaning, etc.) and the city (he gave us a lonely planet guide). He is polite and discreet person, and he doesn't talk a lot of with his guests.
Really great at communicating and an awesome location by Sagrada Familia.
Julian was very nice and helped us out with all of the logistical questions we had.  Thanks!

Julian's apartment is located at an extremely convenient neighborhood with walkable distance to few bus stops/metro stations. The room/house is equipped with everything you need and it is very comfortable. love the bed especially!  Julian is also very helpful with any information you need. 
P/s: it is only suitable for people who just need a place for quiet rest. if you are a loud person, this is not a place for you.
Normal

Mi amiga y yo la pasamos muy bien en Barcelona. Julián es una persona muy amable, la habitación es cómoda y el edificio se encuentra en pleno centro, por lo que además de estar cerca de Sagrada Familia, se tiene acceso rápido al transporte público (si no les gusta caminar, como a mi :)).

Julian was very kind and went above and beyond for me due to some personal trials out of my control where I had to change arrival time and number of nights. His place is an excellent location in Barcelona, 4 blocks from the Segrada Familia. it is clean with firm, comfy mattresses. bathroom share, but very clean and roomy.
overall good experience with Julian.. room is neat and clean...and accomodable.
El anuncio era correcto, el apartamento es cómodo y bien ubicado. Las reglas claras desde el inicio

Très bonne expérience avec Julian. L'appartement est très propre, très calme et conforme aux photos. 
la Sagrada famlia se trouve à quelques minutes de marche à pieds et le reste des points d'intérêt de la ville (centre ville, plage...) est accessible par un métro direct !
Le quartier est très safe et on y trouve toutes sortes de commerces ainsi que des restaurants. 
Julian est un hôte très discret et de bon conseil. 
Bref, je vous le recommande sans hésitation !
Buena zona, lugar agradable y muy limpio. Julián fue de mucha ayuda para aprovechar el tiempo.
Nice block street, reasonable price. Thanks Julian!

La ubicación perfecta cerca del metro y zona muy tranquila,Me sentí a gusto durante la estancia.Él departamento muy limpio y ordenado,Julian nos explico como movernos por Barcelona y nos facilito planos y puntos de interés turístico.Volvería a repetir.
Su amabilidad y servicio fue excelente. Excelente ubicación.

Julián es muy amable, nos facilitó una guía que nos ayudó muchísimo a movernos por Barcelona y nos dio un muy buen dato para cenar. La pieza y camas muy cómodas para 2 personas (a mi madre le encantó el olor de las toallas ;) ), buena ubicación y cerca del metro.
It's a good room, very clean and comfortable. Julian is ardent.
房子的基础设施都很不错,但是房东的要求比较多,感觉并不是很友好,有点压抑｡

La habitación de Julián es un excelente hospedaje a unos pasos de la Sagrada Familia y del Metro de Barcelona. Todo lo encontramos muy limpio y Julián fue muy atento con nosotros y nos dio información práctica para la ciudad. Posiblemente sin su ayuda no hubiéramos podido alcanzar nuestro vuelo a tiempo!
Julián was a great host. We enjoyed our time in his flat. I recommend to stay here.

The location and the house was amazing no doubt about it but non the less the host  was a little bit unpleasant. We always respected the house rules and he still had always something to critic and to say in a rude manner (maybe because of some not so nice expiriences in the passed but we do not have any fault in that). Just to give you an exemple, on the day that we had to do the check-out, not only us but order guests aswell, before noon, the host started to clean the bathroom at 10:30 +/- ... Not very logical in my opinion. When we asked him if we could take a quick  shower he started to rebullying something in Catalan (so we did not understand a thing) and we could tell he was upstet. In overall  conclusion, we understand that is not our house but we wanted to feel confortable at least. Even respecting all the house rules and being gone for the majority of the time still he had allways something to report. Although, the house is very clean and silent and the neighborhood is very calm and safe.

Como positivo, podria decir que la limpieza del lugar es impecable y que es completo en cuanto a instalaciones.
Como negativo, cabe resaltar la falta de hospitalidad del anfitrión. Esta persona controlaba todos nuestros movimientos, desde el tiempo que pasabamos en la cocina o baño, hasta las horas de entrada y salida del departamento. Controlaba incluso la cantidad de shampoo que usabamos, de verdad no te hace sentir comodo, ni ayuda a disfrutar la estancia en su casa.

I stayed four days in Barcelona, I was very welcome by Julian. The room is better in real than in the picture, there is a window in front of the blue wall. Everything was super clean, the location is perfect, 10 min walking from Sagrada Familia. Julian is very discreet, but if you ask, he gives good advices about the city. When I arrived, he explained all the rules in the flat, that are just common sense for peaceful cohabitation. Thank you Julian !
This place was very cozy and clean. Julian was a great host and let us store our bags at his place for an extra day! Would recommend staying with Julian.

Me encantó la ubicación, el metro es muy cercano y es muy fácil moverse en metro. la sagrada familia está solo a 4 bloques. la habitación es muy iluminada y limpia. Julián nos brindó un espacio para organizar nuestra cosas en la nevera y en el baño, lo cual fue fantástico.
La habitación de Julián es muy confortable y está muy bien comunicada. Un ambiente tranquilo y propicio para descansar de tus paseos y rutas por Barcelona

Julian was really nice to us. He explained everything when we arrived and gave us good advice and answered to all our questions. He is really discreet but evenings when we wanted to share with him our day he was always kindly listening to us. He is really reliable which we really appreciated.
Una habitación simple y práctica, con muy buen acceso al transporte público . Julián es serio pero siempre dispuesto a guiar en lo que necesité.
El apartamento es excelente, muy cómodo y muy bien ubicado, cerca a la estación de metro, lo que facilita moverse por Barcelona. La habitación muy bonita y cómoda y en general todo muy limpio.
Estuve cómodo en casa de Julian, el barrio muy tranquilo y agradable.

Julian's house instructions were very clear and we knew what we signed up for when we reserved his place.. he was very particular with noise, cleanliness and time in using the common areas, i found it a little uneasy but then again its for everyone's benefits. :-)

He suggested an amazing place to have local food (Tasca I Vins) very very good place! and we really appreciate his help with very useful info in getting to the airport very early in the morning, thanks Julian!

The room is tidy, and the bathroom is very clean too.. very well maintained :)

His house is a few blocks away from Sagrada Familia - nice walk, we found a nice bfast place just across the street too.. 

with all these, we highly reccommend his place!

THANK YOU JULIAN! :-)

Quartier calme et adéquat proche de toutes les commodités (boulangerie, bus, métro, supermarché, pharmacie, etc). le logement est propre et conforme aux photos. L'hôte était présent pour nous accueillir et tout au long du séjour.

Julian 是一个很直接很真诚的房东,在我们需要帮助的时候他花了很多时间帮助我们｡当然住在他家需要遵守他的规则,下次去巴塞罗那还会再住他家｡
He is so helpful but he got his rules.i enjoyed stay at his place.very clean and very easy to reach my favorite neighbourhood Gracia .thank you Julian .
Clean room, good location for Sagrada Familia.

Clean room and Julian's apartment was clean on a quiet neighbourhood. The room was enough for 2 people. If you have a lot of luggage such as more than 2 suitcases, the room might be a bit small for you. We are happy with our stay.

Julian is very kind and takes hosting seriously. The bathroom was very clean! The room was exactly as the picture, with good beds! Julian gave us some usefull tips about barcelona. We had a great stay at barcelona, partly thanks to julian!
J'avais réservé la chambre pour 2 nuits et j'ai dû annuler au dernier moment à cause d'un contre-temps. Julian a été très compréhensif et consensuel, c'est vraiment appréciable! =)

Ambienti puliti, non nuova, posizione a 10 minuti dalla prima metro.
La camera abbastanza piccola ed essenziale, comunque pulita.
La cucina attrezzata si può usare negli orari stabiliti come la doccia e il tavolo da pranzo; quindi organizzatevi per l'orario di rientro se no non potete farvi la doccia.
Le porte vanno accompagnate e non sbattute (anche se non è che siano proprio perfette..quindi a volte capiterà dato che non si aprono/chiudono perfettamente..).
Julian comunque vi spiegherà tutto nei minimi particolari, anche da che lato inserire la chiave (e anche a cosa serve il bidet...).
C'è la disponibilità di un ripiano del frigorifero e, per 4€, si può usare la lavatrice e asciugatrice
Ottimo l'uso della raccolta differenziata!!
Lui resta in casa ma è come se non ci fosse.
Anche se avevamo l'ansia a chiudere le porte, tutto sommato è stato un buon soggiorno.

Je conseille vivement ce logement à Barcelone.  A 10 mn à pied de la station de métro sagrada familia. Chambre agréable.  Lits confortables.  Propriétaire semble un peu froid à l'arrivée mais très correct. Il insiste sur l'importance des règles à respecter.

Es perfecto por su ubicación y por lo tranquila que es la zona y lo silencioso que es el piso. 
Limpio y muy agradable. 
Además Julián es un muy correcto y respetuoso. 
Totalmente recomendable!

Julian is a very organised host, and gave me excellent, detailed instructions on how to find his apartment. The room though compact, was comfortable, and impeccably clean. However when I felt unwell, and decided to stay home resting most of the day, Julian was obviously annoyed. He made it quite clear to me that his was not a place “for people to live”...he expected guests to be out sightseeing all day, only returning at night to sleep. So for the next two days he didn't speak to me just glared!
If you are only looking for inexpensive accommodation near (4 blocks uphill) Sagrada Familia, simply a place to sleep and shower, a room at Julian’s may suit you. But if you want to feel warmly welcomed into his home, get help with your stay in Barcelona, or interact with your host at all, definitely look elsewhere!!

Julian est un hôte prévenant. les lieux sont vraiment propres , la chambre comporte tout ce qui est nécessaire: le couchage est de bonne qualité, j'ai vraiment bien dormi. Julian a pris le temps de discuter un peu avec moi malgré mon espagnol très mauvais, ce fut un moment sympathique. ce logement est vraiment bien situé.
Julián es una persona encantadora; cuida el más mínimo detalle. Recomendable al 100%

Julian is a well organized host. The room was nice and clean, the bed was comfortable and the sun was shining. So appreciated to have a room with a window. The bathroom was clean and Julian also offered to use the kitchen. I can recommend his place.
Muy bien
Julián fue muy amable y en general la estancia fue muy satisfactoria. Lo descrito en el anuncio coincidía con la realidad y la ubicación es muy buena.
Todo correcto. Era una experiencia muy agradable.
Nice place
Logement propre et correspondant à la description à 8 min' du métro. Quartier calme et hôte correct.
步行离圣家堂十分钟左右 位置尚可 交通便利 房东要求有点多 不允许洗衣服(连小毛巾都不让洗)
Terrible. hypochondriac host who threaten us since we arrived. STRONGLY AVOID!!!! (Apartment is fair, but does not matter if want to have a good holiday)
10 minute a peine du metro . tout etait tres bien conformenent a l annonce je recommande

Great location, informative host, everything orderly and clean. It's a easy accommodation. Quiet place, although you are in the city you do not hear traffic noise. I have found myself very well. When I return to Barcelona I will surely visit Julian again and recommend it to my friends.

El piso es muy tranquilo y limpio y Julián es muy preciso con todas las informaciones

Cozy, quiet and clean place. You will get precise and timely info from Julián, who is willing to help you with everything you might need
Gracias por estos 3 dias

NO VAYAN. NO HAGAN RESERVA DIRECTA.
Es la peor experiencia que he tenido.
DO NOT GO THERE. DO NOT HIT THE DIRECT BOOKING KEY.
The worst experience ever. Itś a hoax . Julian should leave inmediatly Airbnb. Hostile, agressive, he is a CONTROL FREAK and he will blame on you whatever you claim. He only wants our money. I cannot believe he could possibly get a good review.

È la seconda volta che soggiorno presso Julián e come sempre mi sono trovato molto bene, lui è molto preciso e informa sull'uso dell'appartamento in modo corretto. Il luogo lo trovo molto comodo per girare per la città in quanto ben comunicato da bus e metro, inoltre si trova in un luogo con negozi e servizi vari. L'appartamento si trova in una zona residenziale ma è tranquillo perché si situa al riparo dei rumori del traffico. La prossima volta che torno a Barcellona torneró da Julián.
Nice quiet place in gracia nova.

Foi nossa primeira vez usando Airbnb e nós amamos! Julián foi super prestativo e sempre pronto pra ajudar, fez a diferença! Não teria sido a mesma coisa sem ele! A casa é muito limpa e organizada, a localização é ótima e perto de transporte publico (tanto metrô como ônibus). O bairro é super tranquilo e nos sentimos seguros lá. Nossa curta estadia em Barcelona tornou-se uma experiência muito agradável!
Great location and value for money. Julian provided details of public transport and other useful information. I would go back.
The room was clean and comfortable. Julian was a good host and provide helpful information.
Julian's place is quiet, well organized and clean. He was very diligent at check in. For me it turned out perfect because it was exactly was I was looking for.

Great place to stay. Within walking distance of the Sagrada Familia, metro station, and many bus stops. Also many affordable restaurants are nearby. My friend and I enjoyed our stay with Julián. He offered great advice for sightseeing and was always available for questions as he is often sitting at the table working. Julián reputation and high marks are well-deserved.
Buena ubicación para conocer lugares de interés y fácil para llegar al alojamiento.
Julian is a very helpful host, timely and clean. the apartment is in a very good area and has everything you need. I would recommend it!
The place was very good, close to public transit and very close to the Sagrada Familía. 2 comfortable beds and in a quieter neighbourhood so it is easy to get sleep.
Very clean and organised

Julian is a very oragnised person, so there are a set of rules you may have to follow. Overall, it is a very good stay at his place and you'll feel safe. Also, the room is exactly what we got in the picture.
Nice quiet place near the station.
Posizione comoda per visitare la città, vicino a due fermate della metro e a una degli autobus, proprio sotto casa. Buon rapporto qualità-prezzo, host gentile e discreto.
Bien placé et pourtant dans un quartier calme. Pas cher.
Julian ha sido genial.  He was very specific about his expectations of us as guests in his home, but he was also helpful with suggestions for sights to see and places to go.  Highly recommended.
Julian is a very nice host, he gave us very useful recommendations.
本当にいい家でした
Pretty clean and close to metro.
Very helpful with getting to the apartment and checking in.
The place is very central. Very close to sagrada familia and the metro.
Great place. As advertised
Barcelona is great.
Bien situado.
2nd time in this place and it's always nice and it's near the sagrada familia. Will come back again
Todo correcto. El alojamiento tal y como se describe en el anuncio. Limpio y concortable.
Good location and good communication.
la habitacion es miy comoda, se llega facil a la direccion y la sagrada familia esta a unas cuadras, recomendable

Very terrible experience and it let me feel in prison.The host is very unfriendly and fierce!! 
1.If you close the door a little loudly, he will shout and stare at you,even it's daytime. 
2.You will receive a long list about "his house" Rule.No wash anything, including little towel. No shower during 23:30-7:30.No use fridge if you just stay one night. No use the lift because it's for the upstairs neighbors even you are with luggages. 
3.I felt been watched every minute and been (Website hidden by Airbnb) I had to escaped the room avoid facing with him.
I had a comfortable stay at Julian's. The flat is very clean and quiet. As long as you read the rules and are looking for a calm place to stay, you'll have a pleasant time.

We had a pleasant time in Barcelona. Julián is an organized host, the room and facilities were adequate and our stay was calm and quiet. If you're looking for a peaceful accommodation in Barcelona, Julián is a good choice.

Logement et hôte vraiment très agréable. L'emplacement proche de la Sagrada est très pratique. Il y a des règles très claires chez Julian mais elles participent justement à la qualité de son logement : calme, très propre et très serein. De plus, Julian est très discret et agréable et fait tout pour que notre séjour nous soit très agréable (accueil avec bouteille d'eau, conseils pour les transports, etc.). Pour nous donc un accueil et un logement parfait, nous reviendrons avec plaisir ! Merci Julian :)

If you are looking for a reasonably central, quiet and cheap place to stay then go for it. But if you are looking for a relaxed, comfortable environment then we recommend looking elsewhere. Julièn is a strict host and you feel like a bit of an intruder staying at the apartment. We spent most of our stay walking on egg shells as he runs the flat with a rather draconian authority (you get the feeling he has had some poor experiences with guests in the past). The location is close to the metros and the flat is clean. But just be warned that the place feels much more than like a strict boarding school than a warm home from home.

Alles in dit kleine appartement is brandschoon. Het ligt prima ten opzichte van het openbaar vervoer en de Sagrada Familia. Ondanks dat er een ventilator aan stond was het warm in de slaapkamer maar dat vonden we geen probleem. Gastheer Julian doet alles volgens zijn regels. Dat maakt hem in zekere zin  betrouwbaar en voorspelbaar. 
Maar we hebben ons geen moment op ons gemak gevoeld. Hij was voortdurend geïrriteerd als we iets niet direct begrepen en bang dat er iets niet volgens zijn regels zou gaan. Dat gaf ons het gevoel dat we niet welkom waren, sterker nog, dat hij ons liever zag gaan dan komen.
Todo lo que se indica en el anuncio es lo q se ofrece, Julian es muy amable  y siempre estuvo atento a prestar  ayuda para guiarnos en la ciudad

Julián's place was great: very clean, quiet, and just as described. He was very helpful and communicative regarding check in and check out, also. His place is about a 10-minute walk from Sagrada Familia and a metro line that can connect you to most of the city. There's also a bus stop just outside that you can use as well. This is a  great place to stay to visit Barcelona, thank you Julián!
Muy bien, Julián siempre claro y atento.
Emplacement idéal
깔끔한 주인의 성격 덕분에 집 자체는 깔끔하고 좋았으나 너무 예민합니다. 각종 제약이 많아 조금 스트레스 받는 정도였습니다. 하지만 집 자체는 괜찮습니다. 시내 중심지까지는 걸어서 40분인데 다닐만합니다. 저는 3일 내내 걸어다녔어요

Julián's place was very clean and looked just like the pictures. The bathroom was spacious and the sheets on the bed were really soft! Close to the big cathedral in Barcelona but kinda far from everything else, but there was a metro station nearby that was a straight shot to the main area of Barcelona. Julián was strict with his rules but that is to be expected as it is his home. Would definitely stay her again!

Chambre propre et très bien entretenue.
Bon emplacement , proche de La Sagrada Familia , des moyens de transports et il y a de bon resto à proximité

El departamento de Julian está muy bien ubicado y es ideal para descansar después de un largo día . Pudimos disfrutar al máximo de la Sagrada Familia. Fue muy fácil llegar a él.  Todo está muy limpio y ordenado. Julian es amable y nos ha dado buenos consejos para disfrutar de Barcelona. ¡Sin duda volveremos!

Muy buen lugar.. limpio.. muy muy bien ubicado.. Julián es muy atento.. Te apoya mucho con indicaciones .. trayectos.. por favor.. lee bien las indicaciones para acceder al departamento.  En general es muy buen sitio.

Muy desagradable desde el primer momento...le pregunte por un parking que habia justo debajo y su respuesta fue:Que el no trabajaba ahi...
Cuando con un no tengo ni idea o no hace falta se puede aparacar en la calle que es gratis el fin de semana hubiera sido suficiente

El departamento es tal cual lo muestra la foto, la habitacion es luminosa y comoda... Muy buena ubicación para caminar y comunicarse con el metro... Julian es un poco serio y estricto, pero creo que por eso su departamento es tan prolijo!!!

Julian's place was really close to the metro and La Sagrada Familia (literally walking distance). The place was really comfortable and Julian really helped us by giving us suggestions while we were in Spain.

Julian took care of us with a very pleasant check-in. We appreciated his convenience for check-in time despite our arrival time changing. The fresh water, towels, plans and cleanliness were excellent. During one day it was pouring rain and we had left clothes outside to dry; despite us not being there he protected the clothes from being wet. Very kind of him. Julian's place was very clean and well located. (10 min walk from Sagrada- great bus route in front). We recommend Julian for travellers who intend to sightsee during the day with plans to be in bed arround 11 p.m. Because the neighbourhood is very quiet, travellers planning to go out late after midnight are not ideal. 

Julian is a very respectful and highly organized host. We thank him for his hospitality. * We are two young professionals from Canada and appreciated Julian's strong English.

Tres bon emplacement '
Julian est tres arrangeant, disponible et a pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y avait A voir sur Barcelone, comment s'y rendre...

Mijn vriendin en ik zijn hier 3 nachten verbleven. De kamer was hartstikke schoon, evenals de rest van het appartement. Julian was erg gastvrij en behulpzaam. Hij reageerde ook snel op onze berichten. Wat wij achteraf een klein nadeel hebben gevonden, is dat je na 23.30 niet kunt douchen. Daar hebben wij vaak wel rekening mee moeten houden. Verder hebben wij hier prima overnachtingen gehad!
Lovely place to stay, peaceful amd clear. Would recommend to anyone who is going to Barcelona for a quiet weekend or for sight seeing.
Within walking distance to Sagrada Familia, accessible by public transport.  Julian shared lots of sight seeing recommendations which helped to plan our trip.

El lugar muy limpio y céntrico. 
Julián fue muy directo con sus reglas y  nos hizo sentir como intrusas en su casa. No estábamos tan cómodas ya que el parecía estar incomodo con nosotras y como si nos hiciera un favor al dejarnos estar en su casa cuando nosotros estamos pagando por el servicio. Respetamos todas sus reglas y todo pero si eres más cálido en personalidad y al menos te gusta sentirte agusto definitivamente este no es el lugar donde debes quedarte.
Quiet room and perfect location. Great place to stay in Barcelona. Julian was a wonderful host. Thank you.

The house of Julian have a perfect location in the center of Barcelona, very clean, kosy and confortable.
I only stayed one nigth, but is good for more days.
In front of the house you need to just cross the road and there isa public bus station, where you can take a bus to explore the city.
The comunication with Julian was perfect since the fisrt moment and I have no doubt to recommend it to any guests
Everything was correct. It's a good place to rent in Barcelona.
如果住一两天,推荐,时间长了,怕你们受不了要求

My mom and I stayed in the 2 person room for 2 nights (there is another room for 1 person) while visiting Barcelona. Julian was cordial and pleasant host. He provided all the information we needed for a short visit. The location is great - close enough to the city center yet far enough from all the hustle and bustle. Please note there is no AC in the room, so for a hot August afternoon, it was quite hot although Julian did provide a floor fan (with one window out to the balcony there is no cross breeze in the room). The room's door is right in the kitchen/common area, so not as much privacy as I prefer, but overall not an issue since we were out a lot. We enjoyed our stay and I would recommend the place, especially if you are able to get a lower price (we booked it for a very busy weekend which is why I think the price was higher than it is otherwise).
Julian ist sachlich korrekt und sehr gut organisiert. Leider nicht sehr gesprächig-vielleicht auch nur ein schlechter Tag. Seine Wohnung ist klein u sehr hellhörig, aber insgesamt okay.

Julián's place was very clean and in a great location. He was communicative, gave us very good instructions on how to get there, what to do around Barcelona, and how to get to these locations. Julián was a great host and took the time to make us feel welcome.

Fint sted, forholdsvis centralt i Barcelona. Alt var fint, rent og værten var punktlig, men ikke særlig venlig. Udlejningen bliver kørt som en buisiness, så du skal ikke forvente hverken smil eller smalltalk. Hvis du er cool med det, så er det et helt fint sted at overnatte.
Amazing place and amazing host, Julian it is very helpful and a calm guy!

The room was very clean and accurately described. The apartment was in a great location in the middle of everything. No showers between 11:30-7:30am, the room can get warm at night, and you have to be really careful not to make noise when closing the doors and moving around. Great value and really clean - just not a very welcoming host.
El lugar es muy limpio, ordenado y bien ubicado. De fácil acceso con el servicio público. Lugar para gente tranquila
Very clean and well located
Toto ubytovanie odporucam pre tych, ktori vedia byt potichu, upratat po sebe a pridu sa na byt iba vyspat. Mne to nevadilo, pretoze s tym nemam problem, ale nie kazdy musi mat taketo ocakavania.
Quartier calme, chambre très propre et appartement agréable. Julian à des règles strict sur le règlement de l'appartement. Hôte très discret et peu communicatif.

Het verblijf bij Julián was prima. Top locatie, schoon en netjes. Precies zoals het er op de foto's uit ziet. Julián spreekt goed Engels en als je ergens naar vraagt neemt hij de tijd je uitleg te geven, fijn. Wat wel is: regels zijn regels. Zo was het fijn geweest om te kunnen douchen na half twaalf 's avonds en iets minder bang te hoeven zijn een deur iets te hard dicht te slaan. Al met al een aan te raden plek om een paar nachten te verblijven in Barcelona.

Nuestra estadia en casa de Julian fue sensacional, pues la localizacion es ideal para desplazarse por la ciudad, el espacio es realmente limpio y con lo necesario para disfrutar de la estadia. Recomiendo!

Although Julian is strict about a lot of things(simple but relevant) and it is his house anyway....I would say he is a GREAT GUY...He understands difficult situations and responds with his experience...we were  in Barcelona for 36 hrs only and we could manage to see a lot of places because of his advice and cooperation....This place is definitely NOT for late night parties...but STRONGLY RECOMMENDED FOR ANYONE WHO WANTS TO ACTUALLY VISIT BARCELONA....Especially Architects(his place is 5 min walk from Sagrada Familia!!!)
El lugar es tranquilo y cómodo, la zona es muy tranquila y bien ubicada. El anfitrión fue amable con nosotros.

Muy agradecida por la hospitalidad de Julián, facilitandonos recomendaciones sobre la ciudad y sitios de interés para visitar.
El apartamento está muy bien ubicado siendo muy fácil llegar a los sitios turisticos de Barcelona, Bus (enfrente) y Metro (4 calles). Sitio muy silencioso a la hora de descansar, el apartamento muy limpio.
Un lugar que recomiendo para estadía turística, que sin duda volveré a utilizar a la hora de visitar Barcelona, gracias Julián!!!!!
Lo único bueno es la ubicación. La habitación es cómoda y limpia; sin embargo tiene tantas restricciones que no se puede disfrutar nada. Julian es poco comprensivo, áspero en el trato y mal humorado.

Het appartement was netjes en Julian is erg precies qua communicatie en regels. Het appartement heeft 3 slaapkamers waarvan 1 voor Julian, het kan dus zijn dat de andere kamer ook bezet is vandaar waarschijnlijk de wat strikte regels  maar daar hebben we dan ook een goede en rustige nachtrust voor terug gekregen. Prima verblijf gehad.

Nous avons apprécié l'emplacement du logement et les indications très aidantes de Julian . La literie et la propreté sont impeccables , habitation très calme .Nous avons été très déçues du peu de communication avec Julian , aucun échange , nous étions de ce fait peu à l'aise dans le partage des parties communes ( cuisine et table pour le petit déjeuner ) .

Todo acordé al anuncio, muy bien Julián y el piso.

Gracias
Todo fue como lei en la descripción de la casa

El departamento de Julián está muy cerca de La Sagrada Familia y del metro. Te brinda una habitación limpia y baño limpio. Pero tiene sus reglas las cuales son muy estrictas y si quieres algo más tranquilo donde te quieras mover libremente, este no es el lugar. Nosotras sólo estábamos para dormir.

Great value for money - public transport right in front of the house, 10 minute walk from Sagrada Familia, very clean and quiet. The only thing we would appreciate would be an option to use the kitchen or at least the refrigerator.

Julian was helpful and approachable person but could have been more friendly and offered service with smile. Location was reasonably good but charges for the room including the cleaning were a bit too high. Overall its a good place if you just need a place to sleep mainly but not ideal if you consider the friendly atmosphere around you.

There are rules you have to follow at Julian´s but nothing he asks is out of the ordinary. His apartment is near Avinguda Gaudi for great cafes and restaurants and is very close to the Gracia district as well. You can´t find much better for the price and location.

Abbiamo soggiornato da Julián per 5 giorni e tutto è andato al meglio.
La stanza è piccola ma comunque ben organizzata, luminosa e molto pulita così come gli altri ambienti.

È adatto per chi vuole un posto in cui  dormire e riposarsi in tranquillità! Essendo in un condominio bisogna far attenzione a non far rumore in determinati orari.. giustamente!

Consigliato
Muy buena ubicación,trato muy respetuoso,higiene buenísima,para descansar en medio de la ciudad un lugar recomendado
bien situé, propre, parfait pour un city trip de quelques jours

Julián's place was a great "home base" to explore Barcelona. Very close to the Sagrada Familia church and excellent transportation to everywhere else in the city. His place is clean and quiet, and Julián was very kind giving me transportation tips to get around the city more quickly and inexpensively.
Julián is particular, but home is neat, clean, and as advertised on location

I highly recommend staying with Julian. His place is really nice and Julian gave me very detailed instructions on how to get to the apartment from the airport which helped me a lot. He also provided a guidebook for the city, so I really recommend Julian's place for anyone visiting Barcelona.

Estadia nao foi o que esperava. Anfitriao se irritava facil por qualquer razao, tentou despejarnos duas vezes no mesmo dia por razoes bobas (como por exemplo uma simples pergunta). Nao me senti a vontade em sua casa. Deixou bem claro que deveriamos sair todo o dia e retornar somente para dormir em sua residencia. Deixou bem claro que nao queria ver-nos durante o dia em sua casa. Se tivesse a oportunidade, nao escolheria novamente sua residencia para me hospedar.

Julian was great at communicating with us with regards to our stay at his apartment. He provided lots of help in terms of telling us about the attractions and activities you can do in Barcelona and gave us all the help we required. Julian is a great host and you will have a great stay in his rental.

建物は綺麗に使うことを求められましたが､逆に言えばとても清潔な環境で過ごすことができました｡
ｻｸﾞﾗﾀﾞﾌｧﾐﾘｱに徒歩圏内で､市内の観光に便利でした｡
彼が送ってくれた空港からの案内はとても分かりやすく､初めてでも迷わず着けました｡
総合的にいい環境でした
Todo estuvo muy bien, la ubicación es excelente!

Julián es muy buen anfitrión. Si querés un lugar limpio, ordenado y tranquilo es el un gran alojamiento. Si buscas otra cosa que no tenga que ver con algunos de los elementos anteriores, no es tu lugar.
I had a great stay at Julián’s place, the room was very clean and I loved the location. I would definitely recommend it to other solo travelers!

There are plenty of reviews that accurately note the safety and cleanliness and quiet of Julian's apartment. It's worth noting that the room is actually bigger than the picture makes it appear, which was a nice surprise. There are outlets in the room, a nice breezy window, and a standing closet with shelves. Julian is very helpful and kind and provided water and a snack when we arrived. The neighborhood is great, very close to the Sagrada and the beach is a short metro ride away. Do take his advice and buy a two day metro pass in advance!
very tidy room with a super good location. Good experience.

Der Übernachtung bei Julian hat uns gut gefallen. Die Lage ist gut und Man kann hier eine Menge Restaurants finden, welche kein Tourists-Traps sind. Parking in der Parkhaus nebenan ist sehr Teuer, aber um die ecke ist eine dass der 20€ weniger pro Nacht kostet.

Alles is heel netjes , regels zijn heel duidelijk.
Ideaal indien er alleen een slaapgelegenheid is gewenst
Je zit wel middenin de privacy van de gastheer
El lugar es cómo se señala en la descripción del anuncio, agradezco que nos permitiera llegar antes del horario establecido, Julian deja las reglas claras al ingreso

Muy lindo y cómodo lugar, 100% fiel a lo que ofrece en su publicación. Detalles para destacar: las almohadas super cómodas, acolchados y colchones muy buenos, la ducha y baño impecables, además había pequeños detalles de atención como botella de agua y chocolatitos de bienvenida. Muy cerca de metro y buses, además el barrio super tranquilo y seguro, regresábamos tarde y se podía estar tranquilos de noche. Gracias Julián.
An incredible location with a great value. However, do not stay here if you plant to be loud.

Place was exactly what we expected. Very clean and nice with a great location We didn't feel too welcomed by the host and there are a lot of rules to make sure you follow, but overall the place did the job for a one night stay in Barcelona. I would recommend this place if you're just looking for a place to sleep.
Es una persona reservada y muy respetuosa.

Julian was a great host, he provided very clear and helpful directions from the airport via metro, and the apartment was very clean and had everything I needed. A great place to spend a few days exploring Barcelona!
Ha sido una estancia muy tranquila. No hay ruido y, la limpieza es sobresaliente

Mala experiencia con el anfitrión, Julián es muy poco amigable y te hace sentirte incómodo en todo momento que te relacionas con el. Se le nota bastante que no le gusta ser Airbnb. No lo recomiendo y sólo destacó la limpieza de su departamento.

Julian was a great host! He greated us at the doors, offered to use the lift due to having luggage with us (the flat is only on the lower 1st floor though), so that already wowed me at the start :) He explained everything about using the flat and gave us advice about local area and public transport. We were given a big bottle of water and some sweets which was also a really lovely gesture ❤️ I must say I loved the smell of bedding - not sure what washing powder you are using but it stayed so fresh during our whole stay and it smelled amazing every time you entered the room. I definitely recommend Julian and if I’m back in Barcelona, I’d like to stay in his place again ☺️
Julian's place was just what I needed for my 3day stay in Barcelona. It is farely centric. He has very strict rules, but nothing that can't be followed. I would stay in his place again.
Very nice place. Excellent host
Julián was a great host and effective communicator. We really enjoyed our stay at his home. The location was very central to what we wanted to do and a great neighborhood.

My time using AirBNB so was a bit apprehensive. The host however contacted me shortly after booking and provided me with all the information I needed. I have to say I had a very pleasant stay. The price was good and the location was terrific. Recommended.
Julian es super respetuoso y correcto.Estaba todo impecable!Ademas nos ayudo con un tramite que teniamos que hacer.Lo recomiendo 100%

Nous sommes arrivées avec pratiquement 2h de retard vers 22h15 et malgré l heure tardive , Julian nous a bien accueillies , il a fait l effort de parler français ce que j ai beaucoup apprécié ; il nous a fait visiter l appartement ( qui correspond bien aux photos) rappelé le règlement intérieur , qui est rigoureux , mais permet le respect des uns et des autres ; les lits étaient faits , il y avait 2 serviettes par personne , et  une délicate attention : une grande bouteille d eau fraiche et une assiette de friandises . il y avait un plan et de la documentation pour les visites .l appartement est très propre et  est très bien situé , 10 minutes à pied de la Sagrada Familia  et de la ligne de métro . partant vers 9h du matin et rentrant vers 22h15 , nous avons très peu vu Julian. Merci àJulian , nous avons profite à fond de notre séjour à Barcelone , une ville qui nous a séduite .
chantal

Julián’s apartment is a cozy and stylish affair just a few blocks from the famous Sagrada Família basilica. You’ll find an exceptionally clean bathroom and comfortable sleeping areas. While there is not much private space, this will not be a concern because you will want to be out exploring Barcelona, and there is a ton to explore. Julián was considerate enough to provide us with a kitchen, but there are also abundant local restaurants of all sorts in his neighborhood, so you’ll never go hungry!
Buen lugar para hospedarte, ubicación buena, Comunicación rápida y eficiente con el.

Julian was not the most welcoming - he confirmed with me multiple times that this is not a party home, despite me saying I understood each time. However - it was a very clean and safe place to stay in a safe neighborhood!

I do not recommend booking with Julian for 1 day, forbids touse of a kettle, fridge and dishes. Well, you can use the toilet;) Julian likes to talk, let him talk and do not interrupt his speech. Rather, do not count on answering your questions. Contact with him is a painful experience

Nie polecam rezerwacji u Juliana na 1 dzien ,zabrania korzystania z czajnika,lodowki i naczyn.Dobrze ze mozna skorzystac z toalety ;) Julian lubi mówić,  dajcie mu sie wyslowic i nie przeszkadzajcie w wypowiedzi.Raczej nie liczcie ze odpowie nz Wasze pytania.Kontakt z nim to bolesne doznanie
Una casa agradable, limpia y cerca de la Sagrada Familia.
