Very nice apartment, a little bit small but perfect for 2-3 night! Very close to the sagrada familia and easy to travel by metro. We like our stay and Julian was very nice and useful!
Apartamento con muy buena ubicación. Julián es muy amable. Disfrutamos nuestra estadía allá.
Julian fue muy amable y atento con nosotras, su lugar es limpio y tiene buena ubicación. Gracias por las atenciones, recomendado 100%

Por empezar, el lado positivo el lugar es accesible desde la llegada en metro, 4 cuadras de sagrada familia pero bastante lejos de plaza Cataluña y paseo da gracia. Ofrece guías, mapas, 1 botella de agua fría al llegar, no hay horario para entrar ni salir del depto. Lado negativo, al llegar 20 minutos antes a dejar solo las maletas, Julian en ningún momentos nos preguntó cómo había sido nuestro viaje, como estábamos ni nada, solo nos dijo cómo 5 veces que llegamos MUCHO más temprano (perdón Julian somos turistas) si te despertamos perdona, eran casi las 9... tempranisimo seguro!!. Muy exigente con la limpieza (demasiado), en horario de almuerzo no se puede utilizar la cocina ni la mesa!!!! De locos, no hay trato con los huéspedes. Además Horarios de ducha.
It's a nice, simple BNB to stay at when visiting and staying in Barcelona.

Points positifs : appartement propre, bien situé, literie correcte et un guide de Barcelona à disposition
Points négatifs: Il est évident que les voyageurs doivent être respectueux de leur hôte néanmoins les règles de vie imposées sont trop strictes. Nous n'avions pas la possibilité de nous reposer durant la journée (le temps d'une sieste par exemple) puisque Julián nous a clairement dit que nous devions faire du tourisme et donc ne pas être à l'appartement au cours de notre séjour, hormis pour y dormir la nuit. L'utilisation de la cuisine et de la table est fortement déconseillée par notre hôte. La salle de bain est la seule partie commune accessible durant les heures prévues dans le règlement. Cette situation nous a mises mal à l'aise
Thanks Julián. Our arrival was comfortable. Everything in the apartment will be corresponded to the description in the profile. Excellent location. We all advise.
Julián’s place was lovely! Perfect location, very clean and exactly what we had expected/ needed. Thank you :)

Si buscan un lugar cómodo, limpio y cerca de algún sitio turistico es el lugar, Julián nos dio las instrucciones y recomendaciones para estar en su apartamento y es bastante extricto con esto, por lo que recomiendo leer muy bien antes de tomar la habitación, destacable la limpieza y en mi caso que nos permitió guardar las maletas por unas horas y fue de gran ayuda.

Julian is a very thoughtful host, easy to communicate with, and tries to make the stay as convenient as possible. He provided us with plenty of information on Barcelona, and willing to answer all questions we had. 

The apartment is in a very convenient location, just 4 blocks from Sagrada Familia metro. As two female travellers we felt safe in the apartment as well as in the area. We were comfortable returning home at night.
The stay was good, everathing was nice and clean.

Upon arrival, we were greeted without even a smile, and felt like we were intruders. Because I asked for some clarification via email, Julian got really mad and didn't want to host us anymore. We were basically kicked out and had to find another place where to stay. He was helpful in the way that we could use his land phone in order to speak with airBnB team and explain the situation.
I think that Julian has some anger issues and he is also very strict with his rules. My friend couldn't even go to the toilet after 2 hours flight, and had to speak with Julian and airbnb team for one hour before leaving the apartment.
As I could see from other guests comments, Julian has a lot of experience as a host and maybe my case was unique.
Wouldn't recommend him as a host because my experience could be rated as 0 stars.
Very nice area, clear room, great communication and nice tipps for the city!
Excellent location.
Everything was fine, rules clearly explained, nice and quiet place in a very good location.
Great location and relaxed, quiet flat.

The place is very well located and he is very clean but he has so many house rules that I felt uncomfortable. At checkout he gave me a lecture because it was 3pm and we did not come or called earlier. My phone was dead and when I manage to turn on I message him. He was upset for waiting but online it said check in form 2pm to 10pm and I never got a message from him saying  that we should schedule a time. He limited the bathroom time and schedule shower hours. I have only spent a day there and honestly I’m not a party person or a noise person but I found myself rushing through my dinner in order to be home before 11 pm because he asked us not to shower after 11pm. I understand that he may want to avoid noise and disturbance but it was too much for me. I went with a friend and she wanted to dry her her and couldn’t because it was 11pm. Also we left to different ways and she left before me. It was 9am and checkout was at 11am.

A limpeza, a localização, tudo ok, mas as regras e indicaçōes para o uso do banheiro, aff! Fora que quando saímos foi fazer uma vistoria declarada para ver se não havíamos roubado nada. Anfitrião indelicado e chato!

Julián un anfitrión buenísimo sus indicaciones  para llegar y movernos dentro de Barcelona  perfectas, su hogas muy limpio , tranquilo y a dos cuadras del metro Sagrada Familia.
lo recomiendo 100%.
The place is very appropriate for those that don't like noise. It's quite and clean.

Habitación muy limpia y ubicación inmejorable, cerca de la Sagrada Familia y todo tipo de transporte. Julián ha sido un anfitrión muy amable y disponible. Si algun día decidimos regresar a Barcelona volveremos a elegir su piso. 
Recomendable.
estuve una noche y todo fue correcto.  muy limpio

Julian provides a very comfortable, clean accommodation for a very modest price.  He goes out of his way to help you find your way around Barcelona and to locate some of the best attractions this beautiful city has to offer

Accueil froid aucune communication possible. Des reproches constants concernant le bruit alors que je suis venue me reposer avec ma fille.
Nous avons oublié une fois de tirer la chasse d'eau (pour un pipi) ce qui nous a vallu une pancarte au dessus des toilettes. 
Julian n'est pas fait pour accueillir des gens chez lui il est évident que cela le dérange au vu des reproches incesants.
L'appartement est correct et bien situé mais il est impossible de jouir en toute tranquillité de l'espace. Nous devions rester cloîtré dans la petite chambre en murmurant par peur de déranger. Dans le salon si nous voulions nous y installer des reproches étaient effectués sur la place prise. Notamment sur la table.
Il a à plusieurs reprises fait preuve d'agressivité verbale.
Ubicación muy buena!  Lugar muy limpio .
Great place to stay as it only a few blocks away from the metro and Sagrada. The place was sparkly clean and comfortable to stay in.
Nice and clean place . Exactly like the photos . ☺️
thanks

Квартира самая обычная с обыкновенной обстановкой. При заселении - подробная экскурсия по всем помещениям с демонстрацией использования предметов быта. Особенно подробно и дважды было объяснено, что такое биде, как его использовать и что туда не нужно делать. На руки выдается перечень правил проживания, где все это еще раз перечислено. 
Можно завтракать и ужинать, но быстро. По факту выяснилось, что можно выпить чаю с бутербродом, приготовленный овощной салат ели быстро стоя на кухне, практически не жуя (со мной была тетя 59-три лет, на минуточку)! Хозяин практически все время находится в квартире, сидит в проходной комнате и ты все время на виду. Так что, если вы утром встали и,несмотря на погоду,  сразу ушли, а вернувшись –  в кровать, то это ваш вариант. Хотя, за такие деньги есть и лучшие варианты.
Excelente ubicación, lugar muy confortable y ameno, Julián es muy claro con las reglas, muy dispuesto a guiar y colaborar. Volvería con gusto

All of the following things are factual truths. We were lectured for 20 min on how to turn on light switches, lock doors, and flush toilets. Julian is also a political science graduate I'll have you know. The Curfew is at 11pm (not kidding). Disobey this and he will be passive aggressive and condescending towards you. As he was towards us. We didn't party in the house, we just were out a bit late in one of the most night life lively cities in the world, this was a big mistake as his tone got worse and worse. 

Other than that the place was clean and a decent location. Viva la France.

Julian is a nice host. The place is really clean and peaceful. The place is near Sagrada família which is just a few minutes walk. No problem with transportation coz' just outside the house there is a bus that leads to the city and also it is near with the metro.
Excelente piso, exactamente como se describe, muy buena ubicación y Julián es muy amable y dispuesto a ayudar con todo.
Very clean apartment and the location is very central. However the house rules are very strict and you need to follow them.

Very nice apartment, very close to the sagrada familia and easy to travel by metro. 
And there are tons of great bars and restaurants around the area as well.
I like my stay and Julian was very nice and useful!
I really recommend this place as it is clean, well located, you get a confortable room .
la ubicacion del lugar es excelente, buen de partida para recorrer la ciudad y el lugar muy comodo y limpio.

I had a pleasant stay in Barcelona. Julián is a great host and helped me a lot by pointing out things to see and do etc. The appartment is located a few minutes from La Sagrada familia in a quiet neighborhood and the room were clean.
Todo correcto
Everything was as expected. Good, cheap option for crashing in Barcelona.
La habitación es muy limpia y muy cómoda
Everything at Julián's went smoothly, good communication, the appartment is very clean and well located just few steps from Sagrada Familia
La habitación es tal cual aparece en las fotos, tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia agradable. Fácil comunicación con Julián
Un lugar limpio, cercano al metro, buena ubicación y además te aconseja los mejores lugares donde ir a conocer.
Muy buen alojamiento; camas super cómodas, el aseo muy limpio, respeto y silencio en la casa... Estuvimos encantadas. Os lo recomiendo!

name: SUNSHINE STUDIO NEAR MTR 地铁超值房連獨立浴室
summary: -Near airport bus stop / Sham Shio Po & Nam Cheung MTR station) -Few mins walk to MTR station & bus stops.  -Free WiFi, air-condition , water heater provided. -many local food street REMINDER : THIS APARTMENT IS A FOR ECONOMIC PLAN TRAVELERS ,SO IT NEED TO WALK UP STAIR ! address.street: 香港, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: It was a pretty good location with amenities all covered. Directions were clear to get to the house by MTR. Room was in good condition.

Great comunication. Great offer for this price.
Better than most hostels accomadation in HK for the same price.
Room was small and  clean except dusty upper racks.
There is a spacy entressol for your luggage.
.
There is no lift and 8th floor. Mind about it when carring a heavy luggage. 
5min from Sham Shui Po MTR station and Airport BUS
20min from Mongkok on foot

But the Sham Shui Po disctict is so-so because there is a lot of pitchmans and guests from Mainland China
Everything went well, nice flat though there were some traffic noises throughout the day and night. The flat is small but clean. The bed was a bit too small for 183cm tall guy like me.
还行

Kwan Bo is a very helpful host, I enjoyed her hospitality. The room is the same as what the photo shows. Without elevator and pretty small, but that's how it is in Hong Kong. I'm very satisfied with the room.

Ross was a very helpful host, nothing was a trouble to him. His place is a terrific location if your travels take you to central Hong Kong, just a few mins walk from both the MTR . His apartment was clean, and has everything you need including super fast wifi. Despite other comments about noise, I found the building quiet - but you are in a major city! It's 8 floors up so you need to walk a lot ,that why this apartment price is so low. Would certainly stay again and highly recommend KwanBo' place and Kwanbo as a host.

 I am an agent in Hongkong who help some travel to reservate apartment ,the above review is wrote by that apartment guest
Cozy place, with private bathroom, convenient location, great price, and guarantee plenty of exercise.
Good!!

The host was helpful prior to our arrival and even sent videos. Was just disappointed because the room given to us was different from the one posted. He tried to make his staff go back but we were just staying for one night and it was late already so we stuck with the room.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I was delighted to stay in Kwan Bo's space. Videos going to his unit is very helpful. He also reply immediately to all my queries. The space is just right for short stay traveler.

Decent deal given the price. Clean, and no per se red flags. Only thing is that you have to walk 8 floors. However, that's in the description and it was my bad that I overlooked it.
So as long as you're fine with it, again, it's a decent deal.
总的来说性价比还是很高的,房间也比较干净｡但是也有待提升的空间
在这总共住了两晚,总的来的还是挺不错的,离地铁站非常近,周边便利店小吃餐厅也很多,房间虽然比较小,但是在香港这样的地方,已经很不错了,毕竟房间内设施也很完善了,甚至还有冰箱和雨伞,转换插头在房间里没有看到,跟房东说了以后也及时解决了,就是楼层比较高,不过我觉得还是OK的~
里地铁站很近,房间整洁,一应俱全

The place was small and the corridors of the building is extremely dirty, climbing up 8floors will make you tired. bedsheets didn't seem washed.
I wouldn't stay here again. The price should be cheaper for what its worth. bathroom is ok. A/C wasn't powerful enough for Hk weather.
臨時出了點插曲,不過房東聯係很快解決了問題｡總體上地方跟著 (Hidden by Airbnb) 地圖即可,到深水埗地鐵 10 分鐘左右｡除了 8F 有點高外無其他問題｡有機會可以再住!

Mediocre. Bare minimum place in a sketchy neighborhood. Airconditioning didn't work. Saw two cockroaches during my 6 day stay. Toilet was cracked and leaking, causing the bathroom floor to be constantly wet. building is quite old and run down and could use a serious facelift. something as cheap and easy as repainting it would bring it back to life. While the place is inexpensive, it lacks basic features of a good quality airbnb. I would highly recommend for the host to fix the issues above and he'd have a decent place, but I wouldn't feel comfortable renting this place out or recommending it to anyone. Overall a 2* place. Look elsewhere.

這是一次非常差的入住體驗｡首先,爬到了九樓沒有電梯,樓道上臟亂差,房間里有蜘蛛,充滿著異味,且非常小｡(提前與房東發過訊息)然後家中有事不能留在香港時,希望可以更改日期,遭到房東拒絕｡到最後,六百連清潔費都沒有退｡這樣讓這次旅行變得很不愉快｡
im sorry , I'm afraid that I can't give to you good comments .
Rather nice, small room on the 8th floor. No complaints, really. Everything worked well, and the host was always available.
房子虽然在深水埗,但环境相对安静
整体来说,挺好的,交通方便,容易找到,房间虽然很小,但是五脏俱全｡唯一的一个不足的是卫生有待于提高
价格便宜,但是床的垫子偏软,给的牙刷和牙膏太次了,建议自己带!
ชั้น8ตึกเก่าและสกปรกมากทางเดินนึกว่าตลาดขยะ
Bo got a very cozy place with convenient transportations ( Metro,bus) and reasonable price. I would make a reservation again when I visit HK
性价比很高 也很好找 总体很不错哦 但是那天房间没有Wi-Fi和吹风筒 这个得提前和房东沟通哦
Perfect for low budget travelers. Very near the metro station. But very crowded neighborhood in the day.
性比价高
性價比幾高經濟實惠型,但床單有積塵令我覺得應該好久沒換過床單?馬桶也有小小問題

We stayed at Kwan Bos for 12 days and it felt like a little home to us. For people who don't mind to be in a local area and won't complain about walking up to the 8th floor this is definetly a Place to stay.  This was our first Airbnb and we're glad everything worked out so well.
很接地气的住宿体验,周边都是当地市民的住宅区,离地铁站非常近,茶餐厅很多,随便一家都很好吃,特别方便!房间不大,布局合理,干净舒适,床垫舒服,性价比超高
女生一個人住還是有點怕怕的 因為唐樓實在太老舊了
地方很方便,麻雀虽小,五脏俱全
L'annonce est honnête, bon logement pour un voyageur seul ne nécessitant pas un confort de luxe.
Great location close to MTR, be prepared to climb a lot of stairs! Very non-touristy neighborhood.
Good place for the value and convenient location. Going up the stairs is a bit of a pain.
物超所值
Average
地下鉄駅やﾊﾞｽ停に近いから便利です｡部屋はすこし上の方にありますので体力に自信のある方にはいいとおもいます｡5日間の滞在で3日目にﾄｲﾚの調子が悪くなって流れなくなったのでﾎｽﾄに連絡をしたのですが結局返事はきませんでした｡
很好的地理位置,很容易找｡周围都挺安静的,房东很nice,因为知道香港很多的airbnb住宿都不会提供风筒,多口问了句房东,第二天房东送洗发水过来顺便把风筒也带过来了!真的很nice !下次到香港也会再选择此处!
like anything in Hong Kong it's up and you have to travel eight floors but it's worth it as you have a nice private little place comfy and quiet

Хороший район, до набережной тихим шагом 1 час по главной улице, правда 8 этаж без лифта, для Гонконга это нормально, для бюджетного туриста, в следующий раз остановлюсь здесь, мне понравилось, рекомендую

没有电梯要爬八楼 定之前看到别人有说 就OK 反正我没有行李｡有行李箱大重,大的需要注意噢
价格对得起住的,临时订房这个价格是可以接受的,就是楼道上楼的时候真真不好看
房东有求必应 挺好的
另外到香港手机没有信号,找了半天,就是A2出口直走到好像穿过两三条小街到大街荔枝角的时候左转在荔枝角和南昌接交接口
除了沒有電梯以外,不錯了
位置好,是唐楼,楼下的环境很差,房子看上去挺干净的,就是有点担心床单什么的不会及时清洗｡性价比高
终于体验了唐楼的住宿环境,相信这里代表了香港的

This location was in a great place for a really local experience. Sham Shui Po is a very vibrant location with tons of shopping, especially for electronics and gadgets. The room itself was a typical HK style room. Very small, but with a comfortable bed and a private bathroom. Its on the 8th floor which is tough to climb, but it kept me in shape while I stuffed my face with local foods ^^  I enjoyed my stay and I would stay again since its a good value.
希望樓層別太高~但價錢了在香港找不到更優惠了~適合自助旅行者~

Much better than expected.
I love Sham Shui Po district as it's very local and vibrant.
I stayed previously in another studio very close to this one and it was much less comfortable as it was smaller and didn't have a window.
This one has a very large window and has basic but decent interiors.
As long as you know that it's on the 8th floor without lift, know that it's small (not even too small, in my opinion) and know what to expect from the this area, you shouldn't have anything to complain about.
8 floor without lift,if you carry some baggage,think about it.
总体感觉还不错啦!性价比很高｡对要求低,穷游的人来说,值得推荐｡
除了没电梯要爬一会,其他不错
唐楼啊 8楼蛮高的 楼道里……有点气味 地理位置是真的不错 离地铁口近 出行十分方便 深水埗周围也是体验香港不错的地方 在香港 这儿算比较经济的了吧 适合穷游的孩子们
Good location for affordable price.
位于深水埗附近 周围就很好逛 非常有生活气息的地方 也有不少好吃的 就是真的太高了 九楼 爬的很累 只敢最后一天拖着行李去买东西  老板很好人 我们买了西瓜 他借了我们刀 我们的插头转换器不行 他把自己的给我们用了 虽然房子很小 但真的还挺喜欢的 最惊喜的就是小冰箱了
房东人很好  很耐心给我们指路  好评
Ubicación buena, habitación sencilla pero aceptable, solo lamento la falta de ascensor por lo demás contento. Algunos problemillas con los bichos pero controlable.
It was good place for its money
楼层有点高,不过对于年轻人来说,应该不成问题｡房间有国标的插座,房东也有备转换头,这个还是挺好｡拖鞋牙刷没备足,浴室下水比较慢,希望能清理一下｡总体性价比很高｡
They have to walk up 8 floors
谢谢房东的热情接待,地点很市民,能体验本地人的生活
房子确实有点小 床也很小 不过位置很方便 价格也算便宜 房东也很好

老街区 接地气 非常有特色
爬楼担待 人家唐楼就这样的
麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,有冰箱有厕所有床有柜子有电视,不过电视看不了,房子性价比不错,价格相对较香港其它房子较便宜,交通便利,离深水埗地铁站三四分钟路程｡
位置很方便 独立空间 比其他旅馆空间大,香港唐楼,习惯就好,房东给的指引很细致
