host.host_about:
I live in New York , love life , like to laugh and believe in traveling
Be happy and shine

reviews.comments: Host was available to check in at agreed time. I wish the AC would work as it was one of the hottest and most humid day during our stay. Ashiv gave us wifi access  later in the evening, but having it on arrival in the morning would have been nice.  Some towels, soap. and shampoo would be nice to add to the value of this listing. There is no privacy through the kitchen window as it is open to the side walkway of the house without any curtain or window shade. Otherwise, host was very cordial, polite, and responsive to all my questions.
The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood. And Ashiv was very kind and helpful.
Great place, great host :)

Ashiv was a very helpful host, and the apartment had everything we needed for a pleasant stay. The location of the apartment was worth mentioning: it was located about two blocks away from M and R subway stations, and was on Austin st, a very walkable shopping/dining street with a lot of interesting restaurants, shops, and bars.
Good
It was a great experience staying at Ashiv's place. The place was clean and comfy, and Ashiv and his family were very friendly.

A great place where we felt safe. Close to the subway station and about 40mins subway from downtown Manhattan. The trains can be a bit noisy at night and might bother light sleepers. Ashiv was very responsive and made sure our stay was warm and welcoming. Definitely recommend staying here :)

Great Location. 24 hour grocery store right across the street. However, place can accommodate maximum 3 people.
Reasonably priced. You can hear trains at night as track is close to the house, so be aware if you sleep light.
Overall, a good experience

Perfect place for what I was looking for.  Safe, convenient location right around the corner from the subway station.  Was able to catch the express train into Manhattan.  Ashiv and his family were wonderful hosts, and I would defiantly stay with them again the next time I need to visit NY.

Хорошее место. Рядом метро и LIRR. До центра Манхэттена 30 минут. Квартира чистая, удобная. Все есть для деловой поездки. Хозяева очень доброжелательные и милые люди. Рекомендую для людей, любящих спокойствие.

Ashiv and his family were great hosts. When I had any questions he answered them quickly. 
The apartment was great and perfect for myself and my son. It was in a great (Website hidden by Airbnb) close to the subway to take you into Manhatten. There is a laundromat right opposite as well as a shop to get any food and bits you need. 
About a 10 min walk on Austin streets are lots more shops and restaurants. 
Would definitely recommend this apartment ...perfect area as close to everything. 
When we visit New York next this would be our first choice of apartments to stay in. 
Thanks xx

I live in New York myself but needed a place over night. This is an ideal location for couples. Transportation is near along with shopping areas. The neighborhood was peaceful and friendly. Ashiv was very kind and  helpful during the stay. I recommend.
Quaint little place, in walking distance to public transportation, shops, cafes and restaurants.  Always felt safe.

This was a perfect location for us while in Forest Hills. The host was very responsive and helpful to us regarding inquiries we had about the security system and thermostat.We would definitely stay here again.
Ashiv's place is close to the M train making getting around very easy! It's a solid spot but nothing too fancy.
Ashiv was helpful and responsive. He was also kind to let us keep our luggage as our flight was only later in the day.

Ashiv was a great host who took the time to install and explain to us the August lock and who was always very quickly available whenever there were questions. The place offers everything you need for a short trip, the neighborhood is quite and convenient (with a 24h store right across the street). If you're here by car it may be hard to find parking, like anywhere in New York.
Professional, easy check in and out, and convenient location.
I must say it turned out to be a great place, and Ashiv was very welcoming.
Ashiv was very friendly, always responded quickly and made sure our stay was comfortable, safe & fun.

Die Unterkunfr ist nicht zu empfehlen. Die Lage und der Preis sind zwar OK, aber der Kontakt mit dem Gastgeber klappte nur teilweise gut, Checkin war kompliziert (Code stimmte, aber Tür war von innen mit einem Sicherheitsschloss verriegelt, mussten für viel Geld den Vermieter anrufen), Handtücher zu wenig und rochen modrig, in der Küche schlechte Ausstattung (Plastikteller, kein komplettes Gedeck, keine Kaffeemaschine), Geschirr vom Vorbenutzer stand noch rum. 
Nie mehr!

Apartment is a basement with separate entrance. Overall very clean. Everything we needed was provided. Quite spacious with lots of room to put our bags and clothes. Air conditioner and heating in both bedroom and common area.  If you are a light sleeper, sound from outside and ground level can be heard inside.  Parking hard to find, we had to circle around for a while but found a spot in the local neighbourhood we could leave our car for a few days. Overall we were very satisfied and had a good stay.
all good
I would recommend staying. At Ashiv's place. The trains do make some noise but it didn't bother us. Great bed area. Could have been cleaner though.
Nothing fancy but a pleasant enough place to stay in a quiet, safe neighborhood. Convenient to shops and mass transit. Easy check-in and check-out.

Ashiv is very nice and trustful. 
The place is very nice and clean and was suited to our needs.
The only downside is that it's a basement so there aren't real windows which can be a little claustrophobic for some people.

Ashiv's place has many selling key points that future guests/travelers can consider and would really love. It is in a very safe neighborhood, we feel safe walking even in the wee hours. There is a 24-hr convenient store just in front of Ashiv's place which is very useful whenever you need something. It is really close to Subway station M and R going to Manhattan, it is just like a 2-3min walk. And also bus routes, though we never use bus in our trips. This place is very convenient, aside from it is located in Austin St, you have your own private room and your private bathroom and that's what we are looking for, most of the places I have looked were shared baths. Basic needs like soaps, shampoo, tissue, towels are provided. There were so many restaurants (Asian, Peruvian, Mexican etc), food stores, 99cents store and a mall just in Queens Ave. We just have some issues that I addressed to the host and he assured that it will be changed. Ashiv is a very nice guy, he made sure that we are ok with our stay. He went down to see us and to personally say goodbye the night before we checked out. It was an easy check in/check out and I suggest that you download the August lock before you check in. We had a good time staying at Ashiv's place and we'll still choose his place whenever we have a chance to go back to New York. Thanks Ashiv!
This place is close to the train and has a 24 hour shop directly across from it. Overall, a great value.

It is well located, near 67 ave subway station (few mins walk) and forest hill 71 ave station (11 mins walk). takes about 40 mins to time sq by local train, 30 mins by express train. but recently there is some train service change, it is not easy to figure out the train route. do not rely o (Website hidden by Airbnb) map entirely, better to use MTA website and pay attention to the notice posted at the train station.

We took Uber from Sheraton New York Time Square (on 7th Ave) to Ashiv’s place, it was $28. It was also $28 from Ashiv’s place to JFK airport. 

there is a local grocery store right outside the house called Austin Farm. extremely convenient for getting snacks, fruits and bottled waters.

It felt like a safe neighborhood. There is a police station on the same street. we also saw a farmers market on a weekend morning while we were on the way to the subway station. we didn’t explore the surroundings but there are definitely some restaurants (pizza, sushi, Chinese) nearby.

We didn't check in until 11pm, the fact that we could enter the house with passcode (instead of physical key) was great. 

We haven't met Ashiv in person, but he responds almost immediately every time which we really appreciate. It helps us to plan our trip smoothly. 

The house is fully furnished with couch, tv, table, drawers, two big closets (hangers included), bed, stove, microwave, big trash can. petty much everything you need is there, except iron and a full size mirror. the house could use a bit cleanliness, other than that, everything is as expected.

We found the bed quite comfy, my husband and I slept very well for the three nights we were there. the house is very close to train line, the noise didn't bother us, but if you are a light sleeper it might be a problem.

ABOUT & LOCATION: Great location in a safe and quiet neighborhood.  It's a 6 minute walk to the subway station, coffee shops, and stores.  There's even a 24 hour market across the street which is so convinient.  About a 13 minute walk away you have a full avenue of restaurants, bakeries, and shops.  

BEST THING: The best part was the easy access to the subway station.  It made it the process to get into the city even that much more easier.  

REVIEW OF HOST: Ashiv was a great host and let me check in early.  He was very responsive prior to the trip with any questions.  He also checked in with me the second to last day to ensure I had no questions or problems so far.

PRICE: The pictures for the place are just as it is in person.  Basic necessities and needs are met, and for the price it is a good choice to stay if you are keeping conscious of your budget.

Ashiv's self-contained apartment is in a very secure and excellent location in Queens. Within a five minute walk is a subway station to take you to Manhattan or the airport. Even closer is a very convenient supermarket that seems to open early to late, and there are plenty of reasonable restaurants within walking distance. The apartment itself has everything you would require for a comfortable self-catered stay, long or short. Ashiv is very hospitable, communicated promptly, and did not hesitate to give assistance when required. A big thumbs up from us!
Great place to stay! Very close to the subway. Ashiv communicated very well and was very quick to provide anything needed. Great host! Would definitely stay again
It's very easy to get to the main subway and a very quiet neighborhood. There is also a nice 24hr supermarket directly across the street.
Really enjoyed my stay. Ashiv was a great host and the apartment was clean and amazing.
Perfect spot in a great neighborhood! Will definitely go back!
A basement not so clean, the towels were rather smelly

Ashiv was very helpful before, during and after the stay and provides a lot of amenities (i.e. kitchenware, toileteries etc). The location is excellent for any traveller as there is easy access to 2 subway stations (67 Av & 71 Av) with a total of 4 lines, so we rarely had any issues getting back at all. It is suitable for 1 or 2 guests over a few nights, but I found that the noise from upstairs made it difficult to sleep past 8AM and it wasn't properly cleaned when we arrived. This was resolved quickly by Ashiv, but the bathroom has definitely seen better days. Noise from outside wasn't too bad, it's just mainly dealing with a lot of footsteps right above you in the morning.
Highly recommend you stay at Ashiv's place! Great location. This place was perfect for our needs :)

Ashiv was a great host. It was my first time booking through the app and he was very helpful. The place is close to the subway station, Starbucks, Target, and there's a 24 hour market across the street. Would definitely recommend this place.
The apartment was private and excellent. The location was great amd the hosts were very friendly amd helpfull. Would recommend to anyone
Great value for money - Ashiv and his wife were excellent hosts. Location was very convenient for subway and local store which was literally 3 seconds away.

Todo perfecto,bien comunicado con el metro,buen vecindario,tiendas y restaurantes cerca, apartamento muy acogedor y calentito y los anfitriones muy amables.Nos han dejado hacer el checkout a última hora de la tarde! Muy buena experiencia
Great location. Ashiv and Abhilasha's place is very clean and nicely decorated. They are lovely hosts and very helpful. I would stay again.

The apartment is very clean and is located right across from the deli where you can get everything you need.  It’s also in a walking distance to shopping, good restaurants and public transportation.  Host was very quick in responding to all of our questions and needs.
The place was great! Everything advertised was accurate. It is a nice, comfortable modern space great for couples. I recommend this place to anyone. Communication was also on point.
Great location and had everything I needed for my visit.  Perfect set up for visiting for several days.
Highly recommended

The place was clean, hosts are easy to reach. There is a local grocery store across the street and just under 5min walk you can pretty much access the restaurants, cafes and other establishments. The subway train was so close which is a big plus if your in NY. If you’re planning on cooking during your stay just inquire to the hosts what tools and equipments they have in their kitchen that you might need during your stay. You’ll get your privacy in this place.
Highly Recommend.
This place is amazing. Neighbourhood is safe and friendly. The place itself is cozy and comfortable. Highly recommended to everyone.

Passei 25 dias na casa de Ashiva e Abhilasha. Encontrei um lugar limpo, organizado e confortável onde pude me sentir em casa. Tive bastante privacidade e eles foram muito rápidos e disponíveis quando precisei. O bairro é calmo, seguro e tem vários serviços próximos, como restaurantes, mercados, lojas, lavanderias e metrô. Definitivamente recomendo.

Good value and location, very close to the subway in central Queens (about a 45 minute ride from Manhattan). It's a basement apartment, so very little natural light, but that also meant that it was nice and dark at night, which is often difficult to achieve in New York. The kitchen was very sparsely equipped, but it included most of the necessities. 

Overall a clean, safe, well located apartment for a reasonable price

Host was nice, close to restaurants and stores, not bad for the price if you are going just to sleep
Like we went to visit family.

Excelente acomodação. Bem localizado, 2 quadras da estação de metr (Website hidden by Airbnb) possui uma pequena grocery store na calçada em frente. Lugar espaçoso com todos os itens básicos inclusos (toalhas, pratos, panelas...). Respostas rápidas por parte do Host e check-in tranquilo com senha usando a August Lock. Recomendo!
Espaço confortável e limpo porém dar para ouvir os passos da casa de cima.

Ashiv and Abhilasha's basement was a 15 minute walk from public transportation in a safe neighborhood in Queens. Across the street there was also a 24 hour market which was very convenient. We are used to warm/hot weather and when we requested a blanket and help with the heater, our hosts responded immediately and came down to help us out. We felt safe, the hosts responded promptly to all of our messages, our hosts were nice, and it was a great value. If you are particularly sensitive to noise, know that you are staying in a basement and that you can sometimes hear the train nearby.

Nossa estadia foi muito tranquila. O bairro é calmo e muito bem localizado no Queens próximo a lojas, restaurantes e lanchonetes. Fica próximo da estação de metrô também. Ashiv e Abhilasha são muito atenciosos e amigáveis. Nós recomendamos.
The place is conveniently located close to the subway. The owners are friendly and easy to communicate with.
Ashiv and Abhilasha were wonderful hosts. They made sure we are comfortable, and checked in on us. Location was great! Quiet and safe neighborhood.

Netter Vermieter/ in
Subway und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in nächster Umgebung 
Probleme wurden schnell gelöst
Für einen Aufenthalt in New York ist die Wohnung geeignet
Great at communication, and the area is very convenient!

Lovely place, very close to the subway, and the shop across the street has everything you might need arriving late at night like I did. They were attentive hosts, and were kind enough to let me get something I’d forgotten mailed to the address. Would definitely stay again if I’m in the area.
Wonderful location in a great neighborhood.  We loved the convenient little store right across the street!
very nice accommodations, private and felt very safe. Super close to the subway and walking distance to restaurants and entertainment.
A good appartment in a quite neighbourhood. Close to subway and little market across the road.
This place was great! Spacious, convenient, and in a nice neighborhood.

The apartment is very close to the subway. The market across the street is convenient to get water/fruits/milk..etc. Checking process was very fast. The apartment has things you need like towel/soaps/kitchen utensils. Comfortable place.

Die Unterkunft ist so wie beschrieben. Die Lage ist top man ist direkt an der subway, die Gegend ist sehr schön und wir haben uns wohl gefühlt. Der Kontakt mit den Gastgebern war total unkompliziert und es wurden direkt unsere Fragen beantwortet. Das einzige ist, dass die Wohnung sehr hellhörig ist und man jeden Schritt von oben hören kann.

Great place, clean and close to everything, literally from the moment I walked in it was like our own little private hotel, plus there is a convenience store across the street open 24 hours a day, seriously couldn’t ask for a better stay, thank you!

The apt has its own entrance and it’s in a super convenient and safe part of Forest Hills. Walking distance to all the shops, subway, and restaurants. The apt itself was furnished with all the basics and had just what we needed for our stay. There was some noise of the train passing by and the occasional noise of footsteps upstairs, but otherwise it was a great stay! I would highly recommend it for anyone visiting NYC on a budget!
Awesome place to stay. Close to everything in forest hills and subway stations. I would stay here again.

Ashiv and Abhilasha were by far the best AirBnB hosts we have had.  They were willing to be flexible with check in and check out time. They also would check on us regularly if we needed anything. The place was very clean and it is located near the subway and plenty of amenities. If I'm back in Queens I would not hesitate to book with them again!
Amazing place close to subway & minimart. Kind host that helped me unlock the door at check in. Would stay again!
This listing was a lovely, simple space. Easy directions to follow for checkin . Great location.*** Hosts were respectful and the home was true to the photos. Thanks for a great stay.

Thank you, Ashiv and Abhilasha, for your hospitality! The place was exactly what we expected. Some noises from the train and walking upstairs occurred, but we are not light sleepers:) I bought earplugs and slept like a child. Special thanks for making the place very warm- it was necessary in December weather conditions! It was easy to take a shower and come out to a very warm room/bathroom. My favorite feature was the heated step in front of the bathroom:) I used it for drying and heating the bathroom rugs. The location is just great! 2-3 minutes walk to the subway station, and you are in Central Park in 40 minutes, for instance (straight line- “R” train). Lots of awesome restaurants around, and of course, the convenience store 30 seconds away from the house was very helpful! Overall, it was a great deal for the price. Future tenants, do not expect perfection at everything. Things happen, and we all have to realize the whole family lives upstairs. They walk, they make some sounds, but it is normal. Nevertheless, the guys are very polite, responsive and understanding. Thank you for making our vacation in NY unforgettable!
Great place, great hosts

name: Single  Bedroom in Dee Why
summary: Single bedroom in a two bedroom apartment.  Double built in wardrobe, single bed, sunny, leafy private outlook. The apartment features a comfortable living room, well-equipped kitchen, private balcony with BBQ, clean bathroom, internal laundry
description: Single bedroom in a two bedroom apartment.  Double built in wardrobe, single bed, sunny, leafy private outlook. The apartment features a comfortable living room, well-equipped kitchen, private balcony with BBQ, clean bathroom, internal laundry You have access to the living room, bathroom, kitchen, balcony and laundry. Dee Why is the central suburb of the Northern Beaches. Buses can be caught to most parts of Sydney from here, including the city, Manly and Palm Beach, which are all short trips.  The beach is a 5 minute walk. It features a pool, lifeguards, fantastic walks to the next beaches and a good selection of restaurants, bars and cafes. All shops are within walking distance. Many cafes and restaurants, especially on Dee Why Beach. Several major supermarkets, including a Coles next door. There are bakeries, butchers, delis, fruit markets, pharmacies and medical centres.
neighborhood_overview: Dee Why is the central suburb of the Northern Beaches. Buses can be caught to most parts of Sydney from here, including the city, Manly and Palm Beach, which are all short trips.  The beach is a 5 minute walk. It features a pool, lifeguards, fantastic walks to the next beaches and a good selection of restaurants, bars and cafes. All shops are within walking distance. Many cafes and restaurants, especially on Dee Why Beach. Several major supermarkets, including a Coles next door. There are bakeries, butchers, delis, fruit markets, pharmacies and medical centres.
access: You have access to the living room, bathroom, kitchen, balcony and laundry.
house_rules: No loud music, no noise on balcony after 10 pm, the neighbors  must be respected, no smoking in the apartment or on the balcony.

name: Large Comfortable CBD Convenience
summary: Spacious apartment next to Darling Harbour and perfectly positioned in the CBD close to all major attractions.  It has 2 queen size beds and an extra queen mattress to sleep total of 6 guests. Free WIFI, air conditioning, swimming pool and gym.
space: This sun filled, spacious, beautifully presented apartment is situated in a vibrant and convenient location near Darling Harbour and provides easy access to all areas of the CBD. All of Sydneys main attractions including cafes, restaurants, Chinatown and Darling Harbour at your doorstep.  There is a queen bed in the bedroom as well as an extra queen bed in the living room. A spare queen size mattress is also available to sleep a total of 6 guests.  The apartment comes fully furnished with everything you would need to have a comfortable stay including fresh linen, sheets, quilts, blankets,  towels, kitchen utensils and appliances like microwave and fridge, crockery, laundry facilities including washing machine and dryer, sofa and LCD TV.  There is free unlimited broadband WIFI so you can download to your hearts content. The building has access to a gym and swimming pool which you have access to. Features * Air conditioning * Open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances  * Intercom
description: Spacious apartment next to Darling Harbour and perfectly positioned in the CBD close to all major attractions.  It has 2 queen size beds and an extra queen mattress to sleep total of 6 guests. Free WIFI, air conditioning, swimming pool and gym. This sun filled, spacious, beautifully presented apartment is situated in a vibrant and convenient location near Darling Harbour and provides easy access to all areas of the CBD. All of Sydneys main attractions including cafes, restaurants, Chinatown and Darling Harbour at your doorstep.  There is a queen bed in the bedroom as well as an extra queen bed in the living room. A spare queen size mattress is also available to sleep a total of 6 guests.  The apartment comes fully furnished with everything you would need to have a comfortable stay including fresh linen, sheets, quilts, blankets,  towels, kitchen utensils and appliances like microwave and fridge, crockery, laundry facilities including washing machine and dryer, sofa and LCD TV.  There i
neighborhood_overview: Absolutely everything at your footstep from Chinatown, to Darling Harbour to the bustling CBD and main transport railway/bus stations. It is about 10 min walk towards the Opera House/Harbour bridge. Also 10 minutes walk to Pitt St mall for all your shopping needs. You'll have heaps of food options to choose from. It depends on your tastes but I can recommend my personal favourites : Chat Thai 20 Campbell St. Haymarket - best Thai food Haymarket Hotel - Cheapest but excellent australian steak and chips deal for only $12 Din Tai Fung World Square - fantastic dumplings. Also try Uncle Mings on York Street. Macchiato Wood Fire Pizza corner liverpool and Pitt Street for Italian food. Also try  Vapiano on York Street.
notes: I have a carspace in a nearby building I can rent out to you if you require a carspace at $40/night. Please let me know if you require this in order to reserve it. Note the hot water in the shower is now 100% fixed and working as of May.
transit: The apartment is a short walk between 2 major train stations in the city. You can find Town Hall station or Wynyard station just a short 5-10 min walk depending on which direction. To get to Circular Quay you may walk along George Street and it is around 7 mins. The transport system is simple now you just buy a card called "Opal" that you can use to catch trains, ferries and buses.
access: Everything is yours to enjoy so treat the apartment as your own.
interaction: I live in a nearby building so can attend to any emergencies or questions.
house_rules: No parties or excessive noise after 10pm. Take shoes off when entering as it has carpet. Please look after children when in the gym or pool area.

host.host_about:
Hi there we are Sam and Janelle and we are excited by the sharing economy that sites like AirBnB provides. 

Janelle works in aged community care and she looks after the properties you will be booking.

Sam is a professional musician who has  travelled to various parts of SE Asia and I plan on a big European trip next year followed by the USA sometime after that. 

My apartments are carefully selected to provide our guests with the most comfortable stay possible and we hope you enjoy the little touches we put into each apartment.

reviews.comments: This is a great, well presented apartment. It is located in the heart of Sydney within easy walking distance of everything. Gavin is a great host keeping in really good communication all the time. He was very flexible and allowed us to have a great relaxing stay. Highly recommended.

I was in Sydney for 5d4n with my family and stayed at Gavin's apartment. Gavin was very helpful in replying all my messages as when I required his assistance. The check in process was rather easy and straight forward if you follow the steps in his message accordingly. 

The apartment ticked all the basic requirements in terms of comfort and amenities. It was such a hot period whilst we were in Sydney and the strong air conditioning unit and the stand fan in the apartment was a total life saver! However I must give a thumbs up to the location as it was walking distance to the Darling Harbour, QVB, Pitt street mall, Martin place and also just less than 10 minutes walk to Wynyard train station. Gavin allowed us to check in early and also leave our baggages after check out time which was really helpful as we would not need to carry our luggages every where we go.

My family which consist of 4 over 50 year olds has no complain whatsoever on the apartment. It's their words that "the apartment is good."

Overall, I must say, I would totally recommend Gavin's apartment. It has ticked all my requirement boxes when it comes to finding a place with good location and comfort :)
The premise was clean and well maintained and is located in a very strategic area near to Sydney tower eye. Give you a flavor of 'living in an apartment of Sydney CBD'. Highly recommended.

Apartment is in excellent location- 2 min walking distance to Darling harbour and 15min to Opera house.  Gavin was very responsive to our queries. Everything was accurate as advertised. There is also one laminated information sheet in the apartment describing how to use WiFi, etc. That's really nice. I would recommend this place to those who wants to stay heart of CBD. One of two building lifts was not stopping on this apartment's floor.  It was not fixed by building management during our stays (probably due to Christmas holidays).
Really excellent situation in Sydney. Easy, simple, comfortable. perfect !
Gavin was a great host, very friendly and helpful. The apartment was very clean and spacious, an awesome place to stay in the city!

We really enjoyed staying at Gavin's apartment.  The apartment is very well located in the CBD of Sydney - a short walk to everywhere you will want to visit.  

The apartment is exactly as described and is incredibly comfortable.  There is everything that you need for your stay and the kitchen has pots, pans and plates to enable you to prepare food.  

The gym was an added bonus and unfortunately we didn't use the pool as the weather was not great but it looked lovely. 

The check in process was very easy and the apartment was clean and ready for our arrival.  

While we didn't meet Gavin during out stay, Gavin was very easy to deal with.  

I would definitely stay at Gavin's apartment again.

The apartment is conveniently located in Sydney's CBD near Darling Harbour and just a short walk to trains, Martin Place, etc. Sydney is a very walkable city and this apartment is in the middle of the city, so the location is tops. For the price, it would not be possible to find a better place. Clean linens and towels were provided. The apartment has a dish washing machine in the kitchen and a washer & dryer for laundry. They all worked fine. The host even left a box of welcome chocolates which was a nice touch.
We stayed during an unusually hot week. As the aircon is in the main room and not the bedroom, this did mean the bedroom was quite warm. It was not a deal breaker for us.
Clean, the apartment is not brand new, but for the rate absolutely acceptable. I would recommend the apartment.

Great location, everything was as described.  Found a very helpful drawer full of tools and stationery you usually need a little when you are away from home.  They really thought about the guests with little details.   Had a great time in Sydney.

Gavin's apartment in Kent St is located in a great central location of Sydney, is clean and fitted the 5 of us. It has a kitchen fir those that want to cook and a balcony too. Check in was easy and we had no issues during our stay. I would definitely recommend it to others and would be happy to stay again. Booking and contact with Gavin was easy too.
Conveniently located and clean. Overall, pleasant stay.

Excellent appart 1 chambre (1 lit double dans la chambre, 1 lit double dans le salon/cuisine et possibilité 1 lit double confortable par terre) + 1 salle de bain. Petit balcon. Cuisine fonctionnelle, machine à laver le linge, sèche linge et lave vaisselle. Appart extrêmement bien placé (à 1 rue de Darling Harbor et l'aquarium) à 1 rue d'une supérette et 3 rues des boutiques. Circular quai disponible facilement à pied. Les clés sont disponibles facilement et sans stress

Gavin's place is conveniently located near Darling Harbour and is a short walk to numerous places of interest. The house is furnished beautifully and he provided everything needed. Thank you for being a wonderful host Gavin.
Very good instructions apartment brilliant very central recommend it
Great location.  Clean apartment with all the extra things you need in the kitchen, bath, and laundry.  Nice stay.
Really enjoyed our stay. Great location in CBD, great place!

Gavin's instructions were clear and simple and he thought of everything we needed before even getting there. Communication from him was great and he was very helpful. 
The place was very well situated, amazingly close to the Darling Harbor for scenic and romantic walks, but also in great proximity to a lot of shopping. It fit our party of 6 very well and served as a great place to come back to after a full day of activity in Sydney. The room was well maintained and very clean. Internet & WiFi was fast and saw no issues with all six people connected to it at the same time. Gavin even had a couple board games in the room which added to a friendly touch. Some of us even had a chance to use the exercise room which was well equipped. 
Overall a great experience and highly recommended.
Great location and accomodation exactly as described. Would def use again.

My family of 5 had a wonderful time in Sydney.  Gavin's apartment was bright, spacious and had all of the amenities that we needed in a central Sydney location.  Gavin was responsive and accommodating to a couple queries that we had.  We would recommend this apartment to family and friends.
Excellenr position close to everything! Able to walk everywhere. Stayed with 5 others and the apartment wasn't crowded at all good use of space. Would stay again.

Gavin is a good host, he had recommended some restaurant to us and he allow us to have late check out as our flight is at night time. It is very good to us as no need carrying suitcase to shopping before we go airport. Also, the house was in a perfect location to Darling Harbour and easy access to all areas of CBD. We would recommend to to our friend.
Just steps from the Darling Harbour this is the perfect location to stay while visiting Sydney. This apartment was tidy clean and equipped with everything we could possibly need.

Windows Windows Windows !!   Beautiful Windows !!!  And fabulous location in the heart of the city.  Walking distance to everything.  Comfortable and well equipped apartment as advertised.  Extra blankets, pillows, towels,  shampoo, laundry detergent, even tea and coffee.   Enjoyed our stay and very happy with our choice.  This was the first time I had used Airbnb so I was nervous about it.  I shouldn't have worried.  Everything went smoothly.   Thanks Gavin ! 
Reviewed by Laura from Ohio, USA.
Directions how to get to the apartment were good and check-in was easy. Great location.

The Bad
The price that was advertised was inaccurate, please be careful when booking this apartment. The price looked cheap but under certain circumstances which was not told. For the same price you could stay at meriton apartments which is far better. Bathroom door would not close, which caused wet floors. Tv is smal. Address is different from advertised. 

The Good
Location, washing dryer, Internet, kitchen.
The host made us feel welcome by providing all the amenities of home, and the listing was exactly as described.  Beautiful view from the balcony... nice place!
Felt welcome n kids love the chocolate left behind. Big n clean apartment with plenty of extra linens n towels. Great CBD location with Darling Harbour right at the corner. Overall, happy stay.
Great location close to shops and public transport. Clean and  spacious for the two of us. Even had some basics in the cupboard which was very welcome. Easy to follow instructions and house rules.
Place was great. Awesome location in heart of city.

The apartment was beautiful! It was in an amazing location right in the center of things so it was easy to walk to many of the sights we wanted to visit. The train was also very close for when we needed it, and supermarkets and restaurants were easy to walk to. The door handle was loose which Gavin assured us he would fix. The apartment was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the kids loved the chocolates : )
Good place to stay!convenient & comfortable!Thanks Gavin

This was an exceptionally great central apartment within easy walking distance to all of the iconic Sydney landmarks. We had very good communication with our host Gavin who was very accommodating as he allowed us to leave our luggage at the appartment so as we could enjoy our last day without having to carry heavy baggage around with us. The apartment was to a high standard and very clean. We would highly recommend this appartment to anyone with children, groups or just couples as it will meet everyones needs. Thank you so much Gavin for your hospitality.
We enjoyed our stay in Gavin's appartement. Everything was fine. The appartement is best located for discovering the city, as the next trainstation is only a five minutes walk away.
Gavin has been really helpful during check in , and his apartment is fully equipped. We really enjoyed ourself during this trip.

The location is superb, the apartment is clean and has all u need for a short stay. We stayed for two nights and walked to all the touristic places.
Gavin is responding very fast and you can easily reach him. 
The oven was not working at the time of our stay.

Gavin's apartment is really well organised and certainly lacks nothing. The location is great too, very close to local amenities, good cafes and restaurant (I highly recommend next door Italian cafe, the food is superb and the staff are friendly too). Gavin's instruction is also very clear.
Awesome location. Lots of sleeping room. So close to everything in the city!
We had a fabulous stay and Gavin was extremely accommodating and made our visit extra easy for us. Thanks so much Gavin!

Great location and walking distance from all major attractions. Cute little apartment, sufficient for my family of 5. Had a great stay, comfy bedding and kitchen as well. Would definitely stay here again and recommend it to all family and friends too!!
We had a great time in Sydney and we can definitly say that Gavin's apartament contributed to make us feel as home. It is very comfortable place and it is very well located. Strongly recommended!

Our stay was awesome. The location is amazing. Literally a walk away to all the local tourist spots. Very close to the aquarium which we loved. The apartment was spacious, clean and packed with everything we could gave possibly need. Apartment manual had clear instructions that were very easy to follow. Gavin was quick to respond to any queries we had. It also had a great view of Syd buildings which we loved. Thanks again Gavin! Would definitely stay again and will recommend to friends & family.
Perfect location, clean modern apartment ... V happy! Would definitely stay again!

This apartment was so convenient and comfortable for our 3 night stay. Straight forward to access, with really clear instructions to follow. Incredibly handy to Darling Harbour and an easy walk tot he train station for travelling further a field. The pool was a welcome relief from the heat after long days exploring / shopping around Sydney. 
The space itself is much larger than other 1 bedroom apartments I have stayed in and was very comfortable. I would recommend this apartment to others heading to Sydney. I couldnt fault it!

What a great Sydney getaway in such a comfortable place! So clean, right in the heart of the city, and there was even a portacot for our little toddler, very unexpectedly! Check-in was easy and just like described in the manual, we'll put this one on our list if favorites! Great coffee shop right next door and lots of yummy take away place close by. A home away from home! Thanks for having us.
Just GREAT!~
Great stay! Sam kindly allowed us to check out a few hours later which was very lovely. Sam was always prompt and friendly with communication. We would stay here again!

Great location, roomy apartment and decent amenities. Disappointing that the apartment wasn't clean - bed linen was clean, but the carpets and tops of surfaces weren't clean (dead bugs, crumbs, hair, fluff, threads etc) and there are a few maintenance items that need to be addressed. 
Overall, once I cleaned the apartment myself, we had a great stay and the price was very reasonable.

The location is very central with public transport and places of interest at walking distance.
The apartment itself is very comfortable for 4 people with large living space.

Sam was a great host - although we did not meet in person, he (and Gavin) left clear instructions on how to get in/out, and was able to help me with my need for parking as well. Very responsive to all messages, which was much appreciated!

The apartment was quite spacious and had lots of room for my group of 5 adults. The sofa was SO comfortable, that we didn't bother with the spare mattress provided for the 5th person. Great location, very clean, lots of towels, bedding, utensils, hangers, etc.. Would definitely stay again.
Great stay.  Apartment is very central to everything, clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
Great location.  Easy access.
步行就可以到达歌剧院,在阳台就可以看见悉尼塔,步行10分钟就能到达购物中心,非常便利!

This place is smack bang in the CBD of Sydney. A very easy stroll to Darling Harbour. Secure building with great amenities. Previous guests have complained about the noise. Yes it is noisy, but refer to my first point. You are in the heart of Sydney, so go hard or go home. Sam and Gavin were a pleasure to deal with. Fantastic communication. This is our first Airbnb experience. We will certainly stay again here.

My sister and 2 nieces spent 4 nights here. Great location and not too far from
transport. Easy to find. Recommend and would stay again
Sam's place is close to public transport and Sam was very quick to reply to any questions. The place was clean and cosy.

We were delighted to have booked this centrally located apartment hosted by Sam and Gavin. They have been most helpful during our trip allowing us to check in the apartment earlier than the usual check in time, as our flight arrived at 11:30 am. The apartment is walking distance to most tourist spots and restaurants which saves us a lot of trouble having to travel around during this period. It was disappointing to find several items not working in the apartment during our stay, though we know that Sam & Gavin were not able to help as it was Christmas period :( the Aircon broke down on first night; tap in the basin was flowing continuously hence we had to turn on n off the mains each time we use; freezer in fridge was not working either. However, cos it was Xmas period, there was no handyman working :( 

Sam & Gavin were helpful to allow us to check out at 11 am instead, as we rushed to do our last errands. Thanks! 

What we loved:
- location location location! What more can you ask for, than an apartment 8 min from Darling Harbour and Townhall? :) 
- strong wifi in the apartment 
- plenty of extra towels and extra bed available 
- shampoo and body wash provided 
- fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast TV!
- Fully equipped Gym and a lap pool in the building.

What we didn't 
- Aircon broke down on first night :( 
- there's only a fan in the living room, no aircon in bedroom
- the tap that flows continuously and having the trouble to turn on n off the mains. :(
- the fridge that couldn't make ice. 

We know that all these issues would have been fixed by now, so there wouldn't be much issues for future tenants :)

My family of 6 stayed recently for 4 nights leading towards the new year. Sam was very friendly and his responses to fixing issues we had were prompt - very easy to talk to. The fridge was replaced with a new one and works very well! The aircon in the living room and bedroom was a huge plus! We stayed very comfortably :) Thank you!
No comment

Sam's place was very nice and convienent. It was clean and spacious, comfortablly seeping a group of 4. It is central to most of the city and close to public transport for other places you may want to go. Sam was also very accommodating in helping us store luggage after check out since our flight wasn't until late!
Very central and conveniently located. Close to shops, cafes, short walking distance to Darling Harbour.

Everything was as advertised. We were able to sleep 5 people comfortably in the apartment. The location is very central, being a 10-15 minute walk to Darling Harbour and about 20 minutes to Circular Quay. The host was very helpful and responded to any queries quickly. He was also able to help with weekend parking. Would recommend and would stay again

The location is very good.Just only a few minutes to go to anywhere you want.For instance, Daring Harbor ,Coles,shopping (Website hidden by Airbnb) night, it will be a good place to enjoy a part of Sydney's skyline.highly recommend!

This house is very good! Located in the bustling downtown area of Sydney, it takes only more than and 10 minutes to walk to every scenic spot! As long as the balcony can see the Sydney tower. Kitchen utensils are complete, we cook their own meals every day.
Bien situé et bien équipé, cet appart est idéal pour quelques nuits au cœur de Sydney.
Fantastic location!

PERFECT place for us!!!  Easily walked everywhere we wanted to go, easy to get in and out of building -- great wheelchair accessibility -- that's in perfect location!  Comfort.  Relaxing.  Affordable for area -- loved that
Goooood

Large apartment in Central Sydney with full kitchen, washing machine, dryer and separate main bedroom with a fan and air con unit. Only thing missing was a large umbrella which we had to buy due to some heavy downpours so we left it for use of other guests! Although we didn't meet Gavin he was quick to respond to all emails and very helpful.
Great location, easy walk to habour, very central.
Sam's place is huge!  Everything is thought of for his visitors.  The location is brilliant.  Close to train stations, buses, great bars and a quick walk to George Street.  Sam is a perfect host.
住宿地點超棒,只要靠雙腳就能在短時間內走到各大景點,交通也便利

This was a dirty place to stay the bed sheets were stained the pillows, sheets and towels stunk. The host rudely asks you to clean your own towels on the way out even though you have to check out by 10 a.m so you spend the morning washing and drying your own linen which was dirty and smelly to start with. We left or luggage in the room and went back to collect it and used the toilet, and even though we cleaned our own towels, paid a cleaning fee and had to buy glen 20 to get the stench off the pillows and bed clothes the host charged another $20 for using the toilet.  We are all different ages ranging from 18 to 70 and none of us recommend this dirty horrible place to stay. Sydney is beautiful and we had a great time but DO NOT stay here.  Not sure why there are views of the harbor on the airbnb site either as  there are no views from this unit!!!  I host airbnb myself and it takes a lot for me to write a bad review for anything especially airbnb! WE DO NOT RECOMMEND!

Even though I didn't get to meet Sam, our stay went really well. He was very organised, and his place was by far the best one my family stayed in while they're here in Aus. I love that this place is close to everything (bus stops, train stations, shops, restaurants, places to see), yet it's quiet and not too busy.  It was a comfortable place for my family to stay in, allowed us to rest well after a day of going around the city.  It is definitely a perfect place for a family travelling to Sydney.

Appartement bien situé proche de Wynyard station et à cinq min à pied de Darling Harbour. Le logement est très propre et fonctionnel avec une belle vue sur la ville. Nous avons apprécié la piscine pour se relaxer et le calme de la résidence. Nous recommandons.
Helpful host as they lend us their storage for us to put our luggage after check up. Much appreciated!
Location was great and Sam was really good with communication. We were busy enjoying Sydney and this was an easy place to stay!
Great location with many attractions within a walkable distance. Well organised and responsive host.

All good. Great location... so close to Darling Harbour. We walked everywhere from the apartment to Circular Quay, Botanic Garden etc. Nice and quiet at night given the central location. Easy to check in - the instructions and lock box were ideal. Facilities all good and beds super comfy. All in all a great base for us to explore Sydney. Just the right size for two couples on a budget. Thanks for a great stay :-)
Great location, great host!

The apartment is located in the heart of Sydney and importantly near to many attractions. 
We find that the apartment is suitable for a group of 6, and with sufficient necessities provided by the host. 
The process for check-in and check-out is easy with the detailed instructions provided by the host.
Had a nice stay!
This place is walkable to so many things to see in Sydney. This location helped make our trip so memorable. The building was easy to use and Sam was great to work with.

Great stay, was just a bit chilly in the main bedroom due to the fact that the window remains permanently open and there is a strong draft that fills the room very quickly. Did not want to leave the small heater on all night to compensate for that.
Regardless, was a nice place.

Nice place. Great host. Best location.
Highly recommended.

This place was in the perfect location - just steps from the Darling Harbor.  We enjoyed it very much.  Security at the building was a bonus and made us feel very comfortable.  Place is as described.  Thanks for having us!

Apartment shown is exactly as it turned out to be, modern and clean, the location was great and close to the cbd mall, QVB, Galleries, Town Hall stn etc. There was some traffic noise at night from cars below but that is to be expected living so central in a busy area. One downside was the hot water in the shower wasn't hot enough and the next person to shower didn't get much hot/warm water.

it is a very nice place to stay if you are looking for a strategic location, only 5min walks to Queen Victoria Building and 7min walks to Westfield/ Sydney Tower and of course the supermarkets are nearby. The place is really nice and comfortable and also very clean! Overall, it was really great!
Sam's place is great. Close to everything and had all we needed. Appreciated how Sam responded quickly. Highly recommended
The location made it a perfect base to explore the city from. Communication with the owners was great throughout the booking process. Self check-in was easy. We would happily stay here again.
Really well located in CBD, close to everything we wanted to see and do and easy flexible arrangements for arrival and departure.
Excellent location with an easy walk to the restaurants and attractions of darling harbour or the CDB. Perfect for a stay in Sydney.
Fabulous large apartment in a great area central to everything.  Lovely comfortable beds and all you could need in an apartment.
The location was nice and Sam allowed us to leave our luggages before checking in , it gives us more time to stroll around .

This apartment is in a great location in Sydney and has all the conveniences of home.  We were able to walk to either Darling Harbor, Wynard Station or the QVB building quite easily.  We enjoyed our time and having a great place to stay made it that much better.  Karen
位置非常不错,如果住在City里,是个不错的选择!
Sam's place was wonderful for a getaway. A beautiful apartment in a perfect location. A great space, very clean and Sam as a host was very accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!

Great location for exploring Sydney but the apartment could use a little TLC to make your stay a little more comfortable. Host instructions were excellent and when we had to change the date of the booking it was made very easy, thanks

The apartment was exactly as advertised. I was travelling with 2 adults and 3 kids and we stayed comfortably at Sam's place for 5 days. The location was great, 5 to 15 mins walks to Darling Harbour, nearest Coles supermarket, Wynyard train station, Chinatown, Paddy's market and others. There's Nandos just opposite the street. Sam was very responsive to all queries and was very kind to allowed early check in and late check out as well. We would definitely recommend Sam's apartment for travellers with kids.
位置不錯!離達令港､雪梨塔相當近!
Had a great stay at Sam's...excellent location, check in and out was pain free...was very comfortable and would happily stay there again.
A comfortable and convenient apartment. We enjoyed our stay here.
Central Location ,decent facilities ,good place for people looking for a place close to city
Fantastic little apartment with easy access to Darling Harbor and surrounding areas. Will definitely be using this place again in the future.
Best location for Sydney city trip. Great place for family travellers. Strongly recommend Sam's apartment to everyone.

Appartement parfaitement situé, à deux pas de Darling Harbour, quartier en pleine expansion avec beaucoup d’activités. Le cœur de la ville est accessible en 10 min à pied. L’appartement est spacieux et très confortable, très bien équipé. Tous les petits tracas ont été prévu : exemple, le 2 e jour une ampoule a grillé : il y avait dans un placard tout un stock pour en changer facilement. 
L’hote réponds rapidement, avec beaucoup de gentillesse.
Je conseille cet appartement pour découvrir Sydney sans avoir de véhicule
Great location. Everything you need in the city centre

emplacement parfait au coeur de Sydney
appartement spacieux
piscine commune accessible
lave vaisselle et lave linge avec des tablettes lave vaisselle et de la lessive à disposition
peu d'eau chaude pour la douche
Sam a répondu rapidement à nos mails durant le séjour

My family stayed at Sam's place for five nights and we were extremely happy with the location as it is close to the train stations as well as the CBD. There was pretty much everything you could need (utensils, cookware, etc.) and as a family of five adults we were quite comfortable staying here.

Absolutely great location, about a 5min walk from Darling harbour and a quick walk from train stations. The apartment was very clean & spacious, easily fitting a whole family! The amenities and facilities were really great, everything you need to make meals etc. Communication with host was easy and quick. Overall a convenient apartment in such an awesome location, we highly recommend.

The flat location is good in central Sydney and convenient for walking. The flat facilities are basically in ok condition, but more care needs to be taken over plumbing in the bathroom sink and muffling of noise from the street outside, as the bedroom windows look upon the street and one of the windows' latch handles was missing, so it could not be closed (this meant more noise but also a lot of the summer heat entering the flat).
Excellent i would say!!!!! Easy to get around. Nice and clean apartment. Very lovely place and host .

Fantastic location and so close to all the things we wanted to do in Sydney. Very easy getting the keys. Plentry of towels and linen and having the extra queen bed to put on the floor was fantastic seeing my boys don’t like sharing a bed. Plenty of room to just sit and chill after long days sightseeing. Lifts are quick and the floor is quiet. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks heaps.

Great sized apartment for central Sydney and well situated whether you are in the city for business or leisure.
Communication with the owner was timely and effective and check in / check it was no hassle which is always appreciated.
Central location, large apartment, would particularly suit a family or group of people.
Great central location, close to everything.  The place had everything you needed, may need a little revamp , but definitely will go back.
Good memories of Sydney couse by Sam'house.

Everything was good; great location so we could visit lot of things walking.

highly recommended
Great place and nice and clean

Amazing location and super easy check in. Very close to train station and Darling Harbour. 
Apartment is looking tired (old curtains etc) but was fine for us.

El departamento está muy bien ubicado a pocas cuadras de la torre de Sydney muy cerca de la Pitt st y de la Elizabeth st, cerca del Martin Place y de Hyde Park. muy lindo todo el departamento cómodo eramos 5 muchos toallnoes y sabanas, platos, tazas todo muy bien.

Sam‘s place was very close to the CBD, all the famous place, like Darling Harbour ,Sydney Opera House, 5 or 15 minuets can be arrived by walking. And Sam was a very nice host, all the things was very clean. Thanks very much, it’s a very nice traveling in Sydney.

It absolutely is a good accommodation in Sydney. The house is large and the facilities in house is complete. However, the shower water is too cold. Maybe it will be better if it has a calorifier. Anyways, the house is in the city centre and house price is quite cheap. It is high performance cost ratio.

The Ad makes it very clear what you get. Plenty of clean towels and bedding. We had 6 people sleep across 3 double mattresses and we had enough space. Kitchen and bathroom clean and well stocked. 3 fans and two air conditioners was great to have. Washing machine and dryer came in handy and the balcony was lovely :) only downside was hot water in showers was a bit hit and miss. 

Overall great value for money
Central, roomy apartment ideal for a city stay. Comfortable and clean. A seamless check-in experience too. Sam was a great host.
We loved the llocation and there was enough room to spread out - which was nice - we were really disappointed with not being able to have nice hot showers.

Nice place. Very convenient location for working in the CBD. It got a little warm at night but there are fans in the apartment that help. Beds were decent. Shower took a while to warm up. Check-in was super easy with a lockbox, which we appreciated. We'd definitely consider coming back if we're ever in Sydney again!

Positives: Well equipped large flat in a very central location
Negatives: Noisy and a bit run down

A great spacious, clean apartment in a fantastic location.
The pool and gym were a huge hit for my family.
Sam was a great host with very detailed information and communication during our stay.
Thank you.

Fantastic location with a very easy and smooth check in. So many great coffee shops close by and just minutes walk from Darling Harbour and the ICC. Great room for a short term stay as it is very basic. There were three of us over five nights and it suited fine, a little bit cramped but it was good for what we needed.
Great place, super central, everything just about 100 m away ! Also very Nice furniture etc.

Stayed here for a few nights in Sydney. Convenient to Darling Harbour, and walked everywhere else. Check in, although a little unusual, was easy. It was my mother’s first stay at an Airbnb and she enjoyed it!

시티중심에 있고 비비드 축제로 너무 즐거웠어~
다음에 또 방문하고 싶어요~^^

Sam’s apartment is much much better in real life than in the pictures. I even think it is newly renovated. Location was great and it is very convenient. We had a comfortable stay as well!! Would definitely recommend the place to everyone and stay again if ever we go back to Sydney. :)

Very spacious - our family of four with two grown up kids really stretched out. The apartment was nice and clean, with good amenities, and at the fourteenth floor, we had gorgeous views. The location was truly awesome as well - we could walk to most of the local attractions. The apartment was a bit pricey, but well worth the money. We would stay there again!
Awesome location great apartment
Location was perfect for me. Clean room, nice view. A little noise (Saturday night, expected) but didn’t lose any sleep. Would stay again!
Great location for our short stay in Sydney at a very reasonable price! Apartment had plenty of space and was clean, lots of extra blankets and pillows

great place to stay. 
location is awesome. place is clean and very accessible. will definitely stay again

Sam's place is as expected from his post. The best thing about renting his place is the proximity to darling harbor, CBD, Westfield mall and a whole bunch of food options which will fit your bill. Even though there were a couple of things like an uncomfortable bed and what seemed like a non operational gas oven, we might rent again just because of all the other positives. Thank you Sam again for offering your space to our family.
We booked at 10Pm the night before and we were able to checkin the next day with no issues. Awesome location. Will stay here again!
Awesome place
Large apartment in a perfect location right in the CBD
Location & price is excellent. Perfect for a family on holiday in the heart of Sydney!
Good location
Great place right in the heart of the city, including a beautiful view. The apartment is spacious and has plenty of room for lounging and for sleeping, ideal for groups.
Great location to Darling Harbour and public transport. Very comfortable beds, spacious apartment.

The location for this listing was a godsend - it’s right smack in the middle of pretty much every iconic spot to visit in Sydney - so walking is always doable and Uber rides are short. The apartment itself is in great condition and comfortable and clean to live in. Sam is also a very responsive host and gets back with info fast.

This is our second time using an Airbnb venue.
The first was a brilliant experience and we were keen to try again. 
Unfortunately not so good the second time around.
The property read really well so we went ahead and booked. 
Location is great and we understand you pay a premium price for this.
The positives were that the beds weren’t the worst we have ever slept in.
The apartment is tired generally but as stated by the owner it’s someone’s home so we shouldn’t be too harsh. We do think though that when renting out for significant amounts then the basics of cleanliness and equipment that is not held together with masking tape should be standard.
Thanks anyway but perhaps we will stick to hotels in future so we don’t have to do the washing etc.
Sam and Janelle’s place was in a great location. All necessary amenities were provided. Sam and Janelle responded to all questions in a timely fashion and made themselves available for all questions.
Super endroit pour passer quelques jours a Sydney, proche de tout, appartement agreable et très fonctionnel. propriétaire a l écoute et réactif!! recommandé vivement.
This is a beautiful place in a great location. The views are amazing and the balcony was wonderful to sit on. It was convenient to everything we wanted to see!
Great location.  Plenty of places for breakfast locally.  Spacious and clean.  Thanks for having us.

You will never get a reply on time from the host.!!
He is very laid back in replying to messages and unresponsive to any problems you face.
He will always find a way to avoid answering you to your problems by replying irrelevant answers.!!

Sam’s apartment is a tidy and comfortable place which is just a few steps from the shopping centers and other landmarks. 2 queen beds and a mattress are ample for 6 (or more) persons. Whatever you expect about a nice and affordable place to stay in the middle of crowded Sydney, you can find it here. The hosts were very friendly and helpful as well. Definitely would come again in the future.
Great convenient location, close to everything
We stayed here for 6 nights during the Christmas period and had an amazing time. The apartment is very central and the view from the balcony overlooking the city is incredible.

The apartment was really nice, and the location was even better! It was clean, and there was all the essentials like soap, towels and sheets. The check in was easy and quick. We enjoyed our stay and can recommend it to others!
Très bonne situation, au coeur de tout. Comme à la maison, confort des literies. Un peu bruyant la nuit  ( bruit de la rue).

wasnt expecting that tbh it was my first experience in sydney and i wasnt happy coz once i get in the place was smelly and dusty.. i tocuhed curtains it seems like they havent cleaned them for ages.. really unexpected the room aircon which was lrovided by the host wasnt working.. personally wouldnt stay at this place ever.. 

plus point only is its close to darling harbour
very central close to  Everthing  specially public  transports ,  restaurants ,bars . shopping centres ,opera hpuse .very clean ,  I highly recommended.
gooood

Nice comfy place in the middle of the city. Close to Darling Harbour, and close to 2 train stations. Many good eating place just downstairs or next door, including several Asian food places. Or you can cook too as there are utensils for cooking, including a rice cooker. It's nice to be able to 'go home'and rest a little bit before going out to explore the city again. Friendly and fast responding host.

Sam needs to sharpen up and do some renovations and replace or repair his Ac. Ear plugs are a necessity especially, with the constant construction noise across to road, if you are to expect a good nights sleep.
Had a pleasant stay at Sam and Janelle's apartment
Nice location

name: Private Bedroom

We have a Ferret! ;)  I've decided that my space will be great for more Airbnb stories! Love to cook and interact with others, and learn about different cultures. The kitchen is fully equipped with all appliances at your disposal.  -->(There's one shared bathroom in our home). Very clean and tidy! :)  The utilities are included. (Internet (wi-fi), gas, electricity), heat, Air conditioner, Backyard (Spring & Summer).
interaction: I work mostly at nights as babysitter.  During the day, I work with fermented foods and drinks at Fermenting to Heal. (Kombucha, Water Kefir, Milk Kefir, Sauerkraut, Sourdough, Kimchi, Tempeh, Scoby fruit loops, Scoby soaps, and more. :) I spend some hours at home almost every other day to check, clean and arrange what needs. Weekends interacting with the guests, cooking and learning more about other cultures.
house_rules: I WANT THE NEW MEMBER OF THIS BIG FAMILY FEEL VERY WELCOME IN OUR HOME. (GUESTS MAKES LIGHT CLEANING, TAKING CARE OF THEY OWN AND TAKING CARE FOR ALL THINGS PROPERLY AND WELL).  Rooms, kitchen and bathroom: Take care of your own. Make bed. Trash removal. Wash own sheets and towels if staying long term. But I also do guest sheets and blankets laundry when I'm expecting new guests. Sweep the floor after drop something. EVERYTHING HAVE TO BE ALWAYS AT THE SAME PLACE! :) Bathroom: Clean up the bathroom sink and drain after use and after shave or comb hair, make sure there's dry and clean sink and floors.   Hang the bathroom floor towels to dry after use!Papers ONLY in the garbage can.  Kitchen: Wash dishes and utensils RIGHT AFTER USE. Keep your own stuff in the cabinets not on the sink or counter. Clean the sink and stove after use and after dishes are dry please put it away to leave everything organized. Do not cook after 9pm and not before 8:30am. Others doesn't like to sleep with smell

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I’m Claudia, Brazilian and mother of 2 boys, Thierry 20 and Kevin 16 years old.

reviews.comments:
This room has enough space , luminosity , view gives to the backyard . Apartment with space , an open kitchen, utilities furnished so you can easily use it to cook, it's very CLEAN, She comes every week, bathroom correct and very calm place . People are most of us Brazilian and Portuguese . Safe place , and you have all you need near you : supermarket , laundry , pharmacy, restaurant, bus / Subway .... Such a good place to be and correct price ! 

Cette chambre est de taille moyenne ET suffisante , lumineuse elle donne vue sur le jardin extérieur , un placard pour entreposer ses affaires . Une cuisine ouverte tout équipée vous permet de cuisiner aussi facilement que chez vous. Endroit PROPRE , la propriétaire vient toutes les semaines S assurer de la propreté de l appartement ET fait le menage si besoin ! Les voisins sont pratiquement tous Brésiliens et portugais, ç est un endroit très calme , transport à proximité , supermarché , laverie restauration rapide ect ... un endroit agréable où passer ses vacances ou plus à un prix raisonnable !

Claudia's house is amazing, really clean And she Goes there to check if eveything is ok, she is helpful and if she bought every supply that the house need, I strong recommend this place, and the best thing that is walking distance to the trains and you will never have problems in the neighborhood, and I came back at 3 am a lot of times ;)
A nice and affordable place to stay
Nice person! An apartment is clean, good location.

Our stay at Claudia's was amazing the room was very neat and tidy. The kitchen was easy to access and also extremely tidy as well as the bathroom. Also, there were many places to store our stuff during our stay. She accepted us even though we booked super last minute she and her sons are very sweet. We were close to public transportation and even a mall that made it extremely easy to get around :) We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely love to stay there in the future!

Claudia, her kids and the other roommates are amazing! The house is very cozy. Always super clean and very organized! I'm very glad to choose "Our home"- That's how we feel and Claudia makes you feel like it is your own home for sure! Thank you very much for everything!

We had a great night at Claudia's home. The room is ideally situated in Corona, Queens and close to local shops, bars and restaurants. Claudia made us feel at home, nothing was a problem and she was really helpful in suggestions on what to see and do. Claudia was an excellent host to my wife and me. The bedroom and the apartment was very clean and tidy. Her home is very nice and we had a very good time staying at her place. We had access to the kitchen and she had provided us with all the basic needs like tea, coffee etc. Communication with Claudia was smooth and she gave us all the flexibility we needed. It was a pleasure staying at her apartment and we would highly recommend her as a host.

Overall Claudia is a great host she constantly cleaned the sheets, constantly checked on me and gave great directions. The location is somewhat near the subway station, would walk during the day to and from subway station but not a night.  The size of the room is nice and the home is clean, the pet never made noise and was super chill. The shower was clean and the bathroom was spacious.

Claudia is awesome! Always answers quick on text and nice. I'm a pretty quiet person that leaves early for work and stays out a lot or tends to study a lot. I never felt like it was too loud or busy for that. She keeps the place pretty clean too and there is a lot of storage in the room if needed.

It was a nice, simple, comfortable room to stay in very close to the airport. My flight landed at 11pm and I needed a place to sleep before taking a train to New Jersey the next morning. I arrived at midnight, and Claudia was completely helpful and accommodating. She gave me a towel, yummy-smelling soap, and a cold water bottle. She helped me with directions the next day and her son walked me to the bus stop. Even after I left, she texted me to help with directions. The room was well priced and the hospitality was lovely.
It was a pretty good, I liked it, very clean and quiet .

Claudia was such a wonderful host! The place was very tidy and everything was as promised in the pictures and description. I felt very welcome upon arrival and throughout my stay. She answered any questions I had promptly. I'm so grateful that I found this place during my hectic time looking for an apartment and starting clinical training. It can be overwhelming getting settled in Queens if you're new to NYC, and having a quiet, comfortable place to stay and a great host really help with the transition.
Beautiful home and lovely host.

Very clean and cozy home. We did stay there for 7 nights and we would come back any time. The next subway station was about a mile away, which was a little exhausting at the beginning, but we got used to it quite quick. Claudia was a very helpfull and friendly host, who took care about everything.  A washing center and a little grocery store were across the street - very useful for backpackers... Thanks a lot, n see u next time

I Thoroughly Enjoyed My Stay at Claudia's. It Was Very Clean, Quiet & Comfortable. Her Son Thierry Was An Awesome Co Host Making Sure You Knew of All The Best Places (many within walking distance) To Eat & Best Routes To Public Transportation. Overall Affordable, Comfortable Bed, Cool Neighborhood & Good People..I'd Stay Again Without Hesitation!
Claudia's place was amazing! The bed was super comfortable and overall the house had a nice ambience. If I'm in town again I will definitely contact her for a nice place to stay!
Claudia was very accommodating and helpful. She was quick to respond to our messages. She was also very flexible. The room as clean and very comfortable. Overall we had a very nice experience.
She took off work to walk us down to the US Open. She was extremely nice & accomodating.

Just stayed one night at Claudia's place, flying in to NYC from Silicon Valley transitioning to our new home. She allowed us to check in after 11pm from a late flight and her son showed us around when we arrived. Room was very clean and has a/c; bathroom is shared (also clean).  Didn't meet Claudia, but very good/fast communication via messaging!

Claudia was an amazing host. She is very welcoming and ensures that you feel at home in a flash. The room was very clean, the bed was big and comfy, the closet provided ample storage space, and the A/C inside was the perfect touch. This place was fantastic for my stay in NYC!

Claudia's place was great. I was staying at a bunch of different Airbnbs at the time in the area and hers was definitely my favorite. Lots of accommodations and a very comfortable bed. As she states in her description, there are a lot of people sharing one bathroom so just make sure you wake up early in case someone else is showering. Thanks Claudia!
Claudia is very Nice
Claudia is very accomodating. The place is very clean and the private room was excellent.  Reccomended!
My son and I stayed at Claudia's place, and it was as described.  Claudia is very nice and concerned about her guests.  The room was really comfortable, and it was great to stay there.

I stayed at Claudia's place two days before and also planned to stay on my last day in NYC.  The first experience was fine and Claudia and her sons were very nice.  This time it didn't turn out well because I couldn't find a parking spot at her place.  I spent at least an hour looking in the neighborhood.  I left a couple of times and came back and still couldn't find anything.  I contacted the host, and she said this never happens.  After that, I decided to go to my son's place a few miles away, but he only has a single bed. Claudia did say I could come back and try again in a driveway if it was available, but I had to leave for the airport early the next morning and didn't have time or the desire to drive back.  After a couple hours, I realized it wasn't working out at my son's, so I left at 1 am and eventually stayed the night at Laguardia airport but didn't sleep.  The next morning Claudia said her son found parking spots the night before, and she did  "I rent rooms and not parking space."  Claudia would not give me a refund, but Airbnb approved one.

Claudia is very nice and helpful person, ready to provide you with any stuff and good advice. The place is also nice, comfortable and cozy - all is absolutely as you see on the photos! I'm very satisfied with the stay here! ☺

This was my first AirBNB experience and it was not good at all. Upon my arrival (around 11:40 pm) my bedroom was not available to me (there was a guy sleeping there) and the host was unreachable to help me out. Only solution was to find myself an expesive last minute hotel room and leave the place. An unexpected ferret cage in the apt was also an unpleasant surprise.
I enjoyed the stay at claudia's. She was easy to get in contact with no matter the time. Her son was also very helpful.

Do stay here !!!! Claudia was so genuine and nice. As was her son Terry... the bed was perfect as was the rest of their home!!! She made everything easy with a great vibe.. wonderful neighborhood markets and restaurants and culture... i loved it!!!!  travel was also easy to navigate.. I would definitely stay at their home again... Thank you Claudia and Terry !!!!!! :)

Claudia was very accommodating to my last minute reservation, replying promptly to all of my messages. I was so grateful that she allows pets. We received a warm welcome by her son, Thierry, who was so friendly and laid back. The room--and apt--was clean and tastefully decorated. Parking is a bit tricky, but I would highly recommend staying with Claudia in her quiet neighborhood.
Gran persona, mucho apoyo departe de ella
Claudia and her sons were very nice and accommodating. I recommend their place if you're looking for an affordable and warm place to stay near the city. I'm glad I stayed at her place. :)
Claudia was very responsive communication wise and we were able to work out an issue with checking in. Overall good place to stay.

name: Beachside apt in North Bondi
summary: Perfect place for a couple and / or with two kids - just like us! Cafe doors open up the living / dining rooms on to a north east facing garden making for the perfect sunny mornings. Cross the street and Bondi Beach is all yours.
space: The apartment has one master bed room with a California King. Timber louvres can be opened to get a view of the garden and the morning sun. Living and dining are side by side and positioned to maximise the morning sun from the garden. The kitchen and bathroom (bath and shower) are compact but functional. A second bedroom is perfect for kids with two bunks. There is also an external laundry.   A 2 minute walk gets you to glorious Bondi Beach. Either head to the end of the point and jump in or walk to the sand. We've lived here for 15+ years and will never leave!!
description: Perfect place for a couple and / or with two kids - just like us! Cafe doors open up the living / dining rooms on to a north east facing garden making for the perfect sunny mornings. Cross the street and Bondi Beach is all yours. The apartment has one master bed room with a California King. Timber louvres can be opened to get a view of the garden and the morning sun. Living and dining are side by side and positioned to maximise the morning sun from the garden. The kitchen and bathroom (bath and shower) are compact but functional. A second bedroom is perfect for kids with two bunks. There is also an external laundry.   A 2 minute walk gets you to glorious Bondi Beach. Either head to the end of the point and jump in or walk to the sand. We've lived here for 15+ years and will never leave!! It's all yours! We will be available during your trip if you need anything! Ben Buckler point is a special part of Bondi situated at the northern end. My wife and I have lived here for 15+ years and ar
neighborhood_overview: Ben Buckler point is a special part of Bondi situated at the northern end. My wife and I have lived here for 15+ years and are now raising our two kids.
