La cocina está completa para cocinar, con vajilla, hay cafetera, tostadora, toallas de cocina, manteles, hay agua caliente, hay ventiladores de techo en ambos ambientes y aire acondicionado, tiene placares grandes, y teníamos sabanas limpias y varias toallas. El baño tenía jabón, pasta dental y papel higiénico. Había sombrillas y sillas para playa, además de una tabla de barrenar de la que mis hijos hicieron muy buen uso! Y un tv con cable pero no lo utilizamos.
El complejo tiene además un sauna, un gimnasio pequeño y duchas exteriores para sacarse la arena de la playa. Además un lavadero para lavar ropa a mano y colgarla. Juegos para niños y una cancha de fútbol.
Saliendo del condominio, que tiene seguridad las 24hs. y cruzando la calle está la playa que es bellísima, tranquila de día y con olas por la tarde.
El hotel Sheraton muy cerquita, hay bares y restó, cajero, kioscos, y hay un sector que tiene farmacia, mercado, panadería y comida lista para llevar o consumir ahí mismo, todo ello a 2 /3 cuadras. Respecto al transporte hay taxis a cada instante y pasan líneas de colectivos. El lugar y la ubicación son ideales para una disfrutar una excelente estadía en esa linda ciudad. Muy agradecidos! Hasta la vuelta!

Uma vila em plena Barra da Tijuca!
Localizado a uns 300m da praia por conta da distância da portaria do Condomínio até o apto mas é só atravessar a Av Lúcio Costa!

Local seguro e silencioso, com tudo o que precisarem de utensílios.

Não é muito espaçoso porém acomoda bem um casal e 1 filho.

Única sugestão seria um ar condicionado split pois o de parede é muito barulhento; no mais, PERFEITO!!

Erika was a great and attentive host. The check-in was flexible and she was able to accommodate my very late booking. Her parents greeted me at the apartment and were lovely and helpful. Erika was always available and communicative. The apartment complex is like a little village of friendly neighbors, the doormen were incredibly helpful and the location was a few minutes walking distance from the beach. I stayed here for a conference at Windsor Barra and it proved to be a godsend booking!

Apartamento era bem próximo do congresso que eu fui, condomínio de frente pra praia, porteiros gente boa. Condomínio tranquilo, apartamento confortável. E a comunicação ótima. Sem falar no seu Waldir, super gente boa.

Erika is very communicative, hospitable and kind person. I had a great communication with her all the trip. The place is at great location: near to the ocean and hotels, close to the public transport, restaurants and the shopping downtown. The place has sauna, gym, playground for the kids, public living room. The neighbours are very kind and polite. Except all of that, the doorkeeper watches the entrance all the time so you don’t need to worry about security or thieves. The place has everything you would expect and I have no complaints about it. Erika, once again, thank you
Casa pequena e confortável num condomínio muito seguro e aconchegante na Barra, de frente à praia. Ótima localização e hospitalidade.

name: Amazing 1bd in the heart of NYC!!!
summary: Enjoy NYC while staying in one of the most popular neighborhoods. You can have the chance of living in the heart of NYC on the famous Strivers row. Located near the A,B,C,D,2 & 3 trains which simply means you can get everywhere with ease. Don't wait!
space: Our lovely 1 bdr home is cozy, yet very comfortable. We have high ceilings, a decorative fireplace,  and large windows in the living room and bedroom which make our apartment bright and lovely during all times of the day!  There is a queen sized bed in the bedroom (no frame) along with a lovely toddler bed. The living room is furnished with ample seating for guests on two comfortable sofas, a unique and beautiful glass top coffee table, and a classic and modern glass top dining table. The kitchen is small but functional, and the bathroom is small but fully functional with a bathtub and shower. The building is quiet and lovely on a historic landmarked block called Strivers' Row. We love coming home at the end of the day, and we are sure you will enjoy our home as well--especially at this unbeatable price!!
description: Enjoy NYC while staying in one of the most popular neighborhoods. You can have the chance of living in the heart of NYC on the famous Strivers row. Located near the A,B,C,D,2 & 3 trains which simply means you can get everywhere with ease. Don't wait! Our lovely 1 bdr home is cozy, yet very comfortable. We have high ceilings, a decorative fireplace,  and large windows in the living room and bedroom which make our apartment bright and lovely during all times of the day!  There is a queen sized bed in the bedroom (no frame) along with a lovely toddler bed. The living room is furnished with ample seating for guests on two comfortable sofas, a unique and beautiful glass top coffee table, and a classic and modern glass top dining table. The kitchen is small but functional, and the bathroom is small but fully functional with a bathtub and shower. The building is quiet and lovely on a historic landmarked block called Strivers' Row. We love coming home at the end of the day, and we are sure you
neighborhood_overview: We have absolutely fallen in love with this lovely area in central Harlem.  Enjoy famous Harlem restaurants & attractions within walking distance: *Red Rooster *Chez Lucienne *Corner Social *Famous Shrine Lounge *World famous Apollo Theatre *Sylvia's soul food restaurant **And many many more restaurants that are part of the Harlem food renaissance! *City College *Columbia University *St. Nicholas Park
transit: Right near the B,C trains and one stop away from the express A and D trains!  Be in times square in 3 express stops!
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment!
interaction: We will be available to assist you whenever you'd like!
house_rules: Welcome to our home! No smoking or partying behaviors allowed.

host.host_about: My name is Gary Peters and I am a Real Estate Professional in Los Angeles!! I love to travel and meet new people!

name: Modern New Duplex with Private Yard
summary: Large Apartment in Williamsburg great accommodations.  Going on Vacation from August 11-29 Willing to negotiate price for anyone looking to book for the entire stay :) Happy Hunting .
space: Modern Duplex in Williamsburg across from park 2 blocks from train. Large outdoor space, 65 inch 3D TV, Washer/Dryer Combo.   Large Dining area upstairs with TV, Nespresso, Seating for 6, Leads outside to a big dining area and outdoor grill.   Bedroom with king size new bed. Tons of space and large windows. Downstairs is a Office/ Movie Room. Large couch for extra Guest and optional inflatable queen size airbed for downstairs.  Brand new 65 inch 3DTV, Washer dryer and 1/2 Bath. 1800 Sq Feet space to enjoy. 10 Min to Union Square , 20 Min to Midtown. Super cool trendy neighborhood on a quiet block.

Place all dishes in the dishwasher  All towels go in the bin Anything in the fridge you can have but the products in the bathroom are not No large groups of outside guests ( Parties that the neighbors would complain about) Surround sound downstairs kept low after 1AM

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Fun loving, energetic, outgoing. Love life and people. Love the beach and good music. 

Life Motto : Born and Reborn at every moment.

"Heaven isn't a place you go when you die, its the moment in life that you feel alive"

reviews.comments: I enjoyed my stay at Daniel's place. Lots of space and comfortable furniture. Great communication. I would stay here again.

Daniel's apartment was clean, modern and conveniently located. Unlike many New York apartments, this one is huge and has a lovely patio area. It was a welcome retreat at the end of our long days in the city! We would highly recommend his apartment to anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Brooklyn.

Daniel was super responsive and helpful on email prior to check-in and also during our stay.  He was out of the country when we were in NYC, so one of his friends (who was very helpful) did the check-in for us.

The flat was large and comfortable (with a very nice terrace!) and well placed for visiting Williamsburg and Brooklyn and also an easy subway ride from Manhattan. 

We really enjoyed our stay in Daniel's apartment - thank you Daniel!

Daniel was very easy to deal with and excellent to communicate with. 
The flat was as the photos show, lots of space, and a great place to spend some time.

Daniel was out of town, but very available to assist. He used a KeyCafe for the key pickup. The location was convenient and the transaction was simple. The apartment was as listed. Clean and spacious. It was conveniently located a few blocks from the train and a very short ride into Manhattan. Daniel made us feel at home and the place was very comfortable. The neighborhood felt very safe and the apartment was very secure.

Be sure to  describing the travelers that you are arriving with so that they can have an opportunity to best prepare the place for you. In our case, there were a few surprises that were left for us to make us feel special and appreciated Also, If you are traveling with children, there is a less adult-decorated version of the apartment that is available.  Just ask. :)

name: Cosy beach style apartment in the heart of Manly
summary: This cosy apartment is located on the hill in the heart of Manly ,5 min from the beach and the harbour. It is on the ground floor with the balcony view over nature reserve, ocean and harbour. Our place is in a quiet location far from the main roads.
description: This cosy apartment is located on the hill in the heart of Manly ,5 min from the beach and the harbour. It is on the ground floor with the balcony view over nature reserve, ocean and harbour. Our place is in a quiet location far from the main roads.

reviews.comments:
Our hosts were very friendly and welcoming. It was the first time they have listed this apartment with air bnb, and they helped us out at very short notice. They welcomed us to help ourselves to anything eg fridge and pantry. We were well equipped so didn't need to, but the generosity was appreciated. They supply a Nespresso coffee machine and pods too!  The location is great. Walking distance to Manly Harbour, Manly ferry, cafes, bars and shops.
Interesting and peaceful green nature reserve in front of the apartment which we walked through to access Manly harbour. Glimpses of the harbour. Not a lot of street parking, but we managed ok most of the time. Car not needed tho if you are exploring Manly and with the ferry so close! The Friday night international food markets very close by. Just a short walk over to the surf side and round to beautiful Shelly Beach.
We had everything we needed for a 2 night stay, and would recommend our hosts and their apartment.

The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location and place to stay
It was a good location with friendly locals and good bars
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely apartment, we stayed with a family of four. The apartment was clean and tidy. Great location only 5 min walk to beach, ferry, shops and restaurant. Monica was very responsive when we were having problems with the internet. Would recommend this place.

Wonderful apartment a stone throw from the wharf and beach
Lovely!

name: Overlooking the Heart of the Cross.
summary: You've found the perfect location for your stay in Potts Point. Your apartment combines a sapcious double bedroom and private sleeping alcove, sunny dining area overlooking the Fountain, modern kitchen and bathroom and a comfortable living area.
space: Your apartment is located in an historic building known around the village as 'The Fountain'. The building is accessed from both the beautiful tree lined Macleay Street and Lankelly Place, home to Pott's Points best restaurants, cafés and laneway bars. The apartment is comfortably furnished with high ceilings, spacious living areas, a light and airy double bedroom and original features. There's an additional fold out double futon sofa in a private sleeping alcove to accommodate up to two extra guests. You'll have very fast wifi and excellent television reception. The building itself, like the Cross is an exciting mixture of residential, cultural and commercial spaces. Cafés and restaurants are literally downstairs at your doorstep, as is a laundromat (and a dentist if you need one!) Perhaps its most appealing feature is the large sunroom windows through which you can look down and watch Kings Cross pass you by. The building is very secure with gates at both entrances that are locked in
description: You've found the perfect location for your stay in Potts Point. Your apartment combines a sapcious double bedroom and private sleeping alcove, sunny dining area overlooking the Fountain, modern kitchen and bathroom and a comfortable living area. Your apartment is located in an historic building known around the village as 'The Fountain'. The building is accessed from both the beautiful tree lined Macleay Street and Lankelly Place, home to Pott's Points best restaurants, cafés and laneway bars. The apartment is comfortably furnished with high ceilings, spacious living areas, a light and airy double bedroom and original features. There's an additional fold out double futon sofa in a private sleeping alcove to accommodate up to two extra guests. You'll have very fast wifi and excellent television reception. The building itself, like the Cross is an exciting mixture of residential, cultural and commercial spaces. Cafés and restaurants are literally downstairs at your doorstep, as is a laun
neighborhood_overview: Space doesn't allow for a comprehensive list of the amenities that can be easily accessed from this location, but you'll find that Marcelle's cafe, located at the front entrance to the building on Macleay Street is fabulous for breakfast and lunch, and at the Lankelly Place side of the building, the LL Wine and Dine offers a stylish pan-Asian menu, weekend Yum Cha, cocktails and live music. Coffee at Yuca is great, the best Parisian croissants can be found at Croissant D'Or, there's awesome Italian food in Bottega del Vino and some amazing restaurants (among the best in Sydney) like The Fish Shop, Fratelli Paradiso or Billy Kwong are a few minutes stroll from the apartment. You're just a few minutes walk from all the restaurants and night spots of Darlinghurst to the south, the famous Woolloomooloo Bay pubs and eateries to the north (just walk down Macleay Street), where you can continue walking to the Botanical Gardens, the Sydney Opera House, Circular Quay, and then a little further
notes: Note that the street level gates to the building are locked to the public from around 6.00pm each evening and you'll need your security key to enter after that time.
transit: You are two minutes walk to Kings Cross train station, there are bus stops to the city and the eastern suburbs on Macleay Street and taxis are everywhere. Secure parking is available at Wilson's Parking in nearby Ward Avenue, just across Fitzroy Gardens and a two minute walk to your apartment. Airport shuttle services also access Kings Cross, as do the Sydney Explorer open-top bus sight seeing service.
access: You'll have the entire apartment to yourselves.
interaction: We've been long term residents of Potts Point but now live an hour away on the Northern Beaches and have been using this space to stay overnight in the city. If we are unable to meet you on arrival, our friend Ian who lives around the corner will be happy to meet you, give you access and answer your questions. But we are always just a phone call away.
house_rules: Please treat the appartment as you would your own. No smoking, no big parties, but given the location, you'll have no shortage of places to entertain yourselves.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great apartment, clean and spacious.
Communication and check-in was very easy.
Location is good - 5 min walk to king cross station.
Thank you David for your great hospitality!

David's place was stunning! When we first arrived (two couples) David patiently waited for us on the street so we could find the place more easily, though there was no need with the listings accurate address and pictures to find it. David showed us around the beautiful apartment, which was even more lovely than the pictures, then gave us a quick overview of the area on a map before leaving us with the keys! The four of us slept amazing in the two beds and couldn't have asked for a better place to stay to tour around Sydney for a weekend! David was extremely nice and accommodating, and we would highly recommend staying at his place!

We stayed at David's place for two nights and really enjoyed every minute of it. Nicely situated cosy apartment with plenty of space, light and character. Everything was clean and most comfortable. Communication during the booking, check in, check out process was too easy.

I'm gonna make this short and sweet... David and his son Alex made my arrival smooth and very clear. The place itself is amazing!! It's clean, very quaint, secure, modern and central to everything you can possibly think of including the train station. Also, the fountain across the street is insanely therapeutic when relaxing in the apt. If you want to have the greatest experience in one of the most beautiful city's in the world, David's Potts Point gem apartment is the place! I would definitely stay there again. -N

David was kind enough to greet us in person and to show us around. The apartment was superb. It's BIG! The beds and sofa are super comfy and the large windows gives a perfect natural lighting to the whole room (LOVE IT!). The location was perfect, too. Kings cross station is just around the corner, tons of restaurants and cafes on the Macleay st as well.

I'd definitely recommend David's place to all my friends who's going to visit Sydney.
Such a beautiful flat and in the perfect location. The flat was light and airy and decorated in a modern style. We were sad to leave!

David was a wonderful host. He met with me and took me through the apartment which was just divine! Located in the heart of Potts Point, with restaurants and bars a stone throw away! I am hoping to book through David again in the future, was a great experience. Thank again David :)

Great experience of staying in David's lovely apartment. Clean and tidy with good location. Very convenient for everything.(bus and train station, shopping center&restaurants ) Davis is a excellent host, easy communicate, reply every message very fast, nice and friendly to explain everything.
Spacious, clean, charming apartment with everything you need. All in a good location too. Recommended!

very beautiful and tidy house. Thanks for David give us a beautiful memory of Sydney. the house is better than the picture show.David is so kind that introduce for us allthings in house. although it's a little noisy at night . but I will choose stay here second time

David made us feel very welcome; great communication throughout. Lovely apartment; fantastic location! Only downfall, it was very warm in the apartment during our stay & due to not having air conditioner we needed to leave the window wide open which was extremely noisey at all hours of the day (not surprising since we were right in the heart of Kings X). We would love to stay again in the cooler months. Thanks David!

Perfect location, just a block away from the train station, and the place was clean and beautiful. Shame that we only had 1 day at David's place. And we really want to thank David for the hospitality. It made our trip to Sydney so special.
Lovely apartment in great location...clean, as described and the host was a pleasure to deal with. Would definitely stay here again.

Host was very accomodating, meeting us early to let us into the apartment after arriving from the airport. The photos don't do the apartments justice, it was very clean and the dining area over looking the street and fountain was great. The area itself has good local ammenities and some nice restraunts near by. We read on other reviews the area was quite noisy at night but we didn't find a problem with the noise, even on a friday night. Within reasonable walking distance to the botanical gardens, from which you can cut through to the opera house. All in all a great stay and would recommend to anybody looking to visit the city.

David is great host, he is very responsive in communication with attention to details and great intention to respond to all requests in a positive way, he makes us feel home by very nice touches he made in the apartment to welcome us after long exhausting trip. 
We spent a month in David's apartment, it is just awesome, the location is great, everything is just at your door step literally, with access to the city attractions by train (4 mnts walk), buses and even if you fancy walk like us you can reach the heart of Sydney straight on foot in 20 to 25 mnts. 
It can easily accommodate 4 people (we were 2 adults and 3 years old child) and has everything you may need for you to feel like home. 
Thank you David for the great stay and we will certainly stay here again.
David is the perfect host. He was responsive and attentive. The apartment is well located, clean, and stocked with essentials. We thoroughly enjoyed our time there, and hope some day to return!

We had a very enjoyable stay at David's apartment. The apartment is spacious, tastefully decorated, and quite comfortable. It is also located in a terrific neighborhood, Potts Point, with accessible shops, coffee, restaurants, etc. It is also very easy to get to the Sydney Harbor and Opera House from the apartment. 

David was easy to work with in advance of our stay and made sure to welcome us when we arrived. He had great information and maps for us and even some treats for when we arrived! 

There are two things we did want to mention. First, the apartment is close to a busy street and things can get a bit lively on weekend nights. Second, the apartment is on a very nice safe stretch of road, but within a short walk, there are various clubs that might make some individuals feel a bit uncomfortable. This did not get in the way of our enjoyment of our visit, but for some, this might be an issue to consider.

Overall, we would recommend David's place and encourage anyone to contact David to talk with him about your plans to visit Sydney.

Jerry, Mary, & Mickey
An amazing time sums it all up! David's place is way better than the pictures! It is convenient and close to the trains and is really pretty! Theres weekend markets just outside!

We had great time in our stay. This unit is very clear and stylish. Window view is amazing make us so relax when sitting in. Many top best cafés in this area. David is very friendly and helping us a lot. Perfect for a small family like us.

Me and my family had a wonderful time at  David's place throughout out our stay in Sydney. On the day of arrival, we met Cathy, David's wife who was friendly and helpful. And we were happy to be there as the apartment was well equipped and located near to the king cross station. Will definitely recommend this place.

Great place with restaurants and fabulous coffee shop in the immediate vicinity.  We had an early arrival into Sydney and were met by Cathy at 9.30am which was really appreciated.

Everything was as expected from the photos with breakfast bits and bobs and great extra.

Would not hesitate to recommend and will definitely hope to stay there again on our next visit to Sydney.
Great stay. Place is bright, comfortable and clean. Excellent location and surprisingly quiet at night.

David's place is located in a great place, is easy to walk into town or to get public transport. Lots of places to eat around, shops are close by and the apartment has everything you need to feel at home. I would for sure contact David again if I ever get back to Sydney.
David was a great, friendly, helpful host and the place had the perfect location! Thank you again for having us :)

This must be one of the best places to stay in Sydney. We a family of 4 had a great time here. To have breakfast overlooking the square with the fountain and all the people passing by was fantastic. The apartment is top condition and very well equipped, and the host filled up the kitchen with enough tea and coffe bags and that is great in the morning. The neighborhood has everything you need with good restaurants and shops.
If we are so lucky and have the possibilty to come back to Sydney we want to stay here.
L'appartement est fidèle à sa description, et l'accueil de David est très chaleureux. Possibilité de laisser les valises avant le check in, très pratique.
Great location and great apartment
We had a wonderful 4 days loved the apartment and location.
Great place. Great location.

David was courteous communicative and extremely accommodating on our arrival providing all the necessary and helpful info that we required. His place is clean, modern and secure and met the listing description. It felt a little more spacious than we pictured it, possibly because of the high ceilings and warm lighting. This is the best location in Sydney. As tourists we enjoyed easy access to an immense choice of restaurants cafes entertainment and shopping within a walk from the front door. Would definitely recommend and return again.

What a perfect place to visit Sydney ! The apartment is beautiful, clean, well equiped, and the view is so nice.  It is also very well located, close to everything you need (train, shops, restaurants...) Also David was very welcoming. We had a wonderful week here !
The apartment is amazing, great location, very clean, nice decoration and David was always available for any thing that we need. I recommend the apartment 100%

Lovely bright apartment in perfect location! I booked David's Potts Point apartment for myself, as well as my mum and sister for two nights. It was a great size for the three of us! 

I loved sitting by the big window and people watching with a cup of tea in the mornings and glass of red in the evening! I really loved the apartment, quite spacious for Sydney - it was a plus that it was so secure too!

There are markets literally metres away on Saturday, which have plenty of food stalls on offer. There are so many restaurants & bars to choose from all well within walking distance!

David had brilliant communication and was very accommodating. He met us at the apartment and showed us on a map where to walk to get to the gallery the next day, which was extremely helpful and very kind of him. It's a nice walk into Circular Quay, Botanic Gardens and The Rocks.

Last but not least, all 3 of us were in awe of the book collection in the apartment. You have great taste David, I will have to make the next stay longer so I can read some! 

Thank you so much!

David was such a wonderful host. He met me in front of his place and showed me around. He made sure everything was fine before he left me. The place was very clean , comfy pillows and mattresses . The place is beautiful , Internet was fast , you will feel safe and secure because the police station is just right across the apartment. The location was great , convenient as mentioned. We'll book again if given a chance to go back to Sydney . Thank you David !

The space was very nice and clean, and a great location to get to transit, and if you are there on the weekend, it was great for the outdoor market.  There was quite many locations to eat and shop.  It was a little loud on the traffic side since the it faces the main street, but other than that it is a great place.

David was a wonderful host. My family and I were welcomed kindly in front of the apartment. The place was extremely clean and had everything we needed. The location was walking distance to many tourist locations or a quick bus/taxi ride away. We'll definitely recommend this location to family and friends who plan to travel to Sydney.

David's place is a gem in the whole city of Sydney. It's close to public transit, the place had a charm few other places have. Its placement, so close to the parklet of Potts Point, really make you feel like you're a world away. The stay was great thanks to David's little personal touches.

This was our first Airbnb experience.  David's listing at Potts Point looked very promising and it certainly lived up to expectations. The location in the village was great, with public transport at the door but easy walking to the CBD. Much nicer than high rise in the centre of town. The apartment was exactly as stated, light, bright and comfortable. A place we would not hesitate to visit again. David was an excellent host, prompt is his communication and very friendly and helpful.

Our stay in David's apartment was perfect in every detail and everything we could possibly want was provided by David right down to greatly appreciated supplies of milk and cereal to start us off. The apartment is superb, as is the situation. Would stay again and recommend to anyone and everyone.  Superb!
The Flat is really good located and wonderful! Clean, quiet. Really easy to communicate with David, nice stay in nice place! Thank you.
Great apartment in Potts Point, close to everything and great value for place to stay! David was super friendly and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended!

David's light and airy flat is situated just at the sweet spot on Macleay St between the grit and eclectic vibe of Kings Cross and the genteel delights of Potts Point. With the fountain across the street providing a constant bubbling soundtrack we spent a very enjoyable five nights with immediate Darlinghurst at our doorstep and, via KX station two minute walk out the door, greater Sydney. Our third person in our party wanted to report that the futon was one of the most comfortable she has ever slept on. David was helpful before arrival and met us on the door to walk us through the locking systems, easily mastered, of the semi-public courtyard setup of the building. Flat was comfortably and stylishly furnished and we were not lacking for any amenity. Very much recommended. Oh, he was flexible on our departure time as he had a late next arrival so this made our leaving that bit easier. Thx David.

We had a great time at David place in Pott's Point. The location was very good, we could do a lot of things walking from here. The place itself was fine, nice and clean, only the noises from the street were a little bit disturbing.

En fantastisk värd som välkomnade oss och hjälpte oss med väskor och introducerade lägenheten och området för oss. Lägenheten var underbar och var nog bättre än beskrivningen. En klar överraskning. Området var perfekt om du vill ta dig runt i Sidney. Nära till tåg och buss.

Lovely apartment with the perfect location (only 2 mn walk to Kings Cross station), there's also a very nice walk to do from Potts Point to the Opera house through the Royal Botanical Gardens. Will definitely be back again!

We had a lovely time at David's place, it is in a fantastic location, right by the subway station so it's easy to connect with the rest of Sydney. The apartment is clean and comfortable and has everything you could need. David was very welcoming and friendly, and gave us helpful advice about the area, and left us plenty of maps and information. If I ever come back to Sydney, I will hopefully stay here again!

Dear David, we really enjoyed our stay in your wonderful apartment. We all felt comfortable right away. And thanks again for helping us with our crazy luggage load.  
best wishes. 
Judith, Daniel with  Matti and Emmi

If you are looking for an flat in Potts Point this is the place to be. Well equipped, everything (super market, Bars) is very close to the apartment. With the opal card it´s really easy to travel everywhere from Kings Cross which is the nearest station. 
David waited in the front of the building in front of the house and welcomed us very friendly. 
Thanks a lot David. 
Best 
Thomas & Marlon

David welcomed us warmly on arrival.  His lovely apartment lived up to our expectations - cosy and inviting.  A great place to relax after a busy day.  An extensive book collection was a bonus.
The apartment is in an ideal location - very handy to all that Sydney has to offer.
We very much look forward to returning to David's apartment when we next visit Sydney.  Thanks David

David's place is in a great location in the city.  The apartment is very clean and nice and easy to find.  David communicated well leading up to our arrival and had someone there to meet us.  The apartment is on a major street, so you will hear some noise.  Closing the doors helps quite a bit, though.  Overall, great stay!

We had a great stay at David's place, David let us check in early and met us at the apartment to make sure we were all settled in and knew where everything was. It was in a great location, easy to walk to the sights and surrounded by great cafes and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!
lovely place.

We enjoyed the time in the apartment very much. David's communication was always promptly and detailed. He gave us a warm welcome and already awaited us upon our arrival. The apartment itself was exactly as described. Only the noises from the adjacent apartment surprised us. The connection to public transport with Kings Cross Station is perfect. Within 30 minutes you can get to Bondi Beach, Airport or any other well known place in central Sydney. This is the perfect location for a couple to stay in Sydney.
Great apartment with walking distance to Opera House!!!!

Location is amazing! Loved the feel of the apartment and how well appointed it is - David made the checking in experience really easy as well and also gave tips on how to get around/things to see. Thanks for a great stay!

David was very easy to communicate with and he offered information about the area. He left a few things in the fridge for us, which we really appreciated. 
We stayed 3 nights over New Year's Eve and spent much of our time walking and visiting the city so the small apartment was fine for us and our 2 grown daughters. It would be perfect for a couple. It was hot, even with the windows open at night and the ceiling fans running.  Renters should be aware that this is a very noisy neighborhood and there are several "adult" type businesses up the street. Not great if you are travelling with small kids.
We did have trouble sleeping with the street noise.  

I would recommend David's place. It's situated less than 2km from the Circular Quay and Opera House, a perfect distance for a nice walk.
We were very well at David's house. The apartment in old style is furnished very well and located a very lively neighborhood, close to all the comforts.

Everything in the listing was as described.  Great location and very convenient.  You need to make sure you can keep to the agreed meeting time tho.  I felt we had upset the host when with one hours notice we advised we were going to be late.  Otherwise, everything else was perfect and would happily recommend the place to others.

Davids place was in an excellent location - easily accessible by underground and quick to the airport. Check in was made easy and his communication was excellent with us. Good value for money. Lots of nice little cafes and juice bars nearby.

David's appartment is extremely well located. Close to King Cross station and at a pleasant walking distance of the Opera House and the city. The neighbourghood is lively and can be noisy (specially on Saturday night); but MacLeay St is also very fancy and full of exceptional restaurants and coffee places. 

The apparment is neat and comfortable and there is always a nice air flow to cool down summer's hot air.
位置非常好,步行30min左右可以到达海德公园､植物园､歌剧院､海港大桥､市政厅等地方｡唯一的就是没有空调,夏天可能会热吧……

I stayed at David's place with my mother, who was visiting from the UK. We both found it to be a lovely, well-equipped apartment, in a fantastic location for exploring Sydney. The sun room is an especially nice space for watching the world go by down below.
David was a great host to communicate with and greeted us personally to show us in to the apartment. Thanks, David, for a great stay!

David's apartment is very convenient to the very center of sydney city, we can just go sightseeing by walking of 25 minutes. David is very helpful and easygoing, he reply me promtly after I text him, It's a preasure to stay in potts point, Thank you!
非常好的民宿,老板热情,民宿位置好,周围有超市和吃饭的地方｡推荐!
This is a lovely little apartment in a good location - plenty of restaurants &   Cafes & within easy reach of the clean & efficient train network.  Well equipped, comfortable beds &. Strong  wifi.

We loved staying at David's place - a fantastic apartment, well equipped and in a great location. The apartment has lovely high ceilings and was cool even in heatwave temperatures. David had left tea, coffee, milk and, especially welcome after a long journey, cool water in the fridge. Potts Point is lively and full of great restaurants and coffee shops. Local amenities are great and it's really easy to get around by walking or by public transport with the train station just 2 or 3 minutes walk away. Fitzroy Square with the fountain is a great place to sit and watch the world go by. We'd love to return

what a great place. the big front window is fantastic, as is the rest of the cosy, stylish flat. our two kids slept wonderfully on the futon. we really enjoyed potts point and can definitely recommend davids flat and him as a host as he was easy to communicate and really friendly when meeting us. 10 out of 10!
Absolute perfect!
Great place to stay in Sydney. Very close to the city center, convenient flat. I definitely recommend to stay in David's place.
Anytime you can access this apartment do it, especially for longer stays ideal for the city and further afield
Sehr schön, allerdings fehlen Möglichkeiten um Klamotten aufzuhängen und es hätte etwas sauberer sein können
Very central, easy access to all places. Great cafe and restaurants around. Great value for nice bright room, the extra sofa bed is super comfortable too!

A lovely apartment in a great location for easy walking access to the main harbour sites and good public transport links to other areas. Comfortable for the 3 of us with a sunny kitchen area. Really enjoyed our stay here.

Very enjoyable stay! Communication with David was great.  Very bright and welcoming... walking distance to main attractions and very close to kings cross train station.  One thing to note it's quite noisy at night from being right above the street but overall an excellent stay!
David è stato un host attento e presente. La casa è accogliente e ben attrezzata. Consigliato!
Great location, good host
Really lovely apartment in a great location!
Grate place for a visit to Sydney

This apartment was modern and tastefully decorated.  The location is excellent, with a lovely outlook over the fountain at Kings Cross.  Walking distance from the Botanic Gardens, Opera House and Circular Key, Rushcutters Bay and shopping centres.  
Plenty of restaurants within 5 minutes walk, as well as grocery shopping a Harris Farm Market and Woolworths.
The Kings Cross Train Station is only 5 minutes walk and taxi rank and bus stop outside.  The kitchen needs more utensils and baking dish to use in the oven, but was otherwise well equipped.  It was nice to have tea and coffee provided, as well as basics such as dishwashing liquid.
David was prompt in his communications with me and very helpful.
Amazing place , very good communicated with the train, supermarket and the CBD, so wonderful and spacious. I really recommend this place . So beautiful and clean .

David's place is a perfect place with privacy and the amenities needed to make it feel like home. The restaurants and cafes are wonderful. The Saturday market was a nice surprise and experience. The location is very close to the Kings Cross Train station, making it a perfect launching place for a car free, public transit based urban vacation. The train station area is a little on the sketchy side with some hang-over adult entertainment businesses still present. But a short block away, the neighborhood turns into a rather hip, locals-only restaurant filled area that was nice to spend time in.

You really can't beat the location of this apartment.
There's a great view of the fountain and is an easy walk to the train (subway) and because of the apartment's location, we almost only ever needed to go a couple stops. There are lots of cafes, restaurants, and supermarkets nearby.
The apartment is spacious and good value for the money.
The only heads up I would have is that the futon (second bed) is off the entry way of the apartment so light sleepers may hear early risers in the hallway (we think it was someone walking their dog early).
This apartment is definitely worth a stay!

David's place in wonderful in all aspects. A real oasis in the middle of a busy, beautiful city. We stayed here with our two young daughters who also loved it. There is so much to do here. David is really friendly and helpful. We can definitely recommend it here!
Super place in a great location... easy walk to the Opera house and Circular Quay. Gets nice sun in the mornings. We enjoyed!
Great place. Convinent location! ^_^

We really enjoyed our stay in Davids apartment. Great location. Nice energy. Good beds! Wonderful base for our exploring Sydney! David has been helpful and easy to communicate with! Inwoukd certainly recommend this place.

David is a very nice host, it was very easy to communicate with him. 

The apartement is well located with very good connection with bus and train. It is very comfortable. We were a little bit afraid of noise at night but we didn't hear anything, even during the week-end!

We had a great stay here (we loved the overlooking on the fountain) ans we definetly recommand this place!

Thanks for all David.

David is really nice host, easy to communicate. He left us tea and coffe and things for breakfast.The apartement has really good location if you don`t mind walking. I was perpared for traffic noise in the evening but  it wasn`t problem at all, although the saturday night was really a party night at that street. There was 4 of us in the apartement and we fitted well, maybe the sleeping couch is not very convient location. If you come from Europe as we did, be prepred that electric plugs are different, so you need the adaptor (could be bought also from neighborhood). Wifi connection was really good in the apartement.

This place was bigger than expected, had plenty of hot water, fully functional kitchen, and close to 3 grocery stores, lots of places to eat, and transit stops.  David is a great host, left tea, coffee, cereal, dish soap, etc. to use. There is one portable heater so rooms got chilly without the heater but there are extra blankets. Bring slippers. Definitely noisy in the living room at night from people in the corridor downstairs and the queen bed was quite bouncy. However, it was the perfect spot for our stay, we were quite happy.

David is a great host, the location is great and close to cafe, pâtisserie, train station, restaurant, pub and supermarket. 25 minutes walk to opera house across the beautiful royal botanic garden and costal track. The house is clean, equiped, safe and sunny. Highly recommended to everybody. I also did my morning routine run 5 k return from Sydney top 10 bakery Bourke street bakery in Surry hill, wonderful place for first time visitors too.

I didn't know what to expect, but was very happy with our stay.  The apartment was clean and bright, kitchen and bathroom were updated and wifi and security were solid.  Bonus points to David for being flexible and a gracious host.  Saturday morning, we woke up to a brilliant farmers market across the square. Loved the spot and would stay again.
Appartement spacieux et trės fonctionnel. Comme nous étions 3, le recoin avec le lit supplémentaire fut des plus agréable.

David est un hôte très sympa et très disponible.
L'appartement correspond parfaitement à l'annonce, il est très agréable, le quartier très sympathique et idéal pour visiter la ville. 
Je recommande fortement!

A lovely apartment with everything you could need. The location was also great - just five minutes walk from Kings Cross Station and lots of great restaurants even closer. The Saturday morning market in the square outside was also a nice surprise.

The stay at David’s Place was perfect.  David met us on the street and stored our luggage before check in because we arrived early before check in time.  He also briefed us on the apartment and how to get around the area, and gave us the keys.  We had lunch right across the street while we waited for check in.  His apartment couldn’t have been more enjoyable, and convenient.
Un joli appartement très bien situé si vous souhaiter sortir. Logement spacieux et  accueillant. David a été charmant et réactif tout au long de nôtre séjour. Je recommande grandement l endroit!
Super appart juste à proximité des transports et du centre ville en train.

David’s place was a great find for our pre-cruise stay in Sydney.  Our flight from California arrived at 6:00 am, and we were able to check in early.  We texted David to let him know we were on our way, and he met us once we got off the train.  He took us right to the apartment.  

The apartment was clean and described just as the photos in the listing.  It’s a short walk to public transportation and centrally located to all the sites.  Lots of great little restaurants in the area and a wonderful market on Saturday morning.  

David was a very gratious host, and we wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again for our next visit to Sydney.
David is very good host, easy to communicate. The apartment located is very nice , easy go to train station. Walk distance to CBD , SOH and Royal botanic garden. Very recommended.
위치도 좋고 호스트도 친절하고 좋았습니다~~!

The location of this apartment is sensational. You can just sit at the breakfast bar and look into the passing parade of characters walking by the gorgeous El Alamein fountain. The apartment was like something out of a magazine: bright, white, and stylish. The bed was very comfortable, and there is an abundance of natural light through the leafy outlook.
Great unit in a fantastic location.

An awesome apartment in a fun neighborhood. David’s place was even prettier than the pictures. We loved all of the cafes and restaurants right downstairs. There was even a playground across the street that our 2 year old really enjoyed. Great base to explore Sydney!
Perfect location. Next to Kings Cross station and a lovely stroll to circular quay.
Very clean and perfectly located. David was very quick to answer any emails which we really appreciated.  I would stay there again and again if I could! Thanks for everything David.

We had a great stay here during our first two days in Sydney. The apartment is even better than in the photos, and we absolutely loved the dining area overlooking the fountain and street below! Location is perfect, walking distance to Kings Cross Station, supermarkets, CBD, SOH, and Royal Botanic Gardens. Also very clean and well-equipped, and David left us things for breakfast too which was really appreciated. David was an amazing host, and we highly recommend this place!

Staying at Potts Point at Dave’s is hugely recommended for exploring Sydney - 3mins from metro, a short walk to Botanics, the biggest navy ships you can imagine and 20 mins walk to Opera house & CBD area. Very neat appartement, stylish, great daylight, high ceilings, opposite great coffee shop, playground nearby which was great for our 5&7 yr old. Overall a really good stay.

David is a great host. From the beggining letting us leave our ridiculous amount of luggage early so we did not have to lug it around till check in and also allowed us to check out late for the same reason. The apartment is in a perfect spot. Park across the road for our 5 year old daughter. Close to trains and buses, cafes and restaurants. A clean, comfortable and most enjoyable stay. Thank you. Lisa.
Nice place to stay in Sydney.

A lovely clean, light and airy apartment in a great location for seeing central Sydney. Plenty of nearby restaurants and within quite easy walking distance of the Opera House through the Botanic gardens.

Merci pour ce logement avec une situation exceptionnelle.
David a répondu à toutes nos demandes.
Je conseille vivement ce logement.
merci

David’s unit was in a great location and just looking out the windows at life on the streets was a great pastime. The unit was perfect for our purpose as a base for our sightseeing trip to Sydney. Checkin went smoothly, the unit was clean and provided everything that we needed to make our stay relaxed and comfortable
Très bien situé, charmant.

David is a great host!Very kindly friendly and helpful!
The location is really great! The house is very clean , cozy and much more beautiful than the pictures!
The kitchen has all the equipment you will need when you cooked by yourself!
If I come back to Sydney again, I will rebook there again!
Highly recommended David’s house!

Fantastic location - a beautiful walk along the water to the Opera House and Bridge, countless cafes and restaurants at your doorstep, and a superb Saturday market just across the road, plus only a short walk to the train station to go further afield. We loved the apartment itself too and will definitely return one day!

The apartment is perfect!David are waiting for us once we are checking in.He can response quickly every time we need his help.What’s more,we love the fountain on the front his (Website hidden by Airbnb) next time we can live again

David’s Airbnb was awesome! Super close to the Sydney CBD action, our weekend was made great by having literally everything at the doorstep. David was really hospitable and welcoming, and even let us stay a little longer knowing we’d be out late celebrating Mardi Gras. Honestly wonderful, and would happily stay again!

We would highly recommend staying in this lovely Potts Point apartment.  In the middle of a vibrant neighborhood, it was surprisingly quiet.  It was a beautiful half hour walk from the Botanical Gardens & Art Museum.  We appreciated David meeting us for a warm welcome & introduction to the area.

David’s apartment was fantastic- right in the middle of the Potts Point area, awesome restaurants - close to public transport and a short walk to the city. He accomodated our earlier arrival time and we were able to request a later check out time. Would highly recommend David’s home, and would gladly return again!
Great location.  Walking distance to Ópera House, Museums, shops and restaurants!

David’s place is wonderful, and he is a very gracious host. One of the very best places we have visited and one of the very best experiences we’ve had. He is thoughtful and meticulous. We had a great time!

This is a nice apartment in a convenient location, easy to get around, with plenty of restaurants and services nearby. It’s in a nightlife zone with a few adult shops and backpacker hostels around too, but noise and people were never a problem at all.  In fact I think it’s why there are so many neat coffee shops and diverse restaurants nearby. Be sure to eat at Pizza Boccone just behind the building, it’s the best pizza we have EVER eaten, anywhere!  

David set up the futon couch as a second bed for my son, very nice!  And he was super helpful getting us settled in and explaining how best to get around the area. Thanks David! We’d happily stay here again.
Great location for visiting all parts of the city. Lots of amenities close by making it a great place to stay

David's place is very stylish, comfortable and spacious apartment with all amenities you need. We wore traveling with two young children and we appreciated everything went smooth and uncomplicated. The area is busy, a lot of bars and restaurants but also very loca amd individual, what i liked most.
David es un excelente anfitrión. La casa es muy recomendable y su situación inmejorable

Great sleeping arrangements where a second or third person can sleep in a private nook on comfortable futon sofa bed. Great aspect. Some early morning noise but that’s the price of being in the heart of Potts Point
Family was visiting and they enjoyed the convenience and hospitality of David’s place!

David’s house is in perfect location and close to everything you can ask for. In front of the building across the street there is a lovely cafe and you can enjoy a brunch in the open air with sunshine kissing your face. That’s also a plus for this house. The only thing that can be improved is the shower. It would’ve been perfect if it was strong enough.
Clean, good location and you won't regret on booking a stay at this place.
Great host, location and apartment. David was very hospitable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Sydney. Thanks again

Wow!  Great host, great space, super easy access to the city.  Sweet location, lots to do and see and just a few meters to the train.  We had a perfect stay, one of the few 5 stars ive given for cleanliness.  Thanks for having us we will be back!

Thank you for a such a nice place. It is central and close to many things. We can walk to the museum, parks and shops.
We love the wide window with a lot of sunlight.
You are a very good host, David.
Your communication is great. Thank you for letting us check in early and check out late.

David’s place was fantastic and situated in a lovely neighborhood. It’s quite spacious and could comfortably fit 4 people. There are lots of groceries, bars, and restos nearby. I guess the highlight of this place is the dining table overlooking the fountain.

A beautiful space with a lovely view in one of the best locations for exploring the city. Located in a vibrant area with  a wide variety of interesting shops and excellent restaurants within walking distance. Clean, comfortable, and well equipped. Our host David is an excellent communicator, pays attention to detail, and made every effort to help us enjoy our stay. Highly recommended.

Very nice apartment in the middle of Potts Point. Close to Kings Cross station and several restaurants and shops. The apartment is big and light and has heaters - good for winter!
And also David was a very good host and flexible with check-in.
Localização é muito boa, pertinho da Opera House. 15 minutos a pé!
公寓乾淨整潔､窗外景致優美,略顯吵

Location-wise, David's place was conveniently situated close to some places of interest- only a few minutes walk to a couple of pharmacies, restaurants (McDonald's, Pizza Boccone, etc), groceries (Cole's and Woolworths), and some shops. It is also close to the King's Cross Train Station (only a 2-minute walk) and some bus stops. In terms of the home itself, it was very cozy and it didn't take long for us to feel at home. There was a lot of space for baggage storage, and it was generally easy to manoeuvre around. David was able to provide an assortment of breakfast cereals, coffee, and even tea for breakfast. Overall, this place would be one that I would gladly rebook in the future.

We enjoyed our stay at Davids appartment very much! It is excellent located, not far away from the main attractions. It has a very good atmoshere and David was very flexible with the ceck-in time. Communication was allways uncomplicated. We can fully recommend it und would book it again.
A comfortable apartment

We stayed as family (2 adults + 2 teenagers) for 4 nights in August 2018.
We had excellent stay. 
The flat is in great location - just on edge of potts point and kings cross.
Close to station, restaurants, take aways with great view out on the fountain and the goings on.

Flat is a bit noisy unless close the doors to window room but everyone slept well.
Can walk into botanical gardens / opera house easily and eay to get on subway at kings cross.

Things to recommend:
Pizza Boccone - v tasty and good value.
Saturday morning market around the fountain.
Plateia where friends meet - great greek takeaway ( on Bayswater road with few other Good quality take aways).
Dear sainte eloise - great wine bar and owners but vvvv expensive and alas one very rude waitress :-(

David was great to deal with and ensured we hot into flat easily. He then left us to our own devices. Good host of a good flat.
Thanks a-lot.

We loved everything about our stay!
Great location and super cute apartment
Fabulous location and lovely airy space to stay in.
Excellent location in the heart of Kings Cross, very clean and wonderful breakfast options. Cosy place with the weekend market right at the door. Quiet and safe in the evening, lively during the day.
Great apartment in an amazing location with a very helpful host

David's flat was very unique, cosy and clean. We feeled like home. You find here everything you need for an unforgettable trip to Sydney. We loved to have our breakfast with a view to the El-Alamein Fountain. David was always reachable and helped us with everything. Thanks for hosting uns David.

Super emplacement! À 5 minutes du métro de Kings Cross et de 3 épiceries. 

Grande chambre et salon. Beaucoup de rangement.
Même le futon était confortable. 

Cuisine fonctionnelle mais peu équipée. Avec un peu de créativité, on se débrouille bien. 

Petite salle de bains, pas de porte de douche et l'eau s'étend sur le plancher. Mais comme il y a très peu de pression, ce n'est pas trop problématique. 

Bruits de la rue et du corridor très perceptibles, bouchons pour les oreilles conseillés. 

Le logement prend la température de l'extérieur. Heureusement, il y avait des couvertures supplémentaires et un chauffage d'appoint portatif. 

J'y séjournerait de nouveau sans problème!

David is a fantastic host! He had so many nice touches that made our stay more comfortable. He gave us a map of the area and talked us through getting around.
The apartment was clean and simple. It's nothing fancy, but it was just right for our needs. The location is great, 5 minutes walk from the train station. We used public transportation to get all around Sydney. There is good food available nearby, and a grocery store a short walk away if you prefer cooking. The area can be a bit noisy at night. If you're a light sleeper, maybe bring some earplugs. 
The apartment may be a bit small for 4 adults if you're not good friends. The second bed is right in front of the door, so just be aware of that. 
Overall, this place is a great value. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.

My family of four felt completely at-home in this BandB and in the surrounding neighborhood. There are great small restaurants nearby, a huge open-air market that sets-up in the park across the street on Saturday morning, and abundant transit (bus, train, taxi, uber) close-by to explore Sydney.

Great apartment in a great location in Sydney!
Arrival and communication with David were perfect. 
The apartment is cosy, perfect for our 5 days stay in Sydney. 
The neighborhood is fantastic with many restaurants and shops, it is also very nice with Victorian houses . And you can walk to the opera and city center through the botanic garden, which is a great walk. 
I recommend and would definitively come back there if in Sydney!

Great location in Sydney. Lots of restaurants nearby (and many open late). There is no elevator in the building, but David was very helpful in getting our luggage up the stairs — and it’s good exercise after a day of eating.
David was a really good host. The house is pretty secure. The circular quay isn’t far from the area of stay. Lots of good places to eat nearby
Good location to train and grocery store
Es ist eine tolle Wohnung an einem schönen Ort in Sydney und David ist ein toller Gastgeber! Wir kommen gerne wieder.

David har varit mycket enkel att ha att göra med, vänlig och hjälpsam. Mysig lägenhet. I Kings cross med alla dess kontraster har vi känt oss trygga. Står i beskrivningen att det är risk för ljud utifrån och det kan vi hålla med om. Trevlig vistelse.
David’s place is great! Awesome location with sparkling clean facilities. Very comfy and cosy for my party of 4. Will definitely stay again if I have the chance!
Lovely place, fully furnished and great location. Better for two than for four but still really good
perfect
Great location, lovely space and close to everything.
David is a nice host reactive and easy communication. His appartement is well located and have a ancient touch.
This place was much larger than expected. great for backpackers and small families. Grest location in a nice clean area. paid parking near by.

The apartment was super cute and spacious and They were waiting to let us in as soon as our uber arrived. There is not a lift/ elevator and your space is on the third floor, so it is a bit of a hump with the luggage. The view from the breakfast table is very nice when you get there. Remember bug spray because it is hot-hot-hot in the summer and no ac and no screens on the windows got us eaten up by mosquitos. Also, I would not recommend this place for children. It it’s a fun party neighborhood with loud and rowdy activities until 2-3 am on Fridays and Saturdays. It was our most adventurous stay on our current travels so far!
Appartement tres agréable et tres bien situé, dans un quartier tres vivant et à 20 Minutes à pied de l'opéra
Logement très beau et bien placé. David communique rapidement. Le quartier est calme et vraiment sympa . Nous reviendrons !

David’s apartment is lovely great position in the heart of Potts Point so convenient to everything. The communication with David was fabulous the apartment was spotless and all the ammenities you need for a short stay would highly recommend.

name: Spacious, comfortable & budget friendly (Mile-End)
summary: Our apartment is located in the Mile-End, ranked #1 in the Top 15 Coolest Neighbourhoods in the World in 2016  The apt is right by the Mount-Royal mountain, sun-filled, two closed bedrooms, plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants and art galleries, and much much more! Magical place next to *everything*, 5 mins away from downtown, organic grocery store right below the building!
space: Hello! Welcome to our apartment.  If you have any particular interests, let us know in advance and we will send you customized suggestions - Otherwise, we always leave a little Bienvenue package with a list of cool things to go...En Français et in English, because...Montreal, you know? :) This second floor apartment is the perfect niche for a stay in Montreal's Mile-End/Plateau area, and quick access to downtown and around town. You'll find plenty of independent magazines, books and some trinkets from our many travels. Some great features about the space: - the wifi iv drip that we all need is fast - the neighbourhood Mile-End, near the Mile Ex and Plateau, is basically where it's at! There are places to go eat delicious food, top rated ice cream, coffees and world famous bagels. The bars eclectic and multicultural, with a Montreal touch, ie: right around the corner you can find a Portuguese style bar/eatery right in front of a Russian style bar, right next to two brunch places, by the
description: Our apartment is located in the Mile-End, ranked #1 in the Top 15 Coolest Neighbourhoods in the World in 2016  The apt is right by the Mount-Royal mountain, sun-filled, two closed bedrooms, plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants and art galleries, and much much more! Magical place next to *everything*, 5 mins away from downtown, organic grocery store right below the building! Hello! Welcome to our apartment.  If you have any particular interests, let us know in advance and we will send you customized suggestions - Otherwise, we always leave a little Bienvenue package with a list of cool things to go...En Français et in English, because...Montreal, you know? :) This second floor apartment is the perfect niche for a stay in Montreal's Mile-End/Plateau area, and quick access to downtown and around town. You'll find plenty of independent magazines, books and some trinkets from our many travels. Some great features about the space: - the wifi iv drip that we all need is fast - the neighbourh
transit: You couldn't be better situated!  There are many metro stations around, including Laurier which is 10 minutes walk (or less...I'm just really slow) and Metro Place des Arts a 3 minutes bus ride away...Downtown, basically! From the apartment you can walk down St-Laurent, Laurier, Fairmount, St-Viateur, Bernard and Saint-Denis streets to window shop, grab a drink, sample delicious coffee, try locally brewed beers, and much more.
access: I'll let you know where to get the key at least 48 hours before your arrival. The place is furnished with a queen bed, a sofa-bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and dinning table. There is a full bathroom with a shower and a bath. Street parking is available outside the apartment but the price and schedules change depending on the season.
interaction: Most times, I'll be around so just shoot me a text/email and I'll help with whatever I can! If I am out of town, my father or my sister will be there to welcome you and help with whatever they can.

host.host_about:
Hello! 

I am from Morocco and been calling Montreal our home for years now.
I am bilingual, and I can kick it in Arabic and Spanish as well.

I work in communications, advocacy and policy, mostly on  migrants and refugee matters. I read and write a lot. I'm a passionate and avid napper as well. In another life, I was an economist and a dancer. 

Bottom line, folks, is that I'd love to welcome you in my home and make sure your stay is memorable. 
Whether you are looking for a clean, quiet, and comfortable place to relax and have fun in when you're in a new city, get in touch!

reviews.comments: Jiji and Alex's place is spacious and really well-situated in the heart of Mile End, with super easy access to transit, downtown and shops and restaurants around. Although Jiji was away upon our arrival, she arranged for an easy check-in. She was kind enough to provide us with all we needed for breakfast. We had a short but comfortable stay chez Jiji et Alex during the weekend.

This place was perfect for my weekend visit to Montreal! It hit all the items on my checklist - location, cleanliness, comfort, affordability. The apt. is warm & inviting, beds comfortable, all amenities were provided. It is within walking distance of nearly everything one would want to do - plenty of restaurants, nightlife, parks, shops. And although Jiji & Alex were out of town, they arranged for someone to meet my friend and me as soon as we arrived and get us settled in. There were even bagels & schmear waiting on the counter- so thoughtful! They left the numbers of local contacts should we need immediate assistance and Jiji kept in touch via email throughout the visit. She responded quickly and with detail - giving suggestions on what we should do in the area based on our list of interests. Jiji and Alex truly have a gift for hospitality - I highly recommend staying here should you venture to Montreal!

Although Jiji and Alex were away during our stay, they provided a seamless and gracious backup plan for our arrival. His mom and sister were super helpful in orienting us to the place. We loved the location in vibrant and interesting Mile End and were delighted with the kitchen arrangement and comfy bedrooms. A grocery store right downstairs made it especially convenient. This was a great size for two couples, with reliable internet, a great espresso machine, and  everything we needed for a weekend stay.

Jihane and Alexandre were great hosts, they provided us with all the information we required to get around the city. The location was great, close to the bus stop and metro station. The appartment was comfortable , clean and cozy! Thanks again for everything, Christine

Nous avons été très bien reçus chez Jihane et Alexandre. Il faut souligner leur attention et leurs précieux conseils. Nous sommes venus avec deux enfants et cela s'est très bien passé. L'appartement est très bien situé  tant en terme de transport que d commerces et activités. Un grand merci!
Wonderful place in a perfect location!
Accueil chaleureux et super logement. Proche des commerces et de nombreux restaurants, l'endroit reste calme. Je le recommande ! Merci encore :)

Great place in an awesome neighbourhood. I couldn't have wished for a nicer place to stay, it is close to a lot of nice shops and restaurants and is nicely decorated and clean. If you want to experience Montreal I absolutely recommend staying here!

The apartment was close to restaurants and some shopping.  It was a bit of a distance to downtown and the metro.   Communication with our host was great.  They were very accommodating for our uncertain arrival time.  The apartment was spacious and very comfortable.

We couldn't have asked for a better stay on our long weekend in this great city!  Jiji and Alex's place is exactly as described, and the perfect location in the heart of the Mile End.  Restaurants and shops out the door, not to mention the grocery store underneath. Communication was great and they were readily available if anything was needed.  The space was perfect size for 2 couples, clean and well stocked with any essentials needed.  Great find in a good area!

Having stayed in many airbnbs in the last two years, Jihane was the most responsive, easy to contact, and friendliest host I've interacted with. The apartment is close to so many amenities. A couple things to be aware of for the summer, there is a lot of noise from the street with the windows open and the bedrooms get a lot of light. If you're sensitive to those things, bring earplugs and a sleep mask. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need.
Jihane made this experience-- she was a great communicator, friendly, and accommodating. I felt so welcome at her place!
Everything was as advertised. Great place and fantastic location.

name: 1921 15kms from Sydney CBD with Pool Spa parking.
summary: Built in 1921, today has been extended and updated with today's necessities.  Large saltwater pool, outdoor heated spa, ducted and split system Airconditioning.  Fast Wifi and fully appointed kitchen; with 5 bedrooms; 3 bathrooms and 2 living areas and study.  Located in a family friendly neighbourhood - pets welcome.  10 minute walk to Carlton Train station for Sydney CBD day trips.
space: Large modernised open plan family friendly home in quite area close to airport, train station and the Sydney CDB.   Great location for day trips to Carss Park, Brighton-Le-Sands and Hurstville’s China Town.   Easy drives to both Bondi and Cronulla and everything in between.   Drive to Royal National Park.
description: Built in 1921, today has been extended and updated with today's necessities.  Large saltwater pool, outdoor heated spa, ducted and split system Airconditioning.  Fast Wifi and fully appointed kitchen; with 5 bedrooms; 3 bathrooms and 2 living areas and study.  Located in a family friendly neighbourhood - pets welcome.  10 minute walk to Carlton Train station for Sydney CBD day trips. Large modernised open plan family friendly home in quite area close to airport, train station and the Sydney CDB.   Great location for day trips to Carss Park, Brighton-Le-Sands and Hurstville’s China Town.   Easy drives to both Bondi and Cronulla and everything in between.   Drive to Royal National Park. Air conditioning, WiFi, BBQ, Pool, Spa, Kids swing set and cubby house. Easy street parking and secure side driveway tandem parking for 3-4 cars. Limited as I work full time and will not be on premises, but there is a detailed guest handbook and a local contact person available.  I will help out where I c

notes: Includes Netflix subscription.  Fetch TV and Wifi. Xbox and Wii.
