host.host_about:
I'm an active, community minded recently divorced single parent. I live in with my children in our family friendly home in a great suburban location in Sydney. My home is conveniently located close to shops, parks, transport in a quiet leafy street, very centrally located and close to hospitals. 
I have listed my home as I share the care of my children with their father and I travel frequently for work, and Airbnb seemed like a great opportunity for my family to help cover costs. 
I've previously hosted overseas students and always found it a really positive experience for both myself and my kids. We are a welcoming happy family who like to enjoy all our beautiful city has to offer and we look forward to welcoming you and your family.

reviews.comments: Beautiful house and gorgeous pool and spa! Perfect for our family with young kids

Heidi's home was perfect. Our family group was very comfortable and had a wonderful time. Heidi was very accomodating, the house was clean and everything we needed. The kids loved playing in the pool and the adults loved having a spa when the kids went to bed! It was a great location and home base for sightseeing. We'd definitely stay again! Thanks for having us and helping make our family reunion so wonderful,
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
All is as described. Lovely home, not just a house. We were made to feel completely welcome. Our stay in Sydney at Heidi's home was like coming back to an oasis. Thank you for your hospitality.

Beautiful house - the photos do not do it justice, and Heidi was absolutely lovely to deal with and was ready to help with any issues that arose during our stay, literally coming to the house in the rain to fix the spa!

A lovely weekend overall, in a lovely house with a lovely owner. Would definitely stay again.

Our family has such a wonderful time living in Heidi's house. We have 7 adults and 1 baby and this house comfortably accommodates all. It is a very nice house with every convenient facility you could ask for a holiday rental. Heidi even got a rice cooker and so many spices that we use for our cooking. It's so great because my family is from Vietnam and they love to cook and cannot live without rice. We also have great time using the clean pool and barbecue. My husband and I had a good experience when taking my 5 month baby to swim for the first time. Heidi is a fantastic host that welcomed us in the first day and showed us every corner of the house. We are very satisfied and definitely will come back here if we have a chance

This house is absolutely stunning. We were in town for a family funeral, and I'm so glad we found Heidi and her house as it made our stay a lot easier to deal with.

The house and property are gorgeous, a lot of effort has gone into how it looks. There's everything you can think of here and is perfect for families. It's perfect for anyone really. Our toddler was in heaven and I suspect a bit sad to come home.

The linen felt and smelt new and incredibly fresh, the instructions Heidi left described everything well. The air conditioning, netflix and internet were all terrific. Having three bathrooms and toilets was a blessing with our large family. The pool, yard, trampoline, cubby house, swings and hammocks all got used a lot.

Heidi was incredibly accommodating, she let us stay at really short notice and did her very best to make our stay as comfortable as it could be given our circumstances.

This stay was worth every cent and not only will we recommend the house but we'll also stay again should the need arise.

Thank you Heidi.

Heidi was very pleasant to deal with and provided me the flexibility I needed when it came to a late checkout. 
The large beautiful home was extremely comfortable and very well equipped to suit my large family's needs. 
Her backyard was manicured abc the pool was super clean.
This was booked on behalf of my colleagues and they really enjoyed their stay. Thanks Heidi

Heidi welcomed our family in person at the house. She gave us a nice tour and made sure we were comfortable using all the controls for the pool, appliances, TV's ect. 
She then sat with us and reviewed our itinerary for the week. She had some great suggestions that we would have never known about that really made our visit to Sydney special.
The house has been updated but still has the charm of an older home with the crown molding and tray ceilings. The kids had a great time in the Pool and jumping on the trampoline.
The neighborhood was quiet and provided easy access to the train as well as shopping and restaurants.
Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Heidi's property and would recommend it with no reservations.

We had a fantastic family reunion trip staying at Heidi's home. She was extremely accommodating letting us stay at the last minute and also letting us extend our check-out when some family members took ill. 
Heidi has a very welcoming and comfortable house which is obviously a well-loved family home. The pool and back garden were amazing. Towels, linen and all appliances etc. were all in great condition. 
We really couldn't have asked for any more! Thank you so much, Heidi

Thanks Heidi,
Awesome property! Our family had a lovely time. We had a gorgeous family bbq on sunday where my children and nephew ran around in the 'park' as my nephew called it. We all enjoyed the pool & spa - even our bubbly black lab! Beds super comfy & delightfully decorated. To top it all off - very quite neighbourhood close to all amenities. Thanks Heidi & family for sharing your fab home.

There are no words to describe how perfect this property was for our needs and for how amazing Heidi was in accommodating our request. Heidi bent over backwards to make the property available to us even though it meant she and her family had to change their plans to vacate the property. 

The location and size of the house plus all the extras were a perfect fit for us. We needed a place where family could come together - from Spain, Bangladesh, Melbourne, Albury, Gundaroo and Canberra - for a funeral and Heidi's place was like coming home. 

On the one night when everyone was staying over, the house easily slept 9 adults and 3 children. It was great having access to 3 bathrooms. Off road parking and great relaxing options both inside and outside. The pool and spa and trampoline and cubby house were the icing on the cake. 

Thank you a million times over for your generosity Heidi - it made a world of difference to all of us.

Heidi's place was absolutely amazing. The house was immaculate with plenty of space for the 3 other couples we had staying with us. The house itself had everything you could possibly want for a weekend in Sydney.
The location was absolutely incredible close to Carlton train station and not to far from the Airport.
A big backyard with plenty of space for kids to run around an amazing pool which was incredible. 
I will be recommending Heidi's place to all my family and friends and will not hesitate to contact Heidi for any further trips to Sydney to see if her place is available.

The most amazing host and home I have ever had the pleasure of visiting! We used Heidis lovely home for a film shoot and could not have found a more idillic location. 
The entire crew wanted throughout the day to jump in the pool and go for a swim it was that inviting.
Heidi is also the perfect host, nothing is too hard or can't be done, she even sourced another dining room table for us!

I would recommend Heidi and hour home to anyone who would listen. Now I want to go back and stay there with my family!

Heidi's house is clean and comfortable. My kids loves her back garden very much. It's a mini playground for them. 
It's easy to reach the shopping center and airport. 
We enjoyed every minutes here in her house.

We loved our stay at this delightful house. The house was perfect for our family holiday of 3 couples and 5 children. The backyard space and amenities were so well suited to our needs, our children happily played outside every waking hour. 
The kitchen is well equipped, with indoor and outdoor dining options. The bathrooms were modern and lovely. The bedrooms were clean and comfortable and spacious for those needing a portacot. 
Heidi is a lovely, accommodating and well organised host and made our stay very comfortable and easy. 
We will most definitely rebook here in the future.

The place is amazing.  Great location for morning walks. Very friendly neighbourhood. The house is very clean and the swimming pool is just way too relaxing. I honestly enjoyed my stay for 5 nights. The place is very spacious and I could not look for any place better than this.

Great house with all the inclusions you could ask for. Very comfortable, private and quiet neighbourhood . Very central and easy to get into the city or to the south. We stayed for two weeks with our three young children and it met our needs perfectly. Will definately recommend.

this home was big and very spacius.can easly stay upto 8 peoples.pool was plus and childrreb likes it.
home have enough aminties and OK wifi.
bugs and flies are only downside but it  its ok if you are not staying long in kitchen.
非常酷的地方,交通方便,设施齐全,干净温馨的家｡

Had a very comfortable stay at Heidi's place. Good central location, close to some great Lebanese restaurants on Rocky Point Rd and handy to Brighton cafes. Comfortable beds and good linens. Bathrooms are lovely. Would recommend for a family trip and would stay again. Thanks Heidi!
Best airbnb experience I ever had. Beautiful place, nice house, well equipped. All you need is provided.
Heidi's house was absolutely perfect for our stay. Immaculately presented and with all the necessary amenities. Plenty of space too--excellent host!
Great hospitality, huge house in friendly neighbourhood
Heidi was a fantastic host. Communication was fast. clear and easy and the house was great. Highly recommended for families and groups.

My family had a wonderful time thank you for your sharing your home with us Heidi . Everything was there that we wanted in a holiday home, Although it would  of been nice to have a second fridge and little more shade for around the pool. Highly recommended

Our family group stayed at Heidi's back in 2016 and we all loved it. One of the kids, aged 8, who has travelled the world and stayed in many fabulous places, declared "Oh, I LOVE that house" when he heard we were returning this year. And once again it lived up to his expectations and surpassed ours. The five bedrooms are stunning and the mattresses to die for on the comfort front. The three bathrooms are the epitome of luxury - they have all been completely made over since our last visit and are both beautiful and functional. The pool, the spa, the cubby house, the hammocks, the undercover outdoor area ... the list of features goes on. And to complete the package is Heidi - the most responsive, flexible host you could hope to meet. If you are looking for a space to share and create memories this is it. Book it now. You won't regret it.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Such a beautiful home that is very comfortable and relaxing. My friends and I really enjoyed our stay here!

name: Excellent studio Copacabana  wi-fi
summary: Excellent studio in Copacabana, near the beach and the Metro . Sleeps 3 . Wi -fi , TV, air conditioning and all furnished .
space: Nicely decorated, with all the furniture , cable TV, air conditioned and wi -fi. Building with  elevators , security cameras throughout the building and 24 hour doorman .
description: Excellent studio in Copacabana, near the beach and the Metro . Sleeps 3 . Wi -fi , TV, air conditioning and all furnished . Nicely decorated, with all the furniture , cable TV, air conditioned and wi -fi. Building with  elevators , security cameras throughout the building and 24 hour doorman . Access to the entire apartment without restrictions. Administrator available during the entire stay to answer the doubts of guests In the heart of Copacabana, quite busy place. Close to public transportation throughout the city . very close to Metro , 10 minutes walking.
neighborhood_overview: In the heart of Copacabana, quite busy place.
notes: - Não são permitidos animais. Respeitar as regras do condomínio. Respeitar a lei do silêncio, que não permite ruídos altos que incomodem os vizinhos após as 22:00 e antes das 8:00 am. Desligar luzes, tv, ventilador e ar-condicionado ao sair do apartamento, evitando acidentes e a cobrança de multa de R$50,00 por dia. Ocupação máxima de 5 pessoas no imóvel. Check in ou check out entre meia noite e 07:00 am, cobrança adicional de R$50,00.
transit: Close to public transportation throughout the city . very close to Metro , 10 minutes walking.
access: Access to the entire apartment without restrictions.
interaction: Administrator available during the entire stay to answer the doubts of guests
house_rules: Respect the rules of the condominium . Not allowed are loud noises after 22 hours and before 8 am. Any damage to the property must be repaired by the guest , although it has additional costs.

host.host_about:
Empresário, economista, MBA em gestão e marketing esportivo.
Esportista e Flamenguista de coração

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
A finalidade da minha hospedagem foi atendida (festas de reveillon). O studio é completo e foi fornecido todas as toalhas, sabonete, ferro de passar, sanduicheira, pratos, etc. 
O anfitrião foi atencioso e atendeu prontamente quando necessário. 
Mas para quem procura um local mais tranquilo, o studio deixa a desejar, pois a janela não proporciona nenhum abafamento acústico da movimentada e barulhenta Av. Nsa Copacbana. 
Achei o ar condicionado sub-dimensionado. Nos dias mais quentes ele não consegue deixar o studio climatizado. 
Não possui controle de entrada na portaria, o que deixa o studio  vulnerável.

Good location for nye. Both Marcos and Junior were helpful when checking in.

Aircon is too weak for the room. Also not enough room for 2nd bed.
Apartment is ok. Good location :)
Espaço simples, mas aconchegante. Acolhe bem no máximo duas pessoas. Super bem localizado, acesso fácil ao metrô, ônibus, praia etc. Comunicação entre os proprietários acessível. No coração de Copa!
Muy buena ubicación. Buena relacion precio/calidad. Puntuales en la entrega de llaves, y flexibles en el momento del check in y check out!!

Pontos negativos: local mal cuidado, limpeza deixou muito a desejar (tinha teias de aranha, poeira, alguns utensílios de cozinha encardidos e inutilizáveis), a entrada do prédio é muito livre para qualquer pessoa, o que pode tornar o local um pouco inseguro; é muito pequeno, cabe no máximo 2 pessoas. Ar condicionado barulhento, ventilador de teto MUITO barulhento (não consegui usar).
Pontos positivos: a comunicação com o anfitrião foi fácil e rápida sempre, a localização é muito boa (perto de metrô, comércio e da praia).
Já fiquei em muitos locais pelo Airbnb em Copacabana e após ter ficado 1 mês nesse espaço acredito que não vale o preço cobrado (custo x benefício ruim). Talvez para pessoas que vão ficar períodos menores e/ou estejam pelo turismo a experiência seja melhor do que a minha.

Excelente ubicación. Departamento modesto pero completo sin problemas en la estadia. Flexibilidad en check in y out con puntualidad perfecta, rápidas y comprensibles respuestas del anfitrión. Volveríamos
Tudo ok, cama boa, localização muito boa. É quente mas tem ar e ventilador que resolvem e barulho de transito para quem se importa, mas para dormir o pr´prio ar e ventilador já amenizam isso

El depto es comodo para dos personas, muy bien ubicado, el aire acondicionado nos sirvio perfectamente, y Junior muy amable. El drpto era seguro, el encargado estaba siempre abajo.
Puntos a mejorar

El depto y el edificio estaba lleno de cucarachas y hormigas.
La heladera tenia mal olor
La llave costaba abrir y cerrar
La puerta del baño se trababa y era dificil abrirla
No habia tazas, solo vasos

Ideally located, this apartment is perfect for travelers wishing to visit Rio! The neighborhood is great, the beach is five minutes away, and, if you want to go to other neighborhoods, there are plenty of buses passing in the apartment’s Street. 
The apartment itself is small but perfectly adapted to travelers, and we very much appreciated our stay in it.

O espaço corresponde exatamente aquilo que se propõe. Próximo do Comércio. próximo de um supermercado grande,que é bem barato, otimo para quem deseja gastar pouco com alimentação e mais com diversão. próximo à padaria, próximo ao McDonald's, Bob's. Apenas sete minutos da praia de Copacabana. local super tranquilo e seguro, bem policiado, a 10 minutos do Copacabana Palace. Os anfitriões foram super atenciosos, não tenho nada a reclamar em relação a isso. Voltarei Com certeza. é um local pequeno porém aconchegante. Tem tudo que alguém  possa precisar, bem pertinho. O Júnior e o Marcos foram super atenciosos e generosos estão de parabéns. Foi a primeira vez que eu Visitei a cidade e adorei.
Je déconseille cette appartement très petit et pa. Beau

A localização é ótima, e o espaço ideal para duas pessoas, talvez três.
A única coisa que deixou muito a desejar foi a limpeza do banheiro e dos utensílios de cozinha.
Falei sobre isso ao proprietário e ele se dispôs a enviar alguém para limpar, mas não ficamos a vontade de ter alguém estranho no local enquanto já estávamos lá.

Muy buena ubicación. Departamento acorde al precio. Rápidas respuestas por parte de los dueños, y super amables. El baño un poco chiquito. Y menos mal que tiene aire acondicionado porque hace mucho calor en la ciudad.

name: PEACEFUL&CUTE room
summary: The first room has a great view of a garden which is really silent, except the birds singing outside. The flat is located really at the center and you are at the heart of the urban life as well as really close to the parks such as Abbasaga Park and Yildiz.
space: Hello, The flat has 3 bedrooms. It has one shared bathroom and a kitchen. I'm renting two bedrooms.  You will have a private room. The first room has a great view of a garden which is really silent, except the birds singing outside. The second bedroom is bigger, it doesn't have a garden view but has sun light and view of the neighborhood. The second bedroom has direct access to the living room that has a balcony and garden view. The flat is located really at the center and you are at the heart of the urban life as well as really close to the parks such as Abbasaga Park and Yildiz. There are all the shops and restaurants 5 min away. Also after 5 min. of walk you can get the public transports to Kabatas, Taksim, Kadikoy and Levent. You have several choices to get a bus or tram, ferry or a taxi. The flat is comfortable but it is a shared place and we can't offer you a holiday as a hotel so you need to agree with sharing a flat with us :)

There are all the shops and restaurants 5 min away. Also after 5 min. of walk you can get the public transports to Kabatas, Taksim, Kadikoy and Levent. You
neighborhood_overview: Besiktas is really at the center of Istanbul, the neighborhood reminds me old Istanbul in a way, close to the sea side, still some parks (Website hidden by Airbnb) a student neighborhood since we are surrounded by a lot of universities, at late night it doesn't make difference since a lot of pubs are close and life goes on, but I love the place very much since, it is really peaceful and silent in the middle of life in Istanbul.
transit: - from both airports there are shuttles to taksim. from taksim you can take bus, minibus, cap to come to my place. - Historical peninsula is 20 min by tram. - Ferry terminal to asian side is 5 min walk - bus stop to taxim or kabatas is 3 min walk. - kabatas is 20 min walk or 5 min by bus, it is the main transportation center to kadikoy, uskudar, princes islands, metro, tram to old istanbul.
interaction: I might be at home or not, But I will welcome you for sure :)
house_rules: Please be sure that you lock the main door and pull the key out when you come in and leave the place.

host.host_about: I'm from Istanbul, studied Archaeology but now self employee and a owner of music booking agency, working from home, living with 3 cats. Enjoys music and nature. A dive master and goes to traveling a lot.

reviews.comments: I Had a great stay in Ulas place. A very nice flat in a tiny calm steet just a stonethrow away from the lively heart of Besiktas. 3 adorable cats and a great host which explained me a lot of things about istanbul and gave me very good recommendations on places to see and to go to which I wouldn´t have found by myself. So thanks a lot!

I enjoyed my stay with Ulas, she was very friendly and welcoming. The flat is near the busy part of Beşıktaş, but on a quiet street, which was nice. It's a little bit of a walk to the tram, but overall a great base to explore the city!
The reservation was canceled 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The flat is very nice and tidy, and the host is very welcoming and friendly, her advice and recommendations were very helpful indeed. The cat family was a pleasant bonus! We greatly enjoyed our stay there.

We really enjoyed our time at Ulas's place, and would have liked to have stayed longer than our 2 nights. 
She's a wonderful host, and an interesting person.  
Warm and very helpful. 
She kindly offered us an Istanbul travel card and had some great advice on what to do. 
Besiktas is also a cool area to stay in, and it's central enough to travel to and from all the other sights around Istanbul very easily. 

Thanks again Ulas! We'd love to stay with you again if we ever come back.

Ulaş was a great host! She gave us good advices, was friendly and nice.
Her apartment was lovely and we felt like home. We fell in love with her cats, they were adorable! The neighbourhood (Beşiktaş) is an awesome place for young people-shops and pubs everywhere. Also the location is perfect, close to the centre. We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul. Thank you, Ulaş!:)

Ulas was a great host for me and my girlfriend's visit to Istanbul. Her place is in a very good location, with great food places nearby and ferry and tram at walking distance. She gave us clear and detailed directions to reach her place. Her recommendation for restaurants became a defining part of our Istanbul experience. Her cats are very cute and friendly. We were moved to another bigger room on reaching. She was not with us during the whole stay but we didn't face any problems in her absence and she was always reachable. Will definitely recommend this place to stay because of the location, price and a nice host.
The reservation was canceled 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

You were a great host, Ulas. We can highly recommend your place. We liked you and the flat from the beginning and enjoyed talking to you. The cats are a funny bunch, sneaking around and watching us with big yes. It is amazing that though in the middle of busy Besiktas at night in the room one can only hear the muezzin and the occasional call of a rooster. Son Onni is still talking about you and carries the blue airpane around that you made him. And we enjoy listening to the vinyls you gave us.

Stayed in one of two rooms (I think) available at this gritty-but-stylish retro apartment. Small kitchen, lived-in, authentic, Ulas was very generous sharing coffee and such; living area is spacious and lovely: Decorated with music posters and relics from Ulas's event-organizing days, as well as tons of books. It has an artist's pad vibe (which I loved, but might not be everyone's style). Ulas (and roommate, too) were very friendly and communication was excellent. The air circulation in the room was a little less than ideal (I stayed in the second room, with the wrought-iron bed frame) and it got quite hot and humid, but hey, it's Istanbul in the summer and overall it was fine. The cats are friendly but got a little lonely when Ulas was gone, but if you like to play with cats, you'll have a family of three to entertain. The bathroom and other aspects of the "facilities" are worn and gritty, but well-maintained and perfectly functional. If you're looking to live as a student or artist in Besiktas, this is a great place to stay. The best part is that it's right off the main drag, which is extremely crowded and busy, but the apartment is actually amazingly quiet for Istanbul and set back enough from the busy-ness that it feels residential and cozy without any sacrifice in convenience.

The place was really nice and the neighborhood was absolutely amazing. It is very lively and safe and well connected to the rest of the city. I enjoyed my stay a lot and definitely recommend this place. Ulas is a lovely host and has been very helpful and responsive and was always happy to give some tips and recommendations! ❤️

Ulas was a really great host! She was there for me when I had any questions and looked for all my needs. The flat is very cozy, so you can feel comfortable like home. It is very central and you can reach all stations by foot. 
Recommended! :)

Ulas's place is in a stunning local area called Besiktas. I really enjoyed the energy of the students and the trendiness of the coffeeshops. Even though it looks rundown, it's very safe to stay there.
During my stay it was quite noisy outside, as the bedroom overlooks the front section of the apartment. The lounge area was lovely and very bohemian.
I didn’t stay at ulas’s place because of a time schedule conflict.
It was very cozy and comfortable to live here. Ulas is very caring and friendly. It was a really good time and unforgettable journey! Thank you so much!

Ulas’s house was in a perfect location: silence but at a minute walking from the center of Besiktas.
The room was comfortable and familiar.
Ulas’s was a really good host and very helpful for advice on Istanbul! I absolutely recommend this place and can’t wait to go back!
It was a good stay. I really enjoyed the hospitality.

We had a lovely time at Ulas' place. The area, Besiktas, is really cool, with lots of nice restaurants and cafés nearby. It was also easy to travel to the sights on the European side that we wanted to see. Ulas was very accommodating and helpful - she gave us great suggestions for where to eat, drink etc. We would definitely recommend the place to others!

summary: It is up of the main center of Üsküdar. So its really close to centers and at same time its quiet. Üsküdar center and port 10-15 min walking distance. From Üsküdar port there are boats to Kabataş, Beşiktaş, Karaköy, Eminönü. Kadıköy 10-15 min by bus
space: The flat is in a calm neigbourhood of Üsküdar, close to Doğancılar Park. It is up of the main center of Üsküdar. So its really close to centers and at same time its quiet. Üsküdar center and port 10-15 min walking distance. From Üsküdar port there are boats to Kabataş, Beşiktaş, Karaköy, Eminönü. Kadıköy 10-15 min by bus, dolmuş or taxi.
description: It is up of the main center of Üsküdar. So its really close to centers and at same time its quiet. Üsküdar center and port 10-15 min walking distance. From Üsküdar port there are boats to Kabataş, Beşiktaş, Karaköy, Eminönü. Kadıköy 10-15 min by bus The flat is in a calm neigbourhood of Üsküdar, close to Doğancılar Park. It is up of the main center of Üsküdar. So its really close to centers and at same time its quiet. Üsküdar center and port 10-15 min walking distance. From Üsküdar port there are boats to Kabataş, Beşiktaş, Karaköy, Eminönü. Kadıköy 10-15 min by bus, dolmuş or taxi. You can use bathroom and kitchen. You can use washing machine, hair dryer The room is big. There is a table for studying. There is 1 big chair for reading ect. You can ask me anything you want. I can give you tips and directions. It's a local neigbourhood. You can't see too much tourist around. But there are a lot turistic places like mosks ect. Maiden Tower is in 10 min walking distance. It's a safe place.
neighborhood_overview: It's a local neigbourhood. You can't see too much tourist around. But there are a lot turistic places like mosks ect. Maiden Tower is in 10 min walking distance. It's a safe place. You can trust people. I'm living here 4 years and I had no problem. You can easly find bakery, market, hair-dresser, fast-food place ( especially you will love çiğköfte). There are 2 local open market on Wednesday and Friday. Sea side is 10 min away with view of Maiden Tower and Bosphorous. Also there is a very nice park near the flar for relaxing. You can enjoy in Fish Bazaar with a lot of local products. You can visit historical mosques.
notes: Keeping clean the places which you use is very important for me.
transit: In fromt of the apartment you can find bus, dolmuş, taxi easly. In front of the apartment there is a free parking place. There are buses and dolmuş going to Kadıköy and Üsküdar center. From Atatürk Airport you will take metro + marmaray and you are in Üsküdar in 1 hour. From Sabiha Gökçen Airport you will take a bus to Kadıköy and then another bus or dolmus or taxi ( aprox. 10 tl) to Üsküdar.
access: You can use bathroom and kitchen. You can use washing machine, hair dryer The room is big. There is a table for studying. There is 1 big chair for reading ect.
interaction: You can ask me anything you want. I can give you tips and directions.
house_rules: Keeping clean the places which you use is very important for me.

name: Modern, Sunny City Pad with views
summary: Sunny, bright, modern one bedroom apartment with balcony overlooking the fantastic views of the city. Short walking distance to Sydney CBD, Botanical Gardens, Woolloomooloo Wharf, Surry Hills, Darlinghurst and Potts Point.
description: Sunny, bright, modern one bedroom apartment with balcony overlooking the fantastic views of the city. Short walking distance to Sydney CBD, Botanical Gardens, Woolloomooloo Wharf, Surry Hills, Darlinghurst and Potts Point.

name: Well lit, quiet, modern apartment
summary: Fantastic private room in the heart of Camperdown/inner west. A popular suburb close to the city. 10 min walk to King st where you'll find great night life, restaurants/cafes, parks and super close to rail and busses into the city. Would suit a single traveller or a couple. Prefer person/s over the age of 30yrs of age.
space: Air con Big windows Super quiet Plenty of light Open plan living area with big glass doors that open up to the court yard Secure building 2.5 bathrooms Internal laundry Internet  TV Microwave
description: Fantastic private room in the heart of Camperdown/inner west. A popular suburb close to the city. 10 min walk to King st where you'll find great night life, restaurants/cafes, parks and super close to rail and busses into the city. Would suit a single traveller or a couple. Prefer person/s over the age of 30yrs of age. Air con Big windows Super quiet Plenty of light Open plan living area with big glass doors that open up to the court yard Secure building 2.5 bathrooms Internal laundry Internet  TV Microwave You will be sharing the apartment with two other females who live in the house, both mid 30's. Very respectful and quiet. Although one will probably be away and the other will be in and out so pretty much have the space to yourself most of the time. Full use of the kitchen, lounge area and court yard. No other people are to be in the apartment at any time and absolutely no parties. I will be away and not really contactable but i can leave you my house mates number if you have any is
neighborhood_overview: Camperdown is just a lovely place to stay. So many nice parks and great cafes right at your door. The new one called the Commons/Acre is situated about a 5 min walk from the house and the other two are about two minutes away....or a lovely 10 minute stroll into Newtown where you'll find funky local shops, cafes, bars, restaurants and a great little cinema called the Dendy. The city is three stops form Newtown station and there are plenty of busses if you prefer.
notes: Fresh linen and towels provided.
transit: Close to public transport. Both busses and Newtown station. There are always taxis around or better yet book an Uber ;)
access: You will be sharing the apartment with two other females who live in the house, both mid 30's. Very respectful and quiet. Although one will probably be away and the other will be in and out so pretty much have the space to yourself most of the time. Full use of the kitchen, lounge area and court yard. No other people are to be in the apartment at any time and absolutely no parties.
interaction: I will be away and not really contactable but i can leave you my house mates number if you have any issues.
house_rules: No guests/ friends to stay over or come into the apartment. No smoking in the apartment. Outside ok with doors shut.

reviews.comments: A really nice place. We enjoyed our stay and Samanthas room was modern, clean and had a really comfortable bed. Samantha was a great host although she was travelling at the same time she did her best to stay in touch. We also received towels, shampoo, body wash and a sponge at the welcome, which was awesome. Beside this Samantha has two really cool housemates who are friendly and helpful. The busses and trains are in a walking distance of 10 minutes which takes you to the CBD, although the famous beaches as Manly and Bondi will take you more than one hour with public transport. I would highly recommend this place.

name: Private room with great breakfast 3
summary: The room is very bright, has a comfortable full size bed, a colourful hammock and fan that helps cooling down during the warm seasons. Two bathrooms as available for use. We offer the guests clean sheets, towels, soaps and a great breakfast!
space: There are two bathrooms available for use and cleaned every day. There's wireless internet signal everywhere in the house We like having a good breakfast and so shall it be for our guests. Self-made bread, different fresh juices, tropical fruits, yogurt, coffee and many complements to eat with the bread. The breakfast is served in a big beautiful living room and we serve different things every day. The kitchen is available for use and we leave space in the refrigerator for the guests. Our permanent guest is a curious cat.
description: The room is very bright, has a comfortable full size bed, a colourful hammock and fan that helps cooling down during the warm seasons. Two bathrooms as available for use. We offer the guests clean sheets, towels, soaps and a great breakfast! There are two bathrooms available for use and cleaned every day. There's wireless internet signal everywhere in the house We like having a good breakfast and so shall it be for our guests. Self-made bread, different fresh juices, tropical fruits, yogurt, coffee and many complements to eat with the bread. The breakfast is served in a big beautiful living room and we serve different things every day. The kitchen is available for use and we leave space in the refrigerator for the guests. Our permanent guest is a curious cat. We live in a quiet, but central, part of Santa Teresa and only down the street, you can find traditional bars, charming cafés, restaurants, souvenir shops, and enjoy a beautiful view over the city. Our neighbourhood is famous for
neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet, but central, part of Santa Teresa and only down the street, you can find traditional bars, charming cafés, restaurants, souvenir shops, and enjoy a beautiful view over the city. Our neighbourhood is famous for its numerous historical houses in colonial architecture and is known as one of the favourites spots for artist residences and studios. It is located on the top of a hill and in a walking distance from Lapa and the center from Rio. Up and down the street from our place you find bus and tram stations. Our goal is to offer you a joyful experience and we are pleased to give tips and advices about special places in Rio.
house_rules: Since we may have other guests in the meantime, we kindly ask our guests to avoid making too much noise if it's too late or too early. It's also not allowed to smoke inside the room.

host.host_about:
I moved from Berlin to Rio in 2012. Davi and me bought this big old house that needed a lot of work to be done. We renovated it completely and tried to keep it as original as possible. We did most of the work ourselves, so it took about 4 years to complete it. Since we had more space than we needed, we decided to give Airbnb a try and it's being a really good experience since. We have been lucky to have nice guests that share many common interests and have a fun time in the city.

I work also with photography (artistic, street) and some graphic design. Davi works as a carpenter building furniture. Most of the house's furniture was made by him. If guests share these (or other) interests, we are always open to show and hand out, what we know about brazilian culture, habits, photographers, artists and etc.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: La casa de Ewa y Davi resultó mucho mejor de lo que pensábamos, era hermosa, muy limpia y el desayuno muy rico tal cual lo ofrecen. Los anfitriones fueron muy amables y nos dieron recomendaciones para visitar Rio, incluyendo guías preparadas por ellos mismos que nos ubicaron rápidamente en el barrio y nos ayudaron a sacarle el mayor provecho al viaje. El barrio de Santa Teresa nos pareció fantástico, seguro y no tan alejado como muchos comentan. definitivamente recomendaría este lugar.

Ewa's place is beautiful and in a really nice location for hanging out in Santa Teresa! She does an amazing breakfast and she is really helpful with giving tips and trip suggestions for Rio - she had ever made little one-day-trip-maps for a few different neighborhoods, including restaurants and store suggestions - we really enjoyed it!

We spent 2 nights and Ewa and her boyfriend's place. It was really great, her little guides with personal Tours and recommendations are really useful, her breakfasts incredibles and herself really nice. Thank you for everything, good luck with your photographs and everything! I hope we'll come back!

Dank Ewa und Davi, hatte ich eine unvergessliche Zeit in Rio de Janeiro. Ewa ist eine tolle Gastgeberin, die jederzeit hilfsbereit ist und einen mit hervorragenden Tipps versorgt. Das Frühstück bei Ewa ist ein Traum, besonders die selbst gebackenen Brötchen und die frischen Säfte sind perfekt um in den Tag zu starten. Das Zimmer und die restliche Wohnung waren super gemütlich und sehr sauber. Zudem liegt die Wohnung in Santa Teresa, eines der schönsten Stadtteile in Rio und perfekt um die Stadt zu erkunden. Nochmals vielen Dank und ich hoffe wir sehen uns irgendwann wieder.
Liebe Grüße David

We enjoyed staying at Ewa and Davi's place. The house is at close walking distance to many nice bars and restaurants in a safe part of Santa Teresa. The house is very clean and nicely decorated. We also really enjoyed the breakfast offered every morning.
Very thoughtful and welcoming host :) The house is charming and it's inhabitant as well. It felt like home.  I highly recommend this place.

Ewa é muito atenciosa , um amor de pessoa! Café da manhã excelente! Lugar limpo e tranquilo, além de lindo é com design
Super recomendo

Ewa and Davi's place is great; recently refurbised, clean, light and spacious, and the area (Santa Teresa) is bohemian and very charming. The breakfast is among the best we've had, even when comparing with "fancy" hotels. Ewa also makes her own maps on the different areas in Rio which we followed with great succes. However, the best part of staying there is the hosts themselves. Ewa and Davi put great efforts into giving their guests a great stay in Rio and their hospitality and help if needed (we lost a phone in an Uber, and they helped getting it back) is truly great. We highly recommend staying there.
Ewa was the perfect host, very helpful and generous. My room was tiny but clean. The breakfast was great and I loved the neighbourhood of Santa Teresa. I can highly recommend this place.

This place is nothing else but beautiful!!! Ewa and her partner were really nice host, the house is a dream, beautiful decorated, beautiful tiles everywhere, clean and quite. the breakfast was also more than deliciouse.
I highly recommend this place and would also come back any time.

Ewa und Davi sind tolle Gastgeber. Mit viel liebe zum Detail, Mühe und Aufwand haben sie das schöne alte Gebäude in Santa Terese wieder hergerichtet. Das leckere, selbstgemachte Frühstück isst man mit Ewa, Davi und anderen netten Gästen. Es gibt viele Tipps für Rio, Bücher und Karten. Die Beiden sind extrem hilfsbereit und teilen ihr Wissen über Santa, Rio und Brasilien. Santa Teresa ist unser Lieblingsstadtteil und besser als bei Ewa und Davi kann man es nicht haben. Danke für Alles! Liebe Grüße!
Stefan und Pia
Ewa and Davi are fantastic hosts - with a very nice, clean and tastefully furnished house in the heart of Santa Teresa. Thank you again for the great stay!
A casa tem uma arquitetura e decoração de muito bom gosto. Os quartos são bem limpos e os anfitriões bastante disponíveis e acolhedores.
Ewa's place is really beautiful as you can see on the pictures. We were really comfortable. The breakfast is great. Ewa is really kind. I totally recommend her place if your election is Santa Teresa.

The moment we arrived, my wife and I were greeted by Ewa and her husband Davi. Ewa even had personalised travel guides made for us, which were very helpful as it covered a majority of the places we wanted to check out. 

Our room was small but just enough for the two of us. The hammock was our favourite and there was the flexibility of temporarily moving it out of the way to make space. Toilets were clean and well-kept. 

Only thing future Airbnb guests may want to consider is that Santa Teresa is located in a hilly residential area and may not be walking-friendly to all especially when going to and from the metro. Taking Uber is probably the best option if you're returning home from the metro. Other than that, Santa Teresa is full of cafes, restaurants and little boutique stores.

A acomodação da Ewa é incrível! Os espaços são muito limpos, arejados e iluminados, além da decoração incrível em toda a casa. O café da manhã, com itens preparados pela própria Ewa, é sensacional, bem farto, com itens deliciosos. A localização é excelente: você está a uma pequena caminhada dos lugares mais agitados de Santa Teresa, mas também em uma área residencial tranquila para relaxar.

Eva's house is charming and have all you need : great location, clean, delicious breakfast, comfort, and beauty or the house. Moreover, Ewa is a great host, she will welcome you, give you advices and help you if needed.
I highly recomend !

Very great host ! Eva and his boyfriends make a lot of things for us, map, advise and the bigger and tasteful breakfirst we never eat !! The home is beautiful, and great localized ! Recommand of course, a lot !
Lugar super tranquilo, casa aconchegante, foi tudo mto tranquilo

On se sent très bien ! La maison est magnifique, très bon goût, fan de la décoration et des meubles! le déjeuner est incroyable (jus frais, fromage, pain maison, etc...). Les chambres sont parfaites pour un couple, intimité, un salon et une cuisine immense ... nous sommes restés plus longtemps que prévu ! Une hôte géniale qui a préparé des cartes avec soin, visites et bars indiqué ! Le quartier est sympa et animé, la maison se situe dans une rue calme. Pour rejoindre les points touristiques parfois on peut aller à pied sinon en Uber :) nous avons adoré ce lieu ! Merci Ewa.. et bisous à Lia !

The Airbnb to me and my partner was like a mini paradise in itself. Breakfast was always fresh, well presented and tasty. All facilities were beautiful and very well maintained. Ubers and taxi's find it difficult and sometimes refuse to go there because of it being perched on at the top of a hill, but that was easily circumvented with a 1 min walk to the highly popular bar at the end of the street where taxi's very often pass. We walked a lot in the night time and never bumped into any characters, other than the odd tourist wondering around as well. Ewa is a great host with a lot of help in direction and restaurants personally approved as good.
a casa é muito gostosa. o café da manhã super especial, com pão feito pela Ewa. foi tudo ótimo! adorei os mapas com dicas da cidade. muito legal!

Wir hatten eine unglaublich schöne Zeit bei Ewa und können Sie einfach nur weiterempfehlen. Von Anfang an stand sie uns bei allen Fragen zur Seite und hat uns super gute Tipps gegeben. Die Wohnung ist mit so viel Liebe zum Detail hergerichtet und man fühlt sich direkt wie zuhause. Das Frühstück war perfekt und ich werde die leckeren Früchte vermissen. Die Lage in Santa Teresa ist einfach perfekt, alles ist im Viertel fußläufig zu erreichen. Santa Teresa bietet eine große Auswahl an Restaurant, Bars und kleinen Lädchen die den Charme des Viertels ausmachen. Wir können einfach nur Danke sagen, für einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in Rio und empfehlen es jedem bei Ewa und ihrer kleinen süßen Familie unterzukommen.

Just perfect. Ewa is extremely nice, flexible, welcoming and has great advice on things to do in Rio. Very nice rooms, decorated with a lot of taste. Breakfast is amazing. We really liked the area around the house. Really nothing to change, we were so happy that we even came back the last night to stay there before leaving Brazil.

Ewa is a fantastic host. She is gracious and warm. She does make homemade breakfast served with peeled fruits so this is a real Air B&B bed and breakfast. So delicious she even prepared a special one when I had an early trip one day. The place is glorious. Meticulous interior design loyal to original state of the house in one of Rio’s old neighborhood of Santa Teresa is so impressive. Two bathrooms makes it so easy to get a start off your day plans. Very clean. A little more elevated than expected with some effort to walk up to in the Rio heat. Also a bit far from train station but worth it to reach to and stay in such charming place with best breakfast and host who gives you a map she made with area tips. Taxi stand very nearby a convenience leaving the neighborhood of Santa Teresa and Über all over Rio easy to go back from Ipanema or Copacobana. During Carnaval there is a lot of bloco block parties on the streets: Taxis know how to avoid them but farther routes mean more metered money. Über has flat rate but would occasionally get into traffic during Carnaval and some Über drivers get surprised of the climb up to Santa Teresa. Beautiful area of all of Rio  I’m so happy to have learned about this area Santa Teresa. Safer place to walk around I think. Best souvenirs from craftsmen here Tucum (closed when I visited last day but noted my Airbnb room had a well-crafted trash can with a tag that is Tucum) and La Verada. Views of the city from Park of Ruins 12 minutes walk. I would come back here for the neighborhood charm, beautiful house, clean bathrooms, talented intelligent host and quietness the most important for me.

Ewa was a super nice host. 
Communication was fast and easy. 
The breakfast was wonderful.

Ewa und Davi sind großartige Gastgeber und ich hatte eine tolle Zeit dort. Sofort nach dem Betreten des bezaubernden und selbst restaurierten Hauses in Santa Teresa, hatte ich ein gutes Gefühl - daran sollte sich bis zu meiner Abreise auch nichts mehr ändern. Die Inneneinrichtung ist ganz nach meinen Geschmack, schlicht, funktional aber mit Liebe zum Detail - man merkt, dass Beide auf der Bauhaus Uni in Weimar waren ;) Das Frühstück war jeden Tag frisch und reichhaltig. Dafür, dass mir Ewa Sonntags sogar Pfannkuchen gemacht hat und 'Late Check-out' überhaupt kein Stress war, gebe ich 10/10 und komme gerne wieder!

Our stay at Ewa's made our last few days in Rio really memorable. Everything is as described and seen in pictures, and better. Really relaxed atmosphere, clean and simple yet stylish interior. Ewa was always available for questions and gave us plenty of tips that took us away from the hustle and bustle of the city. She made us breakfast (which includes self-baked bread) every morning with fresh fruit and juice! We were lucky enough to also meet her little one, equally as friendly and full of smiles. It's the little things that count and make a trip enjoyable, you'll definitely find them at Ewa's.
It is a perfect cozy place, with the best breakfast in town and a wounderful Host!

name: Ótimo sala e quarta e dependência
summary: Apartamento simples na rua do Botafogo Praia Shopping e do Metro, ônibus  quase na porta, comércio farto, próximo do Cristo e Pão de Açúcar, Praias de Copabana e Leme 3km Sala e quarto grande, com cama de casal e um quarto com 1 cama de solteiro.
description: Apartamento simples na rua do Botafogo Praia Shopping e do Metro, ônibus  quase na porta, comércio farto, próximo do Cristo e Pão de Açúcar, Praias de Copabana e Leme 3km Sala e quarto grande, com cama de casal e um quarto com 1 cama de solteiro. Estarei disponível para auxiliar meus hóspedes por toda a estádia.. Botafogo é um ótimo bairro, de fácil acesso, perto do Pão de Açúcar da para ir andando, uma caminhada pela enseada de Botafogo por uns 15 mins. Perto do Cristo Redentor e das Praias de Copacabana e Leme. O bairro tem metro, shopping, vários bares e comércio. Apartamento localizado na rua do metro e tem ônibus quase na porta. Nada de drogas pesadas!
neighborhood_overview: Botafogo é um ótimo bairro, de fácil acesso, perto do Pão de Açúcar da para ir andando, uma caminhada pela enseada de Botafogo por uns 15 mins. Perto do Cristo Redentor e das Praias de Copacabana e Leme. O bairro tem metro, shopping, vários bares e comércio.
notes: Nada de drogas pesadas!

house_rules: Limpeza é fundamental, nada de lixo espalhado pela casa. Não pode toalha molhada em cima da cama, porque ninguém gosta de cama molhada e fedida.  Cuidado com os pratos, não tenho muitos, mesmo se aplica aos copos.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou uma pessoa que está sempre de bom humor, amo viajar e conhecer novas pessoas. Adoro uma boa culinária, música, festa, mas também sou amante de ficar em casa vendo minhas séries favoritas e um bom filme. 

I'm a person who is always  laughing, love to travel and meet new people . I love good food, music, party, but I'm also lover to stay at home watching my favorite series and a good movie.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ficamos hospedados em alta temporada e em um período festivo (reveillon), então o preço pelo qual alugamos o AP foi bastante em conta. O apartamento é bem localizado e possui um espaço bacana. Tudo o que foi colocado na discrição do anúncio se encaixava com o espaço.

name: Taksim Square 2mnt,Balcony,Kitchen,Wifi,Studıoflat
summary: The flat is close to Taksim Square about 2 minutes walk and close to subway, bus and airport shuttle stations.  There is a double bed and a sofabed in the flat.*Balcony  Shower ,Unlimited Wi-Fi , Fridge ,Cooker,Hot water,TV,Air Mattress,HeaterLinen
description: The flat is close to Taksim Square about 2 minutes walk and close to subway, bus and airport shuttle stations.  There is a double bed and a sofabed in the flat.*Balcony  Shower ,Unlimited Wi-Fi , Fridge ,Cooker,Hot water,TV,Air Mattress,HeaterLinen

reviews.comments: Mehmet's apartment was exactly as described. It's well located, about 3 minutes walk to Taksim, and we felt immediately at home! It provides enough space for 2-3 people (there's a kingsize bed and also a couch). The communication was smooth and Mehmet was very helpful with any information we needed. He even went out of his way to make a reservation at a restaurant for us, which he didn't have to do. Mehmet was extremely helpful and accommodating! Excellent place for a getaway in Istanbul, totally recommended!

Large studio downtown Taksim square. Nice located even if you hear very well the sounds of the mosquee at 6.30 am...
The flat could have been cleaner, and the kitchen more furnished. At least a pan and few more Glasses if you want to enjoy some rest "at home".
Beds and TV access were confortable and the wifi not that bad.
We saw Istanbul under the snow it was a very Nice trip!
Thank you Mehmet.
Laura & Benjamin

L'appartement était fidèle aux photos. Il s'agit  d'appart hotel. Propre et agréable. 

Mehmet était disponible et et à l'écoute de nos demandes.

Sultan is a nice person, welcoming with his beautiful smile, his humor, who does't hesitate to give help and suggestions on what to visit in the city
It's true that when you leave the host, you have to climb a slope to go to Taksim, but the apartment is well equipped, clean, well located and very close to all commodities, 10 minutes from Taksim Square, Istiklal boulevard and all ways of transport (taxis, subways and buses).
Thank you Sultan
Great Location, clean apartment and very helpful host.

Nice experience overall. I was concerned with the fact that the host wasn't replying to my messages before arrival, so I was slightly anxious. Then he gave us a different flat, not the one on the pictures, but it was spacious and clean, so we had no problems with that.
The location is good, but you will struggle with the slope to Taksim if you're not really fit.
Great host!

We stayed at Metins apartment for a week , the location is pretty good, not even 5 minutes to Taksim square, the communication with Metin was pretty easy, he answers really quickly and is always helpful. It could have been a little cleaner but apart of that we were pretty happy with our decision.

Nice location next to Taksim square. The apartment is big with two double beds, kitchen and bathroom. Don't know if it's because it was raining but the bathroom always smelled pretty bad, like sewer.
My biggest complain was the wifi and lack of communication. We spent 11 days in the apartment and the wifi only worked for 2 days. I messaged the host several times to see if it culd be fixed but he never even answered my texts. And in a city where public wifi is not the best, we needed to conect to the internet at home... it's nearly 2019!

Metin is a very welcoming and responsive host. There is no problem with late check-in or check-out times. 
The place itself is as I expected and a teal value for the money. Its location is just perfect. 
Recommended.

Хозяин хорошо встретил нас, но заселил в другое жилье. В целом было хорошее расположение, но были накладки с самой квартирой: в первый час заезда захлопнулась дверь в туалет, хозяин не дал нам ключ от неё и просил деньги за вскрытие двери мастером, потом конечно мы договорились и хозяин оплатил. Нам кто-то часто звонил в домофон поздним вечером и был не приятный запах в ванной комнате. Но в целом квартира просторная, с хорошим видом с балкона.
Awesome location around taksim!! Great host too!
Although it was not what was pictured, it was very clean and the staff were accomodating and friendly! Location very close to subway and Taksim square

name: Executive cataluña 6 , 5 bedrooms
summary: Very nice apartment of 195 m 2, with 5 bedrooms  and maximum capacity of 13 personne, with 3 bathrooms, in the center of barcelona less then 10 minutes walk from the Ramblas , the perfect place for your holidays in the Catalan Capital.
