Very nice apartment of 195 m 2, with 5 bedrooms  and maximum capacity of 13 personne, with 3 bathrooms, in the center of barcelona less then 10 minutes walk from the Ramblas , the perfect place for your holidays in the Catalan Capital.  also you have:  TV plasma, Internet Wifi, DVD,A/C, Dishwasher, Fridge - Freezer, Washing machine, Oven, Microwave oven,  Coffee machine, Toaster, Kettle, Kitchen tools, Bed linen and towels, Hair dryer Location: District: Eixample Subway: Universitat L1, L2  To pay at arrival  Turistix tax :  2,48 € / per personne / per night Check- in : Sunday and bank holidays ( extra 30 €) check-in afhter 19h ( extra 30€) after 23h ( extra 50€)
house_rules: Party are forbiden, No smoking  in all the apartment, but you can on the balcony, pets no permited, no noise after 22h00 and respect the neighbors.

host.host_about: Grandes apartamentos de 3 hasta 6 habitaciones en el centro de Barcelona España.

reviews.comments: appartement très grands , 5 chambre et au centre de Barcelone , quartier très sympa !

L'appartement était tout à fait conforme à la description.Nous avons apprécié la disposition et les pièces très spacieuses pour une grande famille.
La situation est appréciable pour se promener dans Barcelone à pieds ou en métro
Nous avons été très bien accueillis  par notre hôte qui était très ponctuel pour la remise des clefs et qui nous a très bien conseillé pour les visites que nous envisagions de faire.

A beautiful, spacious apartment in the heart of Barcelona! Exactly as described. Lovely, accommodating host.

Thank you for a wonderful stay

Our host met us at the front door and was very cheerful and kind.  He gave us the walk through and thoroughly explained everything to us (where everything was, don't leave without the keys, how to use the washer and dryer, etc.).  The place was updated well for our requirements.  The one great thing was the air conditioner.  It really cranked out the air in each room and the living room.  In like 5 minutes you either needed a blanket or to turn it off/down.  It has a lot of room and everything you need in the kitchen, plus there's a grocery store literally at the front of the building.  When you have the doors open, the street can be noisy in the living room, but you have a huge balcony to people watch and you're in Barcelona which is never quiet.  Think NY, or Miami.  The location is very central, about a 5 minute walk to the Ramblas.  Barcelona is very spread out so it's not close to everything, but the subway is easy to use, cheap and a block away.  There are a bunch of cafes and other restaurants/stores right downstairs as it's on the main thoroughfare of Gran Via.  We couldn't have been happier.  One negative that is really unavoidable in an old city like this the elevator.  It can fit one person and maybe two pieces of luggage comfortable, so you need to make a few trips up to the 3rd floor.  But it is a beautiful piece of history in and of itself and is fully functional.  A warning would be that if you're planning on throwing a raucous party don't stay here.  The building has strict rules as it is residential.  If the police come, you're out on the street and your security deposit is gone.  We just needed a place to stay.  All the partying is done out in the city!  Great place to relax and kick back before and after sightseeing, dinner, or whatever.  Highly recommend.  Great location, great host, great town!

Tout s'est fait naturellement avec Sam, lorsque nous avons découvert l'appartement il était exactement comme sur les photos (il n'y a pas de photoshop derrière). Nous sommes partis à 11, et bien que cela puisse faire beaucoup il est très facile par la disposition et les pièces de la maison (3 salles de bains, mais 4 douches) d'avoir son moment de paix sans forcément être avec tout le monde. 

Au niveau localisation rien à dire, on ne peut pas être mieux situé (métro, navette de l'aéroport, gare, supermarché, magasin)

Sinon Barcelone est vraiment une ville si agréable et les gens sont si gentils que ce n'est que du bonheur  ! Je crois avoir tout dit, bonnes vacances ;) 

Ps : il y a la clim partout

A lovely apartment in a central location, surrounded by many good bars and restaurants. The apartment is a minute walk from the metro - useful for getting to the beach - and the landlord was helpful, giving us plenty of recommendations of places to go out. All in all a perfect location for our group holiday and I would definitely use SamFlat again.

A nice flat which was big enough to accommodate my 11 guests very easily. All the cooking essentials were there to make our stay comfortable. Would def recommend again although may need a little bit of modernisation. Only gripe is that we asked if we could check out at 12 which was agreed only to be fronted by the cleaning team at 11, which meant a quick rush to gather our stuff and leave. However we were informed later that  this was a misunderstanding between Andy and his team.

Host was very welcoming and helpful.  Apartment was perfect.  Location was great!  Only negative was that neighbour was a little bit unduly aggressive with us for playing music at a reasonable level @9PM on a friday night.  But that was the one and only negative to a wonderful stay.  Thanks very much for having us!
Très bel appartement, bien situé. Conforme aux photos. Très pratique pour plusieurs familles.

Great location, easy to get to from airport. Situated conveniently for many of the sights of Barcelona. Enquired about checking in early to the apartment and had a prompt response back to say yes which was great. Sam who met us at the apartment was very helpful and informative. We were a group of 10 and the flat felt spacious. All round great apartment good host.
Las fotos siempre son mejores que la realidad, pero, aún así, un excelente y espacioso piso inmejorablemente situado.

The apartment is extremely easy to reach, taking the Aerobus from the airport, and getting out at the third stop, Universitat. I was met at the front door by the renter, who showed me the place. 

Although the pictures are perhaps a bit too glamorous, the apartment itself lives up to the expectations: it is huge, sleeps 11 people, it has three bathrooms, and a living room which we hardly even used. 

The only beef you could possibly have with the place is that the bed room facing the Gran Via is a bit noisy due to the heavy traffic. So bring earplugs, and all is well. 

It is a great place at a great location, and I would certainly rent it again if I had the chance.

Julian was very helpful when we arrived, and he took the time need to explain everything and answer all our questions about Barcelona. The apartment is as described, however, it could have been been cleaner and it needs maintenance, specially in the bathrooms.

We arrived a bit late in the evening, but our host greeted us and was very welcoming and informed us about every possible, relevant fact we should know about! We had a wonderful stay in Barcelona (which by the way was an amazing city, and the weather was like summer compared to Denmark) , the apartment was huge, had a perfect location, was quiet during the night and had every equipment we needed! We would definitely recommend the apartment to everyone!
Lovely apartment and well located. Host was very flexible for arrival and leaving time too which was great.

The Host was great. Met very promptly at fairly short notice. Very efficient and helpful upon checking in.

The apartment was just as described. Very spacious for 13 people and clean and tidy as shown in the photos.

The location is perfect. Very close to the centre, metro stations, bars, restaurants and local shops and bakerys for breakfast and food etc.

Some of the party are looking to rebook this place again for later in the year.

Sentralt beliggende og stor leilighet med plass til mange. Bildene tilsa kanskje en litt bedre standard enn vi opplevde - leiligheten var litt sliten, men den fungerte optimalt for vårt formål. Det var rimelig stille selv om leiligheten lå langs en stor og trafikkert vei og de fleste soverommene vendte ikke ut mot vei. Det var 3 bad og det var deilig når vi var så mange. Husverten var profesjonell, hyggelig og serviceminded. Alt fungerte helt supert og vi hadde et fantastisk opphold i en nydelig by!

The apartment concerning the description on Airbnb. 
The apartment was clean, the price performance ratio fit and the location of the apartment was great. 
Communication with SAMFlat before arrival was absolutely without problems. 
The check in staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. 
All in all was the apartment TipTop.

Super emplacement pour visiter Barcelone.
L'appartement est grand et spacieux mais il demanderait un peu de rafraîchissement et d'entretien, notamment au niveau des salles de bain.

Our stay was great at Sam's apartment! The host were helpful with the answers and very quick. And also, he came to deliver the key on time as we have agreed. The apartment was exactelly they way was discribed, big aptm really confortable and clean! The location is the best of the apartment, we were in the heart of Barcelona. Just down was a supermarket and few meters away the subway and bus station. Plaza Cataluña, one of the main squares was just 10 min away.
really recommended!!

Premier expérience Airbnb réussie largement! Surtout pour un appartement trouvé le jour-même suite à une annulation de dernière minute.
Appartement magnifique, tout équipé et bien situé au centre ville.  Les prestations sont conformes aux photos. 
Notre hôte Sam a été disponible, réactif et de bons conseils! 
Je recommande vivement cet appartement!

Our stay at Sams flat was amazing. He met us on time, explained everything about the place and the neighbourhood which was very helpful. The place was great, huge clean and quiet. Would easily be suitable for 12 people, well located apartment in the center would definitely recommend.

Très bon accueil, appartement conforme à la description et aux photos, très propre, nous y avons passé un très bon séjour ! 
Le voisinage reste cependant très peu tolérant au bruit...

The apartment was very spacious enough for 12-13 people. However, it was not as clean as I would expect it. The sheets had stains on them. The apartment did not look as clean as the shown in the pictures. The location is near the metro station. Very convenient.

Very good spacious (Website hidden by Airbnb) location and clean.
An enjoyable stay.
Très bon séjour. Appartement fonctionnel et situé en ultra centre, proche de tout. Toutefois, il est un peu plus sombre qu'il n'y parait sur les photos. Les prestations sont au niveau attendu.
Very welcoming host. Amazing apartment and a perfect location. We were shocked by how big the apartment was.

le logement est bien situé à deux pas de plusieurs lignes de métro, et même à pied ça reste agréable. Après le logement, est propre mais on a bien senti que c'était pour de location lucrative plutôt que pour le partage de l'amour de leur ville
Thank you for hosting us, central location, warm welcome, very clean appartment and enough space for all of us !
We really enjoyed our stay here. It was super clean and much larger than we expected. Location was perfect as well! We would definitely recommend it to our friends.

Appartement très grand avec 3 salles d'eau (appreciable pour partir à l'heure le matin) - très bien placé (le bus pour l'aéroport à 150m, 2 lignes de metro également, tous le centre de Barcelone accessible à pied). Bien équipé pour manger à 12. 
Seul bémol, une des 5 chambres est située sur une rue très passante et est donc bruyante mais sans doute comme beaucoup d'endroit à Barcelone. 
Au final un très agréable séjour à Barcelone.
The host was nice and the flat lived up to the expectations.
Amazing apartment, would recommend to anyone going in a large group :)

Nous avons été très contents de trouver cet appartement suite à l'annulation d'une autre réservation sur Barcelone la veille de partir. La personne qui nous a reçus était très sympathique, ses explications claires et efficaces. L'appartement est spacieux (nous étions 11) et très bien situé. Par contre, si certains lits sont d'excellente qualité, il manque des lattes sur d'autres ! Il y a un accès wifi, mais seulement dans l'entrée ! L'appartement, comme les meubles, est un peu vieillot. 2 salles de bains sur 3 ne ferment pas à clef et la chambre donnant sur l'avenue est très bruyante. Cela dit comme nous n'étions pas à Barcelone pour rester dans l'appartement, nous avons passé un très bon séjour.
Everything was ok
Apartamento perfecto para familias con niños en lugar muy céntrico en Barcelona. Fácil accesibilidad y un muy buen anfitrión.
Last minute I could not travel, however my fellow team did and the week worked out very well.  I asked the team for comments back and everything was very good.
Really nice apartment in a great location. Would definitely recommend and stay again.

Appartement très bien situé, proche de plusieurs métros/bus, possibilité d'aller à plusieurs endroits à pieds. Propre, bien équipé et très fonctionnel, avec 3 SDB (ce qui est très appréciable pour 13 filles!). Possibilité d'arriver et de repartir plus tard (mais avec des frais supplémentaires).  Hôte disponible et réactif.

L'appartamento è in un'ottima posizione. La comunicazione con l'host molto buona: disponibile e mai invadente, concede grande fiducia agli ospiti. Stanze e bagni puliti, tutto funzionante e funzionale.

Very good location for example underground station is near the flat. Good choice for large groups (10-13). Kitchen equipment is good also. One of the rooms smells mould and there wasn't good to sleep and our group members who slept there have to change room. Although we inform this problem and contact person take it seriously and apologise the problem and say it will be fixed.
Nice location but we had loud neighbours. Very spacious, not big luxury but clean and good beds.

Thanks for hosting us.

The apartment was nice, location was superb, had good ambiance, most importantly if fit us all comfortably (a family of 13 adults plus an infant).
It took a while to carry all the luggages upstairs since the lift was small, but that's expected since we were a big group, for smaller group this wouldn't be an issue at all.

Overall it was an enjoyable stay.

Thanks

Pat
Sam's flat is spacious, comfortable and very centrally located. 9 of us stayed there for 4 days and we had a great time. We we're able to easily find our way around the city.
Great place to stay for a big group, the place is huge and has enough room, space and necessities for a group of people. We all really loved our stay and would definitely recommend to stay here!
Super avec Samuel quiest réactif et trouve des solutions!
WIFI in the living room didn't work and apartment doesn't look the same as on photos.

We wrote 2 emails to the landlord while we were staying in the apartment, mainly for the bathroom problems and elevator issues. However, the landlord never replied until we leave the apartment. It's a really irresponsible attitude which made us quite disappointed, one of the bathroom was flooded, the water  flow very slow, so we couldn't take a shower in one of the bathroom. Besides the irresponsibility, the apartment is spacious, the location is nice too, it has carrefour just right downstairs which is convenient to get the grocery.
Very spascious and great location! Beautiful apartment and very friendly helpful host. Would stay here again!

The location of the flat was incredibly convenient.  The metro was just a block away taking us to wherever we needed to go.  The apartment was very large and was a comfortable space for 8 people.  The kitchen was well equipped.  The dryer was basically useless, but there was a drying rack and a clothing line out the window for quick drying.  Sam was prompt in responding and took us through check-in quickly and efficiently.  Overall, it was good for what we needed during out stay.
Perfect apartment for large groups!
Great!

Sam's flat is brilliant for a large group, it was very easy to check in and Sam was very accommodating with our needs.

It's not too far a walk from the northern side of La Rambla, it's a 40 minute walk from the beach which wasn't too far for us but if you did decide to take a taxi it will be fairly cheap.

There are lovely restaurants that are quite local too, and there are plenty of shops nearby for all your needs.

All in all it's a nice apartment and we had a great time staying there.

The location of the apartement is very good, it is close to the main attractions, to the beach, etc. The flat is spacious and well equipped but I recommend to offer more liqued soap as the flat is suitable for bigger groups. We had difficulties with the Wifi also, it did not work at all on the last day and in we could not connect to it in the living room.
All in all, we had a pleasant time in SamFlat, I would recommend it to anyone!

Location is fantastic! There were 13 of us and the flat was perfect for us, there were actually enough beds for us all to sleep in one rather than someone having to use the sofa bed. Enough showers for us all to get ready and not be waiting on everyone.
Great location and hosts are very efficient.  a small problem with drains smelling in the bathroom but this was resolved very quickly.

Appartement idéalement situé pour découvrir Barcelone 
Sa capacité importante de couchages permet de partir un WE prolongé dans cette superbe ville entres copains.
L’agence qui s’occupe de cette location est très sympathique et arrangeante concernant les sacs pour le jour du départ.
Appartement vivement recommandé

Logement correspondant aux photos.
Hôte réactif dès l'arrivée, infos claires et précises, bon accueil.
Rien à dire sur la propreté.
A 20min à pieds des ramblas.
A recommander.
Really nicely located, the flat is huge and clean. We really enjoyed our stay.
Very centrally located
Great place for groups!
Very spacious flat, and well located. The beds were very comfortable too! Perfect for a stay with a big group
O espaço é realmente muito grande, da para mais de 12 pessoas com conforto.

The apartment did the job of accommodating 9 hens and there was plenty of space. The photos are definitely a lot brighter than in reality. The apartment definitely needs a little TLC. However, it was in the perfect location!
Glad our group picked SamFlat's place! Sam was quick and helpful in his responses, check-in as well as check-out was seamless, and this location is excellent.
Great location just 10-15 minutes walking from pretty much everywhere. Would recommend for large groups.

Appartement idéalement situé et approprié pour grands groupes.
Appartement avec un énorme potentiel mais peu entretenu. Très mal isolé, on entend tous les bruits de l'artère principale jouxtant l'appartement.
Good flat for a big group, great location very convenient

Excellent location - really spacious. Plenty of room for 12 of us to either be social or have our own space. Comfy beds - and we had a bed each ( no using sofa beds). Lovely balcony for people watching. Highly recommended for larger groups. Close to public transport so really easy to get around Barcelona. And a supermarket just downstairs and a few yards away which was very handy.

Located under 10 min walk from Las Ramblas. Stayed as a group of 13 girls for a hen. We was allowed to check in early and drop bags off. Rooms were clean and spacious. There is security in the main entrance which made us feel safe.

Fantastic host and location - would definitely recommend! The apartment was stylish and clean and more than comfortable for a group of 12. There are bars, restaurants and shops within a stone's throw from the flat. Would definitely go back!
Great host. Very communicative. Great location and all the things a person needs. Clean and neat!

The appartement is perfectly located. Near las ramblas and the metro. It looks exactly how it is showed in the pictures! The check-in was super easy and cool! We were a group of 13 people and there was enough space. I can only recommend it!
Lovely and large place! Came in a large group and there were plenty of space.
Great position. The host has been always available and precise. Definitely recommended

Sam’s flat is a wonderful and extremely lovely flat that I would advise anyone going to Barcelona to stay in. 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms in the middle of city centre, what more could you ask for with a big family travelling. 
Sam made this experience for myself and my family one to remember, I will definitely be staying at Sam’s flat when I go back to Barcelona.
sam is a great host. the place is perfect for large groups. very spacious and a great location.

localisation . apparemment fonctionnel et propre.literie de bonne qualité  .
le vigile présent la nuit dans l escalier est bien pensé.nombres de jeu de clefs en nombre suffisant. communication et informations précises et de qualité.
very good job
overall great apt! def, coming back

Great location but the pictures are definitely outdated. The kitchen smelled like fish upon our arrival and there was a stain on the sheets. When we complained about the smell, they did come as soon as possible to help clean and get rid of the smell.

Fantastic stay! host very easy to communicate with and the location is fantastic! The space was great for 9 of us, with there being plenty of room for a few more people. Plenty of bathrooms and great communal spaces too. The location is ideal- within walking distance of several great parts of the city and great transport links. Highly recommend!

The apartment was in a great location. And is perfectly suited for a large group. Was met outside the property as the previous guests had just checked out and was aloud to leave our bags in the apartment while it was cleaned until check in which was a bonus! Apartment was large and very comfortable. Would defiantly recommend and would return. Thanks for the stay.
Very good located. Clean. The Communication with Sam has been perfect. Best Place for big groups. Thank you.
Ótima localização e espaço amplo para 5 casais.

Molto diverso da quello che si vede in foto però un buon appartamento.
posizione ottima
Sam‘s flat is absolutely amazing. Our entire company was able to fit and the flat is super located.
L’espace de l’appartement et sa localisation sont des points positifs mais de nombreux désagréments (très sombre, très bruyant, vieillot) gâchent ces avantages. Décevant
Awesome huge apartment and an excellent location! Hospitable host!

Schock beim Eintreffen ins Apartment. Es sah viel viel schlimmer aus als auf den Fotos. Die Bilder sind bearbeitet. Die Wohnung ist herunter gekommen, dreckig, verschimmelt und abscheulich. Ich würde nicht mal meinen schlimmsten Feind dorthin schicken.
Everything was fine, we had nothing to complain about. Excellent host with a nice aparmtent
Very nice
Excellent stay in a great apartment :)

Super séjour en famille. Un emplacement idéal pour rayonner dans tout Barcelone et une chambre parfaite pour que tous les cousins dorment ensemble.  Notre hôte nous a aussi permis de déposer nos bagages avant l’heure d’arrivée ce qui était vraiment appréciable pour un vol qui arrivait tôt le matin. Merci encore!
Great experience and perfect location :)
Imboccate che è da paura ,posizione ottima , camere ottocentesche , ottima cucina ,

SamFlat's apartment is perfect for a big group, very spacious with lots of bedrooms and living areas. The location was superb, so close to metro station and city centre. All in all, we had a very pleasant stay!
Decent accomodation

Sams apartment is conveniently located and big enough to accomadate a large group. It has security and also has other Apartments in the building so you have to somewhat watch your tone which is a little annoying when on vacation. Other than that Sam was great helped us check in our bags and made sure the apartment had everything we needed and explained everything thoroughly. Very conveniently located and enough space for everyone. I’d stay here again if ever in Barcelona due to its great location and walking distance to everything.
Great host and great place. Location is hard to beat. Plenty of rooms and beds to accommodate everyone. Sam was a great host.
Nice
Bon séjour, propre, bien situé, je recommande++++
Thank you. A wonderful place. Good location. Lots of space.

name: Rede na varanda com vista verde
summary: Apto todo mobiliado,com wi-fi, ar cond,em área arborizada,com 2 dormitórios, sendo 1 suíte com cama de casal e uma TV a cabo e 1 quarto com bicama de solteiro e 1 banheiro social.Sala de jantar para 6 pessoas integrada com sala de estar/TV a cabo, sofá retrátil pra 6 pessoas.  Cozinha completa, lavanderia  com tanque e máquina de lavar roupa, aquecedor a gás. Prédio com piscina e próximo ao Cristo Redentor, Pão Açúcar, Aterro Flamengo, praia de Copacabana dentre os principais pontos truísticos.
space: O Condomínio possui piscina, a qual está disponível aos hóspedes, respeitando as regras e limitações de horários.
description: Apto todo mobiliado,com wi-fi, ar cond,em área arborizada,com 2 dormitórios, sendo 1 suíte com cama de casal e uma TV a cabo e 1 quarto com bicama de solteiro e 1 banheiro social.Sala de jantar para 6 pessoas integrada com sala de estar/TV a cabo, sofá retrátil pra 6 pessoas.  Cozinha completa, lavanderia  com tanque e máquina de lavar roupa, aquecedor a gás. Prédio com piscina e próximo ao Cristo Redentor, Pão Açúcar, Aterro Flamengo, praia de Copacabana dentre os principais pontos truísticos. O Condomínio possui piscina, a qual está disponível aos hóspedes, respeitando as regras e limitações de horários. A varanda é um delicioso espaço para relaxar ou confraternizar, com vista para área verde de Laranjeiras - Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro. O prédio está situado a 50 metros de ponto de ônibus e a 500 metros da estação do metrô do Flamengo. A 20 metros há ponto de estação de bicicletas do Itaú para serem alugadas e utilizadas nas ciclovias próximas. Frequentemente pessoas são vistas fazen
neighborhood_overview: É um bairro arborizado que oferece segurança por estar próximo à Sede do Governo Estadual (Palácio Guanabara), além de possuir vigilância privativa na rua, 24hs por dia.  Constantemente miquinhos podem ser vistos nos galhos das árvores da vizinhança. É um bairro muito gostoso para caminhar onde também é possível chegar a vários lugares com as bicicletas superbaratas do ITAÚ, contemplando as belas paisagens da Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro e fazendo um pit stop para tomar água de coco, além de um refrescante banho de mar. Há museus e restaurantes próximos, bem como a badalada Praça São Salvador que é um ponto bastante frequentado e movimentado pelo público de idades variadas,  às sextas e sábados à noite. Aos domingos pela manhã, desfrutar do prazer de ouvir o show de chorinho e de fazer compras na feirinha de artesanato Praticamente em frente ao prédio, está o Clube do Fluminense.
notes: Quase em frente ao prédio, há  pontos de ônibus para o Cristo Redentor, Pão de Açúcar e Praia de Copacabana, levando apenas, cerca de 10 minutos. Caminhando apenas 15 minutos até a estação do metrô Flamengo, pontos turísticos como Maracanã, Teatro Municipal, Museu de Belas Artes, dentre outros, podem facilmente ser acessados.  Mercados, farmácias e restaurantes estão localizados a 5 minutos a pé do prédio.
transit: Em frente ao prédio há pontos de ônibus para diversas partes do Rio e, andando apenas 15 minutos chega-se ao metrô do Flamengo. Há pontos de Táxi próximos, além de táxis que circulam pelas ruas a todo momento.  Na rua do prédio, vagas de estacionamento são facilmente encontradas, uma vez que a maioria dos edifícios possuem garagem própria.
access: A varanda é um delicioso espaço para relaxar ou confraternizar, com vista para área verde de Laranjeiras - Zona Sul do Rio de Janeiro. O prédio está situado a 50 metros de ponto de ônibus e a 500 metros da estação do metrô do Flamengo. A 20 metros há ponto de estação de bicicletas do Itaú para serem alugadas e utilizadas nas ciclovias próximas. Frequentemente pessoas são vistas fazendo caminhada pelo bairro.
interaction: Estarei disponível para recebê-los e atendê-los sempre que precisarem durante a estada. Ofereço horários de check in e check out flexíveis, ou seja, podem chegar a partir das 8 da manhã e sair até as 20h.
house_rules: O prédio é familiar, então gostaria que mantivessem as regras de boa convivência com os moradores e zelo com o apartamento, entregando-o no mesmo estado que estava ao receber as chaves.  É permitido fumar e animal de pequeno porte.

reviews.comments: Airbnb

Alugamos o Ap no Carnaval 2016, e foi uma otima experiencia! Alem da otima localizaçao o apt e muito confortavel, principalmente a varanda com rede. Agradeçemos muito a Marcia pela hospitalidade, flexibilidade com os horarios de chegada e saida!

Marcia was very helpful and kind! She made us feel very welcome since our arrival, even showing all the directions around. The apartment is really well located, just in front of the Governor’s Palace! Ah, and it has a very comfy sofa too. 
A Marcia foi uma anfitriã incrível, muito atenciosa e gentil! Ela nos vez sentir em casa desde o momento que chegamos, até mesmo nos mostrando todas as direções nas redondezas. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, em frente do Palácio do Governador. Ah, e também tem um sofá super confortável!
Marcia foi super atenciosa e a estadia no apartamento dela foi incrível! Super recomendo!

Es un departamento muy hermoso acogedor,limpio, ordenado igual que la casa de uno, además te sorprende de llegada con atenciones, esta bien ubicado es un barrio residencial, cerca de metro obnibus. Marcia y familia esta pendiente de preguntas que puedas hacer, te aconseja donde ir a comprar, visitar, como llegar sólo puedo decir gracias.

Márcia foi excepcional! Recebeu muito bem com um café da manhã. Extremamente simpática e ótima anfitriã. Pretendo voltar outras vezes e super recomendo. O apartamento é excelente. Bem equipado, muito bem localizado, confortável, espaçoso, aconchegante e lindo. Foi bastante tranquila com o check in e check out

La estancia fue perfecta.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Great part of town.  Apt was as described.  Simple and effective at a reasonable price.

L'appartamento è centrale è molto comodo per la fermata della metro vicinissima. Quartiere molto carino, ci sono molti locali per la colazione e la cena nei dintorni! Abbiamo avuto un problema per lo scambio di chiavi, dato che la nostra host era partita e il supermercato dove aveva lasciato le chiavi aveva cambiato cassiere e non sapeva di averle. Questo ci è costato un po' d'attesa distrutti dal viaggio, ma per fortuna la persona che si occupa dell'appartamento quando Qiyao è fuori è corsa in nostro soccorso e ci ha aiutato a risolvere.
Qiyao inoltre è stata molto flessibile per l'ora del check out e questo ci ha aiutato molto.

I had an absolute blast in New York, and this apartment is in the best location you could possibly want to be in - the amazing Greenwich Village, walking distance from all the coolest bars and clubs and restaurants! The apartment was clean and well looked after with everything I needed!

Un superbe séjour pour redécouvrir New York, l'appartement de Qiyao est parfaitement situé pour découvrir et profiter de la ville à pied, ou en métro. Le système Keycafé est vraiment très pratique, il permet de récupérer les clefs à toute heure, notre vol ayant eu du retard, nous n'avons pas eu à faire attendre notre hôte. Tout était parfait !
Very good location and very calm apartment! Qiyao is very easy to talk to, she answered very quickly!

I had a nice stay at Qiyao's place. Everything was very well organized even though I never met Qiyao in person. She was very responsive and friendly. Perfect neighbourhood for good food, bars and live music.

We have been in the apartment for 8 nights and it was a great experience. The apartment is clean, spacious and the location is great.
We've had a great time and we hope to come back here in the future.
Great location, in the middle of where you want to be...

Qiyao was a great host.  She responded very quickly to emails and texts before and during our trip and set up our arrival thoughtfully.  The apartment was as described and is in a truly fantastic location in NYC - ideal for two people.  The building had a heating issue for a day and Qiyao was immediately accommodating and responsive to the problem, which we really appreciated.

Would absolutely recommend this spot, we did a 1 week stay and it was perfect.

In such a great location, this apartment is very close to great food spots, the subway, right in the heart of Manhattan. We truly felt like we were part of the city! The apartment itself is very cozy, with a nice bed and essentials provided. When we mentioned to the host that it was a little chilly, she immediately bought us a portable space heater for same-day shipping, with espresso beans to make in the coffeemaker to boot! 

So all in all, great location, nice apartment, and seriously wonderful host who is responsive and who made sure our stay was everything we wanted. Highly recommended!

Qiyao's place was clean tidy spacious and in a great location. The bed was comfortable and it had all the amenities we needed. Qiyao was receptive to our requests and provided great brunch recommendations. I have no hesitations in recommending this property

We spent a week over New Years Eve in New York in Qiyao's apartment. First of all, the location is just perfect! Subway, grocery stores, reatsurants, bars, shops,... just everything is around you. In the apartment it's quiet cause it's on the backside. The bed is really comfortable and perfect for relaxing and chilling and of course sleeping after long days visiting the city. We never met Qiyao, but she really answered fast when I had any questions. If you're looking for an apartment that is in walking distance to everything in the city, that's the place to be! Thank you Qiyao for the good time, I definetley recommend you and your apartment :)

Qiyao's place was just what I was looking for. Impeccable location, super easy check-in, great communication, and very clean & comfy. I was in town for business and was able to walk to work in Union Square in about 10 minutes. You can hear a neighbor's music a bit in the morning and evening... it didn't bother me at all but may be notable if you are a light sleeper.
Really a great experience at Qiyao's place!

great location~~
but I could hear next door people chatting~ kk
Nice neighborhood~

Qiyao 's apartment was in a great location. Close to lots of restaurants, cute shops and bars. It was also easy to walk everywhere or the subway station was very close. Qiyao was very quick in responding to our inquiry's, which was very helpful. We did find the apartment was very warm even for winter.  But overall we had a great stay and would recommend it!

Great location and clean room. Good communication with our host and quickly answered any questions we had. Apartment was small but you are paying for the location. Neighbors were a bit loud. Overall a great stay.

Very nice location with the subway and all the restaurants.
Qiyao Li was very fast to respond and very helpfull with all our needs.
Nice stay :)
Small but nice apartment for one or two people. In a great location, able to walk to just about anything you needed. Comfortable bed, nice shower and kitchen.
Beautiful apartment that is both close to night life and still calm at night. Extremely close to public transit to get anywhere else in the city.
Qiyao's place was amazing. Great location, very clean and cozy. Highly recommended!

Great apartment on a quiet street in the west village, very comfortable bed for a great nights sleep and the apartment is within walking distance of so many places. 
Qiyao was very helpful and kept in contact to see if i needed anything else during the stay. Would 100% stay again

We had a nice time at Qiyao's apt. Qiyao was very responsive and made it easy to check in. Her apt is in a fantastic location. Apt didn't have any blinds / curtains which was a bit awkward. Sheets had some stains on them. Apt is tiny and didn't have any closet / drawer space to put clothes in - you're obviously paying for location.

Qiyao's place was great - awesome location with the subway and tons of restaurants, shops and bars right around the corner. Qiyao was very fast and super helpful with any questions we had and very accommodating when we had some delays on arrival. If we ever come back to New York we'd definitely stay at her place again.

Qiyao's place is fantastic! Great location in the West Village with shops and restaurants literally right outside the front door. It was clean and just the right amount of space for 2 people. Qiyao was very responsive and allowed my sister and I to drop off our bags before our check-in time. I would not hesitate to book Q's place the next time I'm in NYC. Thank you for the lovely stay!
Great location. Close to subway, local restaurants, and supermarkets/convenience stores. The apartment is just as described and Qiyao was very helpful.

The apartment is in a great location, easy access to everything with good subway/bus options. The house is small but for the value and location, it's not bad - one bedroom with a kitchen and a bathroom. It's a walk-up with one flight up the stairs to get to the apartment. The kitchen was practical and bed was really comfortable. The water pressure in the bathroom sink is a little weak but shower was fine so it worked out. Overall, it's a nice place to stay if you are visiting New York, especially if you plan to be out and about most of time and come back home to sleep and relax..

We loved staying at Qiyao's apartment - she is very friendly, accommodating, generous and quick to respond to messages. The apartment itself is very clean and comfortable (the bed is amazing - we slept so well!). Great water pressure in the shower and it was always hot. There is some hanging space (clothes hangers provided) for your clothes. Key pick-up via lockbox so easy and convenient. However, the best part about the apartment is the location - it could not be more convenient. The area is full of terrific restaurants, cafes and bars and very close to the Metro. Walk down to "Rosemary's" for the best Italian food and you must get coffee from "Stumptown" and brunch/lunch at "Bluestone Lane" (their cold-drip coffee is the best around).  "The Spotted Pig" gastropub, "Raines Law Room" cocktail bar and "Employees Only" bar are all within easy walking distance (15 mins).  We highly recommend Qiyao's apartment - she is a wonderful host!!
Qiyao´s apartement has perfect location. She was very helpful to make our stay as comfortable as it could be.

Qiyao's apt is ideally situated one block from the subway and in the middle of everything in Washington Square area. The bed was comfy we had all we needed. It had everything we needed. Our only thought was that hooks to hang towels would be great. Otherwise a solid spot!

Bel appart / studio , bien placé et propre avec pas mal de commerce et restaurants  a coté et surtout calme , idéal pour un couple.
Je recommande vivement
Great location and perfect host, will definitely recommend this place:-)
Logement très bien situé, proche du métro, quartier très sympa. Qiyao répond rapidement aux questions et elle est arrangeante sur l'organisation des départ et arrivée.
Great location right in the heart of the Village and near every subway line
Nice appartement. Great location for a stay in NY. Near to the subway. Communication with the host was fast and Qiyao always tried to help us. We would stay here again.

Amazing location - it really doesn't get any better. Tons of great shops and restos around. Access to subway is steps away.
Qiyao is a very attentive, helpful host. 
Check in couldn't be easier.
Apartment is exactly as shown in pictures.
Bed is super comfortable. 
Quite/no noise from outside. 
Great rooftop deck.
A bit small - but that's to be expected - it's New York!
Overall great value for Manhattan.

There isn’t a more centrally located apartment for this price in NYC! It’s clean, fresh smelling, comfy bed, nice soft linens, Nespresso machine, WiFi, all you could want. Qiyao is great at responding quickly, she also shared some awesome local tips for restaurants, cafes, bars, etc. close to subway lines, quaint and friendly neighborhood. Already planning to return, would stay here again ! Thanks Qiyao!

El departamento es chiquito pero súper acogedor. Está ubicado en una buena zona a media cuadra de la estación del subte, lo cual facilita el traslado a cualquier parte de NY. Quiyao es súper amable y siempre estuvo a disposición para contestar a nuestras dudas. 100% recomendable

Qiyao's apartment is in a great location in the heart of Manhattan, it's close to the subway, supermarket, local comedy clubs and restaurants. The perfect size for one or two people and has a well equipped kitchen. Qiyao is a great host, she is very thoughtful and makes sure you have everything you need to make your stay comfortable, definitely recommend! :)

El departamento es genial, incluso para dos personas, una pareja. 
El agua del baño tiene presión y buena temperatura. La calefacción también es muy buena. Y lo más destacable es la ubicación. Súper cerca del metro que te lleva a todos lados! 
Qiyao es muy atenta y se puso siempre en contacto por cualquier asunto. Sin dudas volvería!
Highly recommended - thanks for a great stay!

Awesome place to stay! So cozy and warm. Great location in the West Village, subway right around the corner, everything is walking distance from the apt.
Qiyao was a great host, everything was just as described and the communication was flawless. She even let us leave our luggage in the apartment for the last day as our flight was late in the evening, we're so grateful for that kind gesture.
All in all, 10/10, we will definitely be back soon!

Lovely little apartment in the heart of lively Greenwich Village with plenty of restaurants and bars around with easy access to the rest of the city! Despite the lively area, the apartment was really quiet; we slept really well and couldn't here any traffic etc.
Great place to stay on a budget in NYC! Close to subway stops and great restaurants. Out of the madness of Times Square and the more touristy places.

A perfect weekend landing spot in one of the best neighborhoods in New York! Qiyao was extremely helpful and responsive, check in was a breeze, and the apartment was clean, nice, and had all of the small amenities we needed. You can’t beat the location, we were able to walk to so many great neighborhoods and hop on the 1 train to go up and downtown easily. Highly recommend!

A great apartment in a great area. I didn’t get to meet Qiyao but the check process was the easiest I have had. The  part meant had everything I needed to make me feel at home and the location is perfect . I would have no hesitation recommending this apartment

Qiyao's place is everything I wanted. I have no flaws to point out. The location is superb to take advantage of the best that the neighborhood and NYC have to offer (be sure to check out her  recommendations!). You have a subway station right around the corner that can take you to anywhere you want and straight to JFK airport. The self-check in/out is ingenious and perfect for late night arrivals. I'll definitely check the availability for future trips before checking anywhere else.

L'appartement est très bien situé.
Proche de tout, restaurants, commerces et surtout métro.
Qiyao répond rapidement à vos demandes et le principe du keylock est très pratique pour le check in et le check out.
Vous pouvez réserver sans crainte. Hautement recommandé.

Qiyao’s place is super well located, right in the village with loads of good bars and restaurants in the area. Check-in and check out were super easy. The place is comfy, clean and everything you need is available. Qiyao was super responsive to questions and really helpful.

Qiyao is a very responsive host. Also, though we didn't meet, I felt she was very warm and personable from our message exchanges organizing my trip. I loved the location of her apartment, which is close to NYU, Washington Square and many delicious restaurants. The apartment itself is very cosy, and Qiyao keeps it very clean. I'd definitely stay here again.
Small but nice and fantastic location. Worth it for that alone. Lack of any way to play music was a bummer, bring a Bluetooth speaker if you have one.
Super central, clean and hospitable place in a great neighbourhood.

This is a great location in NYC and walkable to so many great neighborhoods. There are outstanding restaurants on this very street and the subway is very close by. If you are imterested I’m a variety of neighborhoods in lower Manhattan, this place is a great find. It’s simple but clean and comfortable. Served all of my needs for a wonderful visit to NYC. Qiyao is a very responsive host...... when I had some difficulty adjusting water temperature in shower, she got back to me quickly. Thanks Qiyao!

Qiyao is great host,very thoughtful and responsive. Her instructions to find the apartment and check in were clear and simple to follow. The apartment itself has everything you need to stay in New York and located in brilliant location of Greenwich village. The transportations to the apartment and down town was very easy use  , subway just 2 mins walk away. We would definitely recommend Qiyao’s apartment to anyone who wants to explore NYC. Thank you Qiyao.
Fabulous location. Buildng is a little dirty but the apt is clean and after all it's NYC.

Apartment was a great deal for the location. The apt was just as advertised and the size was just enough for my husband and I. The location is great and close to many restaurants, stores, and public transportation. Q was a good host and was accommodating. Highly recommend!
Great location. Perfect for a couple.

This apartment is very close to the subway and to all Greenwich Village has to offer. Having never been to New York before, we had no trounle at all using Qiyao's tips and helpful information to find great restaurants and to take the subway to anywhere we wanted to go.  The apartment had everything we needed. Note, there is not a microwave, but given the plethora of great restaurants around, we found there wasn't a need. I thought it would be loud being in the city, but the apartment was actually more quiet than our home is!
Qiyao's place is an amazing find in New York. It's in a beautiful part of town, near public transportation, and incredibly affordable. I would recommend it to all of my friends.
Great location, great communication and easy process!

Dieses sehr kleine 1-Raum-Appartment ist in einer guten Lage und absolut ruhig, da Fenster zum Hinterhof. Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel sind gut erreichbar und Greenwich Village ist ein schöner Stadtteil mit Bars, Cafes und Restaurants. Wir haben Qiyao nicht kennen gelernt. Schlüssel werden in einem kleinen Schloss hinterlegt, was die An- und Abreise zu jeder Zeit flexibel möglich macht. Kommunikation mit Qiyao war aber über Mail bzw. SMS möglich. Alles war sauber und ordentlich.
Qiyao’s place is great. Convenient to so much and an excellent place to use as a home base when visiting NYC. She was easy to communicate with and everything was just as described. Thank you!

Appartement dans un quartier sympa, proche métro ! 
Chambre au calme. Très appréciable.
Great experience, highly recommended.
It was an amazing stay- perfect location and great spot. Had the best time, thank you!
All great! Great location! Qiyao tips and all are very helpful! Very convenient!
Qiyao’s apartment was clean and felt very secure! She was prompt and friendly in her responses! The bed is super comfy and there was everything that we needed available to us!! :)
A wonderful place to stay. Central to everything and no street noise. Would happily return.
Awesome location, spotless and cozy apartment.
Good place to stay. Good location. Neighbor(s) smokes so apartment sometimes smells like cigarette.
The apartment is in a typical walk-up old building of Manhattan, and the apartment is just what you need to sleep after a long day touring around. Location is perfect!

I had an excellent stay at Qiyao's place. Place is very well located, close to everything, just minutes from the metro station. The place is perfect for single or couples. Qiyao is an excellent host. Thanks a lot for hosting me and all the instructions and help.
Great location! Everything as advertised. No complaints.

Qiyao was an awesome host, responsive and helpful. She was very flexible with our check out and went out of her way to accommodate a better check in time for our early flight. Other than that, the location is amazing. Right around the corner of washington square park. The place itself is small but has everything you need.

Qiyao’s house is really good location and quiet space.
She is great host.
Such a cute little apartment. Perfect for two people. Comfy bed. We were provided with so many great recommendations for the area. Amazing location.

Wonderful host and nice place! Communicating was easy, quick and effective. The place is located close to the subway and near one of the iconic parks of New York. She provided local tips for places to go, places to eat and was easy to work with. We had no issues, arrived to find a very homey apartment and had a wonderful stay. I would stay again next time.
Great location yet quiet at night. The apartment was clean and comfortable.

Great value, unbeatable location. Very clean and well appointed. If you have realistic expectations that you are in someone’s lived in studio apartment you will not be disappointed. It can not be understated how incredible this west village location is.
Great space in an amazing location. Qiyao is a great host. Very communicative.

Qiyao's place is in a fantastic location. Ideal for 1 guest or a couple to enjoy Greenwich Village, Soho and the surrounding areas. Great bars, restaurants and shops are all within walking distance and there's even somewhere to get a foot massage downstairs after you've tired yourself out exploring!

Nice AirBnB. There's a subway just around the corner, which makes public transport easy. Easy lockbox check-in, which meant no waiting around for your AirBnB host to arrive, this was really appreciated. the apartment was nice, the bed was super comfy and the curtain blacked out most of the light when closed, so we could sleep in without having sunlight waking us up. The fridge, stove and all the amenities worked well. The shower worked well and had plenty of hot water, although we didnt need it because it was so hot during the week outside. The air-con is an evaporative unit, so whilst it kept the room at a comfortable temp, it was quite noisy (but it's a constant noise, so you can still sleep alright). There's a CVS Pharmacy 2 blocks up the road with a small grocery store attached to it, which made it a very handy spot for late night alcohol purchasing and snacks. Qiyao is a great host, she gives you a guide once you book, which makes staying at the AirBnB super easy. Thanks for having us!

The location is really good, easy to walk to nice areas in the West Village. The subway is very close.
The apartment is fairly small and a bit cluttered, so there wasn’t really enough room for two of us and our suitcases (there is no where to unpack and no space for suitcases). There was a huge air conditioner unit taking up space, which had its pipe installed in a piece of cardboard holding the window open, so there was a draft and a fair bit of a noise coming in. We had to block it with tissues. 
The bathroom window is also stuck open so there is quite a draft in the apartment. 
We liked the location, but the apartment is really suited to just one and could do with a bit of a spruce.

Qiyao generously allowed us to checkout late, and she provided a great house "manual" that covered everything.  Her place is in a fantastic location -- it doesn't get better!  I'd definitely recommend her as a host and would stay in her place again.

But just as a note, it is a bit challenging to get hot water in the shower/bath (we could only get lukewarm water, and only for a couple of minutes).

The best thing about Qiyao’s place is the location.  On a second floor but secluded and in the back so it was super quiet.  It’s pretty small but after all its New York and it has the essentials.  Queen bed was comfy.  WiFi was fast.  Coffee and tea.   Her checkin tips were good.  Fantastic location w subway station w lots of lines right around the corner. Tons of restaurants, shops, coffee, and Washington Square a few blocks away.  Would recommend for a single or couple who need a comfy centrally located place to sleep.
Great location!! That apartment was very clean and comfortable. Q was a great host, she was quick to respond and easy to communicate with!

Das Apartment ist ziemlich klein, reicht aber für 1-2 Personen für ein paar Tage aus. Die Lage in Greenwich Village ist fantastisch! Der Check in und Check out war unkompliziert, die Kommunikation ebenfalls. Das Bad war winzig und schon etwas verwohnt. Auch der Duschvorhang hatte leider schon Schimmelansätze und sollte mal ausgetauscht werden - kostet ja wirklich nicht viel. In Summe eine gute Erfahrung.
Good location  & clear directions.
Great!
Perfect location with lots of great restaurants in the area. Easy access to subways. Quiet building. Perfect setup.

This place is great! The location is amazing, right in the center of everything. Qiyao gave great instructions and recommendations and was always quick to respond. I will be recommending this to other and hope to stay here again in the future!

Buena estancia en el alojamiento.

Muy buena ubicación, al lado de un metro por el que pasan varias líneas y cerca de restaurantes y tiendas

El alojamiento bien equipado y sin problemas.

Tuvimos un problema con el agua caliente que nos lo solucionó.

Por último destacar que el último día nos permitió quedarnos más tiempo hasta que saliera nuestro vuelo.

Apartamento recomendable.
Nice flat and good place, thanks Qiyao !

Lovely little appartment in a great location!! Close to everything you need. Qiyao provides heaps of good local tips. 
Self check in and out is easy.

Perfect place for a couple! Location was amazing, very easy to get a subway to anywhere in Manhattan and lots of good food and bars in walking distance. We also found the neighbourhood very safe, even at night. It was fairly quiet for NYC and we didn’t have any issues with noise. Host was great and easy to communicate with. Will be recommending to our friends :)

Great location. Super easy self check-in and check-out.
Subway right on the corner. Chelsea Market and SoHo are less than 10 min away.
Qiyao provides a lot of local tips
Great location and very clean
Great location, spacious by NYC standards, good sized kitchen, comfortable bed, easy check-in and out.

This was a lovely stay! Location is excellent and the apartment is tidy and has all that you need for a short stay. The check-in/check-out is flexible which ended up causing problems with the back to back bookings. I would have preferred a hard check in and check out time, but I do appreciate that Qiyao tries to meet her guests' needs it is just tough when those needs conflict. The key location and locking/unlocking the front door could use some more detail as it took me several minutes to figure out the lock. Had me freaking out that I wouldn't be able to get in! But it finally opened and from then on we had a wonderful stay. Would stay again/reccommend to a friend.
Location, location, location! Great spot in the middle of the West Village.
The place was great. Very close to the subway and great local spots.
This place was the perfect location and perfect size for a get away weekend. All the information she gave was super helpful too!
Clean space and in a perfect location.

Qiyao was very flexible with check in and checkout. She also provided us with a guide that was quite helpful. It included details about our stay as well as her personal favorites of where to eat and things to see. 
I don’t want to be too harsh here but I would not describe Qiyao’s place as “stylish”. It’s  pretty sparse and she needs to improve some of the amenities and provisions in her apartment that would make anyone’s stay more enjoyable and feel like it was a good value. I don’t think I’m being too picky here but I’m not an NYU student. (Mom with a teen-age daughter). Bed and bath linens need replacing to start, as well as some basic kitchen amenities (microwave, toaster, basic coffee maker, cutting board). 
The bathroom has a cracked sink, broken floor tile and the tub needs to be re-caulked (moldy). 
The bedroom ceiling has a hole that looks like it was caused by water damage and ran down the wall and it was just painted over. There’s one curtain panel over the window, not 2 and the clock is broken (has one hand). The pillows and bed linens are old, the towels are also old and stained and there’s no bath mat for the slippery tile floor. There was once a smoke detector in the kitchen by its been removed. 
The neighborhood is great and is in close proximity to Washington Square, many great shops and restaurants and easy walking distance to a few subway stations. 
We’ll see if my review makes it  for public viewing. Just being honest here.
To check in was kind of tricky because the doors lock was hard to open. But we managed to work around it. The area we stayed in was amazing!

We had a great time at Qiyao’s place. It’s  in a great location - easy to walk to all that West Village has to offer, walk to shopping in SoHo, or take the subway anywhere you need to go. For West Village standards, it’s a pretty big space. Perfect for two people. We stayed there on a cold weekend and it was difficult to figure out how to turn on the heat, but we did after some tinkering around. The bathroom is also very drafty and cold, but there was a space heater in the front we moved into the bathroom. It’s a no-frills type of place, but exactly what we needed for a quick trip to NYC where we were mostly out. 

Also to note - there is no television in the apartment, if that’s something that is important to you.

Really lovely apartment and location! Qiyao was a great host--very well prepared and organized. She was really amenable about my check in/out times and I really appreciated it. Would definitely stay again.
Very convenient location and checkin!
