name: Glebe Treetop Cottage. Just 200m to Sydney Harbour
summary: You’ll love the treetops, bridge and Sydney skyline views from this cosy 1890's terrace on the hill of Glebe Point. Only 200m to the waterfront, 10mins to the Fish Markets and 25mins to the CBD. Relax in privacy.
space: No doubt you’re an individual, so why stay in a soulless apartment block or faceless hotel room??? Come stay in an authentic Sydney terrace, surrounded by village atmosphere that's just 2mins from the harbour and only 2.5km from the city centre.  Treetop Cottage is a cosy terrace built in 1890 on the eastern side of Glebe point. It has two bedrooms (one has 2 beds), one bathroom, separate lounge and dining room. The kitchen and laundry are brand new. A covered rooftop deck provides a view of the ANZAC bridge, portions of Blackwattle bay and the city through the trees.
description: You’ll love the treetops, bridge and Sydney skyline views from this cosy (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 's terrace on the hill of Glebe Point. Only 200m to the waterfront, 10mins to the Fish Markets and 25mins to the CBD. Relax in privacy. No doubt you’re an individual, so why stay in a soulless apartment block or faceless hotel room??? Come stay in an authentic Sydney terrace, surrounded by village atmosphere that's just 2mins from the harbour and only 2.5km from the city centre.  Treetop Cottage is a cosy terrace built in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) on the eastern side of Glebe point. It has two bedrooms (one has 2 beds), one bathroom, separate lounge and dining room. The kitchen and laundry are brand new. A covered rooftop deck provides a view of the ANZAC bridge, portions of Blackwattle bay and the city through the trees. The house is accessible 24Hrs a day. On the front door there is a small combination safe which contains two door keys. The internal stairs are narrow and may
neighborhood_overview: Come to our village of Glebe and you'll find a myriad of cafés and restaurants, foreshore walk ways, parklands and proximity to the wonderful city of Sydney with all that it and its beautiful harbour have to offer. Travel to the city by light rail (tram), by bus, an inexpensive taxi or simply walk.  In Glebe besides fantastic food, there are bookshops, fashion stores and collectables. On Saturday visit Glebe Markets on the grounds of Glebe Public School.  'The Glebe' was given to the church by the Governour in the first few years of European settlement as a means for the church to support itself.  Most of the suburb was sub-dived and built upon in the 1880's and the vast majority of the terraces you'll see today were built in that era. Workers unions and left wing politicians managed to fend off building developers in the 1970's resulting in charming terraced townhouses and cottages surviving so close the the city skyscrapers.
notes: *The house can accommodate up to 5 adults and two babies. Stored in the house there are; two portable cots, two prams, two baby feeding seats and one baby car seat. Please inform us if you wish to use the car seat.  *There is unlimited WiFi in the cottage with speeds between 10mbs to 15mbs (sufficient for most streaming services). The TV is fitted with a ChromeCast connected to the WiFi for streaming from your phone. Great for YouTube. *For late/early arrivals there are staple food items free for use. *A folder is in the lounge contains local menus to the closest restaurants and some maps. In the folder you'll also find two public transport Opal cards and starter phone sim cards. If you use the Opal cards please return them when you leave (with enough credit for at least one trip, if you can). The sim cards can be registered online. *There are numerous books in the house ( mainly sci-fi ). If you become engrossed in a particular book and cant leave it, please talk to us and we'll see w
transit: You’ll be in the centre of the inner-inner west and just a hop to the city centre, get about and make the most of it.  (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps on a 4G smartphone will make your trip so much easier.  WALKING;  Walking is a great way to see the area as everything is so close for the average walker. It's only 10min walk to the fish markets and only 20min to Darling Harbour. The shops at the top of the street are 2min walk and it's a mere 2min to the wonderful Glebe foreshore parklands.  At the bottom of Forsyth Street turn right and you can walk along the waterfront all the way to the city via the fish markets (with a few street portions). If you turn left at the bottom of Forsyth Street, it's a beautiful waterfront parkland walk as far as Annandale. PUBLIC TRANSPORT; In the folder in the lounge room, you should find two public transport Opal cards. The cards work for all public transport, be it bus, ferry or train. If you use them, please replace them, with enough value for at least one
access: The house is accessible 24Hrs a day. On the front door there is a small combination safe which contains two door keys. The internal stairs are narrow and may be difficult for those with mobility issues.
interaction: We live just minutes away and can be on hand personally, by Airbnb app, by phone, by text or by email should anything arise.
house_rules: -Please respect our neighbours. No large parties please.   -No smoking allowed anywhere on the premises. -Sorry, no pets allowed. -Children under 10 must be supervised while on upstairs deck. -The Internet access is unlimited. -The phone is free for local and national calls. No outgoing international calls please (unless in an emergency). -Please be aware that the stairs to the main bedroom and deck are narrow and may be difficult for those with mobility issues. -Red and yellow garbage bins need to be put on the footpath on each Monday night. Red bin is for general waste. Yellow bin is ONLY for recyclables such as metal, paper, plastic and glass. Please bring the bins back in on Tuesday afternoon.

host.host_about: I've lived in Glebe for over 20 years, but have travelled widely and called Tokyo, Singapore, KL and London home as well. I work in the media, have a two daughters (a baby and a 5 year old) and therefore a Wiggles phobia.

reviews.comments: We enjoyed staying at the Treetop Cottage on our visit to Sydney!  Bryan welcomed us warmly when we arrived and provided a tour and a description of all the amenities.  The two level cottage is a charming row house in the historic district of Glebe.  Our family was very comfortable (2 adults, 2 children), it was truly a home away from home.  Bryan thought of everything to make our visit comfortable; from great coffee, to comfortable bedding.  He even went out of his way to offer a wifi connection and Opal cards for public transportation.  We loved our Australian holiday and really enjoyed Sydney and the Treetop Cottage!

Bryan was a fantastic host. He was really helpful, quick with communication and made us feel at home. He was there to meet us upon check-in and gave us a run through the house, as well as some handy tops for our stay in Sydney. 
The house itself was just perfect. It is on a lovely quiet street, set back from the shops and restaurants near-by. The city is in walking distance and the view from the terrace is lovely.
I would 100% stay here again and would recommend it to anyone visiting Sydney. Thanks Bryan!

My husband, baby and I had a wonderful time staying at the cottage. All the baby equipment at the cottage really made our stay so much easier. We loved the easy access to restaurants and often strolled around the waterfront and darling harbor.  Bryan and his daughter are such great hosts!

The house was exactly as described and in a fantastic location, communication was exceptionally fast, friendly and helpful.
Would definitely recommend!
非常不错的房东和住宿,房子不是很大,但是非常温馨,比较有情调的地方,厨房的用具一应具全,房东先生非常热情,钥匙不用非要随身带着房东设置的小密码盒非常实用就在门上钥匙在里面回来的时候取出用完锁上不错!

It was a great experience staying at this awesome victorian old house. Bryan is a fantastic host and we were able to feel the great care and effort he had put in to make our stay nice and cozy. We only have good things to say about Bryan and his lovely spot.

Bryan is a really nice host. We can feel his love in the house. There are essential appliance and stuff prepared in the house. So people arrived in a rush can have a rest before buy anything. And the environment is really nice. People can have a walk along the bay. The public transportation is also convenient. The central is about 30 minutes bus away. If I will travel in Sydney again, I may choose Bryan's house again:) My friend and I had a really nice experience here.
Fantastic host and house! Our family had a great time and Bryan catered too all our needs. Highly recommend!!
Nice clean tidy place I would highly recommend it to anyone.

we enjoyed our stay at this unique spacious loft. We love the balcony, and the neighborhood is nice and convenient. Though we never met, Bryan was very prompt in fulfilling our requests. Overall an enjoyable stay.

Great house with great location, walking distance to Main Street and mins drive to CBD, opera house and darling  harbor. Within half an hour, u could reach Sydney's most fabulous beaches. 
Bryan maintained his house very well and provided all necessary commodities which makes the stay very comfortable and convenient.
And BTW the treetop balcony is fantastic.

This was our first Airbnb experience and Bryan's cottage was perfect! Bryan welcomed us even when we arrived on Easter Sunday! Throughout our weeklong stay, Bryan was very quick to respond to any questions we had. 

As for the cottage, it was well appointed and cozy, great location with easy access to the light rail and a plethora of cafes, bakeries, markets, it was perfect. 

What I really appreciated was the collection of snacks and beverages that was waiting for us in the kitchen, making our stay great. 
In addition, Bryan had prepared a book of maps, activities, take out menus, and best of all, a set of Opal (rechargeable public transportation) cars for us to use and reasonably asking us to keep a minimum balance I found great.

Bryan, thank you again for your hospitality and contributing to a great family vacation.

Bryan made us feel very welcome. The house had everything that we needed from milk in the fridge, chilled bottle of wine, transit cards and maps. Loved the house, neighbourhood and proximity to public transport. We had a fantastic time!!!

Bryan is a kind and hospitable host. He came by on one of the evenings to meet us and make sure we were settling in well. It was clear that he wanted us to have a nice stay in Sydney.

We would love to return to Sydney and stay at Bryan's place.

Stayed at Bryan's treetop cottage for a week with some mates, best Airbnb I've stayed at.
Met Bryan when we arrived and couldn't have felt more welcome.
Perfect location, beautiful house at a good price.
I would recommend to everyone.

Bryan was a great host, very prompt and thorough when answering any questions both before and during the stay. 

Great location, Glebe on your doorstep and Darling Harbour is a 20 minute walk or short train journey away. 

The cottage is exactly as described, and was spotlessly clean when we arrived. Fabulous balcony with a lovely view, perfect to enjoy your morning coffee or relax with a book.  Comfortable beds and living areas, and the extras left by the host, including travel cards, made everything really easy. 

If I'm lucky enough to return to Sydney I would love to stay here again.
Bryan人很好,当天入住我们不会用厨房设施,还特意过来教我们用｡房子位置很好,和鱼市场很近,和市中心也近,房子周边很安静,适合睡眠｡

Clean, cosy, comfortable! Quiet neighbourhood (we are not home most of the time lol). Spacious shower room is a plus. Nice to hang out together for TV time in the living room and a game of chess. Thumbs up!

Bryan was a terrific host, very communicative, even anticipating our needs.  For instance, we are academics and Bryan, without prompting, sussed out that we might need a desk during our stay and set one up upstairs!  The Treehouse is in the perfect location - Glebe is AMAZING - and totally comfortable.
Very clean and comfy. The cottage is in a fantastic location right near Glebe Point Road and the light rail. Water views from the terrace too. Would definitely stay again.

Yes Bryan was very accommodating with the availability when checking in and checking out which was appreciated due to our travelling a long distance.
Your home was very accommodating for the family having everything available that you would in your own home.  The weekend experience was fantastic.

Enjoyed our stay. Bryan very responsive and helpful.  House well set up and clean.  Facilities very good. Stairs to upper floor posed some problems for us but would be OK for most.  Entertained by the plover birds that escorted their chick up and down the street! Great location - hilly but could walk to the city and light rail is convenient. Felt very inner Sydney.

Nous avons passé un tres bon séjour chez Bryan. La maison est bien adapté pour 5 adultes. Nous sommes accueilli avec, dans le frigo, jus d'orange, bière et bouteille d'eau! Bryan est tres disponible. Il répond toujours présent à chaque demande. L'arrêt de bus est à 5 minutes à pieds. Ensuite il faut compter 25 minutes pour atteindre le centre.
Pour finir, merci à Bryan pour ce séjour!!!

Bryan is a great host who goes out of his way to make guests comfortable.  Providing Opal (transport) cards and SIM cards is a particularly nice touch (we didn't need but so great for overseas guests).  Great location close to loads of restaurants and bus or light rail.  The highlight of Treetop Cottage is absolutely the rooftop deck which is a glorious place to sip wine or read a book.

The cottage was exactly as described and Bryan was very helpful. The baby equipment at the cottage was handy, my 1 year old son enjoyed getting around Sydney in the pram that was provided at the Treetop cottage. The location was fanatic. It was quite convenient to take the public transport, even with two young kids.

My family and I very much enjoyed our stay in Sydney largely due to Bryan and his lovely house. We were traveling with a 16 month old so the pram, portable high-chair and other baby/kid amenities were a major plus for us. Bryan even offered to come over and install a baby gate for us in the house! 

Everything in the house was clean when we arrived and there were multiples of all the basics such as towels, toilet paper, etc. We have stayed other places where only 1 towel per person is provided. Bryan even dropped off extra pillowcases and toilet paper during our stay =) Bryan was also more than accommodating to our travel schedule and even offered to let us check out later. 

The house is close to public transit so it's really easy to get to places. The house even has OPAL cards to you to use during your stay. There is an abundance of eclectic foods to choose from only a block or two away. 

We really enjoyed our stay in Glebe and will definately look to stay here next time we are in Sydney.
Treetoppers is a nice place, conveniently located in Glebe. the house is cosy and not very big, suitable for max 4 people. we enjoyed our stay and Bryan was a very nice host.
Nice little place, fairly handy to shops and restaurants, and approx 10 minutes to the tram. Bryan also comes recommended as a great host -- happily pointed us tourists in the right direction.
Danke Bryan für dein gemütliches cottage. Wir haben es sehr genossen in Glebe zu wohnen. Ein tolles Viertel mit vielen Restaurants und Cafés.

Great place, vey bice location. The cottage is PERFECT for familys with children or couples. Bryan was the best host I have ever, he had everything you can think about in the cottage. He have left some eggs, mill, juce and lots of other stuff on our check-in. He came also to brong us a power extension and some other things that we have asked for. Thanks Bryan for the great place and being a great host.
Nice place for the family!

Lovely cottage, we felt like locals living there, everything Sydney has to offer nearby, very helpful host
Recommended

Quaint and well equipped little terrace house close to the city (1/2 hour walk or 20 min by tram) but still in a quiet and very charming neighbourhood. The upstairs terrace has a fantastic view over the harbour. The kitchen even had a dishwasher and there were  both a washing machine and tumbling dryer. Only small problem we encountered was that the fan in the bathroom was not working so it got quite humid in there - but the host told us it has only just stopped working and he was getting it fixed. He was very helpful and even had milk, juice and a bottle of wine waiting for us in the fridge upon arrival. Would highly recommend this house, you get a lot more for your money than in central Sydney and are still really close to everything.

Gastgeber Bryan sehr nett und hilfsbereit, Haus dagegen stark sanierungsbedürftig, muffig, nicht beheizt, wenig Warmwasser und dunkel, Dachterrasse entschädigt dafür etwas, für kurze Aufenthalte im Sommer (weniger Feuchtigkeit) prima, bei längeren Besuchen im Winter mit 3 Personen stimmt Preis - Leistung nicht
A wonderful cottage with plenty of room and amenities. Close to  what Sydney has to offer and with a homeliness feel for an extended stay.
Place is a little narrow, but very cosy. the second floor is gorgeous. The view near the park nearby is amazing if you're into good scenery. The host is very helpful and communicates well with you.

Lovely quirky cottage in handy position to reach Darling Harbour and nearby Glebe. Comfy beds. Nice gesture of welcome pack on arrival. Only criticism is extractor fan broken in bathroom which caused humidity and difficult to keep clean. The host is very helpful and keeen to share local knowledge and wants to help you have a great time.
thanks for facilitation

Bryan's cottage is located in a beautiful quiet residential neighborhood. We loved the combination of antique charm and renovated kitchen & bathroom facilities. Communication was smooth and instant. Will definitely stay there again!
A lovely little house in an interesting area. Walks to the Blackwattle Bay and fish market were great and Glebe markets were really good. Bryan is a great host. Really recommend.
This is a fantastic place to stay! There was lots of room and it has a fantastic location. The view from the balcony is also fabulous and a perfect place to hang out on a warm night.
Bryan's place in Glebe offer great value for money. Transportation connectivity is excellent
Fantastic spot, convenient location, lots of hidden treasures all around. Worth the stay!
We've stayed in a lot of airbnbs and this was a top for us. Great location, really well stocked and clean and great hosts. Thanks!
Excellent location, lovely space for 4-5 friends, accessible to anywhere that’s worth going to in Sydney!
Very beautiful place to stay. Lovely neighborhood. Easy access to bus/train station. Highly recommend!

The cottage was exactly what we needed for our stay in Sydney! It's so easy to access all the amazing sites and there's tons to do right outside the front door. Bryan was great with quick responses and provided so many helpful extras that you would never get at a generic hotel. Highly recommend the French toast with bacon and bananas at Esca and all the other cafes on Glebe Point Road. We had everything we could have needed for a couple with a toddler. It was my first trip to Sydney and this home made it so easy to get to know the city.
Bryan is very helpful and kind. The house is lovely and very close to the Harbour. It has everything we need and is just few minutes to CBD by tram. It was a pretty nice experience:).

Excellent location and good value for money. Not the cheapest place but it was well worth the cost - nice little extras eg. milk were waiting for us in the fridge which was a great touch! The balcony and view is lovely!

We loved our time in Bryan’s accommodation! 
The cottage is very cozy, comfortable and perfectly located - close to the center and a just 3 minutes walk to the park. The park is perfect for jogging, skating, walks and provides an incredible view of the Anzac and Harbour Bridge! If you want to have another amazing view, you just need to go the cottage’s balcony and enjoy the sundown with a glass of good wine. 

We had an amazing time while we visited Sydney. If you search for a cozy home, close to the city, but a in quiet neighbourhood, the Glebe and Bryan’s cottage is perfect for you!!

Great place. Nice quiet area. Shops, cafes and a couple of pubs near. Nice walk into town. Parks and cinema also near. Owner always replied quickly to messages. House compact but was great for our family of 5 for 4 nights.
This is such a great querky cottage to stay in.  Lovely location, comfortable and has eveyrthing you need for a city stay.  Many thanks Bryan!
Lovely house, perfect location, really friendly host and lots of thoughtful extras. Would stay again whenever possible.

Glebe ist ein alternativer und sehr angenehmer Stadtteil und Bryans Haus liegt in einer ruhigen und schönen Seitenstraße mit alten Häusern. Besonders das Deck mit Blick auf die Anzac Bridge und das Wasser hat uns gut gefallen, frühstücken dort oder ein Glas Wein nach der Stadtbesichtigung trinken. Die Anbindung per Bus war unproblematisch, der Fußweg zum Jubilee Park (unbedingt den neuen Tramshed mit vielen tollen Läden und Restaurants besuchen!) und zum Darling Harbour herrlich am Wasser entlang und leicht zu finden. Kleines Minus: wir waren zu zweit und es hat uns gut gefallen, mit mehr Leuten könnte es etwas eng werden. Wir würden auf jeden Fall gerne wieder dort wohnen.
Bryan is a great host. Very friendly and helpful. His house is really nice, close to public transport - buses and lightrail. It seems bigger than shown at the photos. Super stay :-)
Very nice and comfortable house. Thanks very much Bryan. We recommend 100%!
An excellent, clean and cute place to stay in Sydney! Wonderful cafes and stores just around the corner and only a 20 minute walk to darling harbour! Highly recommend this beautiful home.
Amazing holiday in Glebe. Very lovely house and very convenient. Close to the fish market and downtown. Thanks to the kindhearted landlord Bryan.
Amazing experience. Very clean, great communication and very close to public transport. Strongly recommend it. Thank you Bryan!

Thanks for a lovely stay! The location was perfect and a very quiet neighborhood. Loved the upstairs balcony view. Plenty of space to settle in and enjoy for a week. Also appreciated the tips for nearby restaurants and other needs. Highly recommend a trip to the swimming pool down the street at Victoria Park if you like swimming laps.

We stayed by Bryan for 5 nights (2 adults with 3 little childrens). Bryan is an amazing host. From the first moment we booked he was super responsive, gave lots of tips, filled the fridge with some stuff for us, and even gave us stroller to use for the little one and some games for the childrens. The place is well equipment with everything you need in the living room, in the kitchen and in the showers. Everything was clean when we got there, and also was clean towels and clean sheets waited for each of us. Also the place is in excellent location: super quite neighborhood, 5 minutes from bus station, 7 minutes from the train station, and 22 minutes to the center (harbor). You can't ask more then that... Super great location for anyone including families. I have been in many AirBnB apartments in different countries, and hosting like Bryan gave I never saw.... I highly recommend to anyone traveling to Sydney to stay at Bryan's place - better the  hotel.
Bryan was very helpful and eager to please. It's a great location in historic Glebe close to the Light Rail which gets you to Darling Harbour in 5 minutes.
Reliable host.

A great place with great hosts, easy walk to everything and so close to the light rail and buses. Quiet at night for a great sleep and space for everyone to chill. Lots of places an easy walk to eat, really was the perfect spot for us to have our holiday . Definitely planning to stay here again.
Bryan's cottage is an easy to find BNB. Very close to trams and bus routes. Owners are great with responding to questions.
A neat cozy old house.  The host is great.  The location is great.  Use UBER if you travel with your family.  Only A$15-18 to Opera House and other sightseeing spots in the city.
Great Glebe location, close to restaurants, shops and recreation, plus walking distance to the Darling Harbour!

An excellent venue, clean, comfortable and brilliant location. Walking distance from the city. Bryan is a great host and professional as he is friendly. I very much liked the fact that the cupboard and fridge has essential supply’s and a light breakfast. I would highly recommend staying here and would stay again if we would be visiting Sydney.
Had an wonderful stay, the place is great and Brian is a very accommodating host. Hope to return.

My first ever airbnb and Bryan made it stress free. Bryan was very hospitable  and accommodating during our stay. This little place is perfect for families. Everything was provided for little kids including a portacot, toys, plastic cups and plates. A little kitchen to make breakfast for the hungry tummies and if you feel like cooking everything is provided to make a proper meal. We didn't cook while we were there as there were plenty of restaurants and cafes on Glebe point road just 5 minute walk around the corner. Shops including bakers delight, a corner store, fruit and veggies and a butchers! Light rail (tram) was just a 5 minute walk away. Great location and perfect little home away from home. Definitely recommend!
Bryan is very hospitable.The house is very clean.The location is near Glebe tram station about 5minutes by walk.

Cette maison est parfaite pour voyager en famille. Nous étions 3 adultes et deux enfants, dont un bébé. Bryan nous a très bien accueillis, nous avions tout le nécessaire pour bébé fourni (poussette, chaise haute, lit parapluie). Il y a également tout ce qu’il faut pour cuisiner, ce qui est appréciable quand on ne veut pas tout le temps manger dehors ou se faire livrer.  Vraiment la maison est top et la vue à l’étage est juste sublime. 
La maison est également bien située, tram à 5min à pied, et bus pareil. Les deux lignes sont direct pour central. Et très facile également d’accéder à Darling Harbour. 
Nous ne pouvons que recommander Bryan qui est très disponible et n’hésite pas à nous donner de bons conseils pour apprécier Sydney! Nous reviendrons c’est certain!

I’d highly recommend Bryan’s house. It’s in a convenient location - handy to the tram, shops, and harbour, it was tidy and clean on arrival, had plenty of supplies to make living easy, and the deck is a very pleasant spot to relax with a good view. 
To top all of those factors off, you have Bryan who is very easy to communicate with, replies in a timely manner and is more than willing to assist when asked. 
Not sure you can ask for too much more.

Le logement de Bryan est agréable, bien équipé et situé dans une zone résidentielle non bruyante. Une ligne de bus (nº431) permet d’aller au centre de Sydney en moins d’une demi-heure. 

Bryan est très à l’écoute de ses hôtes et répond rapidement à ses hôtes. Il nous a spontanément proposé du matériel pour enfants (chaise haute, poussette, porte-bébé, lit parapluie, jeux)

Merci Bryan pour ton accueil
Lovely little house, great location, Bryan was a great host and made sure we had everything we could need with 2 babies staying
Bryan was a great host. Excellent communication, a great space a fabulous location. Exactly as promoted: accommodation with soul, close to everything. We'd love to stay again.

房东热情好客 非常友好 
这套房子地点很好走路到海边2分钟 距离fish market和情人港都1到2公里 走到bus站2分钟 坐车到city10分钟
生活设备一应俱全 各种调料 咖啡 茶叶都有 洗漱用品也一应俱全 
价格实惠  适合一家人入住 性价比超高

Overall a good stay, just small issues with cleanliness but otherwise a great location, easy access to transport and main attractions. Cute cottage with character. Flexible early check in and late check out.
Great character cottage in fantastic location!

We had a great time here!! We have 4 children and it fit us all in really well and was a great quaint place. Great location, especially once we worked out the light rail!!! But the kids enjoyed the walk to darling harbour anyway. 
Bryan was super helpful and really responsive! He even delivered a 2nd fan on a really hot day. Great place to stay.
Great intro place to Sydney.

Very nice place. Close to the fish market. In a very nice neighbourhood.
The place was very good for a family of 5. I would come back again...
Great location!!! Was close to everything we needed but still felt quiet and private. The upstairs deck was the cherry on top!
